S01divyav_u:4: 001.001 buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:5: asmāt parāntake vāsavagrāme balaseno nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:7: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:8: 001.004 so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīnāyācate ārāmedavatāṃ vanadevatāṃ śṛṅgāṭakadevatāṃ balipratigrāhikāṃ devatām/
S01divyav_u:10: 001.006 asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante/
S01divyav_u:14: 001.008 api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrāa jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:19: 001.010 eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:23: katame pañca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti, viraktaṃ jānāti/
S01divyav_u:28: 001.017 saceddārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:29: saceddārikā bhavati, vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:30: 001.018 sā āttamanāttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati--diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhasva/
S01divyav_u:32: 001.019 yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:33: so 'pi āttamanāttamanā udānam udānayati--apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:39: 001.022 asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāmādeśayiṣyati--idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatviti/
S01divyav_u:40_0: 001.024 āpannasattvāṃ ca tāṃ viditvā upariprasādatalagatāmayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte
S01divyav_u:43: 002.001 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:45: abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇaviśālalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūruttuṅganāso ratnapratyuptikayā karṇikayā āmuktayālaṃkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:49: dharmatā yasya na śakyate mūlyaṃ kartuṃ tasya koṭimūlyaṃ kriyate/
S01divyav_u:51: 002.007 tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakāni ekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:52: 002.009 ayaṃ dārakaḥ koṭimūlyayā ratnapratyuptikayā āmuktayā jātaḥ, śravaṇeṣu ca nakṣatreṣu/
S01divyav_u:53: bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa iti nāma/
S01divyav_u:55: tasminneva divase balasenasya gṛhapaterdvau preṣyadārakau jātau/
S01divyav_u:56: 002.011 tenaikasya dāraka iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam, aparasya pālaka iti/
S01divyav_u:57: 002.012 śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyām/
S01divyav_u:58: 002.013 so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:60: 002.016 sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyām upanyastaḥ,
S01divyav_u:61: saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyām/
S01divyav_u:62: 002.017 so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghaṭako vācakaḥ piṇḍataḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:63: 002.018 tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:64: trīṇi udyānāni māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:65: 002.019 trīṇi antaḥpurāṇi pratyupasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhakaṃ madhyamaṃ kanīyasam/
S01divyav_u:66: 002.020 sa upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:68: sa koṭikarṇastaṃ pitaraṃ paśyati nityaṃ kṛṣikarmānte--udyuktam/
S01divyav_u:69: 002.022 sa kathayati--tāta, kasyārthe tvaṃ nityameva kṛṣikarmānte udyuktah?
S01divyav_u:71: yathā tvamupariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍasi ramasi paricārayasi,
S01divyav_u:78: tathāpi me ratnānāṃ parikṣayo na syāt/
S01divyav_u:79: 002.028 sa kathayati--tāta anujānīhi māma, paṇyamādāya mahāsamudramavatarāmīti/
S01divyav_u:81: balasenena gṛhapatinā vāsavagrāmake ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtam--yo yuṣmākamutsahate śroṇena koṭikarṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartum,
S01divyav_u:84: 002.032 balaseno nāma gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--[3]kīdṛśena yānena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo yāsyati?
S01divyav_u:90: sa pitrā āhūyoktah--putra na tvayā sārthasya purastād gantavyam, nāpi pṛṣṭhataḥ/
S01divyav_u:94: na ca te sārthavāhe hate sārtho vaktavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:95: 003.006 dāsakapālakāvapi uktau--putrau, yuvābhyāṃ na kenacit prakāreṇa śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo moktavya iti//
S01divyav_u:96: 003.008 athāpareṇa samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ kṛtakautukamaṅgalasvastyayano mātuḥ sakāśamupasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--amba gacchāmi,
S01divyav_u:101: mātā sāśrudurdinavadanā kathayati--putra, kadācidahaṃ putrakaṃ punarapi jīvantaṃ drakṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:104: sa ruṣitaḥ kathayati--amba, ahaṃ kṛtakautūhalamaṅgalasvastyayano mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:107: 003.014 sā kathayati--putra, kharaṃ te vākkarma niścāritam/
S01divyav_u:109: 003.015 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:111: atha śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ kṛtakautūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmoṭaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ samudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:113: 003.018 nipuṇataḥ sāmudram yānapātraṃ pratipādya mahāsamudramavatīrṇo dhanahārakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:115: tena tatropaparīkṣyopaparīkṣya ratnānāṃ tad vahanaṃ pūritaṃ tadyathā tilataṇḍulakolakulatthānām/
S01divyav_u:118: sau śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'pi sārthavāho dāsakapālakāvādāya sārthamadhyādekānte 'pakramya āyaṃ vyayaṃ ca tulayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:119: 003.023 paścāt tenāsau dāsako 'bhihitah--dāsaka, paśya sāthaḥ kiṃ karotīti/
S01divyav_u:125: 003.026 sa sārthaḥ sarātrimeva sthorāṃ lardayitvā saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:128: te kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, kva sārthavāhah? purastād gacchati/
S01divyav_u:129: 003.028 purastād gatvā pṛcchanti--kva sārthavāhah? pṛṣṭhata āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:130: pṛṣṭhato gatvā pṛcchanti--kva sārthavāhah? madhye gacchati/
S01divyav_u:135: 003.031 bhavantaḥ, na śobhanaṃ kṛtam yadasmābhiḥ sārthavāhaśchoritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:140: kriyākāraṃ tāvat karmah--tāvanna kenacicchroṇasya koṭikarṇasya mātāpitṛbhyāmārocayitavyam yāvad bhāṇḍaṃ pratiśāmitaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:142: 004.003 śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ śrutam--śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:144: 004.005 pṛṣṭhato gatvā pṛcchatah--kva sārthavāhah? purastād gacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:146: paścāt te kathayanti--amba vismṛto 'smābhiḥ sārthavāha iti/
S01divyav_u:147: 004.007 tābhyāmeka āgatya kathayati--ayaṃ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:148: 004.008 tasya tāvabhisāraṃ dattvā pratyudgatau na paśyataḥ/
S01divyav_u:149: apara āgatya kathayati--amba, diṣṭyā vardhasva, ayaṃ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:150: 004.009 tasya tāvabhisāraṃ dattvā pratyudgatau na paśyataḥ/
S01divyav_u:152: tābhyāmudyāneṣu svakasabhādevakuleṣu cchatrāṇi vyajanāni kalaśāni upānahāni cākṣarāṇi abhilikhitāni dattāni sthāpitāni--yadi tāvacchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo jīvati,
S01divyav_u:154: 004.012 atha cyutaḥ kālagataḥ, tasyaiva gatyupapattisthānāt sthānāntaraviśeṣatāyai/
S01divyav_u:156: 004.014 śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ sārthavāho 'pi sūryāṃśubhiḥ spṛṣṭa ātāpitaḥ prativibuddho yāvat sārthaṃ na paśyati nānyatra gardabhayānameva/
S01divyav_u:158: 004.016 rātrau ca vātena pravāyatā vālukayā mārgo vyapoḍhaḥ pithitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:159: te ca gardabhāḥ smṛtimanto gandhamāghrāyāghrāya śanairmandamandaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:160: 004.017 sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kasmādete śanairmandamandaṃ gacchantīti kṛtvā pratodayaṣṭyā tāḍitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:161: 004.018 te saṃbhrāntā ākulībhūtāḥ smṛtibhraṣṭā unmārgeṇa saṃprasthitāḥ, yāvadanyatamāśāṭavīṃ praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:162: 004.019 te tṛṣārtā vihvalavadanā jihvāṃ nirnāmayya gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:164: sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi etān notsrakṣyāmi, anayena vyasanamāpatsye/
S01divyav_u:165: 004.021 ko 'sau nirghṛṇahṛdayastyaktaparalokaśca ya eṣāṃ pratodayaṣṭiṃ kāye nipātayiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:166: tena ta utsṛṣṭāh--adyāgreṇa acchinnāgrāṇi tṛṇāni bhakṣayata anavamarditāni,
S01divyav_u:170: yāvat paśyati āyasaṃ nagaramuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:171: 004.025 tatra dvāre puruṣastiṣṭhati kālo raudrāścaṇḍo lohitākṣa udviddhapiṇḍo lohalaguḍavyagrahastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:173: upasaṃkramya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchati--asti atra bhoḥ puruṣa pānīyamiti/
S01divyav_u:177: tena sārthavāhena tatra praviśya pānīyaṃ pānīyam iti śabdo niścāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:185: 005.002 sa kathayati--ke yūyaṃ bhavantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh?
S01divyav_u:188: ahaṃ bhavantaḥ pratyakṣadarśī, kasmānnābhiśraddadhāsye? te gāthāṃ bhāṣante--
S01divyav_u:189: 005.005 ākrośakā roṣakā vayaṃ matsariṇaḥ kuṭukuñcakā vayam/
S01divyav_u:190: 005.006 dānaṃ ca na dattamaṇvapi yena vayaṃ pitṛlokamāgatāḥ//1//
S01divyav_u:192: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ pretanagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ nirgacchan?
S01divyav_u:193: sa saṃprasthito yāvat tenāsau puruṣo dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:195: aho bata tvayā mamārocitaṃ syāt yathedaṃ pretanagaramiti,
S01divyav_u:199: yena tvaṃ pretanagaraṃ praviśya svastikṣemābhyāṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:201: yāvadaparaṃ paśyati āyasaṃ nagaramuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:202: tatrāpi dvāre puruṣastiṣṭhati kālaścaṇḍo lohitākṣa udviddhapiṇḍo lohalaguḍavyagrahastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:204: 005.013 upasaṃkramyaivamāha--bhoḥ puruṣa, asti atra nagare pānīyam? sa tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:205: 005.014 bhūyastena pṛṣṭah--bhoḥ puruṣa, asti atra nagare pānīyam? sa tūṣṇīṃ vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:206: 005.015 tena tatra praviśya pānīyaṃ pānīyam iti śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:211: 005.018 kuto 'ham yuṣmākaṃ pānīyaṃ dadāmīti? te kathayanti--śroṇa, pretanagaramidam/
S01divyav_u:212: 005.019 kuto 'tra pānīyam? adyāsmābhirdvādaśabhirvarṣaistvatsakāśāt pānīyaṃ pānīyamiti śabdaḥ śrutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:213: 005.020 sa cāha--ke yūyaṃ bhavantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh?
S01divyav_u:219: 005.024 dānaṃ ca na dattamaṇvapi yena vayaṃ pitṛlokamāgatāḥ//2//
S01divyav_u:221: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ sa pretanagaraṃ praviśya kvastikṣemābhyāṃ jīvannirgacchan? sa saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:224: aho bata yadi tvayā mamārocitaṃ syād yathedaṃ pretanagaramiti,
S01divyav_u:227: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā pretanagaraṃ praviśya svastikṣemābhyāṃ jīvan nirgacchan? sa saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:228: 005.029 yāvat paśyati sūryasyāstagamanakāle vimāna, catasro 'psarasah abhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:229: 005.030 ekaḥ puruṣo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikah aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanastābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:233: sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ devo 'yaṃ vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:236: sa tasmin vimāne tāvat sthito yāvat sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:242: 006.006 taistaṃ puruṣamavamūrdhakaṃ pātayitvā tāvat pṛṣṭavaṃśānutpāṭyotpāṭya bhikṣito yāvat sūryasyāstagamanakālasamayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:243: 006.007 tataḥ paścāt punarapi tadvimānaṃ prādurbhūtam, tā apsarasaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:244: 006.008 sa ca puruṣastābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:245: sa teṣāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--ke yūyam, kena ca karmaṇā ihopapannāh?
S01divyav_u:248: sa cāha--ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśī, kathaṃ nābhiśraddadhāsye? śroṇa, ahaṃ vāsavagrāmake aurabhraka āsīt/
S01divyav_u:249: 006.011 urabhrān praghātya praghātya māṃsaṃ vikrīya jīvikāṃ kalpayāmi/
S01divyav_u:254: 006.014 bhūyo bhūyaḥ sa māṃ vicchandayati--bhadramukha, aniṣṭo 'sya karmaṇo phalavipākaḥ/
S01divyav_u:257: sa māṃ pṛcchati--bhadramukha, kiṃ tvametānurabhrān divā praghātayasi āhosvidū rātrau?
S01divyav_u:259: 006.017 sa kathayati--bhadramukha, rātrau śīlasamādānaṃ kiṃ na gṛhṇāsi/
S01divyav_u:262: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātrāvevaṃvidhaṃ divyaṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:263: 006.019 yanmayā divā urabhrāḥ praghātitāḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena divā evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:269: sa urabhrān praghātya praghātya jīvikāṃ kalpayati/
S01divyav_u:273: bhoḥ puruṣa, tvamevaṃ kathayasi--duṣkuhakā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā iti/
S01divyav_u:277: vaktavyastava pitā kathayati--asti sūnādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:279: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya, asmākaṃ ca nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādeśaya/
S01divyav_u:280: 006.029 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:283: 006.031 tatra ekā apsarā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā,
S01divyav_u:284: ekaśca puruṣa abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikah aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanastayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate [7]paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:285: 007.001 sa taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyavabhāṣitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:286: svāgataṃ śroṇa, mā tṛṣito 'si, mā bubhukṣito 'si vā?
S01divyav_u:287: sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnamayaṃ devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:290: sa tasmin vimāne tāvat sthito yāvat sūryasyāstaṃgamanakālasamayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:296: tayā tasya puruṣasya kāyena kāyaṃ saptakṛtvo veṣṭayitvā tāvaduparimastiṣkaṃ bhakṣayantī sthitā,
S01divyav_u:300: sa ca puruṣo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikastayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:301: 007.010 sa tamupasaṃkramya pṛcchati--ko bhavān, kena karmaṇā ihopapannah?
S01divyav_u:302: sa evamāha--śroṇa, duṣkuhakā jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ, nābhiśraddadhāsyasi/
S01divyav_u:304: sa kathayati--yadi evam, ahaṃ vāsavagrāmake brāhmaṇa āsīt pāradārikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:311: 007.016 sa māṃ pṛcchati--bhadramukha, paradārān kiṃ tvaṃ divā gacchasi, āhosvid rātrau?
S01divyav_u:313: 007.017 sa kathayati--bhadramukha, divā kiṃ na śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhṇāsi?
S01divyav_u:315: 007.018 yattanmayā āryasya kātyāyanasyāntikād divā śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhītam,
S01divyav_u:316: tasya karmaṇo vipākena divā evaṃvidhaṃ divyasukhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:318: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātrāvevaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:327: 007.026 bhoḥ puruṣa, tvamevaṃ kathayasi--duṣkuhakā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā iti/
S01divyav_u:330: vaktavyah--tava pitrā agniṣṭomasyādhastāt suvarṇakalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:332: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya/
S01divyav_u:334: apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:337: tatraikā strī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanā/
S01divyav_u:339: 007.032 sā taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyavabhāṣitumārabdhā--[8]śroṇa, svāgatam/
S01divyav_u:340: 008.001 mā tṛṣito 'si mā bubhukṣito 'si vā? sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ devīyaṃ vā nāgī vā yakṣī vā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:345: mā dāsyasīti uktvā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ karmasvakaṭāṃ pratyakṣīkartukāmā vimānaṃ praviśyāvasthitā/
S01divyav_u:354: kasmāt tvayaiṣāṃ dattam? kiṃ kathayati--ayaṃ me svāmī, ayaṃ me putraḥ, iyaṃ me snuṣā, iyaṃ me dāsī/
S01divyav_u:355: 008.010 sa āha--ke yūyam, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh?
S01divyav_u:356: tayoktam--śroṇa, duṣkuhakā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā iti nābhiśraddadhāsyasi/
S01divyav_u:357: 008.011 ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśī kasmānnābhiśraddadhāsye? sā kathayati--ahaṃ vāsavagrāmake brāhmaṇī āsīt/
S01divyav_u:361: cittamabhiprasannaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa mayā prasādajātayā piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:364: mayoktam--āryaputra, anumodasva, mayāryo mahākātyāyanaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:365: 008.017 sa ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate,
S01divyav_u:368: so 'marṣajātaḥ kathayati--kasmāt sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako busaplāvīṃ na bhakṣayatīti?
S01divyav_u:371: 008.021 so 'pi mayoktah--putra, anumodasva, mayāryo mahākātyāyanaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:372: so 'pi ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate,
S01divyav_u:375: so 'pi amarṣajātaḥ kathayati--kasmāt sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako 'yoguḍaṃ na bhakṣayatīti?
S01divyav_u:377: 008.024 nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ mama jñātayaḥ praheṇakāni preṣayanti/
S01divyav_u:379: sā praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā mama lūhāni upanāmayati/
S01divyav_u:380: 008.026 ahaṃ teṣāṃ jñātīnāṃ saṃdiśāmi--kiṃ nu yūyaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni praheṇakāni preṣayata?
S01divyav_u:381: te mama saṃdiśanti--na vayaṃ lūhāni preṣayāmaḥ, api tu praṇītānyeva praheṇakāni preṣayāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:382: 008.029 mayā snuṣābhihitā--vadhūke, mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvāsmakaṃ lūhāni upanāmayasi?
S01divyav_u:383: sā kathayati--kiṃ svamāṃsaṃ na bhakṣayati yā tvadīyāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayatīti?
S01divyav_u:384: iyaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena svamāṃsāni bhakṣayati/
S01divyav_u:385: 008.032 nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratupasthitāyāṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni dattvā jñātīnāṃ preṣayāmi/
S01divyav_u:386: 008.033 sā dārikā tāni praṇītāni praheṇakāni mārge 'ntarbhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāni upanāmayati/
S01divyav_u:387: 009.001 [9]te mama saṃdiśanti--kiṃ nu tvaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni asmākaṃ praheṇakāni preṣayasi?
S01divyav_u:388: ahaṃ teṣāṃ saṃdiśāmi--nāhaṃ lūhāni perṣayāmi, api tu praṇītānyevāhaṃ preṣayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:389: 009.002 mayā dārikābhihitā--dārike, mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāni upanāmayasi/
S01divyav_u:390: 009.004 sā kathayati--kiṃ nu pūyaśoṇitaṃ na bhakṣayati, yā tvadīyāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayatīti?
S01divyav_u:392: 009.005 mama buddhirutpannā--tatra pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇīyām yatraitān sarvān svakaṃ svakaṃ karmaphalaṃ paribhuñjānān paśyeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:393: 009.006 yayā mayāryamahākātyāyanaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇīte trāyastriṃśe devanikāye upapattavyam,
S01divyav_u:395: 009.008 śroṇa, gamiṣyasi tvaṃ vāsavagrāmakam? tatra mama duhitā veśyaṃ vāhayati/
S01divyav_u:396: 009.009 sā tvayā vaktavyā--dṛṣṭāste mayā pitā mātā bhrātā bhrāturjāyā dāsī/
S01divyav_u:399: bhagini, tvameva kathayasi--duṣkuhakā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ, nābhiśraddadhāsyanti/
S01divyav_u:402: vaktavyā--tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catvāro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇasya pūrṇāstiṣṭhanti,
S01divyav_u:405: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
S01divyav_u:407: 009.015 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:409: 009.016 evaṃ tasya paribhramato dvādaśa varṣā atikrāntāḥ//
S01divyav_u:410: 009.017 tayoktah--śroṇa, gamiṣyasi tvaṃ vāsavagrāmakam? bhagini, gamiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:413: śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇaṃ suptameva vāsavagrāmake paitṛke udyāne sthāpayitvā āgacchata/
S01divyav_u:415: 009.020 sa prativibuddho yāvat paśyati ghaṇṭāchatrāṇi vyajanāni,
S01divyav_u:420: 009.022 sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi ahaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ mṛta eva gṛhītaḥ, kasmādbhūyo 'haṃ gṛhaṃ praviśāmi?
S01divyav_u:424: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat--ehi śroṇa, śvāgataṃ te/
S01divyav_u:425: 009.026 dṛṣṭaste śroṇa ayaṃ lokaḥ paraśca lokah? sa kathayati--dṛṣṭo bhadanta mahakātyāyana/
S01divyav_u:426: 009.027 labheyāhaṃ bhadanta mahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:428: sa āryeṇoktah--śroṇa, tāṃ tāvat pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ paripūraya/
S01divyav_u:432: 009.031 bhoḥ puruṣa, adya mama piturdvādaśavarṣāṇi kālagatasya/
S01divyav_u:433: 009.032 asti kaścid dṛṣṭaḥ paralokāt punarāgacchan? bhadramukha, eṣo 'hamāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:435: 009.033 bhadramukha, yadi na śraddadhāsi, sa tava pitā kathayati--asti sūnādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:438: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya, asmākaṃ ca nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādeśaya/
S01divyav_u:439: 010.002 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādāya gacchet/
S01divyav_u:441: paśyāmi, saced bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati, sarvametat satyam/
S01divyav_u:449: 010.007 sa kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, adya mama piturdvādaśa varṣāṇi kālaṃ gatasya/
S01divyav_u:450: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punarāgacchan? bhadramukha, eṣo 'hamāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:454: tava pitrā agniṣṭomasyādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:456: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
S01divyav_u:458: 010.011 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:460: 010.013 paśyāmi, saced bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati, sarvametat satyam/
S01divyav_u:465: upasaṃkramya kathayati--bhagini, dṛṣṭāste mayā mātā pitā bhrātā bhrāturjāyā dāsī/
S01divyav_u:468: sā kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, mama mātāpitrordvādaśa varṣāṇi kālagatayoḥ/
S01divyav_u:469: 010.017 asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punarāgacchan? sa kathayati--eṣo 'hamāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:473: tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catasro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇapūrṇāstiṣṭhanti,
S01divyav_u:476: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
S01divyav_u:478: 010.022 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:480: 010.023 paśyāmi, saced bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati, sarvametat satyam/
S01divyav_u:484: śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarvo 'yaṃ lokaḥ suvarṇasya śraddadhāti,
S01divyav_u:489: syādāryaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa eva te bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānate(?)/
S01divyav_u:505: 011.001 tau kathayatah--putra āvāṃ tvadīyena śokena rudantāvandhībhūtau/
S01divyav_u:514: sa taṃ dhanajātaṃ dīnānāthakṛpaṇebhyo dattvā daridrānadaridrān kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:515: 011.007 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
S01divyav_u:516: 011.008 ekānte sthitaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocat--labheyāhamāryamahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām,
S01divyav_u:523: dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dvau saṃnipātau bhavataḥ/
S01divyav_u:526: te tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikārānudgṛhya paryavāpya tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣāmupagacchanti/
S01divyav_u:529: uttare ca paripṛcchanti sūtrasya vinayasya mātṛkāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:531: atha ye āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavas tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikāraviśeṣān gṛhya paryavāpya tāsu tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣāmupagatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:532: te trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaram yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:533: 011.021 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:534: ekānte niṣadya yathādhigatamārocayanti, uttare ca paripṛcchanti/
S01divyav_u:539: arhan saṃvṛttas traidhātukavītarāgo yāvad abhivādyaśca saṃvṛttaḥ//
S01divyav_u:543: draṣṭavyā eva paryupāsitavyā eva hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:544: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:545_0: 011.029 athāyuṣmāñ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa utthāyāsanād ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ
S01divyav_u:545_1: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā praṇamyāyuṣmantaṃ
S01divyav_u:545_2: mahākātyāyanamidamavocat--dṛṣṭo mayopādhyāyānubhāvena sa bhagavān dharmakāyena, no tu rūpakāyena /
S01divyav_u:546: 011.032 gacchāmi upādhyāya, rūpakāyenāpi taṃ bhagavantaṃ drakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:548: 012.001 durlabhadarśanā hi vatsa tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhās tadyathā audumbarapuṣpam/
S01divyav_u:549: 012.002 asmākaṃ ca vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva, alpābādhatāṃ ca yāvat sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:550: 012.003 pañca praśnāṃśca pṛccha--asmāt parāntakeṣu bhadanta janapadeṣu alpabhikṣukam/
S01divyav_u:552: tatrāsmābhiḥ kathaṃ pratipattavyam? kharā bhūmī gokaṇṭakā dhānāḥ/
S01divyav_u:553: 012.005 asmākamaparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu idamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā avicarma gocarma cchāgacarma/
S01divyav_u:554: 012.006 tadanyeṣu janapadeṣu idamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā erako merako jandurako mandurakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:555: 012.007 evamevāsmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣvidamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā avicarma pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:557: bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāni preṣayati itaścyutāni tatrāsamprāptāni kasyaitāni naiḥsargikāni/
S01divyav_u:558: 012.009 adhivāsayati āyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:559: 012.010 athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇas tasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vāsavagrāmakaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:561: athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:563: 012.014 tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha ānanda tathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasyaikavihāre mañcaṃ prajñāpaya/
S01divyav_u:564: 012.015 evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānandastathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasya yāvat prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:565: 012.016 upasaṃkramya bhagavantamidamavocat--prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya vihārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S01divyav_u:568: athāyuṣmānapi śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya yāvat pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:569: 012.021 tāṃ khalu rātriṃ bhagavān āyuṣmāṃśca śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āryeṇa tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsitavān/
S01divyav_u:570: 012.022 atha bhagavān rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamāmantrayate sma--pratibhātu te śroṇa dharmo yo mayā svayamabhijñāyābhisambudhyākhyātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:571_0: 012.023 athāyuṣmāñ śroṇo bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśah asmāt parāntikayā guptikayā udānāt
S01divyav_u:571_1: pārāyaṇāt satyadṛṣṭaḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti /
S01divyav_u:572: 012.025 atha bhagavāñchroṇasya koṭikarṇasya kathāparyavasānaṃ viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat--sādhu sādhu śroṇa,
S01divyav_u:575_0: 012.028 athāyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭikarṇasyaitadabhavat--ayaṃ me kālo bhagavata upādhyāyasya
S01divyav_u:575_2: parāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsavagrāmake bhadantamahākātyāyanaḥ prativasati, yo me upādhyāyaḥ /
S01divyav_u:576: 012.031 sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati yāvat sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:578: atha bhagavāñcchroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat[13]--akālaṃ te śroṇa praśnavyākaraṇāya/
S01divyav_u:579: 013.001 saṃghamelakas tatra kālo bhaviṣyati praśnasya vyākaraṇāya/
S01divyav_u:580: 013.002 atha bhagavān kālyamevotthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:581: 013.003 athāyuṣmāñcchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt/
S01divyav_u:582: 013.004 ekāntasthito bhagavantamidamavocat--asmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsavagrāmake bhadantamahākāyāyanaḥ prativasati, yo me upādhyāyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:583: 013.005 sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati yāvat sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:584: 013.006 pañca ca praśnāti vistareṇoccārayitavyāni yathāpūrvamuktāni yāvat kasya naiḥsargikāni/
S01divyav_u:588: ekapalāśike upānahe dhārayitavye na dvipuṭāṃ na tripuṭām/
S01divyav_u:589: 013.009 sā cet kṣayadharmiṇī bhavati, tāṃ tyaktvā punar navā grahītavyā/
S01divyav_u:590: 013.010 bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāni preṣayati itaścyutāni tatrāsamprāptāni na kasyacinnaiḥsargikāṇi/
S01divyav_u:591: 013.011 āyuṣmān upālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--yaduktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu vinayadharapañcamenopasampadam,
S01divyav_u:596: 013.013 dakṣiṇena śarāvatī nāma nagarī, tasyāḥ pareṇa sarāvatī nāma nadī, so 'ntaḥ, tataḥ pareṇa pratyantaḥ/
S01divyav_u:597: 013.015 paścimena sthūṇopasthūṇakau brāmaṇagrāmakau, so 'ntaḥ, tataḥ pareṇa pratyantaḥ/
S01divyav_u:598: uttareṇa uśīragiriḥ so 'ntaḥ, tataḥ pareṇa pratyantaḥ//
S01divyav_u:599: 013.017 kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena koṭikarṇena karma kṛtamiti vistaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:600: bhagavānāha--bhūtapūrvam yāvat kāśyapo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho bhagavāñ śāstā loka utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:601: 013.019 tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ dvau jāyāpatikau/
S01divyav_u:603: 013.020 yadā kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣu nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:604: tasya rājñā kṛkinā catūratnamayaṃ caityaṃ kāritaṃ samantādyojanamuccatvena/
S01divyav_u:605: 013.022 tena tatra khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskaraṇāya ye pūrvanagaradvāre karapratyāyā uttiṣṭhante,
S01divyav_u:607: 013.023 yadā kṛkī rājā kālagataḥ, tasya putraḥ sujāto nāṃnā sa rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:612: 013.028 yadi devo 'nujānīyāt, te vayaṃ tān karapratyāyān samucchindāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:613: sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yanmama pitrā kṛtam, devakṛtaṃ na tu brahmakṛtaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:615: vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā svayameva te karapratyāyā notthāsyanti/
S01divyav_u:619: 013.032 tau jāyāpatī vṛddhībhūtau tatraiva stūpe parikarma kurvāṇau tiṣṭhataḥ/
S01divyav_u:623: sa dṛṣṭvā pṛcchati--amba tāta kasyaiṣa stūpa iti/
S01divyav_u:626: na tena rājñāsmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskārakaraṇāya kiṃcit prajñāptam?
S01divyav_u:628: 014.004 ye pūrvanagaradvāre karapratyāyāste 'smin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskaraṇāya niryātitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:630: tasya putraḥ sujāto nāma, sa rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:635: 014.008 amba tāta anayā karṇikayāsmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskāraṃ kurutamiti/
S01divyav_u:638: taistāṃ vikrīya tasmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭitapratisaṃskāraḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:640: athāpareṇa samayena sārthavāhaḥ paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā āgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:643: 014.012 sa prasādajātaḥ pṛcchati--amba tāta yuṣmābhiḥ kiṃciduddhārikṛtam/
S01divyav_u:646: 014.014 tena prasādajātena yattatrāvaśiṣṭam aparaṃ ca dattvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam/
S01divyav_u:649: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sārthavāhaḥ, eṣa evāsau śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:650: 014.017 yadanena kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya stūpe kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:651: tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:653: 014.019 ahamanena kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena sārdhaṃ samajavaḥ samabalaḥ samadhuraḥ samasāmānyaprāptaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:657: 014.022 tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:660: 014.024 bhikṣava ūcuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena koṭikarṇena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena dṛṣṭa eva dharme apāyā dṛṣṭāh?
S01divyav_u:662: tasya karmaṇo vipākena dṛṣṭa eva dharme apāyā dṛṣṭā iti//
S01divyav_u:669: tena khalu samayena sūrpārake nagare nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:671: 015.004 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:672: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:673: 015.005 sā aṣṭānāṃ navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:675: 015.006 tasya trīṇi saptakāni ekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātamahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:676: 015.007 jñātaya ūcuh--ayaṃ dārako bhavasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ,
S01divyav_u:678: 015.008 bhūyo 'pyasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:682: yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavo gṛhapatir glānaṃ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:688: 015.013 na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yadahaṃ svāminamadhyupekṣeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:689: 015.014 sā vaidyasakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--ārya jānīṣe tvaṃ bhavaṃ gṛhapatim?
S01divyav_u:694: 015.016 sa kathayati--dārike tvameva kathayasi--sa patnyā putraiścāpyupekṣita iti/
S01divyav_u:695: 015.017 atha kastasyopasthānaṃ karoti? sā kathayati--ahamasyopasthānaṃ karomi/
S01divyav_u:703: yat kiṃcidahaṃ jīvitaḥ, sarvaṃ tava prabhāvāt/
S01divyav_u:705: sā kathayati--svāmin, yadi me parituṣṭo 'si, bhavatu me tvayā sārdhaṃ samāgama iti/
S01divyav_u:708: yadi tu āryaputreṇa sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhavati,
S01divyav_u:710: 015.026 tenāvaśyaṃ nirbandhaṃ jñātvā abhihitā--yadā saṃvṛttā ṛtumatī tadā mamārocayiṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:711: sā apareṇa samayena kalyā saṃvṛttā ṛtumatī/
S01divyav_u:713: tato bhavena gṛhapatinā tayā sārdhaṃ paricāritam/
S01divyav_u:715: yameva divasamāpannasattvā saṃvṛttā tameva divasamupādāya bhavasya gṛhapateḥ sarvārthāḥ sarvakarmāntāśca paripūrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:716: 015.029 sā tvaṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:717: 015.030 dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśīrṣaḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:719: tasminneva divase bhavasya gṛhapaterbhūyasyā mātrayā sarvārthāḥ sarvakarmāntāḥ paripūrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:720: 016.002 tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātamahaṃ kṛtvā pūrvavat yāvatpūrṇeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:721: 016.003 pūrṇo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dvābhyāmaṃsadhātībhyāṃ datto vistareṇa yāvadāśu vardhate hradasthamiva paṅkajam/
S01divyav_u:723: tadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyām/
S01divyav_u:724: 016.006 aṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūddhaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:725: 016.007 tato bhavena gṛhapatinā bhavilādīnāṃ putrāṇām yathānupūrvyā niveśāḥ kṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:726: 016.008 te patnībhiḥ sārdhamatīva saṃraktā nivṛttā maṇḍanaparamā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:727: 016.009 tato bhavo gṛhapatiḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:728: sa putrairdṛṣṭaḥ puṣṭaśca--tāta, kasmāttvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti/
S01divyav_u:729: 016.010 sa kathayati--putrakāḥ, na tāvanmayā niveśaḥ kṛto yāvatsuvarṇalakṣaḥ samudānīta iti/
S01divyav_u:730: 016.011 te yūyaṃ nirastavyāpārāḥ patnīṣvatyarthaṃ saṃraktā maṇḍanaparamā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:732: kathaṃ na cintāparo bhaviṣyāmīti? bhavilena ratnakarṇikā pinaddhā/
S01divyav_u:733: 016.013 sa tāmavatāryadārukarṇikāṃ pinahya pratijñāmārūḍhah--na tāvat ratnakarṇikāṃ pinahyāmi yāvat suvarṇalakṣaḥ samupārjita iti/
S01divyav_u:736: teṣām yāstāḥ saṃjñā bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandīti tā antarhitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:746: 016.020 pūrṇenāpi tatraiva dharmeṇa nyāyena vyavahāritāḥ sātirekāḥ suvarṇalakṣāḥ samudānītāaḥ/
S01divyav_u:747: pūrṇo 'pi pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--tāta, mamāpi kalyatāmāvārīsamutthitaṃ dravyamiti/
S01divyav_u:749: 016.022 kiṃ tava kalyate? sa kathayati--tāta kalyatām/
S01divyav_u:751: 016.023 kalitam yāvannyāyopārjitasya suvarṇasya mūlyaṃ varjayitvā sātiriktā lakṣāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:752: 016.024 bhavo gṛhapatiḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ saṃlakṣayati--puṇyamaheśākhyo 'yaṃ sattvo yenehaiva sthiteneyatsuvarṇaṃ samupārjitamiti/
S01divyav_u:763: sa kathayati--putrakāḥ, dṛṣṭo vah? tāta dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:769: 017.003 durnyasto bhidyate mantraḥ prītirbhidyate lobhataḥ//2// iti//
S01divyav_u:772: sa tenoktah--putra, na kadācit tvayā pūrṇo moktavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:778: tair nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya mahatā saṃskāreṇa śmaśānaṃ nītvā dhmāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:779: 017.009 tataste śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā kathayanti--yadā asmākaṃ pitā jīvati, tadā tadadhīnāḥ prāṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:782: yannu vayaṃ paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gacchāma iti/
S01divyav_u:784: 017.012 te kathayanti--tvamatraivāvāryāṃ vyāpāraṃ kuru, vayameva gacchāma iti/
S01divyav_u:791: yadā te upasthāya prakrāntā bhavanti, tadā tāsāṃ divasaparivyayaṃ dadāti/
S01divyav_u:794: 017.018 tāḥ kathayanti--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati, yeṣāṃ dāsīputrāḥ kuleṣvaiśvacaryaṃ vaśe vartayantīti/
S01divyav_u:795: 017.019 bhavilapatnyā dārikā abhihitā--tvayā kālaṃ jñātvā gantavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:796: sā kālaṃ jñātvā gacchati, śīghraṃ labhate/
S01divyav_u:803: yadā tasyā dārikā gatā bhavati, tadā labhyate/
S01divyav_u:805: tāḥ saṃjātāmarṣāḥ kathayanti--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati yeṣāṃ dāsīputrāḥ kulesvaiścaryaṃ vaśe vartayantīti/
S01divyav_u:806: 017.024 yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandī ca sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrā āgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:807: 017.026 bhavilena patnī pṛṣṭā--bhadre, śobhanaṃ pūrṇena pratipālitā tvamiti?
S01divyav_u:809: 017.027 te anye 'pi svāmibhyāṃ pṛṣṭe kathayatah--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:815: anyābhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā svaputrāḥ preṣitā yāvat kāśikavastrāvārī ghaṭṭitā, phuṭṭakavastrāvārī udghāṭitā/
S01divyav_u:818: 017.032 te dṛṣṭvā svāminoḥ kathayatah--dṛṣṭam yuvābhyāmapareṣāṃ kāśikavastrāṇi[18] dīyante,
S01divyav_u:821: kimetadeva bhaviṣyati? nūnaṃ kāśikavastrāvārī ghaṭṭitā, phuṭṭakavastrāvārī udghāṭiteti/
S01divyav_u:828: tābhistaṃ dṛṣṭvā svāminau tathā tathā bhagnau yathā gṛhavibhāgaṃ kartumārabdhau/
S01divyav_u:829: 018.005 tau parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurutah--sarvathā vinaṣṭā vayam, gṛhaṃ bhājayāmeti/
S01divyav_u:833: ekasya gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca, ekasyāvārīgataṃ deśāntaragataṃ ca, ekasya pūrṇakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:834: 018.008 yadi jyeṣṭhataro gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca grahīṣyati,
S01divyav_u:837: tathāpi vayaṃ śknumo gṛhagatena kṣetragatena cātmānaṃ saṃdhārayitum,
S01divyav_u:839: 018.011 tāvevaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā bhavilasya sakāśaṃ gatau/
S01divyav_u:841: sa kathayati--suparīkṣitaṃ kartavyam, gṛhabhedikāḥ striyo bhavantīti/
S01divyav_u:845: 018.015 ekasya gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca, ekasyāvārīgataṃ deśāntaragataṃ ca, ekasya pūrṇakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:846: 018.016 sa kathayati--pūrṇasya pratyaṃśaṃ nānuprayacchatha? tau kathayatah--dāsīputraḥ saḥ/
S01divyav_u:847: kastasya pratyaṃśaṃ dadyāt? api tu sa evāsmābhirbhājitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:849: sa saṃlakṣayati--ahaṃ pitrā abhihitah--sarvasvamapi te parityajya pūrṇo grahītavya iti/
S01divyav_u:850: 018.018 gṛhṇāmi pūrṇamiti viditvā kathayati--evaṃ bhavatu mama pūrṇaketi/
S01divyav_u:851: 018.019 yasya gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca, sa tvaramāṇo gṛhaṃ gatvā kathayati--jyeṣṭhabhavike nirgaccha/
S01divyav_u:855: yasyāvārīgataṃ deśāntaragataṃ ca, so 'pi tvaramāṇa āvārīṃ gatvā kathayati--pūrṇaka avatareti/
S01divyav_u:859: 018.023 yāvat bhavilapatnī pūrṇakena sārdhaṃ jñātigṛhaṃ saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:863: sā kathayati--tvayā iyatībhiḥ suvarṇalakṣābhirvyavahṛtam, dārakāṇāṃ pūrvabhikṣikāpi nāsti?
S01divyav_u:864: pūrṇaḥ kathayati--kimahaṃ jāne yuṣmākaṃ gṛhe īdṛśīyamavasthā bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:865: 018.027 yadi mayā jñātamabhaviṣyat, mayā anekāḥ suvarṇalakṣāḥ saṃhāritā abhaviṣyan/
S01divyav_u:869: anyatamaśca puruṣaḥ samudravelāpreritānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ bhāramādāya śītenābhidruto vepamāna āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:870: 018.030 sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaśca--bhoḥ puruṣa, kasmādevaṃ vepase? sa kathayati--ahamapi na jāne/
S01divyav_u:871: 018.031 mayā cāyaṃ bhāraka utkṣipto bhavati, mama cedṛśī samavasthā/
S01divyav_u:875: 019.001 sa tenābhihitah--bho puruṣa, kiyatā mūlyena dīyate? pañcabhiḥ kārṣāpaṇaśataiḥ/
S01divyav_u:876: 019.002 tena taṃ kāṣṭhabhāraṃ gṛhītvā tadgośīrṣacandanamapanīya vīthīṃ gatvā karapatrikayā catasraḥ khaṇḍikāḥ kṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:879: 019.004 uktaṃ ca--enaṃ kāṣṭhabhārakamamuṣmin gṛhe bhavilapatnī tiṣṭhati tatra naya,
S01divyav_u:882: sā urasi prahāraṃ dattvā kathayati--yadyasāvarthātparibhraṣṭaḥ, kiṃ prajñayāpi paribhraṣṭah?
S01divyav_u:891: te pūrṇasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti--tavāsti gośīrṣacandanam? sa āha--asti/
S01divyav_u:892: 019.011 te ūcuh--kiyatā mūlyena dīyate? sa āha--kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa/
S01divyav_u:893: 019.012 taiḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa gṛhītvā rājñaḥ pralepo dattaḥ, svasthībhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:894: 019.013 rājā saṃlakṣayati--kīdṛśo 'sau yasya gṛhe gośīrṣacandanaṃ nāsti/
S01divyav_u:897: sa dūtena gatvā uktah--pūrṇa, devastvāṃ śabdāpayatīti/
S01divyav_u:902: 019.017 sa gośīrṣacandanasya tisro gaṇḍikā vastreṇa pidhāyaikaṃ pāṇinā gṛhītvā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:914: pūrṇaḥ kathayati--yadi me devaḥ parituṣṭo devasya vijate 'paribhūto vaseyamiti/
S01divyav_u:915: 019.023 rājñā amātyānāmājñā dattā--bhavantaḥ, adyāgreṇa kumārāṇāmājñā deyā na tvevaṃ pūrṇasyeti/
S01divyav_u:916: 019.024 yāvanmahāsamudrāt pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptāni/
S01divyav_u:917: 019.025 vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacidasmākaṃ samastānāṃ nirgatyaikākinā vaṇijāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:920: anye kathayanti--kiṃ tasya kṛpaṇasyāsti yaḥ śabdāyata iti/
S01divyav_u:922: tena śrutaṃ mahāsamudrāt pañca vaṇikchatāni saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptānīti/
S01divyav_u:924: pṛcchati--bhavataḥ, kimidaṃ dravyamiti? te kathayanti--idaṃ cedaṃ ceti/
S01divyav_u:925: 019.031 kiṃ mūlyam? te kathayanti--sārthavāha, dūramapi paramapi gatvā tvameva praṣṭavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:933: tato vaṇiggrāmeṇāvacarakāḥ puruṣāḥ preṣitāh--paśyata kiṃ dravyamiti/
S01divyav_u:934: 020.003 tairgatvā pṛṣṭāh--kiṃ dravyam? idaṃ cedaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:940: te kathayanti--yattenāvadraṅge dattaṃ tad yūyaṃ mūlye 'pi na dāsyatha/
S01divyav_u:947: yātenāvadraṅge dattaṃ tadyūyaṃ mūlye 'pi na dāsyatha/
S01divyav_u:950: sa tairāhūyoktah--pūrṇa vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacidekākinā grahītavyam/
S01divyav_u:953: sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yadā yuṣmābhiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtastadā kimahaṃ na śabdito mama bhrātā vā?
S01divyav_u:955: 020.013 tato vaṇiggrāmeṇa saṃjātāmarṣeṇa ṣaṣṭeḥ kārṣāpaṇānāmarthāyātape dhāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:960: kathayati rājā--bhavantaḥ, kasyārthe yuṣmābhiḥ pūrṇa ātape vidhāritah?
S01divyav_u:961: te kathayanti--deva vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛto na kenacidekākinā paṇyaṃ grahītavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:964: samanuyujyantām yadaibhiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtastadā kimahamebhiḥ śabdito mama bhrātā vā?
S01divyav_u:966: 020.019 rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ, śobhanaṃ pūrṇaḥ kathayati--sa tairvrīḍitairmuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:968: 020.020 tena vaṇiggrāma āhūyoktah--bhavantaḥ, mamāmukena dravyeṇa prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:975: te vaṇiggrāmāḥ sarva eva saṃbhūya tasya niveśanaṃ gatvā dvāri sthitvā tairdūtaḥ preṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:981: 020.027 pañcadaśa lakṣāṇi teṣāṃ vaṇijyaṃ dattamavaśiṣṭaṃ svagṛhaṃ praveśitam/
S01divyav_u:982: 020.028 sa saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ śakyamavaśyāyabindunā kumbhaṃ pūrayitum? mahāsamudramavatarāmīti/
S01divyav_u:983: 020.029 tena sūrpārake nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ saurpārakīyā vaṇijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:985: yo yuṣmākamutsahate pūrṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartuṃ sa mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānayatviti/
S01divyav_u:987: tataḥ pūrṇaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanah[21] pañcavaṇikśataparivāro mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:992: pūrṇaḥ ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṃsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:993: 021.003 śrāvasteyā vaṇijaḥ paṇyamādāya sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:994: 021.004 te mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya yena pūrṇaḥ sārthavāhastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:997: asti kaścidyuṣmābhirdṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudrātsaṃsiddhayānapātrāgataḥ saptamaṃ vāramavataran?
S01divyav_u:1002: 021.009 te rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye udānāt pārāyaṇāt satyadṛśaḥ sthaviragāthāḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:1006: 021.012 sa buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāni āhṛṣṭāni/
S01divyav_u:1008: 021.013 te kathayanti--asti śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulātkeśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1011: 021.016 kutra bhavantaḥ sa bhagavānetarhi viharati? sārthavāha, śrāvstyāṃ jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:1012: 021.017 sa taṃ hṛdi kṛtvā taiḥ sārdhaṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṃsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1013: bhrātāsya bhavilaḥ saṃlakṣayati--parikhinno 'yaṃ mahāsamudragamanena, niveśo 'sya kartavya iti/
S01divyav_u:1015: kathaya katarasya dhaninaḥ sārthavāhasya vā tavārthāya duhitaraṃ prārthayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1018: sa kathayati--yadāsmākaṃ gṛhe vārtā nāsti, tadā na pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1020: pūrṇaḥ kathayati--bhrātaḥ, tadānīṃ na śobhate, idānīṃ tu yuktam/
S01divyav_u:1025: nyāyopārjitaṃ te prabhūtaṃ dhanamasti, eṣāṃ tu tava bhrātṛrṇāmanyāyoparjitam/
S01divyav_u:1026: 021.024 yadyete kathayanti ekadhye vasāmeti, na vastavyam/
S01divyav_u:1031: pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha udyāne tiṣṭhati gṛhapatiṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:1032: 021.028 anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ jalayānena khinna idānīṃ sthalayānenāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1036: anāthapiṇḍadaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpam yadahaṃ pradhānapuruṣamasatkāreṇa praveśayeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:1037: 021.031 sa tena mahatā satkāreṇa praveśita udvartitaḥ snāpito bhojitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1039: apūrveṇa gṛhapate icchāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvamiti/
S01divyav_u:1040: 022.002 tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ pūrvaṃ kāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasāryodānamudānayati--aho buddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1043: yatredānīmīdṛśāḥ pradhānapuruṣā vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargamapahāya sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ākāṅkṣanti svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvamiti/
S01divyav_u:1044: 022.005 tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛḥpatiḥ pūrṇaṃ sārthavāhamādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1045: 022.006 tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣupariṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:1047: 022.008 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣavo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:1048: 022.009 nāsti tathāgatasyaivaṃvidhaḥ prābhṛto yathā vaineyaprābhṛta iti/
S01divyav_u:1049: 022.010 tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā pūrṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1050: 022.011 ekāntaniṣaṇṇo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhadanta pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:1053: 022.014 tato bhagavān pūrṇaṃ sārthavāhamāmantrayate--ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryamiti/
S01divyav_u:1054: sa bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭiprāvṛtaḥ pātrakarakavyagrahastaḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśrurvarṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvāsthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1055: 022.017 ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1056: 022.019 sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthau evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena//4//
S01divyav_u:1059_0: 022.022 ekānte sthita āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavantamidamavocat--sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā
S01divyav_u:1059_1: saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvaiko
S01divyav_u:1060: 022.024 yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
S01divyav_u:1061_1: pravrajayeyam--kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
S01divyav_u:1063: sādhu khalu tvaṃ pūrṇa yastvamevaṃ vadasi--sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu pūrvavadyāvannāparamasmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1064: 022.029 tena hi pūrṇa śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye//
S01divyav_u:1065: 022.031 santi pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭakāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni kāmopasaṃhitāni rañjanīyāni/
S01divyav_u:1076: manovijñeyā dharmā iṣṭāḥ kāntāḥ priyā manāpāḥ kāmopasaṃhitā rañjanīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1078: santi tu pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi iṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni pūrvavad yavat śuklapakṣeṇāntike nirvāṇasyeti ucyate/
S01divyav_u:1079: 023.008 anena tvaṃ pūrṇa mayā saṃkṣiptenāvavādena coditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1081: anenāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā saṃkṣiptenāvavādena codita icchāmi śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṃ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsaṃ kalpayitum/
S01divyav_u:1082: 023.010 caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntikā manuṣyā rabhasāḥ karkaśā ākrośakā roṣakāḥ paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1083: 023.011 sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante,
S01divyav_u:1085: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asātyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante,
S01divyav_u:1086: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:1088: ye māṃ saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā
S01divyav_u:1090: 023.017 no tu pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharantīti/
S01divyav_u:1091: caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavat yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1092: 023.018 sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1094: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1095: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:1097: ye māṃ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharanti,
S01divyav_u:1098: no tu daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharantīti/
S01divyav_u:1099: 023.022 caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavad yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1100: 023.023 sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1102: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1103: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:1105: ye māṃ daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharanti,
S01divyav_u:1106: no tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayanti/
S01divyav_u:1107: 023.027 caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1108: sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1110: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparoyiṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1111: tasya me evaṃ bhaviṣyati--santi bhagavataḥ śrāvakā ye anena pūtikāyenārdīyamānā jehrīyante,
S01divyav_u:1120: śakyastvaṃ pūrṇa anena kṣāntisaurabhyena samanvāgataḥ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṃ śroṇāparāntakeṣu vāsaṃ kalpayitum/
S01divyav_u:1121: 024.003 gaccha tvaṃ pūrṇa, mukto mocaya, tīrṇastāraya, āśvasta āśvasaya, parinirvṛtaḥ parinirvāpayeti//
S01divyav_u:1122: 024.005 athāyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1123: 024.006 athāyuṣmān pūrṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:1124: 024.007 śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1125: 024.008 yathāparibhuktaśayanāsanaṃ pratisamayya samādāya pātracīvaram yena śroṇāparāntakā janapadāstena cārikāṃ carañ śroṇāparāntakāñ janapadānanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1126: 024.010 athāyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śroṇāparāntakaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:1129: sa saṃlakṣayati--amaṅgalo 'yaṃ muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako mayā dṛṣṭa iti viditvā ā karṇād dhanuḥ pūrayitvā yenāyuṣmān pūrṇastena pradhāvitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1131: dṛṣṭvā cettarāsaṅgaṃ vivartya kathayati--bhadramukha, asya duṣpūrasyārthe praviśāmi, atra prahareti/
S01divyav_u:1133: 024.015 yasyārthe gahane caranti vihagā gacchanti bandhaṃ mṛgāḥ saṃgrāme śaraśaktatomaradharā naśyantyajasraṃ narāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1134: 024.017 dīnā durdinacāriṇaśca kṛpaṇā matsyā grasantyāyasam asyārthe udarasya pāpakalile dūrādihābhyāgataḥ//5// iti//
S01divyav_u:1135: 024.019 sa saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ pravrajita īdṛśena kṣāntisaurabhyena samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1137: 024.020 tato 'syāyuṣmatā pūrṇena dharmo deśyitaḥ, śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeśeṣu ca pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1141: 024.023 tasyaiva ca trimāsasyātyayāt tisro vidyāḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1143: 024.024 traidhātukavītarāgo yāvat sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaśca saṃvṛttaḥ//
S01divyav_u:1144: 024.025 yāvadapareṇa samayena dārukarṇibhrātrorbhogāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1150: tau kathayatah--śrīrvā bhavatu kālakarṇī vā, āgaccha ekadhye prativasāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1153: 024.030 tau kathayatah--tena dāsīputreṇa mahāsamudramavatīryāvatīrya bhogāḥ samudānītā yena tvaṃ bhuñjāno vikatthase/
S01divyav_u:1159: karṇadhāraḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yattat śrūyate gośīrṣacandanavanamiti, idaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:1161: tena khalu samayena gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ maheśvarasya yakṣasya parigraho 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:1164: 025.004 adrākṣīdapriyākhyo yo yakṣo gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1165: 025.005 dṛṣṭvā ca yena maheśvaro yakṣaḥ, tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1166: 025.006 upasaṃkramya maheśvaram yakṣamidamavocat--yat khalu grāmaṇīrjānīyā gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahanti/
S01divyav_u:1167: 025.007 yatte kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tatkuruṣveti/
S01divyav_u:1168: atha maheśvaro yakṣo yakṣāṇāṃ samitimasamitiṃ kṛtvā saṃjātāmarṣo mahāntaṃ kālikāvātabhayaṃ saṃjanya yena gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ tena saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1169: 025.009 karṇadhāreṇārocitam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jāmbudvīpakā vaṇijah--yattat śrūyate mahākālikāvātabhayamiti, idaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:1171: tataste vaṇijo bhītāstrastāḥ saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpā devatāyācanaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1173: 025.014 vyasanamatibhayaṃ vayaṃ prapannā vigatabhayā hi bhavantu no 'dya nāthāḥ//6//
S01divyav_u:1179: sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, ahaṃ bhrātrā abhihitah--mahāsamudro 'lpāsvādo bahvādīnavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1186: tairekasvareṇa sarvairevaṃ nādo muktah--namastasmai āryāya pūrṇāya,
S01divyav_u:1188: 025.026 atha yā devatā āyuṣmatī pūrṇe 'bhiprasannā, sā yenāyuṣmān pūrṇastenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:1192: 025.029 tata āyuṣmān pūrṇastadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte śroṇāparāntake 'ntarhito mahāsamudre vahanasīmāyāṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1194: 025.031 atha maheśvaro yakṣaḥ saṃlakṣayati--pūrvam yat kiṃcidvahanaṃ kālikāvātena spṛśyate,
S01divyav_u:1196: 025.032 idānīṃ ko yogo yena kālikāvātah [26]sumerupratyāhata iva pratinivṛttah?
S01divyav_u:1197: sa itaścāmutaśca pratyavekṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyati āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ vahanasīmāyāṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvasthitam/
S01divyav_u:1198: 026.002 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ kathayati--ārya pūrṇa, kiṃ viheṭhayasīti? āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kathayati--jarādharmo 'ham/
S01divyav_u:1200: yadi mayedṛśā guṇagaṇā nādhigatāḥ syurbhrātā me tvayā nāmāvaśeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt/
S01divyav_u:1201: 026.004 maheśvaro yakṣaḥ kathayati--ārya idaṃ gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ rājñaścakaravartino 'rthāya dhāryate/
S01divyav_u:1202: 026.005 kiṃ manyase grāmaṇīḥ kiṃ varaṃ rājā cakravartī uta tathagato 'rhan samyaksambuddha?
S01divyav_u:1203: kim ārya bhagavāṃl loka utpannah? utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1205: tataste vaṇijo gatapratyāgataprāṇā āyuṣmati pūrṇe cittamabhiprasādya tadvahanaṃ gośīrṣacandanasya pūrayitvā saṃprasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1207: 026.010 tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhrātuḥ kathayati--yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātramāgacchati,
S01divyav_u:1210: ahamanena gośīrṣacandanena bhagavato 'rthāya candanamālaṃ prāsādaṃ kārayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1211: 026.012 tena teṣāṃ vaṇijāṃ ratnaiḥ saṃvibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1212: 026.013 tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo gośīrṣacandanena prāsādaṃ māpayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1214: kiṃ divase divase pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhṇīdhvamāhosvit gośīrṣacandanacūrṇasya biḍālapadam?
S01divyav_u:1216: 026.015 yāvat alpīyasā kālena candanamālaḥ prāsādaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1219: 026.017 yattatra saṃkalikā cūrṇaṃ cāvaśiṣṭam, tat piṣṭvā tatraiva pralepo dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1220: 026.018 te ca bhrātara parasparaṃ sarve kṣamitā uktāśca--buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantrya bhojayata/
S01divyav_u:1232_0: tata āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ śaraṇapṛṣṭhamabhiruhya jetavanābhimukhaṃ sthitvā ubhe jānumaṇḍale
S01divyav_u:1232_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya puṣpāṇi kṣiptvā dhūpaṃ saṃcārya ārāmikena ca sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṃ
S01divyav_u:1234: 026.027 anāthabhūtān prasamīkṣya sādho kṛtvā kṛpāmāgamanaṃ kuruṣva//8// iti/
S01divyav_u:1235: 026.029 tatastāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvenopari puṣpamaṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā jetavane gatvā sthitāni dūupo 'bhrakūṭavadudakaṃ vaidūryaśalākāvat/
S01divyav_u:1237: 026.031 sa kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ papraccha--kuto bhagavan nimantraṇamāgatam? sūrpārakāt ānanda nagarāt/
S01divyav_u:1238: 026.032 kiyaddūre bhadanta sūrpārakaṃ nagaram? sātirekam ānanda [27]yojanaśatam/
S01divyav_u:1241: bhikṣūnārocaya--yo yuṣmākamutsahate śvaḥ sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā bhoktum,
S01divyav_u:1243: 027.002 evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya śalākāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1245: 027.004 tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kuṇḍopadhānīyakaḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāvimuktas tasyāmeva pariṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:1252: 027.010 ṛddhibhiryatra gantavyaṃ tūṣṇī tvaṃ bhava pūrṇaka//10// iti//
S01divyav_u:1255: tasyaitadabhavat--yena mayā sakalaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ vāntaṃ charditaṃ tyaktaṃ pratiniḥsṛṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:1257: 027.012 tena vīryamāsthāya ṛddhimutpādya yāvadāyuṣmānānandas tṛtīyasthavirasya śalākāṃ na dadāti,
S01divyav_u:1258: tāvat tena gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya śalākā gṛhītā/
S01divyav_u:1260: 027.015 vapuṣmattayā śrutena vā na balātkāraguṇaiśca gautama/
S01divyav_u:1263: 027.018 jarayā hi nipīḍitayauvanāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā hi bhavanti madvidhāḥ//12// iti//
S01divyav_u:1264: 027.019 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ caityaśalākāgrahaṇe/
S01divyav_u:1265: 027.020 tatprathamataḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇatām yaduta pūrṇaḥ kuṇḍopadhānīyakaḥ sthaviraḥ/
S01divyav_u:1267: 027.021 kiṃ cāpi uktaṃ mayā--praticchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyaṃ vivṛtapāpairiti,
S01divyav_u:1269: 027.023 yo vo yasyā ṛddherlābhī, tena tayā tatra sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā bhoktavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:1270: evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--āyuṣmantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1271: bhagavānevamāha--kiṃ cāpi uktaṃ mayā praticchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyamiti pūrvavat yāvat gatvā bhoktavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:1275: 027.029 pratyekamekaikasmin dvāre paramayā vibhūtyā rājaputrā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1276: mūladvāre ca mahatā rājānubhāvena sūrpārakādhipatī rājā āyuṣmān pūrṇo dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī ca vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1278: tān dṛṣṭvā rājā kathayati--bhadanta pūrṇa, kiṃ bhagavānāgatah?
S01divyav_u:1279: āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kathayati--mahārāja [28]patracārikā haritacārikā bhājanacārikāścaite, na tāvat bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:1282: āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kathayati--mahārāja na bhagavān, api tu khalu sthavirasthavirā eva te bhikṣava iti/
S01divyav_u:1285: 028.007 anye toyadharā ivāmbaratale vidyullatālaṃkṛtā ṛddhyā devapurīmiva pramuditā gantuṃ samabhyudyatāḥ//13//
S01divyav_u:1287: 028.010 āsane nirmitāścaike paśya ṛddhimatāṃ balam//14// iti//
S01divyav_u:1288: 028.011 tato bhagavān bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1289: 028.012 yāvad bhagavatā gandhakuṭyāṃ sābhisaṃskāraṃ pādo nyastaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1290: ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātah--iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī calati saṃcalati saṃpracalati/
S01divyav_u:1298: rājā āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ pṛcchati--ārya pūrṇa, kimetat?
S01divyav_u:1302: 028.018 tato bhagavatā kanakamarīcivarṇaprabhā utsṛṣṭā yayā jambudvīpo vilīnakanakāvabhāsaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1303: 028.019 punarapi rājā vismayotphullalocanaḥ pṛcchati--ārya pūrṇa, idaṃ kim?
S01divyav_u:1305: 028.021 tato bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāraḥ pañcabhirarhacchāntaiḥ sārdhaṃ sūrpārakābhimukhaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1307: sā bakulaśākhāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataśchāyāṃ kurvantī pṛṣṭataḥ saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:1308: 028.023 tasyā bhagavatā āśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhakī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:1309: yāṃ śrutvā tayā devatayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:1311_1: vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam /
S01divyav_u:1313_0: 028.029 dharmataiṣā--na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathaścittasya kalyatāṃ janayati
S01divyav_u:1313_1: aputrasya ca putralābho daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṃ rājyābhinandino vā rājyābhiṣeko
S01divyav_u:1314: 028.031 tato bhagavāṃstāsāṃ vinayakālamavekṣya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya [29]prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1315: 029.001 tā api bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1316: tato bhagavatā tāsāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā yāvat srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:1317_0: 029.003 tā dṛṣṭasatyās trirudānamudānayanti--idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ
S01divyav_u:1317_1: na pitrā kṛtaṃ na rājñā neṣṭasvajanabandhuvargeṇa na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na
S01divyav_u:1322: 029.006 etā vayaṃ bhagavataṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmo dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:1324: tata utthāyāsanāt yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan--aho bata bhagavānasmākaṃ kiṃcidatra prayacchet yatra vayaṃ kārāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1327: 029.010 tatastayā jetavananivāsinyā tasmin stūpe yaṣṭyāṃ sā bakulaśākhāropitā/
S01divyav_u:1328: bhagavāṃścoktah--bhagavan, ahamasmin stūpe kārāṃ kurvantī tiṣṭhāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1336: 029.015 te tena madena mattā na kiṃcinmanyante/
S01divyav_u:1341: 029.017 tataste ṛṣayaḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1343: te kathayanti--bhagavaṃstvaṃ dvipādakaṃ puṇyakṣetramiha praviṣṭo 'smākaṃ cedṛśī samavasthā/
S01divyav_u:1345: te kathayanti--bhagavan, puṣpaphalasalilasampannamāśramapadaṃ vinaṣṭam yathāpaurāṇaṃ bhavatu/
S01divyav_u:1347: tato bhagavatā ṛddhiḥ prasrabdhā, yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttam/
S01divyav_u:1349: 029.022 tato bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:1352: 029.024 tato yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan--labhema vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:1354: tataste bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitāh--eta bhikṣavaścarata brahmacaryamiti/
S01divyav_u:1355: 029.027 bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ saṃghāṭiprāvṛtāḥ pātrakaravyagrahastāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravo varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathena avasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1356: 029.029 ehīti coktā hi tathāgatena muṇḍāśca saṃghāṭiparītadehāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1357: 029.031 sadyaḥ praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṃ sthitā buddhamanorathena//15//
S01divyav_u:1359: 030.002 yasteṣām ṛṣiravavādakaḥ sa kathayati--bhagavan, mayā anena veṣeṇa mahājanakāyo vipralabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1361: 030.003 tato bhagavān pañcabhirṛṣiśataiḥ pūrvakaiśca pañcabhirbhikṣuḥśatairardhacandrākāropagūḍhastat eva ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā prakrānto 'nupūrveṇa musalakaṃ parvatamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1362: 030.005 tena khalu samayena musalake parvate vakkalī nāma ṛṣiḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:1363: 030.006 adrākṣīt sa ṛṣirbhagavantaṃ dūrādeva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ pūrvavat yāvat samantato bhadrakam/
S01divyav_u:1371: tato 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:1374_0: 030.012 tato bhagavantamidamavocat--labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
S01divyav_u:1374_1: bhikṣubhāvaṃ pūrvavat yāvat bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā pravrājito yāvadevaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena //
S01divyav_u:1375: 030.014 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śraddhādhimuktānām yaduta vakkalī bhikṣuriti/
S01divyav_u:1376: 030.015 tato bhagavān bhikṣusahasraparivṛto vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi kurvan sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1377: 030.016 bhagvān saṃlakṣayati--yadi ekena dvāreṇa praviśāmi, apareṣāṃ bhaviṣyati anyathātvam/
S01divyav_u:1379: tata ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā madhye sūrpārakasya nagarasyāvatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1380: 030.018 tataḥ sūrpārakādhipatī rājā āyuṣmān pūrṇo dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī te ca saptadaśa putrāḥ svakasvakena parivāreṇa yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S01divyav_u:1382: 030.020 tato bhagavānanekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrairanugamyamāno yena candanamālaḥ prāsādas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1384: 030.022 sa janakāyo bhagavantamapaśyaṃś candanamālaṃ prāsādaṃ bhettumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1385: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--yadi candanamālaḥ prāsādo bhetsyate, dātṛrṇāṃ puṇyāntarāyo bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:1388: tato bhagavatā tasyāḥ pariṣad āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:1399: 030.030 yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā//
S01divyav_u:1400: 030.031 atha dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī ca praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya āsanāni prajñāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayanti--samayo bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:1401: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālam [31]manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:1402: 031.001 tena khalu samayena kṛṣṇagautamakau nāgarājau mahāsamudre prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1403: tau saṃlakṣayatah--bhagavān sūrpārake nagare dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:1405: tatastau pañcanāgaśataparivārau pañcanadīśatāni saṃjanya sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:1407: 031.004 bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--imau kṛṣṇagautamau nāgarājau yadi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramāgamiṣyataḥ, agocarīkariṣyataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1409: 031.006 tatkasya hetoh? pañca me maudgalyāyana ātyayikapiṇḍapātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1410: 031.007 katame pañca? āgantukasya gamikasya glānasya glānopasthāyakasyopadhivārikasya ca/
S01divyav_u:1412: 031.008 atha bhagavān maudgalyāyanasahāyo yena kṛṣṇagautamakau nāgarājau tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1414: 031.010 tau kathayatah--tādṛśena bhadanta prasādena vayamāgatā yanna śakyamasmābhiḥ kuntapipīlikasyāpi prāṇinaḥ pīḍāmutpādayituṃ prāgeva sūrpārakanagaranivāsino janakāyasyeti/
S01divyav_u:1415: 031.012 tato bhagavatā kṛṣṇagautamakayor nāgarājayostādṛśo dharmo yaṃ śrutvā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatau,
S01divyav_u:1419: 031.014 ekaiko nāgaḥ saṃlakṣayati--aho bata bhagavān mama pānīyaṃ pibatu iti/
S01divyav_u:1420: 031.015 bhagavān saṃlakṣayti--yadi ekasyeiva pānīyaṃ pāsyāmi, eṣāṃ bhaviṣyati anyathātvam/
S01divyav_u:1425: 031.017 evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yatra pañcānāṃ nadīśatānāṃ saṃbhedastatrodakasya pātrapūramādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1428_1: bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau āpyāyakau poṣakau saṃvardhakau stanyasya dātārau citrasya
S01divyav_u:1429: 031.022 ekenāṃśena putro mātaraṃ dvitīyena pitaraṃ pūrṇavarṣaśataṃ paricaret,
S01divyav_u:1430: yadvā asyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ maṇayo muktā vaidūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvarta iti,
S01divyav_u:1432: neyatā putreṇa mātāpitaroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syādupakṛtaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:1433: 031.025 yastu asāvaśrāddhaṃ mātāpitaraṃ śraddhāsampadi samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S01divyav_u:1436: duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsampadi samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S01divyav_u:1437: iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syādupakṛtaṃ veti/
S01divyav_u:1438: 031.028 mayā ca mātur na kaścidupakāraḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1439: yadahaṃ samanvāhareyaṃ kutra me mātā upapanneti/
S01divyav_u:1440: 031.029 samanvāhartuṃ saṃvṛttaḥ paśyati marīcike lokadhātau upapannā/
S01divyav_u:1443: 031.031 yannvahametamarthaṃ bhagavato nivedayeyamiti bhagavantamidamavocat--uktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā pūrvam--duṣkarakārakau hi bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau iti/
S01divyav_u:1444: 031.032 tanmama mātā marīcike lokadhātau upapannā, [32]sā ca bhagavato vineyā/
S01divyav_u:1446: bhagavān kathayati--maudgalyāyana, kasya ṛddhyā gacchāmah? bhagavan madīyayā/
S01divyav_u:1447: 032.002 tato bhagavānāyuṣmāṃśca mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ sumerumūrdhni pādān sthāpayantau saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:1449: 032.004 adrākṣīt sā bhadrakanyā āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:1450: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ sasambhramāt tatsakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--cirādbata putrakaṃ paśyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1454: āyuṣmān maudgalyāyanaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ, mama ime skandhā anyāḥ saṃvṛddhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1456: 032.008 tato bhagavatā tasyā bhadrakanyāyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:1457: yāṃ śrutvā tayā bhadrakanyayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśaulaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:1458: 032.010 sā dṛṣṭasatyā trirudānamudānayati pūrvavat yāvat pratiṣṭhāpitā devamanuṣyeṣu/
S01divyav_u:1461: 032.013 apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaṃ ca mayopalabdham//16//
S01divyav_u:1463: 032.015 prāptaṃ ca kāntaṃ padamāryakāntaṃ tīrṇā ca duḥkhārṇavapāramasmi//17//
S01divyav_u:1467: eṣāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:1468: 032.019 upāsikāṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāmabhiprasannām/
S01divyav_u:1471_0: 032.021 atha sā bhadrakanyā bhagavantamāyuṣmantaṃ ca mahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ
S01divyav_u:1471_1: viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya
S01divyav_u:1471_2: bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhātahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā
S01divyav_u:1473: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pātragrāhakaḥ pātraṃ niryātayati/
S01divyav_u:1479: maudgalyāyanastato vismayāvarjitamatiḥ kathayati--kiṃ nāmeyaṃ bhagavann ṛddhih?
S01divyav_u:1481: 032.028 na mayā bhadanta vijñātamevaṃ gambhīramevaṃ gambhīrā buddhadharmā iti/
S01divyav_u:1485: 032.031 tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā pūrṇena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1486: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena [33]dāsyāḥ kukṣau upapannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1488: bhagavānāha--pūrṇena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitāani avaśyambhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:1491: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:1495: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:1497: 033.008 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//19//
S01divyav_u:1498_1: kāśyapo nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S01divyav_u:1507: 033.015 tena tīvreṇa paryavasthānena kharavākkarma niścāritam--kasya dāsīputrasyopadhivāra iti/
S01divyav_u:1512: 033.017 yadā asya paryavasthānaṃ vigataṃ tadā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--jānīṣe tvaṃ ko 'hamiti?
S01divyav_u:1513: sa kathayati--jāne tvaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajito 'hamapīti/
S01divyav_u:1514: 033.018 sa kathayati--yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi tu yanmayā pravrajya caraṇīyaṃ tatkṛtamahaṃ sakalabandhanābaddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1519: yattena naraka upapadya dāsīputreṇa bhavitavyam, tannarake nopapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1520: 033.022 pañca tu janmaśatāni dāsyāḥ kukṣau upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1521: yāvadetarhyapi carame bhave dāsyā eva kukṣau upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1522: 033.023 yat saṃghasyopasthānaṃ kṛtam, tenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1523: 033.024 yattatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:1524: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:1525: 033.025 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1528: 033.027 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:1536: 034.002 yadā rājñā bhāgadhena ajātaśatruṇā vaidehīputreṇa naukramo mātāpitrormāpitastadā vaiśālakairlicchavibhirbhagavato 'rthe naukramo māpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1537: 034.003 nāgāḥ saṃlakṣayanti--vayaṃ vinipatitaśarīrā yannu vayaṃ phaṇasaṃkrameṇa bhagavantaṃ nadī{dīm} gaṅgāmuttārayema iti/
S01divyav_u:1539: 034.005 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--rājagṛhāt śrāvastīṃ gantum yo yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣava utsahate rājño māgadhasyājātaśatrorvaidehīputrasya nausaṃkrameṇa nadīgaṅgāmuttartum,
S01divyav_u:1541: yo vā bhikṣavo vaiśālakānāṃ licchavīnāṃ nausaṃkrameṇa,
S01divyav_u:1543: 034.007 ahamapi āyuṣmatā ānandena bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ nāgānāṃ phaṇasaṃkrameṇa nadīṃ gaṅgāmuttariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:1546: 034.010 bhagavānapi āyuṣmatā ānandena sārdhaṃ nāgānāṃ phaṇasaṃkrameṇottīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1548: 034.012 ye tarantyarṇavaṃ saraḥ setuṃ kṛtvā visṛjya palvalāni/
S01divyav_u:1549: 034.013 kolaṃ hi janāḥ prabandhitā uttīrṇā medhāvino janāḥ//1//
S01divyav_u:1553: 034.017 chittveha mūlaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kasya paryeṣaṇāṃ caret//3// iti//
S01divyav_u:1555: dṛṣṭvā ca punarāyuṣmantamāmantrayate--icchasi tvamānanda yo 'sau yūya ūrdhvaṃ vyāmasahasraṃ tiryak ṣoḍaśapravedho nānāratnavicitro vitaḥ, taṃ draṣṭum?
S01divyav_u:1556: etasya bhagavan kālaḥ, etasya sugatasamayaḥ, yo 'yaṃ bhagavān yūpamucchrāpayet, bhikṣavaḥ paśyeyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:1557: 034.022 tato bhagavatā cakrasvatikanandyāvartena jālāvanaddhenānekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānāmāśvāsanakareṇa pṛthivī parāmṛṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:1558: 034.024 nāgāḥ saṃlakṣayanti--kimarthaṃ bhagavatā pṛthivī parāmṛṣṭeti? yāvat paśyanti yūyaṃ draṣṭukāmāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1562: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--ārohapariṇāhaṃ nimittaṃ bhikṣavo yūpasya gṛhṇīta, antardhāsyatīti/
S01divyav_u:1564: 034.027 bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta bhikṣavo yūpaṃ paśyanti/
S01divyav_u:1571: 035.001 [35]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo rājābhūta praṇādo nāma śakrasya devendrasya vayasyakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1572: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--anekadhanasamudito 'hamaputraśca/
S01divyav_u:1574: 035.003 tataḥ śakreṇa dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaśca--mārṣa, kasmāt tvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparastiṣṭhasīti?
S01divyav_u:1578: 035.006 yadi kaścit cyavanadharmā devaputro bhaviṣyati, tatte putratve samādāpayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1579: 035.007 dharmatā khalu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañca pūrvanimittāni prādurbhavanti--akliṣṭāni vāsāṃsi saṃkliśyanti,
S01divyav_u:1585: 035.010 sa śakreṇa devendreṇoktah--mārṣa, praṇādasya rājño 'grāmahiṣyāḥ kukṣau pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhāṇeti/
S01divyav_u:1588: 035.012 mā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kṛtvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1594: yasminneva divase pratisaṃdhirgṛhītā, tasmin divase mahājanakāyena praṇādo muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1595: 035.015 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:1596: 035.016 dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1597: 035.017 tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:1598: 035.018 jñātaya ūcuh--yasminneva divase 'yaṃ dārako mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāntaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1600: 035.019 yasminneva divase jātastasminneva divase mahājanakāyena nādo muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1601: 035.020 tasmāt bhavatu dārakasya mahāpraṇāda iti nāma/
S01divyav_u:1603: mahāpraṇādo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyāṃsaṃdhātrībhyāṃ dvāghyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyām/
S01divyav_u:1604: 035.023 so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarṇpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:1607: 035.025 saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārīparīkṣāyām/
S01divyav_u:1608: 035.026 so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghaṭṭako vācakaḥ paṭupracāraḥ paṇḍitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1609_0: 035.027 sa yāni tāni rāajñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhnābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryamanuprāptānāṃ
S01divyav_u:1610_0: tadyathā--hastiśikṣāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe śare dhanuṣi prayāṇe niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
S01divyav_u:1610_1: pāśagrahe tomaragrahe yaṣṭibandhe padabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe marmavedhe 'kṣuṇṇavedhe
S01divyav_u:1611: 035.032 dharmatā khalu na tāvat putrasya nāma prajñāyate yāvat tāto jīvati/
S01divyav_u:1614: sa yāvattāvad dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā adharmeṇa kārayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1615: 036.002 tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇoktah--mārṣa, mayā tvaṃ praṇādasya rājñaḥ samādāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1616: 036.003 mā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kāraya, mā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:1617: 036.004 sa yāvattāvad dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapi adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1618: dvirapi śakreṇoktah--mārṣa, mayā tvaṃ praṇādasya rājñaḥ putratve samādāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1619: 036.005 mā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kāraya, mā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:1620: 036.006 sa kathayati--kauśika, vayaṃ rājānaḥ pramattā iti ratibahulāḥ kṣaṇād vismarāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1621: 036.007 kiṃcittvamasmākaṃ cihnaṃ sthāpaya, yaṃ dṛṣṭvā dānāni dāsyāmaḥ, puṇyāni kārayiṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:1622: 036.008 na ca śakyate vinā nimittena puṇyaṃ kartum/
S01divyav_u:1623: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa viśvakarmaṇo devaputrasyājñā dattā--gaccha tvaṃ viśvakarman rājño mahāpraṇādasya niveśane/
S01divyav_u:1625: 036.010 ūrdhvaṃ vyāmasahasreṇa tiryak ṣoḍaśapravedhaṃ nānāratnavicitraṃ sarvasauvarṇamiti/
S01divyav_u:1626: 036.011 tato viśvakarmaṇā devaputreṇa mahāpraṇādasya rājño niveśane divyo maṇḍalavāṭo nirmito yūpaścocchritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1629: 036.013 tasya mātulo 'śoko nāma yūpasya paricārako vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1630: 036.014 tato yūpadarśanodyuktaḥ sarva eva jambudvīpanivāsī janakāya āgatya bhuktvā yūpaṃ paśyati,
S01divyav_u:1635: mahāpraṇādo rājā pṛcchati--bhavantaḥ, kasmāt stokāḥ karapratyāyā upanītāh?
S01divyav_u:1636: deva, jambudvīpanivāsī janakāya āgatya bhuktvā yūpaṃ paśyati, svakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ na karoti/
S01divyav_u:1641: tato 'pyasau janakāyaḥ svapathyadanamādāya bhuktvā yūpaṃ nirīkṣamāṇastiṣṭhati,
S01divyav_u:1651: 036.024 tato rājñā mahāpraṇādena dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛtvā sa yūpo nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāmāplāvitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1652: 036.025 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau māpraṇādasyāśoko nāma mātulaḥ, eṣa evāsau bhaddālī bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:1654: 036.027 kutra bhadanta asau yūpo vilayaṃ gamiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:1656: 036.028 aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ śaṅkho nāma rājā bhaviṣyati samyamanī cakravartī caturantavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājā saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1658: 036.030 tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:1659: 036.031 pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:1661: 037.001 śaṅkhasya rājño brahmāyur nāma brāhmaṇaḥ purohito bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:1663: sā maitreyāṃśena sphuritvā putraṃ janayiṣyati maitreyaṃ nāma/
S01divyav_u:1670: 037.008 enaṃ ca yūpamādāya śaṅkhasya rājña upanāmayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:1674: 037.010 tataste māṇavakāstam yūpaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ chittvā bhājayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:1675: 037.011 tato maitreyo māṇavakastasya yūpasyānityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tenaiva saṃvegena vanaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:1677: tasminneva divase maitreyāṃśena sphuritvā anuttaraṃ jñānamadhigamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:1678: 037.013 tasya maitreyaḥ samyaksambuddha iti saṃjñā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:1681: 037.014 śaṅkho 'pi rājā aśītikoṭṭarājasahasraparivāro maitreyaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ pravrajitamanupravrajiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:1684: 037.017 tato maitreyaḥ samyaksambuddho 'śītibhikṣukoṭiparivāro yena gurupādakaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkramiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:1687_1: dakṣiṇena pāṇinā gṛhītvā vāme pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati--yo

S01divyav_u:2009: 048.002 dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--yadi bhagavantaṃ gautamamupetyābhivādayiṣyāmi, karmaparihāṇirme bhaviṣyatīti/

S01divyav_u:2018: evamanena dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:2019: 048.010 tatkasya hetoh? asminnānanda pradeśe kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasyāvikopito 'sthisaṃghātastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:2020: 048.011 athāyuṣmānānando laghuladhveva caturguṇamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya bhagavantamidamavocat--niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsane/
S01divyav_u:2021: 048.012 evamayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:2027: yaṃ bhagavān bhikṣūṇāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasyāvikopitaṃ śarīrasaṃghātamupadarśayet/
S01divyav_u:2030: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti,
S01divyav_u:2031: tasmin samaye kuntapipīlikā api prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
S01divyav_u:2035: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--udgṛhṇīta bhikṣavo nimittam/
S01divyav_u:2038: 048.023 rājñā prasenajitā śrutaṃ bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanāyāvikopitaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātaṃ samucchritamiti/
S01divyav_u:2039: 048.024 śrutvā ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sahāntaḥpureṇa kumārairamātyairbhaṭabalāgrair naigamajānapadaiśca draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2044: anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kutūhalajātāni draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitāni pūrvakaiśca kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
S01divyav_u:2046: taiḥ śrutam--anatarhito 'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāturavikopita iti/
S01divyav_u:2047: 048.029 śrutvā ca punasteṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpannam--vṛthā asmākamāgamanaṃ jātamiti/
S01divyav_u:2049: 048.030 evaṃ ca cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--asmānme padāvihārāt kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti/

S01divyav_u:2126: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:2127: 051.018 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapaterbhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2129: atha anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:2130_0: 051.022 anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
S01divyav_u:2130_1: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
S01divyav_u:2139: 051.029 ato dauvārikena uktah--ārya tiṣṭha, mā pravekṣyasi/
S01divyav_u:2141: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā ājñā dattā--mā tāvat tīrthyānāṃ praveśaṃ dāsyasi,
S01divyav_u:2144: athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati--tasya me lābhāḥ sulabdhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:2145: yanmāṃ śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ śramaṇaśākyaputrīya[52] iti na jānante/
S01divyav_u:2146: 052.001 gacchāmi, kṛpaṇajanasyānugrahaṃ karomīti viditvā udyānaṃ gataḥ/
