S01divyav_u:2147: sa saṃlakṣayati--adya mayā kasyānugrahaḥ kartavya iti/
S01divyav_u:2148: 052.002 yāvadanyatamā nagarāvalambikā kuṣṭhābhidrutā sarujārtā pakvagātrā bhikṣāmaṭati/
S01divyav_u:2151: 052.004 tayā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaścittaprāsādikaḥ śāntena īryāpathena/
S01divyav_u:2152: 052.005 sā saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe dakṣiṇīye kārā kṛtā, yena me iyamevamrūpā samavasthā/
S01divyav_u:2153: yadi āryo mahākāśyapo mamāntikādanukampāmupādāya ācāmaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt, ahamasmai dadyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:2154: 052.007 tata āyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya pātramupanāmitam--yadi te bhagini parityaktam,
S01divyav_u:2160: saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyāryeṇa mama cittānurakṣayā na cchoritaḥ, api tu na paribhokṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:2161: 052.010 athāyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya tasyā eva pratyakṣamanyatamaṃ kuḍyamūlaṃ niśritya paribhuktam/
S01divyav_u:2162: 052.012 sa saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpi āryeṇa mama cittānurakṣayā paribhuktam,
S01divyav_u:2166: 052.014 tasyā atīva audbilyamutpannam--mamāryeṇa mahākāśyapena piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīta iti/
S01divyav_u:2167: 052.015 tata āyuṣmatī mahākāśyape cittamabhiprasādya kālaṃ gatā tuṣite devanikāye upapannā/
S01divyav_u:2168: 052.016 sā śakreṇa devendreṇa dṛṣṭā ācāmaṃ pratipādayantī cittamabhiprasādayantī kālaṃ ca kurvāṇā/
S01divyav_u:2171: tiryak ca pretaṃ ca manuṣyāṃścāturmahārājikān devāṃstrāyastriṃśān yāvanna paśyati/
S01divyav_u:2172: 052.019 tathā hyadhastāddevānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate no tūpariṣṭāt/
S01divyav_u:2180: 052.027 atha śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhavat--ime ca tāvanmanuṣyāḥ puṇyāpuṇyānāmapratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati, puṇyāni kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:2181: 052.028 ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśanena puṇyānāṃ svapuṇyaphale vyavasthitaḥ kasmāt dānāni na dadāmi,
S01divyav_u:2186: 052.031 avacīravicīrakaṃ kākābhilīnakaṃ nātiparamarūpaṃ kuvindaṃ cātmānamabhinimārya udūḍhaśiraskaḥ saṇaśāṭikānivāsitaḥ sphaṭitapāṇipādo vastraṃ vāyitumārabdhah[53]/
S01divyav_u:2187: 053.001 śacī api devakanyā kuvindanaryā veśadhāriṇī tasarikāṃ kartumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:2188: pārśve cāsyā divyā sudhā sajjīkṛtā tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:2190: 053.003 duḥkhitako 'yamiti kṛtvā dvāre sthitena pātraṃ prasāditam/
S01divyav_u:2194: 053.007 suviruddhamiti kṛtvā jāto me hṛdi saṃśayaḥ//3// iti//
S01divyav_u:2195: 053.008 dharmatā hyeṣā--asamanvāhṛtya arhatāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartate/
S01divyav_u:2200: yasya te bhagavatā dīrgharātrānugato vicikitsākathaṃkathāśalyaḥ samūla ārūḍho yathāpi tattathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena/
S01divyav_u:2202: ime tāvat manuṣyāḥ puṇyānāmapratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:2203: 053.012 ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśī eva puṇyānāṃ kathaṃ dānāni na dadāmi? nanu coktaṃ bhagavatā--
S01divyav_u:2206: 053.016 tataḥ prabhṛti āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ samanvāhṛtya kulāni piṇḍapātaṃ praveṣṭumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2207: 053.017 atha śakro devendra ākāśasthaścāyuṣmato mahākāśyapasya piṇḍapātaṃ carato divyayā sudhayā pātraṃ pūrayati/
S01divyav_u:2212: 053.021 sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapa ācāmena pratipāditaḥ,
S01divyav_u:2213: sā ca tuṣite devanikāye upapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:2214: 053.022 rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena śrutam--amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapa ācāmena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2217: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2218: 053.025 ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati,
S01divyav_u:2219: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:2220_0: 053.027 atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:2220_1: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavānāryamahākāśyapamuddiśya bhaktaṃ saptāhena iti /
S01divyav_u:2222: 053.030 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2223_0: 053.031 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastāmeva rātriṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:2223_1: samudānīyaṃ kālyamevotthāya āsanāni [54]prajñāpya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato
S01divyav_u:2224: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:2225: 054.002 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2227: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:2228_1: pratyakṣadarśīm eva puṇyānāṃ sve puṇyaphale pratiṣṭhāpito 'tṛpta eva puṇyairdānāni
S01divyav_u:2229_0: 054.008 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nekaparyāyeṇa buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ
S01divyav_u:2229_1: śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:2229_2: bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ
S01divyav_u:2230: 054.011 tato bhagavatā abhihitah--mahārāja, kasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśāmi?
S01divyav_u:2231: kiṃ tava, āhosvidyena tavāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtamiti?
S01divyav_u:2233: 054.013 ko 'nyo mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyatīti viditvā kathayati--bhagavan yena mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ tasya bhagavān nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatu iti/
S01divyav_u:2234: 054.014 tato bhagavatā kroḍamallakasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:2236: tato 'nyadivase rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--mama bhagavān piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte,
S01divyav_u:2239: te kathayanti--kimarthaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti?
S01divyav_u:2242: yatredānīṃ sa bhagavān mama piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte,
S01divyav_u:2245: 054.020 vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā śvo bhagavān devasyaiva nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti/
S01divyav_u:2246: 054.021 taiḥ pauruṣeyāṇāmājñā dattā yataḥ śvo bhavadbhiḥ praṇīta āhāraḥ sajjīkartavyaḥ prabhūtaścaiva samudānayitavyo yathopārdhaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātre patati upārdhaṃ bhūmau iti/
S01divyav_u:2247: 054.023 amātyairaparasmin divase prabhūta āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ praṇītaśca/
S01divyav_u:2249: 054.024 upārdhaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātre patati, upārdhaṃ bhūmau/
S01divyav_u:2250: 054.025 tataḥ kroḍamallakāḥ pradhāvitāh--bhūmau nipatitaṃ gṛhṇīma iti/
S01divyav_u:2255: 054.027 kimarthaṃ na dīyate? kimanenāparibhogaṃ choritena iti/
S01divyav_u:2256: tasya kroḍamallakasya cittavikṣepo jātah--na śakyaṃ tena tathā cittaṃ prasādayitum yathā pūrvam/
S01divyav_u:2257: 054.028 tato rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣuasaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā na mama nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti viditvā dakṣiṇāmaśrutvaiva praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2258: 054.030 tato bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā--
S01divyav_u:2260: 054.032 paśyasi(?) phalaṃ hi rūṣkikāyā alavaṇikāyāḥ kulmāṣapiṇḍikāyāḥ//5//
S01divyav_u:2261: 055.001 [55]athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--bahuśo bahuśo bhadanta bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya niveśane bhuktvā nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:2263: 055.003 bhagavānāha--icchasi tvamānanda rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ śrotum?
S01divyav_u:2264: etasya bhagavan kālaḥ, etasya sugata samayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2265: 055.005 ayaṃ bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ varṇayet,
S01divyav_u:2270: 055.008 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:2271: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2282: tena tasya dārakasya mātā abhihitā--ayaṃ tava putraḥ kṣetraṃ rakṣatu,
S01divyav_u:2286: sa tasya sukhaṃ bhaktakena yogodvahanaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2288: 055.016 tasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--adya gṛhapatipatnī suhṛtsambandhibāndhavāḥ saha śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhojanena vyagrā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2289: 055.017 gacchāmi sānukālaṃ tasya dārakasya bhaktaṃ nayāmi iti/
S01divyav_u:2290: 055.018 sā sānukālaṃ gatvā gṛhapatipatnyā etamarthaṃ niveśayati/
S01divyav_u:2291: sā ruṣitā kathayati--na tāvacchramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dadāmi jñātīnāṃ vā, tāvat preṣyamanuṣyāya dadāmi?
S01divyav_u:2292: adya tāvat tiṣṭhatu, śvo dviguṇaṃ dāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:2293: 055.020 tatastasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--mā me putro bubhukṣitakaḥ sthāsyatīti/
S01divyav_u:2298: sā kathayati--putra, yadeva prātidaivasikaṃ tadapyadya nāsti/
S01divyav_u:2304: 055.026 asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prantaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:2307: 055.028 sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūte dakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā, yena me īdṛśī samavasthā/
S01divyav_u:2308: 055.029 yadyayaṃ mamāntikādalavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍikāṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt, ahamasmai dadyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:2309: 055.030 tato 'sau pratyekabuddhastasya daridrapuruṣasya cetasā cittamājñāya pātraṃ prasāritavān--bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:2312: 055.032 tatastena tīvreṇa prasādena sā alavaṇikā kulmāṣapiṇḍakā tasmai pratyekabuddhāya pratipāditā//
S01divyav_u:2314: eṣa evāsau rājā prasenajit kauśalastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:2316: tena karmaṇā ṣaṭkṛtvo deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritavān,
S01divyav_u:2318: tenaiva ca karmaṇā avaśeṣeṇa etarhi rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣiktaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2321: 056.007 paśyasi phalaṃ hi rūkṣikāyā alavaṇikāyā kulmāṣapiṇḍakāyāḥ// iti/
S01divyav_u:2322: 056.008 sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajito 'lavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotirvyākṛtā iti/
S01divyav_u:2325: 056.010 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2326: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdaraśyati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:2327: 056.012 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:2328_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamutterāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu
S01divyav_u:2329: 056.015 adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:2330: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddhamukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya traimāsyaṃ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:2332: 056.017 tailasya ca kumbhakoṭiṃ samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato dātum/
S01divyav_u:2333: 056.018 tatra bhakte pūjāyāṃ ca mahān kolāhalo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2336: śrutvā ca punaḥ pṛcchati--bhavantaḥ, kimeṣa uccaśabdo mahāśabda iti/
S01divyav_u:2337: 056.020 aparaiḥ samākhyātam--rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddhapramukho bhikṣuasṃghastraimāsyaṃ bhojitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:2339: tailasya kumbhakoṭiṃ ca samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato dātumiti/
S01divyav_u:2340: 056.022 tatastasyā nagarāvalambikāyā etadabhavat--ayaṃ tāvadrājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ puṇyairatṛpto 'dyāpi dānāni dadāti, puṇyāni karoti/
S01divyav_u:2341: 056.024 yannvahamapi kutaścit samudānīya bhagavataḥ pradīpaṃ dadyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:2342: tayā khaṇḍamallake tailasya stokam yācayitvā pradīpaṃ prajvālya bhagavataścaṅkrame dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2343: 056.025 pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathāyaṃ bhagavāñ śākyamunirvarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma śāstā loka utpannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:2344: evamahamapi varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunireva śāstā bhaveyam/
S01divyav_u:2353: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatām--na tāvadupasthāyakāḥ pratisamlīyante na yāvadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ pratisamlīnā iti/
S01divyav_u:2354: 056.032 athāyuṣmānānandaḥ saṃlakṣayati--asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavanta āloke śayyāṃ kalpayanti/
S01divyav_u:2357: tataścīvarakarṇikena, tato vyajanena, tathāpi na śaknoti nirvāpayitum/
S01divyav_u:2360: mama buddhirutpanā--asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavanta āloke śayyāṃ kalpayanti/
S01divyav_u:2368: te 'pi na śaknuyur nirvāpayituṃ prāgeva hastagataścīvarakarṇiko vyajanaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:2369: 057.007 tathā hi--ayaṃ pradīpastayā dārikayā mahatā cittābhisaṃskāreṇa prajvalitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2370: 057.008 api tu ānanda bhaviṣyatyasau dārikā varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2383_0: 058.002 buddho bhavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme satkṛto gurukṛto
S01divyav_u:2383_1: mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ paurairbrāhmaṇairgṛhapatibhiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ
S01divyav_u:2384: 058.005 tatra khalu varṣāvāsaṃ bhagavānupagto jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:2385: 058.006 atha tadaiva pravāraṇāyāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ saṃbahulāḥ śrtāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2386: 058.007 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānto niṣaṇṇāh
S01divyav_u:2387: 058.008 ekāntaniṣaṇṇān saṃbahulāñ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:2388: 058.010 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:2390: śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntāḥ,
S01divyav_u:2392: 058.012 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2393: 058.013 saṃbahulāñ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇija āyuṣmānānando dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:2394: 058.015 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:2395_0: 058.016 atha te vaṇija utthāyāsanebhyah ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmānānandastenānñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:2395_1: praṇamya āyuṣmantamānandamidamavocan -- kiṃcitte āryānanda śrutaṃ varṣoṣito bhagavān
S01divyav_u:2397: dharmatā caiṣā ṣaṇmahānagaranivāsino vaṇijo yasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto gantukāmā bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:2399: 058.020 sa kathayati -- buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kiṃ na pṛcchatha ? durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2401: mamāpi bhavanto durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2403: yadi bhadantānandasyāpi durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ,
S01divyav_u:2404: kathaṃ bhadantānando jānīte 'mukāṃ diśaṃ bhagavān gamiṣyatīti ?
S01divyav_u:2406: 058.024 kathaṃ nimittena ? yāṃ diśaṃ bhagavān gantukāmastato 'bhimukho niṣīdati, evaṃ nimittena/
S01divyav_u:2407: 058.025 kathaṃ parikathayā ? teṣāṃ janapadānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣate, evaṃ parikathayā/
S01divyav_u:2408: 058.026 kutomukho bhadantānanda bhagavān niṣīdati, katameṣāṃ ca janapadānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣate ?
S01divyav_u:2409: magadhābhimukho bhavanto bhagavān niṣīdati, māgadhakānāṃ janapadānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣate/
S01divyav_u:2412: nāgnibhyaṃ nodakabhyaṃ na siṃhabhyaṃ na vyāghrabhyaṃ na dvīpitarakṣuparacakrabhyaṃ na caurabhayaṃ na gulmatarapaṇyātiyātrābhyaṃ na manuṣyāmanuṣyabhayam/
S01divyav_u:2413: 058.030 kālena ca kālaṃ divyāni rūpāṇi dṛśyante,
S01divyav_u:2419: 059.001 [059]atha saṃbahulāḥ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijah āyuṣmatah ānandasya bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya āyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2420: 059.003 dhartā khalu buddhā bhagavanto jīvanto dhriyanto yāpayanto mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamānāḥ parānugrahapravṛttāḥ kālena kālamaraṇyacārikāṃ caranti,
S01divyav_u:2421: nadīcārikāṃ parvatacārikāṃ śmaśānacārikāṃ janapada cārikāṃ caranti/
S01divyav_u:2422: 059.005 asmiṃstvarthe buddho bhagavān magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ cartukāmastadeva pravāraṇāṃ pravārayitvā āyuṣmantamānadāmāmantrayate sma -- gaccha ānanda,
S01divyav_u:2423: bhikṣūṇāmārocaya itaḥ saptame divase tathāgato magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cāriṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2424: 059.007 yo yuṣmākam utsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ janapadacārikāṃ cartum, sa cīvarakarma karotu/
S01divyav_u:2425: 059.008 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati -- bhagavānāyuṣyanta itaḥ saptame divase magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2426: 059.009 yo yuṣmākamutsahate bhagavatā sārdhaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cartum, sa cīvarakarma karotu/
S01divyav_u:2427: 059.011 atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ saṃbahulaiśca śrāvastīnivāsibhirvaṇigbrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ sārdhaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:2428: 059.013 atha saṃbahulāśca śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2429: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantamidamavocan -- adhivāsayatvasmākaṃ bhagavān yāvacca śrāvastī yāvacca rājagṛham,
S01divyav_u:2431: 059.016 adhivāsayati bhagavān saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvastīnivāsināṃ vaṇijāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:2432: 059.017 atha saṃbahulāḥ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ//
S01divyav_u:2433: 059.019 atha saṃprasthite buddhe bhagavati antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca rājagṛham,
S01divyav_u:2436: 059.021 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ kathayanti -- gaccatu bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2438: 059.022 ityanuvicintya sarve javena prasṛtā yena sārthaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2440: caurāḥ kathayanti -- vayaṃ smo bhadanta caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2441: 059.023 nāsamākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:2446: api tu sakalasya sārthasya parigaṇayya suvarṇaṃ gṛhṇīdhvam/
S01divyav_u:2448: asmin sārthe ye upāsakā viṇijastaiḥ kṛtsnasya sārthasya mūlyaṃ gaṇayya caurāṇāṃ niveditam iyanti śatāni sahasrāṇi ceti/
S01divyav_u:2449: 059.028 tatasteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ sārthaniṣkrayārthaṃ bhagavatā nidhānaṃ darśitam/
S01divyav_u:2450: 059.029 tatastena caurasahasreṇa sārthamūlyapramāṇaṃ suvarṇaṃ gṛhītam, avaśiṣṭaṃ tatraivāntarhitam/
S01divyav_u:2453: punarapi bhagavān sārthaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃgha puraskṛto rājagṛhāt śrāvastīṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2455: 060.001 [60]evaṃ dvitricatuṣpanñcaṣaḍvārāṃśca cairasahasrasakāśādāgamanagamanena sārthaḥ paritrāto mūlyaṃ cānupradattam/
S01divyav_u:2456: 060.002 saptaṃ tu cāraṃ bhagavān sārtharahito bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ śāvastyā rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2458: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ saṃlapanti -- bhagavān gacchatu, bhikṣusaṃghaṃ muṣiṣyāṃḥ/
S01divyav_u:2459: 060.004 tatkasya hetoh ? eṣo hi bhagavān suvarṇapradaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2461: bhagavatā cābhihitāh -- vatsāḥ, mama ete śrāvakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2462: 060.006 caurāḥ kathayanti -- jānāsyeva bhagavān -- vayaṃ caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2463: 060.007 nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vaṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:2465: 060.008 tato bhagavatā caurāṇāṃ mahānidhānaṃ darśitam, evaṃ coktāh -- vatsāḥ, yāvadāptaṃ dhanaṃ gṛhṇītheti/
S01divyav_u:2466: 060.009 tatastena caurasahasreṇa tasmānmahānidhānādyāvadāptaṃ suvarṇamādattam, avaśiṣṭaṃ tatraivāntarhitam/
S01divyav_u:2467: 060.010 atha bhagavāṃstaccaurasahasram yāvadāptaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā tato 'nupūrveṇa rājagṛhamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2468: 060.011 tatasteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ buddhirutpannā -- yā kācidasmākaṃ śrīsaubhāgyasampat,
S01divyav_u:2470: 060.012 yannu vayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghamasmin pradeśe bhojayema iti/
S01divyav_u:2472_2: daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣtānāṃ trīrātrestrirdivasasya ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivasena buddhacakṣuṣā lokam
S01divyav_u:2483: kamahamapāyād vyutthāpya svarge mokṣaphale ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmi,
S01divyav_u:2490: 060.029 yathā hi mātā priyamekaputrakaṃ hyavekṣate rakṣati cāsya jīvitam/
S01divyav_u:2491: 060.031 tathaiva vaineyajanaṃ tathagato hyavekṣate rakṣati cāsya saṃtatim//2//
S01divyav_u:2493: 061.003 vaineyavatsān bhavaduḥkhanaṣṭān vatsān praṇaṣṭaniva vatsalā gauḥ//3//
S01divyav_u:2494_0: 061.005 tato bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ vaineyakālamapekṣya rājagṛhādanupūrveṇa bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:2494_2: mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta āśvastaparivāraḥ pūrvavat yāvanmahākaruṇayā samanvāgatas
S01divyav_u:2497: 061.009 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantamidamavodcan -- adhivāsayatu asmākaṃ bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena/
S01divyav_u:2499: atha caurasahasraṃ bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato'ntikān prakrāntam//
S01divyav_u:2500: 061.013 atha taccaurasahasraṃ tāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñnapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya,
S01divyav_u:2502: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyase/
S01divyav_u:2503: 061.015 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya caurasahasrasya bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2504: 061.017 atha taccaurasahasraṃ buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya candanodakena pādau prakṣālayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:2505: 061.018 atha bhagavān prakṣālitapāṇipādaḥ purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñnapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2506_0: 061.019 niṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena
S01divyav_u:2506_1: svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ
S01divyav_u:2507: atha bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ viditvā dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñnātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:2508: yāṃ śrutvā tena caurasahasreṇa tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñnānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:2509_0: 061.024 dṛṣṭasatyāśca kathayanti -- idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā
S01divyav_u:2509_1: kṛtaṃ na rājñnā na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair neṣṭair na svajanabandhuvargeṇa
S01divyav_u:2516: 061.027 labhema vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:2518: tato bhagavatā brahmeṇa svareṇābhihitāh -- eta vatsāḥ, carata brahmacaryam/
S01divyav_u:2520: 061.031 sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyāśca saṃvṛttāḥ//
S01divyav_u:2521_1: -- paśya bhadanta bhagavatā idaṃ caurasahasraṃ saptavāraṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā atyantaniṣṭhe
S01divyav_u:2523: yathā atīte 'pyadhvani mayā asyaiva caurasahasrasya sakāśādanekabhāṇḍasahasraḥ sārtho niṣkrītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:2525_1: duradhigamāṃ badaradvīpayātrāṃ varṣaśatena sādhayitvā etadeva caurasahasramārabhya
S01divyav_u:2526_0: 062.007 tacchruṇuta -- bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminneva jambudvīpe vārāṇasyāṃ
S01divyav_u:2526_1: nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati sma ṛddhaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ
S01divyav_u:2528: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ priyaseno nāma sārthavāhaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:2530: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:2531: 062.013 atha anyatama udārapuṇyamaheśākhyaḥ sattvo 'nyatamasmāt praṇītāddevanikāyāccayutvā tasyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ kukṣimavakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2539: 062.017 saceddārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:2541: 062.018 sā āttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati -- diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhasva, āpannasattvāsmi saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:2542: 062.019 yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2543: 062.020 so 'pyāttamanāttamanā udānamudānayati -- apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:2549: asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmuddiśya dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśet -- idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatviti/
S01divyav_u:2550_1: uṣṇa uṣṇopakaraṇaiḥ śīte śītopakaraṇairvaidyaprajñnaptairāhārair nātiśītair nātyuṣṇair
S01divyav_u:2553: 062.028 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:2554: 062.029 dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāso dṛḍhakaṭhinaśarīro mahānagnabalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2555: 062.031 tasya jñnātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatirātriṃdivasāni tasya jātasya jāto mahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti -- kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma?
S01divyav_u:2558: supriyo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhya upanyasto dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām/
S01divyav_u:2559: 063.003 so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhurunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiṣcottaptottapairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:2563: 063.006 nikṣepe hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ puruṣaparīkṣāyāṃ strīparīkṣāyām/
S01divyav_u:2564_1: sarvabhūtarutajñnaḥ sarvagatigatijñnah uddhaṭṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ paramatīkṣṇaniśitabuddhiḥ
S01divyav_u:2565_0: 063.009 sa yāni tāni rājñnāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhnābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryamanuprāptānāṃ
S01divyav_u:2566_0: tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarudhanuḥṣu upayāne niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
S01divyav_u:2566_1: tomaragrahe chedye bhedye muṣṭibandhe padabandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe'kṣuṇṇavedhe
S01divyav_u:2568: dharmatā caiṣā -- na tāvat putrasya nāma nirgacchati yāvat pitā dhriyate/
S01divyav_u:2574: kālagate priyasene sārthavāhe brahmadattena kāśirājñnā supriyo mahāsārthavāhatve 'bhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2575: 063.019 tena sārthavāhabhūtena iyamevamrūpā mahāpratijñnā kṛtā -- sarvattvā mayā dhanena saṃtarpayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2578: 063.021 atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati -- alpaṃ ca deyaṃ bahavaśca yācakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2580: yannvahaṃ sāmudram yānapātraṃ samudānīya mahāsamudramavatareyaṃ dhanahārikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2581: 063.023 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sāmudrayānapātraṃ samudānīya pañcamātrairvaṇikśataiḥ sārdhaṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2582: 063.024 tato 'nupūrveṇa ratnadvīpaṃ gatvā ratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā svastikṣemābhyāṃ mahāsamudrāduttīrya sthalajairvahitrairbhāṇḍamāropya vārāṇasyabhimukhaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2586: caurāḥ kathayanti -- sārthavāha, tvamekaḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ gaccha, avaśiṣṭaṃ sārthaṃ bhuṣiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2587: 063.028 sārthavāhaḥ kathayati mamaiṣa bhavantaḥ sārthaḥ saṃniśritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2588: 063.029 nārhanti bhavanto muṣitum / evamuktāścaurāḥ kathayanti -- vayaṃ smaḥ sārthavāhacaurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2589: 063.030 nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:2591: 063.031 teṣāṃ supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- sārthasya mūlyaṃ bhavanto gaṇyatām/
S01divyav_u:2593: tataste vaṇijaḥ parasparaṃ mūlyaṃ gaṇayitvā caurāṇāṃ nivedayanti[64] -- iyanti śatāni sahasrāṇi ceti/
S01divyav_u:2594: 064.001 tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena bhāṇḍaniṣkrayārthe svaṃ dravyamanupradattam/
S01divyav_u:2596: evaṃ dvistriścatuḥpanñcaṣaḍvārāṃs tasyaiva caurasahasrasya sakāśāt supriyeṇa sārthavāhena sārthaḥ paritrāto mūlyaṃ cānupradattam/
S01divyav_u:2597: 064.003 yāvat saptaṃ tu vāraṃ supriyaḥ sārthavāho mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2600: 064.006 supriyeṇa ca sārthavāhenāvalokyābhihitāh -- supriyo 'haṃ bhavantaḥ sārthavāhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2601: caurāḥ kathayanti -- jānāsyeva mahāsārthavāha vayaṃ caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2602: 064.007 nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyaṃ na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:2604: tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena pūrvikāṃ pratijñnāmanusmṛtya dṛḍhapratijñnena tasya caurasahasrasya bhāṇḍamanupradattam/
S01divyav_u:2605: 064.009 supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati -- ime caurā labdhaṃ labdhamarthajātasaṃnicayaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:2606: 064.010 mayā ca mahatī pratijñnā kṛtā sarvasattvā dhanena mayā saṃtarpayitavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:2607: 064.011 so 'hamimaṃ caurasahasraṃ na śaknomi dhanena saṃtarpayitum/
S01divyav_u:2608: kathaṃ punaḥ sarvasattvān dhanena saṃtarpayiṣyāmīti cintāparo middhamavakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:2609_1: lokahitārthamabhyudgatasya anyatarā maheśākhyā devatā upasaṃkramya samāśvāsayati
S01divyav_u:2611: asti khalu mahāsārthavāha asminneva jambudvīpe badaradvīpo nāma mahāpattano 'manuṣyāvacarito maheśākhyamanuṣyādhiṣṭhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2612: 064.016 santi tasmin badaradvīpe pradhānāni ratnāni sarvasattvavicitramanorathaparipūrakāṇi/
S01divyav_u:2613: 064.017 yadi mahāsārthavāho badaradvīpayātrāṃ sādhayet, evamimāṃ mahatīṃ pratijñnāṃ pratinistareta/
S01divyav_u:2614: 064.018 iyaṃ hi mahāpratijñnā śakrabrahmādīnāmapi dustarā, prageva manuṣyabhūtasya/
S01divyav_u:2616: na ca śakitā supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena sā devatā praṣṭum -- katarasyāṃ diśi badaradvīipaḥ kathaṃ vā tatra gamyata iti/
S01divyav_u:2617: 064.021 atha supriyasya sātrthavāhasya suptapratibuddhasya etadabhavat -- aho bata me sā devatā punarapi darśayet,
S01divyav_u:2618: diśaṃ copāyaṃ ca vyapadiśed badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyeti cintāparo middhamavakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2619_0: 064.023 atha sā devatā tasya mahātmana udārapuṇyamaheśākhyasya dṛḍhodārapratijñnasyodāravīryaparākramanāmanikṣiptotsāhatāṃ
S01divyav_u:2619_1: viditvā upasaṃkramya evamāha -- mā tvaṃ sārthavāha khedamāpadyasva /
S01divyav_u:2620: 064.025 asti khalu mahāsārthavāha paścime digbhāge panñcāntaradvīpaśatāni samatikramya sapta mahāparvatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:2622_1: śaṅkhanābhī ca nīlodastārakākṣaśca parvatau nīlagrīva eva ca vairambhā tāmrāṭavī
S01divyav_u:2622_2: vemṇugulmaḥ sapta parvatāḥ sakaṇṭakāḥ kṣāranadī triśaṅkuh ayaskilamaṣṭādaśavakro
S01divyav_u:2622_3: nadīślakṣṇa eva ca dhūmanetramudakaṃ saptaśīviṣaparvatā nadī bhavati paścimā /
S01divyav_u:2624: 064.030 anulomapratilome mahāsamudre manuṣyānavacarite anulomapratilomā vāyavo vānti/
S01divyav_u:2625: 064.031 tatra yo 'sau puruṣo bhavati maheśākhyo maheśākhyadevatāparigṛhītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:2626: sa mahatā puṇyabalena vīryabalena cittabalena mahāntaṃ plavamāsthāya anulomapratilomamahāsamudramavatarati[65]/
S01divyav_u:2627: 065.001 sa yanmāsena gacchati, tadekena divasena pratyāhriyate/
S01divyav_u:2632: 065.003 anulomapratilomaṃ mahāsamudraṃ samatikramya anulomapratilomo nāma parvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:2635_0: 065.005 sa vīryabalenātmānaṃ saṃdhārya tasmādeva mahāparvatādamoghāṃ nāmauṣadhīṃ
S01divyav_u:2635_1: samanviṣya gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya anulomapratilomaṃ nāma
S01divyav_u:2639: 065.008 sacedevaṃ vidhiṃ vā nānutiṣṭhati auṣadhīṃ vā na labhate,
S01divyav_u:2644: 065.010 anulomapratilomaṃ mahāparvataṃ samatikramya āvarto nāma mahāsamudraḥ/
S01divyav_u:2645: 065.011 tatra vairambhakā vāyavo vānti yaistadudakaṃ bhrāmyate/
S01divyav_u:2647: sa mahatā puṇyabalena vīryabalena cittabalena kāyabalena mahāntaṃ plavamāsthāya āvartaṃ mahāsamudramavarati/
S01divyav_u:2651: evaṃ dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe panñcame ṣaṣṭhe āvarte saptakṛtvo bhrāmayitvā nirudhyate,
S01divyav_u:2655: 065.018 tatra śaṅkho nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharo mahābalo mahākāyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2656: 065.019 tasyopariṣṭādyojanamātre śaṅkhanābhī nāmauṣadhī divā dhūmāyate rātrau prajvalati/
S01divyav_u:2658: sa khalu nāgo divā svapiti rātrau carati/
S01divyav_u:2659: tatra tena puruṣeṇa divā sukhasuptasya nāgasya ātmānaṃ samanurakṣatā nāgaśarīramaviheṭhayatā auṣadhibalena mantrabalena puṇyabalena śaṅkhanābhī auṣadhī grahītavyā/
S01divyav_u:2660: 065.022 gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya āvartaḥ parvato 'dhiroḍhavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2669: nīlode mahāsamudre tārākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raktanetraḥ pradīptaśiroruho vikṛtacaraṇadaśananayanaḥ parvatāyatakukṣiḥ/
S01divyav_u:2670: 065.027 sacet svapiti, vivṛtānyasya netrāṇi bhavanti, tadyathā acirodito bhāskaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:2671: 065.028 audārikāścāsya āśvāsapraśvāsā gurugurukāḥ pravartante yathā meghasya garjato 'śanyāṃ ca sphūrjatyāṃ śabdaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2673_0: tatra tena puruṣeṇa tasmādeva samudrakūlānmahāmakarināmauṣadhīṃ samanviṣya gṛhya
S01divyav_u:2673_1: netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya mahānataṃ plavamāsthāya suptaṃ tārākṣaṃ
S01divyav_u:2677: tamenaṃ tārākṣo dakarākṣasa ojaṃ vā ghaṭṭayati,
S01divyav_u:2680: 066.003 nīlodaṃ mahāsamudraṃ samatikramya nīlodo nāma mahāparvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:2681: tatra nīlagrīvo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati panñcaśataparivāra ugratejā raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2683: 066.005 apīdānīmanimiṣaṃ paśyato netrāṇi vyābādhayate, mūrcchāṃ ca saṃjanayati/
S01divyav_u:2686: sa khalu nāgo dṛṣṭiviṣo 'pi śvāsaviṣo 'pi sparśaviṣo 'pi daṃṣṭrāviṣo 'pi/
S01divyav_u:2688: yaḥ khalu tena dhūmena mṛgo vā pakṣī vā spṛśyate, sa panñcatvamāpadyate/
S01divyav_u:2689: 066.009 tatra tena puruṣeṇa śiraḥsnātenopoṣitena maitrāyatā karuṇāyatā avyāpannena cittenātmānaṃ samanurakṣatā nāgaśarīramaviheṭhayatā auṣadhī grahītavyā/
S01divyav_u:2690: 066.010 netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya anena vidhinā jānatānuṣṭhitena nīlodaḥ parvato 'bhiroḍhavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2691: 066.011 timiraṃ na bhaviṣyati, mūrcchā ca na bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2697: 066.014 nīlodaṃ parvataṃ samatikramya vairambho nāma mahāsamudraḥ/
S01divyav_u:2698: vairambhe mahāsamudre vairambhā nāma vāyavo vānti yaistadudakaṃ kṣobhyate,
S01divyav_u:2700: 066.016 tamutsṛjya uttareṇa vairambhasya mahāsamudrasya mahatī tāmrāṭavī anekayojanāyāmavistārā/
S01divyav_u:2702: 066.018 tatra tāmrākṣo nāma ajagaraḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ paramadurgandhaḥ panñcayojanāyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2704: yadā svapiti, tadā asya yojanaṃ sāmantakena lālāsya spharitvā/
S01divyav_u:2705: 066.020 tiṣṭhati, yadā jāgarti, alpāsya lālā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:2711: tāṃ gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya suptaṃ tāmrākṣamajagaraṃ viditvā auṣadhībalena mantrabalena vā ajagarabhavanasamīpena gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:2713: svastikṣemābhyāmatikramya aviheṭhitastāmrākṣeṇājagareṇa tataḥ paścānmūlaphalāni bhakṣayatā gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:2715: 066.026 tatra tena puruṣeṇa tāmrapaṭṭaiḥ pādau baddhvā tān parvatān vīryabalena laṅghayitvā sapta kṣāranadyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2717: tataḥ śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā abhiruhyātikramitavyā aspṛśatā pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:2719: sapta kṣāranadīḥ samatikramya triśaṅkur nāma parvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:2720: 066.029 triśaṅkau parvate triśaṅkavo nāma kaṇṭakāstīkṣṇāḥ sutīkṣṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2721: 066.030 tatastena puruṣeṇa tāmrapaṭṭairvetrapāśaiḥ pādau baddhvā atikaramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:2724: tatra tena puruṣeṇa śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā atikramitavyamaspṛśatā pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:2726: 067.001 yathā triśaṅkuḥ parvataḥ, evaṃ triśaṅkukā nāma nadī/
S01divyav_u:2730: asya na kiṃcit nistaraṇamanyatra vṛkṣāgrād vṛkṣamadhiruhya gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:2731: 067.004 aṣṭādaśavakraṃ parvatamatikramya aṣṭādaśavakrikā nāma nādī grāhamakarākulā saṃvṛtā ca/
S01divyav_u:2738: ślakṣṇaṃ parvatamatikramya ślakṣṇā nāma nadī grāhamakarākulā/
S01divyav_u:2742: ślakṣṇāṃ nadīmatikramya dhūmanetro nāma parvato dhūmāyate saṃdhūmāyate/
S01divyav_u:2743: 067.010 yena khalu tena dhūmena mṛgā vā pakṣiṇo vā spṛśyante, panñcatvamāpadyante/
S01divyav_u:2746: 067.012 guhāṃ samanviṣya tenātra guhādvāramauṣadhibalena mantrabalena ca moktavyam /
S01divyav_u:2747: sā ca khalu guhā āśīviṣaparipūrṇā tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:2748: 067.013 te khalu āśīviṣā dṛṣṭiviṣā api, sparśaviṣā api/
S01divyav_u:2752: 067.015 tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ saṃjīvanī nāmauṣadhī jyotīrasaśca maṇirdīpaprabhāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2753: 067.016 tāmauṣadhīṃ gṛhītvā saśīrṣapādaṃ samālabhya tāṃ cauṣadhīṃ gṛhītvā guhā praveṣṭavyā/
S01divyav_u:2754: auṣadhībalena mantrabalena auṣadhīprabhāvāccāśīviṣāḥ kāye na kramiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:2762: 067.021 tataḥ śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā māṃsapeśyā ātmānamācchādya adhiroḍhavyam/
S01divyav_u:2763: 067.022 tatastā āśīviṣā māṃsagandhena pārāt pāraṃ gamiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:2764: saptāśīviṣamatikramya mahān sudhāvadātaḥ parvataḥ, uccaśca pragṛhītaśca/
S01divyav_u:2765: 067.023 so 'dhiroḍhavyas tatra drakṣyasi mahāntaṃ sauvarṇabhūmiṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpaphalacchāyāvṛkṣopaśobhitam/
S01divyav_u:2766: 067.024 rohitakāñ janapadān ṛddhāṃśca kṣemāṃśca subhikṣāṃśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṃśca/
S01divyav_u:2767_0: 067.025 rohitakaṃ ca mahānagaraṃ dvādaśayojanāyāmaṃ saptayojanavistṛtaṃ saptaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ
S01divyav_u:2768_0: 067.027 vīṇā vallikā mahatī sughoṣakaiḥ śrotrābhirāmaiśca gītadhvanibhiranuparataprayogaṃ
S01divyav_u:2769_0: 067.030 yatra maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ prativasati abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paṇḍito
S01divyav_u:2769_1: vyakto medhāvī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
S01divyav_u:2770: 068.001 sa te badaradvīpamahāpattanasya pravṛttimākhyāsyati, nimittāni, ca darśayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2771: 068.002 yathoktaṃ ca vidhimanuṣṭhāsyasi, na ca khedamāpatsyase/
S01divyav_u:2772: evaṃ mahāsārthavāha paramaduṣkarakāraka imāṃ sumerumalayamandarasadṛśīṃ dṛḍhāṃ pratijñnāṃ nistariṣyasi/
S01divyav_u:2773: 068.003 iyaṃ ca mahāpratijñnā śakrabrahmādīnāmapi duṣkarā, prāgeva manuṣyabhūtānām//
S01divyav_u:2775_0: atha supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ suptapratibuddho devatāvacanaṃ śrutvā paramavismayamāpannaścintayati
S01divyav_u:2776: 068.007 yadi tāvat sādhitā, duṣkarakārikā iyaṃ devatā/
S01divyav_u:2781: athavā yadyapyahaṃ lokahitārthe pratipadyeyam, saphalo me pariśramaḥ syāt/
S01divyav_u:2787: kasmādahaṃ na sādhayiṣyāmītyanuvicintya supriyo mahāsārthavāho dṛḍhapratijñno dṛḍhavīryaparākramo 'nikṣiptotsāha udārapuṇyavipākamaheśākhyo/
S01divyav_u:2788_1: samanusmṛtya mahatā vīryabalena ekākī advitīyavyavasāyo yathopadiṣṭāni panñcāntaradvīpaśatāni samatikrāmati /
S01divyav_u:2790: sapta mahānadyo vistareṇa sarvāṇi saṃkaṭāni yathoktena vidhinā mūlakandaphalāhāro guṇavati phalake baddhvā paripūrṇairdvādaśabhirvarṣai rohitakaṃ mahānagaramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2791: 068.018 udyāne sthitvā anyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate -- kaścidbhoḥ puruṣa asmin rohitake mahānagare magho nāma sārthavāhaḥ prarivasati?
S01divyav_u:2795: atha supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasyaitadabhavat -- mā haiva magho mahāsārthavāho 'dṛṣṭa eva kālaṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:2796: 068.021 ko me vyapadeśaṃ kariṣyati tasya badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyeti viditvā tvaritatvaritam yena maghasya sārthavāhasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2797: 068.023 sa dvāre nivāryate, na labhate praveśaṃ mahāsārthavāhadarśanāya/
S01divyav_u:2798: 068.024 dharmatā khalu kuśalā bodhisattvāsteṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu/
S01divyav_u:2800_1: sārthavāhaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsaiḥ kālaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā supriyo mahāsārtahvāho 'dhītya
S01divyav_u:2805: 068.029 dākṣyadākṣiṇyacāturyamādhuryopetamupasthānakarmaṇi satputra iva pitaraṃ bhaktyā gauraveṇa śuśrūṣate/
S01divyav_u:2806: 068.030 tato maghasya sārthavāhasya kṣemaṇīyataraṃ cābhūdyāpanīyataraṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:2808_0: atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ pratilabdhasaṃjñnaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat
S01divyav_u:2808_1: -- kuto bhavāñ jñnānavijñnānasampanno 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paṇḍito vyakto
S01divyav_u:2812: evamūktaḥ supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha/
S01divyav_u:2814: 069.004 atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghāya sārthavāhāya jātikulagotrāgamanaprayojanaṃ vistareṇārocayati sma,
S01divyav_u:2815: paraṃ cainaṃ vijñnāpayati -- sārvāhānubhāvādahaṃ badaradvīpamahāpattanaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:2817_0: 069.007 atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasyāśrutapūrvāṃ parahitārthamabhyudyatāṃ
S01divyav_u:2817_1: dṛḍhapratijñnāṃ śrutvā paramavismayajāto 'nimiṣadṛṣṭiḥ suciraṃ nirīkṣya supriyaṃ
S01divyav_u:2819: yo nāma bhavāñ jambudvīpādamanuṣyāvacaritaṃ parvatasamudranadyottaraṇaṃ kṛtvā ihāgataḥ,
S01divyav_u:2821: 069.011 devaṃ tadbhavantaṃ paśyāmi devānyatamaṃ vā manuṣyaveṣadhāriṇam/
S01divyav_u:2823: api tu ahaṃ mahāvyādhinā grasto mumūrṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:2825: 069.013 api tu ko bhavato 'rthe parahitārthe 'bhyudyatasyātmaparityāgamapi na kuryāt?
S01divyav_u:2826: tena hi vatsa kṣipraṃ maṅgalapotaṃ samudānaya, saṃvaraṃ cāropaya, yadāvayoryātrāyanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:2827: 069.014 evaṃ sārthavāheti supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghāya mahāsārthavāhāya pratiśrutya maṅgalapotaṃ samudānīya saṃvaraṃ cāropya yena magho mahāsārthavāhastenaopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2828: 069.016 upasaṃkramya maghaṃ sārthavāhamidamavocat -- deva samudānīto maṅgalapotaḥ,
S01divyav_u:2831_1: sabhṛtyavargeṇa ca rohitakarājñnā ca nivāryamāṇo 'pi guṇavati phalake baddhvā āśu
S01divyav_u:2832: 069.020 atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasya kathayati -- ahaṃ bāḍhaglāno na śakyāmi sthiyo gantum/
S01divyav_u:2834: 069.022 api tu asmin mahāsamudre yāvadevaṃvidhāni nimittāni bhavanti udakasya varṇasaṃsthānāni ca mama nivedayitavyāni/
S01divyav_u:2835: 069.023 yathā anekāni yojanaśatāni gatvā adrākṣīt supriyo mahāsārthavāha ekapāṇḍaraṃ pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:2836: 069.024 dṛṣṭvā punarmaghāya sārthavahāyārocayati -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:2838: 069.025 evamukte maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- naitanmahāsārthavāha ekapāṇḍaraṃ pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:2839: 069.026 api tu paśyasi tvaṃ dakṣiṇakena mahatsudhāparvatam yadidaṃ tasyaitadanubhāvena pānīyaṃ ranñjitam/
S01divyav_u:2844: punarapi gacchan paśyati supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ śastravarṇaṃ pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:2845: 069.030 dṛṣṭvā ca punarmaghāya sārthavāhāyārocayati -- yat khalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- śastravarṇaṃ pānīyaṃ dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:2853: 070.003 evaṃ lohaparvatāstāmraparvatā rūpyaparvatāḥ suvarṇaparvatāḥ sphaṭikaparvatā vaidūryaparvatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2856: 070.005 dṛṣṭvā ca punarmaghāya sārthavāhāyārocayati -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- nīlapītalohitāvadātaṃ pānīyaṃ dṛśyate,
S01divyav_u:2858: 070.007 evemukte magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- naitanmahāsārthavāha nīlapītalohitāvadātaṃ pānīyam,
S01divyav_u:2862: ye 'pyete dīpā iva dīpyante, ete 'ntargatā auṣadhyo dīpyante/
S01divyav_u:2867: 070.012 api tu mahāsārthavāha iyantyevāhaṃ badaradvīpamahāpattanasya daśa nimittāni jāne gamanaṃ prati,
S01divyav_u:2869: 070.013 evamukte supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- kadā badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyānto bhaviṣyati?
S01divyav_u:2870: evamukte maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- mayāpi supriya badaradvīpamahāpattanaṃ kārtsyena na dṛṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:2871: 070.015 api tu mayā śrutaṃ paurāṇānāṃ mahāsārthavāhānāmantikājjīrṇānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ mahallakānām -- ito jalamapahāya paścimāṃ diśaṃ sthalena gamyate/
S01divyav_u:2873: tataḥ supriyāya mahāsārthavāhāya kathayati -- maraṇāntikā me vedanāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2874: 070.018 etattvaṃ maṅgalapotaṃ tīramupanīya vetrapāśaṃ baddhvā maccharīre śarīrapūjāṃ kuruṣva/
S01divyav_u:2875: 070.019 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastaṃ maṅgalapotaṃ tīramupanīya vetrapāśaṃ badhnāti/
S01divyav_u:2877: 070.021 atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghaṃ sārthavāhaṃ kālagataṃ viditvā sthale utthāpya śarīre śarīrapūjaṃ kṛtvā cintayati -- maṅgalapotamāruhya yāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:2878: 070.022 sa ca poto vāyunā vetrapāśaṃ chittvā apahṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2879: 070.023 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaścatūratnamayasya parvatasya dakṣiṇena pārśvenāṭavyāṃ sthalena saṃprasthito mūlaphalāni bhakṣayamāṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2882: tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho madhunā pādau pralipyābhirūḍhaśca,
S01divyav_u:2885: 070.027 sa tatra paśyati mahāntaṃ parvatamuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:2886: niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣamāṇo na labhate, na cāsya kaścinniḥsaraṇavyapadeṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:2888: tatra ca parvate nīlādo nāma yakṣaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:2889: 070.029 sa saṃlakṣayati -- ayaṃ bodhisattvo lokahitārthamudyataḥ parikliśyate,
S01divyav_u:2891: 070.030 idamanucintya supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat -- ito mahāsārthavāha pūrveṇa yojanaṃ gatvā trīṇi parvataśṛṅgāṇyanupūrvaniṃnānyanupūrvapravaṇānyanupūrvaprāgbhārāṇi/
S01divyav_u:2893: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ suptaprabuddho vetraśiṭām [71]baddhvā tāni parvataśṛṅgāṇyatikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2894: 071.001 bhūyaḥ saṃprasthito 'drākṣīt supriyo mahāsāthavāhaḥ sphaṭikaparvataṃ ślakṣṇaṃ nirālambamagamyaṃ manuṣyamātrasya/
S01divyav_u:2895: 071.002 na cāsyopāyaṃ paśyati taṃ parvatamabhirohaṇāyeti viditvā cintāparo 'horātramavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2896: 071.003 tasmiṃśca parvate candraprabho nāma yakṣaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:2897: 071.004 sa cintāparaṃ sārthavāhaṃ viditvā lokahitārthamabhyudyataṃ mahāyānasamprasthitaṃ prasannacittaṃ copetyāśvāsayati -- na khalu mahāsārthavahena viṣādaḥ karaṇīya iti/
S01divyav_u:2902: tayā gṛhītayā nāsya kāye śastraṃ kramiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:2904: balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saṃjanayati, ālokaṃ ca karoti/
S01divyav_u:2908: tatra te na śocitavyaṃ na kranditavyaṃ na paridevitavyam/
S01divyav_u:2909: 071.011 atha candraprabho yakṣaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ samanuśāsya tatraivāntarhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2910: 071.012 atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaścandraprabheṇa mahāyakṣeṇa samāśvāsya ādeśitamārgo yathoktena vidhinā sphaṭikaparvatamatikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2912: 071.014 bhūyaḥ saṃprasthito 'drākṣīt supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sauvarṇaṃ mahānagaramārāmasampannaṃ puṣkariṇīsampannam/
S01divyav_u:2915: 071.016 dṛṣṭvā ca punarudyānaṃ gatvā cintayati -- yadyapyahaṃ nagaramadrākṣam, tadapi śūnyam/
S01divyav_u:2916: 071.017 kadā badaradvīpasya mahāpattanasyāgamanāyādhvā bhaviṣyatīti viditvā śayitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2917: atha sā pūrvadevatā supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ durmanasaṃ viditvā rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaya uṣasaṃkramya samāśvāsya utkarṣayati -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha,
S01divyav_u:2921: indriyāṇi ca gopayitavyāni cakṣurādīni, kāyagatā smṛtirbhāvayitavyā/
S01divyav_u:2923_0: tataścatasraḥ kinnarakanyā nirgamiṣyanti abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prasādikāścāturyamādhuryasampannāḥ
S01divyav_u:2924: 071.025 tāstvāmatyarthamupalālayanti, evaṃ ca vakṣyanti -- etu mahāsārthavāhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2927: apatikānāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'trāṇānāṃ trāṇo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇamaparāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2928: 071.027 imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni,
S01divyav_u:2932: 071.030 tvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasva/
S01divyav_u:2933: 071.031 tatra te tāsu mātṛsaṃjñnā upasthāpayitavyā, bhaginīsaṃjñnā duhitṛsaṃjñnā upasthāpayitavyā/
S01divyav_u:2934: 071.032 daśākuśalāḥ karmapathā vigarhitavyāḥ, daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ saṃvarṇayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2939: tatastvayā nipuṇaṃ praṣṭavyāh -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko 'nubhāva iti/
S01divyav_u:2943: yāvaccaturthakinnaranagaraprāptasya te dvātriṃśat kinnarakanyā nirgamiṣyanti tāsāṃ pūrvikānāmantikādabhirūpatarāśca darśanīyatarāśca prāsādikatarāścāpsarasah -- pratispardhinyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2947: 072.009 atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ pramuditamanāḥ sukhapratibuddhaḥ kālyamevo 'tthāya sauvarṇaṃ kinnaranagaramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2949_0: tataḥ supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre catasraḥ kinnarakanyā nirgatā abhirūpā
S01divyav_u:2953: apatīnāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇo 'trāṇānāṃ trāṇo 'parāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2954: 072.015 imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni vanaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni ca/
S01divyav_u:2956: tadyathāmaṇayo muktā vaidūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajatajātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāh etāni ca/
S01divyav_u:2957: 072.018 tvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasva/
S01divyav_u:2958: atha supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ sūpasthitasmṛtiṃ tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ sarvāṅgairanuparigṛhya sauvarṇaṃ kinnaranagaraṃ praveśya prāsādamabhiropya prajñnapta evāsane niṣādayanti/
S01divyav_u:2959: 072.020 niṣaṇṇaḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho daśākuśalān karmapathān vigarhati,
S01divyav_u:2962: 072.022 tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- āścaryam yatredānīṃ daharaśca bhavān dharmakāmaśca/
S01divyav_u:2963: 072.023 na ca kāmeṣu sajjase vā badhyase vā/
S01divyav_u:2966: 072.024 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastasya ratnasya prabhāvānveṣī kathayati -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko 'nubhāva iti/
S01divyav_u:2967_0: 072.025 tāḥ kathayanti -- yatkhalu sārthavāha jānīyāh -- tadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ
S01divyav_u:2967_1: śiraḥsnāta upoṣadhoṣita idaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya yojanasahasraṃ sāmantakena
S01divyav_u:2967_2: yo yenārthī bhavati hiraṇyena vā suvarṇena vā annena vā vastreṇa vā pānena vā alaṃkāraviśeṣeṇa
S01divyav_u:2967_3: vā dvipādena vā catuṣpādena vā yānena vā vāhanena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā,
S01divyav_u:2972_0: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya
S01divyav_u:2972_1: samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya sauvarṇāt kinnaranagarāt pratiniṣkrāntaḥ /
S01divyav_u:2973: 072.032 adrākṣīt supriyo [73]mahāsārthavāho rūpyamayaṃ kinnaranagaramārāmasampannaṃ vanasampannaṃ puṣkariṇīsampannam/
S01divyav_u:2974: 073.001 tatrāpi supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre'ṣṭau kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2979_0: 073.004 tatrāpi supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kthayā saṃdarśya
S01divyav_u:2979_1: samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya rūpyamayāt kinnaranagarāt
S01divyav_u:2980: 073.007 tatrāpi supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre ṣoḍaśa kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:2982: 073.008 tā api dharmadeśanāvarjitāstata eva viśiṣṭataraṃ saubhāsinikaṃ trisāhasrayojanikaṃ ratnamanuprayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:2983: 073.009 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastasya ratnasya prabhāvānveṣī kathayati -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko'nubhāva iti?
S01divyav_u:2985_0: 073.011 supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya
S01divyav_u:2985_1: samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya tṛtīyāt kinnaranagarāt pratiniṣkrāntaḥ /
S01divyav_u:2988: tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trirākoṭite dvāre dvātriṃśat kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:2993: apatīnāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇo 'trāṇānāṃ traṇo 'parāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2994: 073.020 imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni vanaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni/
S01divyav_u:2996: tadyathā -- maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2999: tatrāpi supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sūpasthitasmṛtistāḥ kinnarakanyā vividhairdharmapadavyanñjanaiḥ paritoṣayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:3000: 073.025 tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ sarvāṅgairanuparigṛhya catūratnamayaṃ kinnaranagaramanupraveśya prāsādamabhiropya prajñnapta evāsane niṣādayanti/
S01divyav_u:3001: 073.026 niṣaṇṇaḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho daśākuśalān karmapathān vigarhati,
S01divyav_u:3004: 073.028 tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- āścaryam yatredānīṃ daharaśca bhavān dharmakāmaśca/
S01divyav_u:3005: 073.029 na ca kāmeṣu sajjase vā badhyase vā/
S01divyav_u:3007: 073.030 tā api dharmadeśanāvarjitāḥ saubhāsinikaṃ jāmbudvīpapradhānamanarghyeyamūlyamanantaguṇaprabhāvaṃ badaradvīpamāpattane sarvasvabhūtaṃ ratnamanuprayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:3008: 073.031 evaṃ ca kathayanti -- idamasmākaṃ mahāsārthavāha maṇiratnaṃ badareṇa bhrātrā kinnararājñnā anupradattam,
S01divyav_u:3010: 074.001 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- asya ratnasya ko 'nubhāva iti?
S01divyav_u:3011_0: tāḥ kathayanti -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- idaṃ maṇiratnaṃ tadeva poṣadhoṣito
S01divyav_u:3011_1: dhvajāgre baddhvā āropya kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ karaṇīyam -- śṛṇvantu
S01divyav_u:3012_0: yuṣmākam yo yenarthī upakaraṇaviśeṣeṇa hiraṇyena vā subarṇena vā ratnena vā annena
S01divyav_u:3012_1: vā pānena vā vastreṇa vā bhojanena vā alaṃkāraviśeṣeṇa vā dvipadena vā catuṣpadena
S01divyav_u:3012_2: vā vāhanena vā yānena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā sa cittamutpādayatu,
S01divyav_u:3015: 074.008 ayaṃ tu prativiśeṣah -- yāni cāsya lokasya bhavanti mahābhayāni,
S01divyav_u:3016: tadyathā -- rājato vā cairato vā agnito vā udako vā manuṣyato vā amiṣyato vā siṃhato vā vyāghrato vā dvīpatarakṣuto vā yakṣyarākṣasapretapiśācakumbhāṇḍapūtanakaṭapūtanato vā,
S01divyav_u:3020: asminnucchrite ratnaviśeṣe ima īrayopadravā na bhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:3021: 074.012 iryuktvā tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ saṃrādhayāmāsuh --- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha,
S01divyav_u:3028: api tu yena tvaṃ pathenāgataḥ, amanuṣyāstāvat, pralayaṃ gaccheyuḥ prāgeva manuṣyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3029: 074.016 anyadeva vayaṃ sanmārgaṃ vyapadekṣyāmaḥ kṣipraṃ vārāṇasīgamanāya/
S01divyav_u:3030: 074.017 tacchṛṇu, manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣyāmah -- itaḥ paścime digbhāge sapta pratānatikramya mahāparvata uccaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3031: 074.018 tasmin parvate lohitākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3032: 074.019 sa ca parvato 'manuṣyavacaritaḥ kṛṣṇamandhakāraṃ savisphuliṅgaṃ vāyuṃ mokṣayati/
S01divyav_u:3033: 074.020 tatra te etadeva ratnaṃ dhvajāgre 'varopayitvā gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:3037: 074.022 sa tava gandhamāghrāya sapta rātriṃdivasānyaśaniṃ pātayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3041: tatra drakṣyasi samaṃ bhūmipradeśamakṛṣṭoptaṃ ca taṇḍulaphalaśālimakaṇakamatuṣaṃ śuciṃ niṣphuṭigandhikaṃ caturaṅgulaparyavanaddham/
S01divyav_u:3042: 074.025 yastamaṣṭamyāṃ panñcadaśyāṃ vā bālāho'śvarājaḥ paribhujya sukhī arogo balavān prīṇitendriyaḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayyodānamudānayati -- kaḥ pāragāmī,
S01divyav_u:3046: sa tvayopasaṃkramya idaṃ syādvacanīyam -- ahaṃ pāragāmī,
S01divyav_u:3049_0: 074.028 atha sa supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya
S01divyav_u:3049_1: samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛduhitṛvat pratisamodya yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa
S01divyav_u:3055: 075.001 [74]upasaṃkramya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bālāho 'śvarājastenānñjaliṃ praṇamya bālāhamaśvarājamidavocat -- ahaṃ pāragāmī,
S01divyav_u:3058: evamukte bālāho 'śvarājaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat -- na te mahāsārthavāha mama pṛṣṭhādhirūḍhena diśo nāvalokayitavyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:3061: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho bālāhasyāśvarājasya pṛṣṭhamadhiruhya yathānuśiṣṭo 'lpaiśca kṣaṇalavamuhūrtairvārāṇasīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3063: 075.007 avatīrya supriyo mahāsārthavāho bālāhāśvarājapṛṣṭhādbālāhāśvarājaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:3064: 075.008 tato bālāho 'śvarājaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ saṃrādhayāmāsa -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha/
S01divyav_u:3073: athāciraprakrānte bālāhe 'śvarājani supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ svagṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3074: 075.013 aśrauṣurvārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurā brahmadattaśca kāśirājah -- supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ pūrṇena varṣaśatena saṃsiddhayātraḥ pūrṇamanorathaḥ svagṛhamanuprāpta iti/
S01divyav_u:3077: 075.016 aśrauṣīt tat pūrvakaṃ caurasahasramanyaśca jano dhanārthī -- supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃsiddhayātraḥ paripūrṇamanoratha āgata iti/
S01divyav_u:3078: 075.017 srutvā ca punarupasaṃkramya supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocan -- parikṣīṇadhanāḥ sma iti/
S01divyav_u:3079: 075.018 evamukte mahāsārthavāhastān sarvān maitreṇa cakṣuṣā vyavalokya vijñnāpayati -- gacchatu bhavantaḥ svakasvakeṣu vijiteṣu/
S01divyav_u:3080: 075.019 yo yenārthī upakaraṇaviśeṣeṇa bhavati, sa tasyārthe cittamutpādayatu, vācaṃ ca niścārayatu/
S01divyav_u:3082: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhastadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnāta upoṣadhoṣito yattatprathamalabdhaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya vācaṃ ca niścārayati,
S01divyav_u:3084: sahābhidhānacca yo yenārthī tasya tadvarṣaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:3086: 075.024 taccaurasahasraṃ supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:3087: 075.025 atrāntarāt kālagate brahmadatte kāśirājani paurāmātyaiḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho rājābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3088_0: 075.026 mahābhiṣiktena supriyeṇa mahārājñnā dvitīyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya
S01divyav_u:3089: 075.028 tṛtīyena maṇiratnena yathoktena vidhinā dhvajāgrocchritena yathepsitopakaraṇaviśeṣavarṣaṇāni saṃpannāni/
S01divyav_u:3091_0: 075.030 tato 'nupūrveṇa jambudvīpaiśvaryabhūtena supriyeṇa mahārājñnā tadeva poṣadhe
S01divyav_u:3091_1: panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātenopoṣadhoṣitena kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā upakaraṇotpannābhilāṣiṇāṃ
S01divyav_u:3092: 076.001 samanantaraṃ dhvajāgrāvaropite tasmiñ jambudvīpapradhānamaṇiratne kṛtsno jambudvīpanivāsī mahājanakāyo yathepsitairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ saṃtarpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3093: 076.003 upakaraṇasaṃtarpitaśca jambudvīpanivāsī janakāyaḥ supriyeṇa rājñnā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3094_0: 076.004 tato jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājyaiśvaryādhipatye partiṣṭhāpya rājarṣibrahmacaryaṃ
S01divyav_u:3094_1: caritvā caturo brahmān vihārān bhāvayitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihārī
S01divyav_u:3095: 076.007 bhagavanāha -- kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau supriyo nāma mahāsārthavāhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3096: ahameva tena kālena tena samayena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartitavān/
S01divyav_u:3098: 076.009 yā sā pūrvadevatā, kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddho bodhisattvabhūtaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:3099: 076.010 yaścāsau magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ, eṣa eva śāriputro bhukṣuḥ sa tena kā
S01divyav_u:3101: 076.011 yaścāsau nīlādo nāma mahāyakṣaḥ, eṣa evānando bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:3102: 076.012 yaścāsau candraprabho yakṣaḥ, eṣa evāniruddho bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:3103: yaścāsau lohitākṣo nāma mahāyakṣaḥ, sa eṣa eva devadattastena kalena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:3104: 076.013 yaścāsau agnimukho nāma nāgaḥ, eṣa eva māraḥ pāpīyān sa tena kalena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:3105: 076.014 yaścāsau bālāho 'śvarājaḥ, maitreyo boddhisattvastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:3106: 076.015 tadā tāvanmayā bhikṣavo dṛḍhapratijñnena pratijñnāpūraṇārthaṃ saptavārāṃścaurasahasrāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3108_1: caurasahasrapramukhaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jambudvīpaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
S01divyav_u:3109: 076.019 idānīmapi mayā anekairduṣkaraśatasahasrairanuttaraṃ jñnānamadhigamya maitrāyatā karuṇayā saptakṛtvaścaurasahasrasakāśāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3110: 076.020 aparituṣṭaṃ ca caurasahasraṃ viditvā yāvadāptaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā atyantaniṣṭhe 'nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3118: tena khalu samayena bhadraṃkare nagare ṣaḍ janā mahāpuṇyāḥ prativasanti--meṇḍhako gṛhapatir meṇḍhakapatnī meṇḍhakaputro meṇḍhakasnuṣā meṇḍhakadāso meṇḍhakadāsī/
S01divyav_u:3120: sa yadi riktakāni kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi paśyati, sahadarśanādeva pūryante/
S01divyav_u:3122: kathaṃ meṇḍhakapatnī? sā ekasyārthāya sthālikāṃ sādhayati, śatāni sahasrāṇi ca bhuñjate/
S01divyav_u:3124: kathaṃ meṇḍhakaputrah? tasya pañcaśatiko nakulako kaṭyāṃ baddhastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:3125: 077.007 sa yadi śataṃ sahasraṃ vā parityajati, tadā pūrṇa eva tiṣṭhati, na parikṣīyate/
S01divyav_u:3127: kathaṃ meṇḍhakasnuṣā? sā ekasyārthāya gandhaṃ saṃpādayati, śatasahasrasya paryāptirbhavati/
S01divyav_u:3129: 077.010 kathaṃ meṇḍhakadāsah? sa yadaikaṃ halasīraṃ kṛṣati, tadā sapta sīrāḥ kṛṣṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:3131: kathaṃ meṇḍhakadāsī mahāpuṇyā? sā yadaikaṃ vastu rakṣati, tatsaptaguṇaṃ syāt/
S01divyav_u:3132: 077.011 yadā ekamātraṃ pratijāgarti, tadā sapta mātrāḥ saṃpadyante/
S01divyav_u:3134_0: 077.013 dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ
S01divyav_u:3134_4: trī rātrestrirdivasasya ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ
S01divyav_u:3157: 077.031 bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ meṇḍhako gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro bhadraṃkare nagare prativasati/
S01divyav_u:3161: bhikṣūṇāmārocaya--tathāgato bhikṣavo bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3162: 078.002 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cartum,
S01divyav_u:3164: 078.003 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--tathāgata āyuṣmanto bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3165: 078.005 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritum,
S01divyav_u:3167: 078.006 evamāyuṣmanniti te bhiṣava āyuṣmata ānandasya pratiśrutya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti//
S01divyav_u:3168_0: 078.008 atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra
S01divyav_u:3168_1: āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
S01divyav_u:3184: virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3193: 078.019 evamanekaguṇagaṇasamanvāgato buddho bhagavāñ janapadacārikayā bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3200: śrutvā ca punarvyathitāste parasparaṃ kathayanti--pūrvaṃ tāvadvayaṃ śramaṇena gautamena madhyadeśānnirvāsitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3205: kasyārthāya? dṛṣṭā asmābhiryuṣmākaṃ saṃpattiḥ, yāvadvipattiṃ na paśyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3207: 078.028 bhavantaḥ, śramaṇo gautamaḥ kṣurāśaniṃ pātayannanekā aputrikā apatikāśca kurvannāgacchati/
S01divyav_u:3208: 078.029 āryāḥ, yadyevam, yasminneva kāle sthātavyaṃ tasminneva kāle 'smākaṃ parityāgas triyate/
S01divyav_u:3210: te kathayanti--kiṃ vayaṃ na tiṣṭhāmah? na yūyamasmākaṃ śroṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:3212: 078.031 te kathayanti--bhadraṃkarasāmantakena sarvajanakāyamudvāsya bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ pravāsayata/
S01divyav_u:3219: tatastairbhadraṃkaranagarasāmantakena sarvo janakāya udvāsya bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ pravāsitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3224: 079.003 tataḥ śakro devendraḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpam yadahaṃ bhagavato 'satkāramadhyupekṣeyam/
S01divyav_u:3225: 079.004 yena nāma bhagavatā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanekair duṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryānuttarajñānamadhigatam,
S01divyav_u:3226: sa nāma bhagavān sarvalokaprativiśiṣṭaḥ sarvavādavijayī śūnye janapade cārikaṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3231: cāturmahārājikā devā uktāh--yūyaṃ bhadraṃkarāṇāṃ janapadānāṃ vāsayateti/
S01divyav_u:3236: 079.013 tīrthyair nagarajanakāyasametairavacarakāḥ preṣitāh--gatvā paśyata kīdṛśā janapadā iti/
S01divyav_u:3237: 079.014 te gatāḥ paśyantyatiśayena janapadān ṛddhān sphītān/
S01divyav_u:3238: tata āgatya kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, na kadācidasmābhirevamrūpā janapadā ṛddhāḥ sphītā dṛṣṭapūrvā iti/
S01divyav_u:3243: sarvathā avalokitā bhavantaḥ, apaścimaṃ vo darśanam, gacchāma iti/
S01divyav_u:3244: 079.017 te kathayanti--āryāḥ, tiṣṭhata, kim yuṣmākaṃ śramaṇo gautamaḥ karoti?
S01divyav_u:3247: tīrthyāḥ kathayanti--samayena tiṣṭhāmo yadi yūyaṃ kriyākāraṃ kuruta--na kenacicchramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:3248: 079.020 ya upasaṃkrāmati, sa ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇo daṇḍya iti/
S01divyav_u:3252: 079.023 ten khalu samayena kapilavastuno brāhmaṇadārikā bhadraṃkare nagare pariṇītā/
S01divyav_u:3254: sā saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ bhagavāñ śākyakulanandanaḥ śākyakulādrājyamapahāya pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3257: 079.026 tato bhagavatā tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya sopānaṃ nirmitam/
S01divyav_u:3258: 079.027 tato hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditā pradīpamādāya sopānenāvatīrya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:3259: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ purastāt pradīpaṃ sthāpayitvā pādau śirasā vanditvā niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:3260: 079.028 tato bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī catruāryasatyasamprativedhikī pūrvavadyāvaccharaṇagatāmabhiprasannāmiti/
S01divyav_u:3261: 079.030 atha bhagavāṃstāṃ dārikāmidamavocat--ehi tvaṃ dārike yena meṇḍhako gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrama,
S01divyav_u:3268: vaktavyah--tava putrasya pañcaśatiko nakulakaḥ kaṭyāṃ baddhastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:3269: 080.002 sa yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti, pūryata eva, na parikṣīyate/
S01divyav_u:3271: evaṃ bhadanteti sā dārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:3272: 080.004 yathāparijñātaiva kenacideva meṇḍakasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatā/
S01divyav_u:3275: 080.006 gṛhapate, bhagavānevamāha--tvāmevāhamuddiśyāgataḥ, tvaṃ ca dvāraṃ baddhvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3276: 080.007 yuktametadevamatitheḥ pratipattum yathā tvaṃ pratipanna iti?
S01divyav_u:3278: gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacicchramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:3279: 080.008 ya upasaṃkrāmati, sa gaṇena ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇo daṇḍya iti/
S01divyav_u:3280: 080.009 gṛhapate, bhagavān kathayati--tava putrasya pañcaśatiko nakulakaḥ kaṭyāṃ baddhastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:3281: 080.010 sa yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti, pūryata eva, na parikṣīyate/
S01divyav_u:3282: 080.011 na śaknoṣi tvaṃ ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇaṃ datvā āgantumiti? sa saṃlakṣayati--na kaścidetajjānīte/
S01divyav_u:3285: sa ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇān dvāre sthāpayitvā brāhmaṇadārikopadiṣṭena sopānenāvatīrya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3286: 080.013 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:3287: 080.014 tato bhagavatā meṇḍhakasya gṛhapaterāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:3288: yāṃ śrutvā meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā yāvacchrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:3290: kimeṣo 'pi bhadraṃkaranagaranivāsī janakāya evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhīte?
S01divyav_u:3291: bhagavānāha--gṛhapate, tvāmāgamya bhūyasā sarva eva janakāyo lābhīte/
S01divyav_u:3292: 080.018 tato meṇḍhako gṛhapatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3293: 080.019 svagṛhaṃ gatvā nagaramadhye kārṣāpaṇānāṃ rāśiṃ vyavasthāpya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:3294: 080.021 yo draṣṭumicchati jinaṃ jitarāgadoṣaṃ nirbandhamapratisamaṃ karuṇāvadātam/
S01divyav_u:3295: 080.023 so 'niścareṇa hṛdayena suniścitena kṣipraṃ prayātu dhanamasya mayā pradeyam//3// iti//
S01divyav_u:3296: 080.025 janakāyaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, śreyaḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya darśanam? sa kathayati--śreyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3297: 080.026 te kathayanti--yadyevam, gaṇenaivaṃ kriyākāraḥ kṛto gaṇa eva udghāṭayatu/
S01divyav_u:3299: 080.027 tataḥ parasparaṃ saṃghaṭṭanena na śaknuvanti nirgantumiti vajrapāṇinā yakṣeṇa vineyajanānukampayā vajraḥ kṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3304: 080.030 te gatvā bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purato niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3306: atha baghavāṃstāṃ parṣadamabhyavagāhya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣadyānekasattvasaṃtānakuśalamūlasamāropikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
S01divyav_u:3312: sa kathayati--bhagavan, kimakāle kalpate? bhagavānāha--dhṛtaguḍaśarkarāpānakāni ceti/
S01divyav_u:3313: 081.004 tato meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā śilpina āhūya uktāh--bhagavato 'kālakhādyakāni śīghraṃ sajjīkuruteti/
S01divyav_u:3315: tato meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'kālakhādyakairakālapānakaiśca saṃtarpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3316: 081.007 tato bhagavān meṇḍhakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ saparivāraṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ karvaṭanivāsinaṃ janakāyam yathābhavyatayā vinīya prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:3322_0: 082.002 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ
S01divyav_u:3322_1: bhadanta meṇḍhakena meṇḍhakapatnyā meṇḍhakaputreṇa meṇḍhakasnuṣayā meṇḍhakadāsena
S01divyav_u:3322_2: meṇḍhakadāsyā karma kṛtam yena ṣaḍabhijñātā mahāpuṇyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S01divyav_u:3325: bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:3328: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:3332: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:3334: 082.011 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//1//
S01divyav_u:3335_0: 082.012 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā
S01divyav_u:3335_1: rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ
S01divyav_u:3337: 082.015 tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ naimittikairdvādaśavarṣikā anāvṛṣṭirvyākṛtā/
S01divyav_u:3338: 082.016 trividhaṃ durbhikṣaṃ bhaviṣyati--cañcu śvetāsthi śalākāvṛtti ca/
S01divyav_u:3339: tatra cañcu ucyate--samudgake tasmin manuṣyā bījāni prakṣipya anāgate sattvāpekṣayā sathāpayanti/
S01divyav_u:3340: 082.017 mṛtā nāma anena te bījakāyaṃ kariṣyantīti/
S01divyav_u:3342: śvetāsthi nāma durbhikṣam--tasmin kāle manuṣyā asthīnyupasaṃhṛtya tāvat kvāthayanti,
S01divyav_u:3346: śalākāvṛttir nāma--tasmin kāle manuṣyāḥ khalu bilebhyo dhānyaguḍakāni śalākayā ākṛṣya bahudakasthālyāṃ kvāthayitvā pibanti/
S01divyav_u:3348: 082.022 tato rājñā brahmadattena vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto vārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3349: 082.023 naimittikairdvādaśavarṣikā anāvṛṣṭirvyākṛtā śalākāvṛtti durbhikṣaṃ cañcu śvetāsthi ca/
S01divyav_u:3350: 082.024 yeṣāṃ vo dvādaśavarṣikaṃ bhaktamasti, taiḥ sthātavyam/
S01divyav_u:3353: 082.026 tasminśca samaye vārāṇasyāmanyatamo gṛhapatirāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaparivāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:3355: bhaviṣyati me saparivārāṇāṃ me saparivārāṇāṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti?
S01divyav_u:3362: 082.030 tatastena gṛhapatinā kośakoṣṭhāgarāṇi śodhayitvā dhānyaprastha upasaṃhṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3364: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:3366: 083.001 sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vārāṇasīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3368: sa ca pratyekabuddho 'nupūrveṇa piṇḍapātamaṭaṃs tasya gṛhapatir niveśanamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3370: 083.004 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--etadapyahaṃ parityajya niyataṃ prāṇairviyokṣye/
S01divyav_u:3372: tena bhāryā abhihitā--bhadre, yo mama pratyaṃśastamahamasmai pravrajitāyānuprayacchāmīti/
S01divyav_u:3373: 083.006 sa saṃlakṣayati--mama svāmī na paribhuṅkte, kathamahaṃ paribhokṣya iti/
S01divyav_u:3375: evaṃ putreṇa snuṣayā dāsena dāsyā ca vicārya svasvapratyaṃśāḥ parityaktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3376: 083.008 tatastaiḥ sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3377: 083.009 kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā, na vācikī/
S01divyav_u:3378: sa vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarāja upari vihāyasamudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3380: 083.011 te mūlanikṛttā iva drumāḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3381: 083.012 gṛhapatiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3382: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadi riktakāni kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi sahadarśanānme pūrṇāni syuh--evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām,
S01divyav_u:3384: 083.014 patnī praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3392: 083.018 putraḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3394: yadi ca śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā tato vyayaṃ kuryāt,
S01divyav_u:3396: mā parikṣayaṃ gacchet--evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām,
S01divyav_u:3398: 083.022 snuṣā praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3401: taṃ na ca parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuryāvanmayā apratipraśrabdham--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ labhinī syām,
S01divyav_u:3403: 083.025 dāsaḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3405: sapta sīrāḥ kṛṣṭāḥ syuh--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca lābhī syām,
S01divyav_u:3407: 083.028 dāsī praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3409: sapta mātrāḥ saṃpadyeran--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca labhinī syām,
S01divyav_u:3412: 083.031 sa ca mahātmā pratyekabuddhasteṣāmanukampayā ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā rājakulasyopariṣṭāt saṃprasthitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:3414: tasya ṛddhyā gacchato rājño brahmadattasyopari cchāyā nipatitā/
S01divyav_u:3419: tato 'sau gṛhapatiḥ kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi pratyavekṣitumārabdho yāvatpūrṇāni paśyati/
S01divyav_u:3420: 084.005 sa patnīmāmantrayate--mama tāvat praṇidhānaṃ pūrṇam, yuṣmākamapīdānīṃ paśyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:3421: 084.006 tato dāsyā dhānyānāmekāṃ mātrāmārabdhā parikarmayitum, sapta mātrāḥ saṃpannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3423: 084.008 tathaiva putrasya snuṣāyā dāsasya praṇidhiḥ siddhā/
S01divyav_u:3424: 084.009 tato gṛhapatinā ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ vārāṇasyām--yo bhavanto 'nnenārthī, sa āgacchatu iti/
S01divyav_u:3428: amātyaiḥ samākhyātam--deva, amukena gṛhapatinā kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi uddhāṭitānīti/
S01divyav_u:3429: 084.012 rājā tamāhūya kathayati--yadā eva lokaḥ kālagataḥ, tadā tvayā kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyuddhāṭitānīti/
S01divyav_u:3430: 084.013 deva, kasya kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyuddhāṭitāni? api tu adyaiva me bījamuptamadyaiva phaladāyakamiti/
S01divyav_u:3431: 084.014 rājā pṛcchati--yathā katham? sa etat prakaraṇaṃ vistareṇārocayati/
S01divyav_u:3432: 084.015 rājā kathayati--gṛhapate, tvayā asau mahātmā piṇḍakena pratipāditah? deva mayaiva pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3436: 084.019 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau gṛhapatirgṛhapatipatnī gṛhapatiputro gṛhapatisnuṣā gṛhapatidāso gṛhapatidāsī,
S01divyav_u:3437: ayameva meṇḍhako gṛḥpatir meṇḍhakapatnī meṇḍhakaputro meṇḍhakasnuṣā meṇḍhakadāso meṇḍhakadāsī ca/
S01divyav_u:3438: 084.021 yadebhiḥ pratyekabuddhe kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:3439: tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍ mahāpuṇyā jātāḥ,
S01divyav_u:3441: 084.022 ahaṃ caibhiḥ pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3442: 084.023 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3455_0: ekasmin samaye bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ
S01divyav_u:3456_0: 085.006 tena khalu samayena vaiśālikā licchavaya idamevamrūpaṃ kriyākāramakārṣuh--pañcadaśyāṃ
S01divyav_u:3456_1: bhavantaḥ pakṣasya aṣṭamyāaṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca prāṇino hantavyā yatkāraṇameyurmanuṣyā
S01divyav_u:3457: 085.008 tena khalu samayena anyatamo goghātako mahāntaṃ vṛṣabhamādāya nagarānniṣkramati praghātayitum/
S01divyav_u:3458: 085.009 tamenaṃ mahājanakāyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho māṃsārthī kathayati--śīghramenaṃ vṛṣaṃ ghātaya,
S01divyav_u:3460: 085.010 sa kathayati--evaṃ kariṣyāmi, kiṃ tu muhūrtamudīkṣadhvamiti/
S01divyav_u:3461: 085.011 tato vṛṣa īdṛśamanāryaṃ vaco duruktaṃ śrutvā bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignah āhṛṣṭaromakūpa itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto nirīkṣate,
S01divyav_u:3464: 085.014 bhagavāṃśca pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat/
S01divyav_u:3465_0: 085.015 athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ
S01divyav_u:3465_1: vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakamam /
S01divyav_u:3470: atha sa vṛṣo bhagavatyavekṣāvān pratibaddhacittah eṣo me śaraṇamiti sahasaiva tāni dṛḍhāni varatrakāṇi bandhanāni cchittvā pradhāvan yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3471: 085.021 upasaṃkramyobhābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya pādau jihvayā nileḍhumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3472: 085.022 sa cāsya raudrakarmā goghātakaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddha eva śastravyagrahastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3473: tato bhagavāṃstaṃ raudrakarmāṇaṃ goghātakamidamavocat--kuruṣva tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa anena govṛṣabheṇa sārdhaṃ sātmyam/
S01divyav_u:3476: tatkasya hetoh? mayā eṣa bahunā mūlyena krītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3480: atha bhagavāmllaukikacittamutpādayati--aho bata śakro devendrastrīṇi kārṣāpaṇasahasrāṇyādāyāgacchediti/
S01divyav_u:3481: 085.028 sahacittotpādādbhagavataḥ śakro devendraḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasratrayamādāya bhagavataḥ purastādasthāt/
S01divyav_u:3482: 085.029 atha bhagavāñ śakraṃ devendramidamavocat--anuprayaccha kauśika asya goghātakasya triguṇaṃ mūlyam/
S01divyav_u:3484: atha goghātakaḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasrayaṃ vṛṣamūlyaṃ gṛhītvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭaḥ pramudito bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā taṃ govṛṣaṃ bandhanānmuktvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3485: 085.032 śakro devendro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:3486_1: bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho bhagavato mukhaṃ
S01divyav_u:3488: 086.003 dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
S01divyav_u:3492_0: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ
S01divyav_u:3492_1: hahavaṃ huhuvamutpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaparyantān narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu
S01divyav_u:3495: 086.009 teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, āhosvidanyatropapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:3497: 086.010 teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, nāpyanyatropapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:3498: 086.011 api tvayamapūrvadarśanaḥ sattvaḥ, asyānubhāvenāsmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti/
S01divyav_u:3499: 086.012 te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhir gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:3507: 086.022 atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
S01divyav_u:3508: 086.023 tadyadi bhagavānatītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante/
S01divyav_u:3520: 086.031 atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyāmantarhitāḥ//
S01divyav_u:3527: 087.008 tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:3530: 087.014 yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrā staṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//6// iti//
S01divyav_u:3532: nāhetvapratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:3533: 087.017 dṛṣṭaste ānanda ayaṃ govṛṣah? dṛṣṭo bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:3534: eṣa ānanda govṛṣastathāgatasyāntike prasannacittaḥ saptame divase kālaṃ kṛtvā cātrumahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyate/
S01divyav_u:3546: tadanayā saṃtatyā navanavatikalpasahasrāṇi vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3547_0: 087.024 tataḥ kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu divyaṃ sukhamanubhūya paścime bhave paścime nikete
S01divyav_u:3547_1: samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe manuṣyatvaṃ pratilabhya rājā bhaviṣyati
S01divyav_u:3547_2: aśokavarṇo nāma cakravartī caturarṇavāntavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
S01divyav_u:3549: tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:3550: 087.028 pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇā parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:3552_0: 087.031 so 'pareṇa samayena dānāni datvā cakravartirājyamapahāya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya
S01divyav_u:3552_1: kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ...ṣamyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati,
S01divyav_u:3554: 087.033 athāyuṣmānānandaḥ kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ papraccha--kiṃ bhadanta anena govṛṣeṇa karma kṛtam yena tiryagyonāvupapannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3555: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena divyamānuṣasukhamanubhūya [88]pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigamiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:3556: bhagavānāha--anenaiva ānanda govṛṣeṇa karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:3559: na hyānanda karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:3563: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:3565: 088.007 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//7//
S01divyav_u:3566_0: 088.008 bhūtapūrvamānanda atīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksambuddho
S01divyav_u:3566_1: loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
S01divyav_u:3567: 088.010 sa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmupaniśritya viharati, anyatamasmin vanaṣaṇḍe/
S01divyav_u:3569: 088.011 sarve ca vītarāgā vigatadveṣā vigatamohā yāvat pañcamātrāṇi dhūrtakaśatāni tena tenāhiṇḍyamānāni taṃ pradeśamanuprāptāni/
S01divyav_u:3570: 088.013 teṣāmetadabhavat--ete hi pravrajitā mahātmānah īdṛśeṣu sthāneṣvabhiramante/
S01divyav_u:3571: yadyeṣāṃ jīvitopacchedaṃ na kariṣyāmaḥ, na bhūya etasmin pradeśe svasthairvihartavyaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3577: sa kathayati--aghātayitvā etān kutaḥ kṣema iti? taiste jīvitādvyaparopitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3579: 088.019 yadbhūyasā tu narakeṣu tiryagyonau upapannāśca santo nityaṃ śastreṇa praghātitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3580: 088.020 tatra yo 'sau caurasteṣāṃ samādāpakaḥ, sa evāyaṃ govṛṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3581: tasya karmaṇo vipākena iyantaṃ kālaṃ na kadācit sugatau upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3583: tasya karmaṇo vipākena divyaṃ mānuṣaṃ sukhamanubhūya pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3584: 088.023 evaṃ hi ānanda tathāgatānāṃ cittaprasādo 'pyacintyavipākaḥ, kiṃ punaḥ praṇidhānam/
S01divyav_u:3585: 088.024 tasmāttarhi ānanda evaṃ śikṣitavyam yatstokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtamantato 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātramapi tathāgatamākārataḥ samanusmariṣyāmītyevaṃ te ānanda śikṣitavyam//
S01divyav_u:3586: 088.026 athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya bhikṣūṇāṃ purastādgāthā bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:3589: 088.029 āpanno hi paraṃ kṛcchraṃ govṛṣo yena mocitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3590: 088.030 vyākṛtaśca bhave divye pratyekaśca jino hyasau//9// iti//
S01divyav_u:3596_0: 089.002 sa bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ
S01divyav_u:3596_1: pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhairdevair nāgairyakṣairasurairgaruḍaiḥ
S01divyav_u:3596_4: saśrāvakasaṃgho divyānāṃ mānuṣyāṇāṃ ca bhagavānanupalipto viharati padmapatramivāmbhasā //
S01divyav_u:3597: 089.007 tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare ṣaṭ pūrṇādyāḥ śāstāro 'sarvajñāḥ sarvajñamāninaḥ prativasanti sma/
S01divyav_u:3604_0: 089.009 atha ṣaṇṇāṃ pūrṇādīnāṃ tīrthyānāṃ kutūhalaśālāyāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ saṃnipatitānām
S01divyav_u:3604_1: ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ -- yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--yadā śramaṇo
S01divyav_u:3605: tadā vayaṃ satkṛtāścābhūvan gurukṛtāśca mānitāśca pūjitāśca rājñāṃ rājamātrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ naigamānāṃ jānapadānāṃ śreṣṭhināṃ sārthavāhānām/
S01divyav_u:3607: 089.014 yadā tu śramaṇo gautamo loke utpannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3608: tadā śramaṇo gautamaḥ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājñāṃ rājamātrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ janapadānāṃ dhanināṃ śreṣṭhināṃ sārthavāhānām/
S01divyav_u:3610: 089.017 asmākaṃ ca lābhasatkāraḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ samucchinnaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3613: arhati jñāvādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
