S01divyav_u:3614: 089.019 yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautamo 'nuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, vayaṃ dve/
S01divyav_u:3619: vayaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:3621: 089.023 upārdhaṃ mārgaṃ śramaṇo gautama āgacchatu, vayamapyupārdhaṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3622: 089.024 tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:3623: atha mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhavat--asakṛdasakṛnmayā śramaṇasya gautamasya prākrāntam,

S01divyav_u:3666: 090.023 upārdhaṃ mārgaṃ śramaṇo gautama āgacchatu, vayamapyupārdhaṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3667: 090.024 tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:3668: 090.025 evamukte rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastīrthyānidamavocat--yūyamapi śavā bhūtvā bhagavatā sārdhaṃ riddhiṃ prārabhadhve?
S01divyav_u:3669: atha pūraṇādyāḥ ṣaṭ śāstāro 'sarvajñāḥ sarvajñānajñānino 'rdhamārge rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ vijñāpayanti--vayaṃ smo deva riddhimanto jñānavādinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3671: 090.029 arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:3672: 090.030 yāvat tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:3673: 090.031 evamukte rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastāṃstīrthikaparivrājakānidamavocat--yadyevaṃ trirapyetamarthaṃ vijñāpayiṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:3675: 090.032 atha tīrthyānāmetadabhavat--ayaṃ rājā [91]māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya śrāvakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3679: tatra vayaṃ gatvā śramaṇaṃ gautamamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihārye āhvayiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3681: 091.004 atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro 'nyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa kṣipram/
S01divyav_u:3682: 091.005 bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojaya, yatrāhamadhiruhya bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramiṣyāmi paryupāsanāyai/
S01divyav_u:3683: 091.006 evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya pratiśrutya kṣipraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā yena rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3684: 091.007 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāramidamavocat--yuktaṃ devasya bhadraṃ yānaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:3685: 091.008 atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhadraṃ yānamabhiruhya rājagṛhānniryāti bhagavato 'ntikaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya/
S01divyav_u:3686: 091.010 tasya yāvatī yānasya bhūmistāvadyānena gatvā yānādavatīrya padbhyāmevārāmaṃ prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:3687: 091.011 antarā rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhagavantamadrākṣīt/
S01divyav_u:3688: 091.012 tadantarā pañca kakudānyapanīya tadyathā--uṣṇīṣaṃ chatraṃ khaḍgamaṇiṃ vālavyajanaṃ citre copānahau,
S01divyav_u:3690: 091.013 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3691: 091.014 ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ viditvā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:3692: 091.015 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:3693: 091.016 atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhagavantamabhyānandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:3694: 091.019 atha bhagavata etadabhavat--kutra pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇinām?
S01divyav_u:3695: devatā bhagavata ārocayanti--śrutapūrvaṃ bhadanta pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇināmiti/
S01divyav_u:3696: 091.021 bhagavato jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--śrāvastyāṃ pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇināmiti/
S01divyav_u:3699: 091.024 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cartum,
S01divyav_u:3701: 091.025 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--bhagavānāyuṣmantaḥ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3702: 091.026 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritum,
S01divyav_u:3703: sa cīvarāṇi dhāvatu sīvyatu rañjayatu iti/
S01divyav_u:3705_0: 091.028 atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra
S01divyav_u:3705_1: āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
S01divyav_u:3705_2: prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gaja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:3705_3: siṃha iva daṃṣṭṭagaṇaparivṛto rājahaṃsa iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva pakṣigaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:3705_4: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto[92]
S01divyav_u:3705_5: deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva pauragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:3706_0: nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:3706_1: virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛto dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:3706_2: vemacitra ivāsuragaṇaparivṛtaḥ śakra iva tridaśagaṇaparivṛto brahmeva
S01divyav_u:3707_0: brahmakāyikagaṇaparivṛtaḥ stimiva iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva
S01divyav_u:3707_2: bhikṣusaṃghena ca puraskṛto yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ /
S01divyav_u:3708: 092.007 anekaiśca devatāśatasahasrairanugamyamāno 'nupūrveṇa cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme//
S01divyav_u:3709: 092.010 aśrauṣustīrthyāḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ śrāvastīṃ gata iti/
S01divyav_u:3711: 092.011 te śrāvastīṃ gatvā rājānaṃ prasenajitkauśalamidamavocan--yatkhalu deva jānīthāh--vayam ṛddhimanto jñānavādinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3713: 092.013 arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:3714: yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, vayaṃ dve/
S01divyav_u:3719: vayaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:3720: vayaṃ taddviguṇaṃ tattriguṇamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3721: 092.017 upārdhaṃ mārgaṃ śramaṇo gautama āgacchatu, vayamapyupārdhaṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3722: 092.018 tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:3723: 092.019 evamukte rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--āgamayantu tāvadbhavanto yāvadahaṃ bhagavantamavalokayāmi/
S01divyav_u:3724: 092.020 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa/
S01divyav_u:3727: evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya kṣipraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā yena rājā prasenajit kauśalastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3728: 092.024 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--yuktaṃ devasya bhadraṃ yānaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:3729: 092.025 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhadraṃ yānamabhiruhya śrāvastyā niryāti bhagavato 'ntikaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya/
S01divyav_u:3730: 092.027 tasya yāvatī yānasya bhūmistāvadyānena gatvā yānādavatārya pādābhyāmeva ārāmaṃ praviśya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3731: 092.028 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3732: 092.029 ekānte niṣaṇṇo rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--ime bhadanta tīrthyā bhagavantamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryeṇāhvayante/
S01divyav_u:3733: 092.030 vidarśayatu bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:3737_0: 092.032 evamukte bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--nāhaṃ mahārāja
S01divyav_u:3737_1: [93]evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi evam yūyaṃ bhikṣava āgatāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmuttare
S01divyav_u:3738: 093.002 api tu ahamevaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi--praticchannakalyāṇā bhikṣavo viharata vivṛtapāpā iti/
S01divyav_u:3739: 093.003 dvirapi trirapi rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--vidarśayatu bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:3743: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānām yāpayatām yaduta daśāvaśyakariṇīyāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:3744: 093.007 na tāvadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvānti yāvanna buddho buddhaṃ vyākaroti,
S01divyav_u:3745: yāvanna dvitīyena sattvenāparivartyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpāditaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:3751: anavatapte mahāsarasi śrāvakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pūrvikā karmaplotirvyākṛtā bhavati,
S01divyav_u:3754: 093.012 atha bhagavata etadabhavat--avaśyakaraṇīyametattathāgateneti viditvā rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja/
S01divyav_u:3755: 093.013 itaḥ saptame divase tathāgato mahājanapratyakṣamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:3756: 093.014 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--yadi bhagavānanujānīyāt,
S01divyav_u:3758: 093.016 atha bhagavata etadabhavat--katarasmin pradeśe pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇināmiti?
S01divyav_u:3759: devatā bhagavata ārocayanti--antarā bhadanta śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarāt pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhermahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:3760: 093.019 bhagavato 'pi jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarāt pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:3761: 093.020 adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:3762: 093.021 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavantamidamavocat--katamasmin bhadanta pradeśe prātihāryamaṇḍapaṃ kārayāmi?
S01divyav_u:3763: antarā ca mahārāja śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanam/
S01divyav_u:3764: 093.023 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:3765: 093.026 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--itaḥ saptame divase bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3769: teṣāmetadabhavat--na hyeva śramaṇo gautamo niṣpalāyiṣyati, nāpyanadhigatamadhigamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3772: iti viditvā raktākṣo nāma parivrājaka indrajālābhijñaḥ sa āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3774: evaṃ cāhuh--[94]yatkhalu raktākṣa jānīyāh--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhiriddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3775: 094.001 sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:3781: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhiriddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3782: 094.006 sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśāyiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:3788: 094.010 atha raktākṣaḥ parivrājako yena te ṛṣayastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3790: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--śramaṇo gautama ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3791: 094.012 sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:3796: 094.015 tena khalu samayena subhadro nāma parivrājakaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3798: 094.016 atha raktākṣaḥ parivrājako yena subhadraḥ parivrājakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3800: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu subhadra jānīyāh--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhih ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3801: 094.018 sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:3805: subhadreṇābhihitam--na śobhanaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yadyuṣmābhiḥ śramaṇo gautamo riddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3806: 094.021 tatkasya hetoh? mama tāvat kuśinagaryāmāvāso 'navatapte mahāsarasi divā vihāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:3807: 094.022 śramaṇasya gautamasya śāriputro nāma śiṣyastasya cundo nāma śrāmaṇerakastasyāpi tatraivānavatapte mahāsarasi divā vihāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:3808: 094.024 na tathānavataptakāyikā devatā api kārān kartavyān manyante yathā tasya/
S01divyav_u:3810: ihāhaṃ kuśinagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātamādāya anavataptaṃ mahāsarasaṃ gacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:3811: 094.026 tasya mamānavataptakāyikā devatā anavataptānmahāsarasaḥ pānīyamuddhṛtya ekānte na prayacchati/
S01divyav_u:3813: tasyānavataptakāyikā devatā pāṃśukūlāni dhāvayitvā tena pānīyenātmānaṃ siñcati/
S01divyav_u:3816: 094.029 na śobhanaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yacchramaṇo gautamo riddhiprātihāryeṇāhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3817: 094.030 evamahaṃ jāne yathā maharddhikaḥ śramaṇo gautamo mahānubhāva iti/
S01divyav_u:3821: 095.001 [95]atha rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya kālo nāṃnā bhrātā abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3823: 095.003 anyatamayā cāvaruddhikayā prāsādatalagatayā rājakumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā sragdāmaṃ kṣiptam/
S01divyav_u:3826: tai rājñe niveditam--yatkhalu deva jānīthāḥ--kālena devasyāntaḥpuraṃ prārthitam/
S01divyav_u:3830: 095.007 evaṃ deveti pauruṣeyai rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya kālasya vīthīmadhye hastapādāśchinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3831: 095.008 sa ārtasvaraṃ krandate, duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ devanāṃ vedayate/
S01divyav_u:3834: 095.010 kālasya jñātibhirabhihitam--etamāryāḥ kālaṃ rājakumāraṃ satyābhiyācanayā yathāpaurāṇaṃ kurudhvamiti/
S01divyav_u:3837: 095.012 atha kālasya rājakumārasyaitadabhavat--kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptaṃ māṃ bhagavān na samanvāharatīti viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:3838: 095.014 imāmavasthāṃ mama lokanātho na vetti saṃbādhagatasya kasmāt/
S01divyav_u:3841: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha tvamānanda saṃghāṭimādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena kālo rājabhrātā tenopasaṃkrāma/
S01divyav_u:3842_0: 095.020 upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evaṃ
S01divyav_u:3842_1: vada--ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā arūpiṇo vā rūpiṇo vā saṃjñino
S01divyav_u:3842_2: vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino vā nāsaṃjñinaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3844: 095.023 ye kecid dharmā asaṃskṛtā vā saṃskṛtā vā, virāgo dharmasteṣāmagra ākhyātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3845: 095.025 anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ syāt/
S01divyav_u:3846: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃghāṭīmādāyānyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena rājabhrātā kālastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3847: 095.027 upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evamāha--ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā yāvannaivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3849: 095.029 ye keciddharmāḥ saṃkṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā, virāgo dharmasteṣāmagra ākhyātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3850: 095.030 ye kecit saṃghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā parṣado vā, tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghasteṣāmagra ākhyātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3851: 095.031 anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ bhavatu/
S01divyav_u:3852: 095.032 sahābhidhānāt kālasya rājakumārasya śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttam,
S01divyav_u:3853: [96]yathāpi tatra buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
S01divyav_u:3854: 096.001 kālena kumāreṇa tenaiva saṃvegena anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam ṛddhiścāpi nirhṛtā/
S01divyav_u:3857: 096.003 yatrāsya śarīraṃ gaṇḍagaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya gaṇḍaka ārāmika iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:3858: 096.004 atha rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sa pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3861: 096.006 rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarādbhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ kāritaḥ śatasahasrahastah .... caturṇāṃ maṇḍapo vitataḥ/
S01divyav_u:3864: 096.009 rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena saptame divase yāvajjetavanaṃ yāvacca bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapo 'ntarāt sarvo 'sau pradeśo 'pagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3868: 096.013 atha bhagavān saptame divase pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:3869: 096.014 śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśrāmya bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pratisaṃlayanāya/
S01divyav_u:3870: 096.015 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nekaśataparivāro 'nekasahasraparivāro 'nekaśatasahasraparivāro yena bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3874: 096.019 niṣadya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocan--yatkhalu deva jānīyāh--ete vayamāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3875: 096.020 kutra etarhi śramaṇo gautamah? tena bhavanto muhūrtamāgamayata/
S01divyav_u:3877: 096.021 atha rājā prasenajit kauśala uttaraṃ māṇavamāmantrayate--ehi tvamuttara,
S01divyav_u:3879: 096.023 upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha,
S01divyav_u:3880: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:3881: 096.024 evaṃ ca vada--rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśala evamāha--ime bhadanta tīrthyā āgatā yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:3882: 096.025 evaṃ devetyuttaro māṇavo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3883: 096.026 upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3884: 096.027 ekāntaniṣaṇṇa uttaro māṇavo bhagavantamidamavocat--rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate,
S01divyav_u:3885: alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātraṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:3886: 096.030 sukhī bhavatu māṇava rājā prasenajit kauśalastvaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:3887: rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśala evamāha--ime bhadanta tīrthyā āgatā yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:3891: 097.002 adrākṣīdrājā prasenajit kauśala uttaraṃ māṇavakamupari vihāyasā āgacchatam/
S01divyav_u:3892: dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:3895: kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kenaitad vidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena?
S01divyav_u:3896: atha bhagavāṃstadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte 'rgaḍacchidreṇārciṣo nirgatya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍape nipatitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:3899: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocan--eṣa idānīṃ mahārāja śramaṇasya gautamasya prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ prajvalitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3901: atha so 'gniraspṛṣṭa eva vāriṇā sarvaprātihāryamaṇḍapamadagdhvā svayameva nirvṛto yathāpi tadbuddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
S01divyav_u:3902: 097.010 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:3905: 097.013 kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena?
S01divyav_u:3906: bhagavatā kanakamarīcikāvabhāsā utsṛṣṭāḥ, yena sarvaloka udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:3908: 097.015 dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānāmantrayate--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:3911: 097.017 kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena?
S01divyav_u:3912: bhagavatā kanakamarīcikāvabhāsā utsṛṣṭā yena sarvaloka udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:3914: dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānāmantrayate--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:3917: kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena vā gautamena?
S01divyav_u:3918: gaṇḍakenārāmikenottarakauravād dvīpāt karṇikāravṛkṣamādāya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapasyāgrataḥ sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3919: 097.023 ratnakenāpyārāmikena gandhamādanādaśokavṛkṣamānīya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapasya pṛṣṭhataḥ sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3920: 097.024 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:3923: kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena?
S01divyav_u:3926: ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampati prakampati saṃprakampati/
S01divyav_u:3937: gaganatalasthā devatā bhagavata upariṣṭāddivyānyutpalāni kṣipanti padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagarucūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi,
S01divyav_u:3941: 098.005 atha teṣām ṛṣīṇāmetadabhavat--kimarthaṃ mahāpṛthivīcālaḥ saṃvṛtta iti/
S01divyav_u:3942: teṣāmetadabhavat--nūnamasmākaṃ sabrahmacāribhiḥ śramaṇo gautamo riddhyā āhūto bhaviṣyatīti viditvā pañca ṛṣiśatāni śrāvastīṃ saṃprasthitāni/
S01divyav_u:3944_0: 098.008 adrākṣuste ṛṣayo bhagavantaṃ dūrādeva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ
S01divyav_u:3944_1: mūrtimantamiva dharmaṃ havyāvasiktamiva hutavahaṃ kāñcanabhājanasthamiva pradīpaṃ
S01divyav_u:3945: 098.010 dṛṣṭvā ca punar na tathā dvādaśavarṣe 'bhyastaśamatho yogācārasya cittasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
S01divyav_u:3946: aputrasya vā putraḥ pratilambho daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṃ rājyābhinandino vā rājyābhiṣeko yathā tatprathamatapūrvabuddhāropitakuśalamūlānāṃ tatprathamato buddhadarśanam/
S01divyav_u:3948: 098.014 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte sthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3949: ekāntasthitāste ṛṣayo bhagavantamidamavocan--labhemahi vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:3951: te bhagavatā brāhmeṇa svareṇāhūtāḥ--eta bhikṣavaścarata brahmacaryam/
S01divyav_u:3952: 098.017 sahābhidhānānmuṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtāḥ pātrakaravyagrahastāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravo varṣaśatopasaṃpannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3954: 098.021 satya(dyaḥ) praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṃ sthitā buddhamanorathena//2//
S01divyav_u:3955_0: 098.023 atha bhagavān divyamānuṣyeṇa pūjāsatkāreṇa satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito
S01divyav_u:3955_1: 'rhannarhatparivāro saptabhiśca nikāyaiḥ saṃpuraskṛto mahatā ca janaughena yena prātihāryamaṇḍapastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S01divyav_u:3957: bhagavataḥ kāyādraśmayo nirgatya sarvaṃ prātihāryamaṇḍapaṃ suvarṇavarṇāvabhāsaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3958_1: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu /
S01divyav_u:3959: 098.028 ahaṃ tīrthyaiḥ sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:3963: na tvaṃ gṛhapate ebhih ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ, api tvahaṃ tīrthyaiḥ riddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3965: 098.032 sthānametadvidyate yattīrthyā evaṃ vadeyuḥ--nāsti śramaṇasya gautamasyottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam[99]/
S01divyav_u:3974: 099.004 athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu/
S01divyav_u:3975: 099.005 ahaṃ tīrthyaiḥ sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:3980: 099.008 api tu na tvaṃ tīrthyair riddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3981: ahameṣāmuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmi hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:3987: tatra bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--ko mahārāja tathāgatamadhyeṣate uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām?
S01divyav_u:3988_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S01divyav_u:3988_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat--ahaṃ
S01divyav_u:3988_2: bhadanta bhagavantamadhyeṣe uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum /
S01divyav_u:3993_0: atha bhagavāṃstadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte svasminnāsane 'ntarhitaḥ
S01divyav_u:3993_1: pūrvasyāṃ diśi uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya caturvidhamīryāpathaṃ kalpayati tadyathā--caṃkramyate
S01divyav_u:3995: tejodhātusamāpannasya buddhasya bhagavato vividhānyarcīṃṣi kāyānniścaranti tadyathā nīlapītāni lohitānyavadātāni mañjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni/
S01divyav_u:3997: 099.022 adhaḥkāyaṃ prajvālayati, uparimāt kāyācchītalā vāridhārāḥ syandante/
S01divyav_u:3998: 099.023 yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśīti caturdiśaṃ caturvidham ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3999: 099.024 niṣadya bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--iyaṃ mahārāja tathāgatasya sarvaśrāvakasādhāraṇā ṛddhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:4000_0: 099.026 tatra bhagavān dvirapi rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--ko mahārāja
S01divyav_u:4000_1: tathāgatamadhyeṣate 'sādhāraṇāyām ṛddhyāmuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām?
S01divyav_u:4001_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S01divyav_u:4001_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--ahaṃ
S01divyav_u:4001_2: bhadanta bhagavantamadhyeṣe 'sādhāraṇāyām ṛddhyāmuttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām /
S01divyav_u:4006: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatām yadi laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti,
S01divyav_u:4007: antaśaḥ kuntapipīliko 'pi prāṇī bhagavatah cetasi cittamājānanti/
S01divyav_u:4011: atha śakrabrahmādīnāṃ devānāmetadabhavat--kimarthaṃ bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittamutpāditam?
S01divyav_u:4013: 100.004 atha śakrabrahmādayo devā anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataścetasā cittamājñāya tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkuñcitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
S01divyav_u:4015: evameva śakrabrahmādayo devā anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi ca devaloke 'ntarhitāni,
S01divyav_u:4017: 100.006 atha brahmādayo devā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4018: 100.008 śakrādayo devā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīktya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā vāmaṃ pārśvaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4019: 100.009 nandopanandābhyāṃ nāgarājābhyāṃ bhagavata upanāmitaṃ nirmitaṃ sahasrapatraṃ śakaṭacakramātraṃ sarvasauvarṇaṃ ratnadaṇḍaṃ padmam/
S01divyav_u:4020: 100.010 bhagavāṃśca padmakarṇikāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:4024: evaṃ bhagavatā buddhapiṇḍī nirmitā yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanamupādāya buddhā bhagavanto parṣannirmitam(?)/
S01divyav_u:4037: 100.021 bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā sarvaloko 'nāvṛtamadrākṣīdbuddhāvataṃsakaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanamupādāya antato bāladārakā api,
S01divyav_u:4038: yathāpi tadbuddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena//
S01divyav_u:4039: 100.024 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--tāvat pratigṛhṇīta bhikṣavo 'nupūrve sthitāyā buddhapiṇḍyā nimittam/
S01divyav_u:4042: atha bhagavāṃstam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4045: 100.029 virocana udgate tu vairavyārto(?) bhavati na cāvabhāsate//5//
S01divyav_u:4047: 100.031 saṃbuddhāvabhāsite tu loke na tārkiko bhāsate na cāsya śrāvakaḥ//6//
S01divyav_u:4048: 100.032 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatā uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4051: 101.001 dvirapi prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatā uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4053: evamukte tīrthyā anyonyaṃ vighaṭṭayanta evāhuḥ--tvamuttiṣṭha tvamuttiṣṭheti/
S01divyav_u:4055: 101.004 tena khalu punaḥ samayena pāñciko mahāsenāpatistasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4056_0: 101.005 atha pāñcikasya yakṣasenāpateretadabhavat--ciramapi te ime mohapuruṣā bhagavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:4056_1: viheṭhayiṣyanti bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ceti viditvā tumulaṃ vātavarṣaṃ saṃjanayya mahāntamutsṛṣṭavān /
S01divyav_u:4057: 101.006 tumulena vātavarṣeṇa tīrthyāṇāṃ maṇḍapā adarśanapathe kṣiptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4058: 101.007 tīrthyā hyaśanivarṣeṇa bādhyamānā diśo digbhyo vicalanti/
S01divyav_u:4060: 101.009 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāni/
S01divyav_u:4061: bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā tasyāṃ parṣadyekavāribindur na patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4062: 101.010 ekāntaniṣaṇṇānyanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇyudānamudānayanti--aho buddhaḥ, aho dharmaḥ, aho saṃghaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4064: 101.012 pāñcikena yakṣasenāpatinā tīrthyā abhihitāh--ete yūyaṃ mohapuruṣā bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchadhvaṃ dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:4065: 101.013 te niṣpalāyamānāḥ kathayanti--ete vayaṃ parvataṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4068: 101.016 bahavaḥ śaraṇam yānti parvatāṃśca vanāni ca/
S01divyav_u:4072: 101.020 yastu buddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:4079: iti viditvā niṣpalāyan kathayati--aham yuṣmākaṃ śāsanasarvasvaṃ kathayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:4086: 101.029 te kalahajātā viharanti bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhītā vivādamāpannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4093: 102.006 gamanāya me samayaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ kāyasya me balavīryam {na?} kiṃcit/
S01divyav_u:4094: 102.008 spṛṣṭāśca bhāvāḥ sukhaduḥkhate me anāvṛtaṃ jñānamihārhatām//12//
S01divyav_u:4096: 102.012 ācakṣva me dūṣika etamarthaṃ śītodakā kutra sā puṣkiriṇī//13//
S01divyav_u:4098: 102.015 eṣā khalu śītā puṣkiriṇī nalinī ca virājati toyadhārā/
S01divyav_u:4099: 102.017 śramaṇādhama hīnāsatpuruṣa tvamimāṃ nanu paśyasi puṣkariṇīm//14//
S01divyav_u:4101: 102.020 na tvaṃ naro nāpi ca nārikā tvaṃ śmaśrūṇi ca te nāsti na ca stanau tava/
S01divyav_u:4102: 102.022 bhinnasvaro 'si na ca cakravākah evaṃ bhavān vātahato nirucyate//15//
S01divyav_u:4103: 102.024 atha pūraṇo nirgrantho vālukāghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhvā śītikāyāṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4105: 102.026 atha te nirgranthāḥ pūraṇaṃ mṛgayamāṇāḥ pratimārge gaṇikāṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛcchanti--bhadre,
S01divyav_u:4106: kaṃcit tvamadrākṣīrgacchantamiha pūraṇaṃ dharmaśāṭapraticchannaṃ kaṭacchavratabhojanam? gaṇikā prāha--
S01divyav_u:4112: 102.033 kathaṃ sa buddhimān bhavati puruṣo vyañjanānvitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4113: 102.034 lokasya paśyato yo 'yaṃ grāme carati nagnakaḥ//18//
S01divyav_u:4116: 103.003 atha te nirgranthā yena śītikā puṣkiriṇī tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4117: adrākṣuste nirgranthāḥ pūraṇaṃ kāśyapaṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ mṛtam/
S01divyav_u:4118: 103.004 kālagataṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ puṣkiriṇyā uddhṛtya ekānte chorayitvā prakrāntāḥ//
S01divyav_u:4119: 103.006 bhagavatā buddhanirmāṇo nirmito dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato muṇḍaḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4120: 103.007 dharmatā khalu buddhā bhagavanto nirmitena sārdhaṃ niścayaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:4121: yaṃ khalu śrāvako nirmitamabhinirmimīte, yadi śrāvako bhāṣate, nirmito 'pi bhāṣate/
S01divyav_u:4125: 103.012 bhagavān nirmitaṃ praśnaṃ pṛcchati, bhagavān vyākaroti/
S01divyav_u:4127: 103.014 bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathā abhiprasannasya āśayaṃ cānuśayaṃ ca dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhakī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:4134: 103.019 yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:4135: 103.020 atha bhagavāṃstāṃ parṣadaṃ buddhaniṃnāṃ dharmapravaṇāṃ saṃghaprāgbhārāṃ vyavasthāpyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:4136: 103.022 dhanyāste puruṣā loke ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4145: 104.002 buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:4146: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śiśumāragirau bodho nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhāno mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:4148: 104.005 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:4149: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:4152: vaidyaprajñaptaiścāhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyaistiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitairāhāraiḥ/
S01divyav_u:4153: 104.008 hārārdhahārabhūṣitagātrā apsareva nandanavanacāriṇī mañcānmañcaṃ pīṭhātpīṭhamanavatarantī adharimāṃ bhūmim/
S01divyav_u:4154: 104.010 na cāsyāḥ kiṃcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇam yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya/
S01divyav_u:4155: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:4156: 104.011 dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prādādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā/
S01divyav_u:4157: 104.012 tasyāstrīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā varṇasaṃsthānaviśeṣānurūpaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyapasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:4158: 104.013 sā dhātryaṅkagatā unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā saripimaṇḍenānyaiśca cottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:4161: tadā rūpiṇī yauvanānurūpayā ācāravihāraceṣṭayā devakanyeva tadgṛhamavabhāsamānā sugṛtsambandhibāndhavānāmantarjanasya ca prītimutpādayati/
S01divyav_u:4162: 104.016 tasyāstādṛśīṃ vibhūtiṃ śrutvā nānādeśanivāsrājaputrā amātyaputrā gṛhapatiputrā dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhiputrāḥ sārthavāhaputrāśca bhāryārtham yācanakān preṣayanti/
S01divyav_u:4163: 104.018 yathā yathā cāsau prāthyate, tathā tathā bodho gṛhapatiḥ sutarāṃ prītimutpādayati/
S01divyav_u:4167: kiṃ tu yo mama kulaśīlena vā dhanena vā sadṛśo bhavati,
S01divyav_u:4170: 104.021 anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutam yathā śiśumāragirau bodho gṛhapatistasya duhitā evaṃ rūpayauvanasamuditā,
S01divyav_u:4171: sā nānādeśanivāsināṃ rājāmātyagṛhapatidhanināṃ śreṣṭhisārthavāhaputrāṇāmarthāya prārthyata iti/
S01divyav_u:4172: 104.023 śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--ahamapi tāvat tāṃ putrasyārthāya prārthayāmi/
S01divyav_u:4173: 104.024 kadācid bodho gṛhapatirdadyāditi viditvā tasyā yācanakāḥ preṣitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4174: bodhena gṛhapatinā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ samudācāradhanasampadaṃ ca vicārya dattā/
S01divyav_u:4175: 104.025 anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā mahatā śrīsamudayena putrasya pariṇītā/
S01divyav_u:4176: 104.026 yāvat punarapi bodhasya gṛhapateḥ patnyā sārdhaṃ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:4179: 104.028 tena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāh--bhavantaḥ, paśyata kasya prabhāvānmamānarthaśatāni prādurbhūtāni/
S01divyav_u:4180: 104.029 naimittikā vicāryaikamatenāhuh--gṛhapate, ya eṣa tava patnyāḥ kukṣimavakrāntaḥ, asyaiṣa prabhāvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4182: 104.031 iti śrutvā bodho gṛhapatiḥ paraṃ viṣādamāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4189: udyānaṃ gatvā tiṣṭhāmīti viditvā tena pauruṣeyā uktāh--yadi me kaścinmahānanartha utpadyate,
S01divyav_u:4190: sa śrāvayitavyo nānya ityuktvā udyānaṃ gatvā avasthito yāvadasyāsau patnī prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:4192: anyatamaḥ puruṣastvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:4194: 105.006 sa saṃlakṣayati--yathāyaṃ tvaritatvaritamāgacchati, nūnaṃ mahānanarthaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4195: 105.007 iti viditvā sasambhramaḥ pṛcchati--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ tvaritvaritamāgacchasīti?
S01divyav_u:4196: sa kathayati--gṛhapte, diṣṭyā vardhase, putraste jāta iti/
S01divyav_u:4197: 105.008 sa kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, yadyapi me putro 'narhaśatānyutpādya jātaḥ, tathāpi svāgatamasyeti/
S01divyav_u:4198: 105.009 tadanantarameva dvitīyapuruṣastathaiva tvaritatvaritamaśruparyākulekṣaṇo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:4199: 105.010 so 'pi tenānarthatayā sasambhrameṇa pṛṣṭah--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ tvaritatvaritamāgacchasīti?
S01divyav_u:4205: 105.014 atha tasya jñātayo lokadharmānuvṛttyā avajñāpūrvakena nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayitumārabdhāh--kiṃ bhavatu dāraksya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:4207: apare kathayanti--yena bodhasya gṛhapateḥ kukṣigatenaivānekadhanasamuditaṃ gṛhaṃ nidhanamupanītam,
S01divyav_u:4209: api tu ayaṃ pitrā jātamātraḥ svāgatavādena samudācaritaḥ, tasmādasya svāgata iti nāma bhavatu iti/
S01divyav_u:4212: tathā tathā bodhasya gṛhapaterdhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:4216: 105.022 ye 'pyasya pauruṣeyāḥ paṇyamādāya deśāntaragatā mahāsamudram yāvattīrṇāḥ,
S01divyav_u:4223: 105.026 kecidbodhasya gṛhapateḥ prāṇaviyogaṃ śrutvā tatraiva avasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4226: kecit tatraivāvasthitāḥ svāgatasya vācamapi na prayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:4229: kecidanyāśrayeṇa tatraivāvasthitāḥ santaḥ svāgatasya nāmāpi na gṛhṇanti/
S01divyav_u:4230: 105.030 kiṃ tu bodhasyaikā purāṇavṛddhā dāsī kṛtajñatayā svāgatasyopasthānaṃ kurvantī tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:4232: sā saṃlakṣayati--bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhamanekadhanasamuditaṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ prabhūtadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyam[106] paryādānaṃ gatam/
S01divyav_u:4234: tajjijñāsyāmi tāvat kasyāpuṇyenāyamupaplavaḥ, kiṃ svāgatasya āhosvinmameti/
S01divyav_u:4235: 106.002 tayā svāgatasya nāṃnā sthālyāṃ taṇḍulān prakṣipya bhaktārtham yojitā vinaṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4236: 106.003 tata ātmano nāṃnā tathaiva yojitāḥ, śobhanaṃ bhaktaṃ saṃpannam/
S01divyav_u:4238: etamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhamanekadhanasamuditaṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ prabhūtadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatam/
S01divyav_u:4240: kṛtaḥ sthāsyāmīti? atra prāptakālaṃ sarvathā yāvat prāṇaviyogo na bhavati tāvanniṣpalāyeyem/
S01divyav_u:4241: 106.007 iti viditvā yattatra kiṃcit sāramasti, tamādāya niṣpalāyitā/
S01divyav_u:4242: 106.008 tasmiñ śūnye gṛhe śvānaḥ praviśya kalahaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4244: 106.009 sa śvānakalahaṃ śrutvā saṃlakṣayati--bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhe śvānaḥ kaliṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:4246: sa tatra praviṣṭo yāvat paśyati śūnyam/
S01divyav_u:4248: 106.012 tataḥ svāgato bhojanavelāṃ jñātvā lekhaśālāyāḥ svagṛhamāgato bhoktumiti yāvat paśyati śūnyam/
S01divyav_u:4254: sa teṣāṃ sakāśaṃ gato yāvattatra kaliḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4255: 106.016 te kalahaṃ kṛtvā vyupaśāntāḥ parasparaṃ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4256: pūrvamasmākamanyonyaṃ dṛṣṭvā sneho bhavati, idānīṃ tu dveṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4260: 106.019 apare kathayanti--nāyaṃ svāgatāḥ, kiṃ tu durāgataḥ, imamāgamyāsmākaṃ kaliḥ prādurbhūta iti/
S01divyav_u:4262: 106.021 tasmādapi niṣkāsito yāvat kroḍamallānāṃ madhye praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4263: te yatra yatra bhaikṣārthikāḥ praviśanti, tatra nirbhartsyante niṣkāsyante ca/
S01divyav_u:4266: vayaṃ pūrve yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā āgacchāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4267: 106.024 idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastakā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti?
S01divyav_u:4268: tatraike kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā ihāgatā iti/
S01divyav_u:4272: 106.028 tatra yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva nirbhartsitā niṣkāsitāśca nairāśyamāpannā riktahastā riktamallāśca yathānilayamāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4274: 106.030 ye te riktahastakā riktapātrā āgatāste bhūyo dvidhā bhūtvā praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4275: tatra teṣāmapi yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4276: 106.031 te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgatakroḍamallakau praviṣṭau riktahastau riktamallakau āgatau/
S01divyav_u:4278: 107.001 tataste kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃkalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4279: ayaṃ mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭho yena vayaṃ riktahastā rikmallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4281: 107.003 sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:4282: 107.004 atrāntare yāvacchrāvasteyo vaṇijo bodhasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ paṇyamādāya śiśumāragirimanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4283: 107.005 tena svāgato mallakena hastagatena pīṭhīṃ gato mukhabimbakena pratyabhijñāta uktaśca--putra tvaṃ bodhagṛhapateḥ putra iti?
S01divyav_u:4284: sa kathayati--tāta, ahaṃ tasya putro durāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:4285: 107.006 sa muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā aśruparyākulekṣaṇaḥ kathayati--putra, tau tava mātāpitarau kālagatau?
S01divyav_u:4287: sa āha--teṣāmapi kecit kālagatāḥ kecidihaiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:4293: 107.011 ye vaṇikpauruṣeyāḥ paṇyaṃ gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ,
S01divyav_u:4300: sa dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--putra śrāvastīṃ kiṃ na gacchasi?
S01divyav_u:4302: putra, tatrānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ, tasya putreṇa tava bhaginī pariṇītā/
S01divyav_u:4310: tena tau kārṣāpaṇau khustavastrānte baddhvā sthāpitau, karmavipākena vismṛtau/
S01divyav_u:4313: yāvadasau vaṇik paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya svāgataṃ vaismṛtya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4315: 107.023 yāvat te sārthakāḥ kaliṃ kartumārabdhāḥ, balīvardā yoddhumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4319: te taṃ khaṭucapeṭādibhistāḍayitvā ardhacandrakāreṇa grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣkāsitumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4322: sārthavāhastaṃ kolāhalaśabdaṃ śrutvā nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ, yāvat paśyati taṃ niṣkāsyamānam/
S01divyav_u:4323: 107.027 sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, mā enaṃ niṣkāsayata, mamaiṣa vayasyaputro bhavatīti/
S01divyav_u:4325: yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:4328: 107.029 yadyeṣa gacchati, vayaṃ na gacchāma iti/
S01divyav_u:4331: 107.031 tvaṃ paścādvāsoddhātikayā gaccha, ahaṃ tavārthe āhāraṃ sthāpayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:4332: sa mātāpitṛviyogapratispardhinā pūrvakarmāparādhaprabhāveṇa duḥkhadaurmanasyena saṃtāpitamanāḥ sāśrukaṇṭhastūṣṇīmavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4335: sa sārthavāhastasyāhāraṃ patrapuṭake baddhvā kiṃcidbhūmau pāṃśunā praticchādya sthāpayati,
S01divyav_u:4337: 108.002 tatra yaṃ bhūmau sthāpayati, sa śṛgālairanyaiścatuṣpādaurbhakṣyate/
S01divyav_u:4338: 108.003 yaṃ vṛkṣaśākhāsu, sa pakṣibhiḥ śākhāmṛgaiśca bhakṣyate/
S01divyav_u:4340: asthānamanavakāśo yaccaramabhavikaḥ sattvo 'samprāpte viśeṣādhigame so 'ntarā kālaṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:4343: 108.006 yāvat tasya bhaginyāḥ santikā preṣyadārikā udakārthinī kumbhamādāya gatā/
S01divyav_u:4346: tvaṃ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putra iti?
S01divyav_u:4347: sa kathayati--evaṃ māṃ bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānīta iti/
S01divyav_u:4348: 108.009 sā aśruparyākulekṣaṇā bāṣpoparudhyamānakaṇṭhā urasi prahāraṃ dattvā karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ praṣṭumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:4353: kecit tatraiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:4359: kiṃcidanyapauruṣeyā gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4367: 108.019 sā dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--ihaiva tiṣṭha yāvatte bhaginyāḥ kathayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:4369: kīdṛśena paṇyeneti? sā kathayati--kuto 'sya paṇyam? daṇḍamasya haste mallakaśceti/
S01divyav_u:4371: kārṣāpaṇāṃśca dattvā uktā ca--sa vaktavyo yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati,
S01divyav_u:4374: sā vastrāṇyādāya kārṣāpaṇāṃśca tasya sakāśaṃ gatā kathayati--imāni te vastrāṇi kārṣāpaṇāśca bhaginyā preṣitāni,
S01divyav_u:4375: kathayati ca--yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati,
S01divyav_u:4385: 108.029 sa ca mārgapariśramakhinnena kṣudhārtena na śakyate kartum/
S01divyav_u:4389: 108.032 te yadi suptaṃ puruṣaṃ paśyanti, pādena ghaṭṭayanti/
S01divyav_u:4392: na tvayā śrutam yathā śrāvastyāmudyānamoṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ pratidinamanvāhiṇḍyante?
S01divyav_u:4393: te yadi suptaṃ puruṣaṃ paśyanti, vadanti--uttiṣṭha gaccheti/
S01divyav_u:4397: sa vigatamadyamadaḥ pratibuddho yāvat paśyati tānyevānantakāni(?) prāvṛtyāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4400: tasyāsau dārikā punaḥ preṣitā--dārike gaccha, cirayatyasau, paśya kimarthaṃ nāgacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:4401: 109.006 sā gatā yāvat paśyati muṣitakaṃ tenaiva veṣeṇāvasthitam/
S01divyav_u:4402: 109.007 sā tvaritatvaritaṃ gatā tasyāḥ kathayati--ārye, muṣitastenaiva veṣeṇa tiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:4403: 109.008 sā saṃlakṣayati--yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:4410: te yatra yatra bhaikṣārthinaḥ praviśanti, tatra tatra nirbhatsyante ca niṣkāsyante ca/
S01divyav_u:4413: vayaṃ pūrvam yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā gacchāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4414: 109.014 idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti?
S01divyav_u:4415: tatraike kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā ihāgatā iti/
S01divyav_u:4419: te tathaiva nirbhartsitā niṣkāsitāśca nairāśyamāpannā riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4421: 109.019 ye riktahastā riktamallakā āgatāḥ, te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtvā praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4422: 109.020 teṣāmapi yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataḥ, te tathaiva riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4423: te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgato 'nyaśca kroḍamallakaḥ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4424: 109.021 tau riktahastau riktamallakau āgatau, te tvanye pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā āgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4425: 109.022 te kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃjalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4426: ayaṃ mandabhāgyasattvo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4428: sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:4430: 109.026 tena dauvārikāṇāmājñā dattā--na tāvat kasyacit kroḍamallakasya praveśo dātavyo yāvadbuddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktam/
S01divyav_u:4432: kroḍamallakā ye tasya gṛhaṃ pratiśaraṇabhūtāste sarve saṃnipatitāḥ praveṣṭumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4434: 109.029 kathayanti--bhoḥ puruṣa, asmākameva nāṃnā ayaṃ gṛhapatiḥ prajñāyate anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiriti/
S01divyav_u:4436: sa kathayati--gṛhapatinā ājñādattā--na tāvat kasyacit kroḍamallakasya praveśo dātavyo yāvadbuddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktam/
S01divyav_u:4439: 110.001 taṃ paśyata mā atrāryā durāgata āgato bhavediti/
S01divyav_u:4440: te samanveṣṭitumārabdhā yāvat paśyantyekasmin pradeśe nilīyāvasthitam/
S01divyav_u:4441: 110.002 tatastaiḥ kolāhalaśabdaḥ kṛtah--ayaṃ bhavantaḥ sa durāgato nilīnastiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:4442: 110.003 sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān datvā niṣkāsitastīvreṇa ca paryavasthānena śirasi mallakena prahāro dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4445: 110.005 tatastairhastapādeṣu gṛhītvā saṃkārakūṭe kṣiptah--durāgata atra tiṣṭheti/
S01divyav_u:4447: 110.006 yāvadbhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yenānāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4448_1: kṛśamalpasthānaṃ malinajīrṇavāsonivasitaṃ śirasā bhagnena rudhireṇa pragharatā anyaiśca vraṇaiścākīrṇaiḥ,
S01divyav_u:4450: 110.010 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--tṛpyata bhikṣavaḥ sarvabhavopapattibhyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4451: 110.011 tṛpyata sarvabhavopapattyupakaraṇebhyaḥ, yatra nāma caramabhavikasya sattvasyeyamavasthā/
S01divyav_u:4452: tatra bhagavāṃs taṃ svāgatamāmantrayate--ākāṅkṣase vatsa pātraśeṣam? bhagavan/
S01divyav_u:4457_0: 110.016 anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā
S01divyav_u:4457_1: praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:4457_2: viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
S01divyav_u:4461: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pātraṃ gṛhītumārabdho yāvat paśyati tatra pātraśeṣaṃ na saṃsthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:4465: sa kathayati--na mayā bhadanta bhagavataḥ kadācidājñā pratyūḍhapūrveti/
S01divyav_u:4466: 110.023 kiṃ kṛtam? svāgatasya pātraśeṣaṃ na sthāpitamiti/
S01divyav_u:4468: api tu svāgatasyaiva tāni karmāṇi labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayānyoghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni yena tava vismṛtam/
S01divyav_u:4473: 110.027 svāgatasya tadapi vismṛtam yadbhagavatā pratijñātam--tava pātraśeṣaṃ sthāpayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:4474: 110.028 sa saṃlakṣayati--ko 'pyayaṃ puṇyakarmā bhagavatā trailokyaguruṇā samanvāhṛtaḥ śabdata iti/
S01divyav_u:4476: 110.029 bhagavan svāgata ityuktvā anekaiḥ prativacanaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:4479: gatvā kathaya--yo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyasya putraḥ svāgataḥ, sa āgacchatu iti/
S01divyav_u:4480: 110.031 āyuṣmatā ānandena gatvoccaiḥ śabdairuktah--yo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putraḥ svāgataḥ, sa āgacchatu iti/
S01divyav_u:4485: 111.003 teṣāṃ sarvajña nātho 'si ye hi tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4486: 111.004 teṣāṃ svāgatamāryāṇām ye ca te śāsane ratāḥ//2//
S01divyav_u:4488: 111.006 śocyaḥ kaṣṭāṃ daśāṃ prāptaḥ śokaśalyasamarpitaḥ//3// iti/
S01divyav_u:4494: 111.009 sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--yadyapyahaṃ bhagavatā trailokyaguruṇā daivāt samanvāhṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4498: yadi tvaṃ sumerumātraiḥ piṇḍaiḥ samudrasadṛśena kuṣkiṇā paribhokṣyase,
S01divyav_u:4501: 111.013 tena tāvad bhuktam yāvat tṛpta iti/
S01divyav_u:4504: vatsa, yadyevamapaścimaṃ kavalaṃ gṛhāṇa, antardhāsyatyeṣa pātra iti/
S01divyav_u:4507: 111.016 caramabhavikaḥ sa sattvo bhagavantaṃ pṛṣṭataḥ pṛṣṭataḥ samanubaddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4508: 111.017 yāvadbhagavān vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4509: so 'pi bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4511: 111.019 iti viditvā svāgatamāmantrayate--vatsa sbāgata, santi te kārṣāpaṇāh? na santi bhagavan/
S01divyav_u:4513: vastrāntaṃ nirīkṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyati dvau kārṣāpaṇau/
S01divyav_u:4515: vatsa gaccha, gaṇḍakasyārāmikasya sakāśānnīlotpalāni gṛhītvā āgaccheti/
S01divyav_u:4520: iti viditvā saparuṣaṃ kathayati--durāgata, kimarthaṃ rvamihāgacchasīti/
S01divyav_u:4522: 111.025 nīlotpalairasti kāryaṃ me tathānyair nāpi paṅkajaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:4526: 111.028 ehyehi yadi dūto 'si tasya śāntātmano muneḥ/
S01divyav_u:4540: sa vṛddhānte sthitvā tāni puṣpāṇi dṛṣṭvā sutarāṃ nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4542: 112.005 tatastaṃ bhagavānāha--vatsa, kiṃ na pravrajasīti? sa kathayati--pravrajāmi bhagavanniti/
S01divyav_u:4544_0: 112.006 tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
S01divyav_u:4547: 112.011 so 'rhattvaṃ prāpto vimuktisukhapratisaṃvedī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:4551: 112.015 āgato 'smi purā nātha śrutvā vākyaṃ tavottamam//7//
S01divyav_u:4554: 112.018 ratnāni pratilebhe hi svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca kāṅkṣatām/
S01divyav_u:4555: 112.019 śreṣṭhā kalyāṇamitrāṇāṃ sadā sevā hitaiṣiṇām//9// iti/
S01divyav_u:4556: 112.020 yadā āyuṣmān svāgataḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4557: tadā sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--śramaṇena gautamenāsau durāgataḥ kroḍamallakaḥ pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4559: te 'vadhyāyanti kṣipanti vivādayanti--śramaṇo bhavanto gautama evamāha--sāmantaprāsādikaṃ me śāsanamiti/
S01divyav_u:4560: 112.023 atra kiṃ sāmantaprāsādikamityasya yatredānīṃ durāgataprabhṛtayo 'pi kroḍamallakāḥ pravrajantīti?
S01divyav_u:4562: 112.024 bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhyo mahāśrāvake mahājanakāyaḥ prasādaṃ pravedayate/
S01divyav_u:4563: 112.025 tadguṇodbhāvanamasya kartavyam, kutra kartavyam? yatraiva patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4564: 112.026 iti jñātvā ānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha ānanda bhikṣūṇāmārocaya--tathāgato bhikṣavo bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:4565: 112.027 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhargeṣu cārikāṃ cartum, sa cīvarakāṇi gṛhṇātu iti/
S01divyav_u:4566: 112.028 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--bhagavānāyuṣmanto bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:4567: 112.029 yo yuṣmākamutsahate bhagavatā sārdhaṃ bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritum,
S01divyav_u:4569_0: 112.031 atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra
S01divyav_u:4569_1: āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
S01divyav_u:4569_2: prāsādikah [113]prasādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gaja iva kalabhaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:4569_3: siṃha iva daṃṣṭṛgaṇaparivṛto haṃsarāja iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva pakṣigaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:4569_4: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:4569_5: deśika ivādhvagagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva pauragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:4569_6: koṭṭarāja iva mantrigaṇaparivṛtaścakravartīva putrasahasraparivṛtaścandra iva nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:4570_0: sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto virūḍhaka iva
S01divyav_u:4570_1: kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpakṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛto dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:4571_0: brahmakāyikagaṇaparivṛtaḥ stimati iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva
S01divyav_u:4571_3: jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako daśabhirbalaiścaturbhir vaiśāradyaistribhirāveṇikaiḥ
S01divyav_u:4571_5: parivṛto 'nyena ca mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena yena śuśumāragiristenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S01divyav_u:4574: aśrauṣuḥ śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayah--bhagavān bhargeṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śuśumāragirimanuprāptaḥ śuśumāragirau viharati bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāva iti/
S01divyav_u:4575: 113.016 śrutvā ca punaḥ saṃghāt saṃghaṃ pūgātpūgaṃ saṃgamya śuśumāragirer niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4576: 113.017 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4577: 113.018 śuśumāragirīyakān brāhamaṇagṛhapatīn dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:4578: 113.019 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:4581_1: viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato
S01divyav_u:4582_0: 113.025 atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayastāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:4582_1: samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanakāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato
S01divyav_u:4583: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:4584: 113.028 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena śuśumāragirīyakānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4586: śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayanti saṃpravārayanti/
S01divyav_u:4587_0: 113.032 anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena [114]bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
S01divyav_u:4587_1: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
S01divyav_u:4588: 114.002 atha bhagavāñ śuśumāragirīyakān brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:4589: 114.004 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm//
S01divyav_u:4590: 114.005 atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavantamidamavocat--bhagavatā bhadanta nānādeśeṣu nānādhiṣṭhāneṣu te te duṣṭanāgā duṣṭayakṣāśca vinītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4591: 114.006 ayaṃ bhadanta aśvatīrthiko nāgo 'smākamavairāṇāṃ vairī asapatnānāṃ sapatno 'drugdhānāṃ drugdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4596: atha bhagavāñ śuśumāragirīyakānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4597: 114.011 atha bhagavān vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4600: śalākāṃ cāraya--yo yuṣmākamutsahate aśvatīrthikaṃ nāgaṃ vinetum,
S01divyav_u:4602: 114.014 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣusaṃghasyārocayitvā buddhapramukhe bhikṣusaṃghe śalākāṃ cārayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4604: sthavirā bhikṣavaḥ samanvāhartuṃ saṃvṛttāh--kimarthaṃ bhagavatā śalākā na gṛhītā iti?
S01divyav_u:4607: āyuṣmān svāgataḥ samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttah--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavatā śalākā na gṛhītā sthavirasthaviraiśca bhikṣubhiriti?
S01divyav_u:4610: tenārdhāsanaṃ muktvā gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya śalākā gṛhītā/
S01divyav_u:4612: 114.021 pṛcchati buddho bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandam--katareṇānanda bhikṣuṇā śalākā gṛhīteti?
S01divyav_u:4617: 114.023 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāyuṣmān svāgatastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4624: tathāpi me te romāpi neñjayituṃ samarthāḥ syuḥ,
S01divyav_u:4627: 114.029 athāyuṣmān svāgatastasyā eva rātreratyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śuśumāragiriṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:4628: 114.030 śuśumāragiriṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yenāśvatīrthikasya nāgasya bhavanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4630: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimanene śramaṇakena mama mṛtipravṛttir yena me bhavanamāgacchatīti?
S01divyav_u:4632_0: 115.001 athāyuṣmān svāgatastasya hradaṃ gatvā pātracīvaramekāntamupasaṃkṣipya pādau
S01divyav_u:4632_1: prakṣālya hastau nirmādya pānīyaṃ parisrāvya jīrṇaparṇakāni samudānīya niṣadya bhaktakṛtyaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
S01divyav_u:4636: tena pātraṃ pakṣālya tatpātrodakaṃ tasmin hrade prakṣiptam/
S01divyav_u:4642: uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya āyuṣmataḥ svāgatasyopari cakrakaṇapaparaśubhindipālādīni praharaṇāni kṣeptumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4646: tadapi divyāni puṣpāṇi māndārakāṇi bhūtvā kāye nipatitumārabdham/
S01divyav_u:4653_0: iti tatrāśvatīrthikasya nāgasya krodhasyānubhāvenāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya ṛddhyanubhāvena
S01divyav_u:4653_1: mahānavabhāsaḥ prādurbhūto yaṃ dṛṣṭvā śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ saṃbhrāntāh
S01divyav_u:4654: 115.017 kathayanti--eṣa bhavanto bhagavānaśvatīrthikaṃ nāgaṃ vinayati, āgacchata paśyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:4657: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāmabhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānām yaduta svāgato bhikṣuriti/
S01divyav_u:4658: 115.021 yadāśvatīrthiko nāgo vigatamadadarpaḥ kṣīṇapraharaṇaśca saṃvṛttaḥ, tadā niṣpalāyitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4660: aśvatīrthako nāgo yām yāṃ diśaṃ gacchati,
S01divyav_u:4661: tāṃ tāṃ diśamādīptāṃ pradīptāṃ saṃprajvalitāmekajvālībhūtāṃ paśyati/
S01divyav_u:4662: 115.023 sa itaścāmutaśca nairmāṇikenāgninā paryākulīkṛto 'trāṇaḥ sarvamaśāntaṃ paśyati nānyatrāyuṣmata eva svāgatasya samīpaṃ śāntaṃ śītibhūtam/
S01divyav_u:4666: sa kathayati--jarādharmā nāhaṃ tvāṃ viheṭhayāmi, api tu tvameva māṃ viheṭhayasi/
S01divyav_u:4667: 115.027 yadi mayā evaṃvidhā guṇagaṇā nādhigatā abhaviṣyan, adyāhaṃ tvayā nāmāvaśeṣaḥ kṛto 'bhaviṣyamiti/
S01divyav_u:4668: 115.028 sa kathayati--bhadanta svāgata, ājñāpayatu, kiṃ mayā karaṇīyam?
S01divyav_u:4670: 115.030 sa kathayati--bhadanta svāgata, śobhanam, evaṃ karomīti/
S01divyav_u:4672: 115.031 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4673: 115.032 ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān svāgato bhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ so 'śvatīrthiko[116] nāga iti/
S01divyav_u:4676: 116.002 sa tvametarhi hataprahataniviṣṭaḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ paraprāṇoparodhena jīvikāṃ kalpayasi/
S01divyav_u:4677: 116.003 itaścyutasya te kā gatirbhaviṣyati, kā upapattiḥ, ko 'bhisamparāyah? iti/
S01divyav_u:4678: 116.004 sa kathayati--bhagavan, ājñāpaya, kiṃ mayā karaṇīyamiti/
S01divyav_u:4684: 116.008 atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ prabhūtamabhisāraṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4685: 116.009 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4686: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavantamidamavocat--bhagavatā bhadanta aśvatīrthiko nāgo vinītah?
S01divyav_u:4687: bhagavānāha--na mayā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo 'śvatīrthako nāgo vinītaḥ, api tu svāgatena bhikṣuṇā/
S01divyav_u:4688: 116.012 katamena bhadanta? ihanivāsinaiva bodhasya gṛhapateḥ putreṇa/
S01divyav_u:4693_0: atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapataya utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena
S01divyav_u:4695: 116.018 atha śuśumāragirīyakā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ//
S01divyav_u:4696: 116.020 śuśumāragirau anyatamo brāhmaṇa ahituṇḍiko bodhasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4698: 116.021 sa rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena hastimadhyasyopari viśvāsikaḥ sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4700: tena śrutam yathā svāgatena bhikṣuṇā bodhasya gṛhapateḥ putreṇāśvatīrthiko nāgo vinīta iti/
S01divyav_u:4702: 116.024 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4703: 116.025 sa brāhmaṇa āyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me āryasvāgata śvo 'ntargṛhe bhakteneti/
S01divyav_u:4710: tadā mama gṛhe tatprathamataḥ piṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavya iti/
S01divyav_u:4713: 116.030 atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ śuśumāragirau vihṛtya yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4716: 116.032 aśrauṣīdanāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavān bhargeṣu janapadacārikām[117] carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4718: 117.001 śrutvā ca punaḥ śrāvastyā niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4719: 117.002 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4720: 117.003 ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:4721: 117.004 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:4722_1: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
S01divyav_u:4724: 117.008 athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4725: 117.010 aśrauṣīt sa brāhmaṇo bhagavān bhargeṣu janapadacārikāṃ carannihānuprāpta ihaiva viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāma iti/
S01divyav_u:4727: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me āryaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhakteneti/
S01divyav_u:4729: 117.013 atha sa brāhmaṇa āyuṣmantaḥ svāgatasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4730_0: 117.014 athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:4730_1: samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena
S01divyav_u:4731: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:4732: 117.017 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yenānāthapiṇḍadasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4733: 117.018 tenāpi brāhmaṇenāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya praṇīta āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4734: 117.019 āyuṣmānapi svāgataḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya yena tasya brāhmaṇasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4736: 117.021 ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān svāgatastena brāhmaṇena praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4737: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--āryeṇa svāgatena praṇīta āhāraḥ paribhuktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4740: 117.023 iti viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--ārya, praṇītaste āhāraḥ paribhuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4748: 117.026 tato dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ śrāvastīvīthīṃ kiliñjacchannām/
S01divyav_u:4749: 117.027 sa tāmatikrānta ātapena spṛṣṭo madyakṣiptaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4751: 117.028 bhagavatā suparṇikā kuṭir nirmitā--maitaṃ kaścid dṛṣṭvā śāsane 'prasādaṃ pravedayiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:4752: 117.029 anāthapiṇḍadaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:4753_0: 117.030 anekaparyāyeṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā
S01divyav_u:4753_1: dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
S01divyav_u:4754: 117.032 atha bhagavānanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā [118]saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4756: 118.002 atha bhagavāṃstān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--ayaṃ sa bhikṣavaḥ svāgato bhikṣuryenāśvatrīrthiko nāgastāvaccaṇḍo vinītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4757: 118.003 kimidānīmeṣa śakto durbhuktasyāpi viṣamapanetum? no bhadanta iti/
S01divyav_u:4759: tasmānna bhikṣuṇā madyaṃ pātavyaṃ dātavyaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:4760: 118.005 atha bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ svāgataṃ madyavaśāt suptamutthāpyedamavocat--svāgata, kimidam?
S01divyav_u:4762: 118.006 tato bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamādāya vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4763: 118.007 niṣadya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--māṃ bho bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśya bhavadbhirmadyamapeyamadeyamantataḥ kuśāgreṇāpi//
S01divyav_u:4764: 118.009 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā svāgatena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye kule mahādhane mahābhoge jātah?
S01divyav_u:4765: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena kroḍamallako jātaḥ, durāgata iti ca saṃjñā saṃvṛttā?
S01divyav_u:4766: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam,
S01divyav_u:4768: bhagavānāha--svāgatenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:4771: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:4775: api tu upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:4777: 118.019 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//10//
S01divyav_u:4778: 118.020 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:4780: 118.022 asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:4786: 118.027 tena gṛhapatinā bhūyasā paryavasthitena sa mahātmāa svayameva grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣkāsitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4793: 118.031 sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--avatarāvatara mahādakṣiṇīya,
S01divyav_u:4796: tena tasya [119]pūjāsatkāraṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4799: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam,
S01divyav_u:4802: 119.005 bhagavānāha--kiṃ kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau gṛhapatireva,
S01divyav_u:4803: asau svāgato bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:4804: 119.006 yadanena pratyekabuddhe kārāḥ kṛtāḥ, tenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4805: 119.007 yadapakāraḥ kṛtaḥ, tena pañcajanmaśatāni kroḍamallako jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4807: 119.008 yatpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtam, tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:4808: 119.009 ahamanena pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4809: 119.010 bhūyo 'pi kāśyape bhagavati samyaksambuddhe pravrajito babhūva/
S01divyav_u:4811: sa bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenābhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagro nirdiṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4812: 119.012 tatrānena yāvadāyurbrahmacaryaṃ cāritam, na ca kaścidguṇagaṇo 'dhigataḥ/
S01divyav_u:4813: 119.013 sa maraṇasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare dakṣiṇīye yādavāyurbrahmacaryaṃ caritam,
S01divyav_u:4815_0: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenottaro māṇavo vyākṛtah--bhaviṣyasi
S01divyav_u:4815_1: tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha iti,
S01divyav_u:4817: 119.017 yathā mām upādhyāyo bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenābhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagro nirdiṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4818: evaṃ māmapi sa bhagavāñ śākyamuniḥ śākyādhirājo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagraṃ nirdiśediti/
S01divyav_u:4820: 119.020 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4823: 119.022 tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmaṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:4831: 120.002 dharmatā khalu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputraysa pañca pūrvanimittāni prādurbhavanti--akliṣṭāni vāsāṃsi kliśyanti,
S01divyav_u:4835: cyavanadharmā devaputraḥ sva āsane dhṛtiṃ na labhate/
S01divyav_u:4851: 120.009 upasaṃkramya taṃ devaputramidamavocat--hā kasmāt tvaṃ mārṣa atyarthaṃ pṛthivyāmāvartase,
S01divyav_u:4864: evamukte devaputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramidamavocat--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika divyaṃ sukhamanubhūya itaḥ saptame divase rājagṛhe nagare sūkaryāḥ kukṣau upapatsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:4865: 120.014 tatra mayā bahūni varṣāṇyuccāraprasrāvaḥ paribhoktavya iti/
S01divyav_u:4866: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ kāruṇyatayā taṃ devaputramidamavocat--ehi tvaṃ mārṣa,
S01divyav_u:4870: 120.016 atha sa devaputrastiryagyonyupapattibhayabhīto maraṇabhayabhītaśca śakraṃ devānāmindramidamavocat--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam,
S01divyav_u:4873: 120.019 atha sa devaputrastriśaraṇaparigṛhīto bhūtvā cyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ//
S01divyav_u:4874: 120.021 dharmatā khalu adhastāddevānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate nordhvam/
S01divyav_u:4875: atha śakro devānāmindrastaṃ devaputramavalokayati--kimasau devaputraḥ sūkarikāyāḥ kukṣau upapanno na veti/
S01divyav_u:4883: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ kutūhalajāto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4884: 120.026 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4885_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ śakro devānāmindro bhagavantamidamavocat--ihāhaṃ bhadanta adrākṣamanyatamaṃ
S01divyav_u:4885_1: devaputraṃ cyavanadharmāṇaṃ pṛthivyāmāvartamānaṃ karuṇakaruṇaṃ ca paridevamānam--hā mandākini,
S01divyav_u:4895: 120.029 tamenamevaṃ vadāmi--kasmāt tvaṃ mārṣa atyarthaṃ śocasi paridevase krandasi urasi tāḍayasi saṃmohāpadyasa iti?
S01divyav_u:4896: sa evamāha--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika divyaṃ sukhamapahāya itaḥ saptame divase rājagṛhe nagare sūkarikāyāḥ kukṣau upapatsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:4897: 120.031 tatra mayā [121]bahūni varṣāṇi uccāraprasrāvaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:4898: 121.001 tamenamevaṃ vadāmi--ehi tvaṃ mārṣa buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha dvipadānāmagryam,
S01divyav_u:4901: 121.003 sa evamāha--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam,
S01divyav_u:4905: 121.005 kutrāsau bhadanta devaputra upapannah? bhagavānāha--tuṣitā nāma kauśika devāḥ sarvakāmasamṛddhayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4907: atha śakro devānāmindra āttamānāstasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:4908: 121.008 ye buddhaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:4910: 121.010 ye dharmaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:4912: 121.012 ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:4914: 121.014 atha bhagavāñ śakrasya devānāmindrasya bhāṣitamanusaṃvarṇayannevamāha--evametat kauśika, evametat/
S01divyav_u:4915: 121.016 ye buddhaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:4917: 121.018 ye dharmaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:4919: 121.020 ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:4921_0: 121.022 atha śakro devānāmindro bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau
S01divyav_u:4921_1: śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāñjalikṛtasampuṭo bhagavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:4928: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ dhriyamāṇānām yāpayatāṃ keśanakhastūpā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:4930: tadā bhikṣavaḥ keśanakhastūpe pujāṃ kṛtvā kecit puṇḍāya praviśanti,
S01divyav_u:4932_0: 122.005 tena khalu samayena buddho bhagavāṃs tathāgatamākārataḥ samanusmaraṃścittamabhiprasādayati--ityapi
S01divyav_u:4932_1: sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S01divyav_u:4933: 122.009 atha bhagavān sāyāhṇe pratisamlayanādvyutthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4934: 122.010 adrākṣīdbhagavāṃstaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam/
S01divyav_u:4935: 122.011 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--paśyata yūyaṃ bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam? evaṃ bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:4936: 122.012 anena bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmirākrāntā adho 'śītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakramityatrāntarā yāvatyo vālukāstāvantyanena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi paribhoktavyāni/
S01divyav_u:4937: 122.014 atha teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāmetadabhavat--puruṣamātrāyām yāvadgartāyāṃ na śakyate vālukā gaṇayitum,
S01divyav_u:4940: atha te bhikṣavo na bhūyaḥ keśanakhastūpe kārāṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4941_0: 122.017 atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cetasā cittamājñāya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--anavarāgro
S01divyav_u:4943: 122.020 āyuṣmānupālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papraccha--yaduktaṃ bhagavatā asya bhikṣoriyatpuṇyaskandha iti,
S01divyav_u:4944: kutra bhadanta iyatpuṇyaskandhastanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gamiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:4945: nāhamupālinn ito bahiḥ samanupaśyāmyeva kṣatiṃ copahatiṃ ca yathā sabrahmacārī sabrahmacāriṇo 'ntike/
S01divyav_u:4946: 122.023 tatropālinn imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:4956: tena khalu samayena anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhaptinā dvau śukaśāvakau pratilabdhau/
S01divyav_u:4957: 123.003 tena niveśanaṃ nītvā ālāpitau poṣitau saṃvardhitau mānuṣālāpaṃ ca śikṣāpitau/
S01divyav_u:4958: 123.004 tayoścāyuṣmānānando 'bhīkṣṇamāgatya caturāryasatyasamprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ karoti--yaduta idaṃ duḥkham,
S01divyav_u:4963: 123.007 teṣāṃ kālānukālamupasaṃkrāmatāṃ tābhyāṃ śukaśāvakābhyāṃ nāmāni parijñātāni/
S01divyav_u:4966: 123.009 dṛṣṭvā antarjanamāmantrayatah--eṣa bhadantaḥ sthaviraḥ śāriputra āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:4968: 123.010 evamāyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ kāśyapaṃ raivatamāyuṣmantamānandaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayatah--eṣo 'smākamācāryānanda āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:4971: adrāṣṭāṃ tau śukaśāvakau bhagavantaṃ dūrādevāgacchantaṃ prāsādikaṃ prasādanīyaṃ śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ parameṇa cittamatyupaśamena samanvāgataṃ suvarṇayūpamiva śriyā jvalantam/
S01divyav_u:4974: 123.016 atha bhagavāṃstayoranugrahārthaṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4975: niṣadya bhagavatā śukaśāvakau caturāryasatyasamprativedhikayā dharmadeśanayā śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau/
S01divyav_u:4976: 123.018 atha bhagavāñ śukaśāvakau antarjanaṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4977: 123.019 tau cāntarjanasya viharataḥ pramādavihāriṇau biḍālena prāṇinā gṛhītau/
S01divyav_u:4978: 123.020 vihvalavadanau cchidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamāneṣu saṃdhiṣu namo buddhāya,
S01divyav_u:4983: 123.023 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantamidamavocat--nāhetupratyayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:4984: 123.024 ko bhadanta hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāviṣkaraṇe? evametadānanda, evametat/
S01divyav_u:4985: 123.025 nāhetupratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:4986: 123.026 dṛṣṭau tvayā ānanda tau śukaśāvakau? dṛṣṭau bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:4987: tau ānanda śukaśāvakau mama samanantaraprakrāntasya biḍālena prāṇinā jīvitād vyaparopitau/
S01divyav_u:4988: 123.027 tau buddhadharmasaṃghāvalambanayā smṛtyā kālagatau cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapannau//
S01divyav_u:4989: 123.029 atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan/
S01divyav_u:4990: 123.030 aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya pracaranto 'nāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśane śukaśāvakau--namo buddhāya,
S01divyav_u:4992: namaḥ saṃghāyeti biḍālena prāṇinā vyaparopitau[124] iti/
S01divyav_u:4993: 124.001 śrutvā ca punaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntāḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4994: 124.002 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4995_0: 124.003 ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantamidamavocan--iha vayaṃ bhadanta
S01divyav_u:4995_1: saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvavad yāvadanāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveśane dvau śukaśāvakau--namo buddhāya,
S01divyav_u:4997: namaḥ saṃghāyeti kurvāṇau biḍālena prāṇinā jīvitādvyaparopitau iti/
S01divyav_u:4999: bhagavānāha--tau bhikṣavaḥ śukaśāvakau tasya śaraṇagamanasya vipākena ṣaṭtriṃśatkṛtvaścāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyete,
S01divyav_u:5005_0: 124.009 tatastāvat ṣaṭsu kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu sattvā vyapasaṃsṛtya paścime bhave paścime
S01divyav_u:5005_1: nikete paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe manuṣyapratilābhaṃ labdhvā pratyekāṃ bodhimabhisambhotsyete,
S01divyav_u:5007: 124.011 evaṃ hi bhikṣavo mahāphalaṃ dharmaśravaṇaṃ mahānuśaṃsakam,
S01divyav_u:5009: 124.012 tasmāttarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam yanno dharmaśravaṇābhiratā bhaviṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5017: ekasmin samaye bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati markaṭahradatīre kūṭāgāraśālāyām/
S01divyav_u:5018: 125.003 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:5019: 125.004 vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamayya yena cāpālacaityaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5021_1: saptāmrakam {bahupatrakam} gautamanyagrodhaḥ śālavanaṃ dhurānikṣepanaṃ mallānāṃ makuṭabandhanaṃ caityam /
S01divyav_u:5023: yasya kasyacidānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5024: ākāṅkṣan sa kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:5025: 125.010 tathāgatasya ānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5026: 125.011 ākāṅkṣamāṇastathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:5028_1: vṛjibhūmiścāpālaṃ caityaṃ saptāmrakaṃ bahupatrakaṃ gautamanyagrodhaḥ śālavanaṃ dhuranikṣepanaṃ
S01divyav_u:5030: yasya kasyacidānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5031: ākāṅkṣan sa kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:5032: 125.016 tathāgatasya ānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5033: ākāṅkṣamāṇastathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:5035_0: atha bhagavata etadabhavat--sphūṭo 'bhavadānando bhikṣurmāreṇa pāpīyasā yatredānīm
S01divyav_u:5035_1: yāvat trirapi audārike avabhāsanimitte prāviṣkriyamāṇe na śaknoti tannimittamājñātum
S01divyav_u:5039: 125.021 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagvataḥ pratiśrutya anyatamavṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya/
S01divyav_u:5043: 125.024 kasmāt tvaṃ pāpīyann evaṃ vadasi--parinirvātu bhagavān, parinirvāṇakālasamayaḥ sugatasya?
S01divyav_u:5044: eko 'yaṃ bhadanta samayah--bhagavānurubilvāyāṃ viharati nadyā nairañjanāyāstīre bodhimūle 'cirābhisambuddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5046: upasaṃkramya bhagavantamevaṃ vadāmi--parinirvātu bhagavān, parinirvāṇakālasamayaḥ sugatasya/
S01divyav_u:5048: yāvanna me śrāvakāḥ piṇḍatā bhaviṣyanti vyaktā vinītā viśāradāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5050: alaṃ svasya vādasya paryavadāpayitāro bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇya upāsakā uapāsikāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5051: 125.030 vaistārikaṃ ca te brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyanti bāhujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtam yāvaddevamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksamprakāśitam/
S01divyav_u:5052: 125.031 etarhi bhadanta bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ paṇḍitā vyaktā vinītā viśāradā alamutpannotpannānāṃ parapravāditāṃ sahadharmeṇa [126]nigrahītāraḥ,
S01divyav_u:5053: svasya vādasya paryavadāpayitāro bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇya upāsakā upāsikāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5054: 126.002 vaistārikaṃ ca te brahmacaryaṃ bāhujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtam yāvaddevamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksamprakāśitam/
S01divyav_u:5057: nicirasyedānīṃ tathāgatasya trayāṇāṃ varṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayānnirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:5058: 126.005 atha mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhavat--parinirvāsyate bata śramaṇo gautamaḥ//
S01divyav_u:5059: 126.006 iti viditvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭaḥ pramudita udagraḥ prītisaumanasyajātastatraivāntarhitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:5062: 126.008 tayostrayāṇāṃ varṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayādindriyaparipāko bhaviṣyati sukhādhiṣṭhānaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:5063: 126.009 śakyaṃ śrāvakavaineyastathāgatena vinayituṃ na tu tathāgatavaineyaḥ śrāvakeṇa//
S01divyav_u:5064: 126.010 atha bhagavata etadabhavat--yannvahaṃ tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyeyam yathā samāhite citte jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārānutsṛjeyam/
S01divyav_u:5065: 126.011 atha bhagavāṃstadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārānutsraṣṭumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5068: 126.014 samanantarotsṛṣṭeṣvāyuḥsaṃskāreṣu kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu ṣaṇnimittāni prādurbhūtānipuṣpavṛkṣaḥ śīrṇāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5074: 126.016 atha bhagavāṃstasmāt samādhervyutthāya tasyā velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:5077: 126.020 samanantarotsṛṣṭeṣvāyuḥsaṃskāreṣu ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devāḥ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikaṃ prakrāntā darśanāya vandanāya/
S01divyav_u:5078: 126.021 bhagavatā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yadanekairdevatāśatasahasraiḥ satyāni dṛṣṭāni,
S01divyav_u:5083: samanantarotsṛṣṭeṣvāyuḥsaṃskāroṣvanekā nāgayakṣagandharvakinnaramahoragā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntā bhagavato darśanāya/
S01divyav_u:5084: 126.026 bhagavatā teṣāmevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā yadanekair nāgayakṣagandharvakinnarairmahoragaiḥ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītāni yāvat svabhavanamanuprāptāḥ//
S01divyav_u:5086: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthād/
S01divyav_u:5087: 126.029 ekāntasthita āyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--ko bhadanta hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya?
S01divyav_u:5088: aṣṭau ime ānanda aṣṭau pratyayā mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:5090: iyamānanda mahāpṛthivī apsu pratiṣṭhitā, āpo vāyau pratiṣṭhitāḥ, vāyurākāśe pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5091: 126.032 bhavatyānanda samayo yadākāśe yadākāśe viṣamā [127]vāyavo vānti,
S01divyav_u:5094: 127.001 ayamānanda prathamo hetuḥ prathamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:5100: ayaṃ dvitīyo heturdvitīyaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:5105: 127.008 yā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatrāmū sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:5106: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:5108: te tayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānante--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5110: 127.012 ayamānanda tṛtīyo hetustṛtīyaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:5111: 127.013 punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣer niṣkrāmati,
S01divyav_u:5112: atha tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo bhavati sarvaścāyaṃ loka udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo bhavati/
S01divyav_u:5113: 127.014 yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
