S01divyav_u:5114: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:5116: te tayā ābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5118: 127.018 ayamānanda caturtho hetuścaturthaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:5122: 127.020 yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:5123: tā pi tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:5125: te tayābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5127: 127.024 ayamānanda pañcamo hetuḥ pañcamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:5128: 127.025 punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye tathāgatastriparivartadvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakraṃ parivartayati,
S01divyav_u:5131: 127.027 yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:5132: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:5134: te tayābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5136: 127.031 ayamānanda ṣaṣṭho hetuḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:5138: atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo bhavati ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5141: 128.003 yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhāstamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayāa ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:5142: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:5144: te tayābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5146: 128.006 ayamānanda saptamo hetuḥ saptamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya/
S01divyav_u:5147: 128.007 punaraparamānanda nacirasyedānīṃ tathāgatasya nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:5148: 128.008 atha tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo bhavati ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5150: sarvaścāyaṃ loka udāreṇāvabhāsena yatremau sūryacandramasau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:5151: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:5154: te tayā ābhayā anyonyaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃjānanti--anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ sattvā upapannāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5156: 128.014 ayamānanda aṣṭamo heturaṣṭamaḥ pratyayo mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya//
S01divyav_u:5157: 128.015 athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--yathā khalvahaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā bhāsitasyārthamājānāmi,
S01divyav_u:5158: ihaiva bhagavatā jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuhasaṃskārā utsṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:5160: etarhi ānanda tathāgatena jīvitasaṃskārānadhiṣṭhāya āyuḥsaṃskārā utsṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5161: 128.018 saṃmukhaṃ me bhadanta bhagavato 'ntikācchrutaṃ saṃmukhamudgṛhītam--yasya kasyaciccatvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5162: ākāṅkṣamāṇastathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhat, kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:5163: 128.020 bhagavatā bhadanta catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5164: 128.021 ākāṅkṣamāṇastathāgataḥ kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:5165: tiṣṭhatu bhagavān kalpam, tiṣṭhatu sugataḥ kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:5166: 128.022 tavaivānanda aparādhastavaiva duṣkṛtam yastvaṃ tathāyatasya yāvat trirapyaudāre avabhāsanimitte prāviṣkṛte na śaknoṣi tannimittaṃ pratiśrāvayitum,
S01divyav_u:5168: 128.024 kimanyasya ānanda bhāṣeta tathāgatastāṃ vācam yā syād dvidhā? no bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:5169: 128.025 sādhu sādhu ānanda, asthānametadānanda anavakāśo yat tathāgatastāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣeta yā syāddvidhā/
S01divyav_u:5174: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yāvanto bhikṣavaścāpālaṃ caityamupaniśritya viharanti,
S01divyav_u:5176: 128.029 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
S01divyav_u:5177: 128.030 ekāntasthita āyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--yāvanto bhadanta bhikṣavaścāpālaṃ caityamupaniśritya viharanti,
S01divyav_u:5182: niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--anityā bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃskārā adhruvā anāśvāsikā vipariṇāmadharmāṇo yāvadalameva bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃskārān saṃskaritumalam/
S01divyav_u:5184: etarhi vā me 'tyayādye te dharmā dṛṣṭadharmahitāya saṃvartante dṛṣṭadharmasukhāya,
S01divyav_u:5186_0: te bhikṣubhirudgṛhya paryavāpya tathā tathā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā grāhayitavyā
S01divyav_u:5186_1: yathaiva tatra brahmacaryaṃ virasthitikaṃ syādbahujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtam yāvaddevamanuṣyebhyaḥ
S01divyav_u:5187: 129.006 etarhi bhikṣavo dharmā dṛṣṭadharmahitāya saṃvartante dṛṣṭadharmasukhāya,
S01divyav_u:5189_0: ye bhikṣubhirudgṛhya paryavāpay tathā tathā dhārayitavyā grāhayitavyā vācayitavyā
S01divyav_u:5196: 129.011 ime te bhikṣavo dharmā dṛṣṭadharmahitāya saṃvartante dṛṣṭadharmasukhāya,
S01divyav_u:5198_0: bhikṣubhirudgṛhya paryavāpya tathā tathā dhārayitavyā grāhayitavyā vācayitavyā yathaitadbrahmacaryaṃ
S01divyav_u:5201: bhagavān vaiśālīvanamabhisaran dakṣiṇena sarvakāyena nāgāvalokitena vyavalokayati/
S01divyav_u:5202: 129.015 athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--nāhetvapratyayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā dakṣiṇena nāgāvalokitamavalokayanti/
S01divyav_u:5203: 129.017 ko bhadanta hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayo nāgāvalokitasya? evametadānanda, evametat/
S01divyav_u:5204: 129.018 nāhetvapratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhā dakṣiṇena sarvakāyena nāgāvalokitena vyavalokayanti/
S01divyav_u:5212: yadā ha bhagavatā vāg bhāṣitā idamapaścimakaṃ vaiśālyā darśanam,
S01divyav_u:5217: vaiśālyāṃ śabdo niścāritah--bhagavān parinirvāṇāya gacchati, na bhūyo bhagavān vaiśālīmāgamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:5218: 129.029 devatānāṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā anekāni vaiśālikāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bhagavatsakāśamupasaṃkrāntāni/
S01divyav_u:5219: 129.030 bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā evaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:5227: yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:5228: 130.003 sthavirānandaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhagavantamidamavocat--paśya bhadanta yāvat tvam/
S01divyav_u:5229: 130.004 bhagavatā parinirvāṇāya prasthitenānekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni/
S01divyav_u:5238_0: atra ānanda kimāścaryaṃ mayā etarhi sarvajñena sarvākārajñenānuttarajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena
S01divyav_u:5239_1: yanmayā maraṇāntikayā vedanayā spṛṣṭena evaṃvidhā parikarmakathā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:5241: ṛṣayaḥ pravrajitvā catvāro brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā kalpavṛndaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokasabhāgatāyāmupapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5244: upoṣadhasya rājño mūrdhni piṭṭako jāto mṛduḥ sumṛduḥ, tadyathā tūlapicurvā karpāsapicurvā/
S01divyav_u:5247: 130.019 kumāro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:5251: mūrdhato jāto mūrdhāta iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:5252: 130.021 māṃ dhaya māṃ dhaya māndhāta iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:5254: 130.022 māndhātasya kumārasya kumārakrīḍāyāṃ krīḍataḥ ṣaṭ cakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5263: 130.026 tairamātyaiḥ punaḥ saṃdeśo visarjitah--pitā te kāladharmaṇā samyuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5265: 130.027 tato 'sau saṃlakṣayati--yadi mama pitā kālagataḥ, kiṃ bhūyo 'haṃ gacchāmīti?
S01divyav_u:5268: sa kathayati--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ prāpsyate, ihaiva rājyābhiṣeka āgacchatu/
S01divyav_u:5269: 130.029 tataste amātyaiḥ kathayanti--ratnaśilayā deva prayojanaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:5270: 130.030 tasya ca divaukaso nāma yakṣaḥ purojavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5272: 130.031 yadā ratnaśilā ānītā, tataste amātyā bhūyaḥ kathayanti--deva śrīparyaṅkenātra prayojanaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:5275: 131.001 sa kathayati--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ prāpsyate, ihaivādhiṣṭhānamāgacchatu/
S01divyav_u:5281: yadi dharmeṇa rājyaṃ prāpsyate, amanuṣyāḥ paṭṭaṃ bandhantu/
S01divyav_u:5284: tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:5285: 131.007 pūrṇaṃ cāsya sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarupiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:5288: 131.009 tatra vanakhaṇḍe prabhūtāḥ pakṣiṇo mṛgāśca prativasanti/
S01divyav_u:5290: 131.010 te ca pakṣiṇo 'vatīryamāṇā avatīryamāṇāḥ śabdaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:5294: yadā teṣām ṛṣikopena pakṣāṇi śīrṇāni, tataste pādoddhārakeṇa prasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5295: 131.012 sa ca rājā janapadānanusaṃsārya paśyati pādoddhārakeṇa gacchataḥ/
S01divyav_u:5297: paścāt te 'mātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, śabdakaṇṭakāni dhyānānīti eteṣām ṛṣikopena pakṣāṇi śīrṇāni/
S01divyav_u:5298: 131.014 tato rājñā abhihitam--evaṃvidhā api ṛṣayo bhavanti, yeṣāṃ sattvānāmantike nāstyanukampā?
S01divyav_u:5300: ṛṣīṇāmevaṃ vadantu--tatra gacchata yatrāhaṃ na vasayā(sā?)mīti/
S01divyav_u:5308: cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣya pṛthak pṛthagutkāḥ śilpasthānakarmasthānāni māpayitum/
S01divyav_u:5309: 131.021 cintakā ime tulakā upaparīkṣakā iti mantrajā mantrajā iti saṃjñā/
S01divyav_u:5311: yataḥ sa rājā paśyati janapadānanusaṃsāryākṛṣyān karmāntān kurvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:5313: tatastairamātyai rājā abhihitah--ete deva manuṣyāḥ śāsyādīni kṛṣanti, tato oṣadhayo bhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:5314: 131.025 yataśca sa rājā kathayati--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ kṛṣiṣyanti?
S01divyav_u:5317: 131.027 rājñā mūrdhātena janapadāḥ pṛṣṭāh--kasyaitāni puṇyāni? tairabhihitam--devasya cāsmākaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:5319: bhūyo 'pi ca rājñā mūrdhātena janapadānanusaṃsārya tena pṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5323: 131.031 tato rājñā tenoktam--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ karpāsavātān māpayiṣyantīti karpāsameva devo varṣatu/
S01divyav_u:5324: 131.032 sahacittotpādādeva[132] rājño mūrdhātasya karpāsāneva devo vṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5326: kasyaitāni puṇyāni? te kathayanti--devasya cāsmākaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:5328: 132.003 sa rājā kathayati--kimete manuṣyāḥ karvanti? tairamātyairabhihitam--deva sūtreṇa prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:5329: 132.004 tato rājñā abhihitam--mama rājye manuṣyāḥ kartiṣyanti? sūtrameva devo varṣatu/
S01divyav_u:5330: sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasya sūtrameva devo vṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5331: 132.005 sa ca rājā kathayati--kasyaitāni puṇyāni? yataste kathayanti--devasya cāsmākaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:5335: 132.008 yato rājā saṃlakṣayati--mama rājye manuṣyā vastrāṇi vāpayiṣyante? vastrāṇyeva devo varṣatu/
S01divyav_u:5336: 132.009 sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasya vastrāṇyeva devo vṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5337: sa rājā kathayati--kasyaitāni puṇyāni? te kathayanti--devasya cāsmākaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:5338: 132.010 yataḥ sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--manuṣyā mama puṇyānāṃ prabhāvaṃ na jānanti/
S01divyav_u:5340: asti me jambudvīpa ṛddhaśca sphītaśca kṣemaśca subhikṣaśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaśca/
S01divyav_u:5342: tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:5343: 132.014 pūrṇaṃ ca me sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:5344: 132.015 aho bata me 'ntaḥpure saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patet, ekakārṣāpaṇo 'pi bahir na nipatet/
S01divyav_u:5345: sahacittotpādādeva rājño māndhātasyāntaḥpure saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ vṛṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:5346: 132.016 ekakārṣāpaṇo 'pi bahir na nipatito yathāpi tanmaharddhikasya sattvasya mahānubhāvasya kṛtapuṇyasya kṛtakuśalasya svakaṃ puṇyaphalaṃ pratyanubhavataḥ/
S01divyav_u:5347: 132.018 yataḥ sa rājā kathayati--kasyaitāni puṇyāni? te kathayanti--devasya cāsmākaṃ ca/

S01divyav_u:5546_1: yojanaśatāni vistareṇa samantaparikṣepeṇa navayojanaśatāni abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sphaṭikamayī,

S01divyav_u:5553: 137.017 tatra ye puṇyamaheśākhyāḥ sattvā anupūrveṇa praviṣṭāh avaśiṣṭā bahiḥ sthitāḥ/

S01divyav_u:5557: 137.019 atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--aho bata me śakro devānāmindro 'rdhāsanenopanimantrayate/

S01divyav_u:5565: tatra ca teṣāṃ devānāṃ devāsurasaṃgrāmaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:5566: 137.025 tatra yadyasurāḥ parājayante, paścādasurapuryāṃ dvārāṇi badhnanti/
S01divyav_u:5570: 137.027 yato rājñā mūrdhātena trāyastriṃśānāmuktam--kimetadbhavanto 'tīva saṃbhramajātā devāh?
S01divyav_u:5571: trāyastriṃśairuktam--etairasurairasmākaṃ pañca rakṣā bhagnāḥ, yato 'smābhirdvārāṇi baddhāni/
S01divyav_u:5572: 137.029 yato mūrdhātena rājñā uktam--ātmapuruṣāḥ, ānayantu bhavanto dhanuḥ/
S01divyav_u:5577: taṃ śrutvā asurā kathayanti--kasyaiṣa guṇaśabdah? taiḥ śrutam--rājño mūrdhātasyaiṣa guṇaśabdaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5579: paścādrājā mūrdhāto nirgatastasmādevanagarāt [138]teṣāṃ devānāmasurairbhagnakānāṃ svaṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃnahya/
S01divyav_u:5580: 138.001 dharmatā ca punareṣāṃ devāsurāṇām yudhyatāṃ rathā vaihāyasena tiṣṭhanti/
S01divyav_u:5581: 138.002 teṣāmanyonyaṃ na kasyacidadhiko vā hīno vā/
S01divyav_u:5585: 138.004 paścāt te saṃlakṣayanti--puṇyavipākamaheśākhyo 'yaṃ sattvo yasyāsmākamuparivaihāyasaṃ ratho gacchati/
S01divyav_u:5586: 138.005 jitā bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtā āsurīṃ purīṃ praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5587: 138.006 paścādrājā mūrdhātaḥ kathayati--kasya jayah? yato 'mātyāḥ kathayanti devasya jayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5588: 138.007 sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--ahameva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sakāśādabhyadhikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5599: 138.012 aho batāhaṃ śakraṃ devānāmindramasmāt sthānāccyāvayitvā svayameva devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:5600: 138.013 sahacittotpādādrājā mūrdhātastasmāt ṛddhitaḥ paribhraṣṭo jambudvīpeṣu pratyaṣṭhāt/
S01divyav_u:5603: atha rājño mūrdhātasyāmātyagaṇamahāmātyā rājyakartāro mantrasahajīvino yena rājā mūrdhātastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5604: 138.016 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ mūrdhātamidamavocan--bhaviṣyanti khalu devasyātyayāt paścimā janapadāh?
S01divyav_u:5606: saced vo grāmṇyo mamātyayāt kaścidupasaṃkramyaivaṃ pṛcchet--kiṃ bhavanto rājñā mūrdhātena maraṇasamaye vyākṛtam,
S01divyav_u:5607: teṣāmidaṃ syādvacanīyām--rājā bhavanto mūrdhāto ratnaiḥ samanvāgato 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:5608: 138.019 catasṛbhiśca mānuṣikābhī ṛddhibhiścaturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayitvā devāṃstrāyastriṃśānadhirūḍhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5616: 138.028 yaḥ prekṣati duḥkhamitonidānaṃ kāmeṣu jātu sa kathaṃ ramate/
S01divyav_u:5617: 138.030 loke hi śalyamupādhiṃ viditvā tasyaiva dhīro vinayāya śikṣet//7//
S01divyav_u:5618: 139.001 [139]yadā ca punastena janakāyena śrutaṃ rājā mūrdhāto glāno maraṇāvasthita iti,
S01divyav_u:5619: tataste 'mātyā janapadāścānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi rājānaṃ mūrdhātamupasaṃkramya darśanāya/
S01divyav_u:5620: 139.002 yatastena rājñā tasya janasya tāvadevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā--kāmeṣvādīnavakathā gṛhāśramapadasyādīnavo bhāṣitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5621: tathā kāmo jugupsito yathā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāmantike pravrajya gṛhāśramapadānyapahāya vanaṃ saṃśritāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5622: ṛṣibhiḥ pravrajitvā catvāri brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokasabhāgatāyāmupapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5623: 139.006 yāvacca jambudvīpe yāvacca pūrvavidehe dvīpe yāvaccāparagodānīye dvīpe yāvaccottarakuruṣu yāvacca saptasu kāñcanamayeṣu parvateṣu yāvacca devāṃstrāyastriṃśānadhirūḍaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5625: 139.009 śakrasya bhikṣavo devānāmindrasyāyuṣaḥ prāmāṇam yanmanuṣyāṇāṃ varṣamekaṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmekarātriṃdivasam/
S01divyav_u:5626: 139.011ṭena rātriṃdivasena triṃśadrātrakena māsena dvādaśamāsena saṃvatsareṇa divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam/
S01divyav_u:5627: 139.012 tadbhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā tisro varṣalakṣāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca varṣasahasrāṇi//
S01divyav_u:5629: evaṃvidhaṃ cittamutpāditam--aho bata me śakro devānāmindro 'rdhāsanenopanimantrayate,
S01divyav_u:5630: kāśyapo bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena śakro devānāmindro babhūva/
S01divyav_u:5631_0: 139.016 yasmin khalvānanda samaye rājño mūrdhātasyaivaṃvidhaṃ cittamutpannam--yannvahaṃ
S01divyav_u:5631_1: śakraṃ devānāmindramasmāt sthānāccyāvayitvā svayameva devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayeyam,
S01divyav_u:5632: kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddhastena kālena tena samayena śakro devānāmindro babhūva/
S01divyav_u:5637: 139.020 yo 'sau rājā mūrdhātaḥ, ahamevānanda tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:5638_0: 139.021 tatra tāvanmayā ānanda sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohena aparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmeṇa
S01divyav_u:5638_1: maraṇakālasamaye tāvadevaṃvidhā parikathā kṛtā yadanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi gṛhāśramamapahāya
S01divyav_u:5638_2: ṛṣibhyaḥ pravrajitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ vyapahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokamupapāditāḥ /
S01divyav_u:5639: 139.024 idānīṃ sarvajñenānuttarajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena nirvāṇāya saṃprasthitena tāvadevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:5644: 139.028 anekāni vaiśālikāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi yeṣāṃ kecitsrotāpattiphale vyavasthāpitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5652_1: bhadanta karmāṇi kṛtāni rājñā mūrdhātena yeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākena sahacittotpādādeva
S01divyav_u:5653_0: 140.004 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani sarvābhibhūr nāma tathāgato 'rhaṃl loke
S01divyav_u:5653_1: utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S01divyav_u:5655: tatra viṣaye dharmatā--yā aciroḍhā dārikā bhartari pravahaṇakena pratipradīyate,
S01divyav_u:5656: sā catūratnamayaiḥ puṣpairavakīrya baddhakā svāmine pradīyate/
S01divyav_u:5658: sa ca śreṣṭhidārakaścatūratnamayāni puṣpāṇi pratigṛhya yānamadhiruhya śvaśuragṛhamanuprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5659: 140.009 tasya gacchato 'bhimukhaṃ sarvābhibhūḥ samyaksambuddho janapadeṣu caryāṃ carannanupūrveṇābhyāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:5661: 140.011 yato 'sau prasādīkṛtacetā yānādavatīrya taṃ bhagavantaṃ taiścatūratnamayaiḥ puṣpairavakiriti/
S01divyav_u:5662: 140.012 tāni sarvābhibhuvā samyaksambuddhenādhiṣṭhitāni tathā yathā śakaṭacakramātrāṇyabhinirvṛttāni/
S01divyav_u:5665: 140.015 anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:5666: 140.017 tīrṇaśca tārayeyaṃ mahājanaughān atāritā ye pūrvakairjinendraiḥ//8//
S01divyav_u:5668: 140.021 praṇidhiśca me tatra kṛtā udārā ākāṅkṣatā vā idamagrabodhim//9//
S01divyav_u:5669: 140.023 tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākato me prāpta hi me bodhiḥ śivā anuttarā/
S01divyav_u:5670: 140.025 vṛṣṭaṃ ca saptāhahiraṇyavarṣaṃ mūrdhātasya rājño mahābalasya//10//
S01divyav_u:5671: 140.027 tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākato me nagaramapi sauvarṇakāñcanaṃ babhūva mahāsudarśanasya ramaṇīyā kuśāvatī nāma purī babhūva//
S01divyav_u:5672_0: 140.029 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kīdṛśaṃ
S01divyav_u:5672_1: bhadanta rājñā mūrdhātena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritam,
S01divyav_u:5674: 141.001 [141]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vipaśyī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho loke utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5675: 141.002 atha sa vipaśyī samyaksabuddho janapadeṣu caryāṃ caramāṇo 'nupūrveṇa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5676: 141.003 atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bandhumatīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśāt/
S01divyav_u:5678: bhagavantaṃ vipaśyinamasecanakadarśanarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā adhikaḥ prasāda utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5679: 141.005 prasādajātena tasya mudgānāṃ muṣṭiṃ gṛhītvā pātre prakṣiptā/
S01divyav_u:5680: 141.006 tato mudgāścatvāraḥ pātre patitāḥ, ekaḥ kaṇṭakamāhatya bhūmau patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5681: avaśiṣṭaṃ naivaṃ saṃprāptaṃ pātram, asamprāptā eva bhūmau patitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5683: 141.009 anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:5684: 141.011 tīrṇaśca tārayeyaṃ mahājanaughān na tāritā ye pūrvakairjinendraiḥ//11/
S01divyav_u:5685: 141.013 bhagavānāha--yo 'sau otkariko vaṇik, ahameva tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:5686: yanmayā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya prasādajātena mudgānāṃ muṣṭiḥ pātre pakṣiptā,
S01divyav_u:5687: tasmāccatvāro mudgāḥ pātre patitā avaśiṣṭā bhūmau patitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5688: tasya karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:5691: 141.017 sacedbhikṣavaḥ sa mudgaḥ pātre patito 'bhaviṣyanna bhūmau,
S01divyav_u:5692: sthāanametadvidyate yaddeveṣu ca manuṣyeṣu ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritamabhaviṣyat/
S01divyav_u:5693: 141.018 yo 'sau otkariko vaṇik tena kālena tena samayena, sa eṣa rājā mūrdhātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5694: 141.019 yo mūrdhāto rājā, ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:5695: 141.020 yasmādevaṃ buddhe bhagavati mahākāruṇike kārāḥ kṛtā atyarthaṃ mahāphalā bhavanti mahānuśaṃśā mahādyutayo mahāvaistārikā iti, tasmādbhavabodhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:5696: 141.021 kiṃ karaṇīyam? buddhe dharme saṃghe kārāḥ karaṇīyāḥ samyakpraṇidhānāni ca karaṇīyānīti//
S01divyav_u:5703: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:5704: 142.004 tena khalu samayena pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanarājadhānīṣu cañcūryamāṇāni mahāsamudrataṭamanuprāptāni/
S01divyav_u:5706: 142.006 yato vaṇijastaṃ mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhinnamanaso na prasahante samavataritum/
S01divyav_u:5707: 142.007 paścāttervaṇigbhiḥ karṇadhāra uktah--uddhoṣaya naḥ puruṣo mahāsamudrasya bhūtaṃ varṇam/
S01divyav_u:5708: 142.008 yato varṇadhāra uddhoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5710: tadyathā--maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilā pravālo rajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5711: 142.010 ya icchati evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇayituṃ mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitam,
S01divyav_u:5712: kālena ca kālaṃ dakṣiṇīyebhyaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitumūrdhvagāminīṃ saubhāgyakarīṃ sukhavipākāmāyatyāṃ svargasaṃvartanīm,
S01divyav_u:5714: 142.014 evamukte ca punaḥ sarva eva sattvāḥ saṃpattikāmā vipattipratikūlāstaṃ śrutvā tasmin mahāsamudre vyavasitāḥ samavataritum/
S01divyav_u:5717: yato vaṇijaḥ kathayanti--kasyedānīṃ vakṣyāmo vahanāt pratyavatarasveti/
S01divyav_u:5719: 142.018 tataḥ sa udghoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5720: santyasmin mahāsamudre imāni evamrūpāṇi mahānti mahābhayāni,
S01divyav_u:5721: tadyathā timibhayaṃ timiṃgilabhayamūrmibhayaṃ kūrmabhayaṃ sthale utsīdanabhayaṃ jale saṃsīdanabhayamantarjalagatānāṃ parvatānāmāghaṭṭanabhayaṃ kālikāvātabhayam/
S01divyav_u:5723: yena cātmano jīvitaparityāgo vyavāsthito mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ citraṃ ca jambudvīpaṃ parityaktum,
S01divyav_u:5726: taṃ śrutvā tathodghuṣya tu tasmādyānapātrādavatīrṇā bahavaḥ, kecidavaśiṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5728: 142.025 paścād dvau trayo yāvadanupūrveṇa sarve varatrāśchinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5729: tāsu cchinnāsu tadvahanaṃ mahākarṇadhārasampreritaṃ gagane mahāvātasamprerito megha iva balavadvāyusampreritaṃ kṣiprameva saṃprasthitam/
S01divyav_u:5731: sa taṃ pradeśamanuprāptānāṃ karṇadhāraḥ kathayati--santyasmin ratnadvīpe kācamaṇayo ratnasadṛśāḥ,
S01divyav_u:5734: 142.029 tatraiva ca kroñcakumārikā nāma striyo bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:5735: tāḥ puruṣaṃ labdhvā tathopalāṃstāḍayanti, yathā atraivānayena vyasanamāpadyate/
S01divyav_u:5737: 142.031 tāni yo bhakṣayati, sa sapta rātriṃdivasān suptastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:5738: asminneva ca ratnadvīpe saptāhāt pareṇa amanuṣyā na sahante,
S01divyav_u:5739: tāvadvidhān viparītān vāyūnutpādayanti yairvahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadakṛtakāryāṇām/
S01divyav_u:5742: prāpya ca taṃ ratnadvīpaṃ prayatnamāsthāya ratnānveṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā anupūrveṇopaparīkṣya ratnānāṃ tadvahanaṃ pūritaṃ tadyathā yavānāṃ vā yavasasyānāṃ vā mudgānāṃ vā bhāṣāṇāṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:5743: 143.003 vahanaṃ pūryitvā te 'nukūlaṃ jambudvīpābhimukhena vāyunā saṃprasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5744: 143.004 mahāsamudre ca tribhiḥ skandhaiḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃmiśritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5747: 143.006 tṛtīye skandhe pañcadaśayojanaśatikā ātmabhāvāḥ, ṣoḍaśayojanaśatikā yāvadekaviṃśatikā ātmabhāvāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5748: 143.007 tatra ca mahāsamudre tā matsyajātayaḥ parasparānyonyabhakṣaṇaparāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5749: 143.008 ye prathamāyāṃ bhūmau avasthitāḥ, te dvitīyabhūmisthairbhakṣyante/
S01divyav_u:5751: 143.009 tatra timiṃgilo nāma matsyāstṛtīyādudakaskandadhādabhyudgamya uparimandakaskandhamādāya carati/
S01divyav_u:5753: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāsamudrāt pānīyaṃ mahatā vegenākṣiptaṃ mukhadvāram yato dhāvati/
S01divyav_u:5755: 143.012 tasyaivaṃ carata ātmabhāvācchira evaṃ lakṣyate dūrata eva, tadyathā--parvato nabhaḥpramāṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5756: 143.013 akṣīṇi cāsya durata eva saṃlakṣyante nabhasīvādityau/
S01divyav_u:5759: teṣāmevaṃ cintayatāṃ tadvahanaṃ tasya mukhadvāram yato vegenopahartumārabdham/
S01divyav_u:5760: 143.016 teṣāṃ vahanaṃ vegenāpahriyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ādotuadvayotpādanaṃ ca saṃlakṣya saṃvega utpannah--kiṃ bhavanto yat tacchrūyate saptādityāḥ kalpasaṃvartanyāṃ samudāgamiṣyantīti,
S01divyav_u:5762: 143.018 yataḥ karṇadhāreṇa teṣāṃ vimarśajātānāmuktam--yat tadbhavantaḥ śrūyate timitimiṃgila iti,
S01divyav_u:5767: 143.022 paśyatha etau dūrata eva sūryavadavalokyete etau akṣitārakau/
S01divyav_u:5771: tadidānīṃ bhavadbhiḥ kiṃ karaṇīyam? yasya vo yasmin deve bhaktiḥ sa tamāyācatu/
S01divyav_u:5772: 143.025 yadi tenāpi tāvadāyācanena kāciddevatā asmākamasmānmahābhayādvimoṣkaṇaṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:5775: 143.028 naiva ca teṣāmāyācatāṃ tasmānmaraṇabhayāt jīvitaparitrāṇaviśeṣaḥ kaścit/
S01divyav_u:5776: 143.029 tathaiva tadvahanaṃ salilavegāt bhikṣiptaṃ timiṃgilamukhadvāram yato 'pahriyate/
S01divyav_u:5780: 143.031 kiṃ tu sarva evaikaraveṇa namo buddhāyeti vadāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5781: sati maraṇe buddhāvalambanayā smṛtyā kālaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5784: 144.001 bhagavatā ca jetavanasthena sa vādaḥ śruto divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhena atikrāntamānuṣeṇa/
S01divyav_u:5785: 144.002 śrutvā ca punarbhagavatā sa nādastathā adhiṣṭhito yathā tena timiṃgilena śrutam/
S01divyav_u:5786: 144.003 tasya taṃ namo buddhāyeti rāvaṃ śrutvā manaso 'marṣa utpanno viklavībhūtaśca--buddho bata loka utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5787: 144.004 na mama pratirūpaṃ syāt yadahaṃ buddhasya bhagavato nāmodghoṣaṃ śrutvā āhāramāhareyam/
S01divyav_u:5788: 144.005 sa cintayituṃ pravṛttah--yadyahamidanīṃ sahasaiva mukhadvāraṃ pidhāsyāmi,
S01divyav_u:5791: 144.006 yannvahaṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ mukhadvāraṃ saṃpidadhyām/
S01divyav_u:5792: 144.007 tatastena timiṃgilenātmīyaṃ mukhadvāraṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ pihitam/
S01divyav_u:5794: 144.009 atha te vaṇijastīramāsādya tadbhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭoṣṭragogardabhādibhiḥ purayitvā anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanādiṣu cañcūryamāṇāḥ śrāvastīmanuprāptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5795: 144.010 te tatra gatvā saṃlakṣayanti--dharmataiṣā yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātramāgacchati,
S01divyav_u:5797: 144.012 yannu vayametāni ratnāni buddhasya bhagavato dadyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5798: te tāni ratnāni saṃgṛhya bhagavataḥ sakāśamupagatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5799: 144.013 anupūrveṇa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ kathayanti--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:5800_0: asmākaṃ samudre yānapātreṇāvatīrṇānāṃ timiṃgilagrāheṇa tasmin yānapāre 'pahriyamāṇe
S01divyav_u:5800_1: jīvitavināśe pratyupasthite bhagavataḥ smaraṇaparāyaṇānāṃ nāmagrahaṇaṃ tasmāt mahāgrāhamukhādvinirmuktam,
S01divyav_u:5801: tato vayaṃ bhagavan saṃsiddhayānapārāḥ kṣemasvastinā ihāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5802: 144.016 dharmatā caiṣā yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātrā āgacchanti, tasya tadgamyaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:5806: balabodhyaṅgaratnānyadhigatāni, kiṃ tathāgatasya bhūyaḥ prākṛtaratnaiḥ karaṇīyam?
S01divyav_u:5807: yadi cecchata asmacchāsane vatsāḥ pravrajitum, āgacchatha/
S01divyav_u:5808: 144.020 yataste saṃlakṣayanti vaṇijah--yadasmākaṃ kiṃcit jīvitam, tatsarvaṃ buddhasya bhagavatastejasā/
S01divyav_u:5809: 144.021 yadvayametāni ratnāni tyaktvā bhagavato 'ntike pravrajema iti/
S01divyav_u:5810: 144.022 paścāt te tāni ratnāni mātāpitṛbhyaḥ putradāradāsīdāsakarmakaramitrāmātyajñātisālohitebhyo yathānyāyataḥ saṃvibhajya pravrajitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5812: 144.024 yato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kīdṛśāni karmāṇi bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:5814: yeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākena bhagavānārāgito na virāgitah? bhagavānāha--
S01divyav_u:5815: 144.027 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddho loka utpanno 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:5816: tasya ca śāsane eta eva ca pravrajitā abhūvan/
S01divyav_u:5817: 144.028 tatra pravrajya ca na kaścit tadrūpo guṇagaṇo 'dhigato nānyatra sabrahmacāriṇāmuddiṣṭamadhītaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:5818: 144.029 maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavantah--yadasmābhiḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksambuddhamāsādyoddiṣṭamadhītaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ ca,
S01divyav_u:5820: asya karmaṇo vipākena vayam yo 'sau anāgato 'dhvani kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena śākyamuninarmā samyaksambuddho vyākṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5822: 145.001 [145]bhagavānāha--kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni pañcabhikṣuśatānyatīte 'dhvanyāsan kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitāni,
S01divyav_u:5824: 145.002 tadā caiṣāmindriyāṇi paripācitāni, etarhi arhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:5825: 145.003 yaścāsau mahāsamudre timistimiṃgilo nāma matsyo buddhaśabdaṃ śrutvā anāhāratāyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5830: 145.007 yatra ca vikṣiptaṃ tatrāpi samīpe nāgasyaiva bhavanam/
S01divyav_u:5832: evaṃ kṣiptena pāramparyeṇa tat kalevaraṃ mahāsamudrataṭaṃ samudānītam/
S01divyav_u:5834: taccānekaiḥ kākagṛdhraśvaśṛgālaśvāpadādyaiḥ pakṣibhistatsamucchritaiśca kṛmibhirbhakṣyamāṇamasthikaraṅkajīrṇamāsaṃ śvetaṃ śvetaṃ vyavasthitam/
S01divyav_u:5835: 145.011 asyāṃ ca śrāvastyāṃ tasya brāhmaṇasya yadā patnī antarvartinī saṃvṛttā,
S01divyav_u:5836: tadeva tasyā garbhotpādādatīva kṣudduḥkhena pīḍyamānayā gṛhasvāmyabhihitah--āryaputra,
S01divyav_u:5838: 145.013 tasyā evaṃ vadantyā gṛhasvāminoktam--bhadre, yadasmadgṛhe 'nnapānaṃ tatsarvamabhyavaharasva/
S01divyav_u:5840: sā ca tadannapānaṃ sarvamabhyavahṛtya naiva tṛptimupayāti/
S01divyav_u:5846: 145.018 kimetadbhavantaḥ syāt--asyāḥ sattvamudare utpannam yasyotpādānnaiva tṛptimupayāti?
S01divyav_u:5847: yataḥ sa brāhmaṇo naimittakānāṃ darśayitvā saṃśayanirṇayanārthaṃ vaidyādīn bhūtatantravidaśca--paśyantu bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5848: iyaṃ brāhmaṇī kiṃ mahatā rogeṇābhibhūtā syādatha bhūtagrahāviṣṭā syādanyadvā syādrūpaṃ maraṇaliṅgamanenopasaṃkrameṇa pratyupasthitā syāt/
S01divyav_u:5852: tadā tairvaidyanaimittakabhūtatantravidbhiścikitsakaiḥ sā brāhmaṇīparyanuyuktā--kasmāt kālādārabhya tavaivaṃvidhā dīptāgnitā samutpannā?
S01divyav_u:5853: tayā abhihitam--garbhalambhasamakālameva sa evaṃvidha upakramaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5854: 145.025 yato naimittakavaidyacikitsakairabhihitam--nāsyāḥ kaścidanyastadrūpo rogo nāpi bhūtagrahāveśo bādhākara utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5859: 145.029 tasya dārakasya jātamātrasya sā brāhmaṇī vinītakṣudduḥkhā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:5860: sa dārako jātamātra eva atyarthaṃ bubhukṣayopapīḍyate/
S01divyav_u:5861: 145.030 tasya bubhukṣayā pīḍyamānasya mātā stanaṃ dātuṃ pravṛttā/
S01divyav_u:5862: 145.031 sa ca dārakaḥ stanaṃ pītvāpi sarvaṃ naiva tṛptimupayāti/
S01divyav_u:5863: paścāt tena brāhmaṇena tayā ca brāhmaṇyā tiraskṛtaprātiveśyasvajanayuvatyaścābhyarthya stanaṃ tasya dārakasya dāpayituṃ pravṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5864: 146.001 [146]sa ca dārakaḥ sarvāsāmapi stanaṃ pītvā naiva tṛptimabhyupagacchate/
S01divyav_u:5865: paścāt tena brāhmaṇena tayārthe chagalikā kṛtvā/
S01divyav_u:5866: 146.002 sa dārakastasyā api cchagalikāyāḥ kṣīraṃ pītvā janikāyāśca stanaṃ naiva tṛpyate/
S01divyav_u:5867: 146.003 tatra kālena kālaṃ bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaśca piṇḍapātaṃ praviṣya parikathāṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:5868: 146.004 sa dārakastāṃ parikathāṃ śrutvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ na roditi,
S01divyav_u:5870: 146.005 pratyavāsṛteṣu bhikṣubhikṣuṇīṣu ca punaḥ pipāsāduḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayamāno rohituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5873: 146.007 sa ca dārako 'nupūrveṇa māsārdharmāsādīnāmatyayādbhuñjāno naiva kadācidannapānasya tṛpyati/
S01divyav_u:5874: 146.008 yadā ca viśiṣṭe vasasi sthitaḥ, tadā tasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ bhakṣabhājanaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:5876: gṛhītvā śrāvastyāṃ bhikṣāṃ paryaṭitvā āhārakṛtyaṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:5877: 146.010 yataḥ sa dārako bhaikṣabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā śrāvastyāṃ bhaikṣaṃ paryaṭati/
S01divyav_u:5878: paryaṭanneva ca bhuktvā bhuktvā atṛpyamāna eva gṛhamāgacchati/
S01divyav_u:5879: 146.011 yato 'sau saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ mayā karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena na kadācit vitṛpyamāna āhāramārāgayāmi?
S01divyav_u:5884: tasya tenoktam--kiṃ cintāpara evaṃ tiṣṭhasi? gaccha tvam/
S01divyav_u:5887: tatra ca tvaṃ pravrajitaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃcayaṃ kariṣyasi/
S01divyav_u:5888: 146.016 akuśalāśca te dharmā ye 'sminnapi janmani saṃcitā bhaviṣyanti, te tanvībhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:5890: 146.018 atha sa mahātmā upāsakena codito jetavanaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:5891: jetavanaṃ gatvā tatra bhikṣūn pāṭhasvādhyāyamanasikārodyuktān dṛṣṭvā atīva prasādajātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5895: yataḥ sa mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sakāśādanujñāṃ mārgituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5899: 146.024 tatra ca bhikṣūṇāṃ kadācit piṇḍapāto bhavati, kadācit nimantraṇaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:5900: sa ca yasmin divase piṇḍapāto bhavati, tatropādhyāyenocyate--vatsa, kiṃ tṛpto 'si uta na?
S01divyav_u:5902: 146.026 yata upādhyāyenāsya saṃlakṣitah--taruṇavayasā pravrajito dīptāgnitayā na tṛptimupayāti/
S01divyav_u:5903: 146.027 sa ātmīyādapi piṇḍapatāt tasya saṃvibhāgaṃ prārabdhaḥ kartum/
S01divyav_u:5904: 146.028 punaśca pṛcchati--vatsa, kimidānīṃ tṛpto 'si? atha sa tamupādhyāyaṃ vadati--na tṛpto 'smi/
S01divyav_u:5905: 146.029 yata upādhyāyastaṃ śrutvā sapremān bhikṣūnanyāṃśca sārdhavihāriṇaḥ prārabdho vaktum/
S01divyav_u:5906: 146.030 yataḥ samānopādhyāyaiḥ samānācāryairanyaiśca sapremakairbhikṣubhirupasaṃhāra ārabdhaḥ kartum/
S01divyav_u:5908: yadā ca nimantraṇaṃ bhavati, tadāpi te tathaiva tasyopasaṃhāraṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:5909: 146.032 dānapatirapi viditvā yadyadadhikaṃ tattadasmai datvā āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:5910: 147.001 [147]atha pānakaṃ bhavati tadapi tathaiva yadadhikaṃ bhavati tattasyānupradīyate/
S01divyav_u:5911: tasya ca yataḥ pravrajitasya na kadācidannapānena kukṣiḥ pūṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5912: 147.002 tena khalu samayena anyatamena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5913: 147.003 bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamantargṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya/
S01divyav_u:5916: tena caivamupalabdham yo 'saṃviditameva buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayati sa sahasaiva bhogairabhyudgacchati/
S01divyav_u:5918: 147.007 sa tasyāhārasya śakaṭaṃ pūrayitvā praṇītapraṇītasya śucinaḥ sārdhaṃ sarvarūpairmitrasvajanasahāyo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmīti vihāraṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:5919: 147.009 sa paśyati tasmiñ jetavane bhikṣava eva na santi/
S01divyav_u:5921: 147.010 tasya tena gṛhapatinoktam--ārya, kva gatā bhikṣavah?
S01divyav_u:5923: 147.011 sa gṛhapatistacchutvā durmanā vyavasthitah--kaṣṭam, evamasmākaṃ viphalaḥ pariśramo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5924: 147.012 saṃcintya ca tasya dharmaruceḥ kathayati--ārya, bhakṣa tvamapi tāvat/
S01divyav_u:5925: sa kathayati--yadi te mahātman parityaktaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:5926: 147.013 tatastena gṛhapatinā saṃlakṣayitvā yenāhāreṇaikasya bhikṣoḥ paryāptaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:5927: tāvadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ gṛhītvā taṃ dharmaruciṃ pariveṣayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5931: 147.016 tena ucyate--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? sa kathayati--mahātman, yadi te parityaktam/
S01divyav_u:5932: tatastena gṛhapatinā bhūyastasmāt śakaṭādyena bhikṣudvayasyāhāreṇa paryāptaṃ syāt,
S01divyav_u:5936: 147.019 tenoktam--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? sa kathayati--mahātman, yadi te parityaktam/
S01divyav_u:5937: 147.020 yatastasmācchakaṭādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā trayāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paryāptaṃ syāditi punarbhojayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5939: pṛṣṭah--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? sa kathayati--yadi te parityaktam/
S01divyav_u:5940: 147.022 yataḥ sa gṛhapatistasmādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā yena caturṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paryāptaṃ syāditi punarbhojayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5942: pṛṣṭah--ārya, punarbhokṣyase? bhūyaḥ sa kathayati--yadi te parityaktam/
S01divyav_u:5947: 147.026 vistareṇa yāvaddaśānāṃ bhikṣūṇāmannapānena paryāptaṃ syāt, tāvad bhuktvā naiva tṛpyate/
S01divyav_u:5949: 147.027 yataḥ śrūyate pañcabhir nīlavāsaso yakṣaśatairjetavanamaśūnyamiti teṣāṃ bhaviṣyatyeva anyatamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5950: 147.028 iti saṃcintya garbharūpāṇi gṛhe 'nupraveśayituṃ pravṛttah--gacchatha yūyaṃ śīghraṃ gṛhameva,
S01divyav_u:5952: 147.029 sa gṛhajanaṃ visarjya maraṇabhayabhītastasmāt śakaṭādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā pariveṣayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5957: 148.002 tasmānnagarāt piṇḍapātanirhārako bhikṣu tasyaiva piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:5959: tasya dharmarucer na kadācidyato jātasya kuṣkiṃ pūrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5961: 148.004 tasya ca gṛhapater nagaraṃ praviśato 'bhimukhaṃ bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaḥ saṃprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5963: ahaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamuddiśya pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ tṛptitaḥ śakaṭamannapānasya pūrayitvā jetavanaṃ gato buddhapramyukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:5964: 148.007 na ca me tatra bhikṣavo labdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5966: tena samākhyātaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamantargṛham upanimantraṇaṃ praviṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:5968: 148.009 yatastasya mamānupūrveṇa sarvaṃ tadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:5970: 148.010 kiṃ bhagavan manuṣyo 'tha vā amanuṣyah? bhagavatābhihitam--gṛhapate, bhikṣuḥ sa dharmarucir nāṃnā/
S01divyav_u:5971: 148.011 prāmodyamutpādaya, adya sa tvadīyenānnapānnena tṛpto 'rhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati//
S01divyav_u:5973: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--ko 'sau dānapatirbhaviṣyati yo 'sau dharmaruceretāvatā āhāreṇa pratidivasam yogodvahanaṃ kariṣyati?
S01divyav_u:5976: yato bhagavānāha--gṛhāṇa madīyaṃ cīvarakarṇikam, paścāt te 'haṃ mahāsamudraṃ darśayāmi/
S01divyav_u:5978: paścādbhagavān vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ sahacittotpādāt ṛddhyā dharmaruciṃ gṛhītvā samudrataṭamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5979: 148.017 yasmiṃścāsya sthāne timitimiṃgilabhūtasyāsthaśakalā tiṣṭhati, tatra nītvā sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5982: 148.019 kimetat kāṣṭhaṃ syādathāsthiśakalā, atha phalakinī syāt/
S01divyav_u:5985: sa itaścāmutaśca tasyā anupārśvanaṃ tāṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ śramamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:5987: 148.022 tasyaitadabhavat--nāhamasya vyaktiṃ jñāsyāmi kimetaditi, na ca paryantamāsādayiṣye/
S01divyav_u:5989: 148.023 yato 'sau bhagavato 'ntikaṃ gatvā bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--kiṃ tadbhagavan?
S01divyav_u:5992: 148.025 sa kathayati--bhagavan, evaṃvidho 'sau sattvo yasyedṛśī asthiśakalā?
S01divyav_u:5995: dharmarucistaṃ śrutvā bhagavadvaco vyākulitacetāḥ kathayati--mamaiṣedṛśī asthiśakalā?
S01divyav_u:5998: yato 'sya bhagavatā avavādo dattah--dharmaruce, idaṃ cedaṃ manasikuru/
S01divyav_u:5999: 148.029 ityuktvā bhagavān vitatapakṣa iva rājahaṃsa ṛddhyā jetavanamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6000: 148.030 atha dharmarucinā cintayatā manasikāramanutiṣṭhatā uṣmagatānyutpāditāni murdhānaḥ kṣāntayo laukikā agradharmā darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārgaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6005: 149.003 samanvāhartumātmanaḥ pūrvajātiṃ pravṛttah--kuto hyahaṃ cyutaḥ, kutropapanna iti/
S01divyav_u:6010: 149.006 sa evaṃ saṃlakṣya duṣkarakārako bata me bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:6011: 149.007 yadi ca bhagavatā mamaivaikasyārthe 'nuttarā samyaksambodhiradhigatā syāt,
S01divyav_u:6015: tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:6018: 149.011 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat/
S01divyav_u:6019: 149.012 ekāntaniṣaṇṇo bhagavatā abhihitah--cirasya dharmaruce? dharmaricirāha--cirasya bhagavan/
S01divyav_u:6022_0: 149.015 yato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--bhagavan
S01divyav_u:6022_1: dharmarucirihaiva śrāvastyāṃ jāto 'sminneva jetavane pravrajito na kutaścidāgato na kutracidgataḥ /
S01divyav_u:6027: evamukte bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--na bhikṣavaḥ pratyutpannaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi/
S01divyav_u:6030: icchatha bhikṣavo 'sya dharmaruceḥ pūrvikāṃ karmaplotimārabhya dhārmikathāṃ śrotum?
S01divyav_u:6032: etasya sugata samayo yadbhagavān dharmarucimārabhya bhikṣūṇāṃ dhārmikathāṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:6034_0: 149.023 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani prathame 'saṃkhyeye kṣemaṃkaro nāma tathāgato
S01divyav_u:6034_1: loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
S01divyav_u:6036: tasyāṃ ca kṣemāvatyāṃ kṣemo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:6037: 149.026 tasyāṃ ca kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanyatamo vaṇikśreṣṭhī prativasati/
S01divyav_u:6038: 149.027 tenāsau kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ traimāsān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena sarvopakaraṇairupasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6040: bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya tasmācca ratnānyānīya saṃghe pañcavārṣikaṃ kariṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:6041: 149.029 evaṃ saṃcintya bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya grāmanigamapallīpattanarājadhānīṣvanupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇaḥ samudramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6043: 149.031 asya tasmin mahāsamudre 'vatīrṇasya kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalambuddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6046: sa ca śreṣṭhī saṃsiddhayānapātreṇa devatāmānuṣyaparigṛhītena tasmānmahāsamudrāt tīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6047: 150.002 uttīrya ca taṃ bhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiśca cotkṣipya anupūrveṇa saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6048: 150.003 sa ca panthānaṃ gacchan prātipathikān pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto jānīdhvaṃ kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ pravṛttih?
S01divyav_u:6050: 150.004 sa kathayati--asti kaścit kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ kṣemaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddhah?
S01divyav_u:6051: te kathayanti--parinirvṛtaḥ sa bhagavān kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6054: 150.007 tasmācca jalābhiṣekeṇa pratyāgataprāṇo jīvita utthāya bhūyaḥ pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto jānīdhvaṃ śrāvakā api tāvattasya bhagavatastiṣṭhanti?
S01divyav_u:6056: 150.009 saptāhaparinirvṛtasya ca buddhasya bhagavataḥ kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya kṣemeṇa rājñā caityamalpeśākhyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam/
S01divyav_u:6057: 150.010 tena ca gatvā śreṣṭhinā janapadāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6058: asti bhavantastasya bhagavato buddhasya kiṃcit stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam/
S01divyav_u:6059: 150.011 tairuktam--asti, kṣemeṇa rājñā alpeśākhyaṃ caityaṃ pratiṣṭhapitam/
S01divyav_u:6060: 150.012 tasya etadabhavat--etaṃ mayā suvarṇaṃ kṣemaṃkaraṃ samyaksambuddham uddiśyānītam/
S01divyav_u:6062: yannvahametenaiva suvarṇena tasyaiva bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:6067: ahametenaiva suvarṇenaitat tasya bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:6069: 150.017 tato brāhmaṇā nagaraṃ prati nivāsinaḥ saṃbhūya sarve tasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti--bho mahāśreṣṭhin,
S01divyav_u:6073: idānīṃ tu tasya parinirvṛtasya vayameva dakṣiṇīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6075: sa teṣāṃ kathayati--nāham yuṣmākametat suvarṇaṃ dāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:6076: 150.021 te kathayanti--yadyasmākaṃ na dāsyasi, na vayaṃ tava kāmakāraṃ dāsyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6078: teṣāṃ tathā vyutpadyatāṃ na lebhe taccaityam yathepsitaṃ tena suvarṇena kārayitum/
S01divyav_u:6079: 150.023 atha sa śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--mahārāja,
S01divyav_u:6080: taccaityaṃ na labhe brāhmaṇānāṃ sakāśādyathābhipretaṃ kārayitum/
S01divyav_u:6082: 150.025 evaṃ ca rājñā svapuruṣa ājñaptah--yadyasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidapanayaṃ karoti,
S01divyav_u:6084: 150.026 evaṃ deveti sahasrayodhī puruṣo rājñaḥ pratiśrutya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6085: 150.027 nirgamya ca tān brāhmaṇānevaṃ vadati--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6086: ahaṃ rājñāsya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ svapuruṣo dattah--yadyasya stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidvighātaṃ kuryāt,
S01divyav_u:6087: sa tvayā mahatā daṇḍena śāsayitavya iti/
S01divyav_u:6088: 150.029 yadi yūyamatra kiṃcid vighnaṃ kariṣyatha, ahaṃ vo mahatā daṇḍenānuśāsayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:6089: 150.030 te brāhmaṇāḥ sahasrayodhinaḥ puruṣasyaivaṃ śrutvā bhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6090_0: yatastena mahāśreṣṭhinā saṃcintya yathaitat suvarṇaṃ tatraiva garbhasaṃsthaṃ syāt
S01divyav_u:6090_1: tathā kartavyamiti tasya stūpasya sarvaireva caturbhiḥ pārśvaiḥ pratikaṇṭhukayā catvāri
S01divyav_u:6091: 150.032 yāvadanupūrveṇa[151] prathamā meḍhī tato 'nupūrveṇa dvitīyā tatastṛtīyā meḍhī yāvadanupūrveṇāṇḍam/
S01divyav_u:6092: 151.001 tathāvidhaṃ ca stūpasyāṇḍaṃ kṛtam yatra sā yūpayaṣṭirabhyantare pratipāditā/
S01divyav_u:6096: 151.004 tatra ca kriyamāṇe sahasrayodhinaḥ puruṣasyaivamutpannam--nātra kaścididānīṃ prahariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:6098: tena ca mahāśreṣṭhinā tasya stūpasya caturbhiḥ pārśvaiścatvāro dvārakoṣṭhakā māpitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6104: tatra ca vividhāni jalajāni mālyāni ropitāni tadyathā utpalaṃ padmaṃ kumudaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ sugandhikaṃ mṛdugandhikam/
S01divyav_u:6105: 151.010 vividhāni ca puṣkariṇītīreṣu sthalajāni mālyāni ropitāni,
S01divyav_u:6111: ye tasmiṃścaitye gandhairdhūpairmālyaiśca cūrṇaiḥ kārāḥ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:6114: dakṣiṇena vāyunā sarvapuṣpajātīnāṃ gandhena taccaityamaṅgaṇaṃ cāsya sphuṭaṃ bhavatyanubhāvitam/
S01divyav_u:6115: 151.016 evaṃ paścimena vāyunā, anupūrveṇāpi ca vāyunā/
S01divyav_u:6116: vāyatā vāyatā taccaityāṅgaṇaṃ ca tena vividhena gandhamālyena sphuṭaṃ bhavatyanubhāvitam/
S01divyav_u:6118: 151.018 sa taṃ stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvajātakṛtaniṣṭhitaṃ kathayati--asmiṃścaitye kārāṃ kṛtvā kimavāpyate?
S01divyav_u:6119: yato 'sau śreṣṭhī buddhodāharaṇaṃ pravṛttaḥ kartum--evaṃ tribhirasaṃkhyeyairvīryeṇa vyāyamatā anuttarā bodhiravāpyate/
S01divyav_u:6120: 151.020 sa taṃ śrutvā viṣādamāpanno hīnotsāhatayā kathayati--nāhaṃ śakṣyāmi anuttarāṃ samyaksambodhiṃ samudānayitum/
S01divyav_u:6121_0: 151.021 tato 'sau śreṣṭhī pratyekabuddhodāharaṇaṃ pravṛttaḥ kartum--evaṃ sahasrayodhī
S01divyav_u:6121_1: tasyāpi varṇodāharaṇaṃ śrutvā viṣaṇṇacetāḥ kathayati--etāmapyahaṃ pratyekabodhiṃ
S01divyav_u:6122: 151.023 tataḥ sa mahāśreṣṭhī śrāvakavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--asminnapi tāvat praṇidhatsva cittam/
S01divyav_u:6123: 151.024 yataḥ sahasrayodhyāha--tvayā punarmahāśreṣṭhin katamasyāṃ bodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam?
S01divyav_u:6125: 151.026 sahasrayodhyāha--yadi tvayā anuttarasyāṃ bodhau cittamutpāditam, ahaṃ tavaiva śrāvakaḥ syām/
S01divyav_u:6128: 151.028 kiṃ tu loke yadā tvaṃ buddhotpādaśabdaṃ śrutvā smṛtiṃ pratilabhethāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6129: 151.029 sa ca śreṣṭhī taṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā nirīkṣya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ karoti--
S01divyav_u:6130: 151.030 anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:6133: ahameva sa tasmin samaye bodhisattvacaryāṃ vartāmi/
S01divyav_u:6134: 152.002 yo 'sau sahasrayodhī, eṣa eva dharmarucistena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:6138: 152.005 dvitīye dīpaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddho loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasamyaksambuddhaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:6139: 152.006 atha dīpamakaraḥ samyaksambuddho janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran dvīpāvatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6140: 152.007 dvīpāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dvīpo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:6141: 152.009 tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6142: 152.010 tasya ca dīpasya rājño vāsavo nāma sāmantarājo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:6144: iha mayā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6146: 152.012 tadā ca vāsavena rājñā dvādaśavarṣāṇi yajñamiṣṭvā yajñāvasāne rājñā pañca mahāpradānāni vyavasthāpitāni,
S01divyav_u:6152: 152.014 tena khalu samayena anyeṣu janapadeṣu dvau māṇavakau prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6155: 152.017 tābhyāṃ ca śrutaṃ vāsavena rājñā pañca mahāpradānāni yajñāvasāne samudānītāni,
S01divyav_u:6156: yo brāhmaṇaḥ svādhyāyasampanno bhaviṣyati sa lapsyatīti/
S01divyav_u:6158: 152.019 ko 'smākaṃ tatra bahuśrutatamo vā svādhyāyatamo bhaviṣyatīti saṃcintya yena vāsavasya rājño mahānagaraṃ tena saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:6160: yau etau dvau māṇavakau āgacchataḥ sumatiśca matiśca, anayordvayoḥ sumateretatpradānaṃ dada/
S01divyav_u:6161: 152.021 yadevaṃ dvau māṇakakau āgacchataḥ sumitaśca matiśca, anayordvayoḥ sumateretatpradānaṃ dada/
S01divyav_u:6162: yadevaṃ mahārāja tvayā dvādaśa varṣāṇi yajña iṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6164: 152.023 sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--nūnametau mahātmānau yeṣāmāmarthāya devatā apyārocayanti/
S01divyav_u:6165: 152.024 yato 'sau rājā paśyati māṇavakau dūrata evāgacchantau agrasanamībhiruhyavasthitau/
S01divyav_u:6166: 152.025 yato rājā vāsavastyau sumatiṃ māṇavaṃ pṛcchati--bhavān sumati? tenoktam--aham/
S01divyav_u:6167: 152.028 yato rājā vāsavaḥ sumatiṃ māṇavamagrāsane bhojayitvā pañca pradānāni prayacchati/
S01divyav_u:6171: yataḥ sā kanyā sumatiṃ māṇavaṃ prāsādikamabhirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā lubdhā snehotpannā,
S01divyav_u:6174: yataḥ sā kanyā rājñā pradānabuddhyā parityaktā [153]na punargṛhītā,
S01divyav_u:6175: sumatināpi māṇavenāpratigṛhyamāṇā rājño dīpasya dīpāvatīṃ nagarīṃ gatā/
S01divyav_u:6176: 153.002 sā tatra gatvā tadātmīyamalaṃkāraṃ śarīrādavatārya mālākārāyānuprayacchati--asyālaṃkārasya mūlyaṃ me pratidivasaṃ devasyārthe nīlotpalāni dadasva/
S01divyav_u:6177: 153.003 sā tenopakrameṇa tadalaṃkārikaṃ suvarṇaṃ datvā devaśuśraūṣikā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:6178: 153.004 sa ca māṇavakaḥ sumatistāni catvāri mahāpradānāni gṛhya upādhyāyasakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6180: 153.006 tebhyaścopādhyāyastrīṇi pratigṛhṇāti, kārṣāpaṇānāṃ tu pañca śatāni tasyaiva sumaterdadāti/
S01divyav_u:6181: sa ca sumatistasyāmeva rātrau daśa svapnānadrākṣīt--mahāsamudraṃ pibāmi,
S01divyav_u:6183: imau candrādityau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi,
S01divyav_u:6190: 153.010 pratibuddhasyaitadabhavat--ka eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ mama vyākaraṇaṃ kariṣyati?
S01divyav_u:6192: 153.011 atha sumatirmāṇavaḥ saṃśayanirṇayanārtham ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6193: 153.012 sumatistasya ṛṣeḥ pratisaṃmodanaṃ kṛtvā svapnānākhyāyāha--kuruṣva me eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ nirṇayam/
S01divyav_u:6196: tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6198: 153.015 atha vāsavo rājā tasya dīpasya rājñaḥ pratiśrutya aśītyamātyasahasraparivṛto dīpāvatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6199_0: 153.016 tena ca dīpena rājñā saptamāddivasāddīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya sābhisaṃskāreṇa
S01divyav_u:6199_1: nagarapraveśaṃ kariṣyāmīti sarvaviṣayādhiṣṭhānāñca sarvapuṣpāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
S01divyav_u:6200: 153.018 tatra ca yasmin divase rājñā dīpena tasya dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśa ārabdhaḥ kartum,
S01divyav_u:6203: sā ca devopasthāyikā dārikā mālākārasakāśaṃ gatā--prayaccha me nīlotpalāni, devārcanaṃ kariṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:6204: 153.022 mālākāra āha--adya rājñā sarvapuṣpāṇi gṛhītāni dīpaṃkaranagarapraveśasyārthe/
S01divyav_u:6206: punarapi tatra puṣkiriṇyām yadi matpuṇyair nīlotpalapadmamanuddhṛtamāsādyeta/
S01divyav_u:6207: 153.023 tatra puṣkiriṇyāṃ sumateḥ puṇyānubhāvāt sapta nīlapadmāni prādurbhūtāni/
S01divyav_u:6208: 153.024 yataḥ sa mālākāro gataḥ, sa tāni paśyati/
S01divyav_u:6215: yataḥ sā dārikā kathayati--madīyaiḥ puṇyairetāni prādurbhūtāni, prayacchoddhṛtāni mama/
S01divyav_u:6219: tena mālākāreṇaivaṃ śrutvā tasyā dārikayāstānyuddhṛtya anupradattāni/
S01divyav_u:6220: 153.031 sā tāni gṛhītvā udakakumbhe prakṣipya tatkumbhamudakasya pūrayitvā adhiṣṭhānaṃ gatā prasthitā/
S01divyav_u:6223: sa mālākāragṛhāṇyanvāhiṇḍati sarvapuṣpānveṣaṇaparaḥ, na ca kiṃcidekapuṣpamāsādayati/
S01divyav_u:6227: sā ca dārikā tasmādudyānāt tasya sumatermāṇavasyābhimukhamāgatā/
S01divyav_u:6229: 154.005 yatastāni sumatirdṛṣṭvā tasyā dārikāyāḥ kathayati--prayaccha mamaitāni padmāni/
S01divyav_u:6231: sā dārikā tasya sumateḥ kathayati--tadā necchasi māṃ pratigṛhītum/
S01divyav_u:6234: 154.008 evamuktvā taṃ sumatiṃ māṇavamuvāca--kimebhiḥ kariṣyasi? sumatirāha--buddhaṃ bhagavantamarcayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:6237: yadi tvameṣāṃ padmānāṃ pradānaphalena mamāpi jātyāṃ jātyāṃ patnīmicchasi,
S01divyav_u:6238: asya dānasya pradānakāle yadyevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ karoṣi--jātyāṃ jātyāṃ mama bhāryā syāditi/
S01divyav_u:6239: 154.011 sumatirāha--vayaṃ dānābhiratāḥ svagarbharūpaparityāgaṃ svamāṃsaparityāgaṃ ca kurmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6240: 154.012 tataḥ sā dārikā sumateḥ kathayati--tvamevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kuru,
S01divyav_u:6243: 154.013 evamukte tayā dārikayā tasya sumateḥ pañca padmānyanupradattāni, ātmanā dve gṛhīte/
S01divyav_u:6246: 154.016 tatra te 'haṃ bhavet patnī nityaṃ sahadharmacāriṇī//2//
S01divyav_u:6249: 154.020 sa ca rājā śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ gṛhītvā dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6251: evameva vāsavo rājā amātyaiḥ saha pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6252: dīpo rājā bhagavato buddhasya pādayor nipatya vijñāpayati--bhagavan, adhiṣṭhānaṃ praviśa/
S01divyav_u:6254: 154.023 sa ca rājā dīpaḥ śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya dhārayati/
S01divyav_u:6256: bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā ekaikaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ahaṃ bhagavataśchatraṃ dhārayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:6258: 154.026 tatra bhagavatā sābhisaṃskāra indrakīle pādo vyavasthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6260: tadaiva samanantarakālaṃ pṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā--calitā pracalitā saṃpracalitā,
S01divyav_u:6262: 154.028 dharmatā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām yadendrakīle sābhisaṃskāreṇa pādau vyavasthāpayanti,
S01divyav_u:6283: padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagurucūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi divyāni mandāravāṇi puṣpāṇi kṣipanti,
S01divyav_u:6290: 155.009 tatra ca dīpāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi puṣpairdhūpairgandhaiśca kārāṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:6291: 155.010 te 'pi ca sumatiśca dārikā ca yena dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhastenānugacchanti padmāni gṛhya/
S01divyav_u:6292: 155.011 te ca tatra mahājanakāyena pūjārthaṃ saṃparivṛtasya bhagavata upaśleṣaṃ na labhante/
S01divyav_u:6293: 155.012 bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--bahutaraṃ sumatirmāṇavo 'smānmahājanakāyāt puṇyaprasavaṃ kariṣyati iti/
S01divyav_u:6296: labdhāvakāśaśca sumatirmāṇavo bhagavantamasecanakadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā atīva prasādajātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6297: 155.015 prasādajātena ca tāni pañca padmāni bhagavataḥ kṣiptāni/
S01divyav_u:6298: 155.016 tāni ca bhagavatā dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena tathā adhiṣṭhitāni,
S01divyav_u:6301: 155.018 tathā dṛṣṭvā tayā dārikayā prasādajātayā dvau padmau bhagavataḥ kṣiptau/
S01divyav_u:6302: tau cāpi bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitau yathā śakaṭīcakramātrau karṇasamīpe vitānaṃ baddhvā vyavasthitau/
S01divyav_u:6303: 155.019 tatra ca pradeśe tumulena vātavarṣeṇa kardamo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6304: 155.020 paścāt sumatirmāṇavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sakardamaṃ pṛthivīpradeśamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6305: 155.021 tasmin sakardame pṛthivīpradeśe jātaṃ saṃtīrya bhagavato bhagavataḥ purato gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:6308: 155.024 tatastena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena samyaksambuddhena tasya sumatermāṇavasya jaṭāsu pādau vyavasthāpitau/
S01divyav_u:6309: 155.025 tasya ca sumateḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubuddha eva matirmāṇavastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:6311: anena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhenāsya sumatermāṇavasya tiraścām yathā padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6312: 155.027 paścāt dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena sumatirmāṇavo vyākṛtah--bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ nṛbhavādvimukto mukto vimurlokahitāya śāstā/
S01divyav_u:6313: 155.030 śākyātmajaḥ śākyamunīti nāṃnā trilokasāro jagataḥ pradīpaḥ//4//
S01divyav_u:6314: 156.001 [156]yadā ca sa sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6316: 156.002 tāścāsya jaṭāḥ śīrṇāḥ, anyāḥ praviśiṣṭatarā jaṭāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6318: dṛṣṭvā ca praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yadā anenānuttarajñānamadhigataṃ tadāsya vayaṃ śrāvakā bhavema/
S01divyav_u:6323: 156.008 śrāvikā te bhaviṣyāmi tasmin kāla upasthite//6//
S01divyav_u:6324: 156.009 khagasthaṃ māṇavaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasrāṇi śatāni ca/
S01divyav_u:6328: 156.013 yadā ca sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ, tadāsya dīpena rājñā jaṭā gṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6334: tena rājñā teṣāṃ bhṛtyānāmekaiko vālo dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6335: 156.017 tairamātyaiḥ svake vijite gatvā caityāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni/
S01divyav_u:6337: tadā dīpena rājñā vāsavena ca rājñā tairanekaiśca naigamajānapadaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārito 'nāgataguṇāvekṣatayā/
S01divyav_u:6338: 156.019 tataḥ sa matirmāṇava ucyate--ahamanuttarasyāṃ samyaksambodhau vyākṛtah--tvayā kutra cittamutpāditam?
S01divyav_u:6341: tataḥ sa kathayati--yadā tava dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6342: tadā kupitena vāg niścāritā--dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena śrotriyasya jaṭā tiraścām yathā padbhyāmavaṣṭabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6343: 156.023 yatastasya sumatiḥ kathayati--āgacchasva, buddhasya bhagavato 'ntike pravrajāvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6344: 156.024 tatastau sumatirmatiśca dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajitau/
S01divyav_u:6345: 156.025 sumatinā ca pravrajya trīpi piṭakānyadhītāni, dharmeṇa parṣat saṃgṛhītā/
S01divyav_u:6346: 156.026 sa ca sumatirmāṇavaścyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6348: 156.028 bhagavānāha--yo 'sau vāsavo rājābhūt tena kālena tena samayena, sa rājā bimbisāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:6349: 156.029 yāni tānyaśītiramātyasahasrāṇi tena kālena tena samayena, tānyetarhyaśītirdevatāsahasrāṇi/
S01divyav_u:6350: 156.030 yo 'sau dīpāvatīyako janakāyaḥ, yāsau dārikā, eṣaiva sā yaśodharā/
S01divyav_u:6351: yo 'sau sumatiḥ, ahameva tasmin samaye bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartāmi/
S01divyav_u:6352: 156.031 yo 'sau matiḥ, eṣa eva sa dharmaruciḥ/
S01divyav_u:6353: 157.001 [157]etaddvitīye 'saṃkhyeye asya ca dharmarucermama ca darśanam yadahaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi--cirasya dharmaruce,
S01divyav_u:6355_0: 157.003 tasmādapyārvāk tṛtīye 'saṃkhyeye krakucchando nāma samyaksambuddho loka utpanno
S01divyav_u:6355_1: vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S01divyav_u:6358: 157.006 sa ca kalatrasahāyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:6359: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6362: sa ca gṛhapatistāṃ patnīmevamāha--jāto 'smākam ṛṇadharo dhanaharaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6364: 157.009 sa ca vaṇiglokenāvṛto dūrataraṃ gato bhāṇḍamādāya/
S01divyav_u:6366: 157.010 sa ca dārakaḥ kālāntareṇa mahān saṃvṛtto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6367: 157.011 tato 'sau mātaraṃ pṛcchati--amba, kimasmākaṃ kulārthāgataṃ karma?
S01divyav_u:6368: sā kathayati--vatsa, pitā tava āpaṇaṃ vāhayannāsīt/
S01divyav_u:6370: sā ca mātā asya kleśairbādhyamānā cintayituṃ pravṛttā--ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ kleśān vinodayeyam,
S01divyav_u:6373: yathā anenaiva me sārdhaṃ rogavinodakaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:6375: 157.016 tatastayā vṛddhayuvatī āhūya bhojayitvā dvis triḥ paścānnavena paṭenācchāditā/
S01divyav_u:6376: tasyāḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--kena kāryeṇaiva mamānuprasādādinā upakrameṇānupravṛttiṃ karoṣi?
S01divyav_u:6377: sā tasyā vṛddhāyā viśvastā bhūtvā evamāha--amba, śṛṇu vijñāpyam/
S01divyav_u:6380: yo 'bhyantara eva syānna ca śaṅkanīyo janasya/
S01divyav_u:6381: 157.019 vṛddhā kathayati--neha gṛhe tathāvidho manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate,
S01divyav_u:6384: 157.021 katamaḥ sa manuṣyo bhaviṣyati yasyāhaṃ vakṣyāmi?
S01divyav_u:6385: tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī tasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--yadyanyo manuṣya evaṃvidhopakramayukto nāsti,
S01divyav_u:6388: 157.023 tasyāstayā vṛddhayā abhihitam--kathaṃ nu putreṇa sārdhaṃ ratikrīḍāṃ gamiṣyasi?
S01divyav_u:6390: 157.024 tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī kathayati--yadyanyo 'bhyantaro manuṣyo na saṃvidyate, bhavatu eṣa eva me putraḥ/
S01divyav_u:6392: 157.026 tataḥ sā vṛddhayuvatī tasya vaṇijaḥ putrasyaivāgamya pṛcchati--vatsa, taruṇo 'si rūpavāṃśca/
S01divyav_u:6395: tataḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--bhavānevamabhirūpaśca yuvā ca asmin vayasi taruṇayuvatyā sārdhaṃ śobhethāḥ krīḍan raman paricārayan/
S01divyav_u:6398: 157.030 tataḥ sā vṛddhā evaṃ dvirapi trirapi tasya dārakasya kathayati--taruṇayuvatistavārthe kleśairbādhyate/
S01divyav_u:6399: 157.031 sa vaṇigdārako dvirapi trirapyucyamānastasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--amba,
S01divyav_u:6401: tatah [158]sā vṛddhā kathayati--uktaṃ tasyā mayā tannimittam/
S01divyav_u:6403: sā ca dārikā hīvyapatrāpyagṛhītā na kiṃcidvakṣyati/
S01divyav_u:6405: na tvayā tasyā vā anveṣaṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6406: 158.003 tatastena vaṇigdārakeṇa tasyā vṛddhāyā abhihitam--kutrāsmākaṃ saṃgataṃ bhaviṣyati?
S01divyav_u:6408: 158.004 tenoktam--kutrāvakāśe tava gṛham? tato 'sya tayā vṛddhayā gṛhaṃ vyapadiṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:6409: 158.005 sā ca vṛddhā tasyā vaṇikpatnyāḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--icchāpitaḥ sa vo 'yaṃ dārakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6410: 158.006 sā kathayati--kutrāvakāśe saṃgataṃ bhaviṣyati? madīye gṛhe/
S01divyav_u:6411: 158.007 sa ca dārakaḥ kāryāṇi kṛtvā gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6415: sa dārako labdhānujñastasyā vṛddhāyā gṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6416: 158.009 tasya dārakasya tasmin gṛhe gatasya ratikrīḍākālamāgamayamānasya tiṣṭhato niśikālamapratyabhijñātam/
S01divyav_u:6417: 158.010 rūpe kāle sā mātā asya vaṇigdārakasya tasminneva gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavanārthaṃ tatraiva gatā/
S01divyav_u:6418: 158.011 gatvā ca tasmin gṛhe vikālamavyaktiṃ vibhāvyamāne rūpākṛtau nirgūḍhenopacārakrameṇa ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhavituṃ pravṛttā pāpakenāsaddharmeṇa/
S01divyav_u:6419: 158.013 sā ca parikṣīṇāyāṃ rātrau anubhūtaratikrīḍā satamondhakāre kālāyāmeva rajanyāmavibhāvyamānarūpākṛtau svagṛhaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:6420: 158.014 sa cāpi vaṇigdārako ratikrīḍāmanubhūya prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhāṇḍāvāriṃ gatvā kuṭumbakāryāṇi karoti/
S01divyav_u:6422_0: tatra vṛddhāyā gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavaṃśca cirakālamevaṃ vartamānena ratikrīḍākrameṇa
S01divyav_u:6425_0: 158.019 iti saṃcintya tatraiva vṛddhāgṛhe gatvā ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhūya
S01divyav_u:6425_1: rajanyāḥ kṣaye satamondhakārakāle tasya dārakasyoparimaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ nivasyātmanīyāṃ
S01divyav_u:6426: 158.021 sa ca dārakaḥ prabhāakāle tāṃ paṭṭikāṃ śirasi mañcasyāvatiṣṭhantīṃ saṃpaśyati/
S01divyav_u:6427: 158.022 ātmīyāmevopariprāvaraṇapotrīmalabhamānastatraiva tāṃ paṭṭikāṃ saṃlakṣya tyaktvā bhāṇḍāvārīṃ gatvā yugalamanyaṃ prāvṛtya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6428: 158.023 tatra ca gataḥ saṃpaśyati tamevātmīyaṃ pravaraṇaṃ tasyā mātuḥ śirasi prāvṛtam/
S01divyav_u:6429: 158.024 dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ mātaraṃ pṛcchati--amba, kuto 'yaṃ śirasi prāvaraṇo 'bhyāgatah?
S01divyav_u:6431: evaṃ cirakālaṃ tava mayā sārdhaṃ kāmān paribhuñjato 'dyāpyahaṃ tava saivāmbā?
S01divyav_u:6432: yataḥ sa vaṇigdārakastathāvidhaṃ mātṛvacanamupaśrutya saṃmūḍho vihvalacetā bhūmau nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6434: sa jalapariṣekāvasikto dārakaścireṇa kālena pratyāgataprāṇastayā mātrā samāśvāsyate--kimevaṃ khedamupāgatastvam?
S01divyav_u:6437: sa dārakastasyāḥ kathayati--kathamahaṃ khedaṃ na kariṣyāmi saṃmohaṃ vā,
S01divyav_u:6438: yena mayā evaṃvidhaṃ pāpakaṃ karma kṛtam?
S01divyav_u:6439: tataḥ sa tayābhihitah--na te manaḥśūkaṃsdminnarthe utpādayitavyam/
S01divyav_u:6441: yenaivaṃ hi yathā pitā gacchati, putro 'pi tenaiva gacchati/
S01divyav_u:6442: 158.032 na cāsau panthā putrasyānugacchato doṣakārako [159]bhavati, evameva mātṛgrāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6446: na ca tīryaṃ putrasya snāyato doṣakārakaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:6448: api ca pratyanteṣu janapadeṣu dharmataivaiṣā yasyāmeva pitā asaddharmeṇābhigacchati,
S01divyav_u:6450: 159.004 evamasau vaṇigdārako mātrā bahuvidhairanunayavacanairvinītaśokastayā mātrā tasmin pātake 'saddharme punaḥ punaratīva saṃjātarāgaḥ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6454: sā vaṇikpatnī tathāvidhaṃ lekhārthaṃ śrutvā vaimanasyajātā cintayituṃ pravṛttā--mahāntaṃ kālaṃ mama tasyāgamanamudīkṣamāṇāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6456: 159.008 idānīṃ mayā evaṃvidhenopakrameṇa putraṃ ca paricaritvā sa cāgamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:6457: ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ tamihāsamprāptameva jīvitāt vyaparopayeyam?
S01divyav_u:6458: iti saṃcintya taṃ putramāhūya kathayati--pitrā te lekhyo 'nupreṣitah āgamiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:6459: 159.010 jājase 'smābhiridānīṃ kiṃ karaṇīyamiti? gacchasva, pitaramasamprāptameva ghātaya/
S01divyav_u:6461: yadā asau na prasahate pitṛvadhaṃ kartum,
S01divyav_u:6462: tadā tayā mātrā bhūyo 'nuvṛttivacanairabhihitah--tasyānuvṛttivacanairucyamānasya kāmeṣu saṃraktasyādhyavasāyo jātaḥ pitṛvadhaṃ prati/
S01divyav_u:6463: 159.013 kāmān khalu pratisevato na hi kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karmākaraṇīyamiti vadāmi/
S01divyav_u:6465: 159.015 ityuktvā viṣamādāya samitāyāṃ miśrayitvā maṇḍilakān paktvā anye 'pi ca nirviṣāḥ paktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6468: gṛhya pitṛsakāśaṃ gatvā ca tasya viśvastasyaikatra bhuñjata etān saviṣān maṇḍilakān prayacchasva,
S01divyav_u:6470: 159.018 tataḥ sa dārakastena lekhavāhikamanuṣyeṇa sārdhaṃ tān maṇḍilakān gṛhya gataḥ pitṛsakāśam/
S01divyav_u:6471: 159.019 āgamya pitā asya atīva taṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā abhirūpaprāsādikaṃ maheśākhyaṃ prāmodyaṃ prāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6472: 159.020 sahyāsahyaṃ pṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ vaṇijāmākhyāti--ayaṃ bhavanto 'smākaṃ putraḥ/
S01divyav_u:6473: 159.021 yadā tena dārakeṇa saṃlakṣitaṃ sarvatra ahamanena pitrā pratisaṃvedita iti,
S01divyav_u:6477: paścāttena pitrā sārdhamekaphalāyāṃ bhuñjatā tasya pituḥ saviṣā maṇḍilakā dattāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6479: 159.024 yato 'sya pitā tān saviṣān maṇḍilakān bhakṣayitvā bhṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6480: 159.025 tasya ca pituḥ kāladharmaṇā yuktasya ca dārako na kenacit pāpakaṃ karma kurvāṇo 'bhiśaṅkito vā pratisaṃvedito vā/
S01divyav_u:6481: 159.026 paścāttairiṣṭasnigdhasuhṛdbhirvaṇigbhiḥ śocayitvā yattattu kiṃcittasya vaṇijo bhaṇḍamāsīddhiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ vā,
S01divyav_u:6483: 159.028 sa dārakastaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ paitṛkaṃ gṛhya svagṛhamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6484: 159.029 tasya ca gatasya svagṛhaṃ sā mātā pracchannāsaddharmeṇa taṃ putraṃ paricaramāṇā ratiṃ nādhigacchati,
S01divyav_u:6485: anabhiratarūpā ca taṃ putraṃ vadati--kiyatkālaṃ vayamevaṃ pracchannena krameṇa ratikrīḍāmanubhaviṣyāmah?
S01divyav_u:6486: yannu vayamasmāddeśādanyadeśāntaraṃ gatvā prakāśakrameṇa niḥśaṅkā bhūtvā jāyāpatīti vikhyātadharmāṇaḥ sukhaṃ prativasema/
S01divyav_u:6487: 159.032 tatastau gṛhaṃ tyaktvā [160]mitrasvajanasambandhivargānapahāya purāṇadāsīdāsakarmakarāṃstyaktvā yāvadarthajātaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ca gṛhya anyaviṣayāntaraṃ gatau/
S01divyav_u:6488: 160.002 tatra gatvā janapadeṣu vikhyāpayamānau jāyāpatikamiti ratikrīḍāmanubhavamānau vyavasthitau/
S01divyav_u:6489: 160.003 yāvadarhan bhikṣuḥ kenacit kālāntareṇa janapadacārikāṃ caraṃs tamadhiṣṭhānamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6490: 160.004 tena tatra piṇḍapātamanvāhiṇḍatā vīthyāṃ niṣadya ayaṃ vaṇigdharmaṇā saṃvyavahāramāṇaḥ sa dārako dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6492: sa ca dārakastamarhantaṃ tathā abhivadamānamupaśrutya saṃbhinnacetāḥ svena duścaritena karmaṇā śaṅkitamanāścintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6495: eṣa sa ihādhiṣṭhāne pratisaṃvedayiṣyati eṣā asya dārakasya māteti/
S01divyav_u:6498: tatastayoḥ saṃcintya taṃ gṛhamenamupanimantrayitvā bhuñjānaṃ ghātayāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6500: 160.011 sa dārako gūḍhaśastro bhūtvā arhantaṃ bhojayituṃ mātrā saha nirjanaṃ gṛhaṃ kṛtvā sa cārhadbhikṣubhuktvā tasmādgṛhādviśrabdhacārakrameṇa pratinirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6503: yathā yathā sevyanti, tathā tathā tṛṣṇā vṛddhimupayāti/
S01divyav_u:6504: 160.015 tasya dārakasya sā mātā taṃ putramasaddharmeṇānuvartamānā tasminnevādhiṣṭhāne śreṣṭhiputreṇa sārdhaṃ pracchannakāmā asaddharmeṣu saktacittā jātā/
S01divyav_u:6508: 160.018 sā ca tasmiñ śreṣṭhiputre saṃraktacittā dvirapi trirapyucyamānā na nirvartate/
S01divyav_u:6509: tatastena niṣkoṣamāsiṃ kṛtvā sā mātā jīvitādvyaparopitā/
S01divyav_u:6514: 160.022 sa yadā nirvāsitastasmādadhiṣṭhānāt tadā cintayituṃ pravṛttah--asti cāsya buddhaśāsane kaścidevānunayah?
S01divyav_u:6516: 160.024 sa ca vihāraṃ gatvā bhikṣusakāśamupasaṃkramya evaṃ kathayati--ārya, pravrajeyam/
S01divyav_u:6517: 160.025 tatastena bhikṣuṇā uktam--mā tāvat pitṛghātako 'si? tena bhikṣurabhihitah--asti mayā ghātitaḥ pitā/
S01divyav_u:6518: 160.026 tataḥ punaḥ pṛṣṭah--mā tāvanmātṛghātako 'si? tenoktam--ārya, ghātitā mayā mātā/
S01divyav_u:6519: 160.027 sa bhūyaḥ pṛṣṭah--mā tāvadarhadvadhaste kṛtah? tataḥ sa kathayati--arhannapi ghātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6520: 160.028 tatastena bhikṣuṇā abhihitah--ekaikena eṣāṃ karmāṇāmācaraṇānna pravrajyārho bhavasi,
S01divyav_u:6523: 160.030 tataḥ sa puruṣo 'nyasya bhikṣoḥ sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--ārya pravrajeyam/
S01divyav_u:6528: sa yadā [161]dvirapi trirapi pravrajyāmāyācamāno 'pi bhikṣubhir na pravrājitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6529: tadā amarṣajātaścintayituṃ pravṛttah--yā api sarvasādhāraṇā pravrajyā,
S01divyav_u:6532: 161.003 tasmin vihāre 'gniṃ datvā anyatra vihāraṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6536: 161.005 tatrāpi vihāre bahavo bhikṣavaḥ śaikṣāśaikṣāśca dagdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6537: 161.006 evaṃ tasyānekān vihārān dahataḥ sarvatra śabdo visṛtah--evaṃvidhaścaivaṃvidhaśca pāpakarmakārī puruṣo bhikṣubhyaḥ pravrajyāmalabhan vihārān bhikṣūṃśca dahatīti/
S01divyav_u:6539: 161.008 tatra ca vihāre bodhisattvajātīyo bhikṣuḥ prativasati tṛpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6540: tena śrutaṃ sa evaṃ duṣkarakarmakārī puruṣa ihāgacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:6541: 161.009 yataḥ sa bhikṣustasya puruṣasyāsamprāptasyaiva tasmin vihāre pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6542: 161.010 sa taṃ puruṣaṃ sametya kathayati--bhadramukha, kimetat?
S01divyav_u:6544: 161.011 tatastena bhikṣuṇām uktam--āgaccha vatsa, ahaṃ te pravrājayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:6545: 161.012 paścāt tena bhikṣuṇā tasya puruṣasya śiro muṇḍāpayitvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni/
S01divyav_u:6546: 161.013 paścāt sa puruṣaḥ kathayati--ārya, śikṣāpadāni me 'nuprayaccha/
S01divyav_u:6547: tatastena bhikṣuṇā uktah--kiṃ te śikṣāpadaiḥ prayojanam?
S01divyav_u:6548: evaṃ sarvakālaṃ vadasva--namo buddhāya, namo dharmāya, namaḥ saṃghāyeti/
S01divyav_u:6549: 161.015 paścāt sa bhikṣustasya puruṣasya dharmadeśanāmārabdhaḥ kartum--tvamevaṃvidhaścaivaṃvidhaśca pāpakarmakārī sattvo yadi kadācidbuddhaśabdaṃ śṛṇoṣi,
S01divyav_u:6554: yo 'sau atīte 'dhvani bhikṣus tripiṭah āsa, ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:6555: 161.019 yo 'sau pāpakarmakārī sattvo mātāpitrarhaddhātakaḥ, eṣa eva dharmaruciḥ/
S01divyav_u:6557: tadahaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi--cirasya dharmaruce, sucirasya dharmaruce, suciracirasya dharmaruce/
S01divyav_u:6558: 161.021 yāvacca mayā bhikṣavastribhirasaṃkhyeyaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiranyaiśca duṣkaraśatasahasrairanuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ samudānītā,
S01divyav_u:6564: 162.002 buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:6565: rājagṛhe nagare subhadro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6568: 162.004 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:6569: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:6570: 162.005 bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:6571: 162.006 rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caran yena subhadrasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6573: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6574: 162.008 upasaṃkramya bhagavantamidamavocat--bhagavan, iyaṃ me patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:6581: 162.011 tena bhagavataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūro dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6584: 162.013 sa saṃlakṣayati--yadapyasmākamekaṃ bhikṣakulam, tadapi śramaṇo gautamo 'nvāvartayati/
S01divyav_u:6585: gacchāmi, paśyāmi kiṃ śramaṇena gautamena vyākṛtamiti/
S01divyav_u:6586: 162.014 sa tatra gatvā kathayati--gṛhapate, śramaṇo gautama āgata āsīt? āgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6588: ārya, mayā tasya patnī darśitā--kiṃ janayiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:6593: 162.017 sa bhūriko gaṇitre kṛtāvī śvetavarṇāṃ gṛhītvā gaṇayitumārabdhah--paśyati yathā bhagavatā vyākṛtaṃ tatsarvaṃ tathaiva/
S01divyav_u:6596: 162.020 tadatra kiṃcid saṃvarṇayitavyaṃ kiṃcit vivarṇayitavyamiti viditvā hastau saṃparivartayati,
S01divyav_u:6598: 162.021 subhadro gṛhapatiḥ kathayati--ārya, kiṃ hastausamparivartayasi mukhaṃ ca vibhaṇḍayasīti?
S01divyav_u:6599: sa kathayati--gṛhapate, atra kiṃcit satyaṃ kiṃcinmṛṣā/
S01divyav_u:6600: 162.023 ārya, kiṃ satyaṃ kiṃ vā mṛṣā? gṛhapate, yadanenoktaṃ putraṃ janayiṣyatīti, idaṃ satyaṃ kathayati/
S01divyav_u:6603: mandabhāgyaḥ sa sattvo jātamātra evāgninā kulaṃ dhakṣyati/
S01divyav_u:6604: 162.025 yat kathayati--divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti, idaṃ mṛṣā/
S01divyav_u:6605: 162.026 gehapate, asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭo manuṣyabhūto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhavan?
S01divyav_u:6607: 162.027 yadā asya na bhaktaṃ na vastram, tadā niścayena śramaṇasya gautamasyāntike pravrajiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:6609: 162.029 śramaṇasyaiva tāvadgautamasya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ nāsti, prāgevāsya bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:6610: subhadro viṣādamāpannaḥ kathayati--ārya, atra mayā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti?
S01divyav_u:6614: subhadraḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarvathā parityājyo 'sau iti viditvā sa bhaiṣajyaṃ dātumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6621: asthānametadanavakāśo yaccaramabhavikaḥ sattvo 'ntarāducchidya kālaṃ kariṣyati aprāpte āśravakṣaye/
S01divyav_u:6624: te tvaritatvaritaṃ gatāḥ pṛcchanti--bhavantaḥ, kimiyaṃ gṛhapatipatnī virauti?
S01divyav_u:6630: sā tenāraṇyaṃ nītvā tathopakrāntā yathā kālagatā/
S01divyav_u:6631: sa tāṃ pracchannaṃ gṛhamānīya suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāṃ prātiveśakānāṃ ca kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6634: sā tairvikrośadbhir nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya śītavanaṃ śmaśānamabhinirhṛtā/
S01divyav_u:6635: 163.010 nirgranthaiḥ śrutam--te hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditāśchatrapatākā ucchrayitvā rājagṛhasya nagarasya rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭake upāhiṇḍamānā ārocayanti--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6636: 163.012 śramaṇena gautamena subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:6641: yasya tāvadvṛkṣamūlameva nāsti, kutastasya śākhāpatraphalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti?
S01divyav_u:6643_0: 163.016 dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānāmekārakṣāṇāṃ
S01divyav_u:6644: daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trirdivasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--ko hīyate,
S01divyav_u:6660: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
S01divyav_u:6661: tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti,
S01divyav_u:6664_0: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ
S01divyav_u:6664_1: nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhavamutpalaṃ padma [164]mahāpadmaṃ narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu
S01divyav_u:6666: 164.002 teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, āhosvidanyatropapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:6668: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, nāpyanyatropapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6669: 164.004 api tvayamapūrvadarśanaḥ sattvaḥ, asyānubhāvādasmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti/
S01divyav_u:6670: 164.005 te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:6678: 164.016 atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
S01divyav_u:6686: 164.028 tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:6689: 165.003 yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti nāthāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//7//iti/
S01divyav_u:6691: nāhetupratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:6692: 165.006 gaccha ānanda, bhikṣūṇāmārocaya--tathāgato bhikṣavaḥ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantukāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6693: 165.007 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantum, sa cīvarakāṇi gṛhṇātu/
S01divyav_u:6694: 165.008 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--tathāgata āyuṣmantaḥ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantukāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6695: 165.009 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ śmaśānacārikaṃ gantum, sa cīvarakāṇi gṛhṇātu/
S01divyav_u:6696: 165.010 evamāyuṣmanniti te bhikṣavaḥ sarve saṃśrutya bhagavatsakāśamupagatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6697_0: 165.011 atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra
S01divyav_u:6697_1: āśvasta āśvāstaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
S01divyav_u:6697_2: prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gajarāja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:6697_3: siṃha iva daṃṣṭagaṇaparivṛto haṃsarāja iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva parikṣagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:6697_4: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:6697_5: deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva paurajanaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:6698_0: nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:6698_1: virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto brahmeva brahmakāyikaparivṛtaḥ stimita iva jalanidhiḥ
S01divyav_u:6698_2: sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva gajapatiḥ sudāntairindrayairasaṃkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro dvātriṃśatā
S01divyav_u:6699_1: sūryasahasrātirekaprabho jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako daśabhirbalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaistribhirāveṇikaiḥ
S01divyav_u:6699_3: parivṛto 'nyena ca mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena anekaiśca prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
S01divyav_u:6700: 165.026 aṣṭādaśānuśaṃsā buddhacārikāyāmityanekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāni/
S01divyav_u:6702: 165.028 rājagṛhāt dvau bāladārakau brāhmaṇadārakaḥ kṣatriyadārakaśca bahir nirgatya krīḍataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6705: bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:6709: 165.032 sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ nirhṛtā--mā haiva bhagavatā bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāditi/
S01divyav_u:6711: 166.001 [166]sacandratāraṃ prapatedihāmbaraṃ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet/
S01divyav_u:6712: 166.003 mahodadhīnāmudakaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ//8//iti
S01divyav_u:6713: 166.005 sa ca brāhmaṇadārakaḥ kathayati--vayasya, yadyevam, gacchāmaḥ śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ paśyāmah?
S01divyav_u:6721: 166.012 yathā hyamī śītavanonmukhotsukāḥ pravānti vātā himapaṅkaśītalāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6722: 166.014 prayānti nūnaṃ bahavo divaukaso nirīkṣituṃ śākyamunervikurvitam//10//iti/
S01divyav_u:6723: 166.016 rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutam--bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:6727: 166.018 sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṃ śmaśānamabhinirhṛtā/
S01divyav_u:6729: 166.019 śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--na bhagavān nirarthakaṃ śītavanaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:6730: 166.020 nūnaṃ bhagavān subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnīmāgamya mahadvineyakāryaṃ kartukāmo bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:6733: 166.022 adrākṣīt sa kṣatriyakumārako rājānaṃ māgadhaśreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:6735: 166.024 yathā hi śreṇyo magadhādhipo hyayaṃ viniryayau rājagṛhāt sabāndhavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6736: 166.026 pravartate me hṛdi niścitā matirmahājanasyābhyudayo bhaviṣyati//11//iti/
S01divyav_u:6739: 166.029 nirgrantha bhagavantaṃ smitonmukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayanti--yathā śramaṇo gautamaḥ smitonmukho mahājanamadhyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6741: 166.030 taiḥ subhadro gṛhapatiruktah--gṛhapate, nanvayaṃ sattvo mandabhāgyo na kālagata iti/
S01divyav_u:6743: te kathayanti--gṛhapate, vayaṃ śamāttaśikṣāḥ, tvameva jñāsyasīti/
S01divyav_u:6745: tasyāḥ sarvaḥ kāyo dagdhaḥ sthāpayitvā kukṣisāmantakam/
S01divyav_u:6747: tasya coparipadmakarṇikāyāṃ kumāro niṣaṇṇo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6748: 167.004 taṃ dṛṣṭvā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi paraṃ vismayamupagatāni/
S01divyav_u:6750: 167.006 tatra bhagavān subhadraṃ gṛhapatimāmantrayate--gṛhapate, gṛhāṇa kumāram/
S01divyav_u:6752: 167.007 te kathayanti--gṛhapate, yadi prajvalitāmetāṃ citāṃ pravekṣyasi, sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:6754: tatra bhagavāñ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate--gṛhāṇa jīvaka kumārakamiti/
S01divyav_u:6760: 167.015 tato jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtamidamavocat--jīvaka, māsi kṣata upahato veti?
S01divyav_u:6761: sa kathayati--rājakule 'haṃ bhadanta jāto rājakule vṛddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6763: 167.017 tatra bhagavān subhadraṃ gṛhapatimāmantrayate--gṛhāṇedānīṃ gṛhapate kumāramiti/
S01divyav_u:6767: 167.019 te kathayanti--gṛhapate, ayaṃ sattvo 'tīva mandabhāgyo yo hi nāma sarvabhakṣeṇāpyagninā na dagdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6768: 167.020 kiṃ bahunā? yadyevaṃ gṛhaṃ praveśayasi, nīyatām/
S01divyav_u:6769: te gṛhamutsādayad bhaviṣyasi, tvaṃ ca prāṇairviyujyasa iti/
S01divyav_u:6772: 167.022 tatra bhagavān rājānaṃ bimbisāramāmantayate--gṛhāṇa mahārāja kumāramiti/
S01divyav_u:6774: 167.023 tataḥ samantato nirīkṣya kathayati--bhagavan, kiṃ bhavatu asya dārakasya jyotiṣka iti nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:6776: tato bhagavatā tasya janakāyasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:6790: 167.031 yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:6791_0: 167.032 jyotiṣko dārako rājñā bimbisāreṇa aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto [168]dvābhyāsaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ
S01divyav_u:6791_1: dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhāgtrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām /
S01divyav_u:6792: 168.002 so 'ṣṭhābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:6795: tena śrutam yathā mama bhaginī sattvavatī saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:6801: 168.007 tena śrutam yathā sā asmākaṃ bhaginī kālagateti/
S01divyav_u:6802: 168.008 śrutvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--bhagavatā asau vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati,
