S01divyav_u:6806: 168.010 mā haiva tabhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāt/
S01divyav_u:6807: tena tiraḥprātiveśyāḥ pṛṣṭāh--śrutaṃ mayā asmākaṃ bhaginī sattvavatī saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:6814: 168.014 mā haiva bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāditi/
S01divyav_u:6816: 168.015 sacandratāraṃ prapatedihāmbaraṃ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet/
S01divyav_u:6817: 168.017 mahodadhīnāmudakaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ//13//
S01divyav_u:6820: kiṃ tu tena svāmināpi asau tathā tathā upakrāntā, yathā kālagatā/
S01divyav_u:6824: sa subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--na yuktaṃ gṛhapate tvayā kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:6826: asmākaṃ sattvavatī bhaginī tvayā nirgranthavigrāhitena tathā tathā upakrāntā, yathā kālagatā/
S01divyav_u:6835: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṃ niścārayāmah--asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā/
S01divyav_u:6841: nūnamevaṃ karomīti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--deva,
S01divyav_u:6842: mama jñātaya evaṃ paribhāṣante--yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṃ kuśalam,
S01divyav_u:6846: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṃ niścārayāmah--asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā/
S01divyav_u:6852: na mayā tvatsakāśāt jyotiṣkaḥ kumāro gṛhītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6857: mama jñātaya evaṃ paribhāṣante--yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṃ kuśalam/
S01divyav_u:6867: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--yadi subhadro jyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
S01divyav_u:6868: sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:6871: evaṃ ca vada--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
S01divyav_u:6872: 169.010 yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
S01divyav_u:6873: sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:6874: 169.012 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena rājā bimbisārastenopasaṃskrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6876: kathayati ca--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
S01divyav_u:6877: 169.014 yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
S01divyav_u:6878: sthānametadvidyate yat subhadro gṛhapatiruṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣye/
S01divyav_u:6882: rājā bimbisāraḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, mayā ayaṃ kumāraḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6884: samayato 'haṃ muñcāmi, yadi māṃ divase divase triṣkālaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatīti/
S01divyav_u:6886: 169.020 ko 'nya upasaṃkramitavya iti? sa rājñā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā hastiskandha āropya visarjitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:6887: 169.022 ācaritametallokasya--na tāvat putrasya nāma prajñāyate yāvat pitā jīvati/
S01divyav_u:6891: 169.024 buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6892: tena yasmin pradeśe tena subhadreṇa patnī āghātitā,
S01divyav_u:6894: 169.026 tathā sthavirairapi sūtrānta upanibaddham--bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati mṛditakukṣike dāva iti//
S01divyav_u:6895: 169.028 subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ pauruṣeyā ye paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6898: sa buddhe 'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasanno buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gata iti/
S01divyav_u:6902: 169.032 ghaṇḍāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--nedaṃ kenacit viṣṭayā vā [170]śītayā vā karkaṭakena vā gṛhītavyam/
S01divyav_u:6903: 170.001 ya etacchramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā maharddhiko vā mahānubhāvah ṛddhyā gṛhṇāti, tasyedam yathāsukhamiti/
S01divyav_u:6906: dṛṣṭvā ca punarjyotiṣkasya gṛhapateḥ kathayanti--gṛhapate, kimetaditi? tena teṣāṃ vistareṇārocitam/
S01divyav_u:6909: yāvat sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6910: 170.006 tairdṛṣṭvā tairapi jyotiṣko gṛhapatiḥ pṛṣṭah--kimetaditi? tena tathaiva vistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:6912: uktaṃ bhagavatā--pracchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyaṃ dhūtapāpairityuktvā prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6915: 170.010 āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yena mayā anādikālopacitaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ vāntaṃ tyaktaṃ charditaṃ pratinisṛṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:6919: sa tadgṛhītvā vihāraṃ gato bhikṣubhirucyate--sthavira, kutastava gośīrṣacandanamayaṃ pātramiti?
S01divyav_u:6921: 170.014 bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti--sthavira, kalpate tava pātramātrasyārthāya ṛddhiṃ vidarśayitumiti?
S01divyav_u:6924: kiṃ kriyatāmiti? etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti/
S01divyav_u:6927: api tu catvāri pātrāṇi suvarṇamayaṃ rūpyamayaṃ varḍūryamayaṃ sphaṭikamayam/
S01divyav_u:6928: 170.018 aparāṇyapi catvāri pātrāṇi rītimayaṃ tāmramayaṃ kaṃsamayamabhramayaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:6935: 170.022 api tvadhīṣṭāni te dve pātre āyasaṃ mṛṇmayam/
S01divyav_u:6936: yāvadapareṇa samayena jyotiṣkasya gṛhapaterdivyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā/
S01divyav_u:6937: 170.023 antarā ca rājagṛhamantarā ca campāmatrāntare śulkaśālā/
S01divyav_u:6940: tena putrāṇāṃ svapnadarśanaṃ dattam--yaḥ kaścit paṇyamaśulkayitvā gamiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:6941: sā ghaṇṭā tāvadviraviṣyati yāvadasau nivartya śulkaṃ dāpayitavyamiti (yiṣyatīti?)/
S01divyav_u:6942: 170.027 taistaṃ svapnaṃ saṃbandhibāndhavānāṃ nivedya divasatithimuhūrtena tasmin pradeśe yakṣasthānaṃ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:6946: sā brāhmaṇī saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ brāhmaṇo yaistairupāyairdhanopārjanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:6952: tayā brāhmaṇa uktah--brāhmaṇa, asyā yamalyāḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasraṃ mūlyam/
S01divyav_u:6954: yadi kaścit yācati, kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa dātavyā, no cedapattanaṃ ghoṣayitvā anyatra gantavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:6957: so 'pattanaṃ ghoṣayitvā tām yamalīṃ chatradaṇḍe prakṣipya sārthena sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthito yāvadanupūrveṇa śulkaśālāmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6961: 171.007 śailkikāḥ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, yatheyaṃ ghaṇṭā raṇati, nūnaṃ sārtho na nipuṇaṃ śulkitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6968: 171.010 sārthikā avadhyātumārabdhāh--kim yūyamasamān bhūṣitukāmā yena bhūyo bhūyaḥ pratinivartayadhvamiti?
S01divyav_u:6970: 171.011 yeṣāṃ madhye sa brāhmaṇo nāsti, te 'tikrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6971: 171.012 anyeṣāṃ gacchatāṃ sā ghaṇṭā tathaiva raṭitumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:6973: 171.013 evaṃ tāvat dvidhākṛtāḥ, yāvat sa caiko brāhmaṇo 'vasthita iti/
S01divyav_u:6978: 171.015 tairasau brāhmaṇaḥ pratinivartyoktah--bho brāhmaṇa kathaya, naiva śulkaṃ dāpayāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6979: 171.016 kiṃ tu devasyaiva sānnidhyaṃ jñātaṃ bhavatīti/
S01divyav_u:6982: te paraṃ vismayamāpannāh--bhavantaḥ, īdṛśamapi devasya sānnidhyamiti/
S01divyav_u:6984: brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--yūyaṃ kathayatha śulkaṃ na dāpayāma iti/
S01divyav_u:6987: 171.020 api devasyaitat sānnidhyamiti kṛtvā asmābhiḥ prāvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6989: 171.021 sa taṃ punargṛhītvā punaśchatranāḍikāyāṃ prakṣipya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6992: tatrāpi tāṃ na kaścit kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa yācate/
S01divyav_u:6994: jyotiṣkaśca kumāro rājakulānniṣkramya hastiskandhābhirūḍho vīthīmadhyena svagṛhaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:6997: 171.025 jyotiṣkeṇoktah--bho brāhmaṇa, kimarthaṃ tvam apattanaṃ ghoṣayasi?
S01divyav_u:7007: brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--kimetadevaṃ bhaviṣyati? jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati--brāhmaṇa, tava pratyakṣīkaromi/
S01divyav_u:7019: sa brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasannaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, maharddhikastvaṃ ṃhānubhāvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7026: jyotiṣkeṇa tato yaḥ paribhuktakaḥ sa dārakāya dattaḥ, aparibhuktakastu snānaśāṭakaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7028: 172.007 jyotiṣkasya sa snānaśāṭaka upari gṛhasyābhyavakāśe śoṣito vāyunā hriyamāṇo rājño bimbisārasyopari patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7031: te kathayanti--deva, śrūyate rājño māndhātuḥ saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patitam/
S01divyav_u:7035: jyotiṣko gṛhapatirbhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:7040: 172.014 rājā kathayati--kumāra, tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:7046: sa vismṛtya kathayati--deva, madīyo 'yaṃ snānaśāṭako vāyunopakṣipta ihāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:7047: 172.017 kumāra, tava divyamānuṣyakī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā? deva, prādurbhūtā/
S01divyav_u:7048: 172.018 kumāra, yadyevam, kimarthaṃ na nimantrayasi? deva, nimantrito bhava/
S01divyav_u:7050: deva, yasya divyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā, kiṃ tena sajjīkartavyam? nanu sajjīkṛtameva, gaccheti/
S01divyav_u:7060: jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati--deva, ayamapi na vadhūjanaḥ, kiṃ tu madhyo 'yaṃ janaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7068: 172.028 sa kathayati--kumāra, ime matsyā upari bhramantaḥ paśyanti/
S01divyav_u:7078: kiṃ tu devasya kāṣṭhadhūmena vastrāṇi dhūpitāni,
S01divyav_u:7080: 173.001 rājā tatra divyamānuṣyā śriyā upacaryamāṇaḥ pramatto na niṣkrāṃti/
S01divyav_u:7082: amātyairajātaśatruḥ kumāro 'bhibhūtah--kumāra, devo jyotiṣkasya gṛhaṃ praviśya pramattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7086: 173.005 sa kathayati--kumāra, na śaknoṣi tvamekaṃ divasaṃ rājyaṃ kārayitum?
S01divyav_u:7089: 173.006 rājā jyotiṣkasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya kathayati--kumāra satyam? deva satyam/
S01divyav_u:7092: deva, puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocavikāsānmaṇīnāṃ jvalanājvalanayogācchakunīnāṃ ca kūjanākūjanāt/
S01divyav_u:7093: 173.009 santi tāni puṣpāṇi yāni rātrau vikasanti, divā mlāyanti?
S01divyav_u:7094: santi yāni divā vikasanti rātrau mlāyanti?
S01divyav_u:7095: santi te maṇayo ye rātrau jvālanti, na divā?
S01divyav_u:7096: santi ye divā jvalanti, na rātrau?
S01divyav_u:7097: santi te śakunayo ye rātrau kūjanti, na divā?
S01divyav_u:7098: santi ye divā kūjñati, na rātrau?
S01divyav_u:7100: 173.013 yathā tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtastathaiva nānyathetyuktvā jyotiṣkagṛhāt niṣkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7101: 173.014 ajātaśatrukumāreṇa jyotiṣkasantako maṇirapahṛtya dārakasya haste dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7103: 173.015 ajātaśatruḥ kathayati--dāraka, ānaya taṃ maṇiṃ paśyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:7104: sa muṣṭhiṃ vighāṭya kathayati--kumāra, na jāne kutra gata iti/
S01divyav_u:7106: jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati--kumāra, kimarthamenaṃ tāḍayasi? ghapate, ahaṃ cauraḥ, eṣa mahācauraḥ/
S01divyav_u:7110: api tu yata eva tvayā gṛhītastatraiva gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7111: 173.019 api tu kumāra, svakaṃ te gṛham/
S01divyav_u:7113: sa pratibhinnakaḥ saṃlakṣayate--yadā pituratyayādrājā bhaviṣyāmi, tadā grahīṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:7114: 173.021 yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7119: 173.024 sa saṃlakṣayati--yena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ praghātitaḥ, sa māṃ marṣayatīti kuta etat?
S01divyav_u:7131: 173.029 ajātaśatruḥ saṃlakṣayate--evamapi mayā na śakitaṃ jyotiṣkasya maṇīnapahartum/
S01divyav_u:7139: 174.001 teṣām yo yatrābhirūḍhaḥ sa tatraivāsthito yāvat prabhātā rajanī saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:7141: te kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, anena kalirājena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:7143: tatkiṃ na me moṣiṣyata iti? purakṣobho jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7144: 174.004 ajātaśatruṇā jyotiṣkasay dūto 'nupreṣitah--muñcata mamāyaṃ khalīkāra saṃlakṣayate--yena nāma pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7145: sa māṃ na praghātayitṣyatīti kuta etat?
S01divyav_u:7146: sarvathā ahaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtah--mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarthattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:7150: 174.009 atha jyotiṣko gṛhapatiḥ suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānavalokya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7151: 174.010 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7152: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo jyotiṣko gṛhapatirbhagavantamidamavocat--labheyāhāṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:7154: sa bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitah--ehi bhikṣo, cara brahmacaryamiti/
S01divyav_u:7157: 174.016 ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7160_0: tenodyacchamānena vyāyacchamānena idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā
S01divyav_u:7163: 174.025 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā jyotiṣkeṇa karma kṛtam yena citāmāropitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7169: na bhikṣavaḥ kārmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:7173: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:7175: 175.002 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//15//
S01divyav_u:7176_0: 175.003 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava ekanavatikalpe vipaśyī nāma śāstā loka udapādi tathāgato
S01divyav_u:7177: 175.005 dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṃ viharati sma bandhumatīyake dāve/
S01divyav_u:7178_0: 175.006 tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ bandhumān nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati
S01divyav_u:7178_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
S01divyav_u:7180: 175.009 tasyānaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatirāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:7181: 175.010 sa saṃlakṣayate--bahuśo mayā vipaśyī samyaksambuddho 'ntargṛhe upanimantraya bhojitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7182: 175.011 na tu kadācit traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7183: 175.012 yannvahaṃ vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:7185: 175.013 upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7186: 175.014 ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vipaśyī samyakasmbuddho dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:7187: 175.015 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:7188_0: 175.016 athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:7188_1: praṇamya vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhamidavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṃs traimāsīṃ
S01divyav_u:7190: athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7191: 175.021 aśrauṣīdbandhumān rājā--vipaśyī samyaksambuddho dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṃ viharati bandhumatīye dāve iti/
S01divyav_u:7192: 175.023 śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--bahuśo mayā bhagavānantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7193: na tu kadācit traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7196: upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7197: 175.026 ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ bandhumantaṃ rājānaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:7198: 175.027 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:7199_0: 175.028 atha bandhumān rājā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:7201: adhivāsayatu bhagavān, ahaṃ tathā kariṣye yathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirājñāsyati/
S01divyav_u:7202: 175.032 sacet te mahārāja anaṅgaṇo [176]gṛhapatiranujānīte, evaṃ te 'hamadhivāsayāmi/
S01divyav_u:7203: 176.001 atha bandhumān rājā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena svaṃ nirveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7204: 176.003 bandhumān rājā anaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dūtena prakrośyedamavocat--yatkhalu gṛhapate jānīyāt--ahaṃ tvatprathamato vipaśyinaṃ samyakasmbuddhaṃ bhojayāmi,
S01divyav_u:7205: tataḥ paścāt tavāpi na duṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ bhojayitumiti/
S01divyav_u:7206: 176.005 sa kathayati--deva, mayā vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastvatprathamata upanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7208: rājā kathayati--gṛhapate, yadyapyevam, tathāpi tvaṃ mama viṣayanivāsī/
S01divyav_u:7210: deva, yadyapyahaṃ tava viṣayanivāsī, tathāpi yena pūrvanimantritaḥ sa eva bhojayati/
S01divyav_u:7213: 176.009 api tu yo bhaktottarikayā jeṣyati, so 'vaśiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ bhojayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:7215: tathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:7216: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:7217: 176.012 atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto yenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapaterbhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7219: 176.015 athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:7220_0: 176.016 anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
S01divyav_u:7220_1: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
S01divyav_u:7221: 176.018 atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddho 'naṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:7222: 176.020 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7226: 176.022 tato bandhumān rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7227: amātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, kasmāt tvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparastiṣṭhasīti?
S01divyav_u:7229: kathamahaṃ na cintāparastiṣṭhāmi yo 'haṃ mama viṣayanivāsinaṃ kuṭumbinaṃ na śaknomi bhaktottarikayā parājayitum?
S01divyav_u:7230: te kathayanti, deva, tasya gṛhapateḥ kāṣṭhaṃ nāsti/
S01divyav_u:7233: bhavantaḥ, na kenacit madviṣayanivāsinā kāṣṭhaṃ vikretavyam/
S01divyav_u:7234: 176.027 yo vikrīṇīte, tena madviṣaye na vastavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:7237: surabhiṇā gandhena sarvā bandhumatī nagarī sphuṭā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:7238: 176.029 bandhumān rājā pṛcchati--bhavantaḥ, kuta eṣa manojñagandha iti? tairvistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:7247: 177.002 tena cittaṃ pradūṣya kharā vāg niścārita--tāvanme bhaktakāṣṭhamasti,
S01divyav_u:7249: 177.003 rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7250: 177.004 amātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, kimarthaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparistiṣṭhasīti?
S01divyav_u:7253: vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā devaścānaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ parājayatīti/
S01divyav_u:7254_0: 177.006 tairaparasmin divase bandhumatī rājadhānī apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyā vyavasthāpitā
S01divyav_u:7258: 177.011 tato bandhumān rājā dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayamāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7259: 177.012 tato vismayāvarjitacittasaṃtatirvipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya dūtena kālamārocayati--samaye bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:7260: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:7261: 177.014 atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena bandhumato rājño bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7263: 177.017 bandhumato rājño maṅgalyābhiṣeko hastināgo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṃ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:7265: 177.018 bandhumato rājño 'gramahiṣī vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati,
S01divyav_u:7267: 177.020 anaṅgaṇena gṛhapatinā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:7268: paśya kīdṛśenāhāreṇa bandhumān rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayatīti/
S01divyav_u:7273: so 'pi tāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ viṣādamāpannaḥ saṃlakṣayati--śakyamanyat saṃpādayitum/
S01divyav_u:7274: 177.024 kiṃ tu hastināmantaḥpurasya ca kuto mama vibhavah?
S01divyav_u:7275: iti viditvā niveśanaṃ gato dauvārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:7277: sa yat prārthayate taddātavyam, no tu praveśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7284: iti viditvā kauśiko brāhmaṇaveṣamabhinirmāya yenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7286: anaṅgaṇasya gṛhapateḥ kathaya--kauśikagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati bhavantaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:7288: gṛhapatinā ahaṃ sthāpitah--yaḥ kaścid yācanaka āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:7292: kiṃ te gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭeneti? sa kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, na mama kenacit prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:7296: kauśikasagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati āryaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:7297: 178.004 sa kathayati--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, yena taysa prayojanaṃ tat prayaccha--kiṃ tenātra praviṣṭeneti?
S01divyav_u:7299: ukto mayā evaṃ kathayati--nāhaṃ kiṃcit prārthayāmi,
S01divyav_u:7303: 178.007 brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--kasmāt tvaṃ gṛhapate kare kapolaṃ cintāparastiṣṭhasīti?
S01divyav_u:7305: 178.009 na tasya kathayecchokam yaḥ śokānna pramocayet/
S01divyav_u:7307: 178.011 śakraḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, kastava śokah? kathaya, ahaṃ te śokātpramocayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:7309: 178.012 atha śakro devendraḥ kauśikabrāhmaṇarūpamantardhāpy svarūpeṇa sthitvā kathayati--gṛhapate,
S01divyav_u:7310: viśvakarmā te devaputraḥ sāhāyyaṃ kalpayiṣyatītyuktvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7311: 178.013 atha śakro devendro devāṃstrāyastriṃśān gatvā viśvakarmāṇaṃ devaputramāmantrayate--gaccha,
S01divyav_u:7314: 178.015 paraṃ bhadraṃ tava kauśiketi viśvakarmaṇā devaputreṇa śakrasya devendrasya pratiśrutya āgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7317: 178.017 airāvaṇo nāgarājo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṃ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:7319: 178.018 śacī devakanyā vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati,
S01divyav_u:7321: 178.019 bandhumatā rājñā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:7323: sa puruṣastatra gatastāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatraiva avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7328: tato bandhumān rājā svayameva taddvāraṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7329: 178.023 vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate, bandhumān rājā dṛṣṭasatyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7333: tenāsau nirgatya kṣamita uktaśca--mahārāja, praviśa svahastena pariveṣaṇaṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:7337: tvamevaiko 'rhasi dine dine buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayituṃ na vayaṃtī/
S01divyav_u:7338_1: praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe
S01divyav_u:7339: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam,
S01divyav_u:7343: 179.001 [179]kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau anaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatiḥ,
S01divyav_u:7344: eṣa evāsau jyotiṣkaḥ kulaputrastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:7345: 179.002 yadanena bandhumato rājño dṛṣṭasatyasyāntike kharā vāgniścāritā,
S01divyav_u:7346: tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañcaśatāni samātṛkaścitāyāmāropya dhmāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7348: 179.004 yadvipaśyini tathāgate kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:7349: tasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7352: 179.006 ahamanena vipaśyinā samyaksambuddhena sārdhaṃ samajavaḥ samabalaḥ samadhuraḥ samasāmānyaprāptaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7353: 179.007 iti hi bhikṣavah ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7356: 179.009 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:7365: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
S01divyav_u:7366_0: 180.002 satkṛto bhagavān gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhirbhikṣuṇībhirupāsakairupāsikābhī
S01divyav_u:7367: 180.004 lābhī bhagavān prabhūtānāṃ praṇītānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ divyānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:7369_1: sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S01divyav_u:7370: 180.009 sa imaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamānuṣīṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya pravedayate/
S01divyav_u:7371: 180.011 sa dharmaṃ deśayati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye paryavasāne kalyāṇam/
S01divyav_u:7372: 180.012 svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati/
S01divyav_u:7373_0: 180.013 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--sacedbhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyurdānasya
S01divyav_u:7373_1: phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
S01divyav_u:7377: 180.016 na caiṣāmutpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhet/
S01divyav_u:7378: 180.017 yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānante dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
S01divyav_u:7380: 180.019 utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:7382: 180.021 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani rājābhūt kanakavarṇo nāma abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā suvarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7383: 180.022 rājā bhikṣavaḥ kanakavarṇa āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7385: 180.024 rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya khalu bhikṣavaḥ kanakāvatī nāma rājadhānī babhūva pūrveṇa paścimena ca dvādaśa yojayānyāmena,
S01divyav_u:7386: dakṣiṇenottareṇa ca sapta yojanāni ca vistāreṇa/
S01divyav_u:7387: 180.026 ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca ramaṇīyā ca/
S01divyav_u:7389: 180.028 aṣṭādaśa kulakoṭī ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
S01divyav_u:7390: 180.029 saptapañcāśadgrāmakoṭya ṛddhāḥ sphītāḥ kṣemāḥ subhikṣā ramaṇīyā mahājanākīrṇamanuṣyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7391: 180.030 ṣaṣṭiḥ karvaṭasahasrāṇyabhūvann ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
S01divyav_u:7396: 181.001 [181]athāpareṇa samayena rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya ekākino rahogatasya pratisamlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparivitarkamudapādi--yannvahaṃ sarvavaṇijo 'śulkānagulmān muñceyam/
S01divyav_u:7398: 181.003 atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapariṣadyānāmantrayate--adyāgreṇa vo grāmaṇyaḥ sarvavaṇijo 'śulkān muñcāmi,
S01divyav_u:7400: 181.005 tasyānenopāyena bahūni varṣāṇi rājyaṃ kārayato 'pareṇa samayena nakṣatraṃ viṣamībhūtam,
S01divyav_u:7402: 181.006 atha brāhmaṇā lakṣaṇajñā naimittikā bhūmyantarikṣamantrakuśalā nakṣatraśukragrahacariteṣu tat saṃlakṣayitvā yena rājā kanakavarṇaḥ, tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7403: 181.008 apasaṃkramya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamidamavocan--yatkhalu devo jānīyāt--nakṣatraṃ viṣamībhūtam,
S01divyav_u:7405: 181.009 atha rājā kanakavarṇa idamevamrūpaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā aśrūṇi pravartayati--aho bata me jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:7406: aho bata me jambudvīpah ṛddhaḥ sphītaḥ kṣemaḥ subhikṣo ramaṇīyo bahujanākīrṇamanuṣyo nacirādeva śūnyo bhaviṣyati rahitamanuṣyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7407: 181.012 atha rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya muhūrtaṃ śocitvā etadabhavat--ya ime āḍhyā mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ,
S01divyav_u:7409: 181.013 ya ime daridrā alpadhanā alpānnapānabhogāḥ, te katham yāpayiṣyanti?
S01divyav_u:7410: tasyaitadabhavat--yannvahaṃ jambudvīpādannādyaṃ saṃhareyam, sarvajāmbudvīpān sattvān gaṇayeyam/
S01divyav_u:7413: 181.016 ekaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ kārayitvā sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ pratyarpayeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:7418: 181.019 paraṃ deveti gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pratiśrutya sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ gaṇayanti,
S01divyav_u:7421: 181.021 ekasmin koṣṭhāgāre sthāpayitvā yena rājā kanakavarṇaḥ, tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7422: 181.022 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamidamavocat--yat khalu deva jānīyāh--sarvagrāmanagaranigamakarvaṭarājadhānīṣvannādyaṃ saṃhṛtam,
S01divyav_u:7425: māpayitvā sarvagrāmanagaranigamarājadhānīṣvekasmin koṣṭhāgāre sathāpitam yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:7426: 181.025 atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ saṃkhyāgaṇakalipikapauruṣeyānāmantrayitvā etadavocat--gacchata yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7428: gaṇayitvā grāmaṇyaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ prayacchata/
S01divyav_u:7429: 181.027 paraṃ deveti saṃkhyāgaṇakalipikapauruṣeyā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pratiśrutya sarvajāmbudvīpakān manuṣyān gaṇayanti,
S01divyav_u:7430: saṃgaṇya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamādau kṛtvā sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ prajñapayanti/
S01divyav_u:7432: nirgato dvādaśasya varṣasyaiko māso yāvadbahavaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā jighatsitāḥ pipāsitāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:7433: 181.031 ten khalu punaḥ samayena sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇamanyatra rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyaikā mānikā bhaktasyāvaśiṣṭā//
S01divyav_u:7434: 182.001 [182]tena khalu samayena anyatamaścatvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito bodhisattva imāṃ sahālokadhātumanuprāpto babhūva/
S01divyav_u:7435: 182.002 adrākṣīd bodhisattvo 'nyatarasmin banaṣaṇḍe putraṃ mātrā sārdhaṃ vipratipadyamanam/
S01divyav_u:7438: yatra hi nāma asyāmeva nava māsān kukṣau uṣitvā,
S01divyav_u:7442: 182.006 ka utsahata īdṛśānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ caritum?
S01divyav_u:7446: paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya pañcasūpādānaskandheṣūdayavyayānudarśī viharati yadutedaṃ rūpam,
S01divyav_u:7455: 182.011 sa evaṃ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣūdayavyayānudarśī viharannacirādeva yatkiṃcit samudayadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ nirodhadharmakamiti viditvā tatraiva pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigatavān/
S01divyav_u:7456: 182.013 atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho yathāprāptānavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:7457: 182.014 saṃsevamānasya bhavanti snehāḥ snehānvayaṃ saṃbhavatīha duḥkham/
S01divyav_u:7459: 182.018 atha tasya bhagavataḥ pratyekabuddhasyaitadabhavat--bahūnāṃ me sattvānāmarthāya duṣkarāṇi cīrṇāni,
S01divyav_u:7460: na ca kasyacit sattvasya hitaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:7462_0: atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa sarvāvantamimaṃ
S01divyav_u:7462_1: jambudvīpaṃ samantādanuvilokayannadrākṣīt sa bhagavān pratyekabuddhaḥ sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇam,
S01divyav_u:7465: 182.023 yannvahaṃ rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya niveśanāt piṇḍapātamahṛtya paribhuñjīya/
S01divyav_u:7466: 182.024 atha bhagavān pratyekabuddhastat eva ṛddhyā vihāyasamabhyudgamya dṛśyatā kāyena śakuniriva ṛddhyā yena kanakāvatī rājadhānī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7467: 182.025 tena khalu samayena rājā kanakavarṇa upariprāsādatalagato 'bhūt pañcamātrairamātyasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7468: 182.026 adrākṣīdanyatamo mahāmātrastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ dūrata evāgacchantam/
S01divyav_u:7471: dvitīyo mahāmātra evamāha--naiṣa grāmaṇyo lohitapakṣaḥ śakuntaḥ, rākṣasa eva ojohāra ihāgacchati/
S01divyav_u:7473: 182.030 atha rājā kanakavarṇa ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ mukhaṃ saṃparimārjya mahāmātrānāmantrayate--naiṣa grāmaṇyo lohitapakṣaḥ śakuntaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7476: 182.032 atha sa bhagavān pratyekabuddho rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya prāsāde pratyaṣṭhāt//
S01divyav_u:7477: 183.001 [183]atha rājā kanakavarṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhamutthāyāsanāt pratyudgamya pādau śirasā vanditvā prajñapta evāsane niṣīdayati/
S01divyav_u:7478: 183.002 atha rājā kanakavarṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhamidamavocat--kimartham ṛṣe ihābhyāgamanam?
S01divyav_u:7483: yatra hi nāma jambudvīpaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayitvā ekasyāpi ṛṣerasamarthaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ pratipādayitum/
S01divyav_u:7484: 183.005 atha yā kanakāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmadhyuṣitā devatā, sā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya purastādgāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:7485: 183.007 kiṃ duḥkhaṃ dāridryaṃ kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ tadeva dāridryam/
S01divyav_u:7487: 183.009 atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ koṣṭhāgārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--asti bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:7490: sa evamāha--yat khalu deva jānīyāh--sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇam,
S01divyav_u:7494: tasyaitadabhavat--yadi paribhokṣye, yadi vā na paribhokṣye, avaśyaṃ mayā kālaḥ kartavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7496: kathaṃ nāmehedṛśa ṛṣiḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā mama niveśane 'dya yathādhautena pātreṇa nirgamiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:7497: atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyān saṃnipātyaivamavocat--anumodata yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7499: 183.016 anena kuśalamūlena sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dāridryasamucchedaḥ syāt/
S01divyav_u:7500_0: 183.017 atha rājā kanakavarṇastasya maharṣestat pātraṃ gṛhītvā ekāṃ mānikāṃ bhaktasya
S01divyav_u:7500_1: pātre prakṣipya ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā jānubhyāṃ nipatya tasya bhagavataḥ
S01divyav_u:7501: 183.019 dharmatā punarbhagavatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ kāyikī dharmadeśanā na vācikī/
S01divyav_u:7502: 183.020 atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyāntikāt piṇḍapātramādāya tat eva ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7503: 183.022 atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ prāñjalirbhūtvā tāvadanimiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇo 'sthāt,
S01divyav_u:7505: 183.023 atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyānāmantrayate--gacchata grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni niveśanāni/
S01divyav_u:7506: 183.024 mā ihaiva prāsāde jighatsāpipāsābhyāṃ sarva eva kālaṃ kariṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:7508: tadā vayaṃ devena sārdhaṃ krīḍatā ramatā kathaṃ punarvayamidānīṃ devaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye parityakṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:7512: 183.028 mā ihaiva prāsāde jighatsāpipāsābhyāṃ sarva eva kālaṃ kariṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:7513: 183.029 evamuktā gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyāḥ prarudanto 'śrūṇi pravartayanto 'śrūṇi saṃparimārjya yena rājā kanakavarṇastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7514: 183.030 upasaṃkramya rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pādau śirasā vanditvā añjaliṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyaitadūcuh--kṣantavyaṃ te yadasmābhiḥ kiṃcidaparāddham/
S01divyav_u:7516: 184.001 [184]tadyathā tena bhagavatā pratyekabuddhena sa piṇḍapātraḥ paribhuktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7517: atha tasminneva kṣaṇe samantāccatasṛṣu dikṣu catvāryabhrapaṭalāni vyutthitāni,
S01divyav_u:7521: 184.003 atha tasminneva divase dvitīye 'rdhabhāge vividhasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya varṣaṃ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:7523: idamevamrūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ mūlakhādanīyaṃ skandhakhādanīyaṃ patrakhādanīyaṃ puṣpakhādanīyaṃ phalakhādanīyaṃ tilakhādanīyaṃ khaṇḍaśarkaraguḍakhādanīyaṃ piṣṭakhādanīyam/
S01divyav_u:7524: 184.006 atha rājā kanakavarṇo hṛṣṭatuṣṭah udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapārṣadyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7527: 184.010 atha dvitīye divase saptāhaṃ dhānyavarṣaṃ pravarṣanti,
S01divyav_u:7533: suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya/
S01divyav_u:7534: 184.013 sarvasya rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyānubhāvena jāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dāridryasamucchedo babhūva//
S01divyav_u:7535: 184.015 syāt khalu bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājā kanakavarṇo babhūva/
S01divyav_u:7537: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājā kanakavarṇo babhūva/
S01divyav_u:7539: sacedbhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyurdānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam--apīdānīm yo 'sau apaścimakaḥ kavalaścarama ālopaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7542: 184.019 na caiṣāmutpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:7543: 184.020 yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānate dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam--yathā ahaṃ jāne dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
S01divyav_u:7545: utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādattaṃ tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:7546: 184.024 na naśyate pūrvakṛtaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ na naśyate sevanaṃ piṇḍatānām/
S01divyav_u:7547: 184.026 na naśyate āryajaneṣu bhāṣitaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛtajñeṣu na jātu naśyati//3//
S01divyav_u:7549: 184.029 asti caitasya vipāko avaśya dāsyate phalam//4//
S01divyav_u:7551: āttamanasaste bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikādevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayaḥ sarvāvatī ca parṣadbhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//
S01divyav_u:7555: 185.002 buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:7556: ācaritamāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ carituṃ tiryakcārikāṃ carituṃ pretacārikāṃ devacārikāṃ manuṣyacārikāṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:7563: 185.007 yasya kasyacit sārdhaṃvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṃ carati,
S01divyav_u:7567: 185.010 evamaparamaparaṃ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyaganuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S01divyav_u:7569: 185.011 tena khalu samayenāuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo viharati bhikṣubhirbhikṣuṇībhirupāsakairupāsikābhiśca/
S01divyav_u:7572: 185.014 sa kathayati--ācaritaṃ bhadanta āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ carituṃ tiryakcarikāṃ pretacārikāṃ devacārikāṃ manuṣyacārikāṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:7579: 185.018 yasya kasyacit sārdhaṃvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṃ carati,
S01divyav_u:7583: 185.021 evamaparamaparaṃ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyagavuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S01divyav_u:7585: 185.023 ayaṃ bhadanta heturayaṃ pratyayo yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo viharati bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikābhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:7586: 185.024 na sarvatra ānanda maudgalyāyano bhikṣurbhaviṣyati maudgalyāyanasadṛśo vā/
S01divyav_u:7588: 185.026 uktaṃ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakraṃ kārayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:7590: 185.027 bhagavānāha--pañca gatayaḥ kartavyā narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
S01divyav_u:7591: 185.028 tatrādhastāt narakāḥ kartavyāḥ, tiryañcaḥ pretāśca, upariṣṭāt devā manuṣyāśca/
S01divyav_u:7593: madhye rāgadveṣamohāḥ kartavyāḥ, rāgaḥ pārāvatākāreṇa, dveṣo bhujaṅgākāreṇa, mohaḥ sūkarākāreṇa/
S01divyav_u:7595: 185.031 anupapādukāḥ sattvā ghaṭīyantraprayogeṇa cyavamānā upapadyamānāśca kartavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7597: 185.033 sarvamanityatayā grastaṃ kartavyam, gāthādvayaṃ ca lekhayitavyam--
S01divyav_u:7602: 186.005 uktaṃ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakraṃ kārayitavyamiti bhikṣubhiḥ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:7604: te kathayanti--bhadramukhāḥ, vayamapi na jānīma iti/
S01divyav_u:7605: 186.007 bhagavānāha--dvārakoṣṭhake bhikṣuruddeṣṭavyo ya āgatāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ darśayati/
S01divyav_u:7607: te aviśeṣeṇoddiśanti bālānapi mūḍhānapi avyaktānapi akuśalānapi/
S01divyav_u:7608: 186.009 te ātmanā na jānate, kutaḥ punarāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ darśayiṣyanti?
S01divyav_u:7612: 186.012 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:7613: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7614: 186.013 tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:7618: sa suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāmantrayitvā antarjanaṃ ca samāśvāsya mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamādāya divasatithimuhūrtena mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7620: tasya patnyā sa dārako jñātibalena hastabalena pālitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhito lipyāmupanyasto lipyakṣareṣu ca kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7621: 186.018 sa vayaskareṇa sārdhaṃ veṇuvanaṃ gato vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ paśyati dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakramabhilikhitam/
S01divyav_u:7623: bhikṣuḥ kathayati--bhadramukha, etāḥ pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
S01divyav_u:7624: 186.021 ārya, kimebhiḥ karma kṛtam yenaivaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni praryanubhavantīti?
S01divyav_u:7625: sa kathayati--ete prāṇātipātikā adattādāyikāḥ kāmamithyācārikā mṛṣāvādikāḥ paiśunikāḥ pāruṣikāḥ saṃbhinnapralāpikā abhidhyālavo vyāpannacittā mithyādṛṣṭikāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7626: 186.024 tadebhirete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:7629: 186.026 ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti?
S01divyav_u:7632: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti?
S01divyav_u:7633: bhadramukha, ete 'pi matsariṇa āsan kuṭukuñcakā āgṛhītapariṣkārāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7634: 186.030 tattena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni kṣuttṛṣādīni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti/
S01divyav_u:7636: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni sukhāni pratyanubhavanti?
S01divyav_u:7638: ete prāṇātipātāt prativiratā adattādānāt [187]kāmamithyācārānmṛṣāvādāt paiśunyāt pāruṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpādanabhidhyāpannacittāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7639: 187.002 tadebhirete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:7642: 187.004 ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena sukhāni pratyanubhavanti?
S01divyav_u:7644: ebhirapi daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāstanutarā mṛdutarāścāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:7646: 187.006 ārya, āsāṃ pañcānāṃ gatīnām yā etāstisro gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretāśca, etā mahyaṃ na rocante/
S01divyav_u:7647: 187.007 ye tu ete devā manuṣyāśca ete rocete/
S01divyav_u:7648: 187.008 tatkathamete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samādāya vartayitavyāh?
S01divyav_u:7650: svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya saced dṛṣṭa eva dharme ājñāmārāgayiṣyasi,
S01divyav_u:7653: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā--pañcānuśaṃsān samanupaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:7655: āveṇikā ime svārthā anuprāpto bhaviṣyāmīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:7656: 187.012 yeṣāmahaṃ dāsaḥ preṣyo nirdeśyo bhujiṣyo nayena kāmaṃgamaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7657: teṣāṃ pūjyaśca bhaviṣyāmi praśaṃsyaśceti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:7658: 187.014 anuttaram yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpsyāmīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:7659: 187.015 anuttaraṃ vā yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpnuvato 'nāpattikasya sato deeveṣūpapattirbhaviṣyatīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:7662: kiṃ tatra pravrajyāyāṃ kriyate? bhadramukha, yāvajjīvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caryate/
S01divyav_u:7664: anyo 'sti upāyah? bhadramukha, asti, upāsako bhava/
S01divyav_u:7678: tatra mayā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakramabhilikhitaṃ dṛṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:7679: 187.025 tatra pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
S01divyav_u:7685: āsāṃ mama tisro gatayo nābhipretāḥ, dve abhiprete/
S01divyav_u:7690: putra, mayā tvaṃ jñātibalena hastabalena cāpyāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7691: 187.032 kuto me pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāṃ vibhavah? amba, yadi [188]nāsti, bhṛtikayā karma karomi/
S01divyav_u:7696: sa tayā anujñāto bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7697: 188.003 brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo 'nyān bhṛtakapuruṣān gṛhṇanti, taṃ na kaścit pṛcchati/
S01divyav_u:7698: 188.004 sa tatra divasamatināmya vikāle gṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7699: sa mātrā pṛṣṭah--putra, kṛtaṃ te bhṛtikayā karma? amba, kiṃ karomi? na māṃ kaścit pṛcchati/
S01divyav_u:7702: 188.006 yadyavaśyaṃ tvayā bhṛtikayā karma kartavyam, īdṛśaṃ veṣamāsthāya bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā tiṣṭha/
S01divyav_u:7705: so 'parasmin divase tādṛśaṃ veṣamāsthāya bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7708: tena taṃ pratyākhyāya anye bhṛtakapuruṣā gṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7709: 188.010 sa kathayati--gṛhapate, ahamapi bhṛtikayā karma karomīti/
S01divyav_u:7710: gṛhapatiḥ kathayati--putra, tvaṃ sukumāraḥ, na śakṣyasi bhṛtikayā karma kartum/
S01divyav_u:7711: 188.011 tāt, kiṃ tvaṃ pūrvaṃ bhṛtiṃ dadāsi, āhosvit paścāt?/
S01divyav_u:7715: adya tāvat jijñāsyāmi yadi śakṣyati karma kartum, dāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:7716: 188.014 na śakṣyati, na dāsyāmīti viditvā kathayati--putra āgaccha, gacchāma iti/
S01divyav_u:7722: 188.017 tadyadi śāṭhyena karma kariṣyāmaḥ, itaścyutānāṃ kā gatibhaviṣyati?
S01divyav_u:7727: teṃs teṣāṃ tādṛśī lokākhyānakathā prastutā, yāṃ śrutvā te bhṛtakapuruṣā ākṣiptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7728: 188.020 tasyātisvareṇa gacchato 'nupadaṃ gacchanti, mā lokākhyāyikāṃ na śroṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:7730: 188.022 so 'dhiṣṭhāyakapuruṣaṃ pṛcchati--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ tvayā apare bhṛtakā gṛhītāh? ārya, na gṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7731: 188.023 atha kasmādadya dviguṇaṃ karma kṛtam? tena yathāvṛttamārocitam/
S01divyav_u:7732: 188.024 śrutvā gṛhapatistasya dārakasya dviguṇāṃ bhṛtiṃ dātumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7733: 188.025 sa kathayati--tāt, kiṃ dvidaivasikāṃ bhṛtiṃ dadāsīti?
S01divyav_u:7734: sa kathayati--putra, na dvidaivasikāṃ dadāmi, api tu prasanno 'haṃ prasannādhikāraṃ karomīti/
S01divyav_u:7737: yāvat tava gṛhe karma kartavyaṃ tāvat tavaiva haste tiṣṭhatu/
S01divyav_u:7740: tadā asau dārako bhṛtiṃ gaṇayitumārabdho yāvat pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni na paripūryante/
S01divyav_u:7742: sa gṛhapatiḥ kathayati--putra, kiṃ rodiṣi? māsi mayā kiṃcit vyaṃsitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7743: 188.030 tāt, mahātmā tvam, kiṃ māṃ vyaṃsayiṣyasi? api tu ahameva mandabhāgyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7744: 188.031 mayā pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhṛtikayā karma prārabdhaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:7747: 189.001 punarapi mayā anyatra bhṛtikayā karma kartavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:7751: putra, abhiśraddadhāsi tvaṃ bhagavatah? tāt abhiśraddadhe/
S01divyav_u:7754: 189.004 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7756: mayā pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmītyamukasya gṛhapaterbhṛtikayā karma kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:7759: bhagavan kim? āha--vatsa gṛhāṇa, śrāddhaḥ sa gṛhapatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:7760: bhagavan, mā deveṣu nopapatsye? vatsa upapatsyase, gṛhāṇa/
S01divyav_u:7761: 189.008 sa parituṣṭo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yena sa gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7762: 189.009 upasaṃkramya gṛhapaterantikāt pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhītvā mātuḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7766: sā kathayati--putra, na mama bhāṇḍopaskaro na śayanāsanam/
S01divyav_u:7770: sa tasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--tvayaiva etāni pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni dattāani/
S01divyav_u:7771: 189.014 asmākaṃ gṛhe na bhāṇḍopaskaro nāpi śayanāsanam/
S01divyav_u:7774: 189.016 gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--mamedaṃ gṛhamacirotthitaṃ buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena paribhuktaṃ bhaviṣyati, pratijāgarmi/
S01divyav_u:7776: 189.018 sthāpayitvā kārṣāpaṇān gaccha, śvo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantraya/
S01divyav_u:7778: 189.019 sa saṃjātasaumanasyaḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṃ kṛtvā prakrānto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7779: 189.020 upasaṃkramya vṛddhānte sthitvā kathayati--so 'haṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantrayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:7781: atha sa gṛhapatiputro bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:7782: 189.023 tenāpi gṛhapatinā tāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya gṛhaṃ saṃmārjitam/
S01divyav_u:7783: 189.024 sukumārī gomayakārṣī dattā, āsanaprajñaptiḥ kāritā, udakamaṇayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7784: 189.025 tenāpi gṛhapatiputreṇa gatvā bhagavata ārocitam--samayo bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:7785: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti/
S01divyav_u:7786: 189.026 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7787: 189.027 ṣaḍvargīyāḥ pṛcchanti--kenāayaṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrita iti?
S01divyav_u:7789: 189.029 te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurvanti--nandopananda, bhṛtakapuruṣaḥ saḥ/
S01divyav_u:7790: kimasau dāsyati? gacchāma kulopakagṛheṣu gatvā purobhaktakāṃ karma iti/
S01divyav_u:7795: bhagavāṃstasya gṛhapater niveśane purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7797: 190.001 atha sa gṛhapatipurtaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhijanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:7798: 190.002 satatapariveṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇaḥ paśyti ṣaḍvargīyān na satkṛtya parimuñjānān/
S01divyav_u:7799: 190.003 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā kathayati--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:7802: bhagavānāha--vatsa, śayanāsanaparibhogena tāvat tvaṃ deveṣūpapadyethāḥ prāgevānnapānaparibhogeneti/
S01divyav_u:7803: 190.006 atha bhagavāṃstaṃ gṛhapatiputraṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:7804: 190.008 atrāntare pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇni rājagṛhamanuprāptāni/
S01divyav_u:7805: 190.009 rājagṛhe ca parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi labhyate/
S01divyav_u:7808: āgamayata kasyādya gṛhe buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhaktam,
S01divyav_u:7812: tavādya buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhukte iha parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi labhyate/
S01divyav_u:7814: 190.014 na mamaitadbhaktam, api tu tasyaitadgṛhapatiputrasya bhaktam/
S01divyav_u:7816: te tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayanti--gṛhapatiputra, dīyatāmasmākaṃ bhuktaśeṣam yadasti/
S01divyav_u:7820: te tenānnapānena saṃtarpitā gṛhapatergatvā kathayanti--tasya te gṛhapate lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te niveśane buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'nnapānena saṃtarpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7823: 190.019 anena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'nnapānena saṃtarpito na mayeti/
S01divyav_u:7824: 190.020 te pṛcchanti--katarasyāyaṃ gṛhapateḥ putrah? amukasya sārthavāhasya/
S01divyav_u:7827: śakyaṃ bahubhirekaḥ samuddhartum, na tveva ekena bahavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7828: 190.022 tadayaṃ paṭakaṃ prajñapto yena vo yat parityaktam, so 'smin paṭake 'nuprayacchatviti/
S01divyav_u:7829: 190.023 te pūrvamevābhiprasannāḥ sārthavāhena ca protsāhitā iti tairyathāsambhāvyena maṇimuktādīni ratnāni dattāni/
S01divyav_u:7832: 190.025 sa kathayati--tāt, na mayā mūlyena dattamiti/
S01divyav_u:7833: sārthavāhaḥ kathayati--putra, na vayaṃ tava mūlyaṃ prayachāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7834: 190.026 yadi ca mūlyaṃ gaṇyate, ekena ratnenedṛśānāṃ bhaktānāmanekāni śatāni saṃvidyante/
S01divyav_u:7835: 190.027 kiṃ tu vayaṃ tavābhiprasannāḥ prasannādhikāraṃ kurmaḥ, gṛhāṇeti/
S01divyav_u:7836: sa kathayati--tāt, mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhojito deveṣūpapatsye iti/
S01divyav_u:7843: 190.031 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7845: mayā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā yadannapānamavaśiṣṭam [191]tadviṇijāṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:7847: kiṃ kalpate tanmama grahītumāhosvinna kalpata iti?
S01divyav_u:7849: 191.002 bhagavan, mā deveṣu notpapatsye? bhagavānāha--vatsa, puṣpametat, phalamanyadbhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:7850: 191.003 tena bhagavadvacanābhisampratyayāt parituṣṭena gatvā ratnāni gṛhītāni//
S01divyav_u:7852: tato rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ saṃnipatya saṃjalpaṃ kurvanti--bhavantaḥ, śreṣṭhī kālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7853: 191.006 kaṃ śreṣṭhinamabhiṣañcāma iti? tatraike kathayanti--yaḥ puṇyamaheśākhya iti/
S01divyav_u:7859: ārocitaṃ ca--bhavantaḥ, ya ekavarṇāni bījāni etasmāt kumbhāduddharet, sa śreṣṭhyabhiṣicyate/
S01divyav_u:7860: 191.010 yasya vaḥ śreṣṭhitvamabhipretaṃ ca, uddharatu iti/
S01divyav_u:7867: kathamenaṃ śreṣṭhinamabhiṣiñcāma iti? apare kathayanti--punarapi tāvat jijñāsāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7872: sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--yadapyanena mama bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:7875: tena tasya sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā duhitā bhāryārthaṃ dattā/
S01divyav_u:7877: sahasaivaṃ bhogairabhyudgata iti tasya sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sahasodgato gṛhapatiriti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
S01divyav_u:7878: 191.020 sa saṃlakṣayati--yā kācidasmākaṃ śrīsaubhāgyasampat, sarvāsau buddhaṃ bhagavantamāgamya/
S01divyav_u:7879: 191.021 yannvahaṃ punarapi buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojayeyam/
S01divyav_u:7881: 191.022 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7882: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ sahasodgataṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:7883: 191.024 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:7884_0: 191.025 atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:7884_1: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
S01divyav_u:7886: 191.027 atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7887_0: 191.028 atha sahasodgato gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:7887_1: samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena
S01divyav_u:7888: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:7889: 191.031 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto yena sahasodgatasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7891: 192.001 atha sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:7892_0: 192.002 anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
S01divyav_u:7892_1: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
S01divyav_u:7893: 192.005 tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāyasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:7894: yāṃ śrutvā sahasodgatena gṛhapatinā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:7895_0: 192.007 sa dṛṣṭasatyastrirudānamudānayati--idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na
S01divyav_u:7895_1: pitrā neṣṭena na svajanabandhuvargeṇa na rājñā na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhagavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam /
S01divyav_u:7902: eṣo 'haṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:7903: 192.012 upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetamabhiprasannamiti/
S01divyav_u:7904: atha bhagavān sahasodgataṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:7905: 192.015 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta sahasodgatena gṛhapatinā karma kṛtam yena bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:7908: bhagavānāha--sahasodgatenaiva bhikṣavo gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:7911: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipaṣyante,
S01divyav_u:7915: api tu upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:7917: 192.024 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//3//
S01divyav_u:7918: 192.025 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:7920: 192.027 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:7921: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:7922: 192.028 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:7924: tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:7926_0: 192.031 yāvadapareṇa samayena sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu
S01divyav_u:7927: 193.001 asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasyā/
S01divyav_u:7931: adrākṣīt sa gṛhapatistaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ kāyaprāsādikaṃ ca śānteneryāpathenodyānaṃ praviśantam/
S01divyav_u:7936: sa gṛhapatiḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--ārya, kiṃ nivartase tvam? piṇḍakenārthī/
S01divyav_u:7941: 193.010 so 'pi tasya piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7942: 193.011 yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya gṛhapateranyatarakarvaṭake kiṃcit karaṇīyamutpannam/
S01divyav_u:7943: sa patnīmāmantrayate--bhadre, mamāmuṣmin karvaṭake kiṃcit karaṇīyamutpannam/
S01divyav_u:7947: aparasmin divase sā gṛhapatnī kālyamevotthāya tadarthamannapānaṃ sādhayitumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:7949: sā kathayati--putra, yo 'sau udyāne śāntātma pravrajitastiṣṭhati, tasyārthe sādhyata iti/
S01divyav_u:7950: 193.016 sa ruṣitaḥ kathayati--amba, kimarthaṃ bhṛtikayā karma kṛtvā na bhuṅkta iti?
S01divyav_u:7955: patnīmāmantrayate--bhadre, kṛtaste tasya piṇḍakenāvighātah? āryaputra kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7956: 193.019 kiṃ tu anena dārakeṇa tasyāntike kharāvāgniścāritā/
S01divyav_u:7957: 193.020 sa kathayati--bhadre, kiṃ kathayati? tayā vistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:7959: 193.021 gacchāmi, taṃ mahātmānaṃ kṣamāpayāmi--mā atyantameva kṣato bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:7960: 193.022 iti viditvā taṃ dārakamādāya yena pratyekabuddhastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7963: 193.024 tat kimatra kāraṇamiti? asamanvāhṛtya śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartate/
S01divyav_u:7966: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī/
S01divyav_u:7967: 193.026 sa tasyānukampārthaṃ vitatapakṣa hava haṃsarāja uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7969: 193.028 sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ saputraḥ pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7970: tataḥ sa dāraka āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ kathayati--avatara avatara sadbhūtadakṣiṇīya,
S01divyav_u:7973: sa gṛhapatiputrastīvreṇāśayena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kharā vāgniścāritā,
S01divyav_u:7979: 194.003 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavah? yo 'sau gṛhapatiputraḥ, eṣa evāsau sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:7980: 194.004 yadanena pratyekabuddhasyāntike kharā vāgniścāritā, tena pañca janmaśatāni bhṛtakapuruṣo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7982: yat punastasyaivāntike cittamabhiprasādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam, tena sahasaiva bhogairabhivṛddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7984: ahaṃ cānena pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7985: 194.007 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7988: 194.009 tasmāttarhi ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7990: (iyaṃ tāvadutpattir na tāvat buddho bhagavāñ śrāvakāṇāṃ vinaye śikṣāpadam/?)
S01divyav_u:7996: ekasmin samaye bhagavān bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśābhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
S01divyav_u:7997: 195.003 tatra bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:7998: yāvadāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau tatprathamataraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau,
S01divyav_u:8000_0: 195.005 atredānīṃ bhikṣavaḥ kimāścaryam yadetarhi śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣū
S01divyav_u:8000_3: buddhapramukhe bhikṣusaṃghe tatprathamataraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau,
S01divyav_u:8004: 195.013 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvanyuttarāpathe bhadraśilā nāma nagarī rājadhānī abhūt,
S01divyav_u:8005: ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca/
S01divyav_u:8006_0: 195.014 dvādaśayojanānyāyāmena dvādaśayojanāni vistareṇa caturasrā caturdvārā suvibhaktā
S01divyav_u:8008: 195.018 tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyāmagurugandhāścandanagandhāścūrṇagandhāḥ sarvakālikāśca kusumagandhā nānāvātasamīritā atiramaṇīyā vīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vāyavo vāyanti sma/
S01divyav_u:8009: 195.019 hastyaśvarathapattibalakāyasampannā yugyayānopaśobhitā vistīrṇātiramaṇīyavīthīmahāpathā ucchritavicitradhvajapatākā toraṇagavākṣārdhacandrāvanaddhā amarālaya iva śobhate/
S01divyav_u:8012_0: 195.025 bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāmanyataraṃ maṇigarbhaṃ nāma rājodyānaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalavṛkṣaviṭapopaśobhitaṃ
S01divyav_u:8014_0: bhadraśilāyāṃ rājādhānyāṃ rājābhūccandraprabho nāma abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko
S01divyav_u:8016: na ca maṇirvā pradīpo vā ulkā vā purastāt nīyate,
S01divyav_u:8017: api tu svakāt kāyāt rājñaścandraprabhasya prabhā niścaranti tadyathā candramaṇḍalādraśmayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8018: 195.032 anena kāraṇena rājñaścandraprabhasya candraprabha iti saṃjñā babhūva//
S01divyav_u:8019: 196.001 [196]tena khalu samayenāsmiñ jambudvīpe 'ṣḍaṣaṣṭinagarasahasrāṇi babhūvurbhadraśilārājadhānīprabhukhāni ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
S01divyav_u:8020: 196.002 apīdānīṃ jambudvīpakā akarā abhūvann aśulkā atarapaṇyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8023: 196.004 tena khalu samayena catuścatvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi jambudvīpe manuṣyāṇāmāyuṣaḥ pramāṇamabhūt/
S01divyav_u:8024: 196.005 rājā candraprabho bodhisattvo 'bhūt sarvaṃdadaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca/
S01divyav_u:8026: tena bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ nirgatya bahirdhā nagarasya caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu catvāro catvāro mahāyajñavāṭā māpitāśchatradhvajayūpapatākātyucchritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8035: 196.011 kumārāḥ kumārikāśca sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāḥ kṛtvā pradānāni dīyante/
S01divyav_u:8039: yena sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā āḍhyā mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8041: yathā asmiñ jambudvīpe ekamanuṣyo 'pi padbhyāṃ na gacchati/
S01divyav_u:8042: 196.016 sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā hastipṛṣṭhaiśca caturaśvayuktaiśca rathairuparisuvarṇamayai rūpyamayaiścātapatrairudyānenodyānaṃ grāmeṇa grāmamanuvicaranti sma/
S01divyav_u:8043: 196.018 tato rājñaścandraprabhasyaitadabhavat--kiṃ punarme itvareṇa dānena pradattena?
S01divyav_u:8046: yat sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājakrīḍayā krīḍeyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:8049: 196.022 rājñā candraprabheṇa tāvanti rājārhāṇi vastrāṇyalaṃkārāṇi maulayaḥ paṭṭāścānupradattāḥ,
S01divyav_u:8050: yena sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā maulidharāḥ paṭṭadharāśca saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8051: 196.023 yā rājñaścandraprabhasyākṛtistādṛśā eva sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8052: 196.024 tato rājñā candraprabheṇāṣṭaṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--sarve bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājakrīḍayā,
S01divyav_u:8055: 196.026 atha jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājñaścandraprabhasya ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇāṃ śrutvā sarva eva rājakrīḍayā krīḍitumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8057_0: 196.029 tena khalu samayena jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ rājalīlayā krīḍatām yaśca
S01divyav_u:8057_2: yaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ varṇamanojñaśabdo niścarati,
S01divyav_u:8058: tena sarvo jambudvīpo manojñaśabdanādito 'bhūt tadyathā devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmabhyantaraṃ devaputam [197]nṛttagītavāditaśabdena nirnāditam/
S01divyav_u:8059: 197.001 evameva tasmin kāle tasmin samaye sarvo jambudvīpavāsināṃ janakāyastena gītavāditaśabdena ekāntasukhasamarpito 'tyarthaṃ ramate/
S01divyav_u:8060: 197.002 tena khalu samayena bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dvāsaptatirayutakoṭīśatāni manuṣyāṇāṃ prativasanti sma/
S01divyav_u:8061: 197.004 teṣāṃ rājā candraprabha ṛṣṭo babhūva priyo manāpaśca/
S01divyav_u:8062: apīdānīṃ varṇākṛtiliṅgasthairyamasya nirīkṣamāṇā na tṛptimupayānti sma/
S01divyav_u:8063: 197.005 yasmiṃśca samaye rājā candraprabho mahāyajñavāṭaṃ gacchati,
S01divyav_u:8065: evaṃ cāhuh--devagarbho batāyaṃ rājā candraptabha iha jamudvīpe rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:8066: 197.007 na khalu manuṣyā īdṛgvarṇasaṃsthānā yādṛśā devasya candraprabhasyeti/
S01divyav_u:8068: tena tena strīsahasrāṇyavalokayanti--dhanyāstāḥ striyo yāsāmeṣa bharteti/
S01divyav_u:8073: 197.011 vyaktau paṇḍitau medhāvinau guṇaiśca sarvāmātyamaṇḍalaprativiśiṣṭau sarvādhikṛtau rājaparikarṣakau rājaparipālakau/
S01divyav_u:8075_0: 197.013 mahācandraścāgrāmātyo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ jambudvīpakān manuṣyān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu
S01divyav_u:8075_1: niyojayati--imān bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyā daśa kuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartatheti /
S01divyav_u:8076: 197.014 yādṛśī ca rājñaścakravartino 'vavādānuśāsanī, tādṛśī mahācandrasyāmātyasyāvavādānuśāsanī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:8077: 197.016 mahācandrasyāgrāmātyasya rājā candraprabha iṣṭaścābhūt priyaśca manāapaśca/
S01divyav_u:8079: 197.018 yāvadapareṇa samayena mahācandreṇāgrāmātyena svapno dṛṣṭah--rājñaścandraprabhasya dhūmavarṇaiḥ piśācairmaulirapanītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8082: abhūdromaharṣah--mā haiva devasya candraprabhasya śiroyācanaka āgacchet/
S01divyav_u:8085: 197.021 tasya buddhirutpannā--na mayā rājñaścandraprabhasya svapno nivedayitavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8086: 197.022 api tu ratnamayāni śirāṃsi kārayitvā koṣakoṣṭhāgāraṃ praveśya sthāpayitavyāni/
S01divyav_u:8087: 197.023 yadi nāma kaściddevasya śiroyācanaka āgacchet, tamenamebhī ratnamayaiḥ śirobhiḥ pralobhayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:8088: 197.024 iti viditvā ratnamayāni śirāṃsi kārayitvā koṣakoṣṭhāgareṣu prakṣipya sthāpitavān/
S01divyav_u:8089: 197.025 apareṇa samayena mahīdhareṇāgrāmātyena svapno dṛṣṭah--sarvaratnamayaḥ potaścandraprabhasya kulasthaḥ śataśo viśīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8090: 197.026 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītastrastaḥ saṃvignah--mā haiva rājñaścandraprabhasya rājyacyutirbhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarasya cāntarāya iti/
S01divyav_u:8091: 197.027 tena brāhmaṇā ye naimittikā vipaścikāścāhūya uktāh--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8093: 197.028 tatastairbrāhmaṇair naimittikairvipaścikaiśca samākhyātam--yādṛśo 'yaṃ tvayā svapno dṛṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8096_0: tato mahīdharo 'grāmātyaḥ svapnanirdeśaṃ śrutvā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--atikṣipraṃ
S01divyav_u:8097: 197.032 athāpareṇa samayenārdhatrayodaśābhiramātyasahasraih[198] svapno dṛṣṭah--rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu yajñavāṭeṣu karoṭapāṇibhiryakṣaiścachatradhvajapatākāḥ pātitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:8099: 198.002 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītāstrastāḥ saṃvignāh--mā haiva rājñaścandraprabhasya mahāpṛthivīpālasya maitrātmakasya kāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānityatābalamāgacchet,
S01divyav_u:8100: mā haiva asmākaṃ devena sārdhaṃ nānābhāvo bhaviṣyati vinābhāvo viprayogaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8103: tena śrutvā aṣṭaṣaṣṭinagarasahasreṣu ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--rājalīlayā bhavantaḥ sarve jambudvīpakā mānuṣyāḥ krīḍantu yāvadahaṃ jīvāmi/
S01divyav_u:8105: rājñaścandraprabhasya ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ śrutvā sarva eva jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājalīlayā krīḍitumārabdhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:8107_0: 198.010 tena khalu samayena jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ rājakrīḍayā krīḍatām yaśca
S01divyav_u:8107_1: rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati,
S01divyav_u:8110: evameva tasmin kāle tasmin samaye sarvo jambudvīpanivāsī janakāyastena gītaśabdenaikāntasukhasamarpito 'tyarthaṃ ramate//
S01divyav_u:8111: 198.016 tena khalu samayena gandhamādane parvate raudrākṣo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma indrajālavidhijñaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8112: 198.017 aśrauṣīdraudrākṣo brāhmaṇo bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ candraprabho nāma rājā sarvaṃdado 'smītyātmānaṃ pratijānīte/
S01divyav_u:8114: tasyaitadabhavat--yadi tāvat sarvadado bhaviṣyati, mama śiro dāsyati/
S01divyav_u:8115: 198.019 api tu duṣkarametadasthānamanavakāśo yadevamiṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ manāpamuttamāṅgaṃ parityakṣyati yaduta śīrṣam,
S01divyav_u:8118: atha gandhamādananivāsinī devatā vikroṣṭumārabdhā--hā kaṣṭaṃ rajñaścandraprabhasya maitrātmakasya mahākāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānityatābalaṃ pratyupasthitamiti/
S01divyav_u:8124: 198.024 bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ nātidūre pañcābhijño ṛṣiḥ praivasati viśvāmitro nāṃnā pañcaśataparivāro maitrātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8125: 198.026 atha sa ṛṣiḥ sarvajambudvīpamākulaṃ dṛṣṭvā māṇavakānāmantrayate--yatkhalu māṇavakā jānīta sarvajambudvīpa etarhyākulākulo dhūmāndhakāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:8126: 198.027 sūryācandramasau evamahānubhāvau na bhāsato na tapato na virocataḥ/
S01divyav_u:8129: 198.029 rodanti kinnaragaṇā vanadevatāśca dhikkāramutsṛjanti devagaṇā pi na sthuḥ/
S01divyav_u:8130: 198.031 candro na bhāti na vibhāti sahasraraśmir naiva vādyavāditaravo 'pi niśāmyate 'tra//1//
S01divyav_u:8131: 199.001 [199]ete hi pādapagaṇāḥ phalapuṣpanaddhā bhūmau patanti pavanairapi cālitāni/
S01divyav_u:8132: 199.003 saṃśrūyate dhvanirayaṃ ca yathātibhīmo vyakto bhaviṣyati pure vyasanaṃ mahāntam//2//
S01divyav_u:8133: 199.005 ete bhadraśilānivāsaniratāḥ sarve saduḥkhā janā atyantapratiśokaśalyavihatāḥ praspandakaṇṭhānanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8134: 199.007 etāścandranibhānanā yuvatayo rodanti veśmottame sarve ca prarudanti tīvrakaruṇāḥ santaḥ śmaśāne yathā//3//
S01divyav_u:8135: 199.009 kiṃ kāraṇaṃ puranivāsijanāḥ samagrāḥ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ manasi duḥkhamidaṃ vahanti/
S01divyav_u:8137: 199.013 ete payodā vinadantyatoyā jalāśrayāḥ śokamamī vrajanti/
S01divyav_u:8138: 199.015 bhuvorivāmbhasi ca bālasamīraṇāstā vātāḥ pravānti ca kharā rajasā vimiśrāḥ//5//
S01divyav_u:8141: 199.019 api tu khalu māṇavakā rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ na bhūyo manojñaḥ svaro niścarati/
S01divyav_u:8144: tato nagaravivāsinī devatā raudrākṣaṃ brahmaṇaṃ dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā yena rājā candraprabhāstenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:8145: 199.022 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ candraprabhamidamavocat--yatkhalu deva jānīyāh--adya devasya yācanaka āgamiṣyati hiṃsako viheṭhako 'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī/
S01divyav_u:8148: 199.025 atha rājā candraprabhaḥ śiroyācanakamupaśrutya pramuditamanā vismayotphalladṛṣṭirdevatāmuvāca--gaccha devate,
S01divyav_u:8151: 199.027 atha sā devatā rājñaścandraprabhasya idamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ viditvā duḥkhinī durmanaskā vipratisāriṇī tatraivāntarhitā/
S01divyav_u:8155: tato raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa praviśan devatayā nivāritah--gaccha pāpabrāhmaṇa, mā praviśa/
S01divyav_u:8158: 200.003 yāvadetat prakaraṇaṃ rājñā candraprabheṇa śrutam--yācanako me nagaradvāre devatayā vidhāryate iti/
S01divyav_u:8159: 200.004 śrutvā ca punarmahācandramagrāmātyamāmantrayate--yatkhalu mahācandra jānīyāh--yācanako me nagaradvāri devatayā vidhāryate/
S01divyav_u:8161: evaṃ deveti mahācandro 'grāmātyo rājñaścandraprabhasya pratiśrutya nagaradvāraṃ gatvā tāṃ devatāmuvāca--yatkhalu devate jānīyāh--praviśatveṣa brāhmaṇa,
S01divyav_u:8163_1: jānīyāh--eṣa brāhmaṇo raudracitto niṣkāruṇiko rājñaścandraprabhasya vināśārthaṃ bhadraśilāmanuprāptaḥ /
S01divyav_u:8165: eṣa mayā devate upāyaścintito yenāyaṃ brāhmaṇo na prabhaviṣyati devasya śiro grahītumiti/
S01divyav_u:8166: 200.011 atha mahācandro 'grāmātyo raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamādāya nagaraṃ praviśya ratnadharānājñāpayati--ānīyantāṃ bhavanto ratnamayāni śirāṃsi/
S01divyav_u:8168: bhāṇḍāgārikai ratnamayānāṃ śīrṣāṇāṃ rājadvāre rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8169: 200.014 mahācandreṇāgrāmātyena raudrākṣasya ratnamayāni śīrṣāṇyupadarśitāni--pratigṛhṇa tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa prabhūtāni ratnamayāni śīrṣāṇi/
S01divyav_u:8170: 200.015 yāvadāptaṃ ca te hiraṇyasuvarṇamanuprayacchāmi, yena te putrapautrāṇāṃ jīvikā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:8172: evamukte raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo mahācandramagrāmātyamidamavocat--na ratnamayairme śirobhiḥ prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:8174: api tvahamasya mahāpṛthivīpālasya sarvaṃdadasya sakāśamāgataḥ śiraso 'rthāya/
S01divyav_u:8175: 200.019 evamukte mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparau vyavasthitau--kimidānīṃ prāptakālamiti/
S01divyav_u:8176: 200.020 athaitadvṛttāntamupaśrutya rājā candraprabho mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau dūreṇa prakrośyaitadavocat--ānīyatāmeṣa matsamīpam/
S01divyav_u:8178_1: paridevamānau abhirudya devasya maitrātmakasya kāruṇikasya sattvavatsalāsyānekaguṇasamuditasya
S01divyav_u:8179: adyāsmākaṃ devena sārdhaṃ nānābhāvo bhaviṣyati vinābhāvo viprayogo visamyogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8180: 200.025 iti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya ekānte niṣaṇṇau/
S01divyav_u:8181: atha rājā candraprabhaḥ paramatyāgaprativiśiṣṭaṃ tyāgaṃ parityakukāmo dūrata eva taṃ brāhmaṇamāmantrayate--ehi tvaṃ brāhmaṇa,
S01divyav_u:8183: 200.027 atha raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo yena rājā candraprabhastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8184: 200.028 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ candraprabhaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā rājānaṃ candraprabhamidamavocat--
S01divyav_u:8185: 200.029 dharme sthito 'si vimale śubhabuddhisattva sarvajñatāmabhilaṣan hṛdayena sādho/
S01divyav_u:8186: 200.031 mahyaṃ śiraḥ sṛja mahākaruṇāgracetā mahyaṃ dadasva mama toṣakaro bhavādya//7//
S01divyav_u:8187_1: śrutvā pramuditamanāḥ prītivisphāritākṣo raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamuvāca--hantedaṃ brāhmaṇa
S01divyav_u:8189: 201.004 priyo yathā yadyapi caikaputrakastathāpi me kharpamidaṃ gṛhāṇa/
S01divyav_u:8190: 201.006 tvaccintitānāṃ phalamastu śīghraṃ śiraḥpradānāddhi labheya bodhim//8//
S01divyav_u:8192: yadā ca rājā candraprabheṇa śiraso maulirapanītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8193: tatsamanantarameva sarveṣāṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maulayaḥ patitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8194: 201.010 bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ caturdiśamulkāpātā diśodāhāśca prādurbhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8195: nagaradevatābhiśca śabdo niścāritah--asya rājñaścandraprabhasya pāpabrāhmaṇo śiraśchetsyatīti/
S01divyav_u:8196_1: śarīraparityāgaṃ viditvā sāśrudurdidavadanau rājñaścandraprabhasya pādau pariṣvajyāhatuh--dhanyāste
S01divyav_u:8196_2: puruṣā deva ya evamatyadbhutarūpadarśanaṃ vā drakṣyantīri /
S01divyav_u:8197_0: 201.014 tau abhimukhamudvīkṣyamāṇau rājani candraprabhe cittamabhiprasādya raudrākṣe
S01divyav_u:8197_1: ca brāhmaṇe maitryacittamutpādya nāvāṃ śakṣyāmo nirupamaguṇādhārāsya devasyānityatāṃ
S01divyav_u:8199_0: rājñaścandraprabhasyedamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ buddhvā tāṃ ca nagaranivāsinīnāṃ devatānāmārtadhvanimupaśrutya
S01divyav_u:8199_1: bhaumā yakṣā antarikṣacarāśca yakṣāḥ krinditumārabdhāh--hā kaṣṭamidānīṃ rājñaścandraprabhasya
S01divyav_u:8201: tato raudrākṣo brāhmaṇastaṃ mahājanakāyamavekṣya śiro grahītum/
S01divyav_u:8202: 201.021 yadi ca te śiraḥ parityaktam, ekāntaṃ gacchāva iti/
S01divyav_u:8203: 201.022 evamukte rājā candraprabho raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamavocat--evaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa kriyatām/
S01divyav_u:8204: 201.023 ṛddhyantāṃ tava saṃkalpāḥ, paripūryantāṃ manorathā iti/
S01divyav_u:8205: atha rājā candraprabho rājā āsanādutthāya tīkṣaṇamasimādāya yena maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8206: 201.024 atha rājā candraprabhasya idamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāmanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vikrośamānāni pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni/
S01divyav_u:8208: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ samāśvāsayannāha--apramādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmoṣviti/
S01divyav_u:8209: 201.027 saṃkṣepeṇa dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamādāya maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8210: 201.028 samanantarapraviṣṭasya rājñaścandraprabhasya maṇiratnagarbha udyāne bhadraśilāyāṃ chatrāṇi dhvajapatākāśca yena maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ tenāvanāmitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8211: 201.029 tato rājā candraprabho maṇiratnagarbhasyodyānasya dvāraṃ pidhāya taṃ taṃ raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamāmantrayate--pratigṛhyatāṃ brāhmaṇa mamottamāṅgamiti/
S01divyav_u:8212: 201.031 evamukte raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo rājānaṃ candraprabhamuvāca--nāhaṃ śakṣyāmi devasya śiraśchettumiti/
S01divyav_u:8218: 202.003 evaṃ cāhuh--kathamidānīṃ tvaṃ pāpabrāhmaṇa rājñaścandraprabhasyādūṣiṇo 'napakāriṇo mahājanavatsalasyānekaguṇasampannasya śiraśchetsyasīti?
S01divyav_u:8219: tato rājā candraprabha udyānadevatā nivārayati--mā devatā mama śiroyācanakasyāntarāyaṃ kuruta/
S01divyav_u:8220: 202.006 tatkasya hetoh? bhūtapūrvaṃ devatā mamottamāṅgam yācanakasya devatāyā antarāyaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8223: yadi tayā devatayā antarāyo na kṛto 'bhaviṣyat,
S01divyav_u:8225: 202.008 ataśca tvāmahamevaṃ bravīmi--mā me tvamuttamāṅgayācanakasyāntarāyaṃ kuruṣveti/
S01divyav_u:8226: 202.009 asminneva te maṇiratnagarbha udyāne mayā sahasraśaḥ śiraḥparityāgaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8228: 202.010 tasmāt tvaṃ devate mamottamāṅgayācanakasyāntarāyaṃ mā kuru/
S01divyav_u:8229: 202.011 eṣa eva devate sa pṛṣṭhībhūto maitreyo yo vyāghryā ātmānaṃ parityajya catvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito maitreyo bodhisattva ekena śiraḥparityāgenāvapṛṣṭhīkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8230: 202.013 atha sā devatā rājñaścandraprabhasya maharddhitāmavetya tasmin rājani paraṃ prasādaṃ pravedayantī tūṣṇīmavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:8231: 202.014 atha rājā candraprabhaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8234: asmiṃs tyāgaṃ svaśiraḥparityāgam yena cāhaṃ satyena svaśiraḥ parityajāmi,
S01divyav_u:8235_0: na rājyārthāya na svargārthāya na bhogārthāya na śakratvāya na brahmatvāya na cakravartivijayāya
S01divyav_u:8235_1: nānyatra kathamahamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambuddhya adāntān sattvān damayeyam,
S01divyav_u:8241: 202.020 anena satyena satyavacanena saphalaḥ pariśramaḥ syāt,
S01divyav_u:8243: asya ca maṇiratnagarbhasyodyānasya madhye mahān stūpaḥ syāt sarvastūpaprativiśiṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8244: 202.022 ye ca sattvāḥ śāntakāyā mahācaityaṃ vanditukāmā gaccheyuḥ,
S01divyav_u:8245: te taṃ sarvastūpaprativiśiṣṭaṃ dhātuparaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśrāntā bhaveyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:8246: 202.023 parinirvṛtasyāpi mama caityeṣu, janakāyā āgatya kārāṃ kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyāṇā bhaveyuriti/
S01divyav_u:8247: 202.024 evaṃ samyak praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃścampakavṛkṣe śikhāṃ baddhvā raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamuvāca--āgaccha mahābrāhmaṇa, pratigṛhyatām/
S01divyav_u:8249: 202.027 tato rājā candraprabha ātmanaḥ kāyasya sthāma ca balaṃ ca saṃjanya tasmiṃśca brāhmaṇe karuṇāsahagataṃ maitracittamutpādya śiraśichattvā raudrākṣāya brāhmaṇāya niryātitavān/
S01divyav_u:8250: 202.028 kālaṃ ca kṛtvā atikramya brahmalokaṃ praṇītatvācchubhakṛtsne devanikāye upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8251: 202.029 samanantaraparityakte rājñā candraprabheṇa śirasi ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus triḥ kampitaḥ saṃkampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8255: padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagarucūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi divyāni [203]māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi,
S01divyav_u:8265: 203.005 tata ekatyāstasminneva pradeśe sthitvā dhyānānyutpādya tatraiva kālaṃ kṛtvā śubhakṛtsne devanikāye upapannā rājñaścandraprabhasya sabhāgatāyām/
S01divyav_u:8266: 203.006 apare dhyānānyutpādya tatraiva kālaṃ kṛtvā bhāsvare devanikāye upapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8268: 203.008 aparaiḥ saṃnipātya rājñaścandraprabhasya śarīraṃ sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiścitāṃ citvā,
S01divyav_u:8272: gandhairmālyairdhūpairdīpaiḥ puṣpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā candraprabhe rājani svacittamabhiprasādya kālagatāḥ ṣaṭsu devanikāyeṣu kāmāvacareṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8273: 203.012 yaiśca tatra kārāḥ kṛtāḥ, sarve te svargamokṣaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvṛttā iti//
S01divyav_u:8274: 203.013 syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyā sā tena kālena samayenottarāpathe bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānyabhūditi/
S01divyav_u:8276: tatkasya hetoh? eṣaiva sā takṣaśilā tena kālena tena samayena bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:8277: 203.015 syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenottarāpathe bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānyabhūditi/
S01divyav_u:8279: tatkasya hetoh? eṣaiva sā takṣaśilā tena kālena tena samayena bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:8280: 203.015 syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣuvaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena candraprabho nāma rājābhūditi/
S01divyav_u:8282: tatkasya hetoh? ahameva tena kālena tena samayena rājā candraprabho babhūva/
S01divyav_u:8283: 203.018 syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena raudrākṣo nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūditi/
S01divyav_u:8285: tatkasya hetoh? eṣa eva sa tena kālena tena samayena devadatto babhūva/
S01divyav_u:8286: 203.020 syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyau tau tena samayena mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau babhūvaturiti/
S01divyav_u:8288: 203.022 tatkasya hetoh? etāveva mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau babhūvatuḥ/
S01divyav_u:8289: 203.023 tadāpyetau tatprathamataḥ kālagatau, na tveva putṛmaraṇamārāgitavantau iti//
S01divyav_u:8309: ayaṃ tāvat khustikayā ekottarikayā dharmaṃ deśayati--amī bhikṣavo dharmakathikā yuṃktamutkamuktapratibhānāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8310: 204.003 kasmānnaitānadhyeṣayasi? sa tairabhihitah--mahalla, kiṃ tvayā adhigatam? sa kathayati--ekottarikā/
S01divyav_u:8311: 204.004 te kathayanti--tvaṃ tāvanmahalla khustikayā ekottarikayā dharmaṃ deśayasi/
S01divyav_u:8314: sa kathayati--āryāḥ, yūyaṃ kasyārthe na deśayata?
S01divyav_u:8318: 204.008 sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi me utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kariṣyanti, nāgabhavane 'pyahamavakāśaṃ na lapsye/
S01divyav_u:8319: 204.009 sa teṣāṃ śayitakānāṃ taṃ vihāramantarhāpayitvā mahāsamudraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8321: 204.010 nandopananda, uttiṣṭha siṃhāsanaṃ prajñāpaya, dharmaṃ deśayāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8322: te kathayanti--ko 'pyasau devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhagavatyabhiprasanno buddhe dharme saṃghe kārān kurvan,
S01divyav_u:8325: bhagavānāha--yo 'sau bhikṣavo nirmito yadi ṣaḍvargikairbhikṣubhir na viheṭhito 'bhaviṣyat,
S01divyav_u:8332: 204.017 śrāvastyāṃ buddharakṣito nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8334: 204.018 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:8335: tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:8337: 204.020 tena sa gṛhapatiḥ sapatnīkaḥ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratikṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8338: apareṇa samayena sā tasya patnī āpannasattvā savṛttā/
S01divyav_u:8339: 204.021 āyuṣmāñ śāriputrastasya ca vaineyakālaṃ jñātvā ekākyeva tat kulamupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8341: sa kathayati--gṛhapate, kimasmākaṃ kāśadhānādvā kuśadhānādvā paścācchramaṇā bhavanti?
S01divyav_u:8342: api tu ye bhavadvidhānāṃ sakāśāllabhyante, asmākaṃ te paścācchramaṇā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:8343: 204.025 buddharakṣito gṛhapatih--ārya, mama patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:8344: yadi putraṃ janayiṣyati, tamahamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṃ dāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:8346: 204.027 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām {atyayāt} prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:8347: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8348: 204.029 tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma?
S01divyav_u:8352: tasminneva divase pañcānāṃ vaṇikśatānāṃ pañca putraśatāni jātāni/
S01divyav_u:8354: 205.001 saṃgharakṣito dāraka unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:8357: tadā āyuṣmāñ śāriputrastasya vaineyakālaṃ jñātvā ekākyeva tatkulamupasaṃkramya nimittamupadarśayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8359: ajāta eva tvaṃ mayā āryaśāriputrasya paścācchramaṇo datta iti/
S01divyav_u:8360: 205.006 caramabhavikaḥ sa āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa pravrājita upasampādita āgamacatuṣṭayaṃ ca grāhitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:8361_0: 205.007 athāpareṇa samayena tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānīya
S01divyav_u:8362: 205.009 te kathayati--bhavantaḥ, ayamasmākamāryasaṃgharakṣito vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṃśukrīḍanakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8365: ārya saṃgharakṣita, tvamasmākaṃ vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṃśukrīḍanakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8374: 205.015 eṣo 'pyasmābhiḥ sārdhamavataratu, asmākaṃ mahāsamudramadhyagatānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati/
