S01divyav_u:8383: 205.020 tatra bhagavān saṃgharakṣitamāmantrayate--gaccha saṃgharakṣita, bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā bhavitavyam/
S01divyav_u:8385: 205.023 atha tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni kṛtakautukamaṅgalasvastyayanāni śakṭairbhārairmūḍhaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitāni/
S01divyav_u:8386: 205.025 te nipuṇataḥ samudrayānapātraṃ pratipadya mahāsamudramavatīrṇā dhanahārakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8388: 205.027 te devatāyācanaṃ kartumārabdhāh--yo 'smin mahāsamudre devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā prativasati,
S01divyav_u:8391: 205.029 te kathayati--āryasaṃgharakṣito 'smākaṃ vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṃśukrīḍanako bhadantaśāriputreṇānupradattako bhagavatānuparītakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8392: 205.030 śreyo 'smākamanenaiva sārdhaṃ kālatriyā, na tvena vayaṃ saṃgharakṣitaṃ parityakṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8397: te kathayanti--ārya, tvamasmākaṃ vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṃśukrīḍanakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8400: na tveva vayamārya saṃgharakṣita tvāṃ parityakṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8401: 206.004 āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yaduktaṃ bhagavatā bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā te bhavitavyamitīdaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:8402: 206.005 sa pātracīvaraṃ gṛhītvā ātmānaṃ mahāsamudre prakṣeptumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8404: te kathayanti--āryasaṃgharakṣita kiṃ karoṣi, āryasaṃgharakṣita kiṃ karoṣīti/
S01divyav_u:8408: 206.008 ārya saṃgharakṣita, iyaṃ vipaśyitaḥ samyaksambuddhasya gandhakuṭī/
S01divyav_u:8409: iyaṃ śikhino viśvabhuvaḥ krakucchandasya kanakamuneḥ kāśyapasyeyaṃ bhagavato gandhakuṭī/
S01divyav_u:8410: 206.009 ārya saṃgharakṣita, bhagavataḥ sūtraṃ mātṛkā ca devamanuṣyeṣu pratiṣṭhitam/
S01divyav_u:8412: aho bata, āryaḥ saṃghāṃ rakṣita ihāpyāgamacatuṣṭayaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet/
S01divyav_u:8423: 206.015 sa eva teṣāmekaḥ sagauravaḥ sapratīśa iti karaṇīyaiśca sarvatra pūrvaṃgamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8433: sa kathayati--smṛtimattakā hyete dhārayiṣyanti, api tu doṣo 'styeṣām/
S01divyav_u:8434: 206.019 sa kathayati--ārya, ko doṣah? sarve hyete 'gauravā apratīśāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8438: 206.021 tvamevaikaḥ sagauravaḥ sapratīśa iti karaṇīyaiśca sarvatra pūrvaṃgamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8440: 206.023 yastāvadayaṃ cakṣuṣī nimīlayitvoddeśaṃ gṛhṇāti, ayaṃ dṛṣṭiviṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8441: yo 'pyayaṃ pṛṣṣṭhatomukha uddeśaṃ gṛhṇāti, eṣo 'pi śvāsaviṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8442: 206.024 yo 'pyeṣa dūrataḥ sthitvoddeśaṃ gṛhṇāti, eṣo 'pi sparśaviṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8444: sa bhīta utpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukaḥ kṛśāluko durbalako mlānako 'prāptakāyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8445: 206.026 sa kathayati--ārya, kasmāt tvamutpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukaḥ kṛśāluko durbalako mlānako 'prāptakāyaḥ saṃvṛttah?
S01divyav_u:8447: 206.028 sacet yuṣmākamanyatamo 'nyatamaṃ prakupyeta, māṃ nāmāvaśeṣaṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:8449: 206.029 api tu icchasi tvaṃ jambudvīpaṃ gantum? bhadramukha, icchāmi/
S01divyav_u:8458: te 'nupūrveṇa samudratīraṃ gatvā sarve te vaṇijaḥ śayitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8462: 207.005 asecanakā darśanena buddhaśca bhagavatāṃ varaḥ//1// iti/
S01divyav_u:8466: te kathayanti prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām--kutrāyaṃ saṃgharakṣitah? tatraika evamāhuh--purastādgacchati/
S01divyav_u:8471: āryasaṃgharakṣito bhavanto maharddhiko mahānubhāvo yaḥ samudramadhye na kālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:8472: 207.011 sa idānīṃ kālaṃ kariṣyati? sthānametadvidyate yadasau agrata eva yāsyati/
S01divyav_u:8475: 207.013 āyuṣmānapi saṃgharakṣitaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanasamaye sūryāṃśubhistāḍitaḥ pratibuddho yāvanna kiṃcitpaśyati/
S01divyav_u:8483: viśrāmayitvā vihāraṃ praveśito yāvat paśyati śobhanāṃ śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtāṃ praṇītaṃ cāhāramupahṛtam/
S01divyav_u:8484: 207.018 sa tairuktah--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita, mā tṛṣito 'si, mā bubhukṣito 'si?
S01divyav_u:8488: te kathayanti--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita, muṅkṣva, ādīnavo 'tra bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:8495: taistāvadayomudgaraiḥ parasparamārtasvaraṃ krandadbhiḥ śirāṃsi bhagnāni, yāvat kālādakālībhūtam/
S01divyav_u:8496: 207.024 tataḥ paścāt punarapi teṣāṃ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, te ca bhikṣavaḥ śānteneryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8498: 207.026 ke yūyamāyuṣmantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh?
S01divyav_u:8502: te kathayanti--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita, vayaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:8504: 207.029 te vayaṃ bhaktāgre raṇamutpādayitvā iha pratyekanarakeṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8507: jambudvīpaṃ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmārocaya--mā āyuṣmantaḥ saṃghamadhye raṇamutpādayiṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:8508: 207.031 mā asyaivamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhāgino bhaviṣyatha tadyathā śramaṇāḥ kāśyapīyāḥ//
S01divyav_u:8510: yāvat paśyati dvitīyaṃ vihāramudgataṃ mañcapīṭhavedikājālavātāyanaparikṣiptaṃ gavakṣaparimaṇḍitaṃ bhikṣūṃśca suprāvṛtān supraticchannāñ śāntāñ śānteryāpathe vyavasthitān/
S01divyav_u:8515: śobhanāṃ śayanāsanaprajñaptiḥ kṛtvā praṇītaṃ cāhāraṃ samanvāhṛtya sa tairuktah--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita muṅkṣva/
S01divyav_u:8521: tairātasvaraṃ krandadbhistāvadayorasena parasparamātmā sikto yāvat kāladakālībhūtam/
S01divyav_u:8522: 208.008 tataḥ paścāt punarapi sa teṣāṃ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8523: 208.009 te ca bhikṣavaḥ punarapi śāntāḥ śānteryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8524: sa teṣāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntah--ke yūyamāyuṣmantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh?
S01divyav_u:8525: duṣkuhakā bhadanta saṃgharakṣita jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ, nābhiśraddaddhāsyanti/
S01divyav_u:8527: te kathayanti--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita, vayaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:8528: 208.013 saṃghasya ca snehalābhe saṃpanne āgantukā bhikṣava āgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8529: tairasmābhiranāryaparigṛhītairevaṃ cittamutpāditam--na tāvadbhojayiṣyāmo yāvadete āgantukā bhikṣavo na prakrāntā bhaviṣyantīti/
S01divyav_u:8536: jambudvīpaṃ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmāraocaya--mā āyuṣmantaḥ śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātayiṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:8537: mā asya evamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhāgino bhaviṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:8539_0: 208.020 sa saṃprasthito yāvat paśyati tṛtīyaṃ vihāramudgataṃ mañcapīṭhavidikājālavātāyanagavākṣaparimaṇḍitaṃ
S01divyav_u:8541: 208.022 sa tena vihāra ādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ saṃprajvalita ekajvālībhūto dhmāyitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8543: 208.023 tataḥ paścāt punarapi teṣāṃ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, te ca bhikṣavaḥ śāntaśānteneryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8544: 208.024 sa teṣāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntah--ke yūyamāyuṣmantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh?
S01divyav_u:8545: duṣkuhakā bhadanta saṃgharakṣita jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ, nābhiśraddadhāsyasi/
S01divyav_u:8547: te kathayanti--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita vayaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:8553: 208.030 sa tatraiva sthito yāvat tasyānisaṅgena(?) punarapi bahavaḥ śīlavanto bhikṣava āgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8555: tairasmābhiramarṣajātaiḥ śuṣkāni kāṣṭhāni śuṣkāni tṛṇāni śuṣkāni gomayāni upasaṃhṛtya tasmin vihāro 'gnirdagdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8557: 209.001 [209]te vayaṃ śaikṣāśaikṣān pudgalān dagdhvā iha pratyekanarakeṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8560: jambudvīpaṃ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmārocaya--mā āyuṣmantaḥ sabrahmacāriṇāmantike praduṣṭacittamutpādayiṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:8561: mā asyaivamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhagino bhavino bhaviṣyatha tadyathā śramaṇaḥ kāśyapīyāḥ//
S01divyav_u:8562_0: 209.006 āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ saṃprasthito yāvat sattvānadrakṣīt stambhākārān kuḍyākārān
S01divyav_u:8562_1: vṛkṣākārān patrākārān puṣpākārān phalākārān rajjvākārān saṃmārjanyākārānudūkhalākārān
S01divyav_u:8566: te kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, kriyākāraṃ tāvat kurmah--bahubollakāḥ śramaṇāḥ śākyaputrīyā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:8573: 209.014 kathayati--kim yuṣmākaṃ pratiśrayaṃ na dīyate? api tu yuṣmākaṃ doṣo 'sti/
S01divyav_u:8575: 209.015 samayenāhaṃ bhavataḥ pratiśrayaṃ dāsye, sacet kiṃcinna mantrayasi/
S01divyav_u:8580: āyuṣmatā saṃgharakṣitena sā kuṭikā siktā saṃmṛṣṭā saṃmārjitā sukumārīṃ gomayakāsiṃ cānupradattā/
S01divyav_u:8582: te kathayati--bhadanta, śucyapi mārjantyete śramaṇāḥ śākyaputrīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8583: 209.019 āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito bahiḥ kuṭikāyāḥ pādau prakṣālya kuṭikāṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupashtāpya/
S01divyav_u:8585: sā rātryāḥ prathame yāme yenāyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitastenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:8588: 209.023 na paśyasi mayā triyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṃ labdham, kiṃ niṣkāsāpayitumicchasi?
S01divyav_u:8594: 209.026 na paśyasi mayā kriyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṃ labdham?
S01divyav_u:8601: na paśyasi mayā kriyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṃ labdham?
S01divyav_u:8605: api tu nanūktaṃ bhagavatā bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā te bhavitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:8606: 209.032 āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--śobhanaṃ kathayati--sacet sa niṣkāsayiṣyati, [210]gamiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:8609: 210.003 na nagnacaryā na jaṭā na paṅko nānāśanaṃ sthaṇḍalaśāyikā vā/
S01divyav_u:8611: 210.007 alaṃkṛtaścāpi careta dharmaṃ dāntendrayaḥ śāntaḥ samyato brahmacārī/
S01divyav_u:8612: 210.009 sarveṣu bhūteṣu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ sa brāhmaṇaḥ sa śramaṇa sa bhikṣuḥ//3//
S01divyav_u:8615: ityeka upasaṃkrānto dvitīyastṛtīyo yāvat sarve upasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8616: 210.012 tathā tayā devatayā adhiṣṭhitam, yathā parasparaṃ na paśyanti/
S01divyav_u:8620: 210.016 kurvantu maitrīṃ satataṃ prajāsu divā ca rātrau ca carantu dharmam//4// iti/
S01divyav_u:8629: te dṛṣṭasatyāḥ kathayanti--labhemo vayaṃ bhadanta saṃgharakṣita svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:8631: āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ kathayati--kiṃ matsakāśe pravrajatha, āhosvidbhagavatah?
S01divyav_u:8633: 210.024 āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ kathayati--yadyevam, āgacchatha, bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gacchāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8634: te kathayanti--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita, kimasmadīyayā ṛddhyā gacchāmaḥ, āhosvit tvadīyayā?
S01divyav_u:8638: āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito 'nyatamaṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:8646: 211.001 te āyuṣmatā saṃgharakṣitenābhihitāh--bhavantaḥ, gṛhṇīdhvaṃ madīyaṃ cīvarakarṇikam, yāsyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8648: 211.003 athāyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājastata eva ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:8649: 211.004 yāvat tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni bhāṇḍaṃ pratisāmayanti/
S01divyav_u:8654: sa kathayati--imāni pañca kulaputraśatānyākāṅkṣanti svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:8660: 211.010 tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:8662: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣuvaḥ saṃgharakṣito bhikṣuḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:8665: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8666: 211.014 ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito bhagavantamidamavocat--idaṃ bhadanta kulaputrasahasramākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:8668: te bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitāh--eta bhikṣuvaścarata brahmacaryam/
S01divyav_u:8669: 211.017 bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravaḥ pātrakarakavyagrahastā varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitāḥ//
S01divyav_u:8670: 211.020 ehīti caoktā hi tathāgatena muṇḍāśca saṃghāṭiparītadehāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8671: 211.022 sadyaḥ praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṃ sthitā buddhamanorathena//5//
S01divyav_u:8674: 211.025 arhantaḥ saṃvṛttāstraidhātukavītarāgāḥ pūrvavadyāvat pūjyāśca abhivādyāśca saṃvṛttāḥ//
S01divyav_u:8675_0: 211.027 āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--ihāhaṃ bhadanta sattvānadrākṣaṃ
S01divyav_u:8675_1: kuḍyākārān stambhākārān vṛkṣākārān patrākārān puṣpākārān phalākārāan rajjvākārān
S01divyav_u:8678: bhagavānāha--yāṃstvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvānadrākṣīḥ kuḍyākārāṃste kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:8680: 212.001 te tasya karmaṇo vipākena kuḍyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8682: 212.002 yān saṃgharakṣita sattvānādrākṣīrvṛkṣākārāṃste kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:8683: 212.003 taiḥ sāṃghikāḥ puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāḥ paudgalikaparibhogena bhuktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8684: 212.004 te tasya karmaṇo vipākena vṛkṣākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8685: yathā vṛkṣākārāḥ, evaṃ patrākārāaḥ phalākārāḥ puṣpākārāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8686: 212.005 yaṃ tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣī rajjvākāram, sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvaka āsīt/
S01divyav_u:8692: sa taiḥ pṛṣṭah--śrāmaṇeraka, kiṃ saṃghasya pānakaṃ bhaviṣyati? sa kathayati--nāstīti/
S01divyav_u:8695: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena tapvākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8696: 212.012 yaṃ tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣīrudūkhalākāram, sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvaka āsīt/
S01divyav_u:8699: 212.014 sa tenoktah--śrāmaṇeraka, dadasva me khalastokaṃ kuṭṭayitvā/
S01divyav_u:8705: tvāmevāhamasminn udūkhale prakṣipya kuṭṭaye prāgeva khalastokam/
S01divyav_u:8706: 212.016 yattadarhato 'ntike kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam, sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena udūkhalākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8707: 212.017 yāṃstvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvānadrākṣīḥ sthālyākārāṃste kāśyapasya samyaksambbuddhasya kalpikārakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:8708: 212.018 te bhikṣūṇāṃ bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayamānāḥ sthālikāṃ bhañjate/
S01divyav_u:8710: te tasya karmaṇo vipākena sthālyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8711: 212.020 yaṃ tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣīrmadhye chinnastantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati,
S01divyav_u:8712: sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajita āsīllābhagrāhikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8713: 212.021 tena yadvārṣikaṃ lābhaṃ tad dhaimantikaṃ pariṇāmitam, yaddhaimantikaṃ tadvārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:8714: 212.022 tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnastantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati//
S01divyav_u:8718: 213.002 bhikṣuvaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kuto bhadanta tena nāgakumāreṇa tatprathamataḥ śraddhā pratilabdhā?
S01divyav_u:8719_1: kāśyapo nāma śāstā lokam utpannastathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ
S01divyav_u:8719_2: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S01divyav_u:8720: 213.005 sa evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati--etāni bhikṣavo 'raṇyāni śūnyāgārāṇi parvatakandaragiriguhāpalālapuñjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni dhyāyata/
S01divyav_u:8728: kecit tāsu tāsu grāmanigamarājarāṣṭradhānīṣu gatvā dhyāyanti//
S01divyav_u:8729: 213.011 anyatamaśca cirajātako nāgakumāraḥ suparṇinā pakṣirājena sumerupariṣaṇḍāyāmupariṣṭādapahriyate/
S01divyav_u:8730: 213.012 yāvat tena bhikṣavo dhyānādhyayanayogamanasikārayuktā viharanto dṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8732: 213.013 prasādajātaḥ saṃlakṣayati--muktā hyete āryakā evaṃvidhād duḥkhāt/
S01divyav_u:8733: 213.014 cyutaḥ kālagato vārāṇasyāṃ ṣaṭkarmanirate brāhmaṇakule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8735: 213.015 so 'pareṇa samayena kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8740: kutra mama mātāpitarau? yāvat paśyati nāgabhavane rudantau tiṣṭhataḥ/
S01divyav_u:8743: tau kathayatah--ārya, sucirajātako 'smākaṃ nāgakumāraḥ suparṇinā pakṣirājenāpahṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8746: tādṛśaḥ sa duṣṭānāgo yadvayaṃ sugatigamanamapi na saṃbhāvayāmaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8749: pādayor nipatya kathayatah--ārya, evaṃvidhāstvayā guṇagaṇā adhigatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8751: 213.023 ihaiva tvamāgamya divase divase bhaktakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā gaccha/
S01divyav_u:8752: sa nāgabhavane divyāṃ sudhāṃ paribhuktvā āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:8754: sa bhikṣubhiruktah--śrāmaṇeraka, ayaṃ te upādhyāyaḥ kutra bhuktvā āgacchati?
S01divyav_u:8756: 213.025 te kathayanti--nāgabhavane divyāṃ sudhāṃ paribhujya pāribhujyāgacchati/
S01divyav_u:8757: 213.026 tvaṃ kasyārthe na gacchati? sa kathayati--ayaṃ maharddhiko mahānubhāvo yena gacchati/
S01divyav_u:8758: 213.027 kathamahaṃ gacchāmi? te kathayanti--yadā ayam ṛddhyā gacchati, tadā tvamasya cīvarakarṇikaṃ gṛhāṇa/
S01divyav_u:8764: 213.030 yo yasmin sthāne 'ntardhāsyati, tena tatra nimittamudgṛhītam/
S01divyav_u:8767: tau upari vihāyasā [214]prakrāntau yāvat tau nāgairdṛṣṭau/
S01divyav_u:8770: sa saṃlakṣayati--kasyārthe 'yamapara āsanaḥ prajñaptah? sa pratinivartya paśyati yāvat śrāmaṇerakam/
S01divyav_u:8776: 214.005 taistasya divyā sudhā dattā, tasyāpi prākṛta āhāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:8778: tena tasya pātraṃ gṛhītam yāvat tatraikā odanamijya(?) vatiṣṭhate/
S01divyav_u:8781: ekadhye niṣaṇṇayorasya divyā sudhā dattā, mamāpi prākṛta āhāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:8782: 214.008 sa praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare mahādakṣiṇīye brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam,
S01divyav_u:8784: 214.010 tasya dṛṣṭa eva dharme ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ jalaṃ syanditumārabdham/
S01divyav_u:8788: sa kathayati--bhadramukha, apāyā hyete, nivartaya cittam/
S01divyav_u:8791: 214.015 ihasthasyaiva me bhadanta pāṇibhyāṃ syandate jalam//1//
S01divyav_u:8793: tatra bhikṣavastena nāgakumāreṇa tatprathamataḥ śraddhā pratilabdhā//
S01divyav_u:8797: 215.002 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā saṃgharakṣitena karma kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:8798: yasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahābhoge kule jāto bhagavato 'ntike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam?
S01divyav_u:8800: bhagavānāha--saṃgharakṣitenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāni kṛtāni upacitāni pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:8801: 215.005 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ nāma śāstā pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:8805: 215.008 anena tatra yāvadāyuḥparyantaṃ brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam, na kaścidguṇo 'dhigataḥ/
S01divyav_u:8808: 215.010 maraṇasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā kāśyape bhagavati samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare mahādakṣiṇīye yāvadāyurbrahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam,
S01divyav_u:8810: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenottaro nāma māṇavo varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāmavaśyabhāgīyakasya bhāvyatāyāṃ buddho,
S01divyav_u:8814: te kathayanti--upādhyāya, asti kiṃcit tvayā guṇagaṇamadhigatam? sa kathayati--nāsti/
S01divyav_u:8815: 215.015 kiṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam? idaṃ cedaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:8816: 215.016 te kathayanti--vayamapyupādhyāyameva kalyāṇamitramāgamya tasyaiva bhagavato 'ntike sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ/
S01divyav_u:8817: 215.017 karvaṭanivāsinā janakāyena śrutaṃ glāna āryaka iti/
S01divyav_u:8820: 215.019 kiṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam? idaṃ cedaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:8821: te kathayanti--vayamapyāryameva kalyāṇamitramāgamya tasyaiva bhagavato 'ntike sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ//
S01divyav_u:8822: 215.021 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavah? yo 'sau vaiyāvṛtyakaraḥ, eṣa evāsau saṃgharakṣito bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:8823: 215.022 yāni tāni pañca sārdhaṃvihāriśatāni, etānyeva tāni pañcabhikṣuśatāni/
S01divyav_u:8824: yo 'sau karvaṭanivāsī janakāyaḥ, etānyeva tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni/
S01divyav_u:8826: tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8828: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mamāntike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtamevaṃ ca vaineyakāryaṃ kṛtam//
S01divyav_u:8829: 215.027 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākah...pūrvavat//
S01divyav_u:8832: 216.002 yo 'sau svamāṃsatanubhiryajanāni kṛtvā tāvacciraṃ karuṇayā jagato hitāya/
S01divyav_u:8833: 216.003 tasya śramasya saphalīkaraṇāya santaḥ saṃmārjitaṃ śṛṇuta sāmpratabhāṣyamāṇam//1//
S01divyav_u:8835: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharatīti sūtraṃ vaktavyam/
S01divyav_u:8838: 216.013 evamanuśrūyate--yadā bhagavān parinirvāṇakālasamaye palālanāgaṃ vinīya kumbhakārīṃ caṇḍālīṃ gopālīṃ ca,
S01divyav_u:8840: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--asyāmānanda mathurāyāṃ mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya gupto nāma gāndhiko bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:8841: 216.015 tasya putro bhaviṣyatyupagupto nāma alakṣaṇako buddho yo mama varṣaśatapatinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṃ bhavi(kari)ṣyati/
S01divyav_u:8843: te 'ṣṭādaśahastāmāyāmena dvādaśahastāṃ vistāreṇa caturaṅgalamātrābhiḥ śaṇakābhiḥ pūjayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:8844: 216.018 eṣo 'gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāṃ bhaviṣyatyavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:8845: 216.019 paśyasi tvamānanda dūrata eva nīlanīlāmbararājim? evaṃ bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:8847: atra varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya śāṇakavāsī nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:8848: 216.021 so 'tra rurumuṇḍaparvate vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati, upaguptaṃ ca pravrājayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:8849: 216.022 mathurāyāmānanda naṭo bhaṭaśca dvau bhrātarau śreṣṭhinau bhaviṣyataḥ/
S01divyav_u:8851: 216.024 etadagraṃ me ānanda bhaviṣyati śamathānukūlānāṃ śayyāsanānām yadidaṃ naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatanam/
S01divyav_u:8852: 216.025 athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--āścaryaṃ bhadanta yadīdṛśamāyuṣmānupagupto bahujanahitaṃ kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:8854: yathā atīte 'pyadhvani tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraiva urumuṇḍaparvate trayaḥ pārśvāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8859: sa tam yūthamapahāya yatra pārśve pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni prativasanti, tatra gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:8860: 216.030 tasya tān pratyekabuddhān dṛṣṭvā prasādo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8861: sa teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ śīrṇaparṇāni mūlaphalāni copanāmayati/
S01divyav_u:8863: sa vṛddhānte praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā yāvannavāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkenopaviśati,
S01divyav_u:8865: 217.001 [217]sa teṣāṃ śīrṇaparṇāni mūlaphalāni copanāmayati, te na pratigṛhṇanti/
S01divyav_u:8868: 217.003 tataḥ sa markaṭaḥ śocitvā paridevitvā ca dvitīyaṃ pārśvaṃ gato yatra pañca ṛṣiśatāni prativasanti/
S01divyav_u:8878: yadā ca tairīryāpatho vikopito bhavati, tadā sa teṣāmagrataḥ paryaṅkaṃ badhnāti/
S01divyav_u:8880: tenāpi coktam--paryaṅkena tāvanniṣīdatha, yāvat tāni pañca ṛṣiśatāni paryaṅkenopaviṣṭāni/
S01divyav_u:8881: 217.009 te 'nācāryakā anupadeśakāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmānāmukhīkṛtya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkṛtavantaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8884: 217.012 tairyāvat sa markaṭaḥ phalamūlaiḥ paripālitaḥ, kālagatasya ca taccharīraṃ gandhakāṣṭhairdhmāpitam//
S01divyav_u:8885: 217.014 tatkiṃ manyase ānanda? yo 'sau pañcānāṃ markaṭaśatānām yūthapatiḥ, sa eṣa upaguptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8886: 217.015 tadāpi tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraivorumuṇḍe parvate bahujanahitaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:8887: anāgate 'pyadhvani varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama atraivorumuṇḍe parvate bahujanahitaṃ kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:8888: 217.016 tacca yathaivaṃ tathopadarśayiṣyāmah--yadā sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā urumuṇḍe parvate vihāraḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8891: 217.018 sa yāvat samanvāharati--yo 'sau tasya putra upagupto nāṃnā alakṣa.ṅko buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8895: 217.021 sa yadā abhiprasannastadā sthaviraḥ saṃbahulairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdhamekadivasaṃ tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8898: 217.023 yāvadgupto gandhikaḥ sthaviraṃ śāṇakavāsinamekākinaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--na khalu āryasya kaścit paścāccchramaṇah?
S01divyav_u:8900: yadi kecit śraddhāpurogena pravrajanti, te 'smākaṃ paścācchramaṇā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:8901: 217.025 gupto gāndhika uvāca--ārya, ahaṃ tāvadgṛhavāse parigṛddho viṣayābhirataśca/
S01divyav_u:8903: api tu yo 'smākaṃ putro bhavati, taṃ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṃ dāsyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8908: 217.029 sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamadhigamyovāca--vatsa,
S01divyav_u:8914: 217.032 yo 'smākaṃ dvitīyaḥ putro bhaviṣyati, taṃ vayamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṃ dāsyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8915: yāvat sthavirah [218]śāṇakavāsī samanvāharati--kimayaṃ sa upaguptah? paśyati neti/
S01divyav_u:8925: gāndhika uvāca--ārya marṣaya, eko 'smākaṃ dravyaṃ saṃśayiṣyati, sa āryasya dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8926: 218.007 yāvat sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī samanvāharati--kimayaṃ sa upaguptah? paśyati neti/
S01divyav_u:8928: yāvadguptasya gāndhikasya tṛtīyaḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇamasamprāptaśca divyavarṇam/
S01divyav_u:8929: 218.009 tasya vistareṇa jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā upagupta iti nāma kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:8938: 218.014 yadā tena samayaḥ kṛtaḥ, tadā māreṇa sarvāvatī mathurā gandhāviṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:8943: sa dharmeṇa vyavahāraṃ karoti, gandhān vikrīṇīte/
S01divyav_u:8945: kīdṛśāste cittacetasikāḥ pravartante kliṣṭā vā akliṣṭā veti?
S01divyav_u:8946: upagupta uvāca--ārya, naiva jānāmi kīdṛśāḥ kliṣṭāścittacetasikāḥ, kīdṛśā akliṣṭā iti/
S01divyav_u:8947: 218.019 sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī uvāca--vatsa, yadi kevalaṃ cittaṃ parijñātuṃ na śakyasi, pratipakṣaṃ mocayitum/
S01divyav_u:8948: 218.020 tena tasya kṛṣṇikapaṭṭikā dattā pāṇḍurikā ca/
S01divyav_u:8949: 218.021 yadi kliṣṭaṃ cittamutpadyate, kṛṣṇikāṃ paṭṭikāṃ sthāpaya/
S01divyav_u:8951: 218.022 śubhāṃ manasi kuru, buddhānusmṛtiṃ ca bhāvayasveti tenāsya vyapadiṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:8953: sa dvau bhāgau kṛṣṇikānāṃ sthāpayati, ekaṃ pāṇḍurikāṇām/
S01divyav_u:8955: 218.025 yāvat dvau bhāgau pāṇḍurikāṇāṃ sthāpayati, ekaṃ kṛṣṇikānām/
S01divyav_u:8956: yāvadanupūrveṇa sarvāṇyeva śuklāni cittānyutpadyante, sa pāṇḍurikāṇāmeva paṭṭikāṃ sthāpayati/
S01divyav_u:8959: tasyā dāsī upaguptasakāśaṃ gatvā gandhān krīṇāti/
S01divyav_u:8960: 218.029 so vāsavadattayā cocyate--dārike, muṣyate sa gāndhikastvayā/
S01divyav_u:8963: upagupto gāndhikadārako rūpasampannaścāturyamādhuryasampannaśca dharmeṇa vyavahāraṃ karori/
S01divyav_u:8964: 218.031 śrutvā ca vāsavadattāyā upaguptasakāśe sānurāgaṃ cittamutpannam/
S01divyav_u:8970: 219.002 tasyā buddhirutpannā--niyataṃ pañca purāṇaśatāni notsahate dātum/
S01divyav_u:8971: tayā yāvaddāsī upaguptasakāśaṃ preṣitā--na mamāryaputrasakāśāt kārṣāpaṇenāpi prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:8976: anyataraśca sārthavāha uttarāpathāt pañcaśatamaśvapaṇyaṃ gṛhītvā mathurāmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8978: 219.007 sa pañca puraṇaśatāni gṛhītvā bahūṃśca prābhṛtān vāsavadattāyāḥ sakāśāmabhigataḥ/
S01divyav_u:8979: 219.008 tato vāsavadattayā lobhākṛṣṭena taṃ śreṣṭhiputraṃ praghātayitvā^vaskare prakṣipya sārthavāhena saha ratimanubhutā/
S01divyav_u:8983: vāsavadattāṃ hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne chorayantu/
S01divyav_u:8984: 219.011 yāvat tairvāsavadattā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne choritā/
S01divyav_u:8985: 219.012 yāvadupaguptena śrutam--vāsavadattā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne choritā/
S01divyav_u:8986: 219.013 tasya buddhirutpannā--pūrvaṃ tayā mama viṣayanimittaṃ darśanamākāṅkṣitam/
S01divyav_u:8987: idānīṃ tu tasyā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca vikārtitau, idānīṃ tu tasyā darśanakāla iti/
S01divyav_u:8990: 219.017 mokṣārthināṃ janmaparānmukhānāṃ śreyastadāsyāstu na darśanaṃ syāt//2//
S01divyav_u:8991: 219.019 idānīṃ tu tasyāḥ kāle 'yaṃ draṣṭuṃ gatamānarāgaharṣāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8994: 219.022 tasyāśca preṣikā pūrvaguṇānurāgāt samīpe 'vasthitā kākādīn nivārayati/
S01divyav_u:8996: yasya tvayā ahaṃ sakāśaṃ punaḥ punaranupreṣitā,
S01divyav_u:9002: 219.028 tataḥ preṣikāmuvāca--yau hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca maccharīrādvikartitau, tau śleṣayeti/
S01divyav_u:9005: tato vāsavadattā upaguptamagrataḥ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--āryaputra,
S01divyav_u:9006: yadā maccharīraṃ svasthabhūtaṃ viṣayaratyanukūlaṃ tadā mayā āryaputrasya punaḥ punardūtī visarjitā/
S01divyav_u:9009: idānīṃ mama hastapādau karṇanāsau ca vikartitau, svarudhirakardama evāvasthitā/
S01divyav_u:9012: 220.005 babhūva gātraṃ mama darśanakṣamaṃ tadā na dṛṣṭo 'si mayālpabhāgyayā//5//
S01divyav_u:9013: 220.007 etarhi kiṃ draṣṭumihāgato 'si yadā śarīraṃ mama darśanākṣamam/
S01divyav_u:9019: 220.016 nirīkṣyamāṇā api yatnavadbhir nāpyatra dṛṣṭāsi bhavedyathāvat//8//
S01divyav_u:9020: 220.018 idaṃ tu rūpaṃ tava dṛśyametat sthitaṃ svabhāve racanādviyuktam/
S01divyav_u:9021: 220.020 te 'paṇḍitāste ca vigarhaṇīyā ye prākṛte 'smin kuṇape ramante//9//
S01divyav_u:9023: 220.024 śirāsahasraiśca vṛte samantāt ko nāma rajyeta itaḥ śarīre//10//
S01divyav_u:9032: 221.006 saṃbuddhasya tu ye vacaḥ suvacasaḥ śṛṇvanti kurvantyapi te kāmāñ śramaśokaduḥkhajananān sadbhiḥ sadā garhitān/
S01divyav_u:9033: 221.008 tyaktvā kāmanimittamuktamanasaḥ śānte vane nirgatāḥ pāram yānti bhavārṇavasya mahataḥ saṃśritya mārgaplavam//14//
S01divyav_u:9037: 221.012 me tvāṃ sādhuṃ samāsādya buddhasya vacanaṃ śrutam//15//
S01divyav_u:9038: 221.013 yāvadupaguptena vāsavadattāyā anupūrvikāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyāni saṃprakāśitāni/
S01divyav_u:9040: tenātmīyayā dharmadeśanayā sahasatyābhisamayādanāgāmiphalaṃ vāsavadattayā ca srotāpattiphalaṃ prāptam/
S01divyav_u:9045: eṣāhaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharma ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ cetyāha--
S01divyav_u:9047: 221.024 tamamarabudhajanamahitaṃ jinaṃ virāgaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca//17// iti//
S01divyav_u:9048: 221.025 yāvadupagupto vāsavadattāṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9050: 221.026 devataiśca mathurāyāmārocitam--vāsavadattayā upaguptasakāśāddharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni, deveṣūpapanneti/
S01divyav_u:9051: 221.027 śrutvā ca mathurāvāsatavyena janakāyena vāsavadattāyāḥ śarīre pūjā kṛtā//
S01divyav_u:9052: 221.029 yāvat sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamabhigamyovāca--anujānīhi upaguptaṃ pravrājayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:9054: yadā na lābho na cchedo bhaviṣyati, tadā anujñāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:9055: 221.031 yāvat sthaviraśāṇakavāsinā ṛddhyā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā [222]
S01divyav_u:9057: tato gupto gāndhiko gaṇayati, tulayati, māpayati, paśyati--na lābho na cchedaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9058: 222.002 tataḥ sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamuvāca--ayaṃ hi bhagavatā buddhena nirdiṣṭo mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:9061: 222.004 tataḥ sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā upagupto naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatanaṃ nītaḥ, upasampāditaśca/
S01divyav_u:9065: tvaṃ bhagavatā nirdiṣṭo vaiṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mamopagupto nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyatyalakṣaṇako buddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9067: 222.008 eṣo 'gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāmavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:9071: mathurāyāṃ ca śabdo visṛtah--upagupto nāmālakṣaṇako buddho 'dya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:9076: paśyati pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanā kṛtā/
S01divyav_u:9077: 222.014 so 'pi pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9081: 222.016 yāvat sthaviropagupto vyavalokayati--kenāyaṃ vyākṣepaḥ kṛtah? paśyati māreṇa/
S01divyav_u:9083: upagupto dharmaṃ deśayati, muktāhāraṃ ca varṣopavarṣitamiti/
S01divyav_u:9084: 222.018 yāvat dvitīye 'pi divase sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāyāmārabdhāyāṃ māreṇa cāsyāṃ parṣadi suvarṇavarṣamutsṛṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:9087: 222.020 yāvat sthaviropagupto vyavalokayati--kenāyaṃ vyākṣepaḥ kṛtah? paśyati māreṇa pāpīyaseti/
S01divyav_u:9088: 222.021 yāvat tṛtīye śivase bahutarako janakāyo nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:9089: 222.022 upagupto dharmaṃ deśayati, muktāvarṣaṃ suvarṇavarṣaṃ ca patatīti/
S01divyav_u:9090: 222.023 yāvat tṛtīye 'pi divase sthaviropaguptaḥ pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyā nyārabdhaḥ saṃprakāśayitum/
S01divyav_u:9092: divyāni ca vādyāni saṃpravāditāni, divyāścāpsaraso nāṭayituṃ pravṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9093: 222.025 yāvadvītarāgo janakāyo divyāni rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā divyāṃśca śabdāñ śrutvā māreṇākṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9095: praītimanasā māreṇa sthaviropaguptasya śirasi mālā buddhā/
S01divyav_u:9097: 222.028 tasya buddhirutpannā--ayaṃ māro bhagavacchāsane mahāntaṃ vyākṣepaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:9098: 222.029 kimarthamayaṃ bhagavatā na vinītah? paśyati mamāyaṃ vineyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9099: tasya ca vinayāt sattvānugrahādahaṃ bhagavatā alakṣaṇako buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9100: 222.030 yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ samanvāharati--kimasya vinayakāla upasthita āhosvinneti?
S01divyav_u:9102: 222.031 tataḥ sthaviropaguptena trayaḥ kuṇapā gṛhītāh--ahikṛṇapaṃ kurkurakuṇapaṃ manuṣyakuṇapam/
S01divyav_u:9104: 223.001 dṛṣṭvā ca mārasya prītirutpannā--upagupto 'pi mayā ākṛṣṭa iti/
S01divyav_u:9111: 223.005 bhikṣujanapratikūlā mālā baddhā yathaiva me bhavatā/
S01divyav_u:9113: 223.007 yatte balaṃ bhavati tatpratidarśayasva buddhātmajena hi sahādya samāgato 'si/
S01divyav_u:9116: paramapi ca svayamanupraviśya pipīlika ivādrirājamapanayituṃ na śaśāka/
S01divyav_u:9118: 223.013 yadi moktuṃ na śakyāmi kaṇṭhāt śvakuṇapaṃ svayam/
S01divyav_u:9121: 223.016 brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ śatakratuṃ vā dīptaṃ vā praviśa hutāśamarṇavaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:9122: 223.018 na kledaṃ na ca pariśoṣaṇaṃ na bhedaṃ kaṇṭhasthaṃ kuṇapamidaṃ tu yāsyatīha//21//
S01divyav_u:9129: 223.026 kāmaṃ mamāpi mahadasti balaṃ tathāpi nāhaṃ tathāgatasutasya balena tulyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9130: 223.028 tejasvināṃ na khalu na jvalane 'sti kiṃ tu nāsau dyutirhutavahe ravimaṇḍale yā//24//
S01divyav_u:9132: 224.002 śaghrīṃ tameva śaraṇaṃ vraja yaṃ sametya bhraṣṭo hi yaḥ kṣititale bhavatīha janturuttiṣṭhati kṣitimasāvavalambya bhūyaḥ//25//
S01divyav_u:9135: 224.008 tasya buddhasya sāmarthya pramātuṃ ko nu śaknuyāt//26//
S01divyav_u:9140: 224.014 mohāndhena hi tatra tatra sa mayā taistair nayaiḥ kheditastenāhaṃ ca tathāpi nāma balinā naivāpriyaṃ śrāvitaḥ//28//
S01divyav_u:9141: 224.016 atha kāmadhātvadhipatirmāro nāstyanyā gatiranyatropaguptakādeveti jñātvā sarvamutsṛjya sthaviropaguptasamīpamupetya pādayor nipatyovāca--bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:9142: kimaviditametadbhadantasya yathā bodhimūlamupādāya mayā bhagavato vipriyaśatāni kṛtāni? kutah?
S01divyav_u:9146: 224.022 sa mayāyāsito nātho na cāhaṃ tena hiṃsitaḥ//30//
S01divyav_u:9147: 224.023 tvayā punarahaṃ vīra tyaktvā (tu) sahajāṃ dāyām/
S01divyav_u:9150: 224.026 kiṃ sarṣapeṇa samatāṃ nayasīha meruṃ khadyotakena raviṃ maṇḍalinā samudram/
S01divyav_u:9151: 224.028 anyā hi sā daśabalasya kṛpā prajāsu na śrāvakasya hi mahākaruṇāsti saumya//32//
S01divyav_u:9156: 225.002 brūhi brūhi śrīmatastasya bhāvaṃ saṅgaṃ chettuṃ kṣāntiguptavratasya/
S01divyav_u:9157: 225.004 yo 'sau mohānnityamāyāsito me tenāhaṃ ca prekṣito maitryeṇaiva//34//
S01divyav_u:9158: 225.006 sthavira uvāca--śṛṇu saumya, tvaṃ hi bhagavatyasakṛdasakṛdavaskhalitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9159: na ca buddhāvropitānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanyat prakṣālanamanyatra tathāgataprasādādeva/
S01divyav_u:9161: 225.009 tvaṃ nāpriyamiha proktaḥ priyāṇyeva tu lambhitaḥ//35//
S01divyav_u:9162: 225.010 nyāyenānena bhaktistava hṛdi janitā tenāgramatinā svalpāpi hyatra bhaktirbhavati matimatāṃ nirvāṇaphaladā/
S01divyav_u:9163: 225.012 saṃkṣepādyatkṛtaṃ te vṛjinamiha mune mohāndhamanasā sarvaṃ prakṣālitaṃ tattava hṛdayagataiḥ śraddhāmbuvisaraiḥ//36//
S01divyav_u:9165: 225.015 sthāne mayā bahuvidhaṃ parikhedito 'sau prāk siddhitaśca bhuvi siddhamanorathena/
S01divyav_u:9166: 225.017 sarvaṃ ca marṣitamṛṣipravareṇa tena putrāparādha iva sānunayena pitrā//37//
S01divyav_u:9167: 225.019 sa buddhaprasādāpyāyitamanāḥ suciraṃ buddhaguṇānanusmṛtya sthavirasya padayor nipatyovāca--
S01divyav_u:9168: 225.020 anugraho paraḥ kṛtastvayā niveśitam yanmayi buddhagauravam/
S01divyav_u:9169: 225.022 idaṃ tu kaṇṭhavyavalambi maitryā maharṣikopābharaṇaṃ visarjaya//38//
S01divyav_u:9171: māra uvāca--kaḥ samaya iti? sthavira uvāca--adyaprabhṛti bhikṣavo na viheṭhayitavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:9173: kamaparamājñāpayasīti? sthavira uvāca--evaṃ tāvacchāsanakāryaṃ prati mamājñā/
S01divyav_u:9175: 225.027 tato māraḥ sasambhrama uvāca--prasīda sthavira, kimājñāpayasi?
S01divyav_u:9178: 225.029 trailokyanāthasya kāñcanādrinibhastasya na dṛṣṭo rūpakāyo me/
S01divyav_u:9180: 226.003 priyamadhikamato hi nāstiṃ me daśabalarūpakutūhalo hyāham//39//
S01divyav_u:9181: 226.005 māra uvāca--tena hi mamāpi samayaḥ śrūyatām/
S01divyav_u:9184: 226.008 buddhānusmṛtipeśalena manasā pūjām yadi tvaṃ mayi svalpāmapyupadarśayiṣyasi vibho dagdho bhaviṣyāmyaham/
S01divyav_u:9185: 226.010 kā śaktirmama vītarāgavihitāṃ soḍhuṃ praṇāmakriyāṃ hastanyāsamivodvahanti na gajasyairaṇḍavṛkṣāṅkurāḥ//41//
S01divyav_u:9189: 226.014 śūraṃ vañcayituṃ purā vyavasitenottaptahemaprabhaṃ bauddhaṃ rūpamacintyabuddhivibhavādāsīnmayā yatkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:9190: 226.016 kṛtvā rūpamahaṃ tadeva nayanaprahlādikaṃ dehināmeṣo 'pyarkamayūkhajālamamalaṃ bhāmaṇḍalenākṣipan//42//
S01divyav_u:9191: 226.018 atha sthavirah evamastu ityuktvā taṃ kuṇapamapanīya tathāgatarūpadarśanotsuko 'vasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9192: 226.019 māraśca vanagahanamanupraviśya buddharūpaṃ kṛtvā naṭa iva suruciranepathyastasmādvanagahanādārabdho nikṣramitum/
S01divyav_u:9196_1: dakṣiṇe pārśve sthaviraśāradvatīputraṃ vāmapārśve sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ pṛṣṭhataścāyuṣmantamānandaṃ
S01divyav_u:9201: 227.005 sa buddhāvalambanayā smṛtyā tathāpyāsaktamanāḥ saṃvṛtto yathā buddhaṃ bhagavantamahaṃ paśyāmīti vyaktamupāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:9204: 227.008 vaktreṇābhibhavatyayaṃ hi kamalaṃ nīlotpalaṃ cakṣuṣā kāntyā puṣpavanaṃ ghanaṃ priyatayā candraṃ samāptadyutim/
S01divyav_u:9205: 227.010 gāmbhīryeṇa mahodadhiṃ sthiratayā meruṃ raviṃ tejasā gatyā siṃhamavekṣitena vṛṣabhaṃ varṇena cāmīkaram//45//
S01divyav_u:9206: 227.012 sa bhūyasyā mātrayā harṣaṇāpūryamāṇahṛdayo vyāpinā svareṇovāca--
S01divyav_u:9210: 227.017 tenedaṃ jananetrakāntamamalaṃ rūpaṃ samutthāpitam yaṃ dṛṣṭvā ripurapyabhipramuditaḥ syātkiṃ punarmadvidhaḥ//47//
S01divyav_u:9211: 227.019 saṃbuddhālambanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ vismṛtya buddhasaṃjñāmadhiṣṭhāya mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa mārasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9212: 227.020 atha māraḥ sasambhramo 'bravīt--evaṃ taṃ bhadanta nārhasi samayaṃ vyatikramitum/
S01divyav_u:9214: māra uvāca--nanu pratijñātaṃ bhadantena--nāhaṃ bhavantaṃ praṇamiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:9216: 227.024 na khalu na viditaṃ me yasya vādipradhāno jalavihata ivāgnir nirvṛtiṃ saṃprayātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9217: 227.026 api tu nayanakāntāmākṛtiṃ tasya dṛṣṭvā tamṛṣimabhinato 'haṃ tvāṃ tu nābhyarcayāmi//48//
S01divyav_u:9218: 227.028 māra uvāca--kathamihāhaṃ nārcito bhavāmi, yadevaṃ māṃ praṇamasīti/
S01divyav_u:9220: yathā tvaṃ naiva mayā abhyarcito bhavasi,
S01divyav_u:9221: na ca mayā samayātikramaḥ kṛta iti/
S01divyav_u:9227: yāvaccaturthe divase māraḥ svayameva mathurāyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣitumārabdhah--yo yuṣmākaṃ svargāpavargasukhaṃ prārthayate,
S01divyav_u:9229: yaiśca yuṣmābhistathāgato na dṛṣṭaste sthaviropaguptaṃ paśyantu iti/
S01divyav_u:9232: 228.011 svargāpavargāya ca yasya vāñchā sa śraddhayā dharmamataḥ śṛṇotu//51//
S01divyav_u:9233: 228.013 dṛṣṭo na yairvā dvipadapradhānaḥ śāstā mahākāruṇikaḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:9235: 228.017 yāvanmathurāyāṃ śabdo visṛtah--sthaviropaguptena māro vinīta iti/
S01divyav_u:9236: śrutvā ca yadbhūyasā mathurāvāstavyo janakāyaḥ sthaviropaguptasakāśaṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:9237: 228.018 tataḥ sthaviropagupto 'nekeṣu brāhamaṇaśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu siṃha iva nirbhīḥ siṃhāsanamabhirūḍhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9239: 228.020 māṃ prati na te śakyaṃ siṃhāsanamaviduṣā samabhiroḍhum/
S01divyav_u:9240: 228.021 yaḥ sa siṃhāsanastho mṛga iva sa hi yāti saṃkocam//53//
S01divyav_u:9241: 228.022 siṃha iva yastu nirbhīr ninadati pravarāridarpanāśārtham/
S01divyav_u:9243: 228.024 yāvat sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyāni saṃprakāśitāni/
S01divyav_u:9250: 228.028 tatra corumuṇḍaparvate guhā aṣṭadaśahastā dairdhyeṇa dvādaśahastā vistāreṇa/
S01divyav_u:9251: yadā te kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ saṃvṛttāstadā sthaviropaguptenābhihitam--yo madīyenāvavādena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati,
S01divyav_u:9254: 228.031 tasya yāvadāsamudrāyām {pṛthivyām} śabdo visṛtah--mathurāyāmupaguptanāmā[229] avavādakānāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā/
S01divyav_u:9255_0: 229.001 tadyathā hi vinītakāmadhātvīśvare dvitīyaśāstṛkalpe mahātmani sthaviropagupte
S01divyav_u:9259: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:9264: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ sābhisaṃskāraṃ nagaradvāramindrakīle pādau vyavasthāpayanti,
S01divyav_u:9271: vatsā dāmāni cchittvā mātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchanti/
S01divyav_u:9277: 229.021 aparāhatāni ca vāditrabhāṇḍāni madhuraṃ śabdaṃ niścārayanti/
S01divyav_u:9280: iyaṃ ca tasmin samaye pṛthivī ṣaḍanikāraṃ prakampate/
S01divyav_u:9284: 229.024 itīme cānye cādbhutadharmāḥ prādurbhavanti bhagavato nagarapraveśe/
S01divyav_u:9288: 229.030 atha buddhapraveśakālaniyataiḥ prātihāryairāvarhjitāḥ strīmanuṣyāstannagaramanilabalacalitabhinnavīcītaraṅgakṣubhitamiva mahāsamudraṃ vimuktoccanādaṃ babhūva/
S01divyav_u:9292: 230.001 [230]niṃnā connamate natāvanamate buddhānubhāvānmahī sthāṇuḥ śarkarakaṇḍakavyapagato nirdoṣatām yāti ca/
S01divyav_u:9293: 230.002 andhā mūkajaḍendriyāśca puruṣā vyaktendriyāstatkṣaṇaṃ saṃvādyantyanighaṭṭitāśca nagare nandanti tūryakhanāḥ//57//
S01divyav_u:9294: 230.005 sarvaṃ ca tannagaraṃ sūryasahasrātirekayā kanakamarīcivarṇayā buddhaprabhayā sphuṭaṃ babhūva/
S01divyav_u:9296: 230.007 sūryaprabhāmavabhartsya hi tasya bhābhirvyāptaṃ jagatsakalameva sakānanastham/
S01divyav_u:9297: 230.009 saṃprāpya ca pravaradharmakathābhirāmo lokaṃ surāsuranaraṃ hi samuktabhāvam//58//
S01divyav_u:9303: 230.013 yāvajjayena dārakena saktuṃ dāsyāmīti pāṃśvañjalirbhagavataḥ pātre prakṣiptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9307: 230.018 dhīreṇa vaktreṇa kṛtaprasādaḥ pāṃśuṃ dadau jātijarāntakāya//59//
S01divyav_u:9308: 230.020 sa bhagavate pratipādayitvā praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena ekacchatrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ rājā syām,
S01divyav_u:9310: 230.022 tato munistasya niśābhya bhāvaṃ bālasya samyakpraṇidhiṃ ca buddhvā/
S01divyav_u:9311: 230.024 iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ kṣṛtravaśena dṛṣṭvā jagrāha pāṃśuṃ karuṇāyamānaḥ//60//
S01divyav_u:9314: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ vidarśayanti,
S01divyav_u:9318: te saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīciparyanteṣu gatvā ye śītanarakāsteṣūṣṇībhūtvā nipatanti,
S01divyav_u:9328: 231.004 te nirmite cittāni prasādayitvā narakavedanīyāni karmāṇi kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:9337: 231.015 yadi bhagavānatītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante/
S01divyav_u:9349: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato vāme karatale 'ntarhitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9352: 231.027 nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitaṃ vidarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ//36//
S01divyav_u:9353: 231.029 tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:9359: 232.004 api tu sahetu sapratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitamupadarśayanti/
S01divyav_u:9360: 232.005 paśyasi tvamānanda dārakam yena tathāgatasya pātre pāṃśvañjaliḥ prakṣiptah? evaṃ bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:9361: 232.006 ayamānanda dārako 'nena kuśalamūlena varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya pāṭaliputre nagare aśoko nāṃnā rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dhārmiko dharmarājā,
S01divyav_u:9366: 232.010 astaṃgate mayi bhaviṣyati ekarājā yo 'sau hyaśoka iti nāma viśālakīrtiḥ/
S01divyav_u:9368: 232.014 ayamasya deyadharmo yattathāgatasya pāṃśvañjaliḥ pātre pakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9369: yāvadbhagavatā teṣāṃ sarva āyuṣmate ānandāya dattāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9370: 232.015 gomayena miśrayitvā yatra caṃkrame tathāgataścaṃkramyate, tatra gomayakārṣīṃ prayacchati/
S01divyav_u:9371: 232.016 yāvadāyuṣmatā ānandena teṣāṃ sagomayena miśrayitvā yatra caṃkramati bhagavān,
S01divyav_u:9373: 232.018 tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājagṛhe bimbisāro rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:9384: pāṭaliputre nagare biṃdusāro nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:9387: 232.023 tena ca samayena campāyāṃ nagaryāmanyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9388: tasya duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā janapadakalyāṇī/
S01divyav_u:9389: 232.024 sā naimittikairvyākṛtā--āsyā dārikāyā rājā bhartā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:9394: sa tāṃ duhitaraṃ grahāya pāṭaliputraṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:9395: 232.027 tena sā sarvālaṃkārairvibhūṣayitvā rājño bindusārasya bhāryārthamanupradattā--iyaṃ hi devakanyā dhanyā praśastā ceti/
S01divyav_u:9398: yadi rājā anayā sārdhaṃ paricārayiṣyati, asmākaṃ bhūyaścakṣuḥsampreṣaṇamapi na kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:9400: 232.031 sā rājñaḥ kṛśaśmaśruṃ prasādhayati yāvat suśikṣitā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:9401: yadā [233]ārabhate rājñaḥ keśaśmaśrum, tadā rājā śete/
S01divyav_u:9402: 233.001 yāvat rājñā prītena vareṇa pravāritā--kiṃ tvaṃ varamicchasīti?
S01divyav_u:9403: tayā abhihitam--devena me saha samāgamaḥ syāt/
S01divyav_u:9404: 233.002 rājā āha--tvaṃ nāpinī, ahaṃ rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9406: sā kathayati--deva nāhaṃ nāpinī, api tu brāhmaṇasyāhaṃ duhitā/
S01divyav_u:9408: 233.005 rājā kathayati--kena tvaṃ nāpitakarma śikṣāpitā? sā kathayati--antaḥpurikābhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:9415: tasya vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ kumārasya bhavatu nāma?
S01divyav_u:9422: atha rājā bindusāraha kumāraṃ parīkṣitukāmaḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaṃ parivrājakamāmantrayate--upādhyāya,
S01divyav_u:9424: piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ kathayati--tena hi deva kumārānādāya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṃ nirgaccha, parīkṣāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9429: 233.016 aśokaḥ kathayati--rājño 'hamanabhipreto darśanenāpi, kimahaṃ tatra gāmiṣyāmi?
S01divyav_u:9432: yāvadaśokaḥ pāṭaliputrānnirgacchati, rādhaguptena cāgrāmātyaputreṇoktah--aśoka, kva gamiṣyasīti?
S01divyav_u:9433: aśokaḥ kathayati--rājā adya suvarṇamaṇḍape udyāne kumārān parīkṣayati/
S01divyav_u:9435: yāvadaśokastasmin mahallake 'bhiruhya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṃ gatvā kumārāṇāṃ madhye 'tra pṛthivyāṃ prastīrya niṣasāda/
S01divyav_u:9440: paśyati piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ, cintayati ca--aśoko rājā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:9442: yadi kathayiṣyāmi aśoko rājā bhaviṣyatīti, nāsti me jīvitam/
S01divyav_u:9445: āha--yasya yānaṃ śobhanaṃ sa rājā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:9449: 233.029 mama yānaṃ śobhanam, ahaṃ rājā bhaviṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:9451: 233.030 piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ kathayati--deva, yasyāsanamagram, sa rājā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:9457: aśokaḥ kathayati--abhedena vyākṛtam--yasya yānamagramāsanaṃ pānaṃ bhājanaṃ ceti,
S01divyav_u:9460: 234.003 mama hastiskandham yānaṃ pṛthivī āsanaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ bhājanaṃ śālyodanaṃ dadhivyañjanaṃ pānīyaṃ pānamiti//
S01divyav_u:9461: 234.005 tataḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakah aśoko rājā bhaviṣyatīti tasya mātaramārabdhaḥ sevitum/
S01divyav_u:9462: 234.006 yāvat tayocyate--upādhyāya, kataraḥ kumāro rājño bindusārasyātyayādrājā bhaviṣyatīti? āha--aśokaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9466: yadā śṛṇoṣi aśoko rājā saṃvṛttāḥ, tadā āgantavyam/
S01divyav_u:9468: 234.010 atha rājño bindusārasya takṣaśilā nāma nagaraṃ viruddham/
S01divyav_u:9469: tatra rājñā bindusāreṇa aśoko visarjitah--gaccha kumāra, takṣaśilānagaraṃ saṃnāhaya/
S01divyav_u:9470: 234.011 caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ dattam, yānaṃ praharaṇaṃ ca pratiṣiddham/
S01divyav_u:9473: tatah aśokenābhihitam--yadi nāma rājyavipākyaṃ kuśalamasti, sainyaṃ praharaṇaṃ ca prādurbhavatu/
S01divyav_u:9477: 234.016 śrutvā takṣaśilānivāsinaḥ paurā ardhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārge śobhāṃ kṛtvā pūrṇaghaṭamādāya pratyudgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9478: 234.017 pratyudgamya ca kathayanti--na vayaṃ kumārasya viruddhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:9480: api tu duṣṭāmātyā asmākaṃ paribhavaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:9484: tena tau vṛttyā saṃvibhaktau tasyāgrataḥ parvatān saṃchindantau saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:9487: 234.023 yāvat susīmaḥ kumāra udyānāt pāṭaliputraṃ praviśati/
S01divyav_u:9489: 234.024 tasya susīmena kumāreṇa trīḍābhiprāyatayā khaṭakā pātitā/
S01divyav_u:9491: yadā rājā bhaviṣyati, tadā śastraṃ pātayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:9492: 234.026 tathā kariṣyāmi yathā rājaiva na bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:9501: 234.030 yāvadamātyairaśokaḥ kumāro haridrayā pralipto lakṣāṃ ca lohapātre kvāthayitvā kvathitena rasena lohapātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā chorayanti--aśokaḥ kumāro glānībhūta iti/
S01divyav_u:9503: tadā amātyairaśokaḥ kumāraḥ sarvālaṃkārairbhūṣayitvā[235] rājño bindusārasyopanītah--imaṃ tāvadrājye pratiṣṭhāpaya/
S01divyav_u:9504: 235.001 yadā susīma āgato bhaviṣyati, tadā taṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9506: aśokena cābhihitam--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ bhavati, devatā mama paṭṭaṃ bandhantu/
S01divyav_u:9508: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bindusārasya rājña uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ mukhādāgatam yāvatkālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:9509: 235.004 yadā aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ, tasyordhvam yojanam yakṣāḥ śṛṇvanti, adho yojanaṃ nāgāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9511: 235.006 susīmenāpi śrutam--bindusāro rājā kālagataḥ, aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9514: aśokenāpi pāṭaliputre nagare ekasmin dvāre eko nagnaḥ sthāpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9518: 235.009 rādhaguptena ca pūrvasmin dvāre yantramayo hastī sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9519: aśokasya ca pratimāṃ parikhāṃ khanayitvā khadirāṅgāraiśca pūrayitvā tṛṇenācchādya pāṃśunākīrṇā/
S01divyav_u:9527: 235.014 yadā aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ sa tairamātyairavajñayā dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:9528: tenāmātyānāmabhihitam--bhavantaḥ, puṣpavṛkṣān phalavṛkṣāṃśca cchittvā kaṇṭakavṛkṣān paripālayatha/
S01divyav_u:9530: api tu kaṇṭakavṛkṣāṃś chittvā puṣpavṛkṣān phalavṛkṣāṃśca paripālayitavyam/
S01divyav_u:9532: tato rājñā ruṣitena asiṃ niṣkośaṃ kṛtvā pañcānāmamātyaśatānāṃ śiraṃsi cchinnāni/
S01divyav_u:9533: 235.018 yāvadrājā aśoko 'pareṇa samayenāntaḥpuraparivṛto vasantakālasamaye puṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu pūrvanagarasyodyānaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:9534: 235.019 tatra ca paribhramatā aśokavṛkṣaḥ supuṣpito dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9535: 235.020 tato rājño mamāpi sahanāmā ityanunayo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9538: yāvadrājā śayitaḥ, tasyāntaḥpureṇa roṣeṇa tasmādaśokavṛkṣāt puṣpāṇi śākhāśca cchinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9539: 235.022 yāvadrājñā pratibuddhena so 'śokavṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ, pṛṣṭaśca--kena tacchinnam?
S01divyav_u:9541: 235.023 śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣajātena pañca strīśatāni kiṭikaiḥ saṃveṣṭya dagdhāni/
S01divyav_u:9542: 235.024 tasyemānyaśubhānyālokya caṇḍo rājā caṇḍāśoka iti vyavasthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9544: 235.026 api tu devasya vadhyaghātakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ, ye devasya vadhyakaraṇīyaṃ śodhayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:9550: 235.029 caṇḍo duṣṭātmā mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca paribhāṣate,
S01divyav_u:9552: pipīlikān makṣikān mūṣikān matsyāṃśca jālena baḍiśena praghātayati/
S01divyav_u:9553: 235.031 caṇḍo dārakastasya caṇḍagirika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:9571: sa āha--deva, varaṃ me prayaccha, yastatra praviśettasya na bhūyo nirgama iti/
S01divyav_u:9576_0: yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān
S01divyav_u:9576_1: pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṃ viṣkambhya ayoguḍānādīptān pradīptān
S01divyav_u:9578: jahvāmapi kaṇṭhamapi kaṇṭhamapi hṛdayamapi hṛdayasāmantamapi antrāṇyantraguṇānapi dagdhvā adhaḥ pragharati/
S01divyav_u:9579: 236.016 evaṃ duḥkhā hi bhikṣavo nārakāḥ sattvā narakeṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9580_0: 236.017 yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān
S01divyav_u:9580_1: pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṃ viṣkambhya kvathitaṃ tāmramāsye prakṣipanti,
S01divyav_u:9585_0: santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālībhūtāyāmavānmukhān
S01divyav_u:9585_3: saṃpratakṣṇuvanti aṣṭāṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi caturasnamapi vṛttamapi maṇḍalamapi
S01divyav_u:9587_0: santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:9588: aṣṭāṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi caturasnamapi maṇḍalamapi unnatamapi avanatamapi śāntamapi viśāntamapi takṣṇuvanti/
S01divyav_u:9590_0: 236.031 santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmāvādīptāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:9590_1: pradīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvalībhūtāyāmuttānakān pratiṣṭhāpya pañcaviṣaṭabandhanāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayanti,
S01divyav_u:9595: evaṃ pañca vedanā iti kurute sadṛśāśca kāraṇāḥ sattvānāmārabdhāḥ kārayitum//
S01divyav_u:9596: 237.004 yāvat śrāvastyāmanyatamaḥ sārthavāhaḥ patnyā saha mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9603: 237.007 sa ca samudraḥ sārthavāhaputro bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9605: 237.008 sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya pāṭaliputraṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9612: 237.012 tenocyate--kimidaṃ bāladāraka iva rudasīti? sa bhikṣuḥ prāha--
S01divyav_u:9615: 237.015 durlabhaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ pravrajyāṃ ca sukhodayām/
S01divyav_u:9620: tataḥ sakaruṇairvacanaistaṃ bhikṣuḥ kramam yācati sma māsam yāvat/
S01divyav_u:9622: sa khalu maraṇabhayodvignahṛdayaḥ saptarātreṇa me na bhavitavyamiti vyāyatamatiḥ saṃvṛttaḥ//
S01divyav_u:9623_0: 237.020 atha saptame divase 'śokasya rājño 'ntaḥpurikāṃ kumāreṇa saha saṃraktāṃ nirīkṣamāṇāṃ
S01divyav_u:9623_1: saṃlapantīṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sahadarśanādeva ruṣitena rājñā tau dvāvapi taṃ cārakamanupreṣitau /
S01divyav_u:9628: 237.025 kva tadvadanakāntitvaṃ gātraśobhā kva sā gatā/
S01divyav_u:9632: 237.029 tena tāṃ rajanīṃ kṛtsnāam yujyatā buddhaśāsane/
S01divyav_u:9637: tato bhikṣurāha--dīrghāyuḥ, mamāpi nirgatā rātriḥ, udita ādityaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9649: 238.011 tatastena nirghṛṇena dāruṇahṛdayena paralokanirapekṣeṇa roṣāviṣṭena bahūdakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ nararudhiravasāmūtrapurīṣasaṃkulāyāṃ mahālohyāṃ prakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9658: 238.015 atha rājani samāgate prāṇisahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu sa bhikṣurvaineyakālamavekṣamāṇah--
S01divyav_u:9659: riddhiṃ samutpādya sa tanmuhūrtaṃ lohyanatarasthaḥ salilārdragātraḥ/
S01divyav_u:9660: 238.018 nirīkṣamāṇasya janasya madhye nabhastalaṃ haṃsa ivotpapāt//76//
S01divyav_u:9663: 238.021 ardhena gātreṇa vavarṣa toyamardhena jajvāla hutāśanaśca/
S01divyav_u:9664: 238.023 varṣañ jvalaṃścaiva rarāja yaḥ khe dīptaucadhiprasravaṇeva śailaḥ//77//
S01divyav_u:9667: 238.029 manuṣyatulyaṃ tava saumya rūpam ṛddhiprabhāvastu narānatītya/
S01divyav_u:9668: 238.031 na niścayaṃ tena vibho vrajāmi ko nāma bhāvastava śuddhabhāva//79//
S01divyav_u:9669: 239.001 [239]tatsāmprataṃ brūhi mamedamartham yathā prajānāmi tava prabhāvam/
S01divyav_u:9670: 239.003 jñātvā ca te dharmaguṇaprabhāvān yathābalaṃ śiṣyavadācareyam//80//
S01divyav_u:9673: mahājanahitārthaṃ ca pratipatsyata iti matvā svaguṇamudbhāvayaṃstamuvāca--
S01divyav_u:9675: 239.009 buddhasya putro vadatāṃ varasya dharmānvayaḥ sarvabhaveṣvasaktaḥ//81//
S01divyav_u:9676: 239.011 dāntena dāntaḥ puruṣarṣabheṇa śāntiṃ gatenāpi śamaṃ praṇītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9680: tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtah--varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama pāṭaliputre nagare 'śoko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dharmarājaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9683: 239.017 idaṃ ca devena narakasadṛśaṃ sthānameva sthāpitam yatra prāṇisahasrāṇi nipātyante/
S01divyav_u:9684: 239.018 tadarhasi deva sarvasattvebhyo 'bhayapradānaṃ dātum, bhagavataśca manorathaṃ paripūrayitum/
S01divyav_u:9687: 239.022 nāthasya saṃpūrya manorathaṃ ca vistārikān dharmadharān kuruṣva//83//
S01divyav_u:9688: 239.024 atha sa rājā buddhe samupajātaprasādaḥ kṛtakarasampuṭastaṃ bhikṣuṃ kṣamayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:9690: 239.027 śaraṇamṛṣimupaimi taṃ ca buddhaṃ gaṇavaramāryaniveditaṃ ca dharmam//84//
S01divyav_u:9700: rājā āha--ko 'smākaṃ prathamataraṃ praviṣṭah? caṇḍagirika uvāca--aham/
S01divyav_u:9706: 240.008 tato rājā bhagavaccharīradhātuṃ vistarīṣyāmīti caturaṅgena balakāyena gatvā ajātaśatrupratiṣṭhāpitaṃ droṇastūpamutpāṭya śarīradhātuṃ gṛhītavān/
S01divyav_u:9707_0: 240.010 yatroddhāraṇaṃ ca vistareṇa kṛtvā dhātupratyaṃśaṃ datvā stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S01divyav_u:9707_1: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ stūpaṃ vitareṇa bhaktimato yāvatsaptadroṇādgrahāya stūpāṃśca pratiṣṭhāpya rāmagrāmaṃ gataḥ /
S01divyav_u:9708: 240.011 tato rājā nāgair nāgabhavanamavatāritaḥ, vijñaptaśca--vayamasyātraiva pūjāṃ kariṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:9712: 240.014 rāmagrāme tvaṣṭamaṃ stūpamadya nāgāstatkālaṃ bhaktimanto rarakṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:9713: 240.016 dhātūnyetasmānnopalebhe sa rājā śraddhābhū(?) rājā cintayati yastvetatkṛtvā jagāma//86//
S01divyav_u:9714: 240.018 yāvadrājā caturaśītikaraṇḍasahasraṃ kārayitvā sauvarṇarūpyasphaṭikavaiḍūryamayānāṃ teṣu dhātavaḥ prakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9715: 240.019 evaṃ vistareṇa caturaśītikumbhasahasraṃ paṭṭasahasraṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ haste datvā visarjitam--āsamudrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyameṣu nagareṣu yatra koṭiḥ paripūryate,
S01divyav_u:9719: 240.023 rājā cintayati--na yadi vaistārikā dhātavo bhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:9722: vistareṇa yāvadrājñā abhihitam--yatrādhikatarā bhavanti, yatra ca nyūnatarāḥ, tatra na dātavyam//
S01divyav_u:9723: 240.026 yāvadrājā kurkuṭārāmaṃ gatvā sthavirayaśasamabhigamyovāca--ayaṃ me manorathah--ekasmin divase ekasminmuhūrte caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:9725: 240.028 ahaṃ tasmin samaye pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ praticchādayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:9726: yāvat tasmin divase sthavirayaśasā pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ praticchāditam/
S01divyav_u:9729: 241.001 [241]tābhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvikābhyaḥ kṛtibhyo dhātuṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sa hyupādāya mauryaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9730: 241.003 cakre stūpānāṃ śāradābhraprabhānāṃ loke sāśīti śāsadahnā sahasram//87//
S01divyav_u:9731: 241.005 yāvacca rājñā aśokena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam, dhārmiko dharmarājā saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9734: 241.007 āryamauryaśrīḥ sa prajānāṃ hitārthaṃ kṛtsnaṃ stūpān kārayāmāsa lokam/
S01divyav_u:9735: 241.009 caṇḍāśokatvaṃ prāpya pūrvaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dharmāśokatvaṃ karmaṇā tena lebhe//88//
S01divyav_u:9739: 242.002 sa idānīmacirajātaprasādo buddhaśāsane yatra śākyaputrīyān dadarśa ākīrṇe rahasi vā,
S01divyav_u:9740: tatra śirasā pādayor nipatya vandate sma/
S01divyav_u:9741: 242.003 tasya ca yaśo nāmāmātyaḥ paramaśrāddho bhagavati/
S01divyav_u:9742: 242.004 sa taṃ rājānamuvāca--deva, nārhasi sarvavarṇapravrajitānāṃ praṇipātaṃ kartum/
S01divyav_u:9743: santi hi śākyaśrāmaṇerakāścaturbhyo varṇebhyaḥ pravrajitā iti/
S01divyav_u:9745: atha sa rājā kenacit kālāntareṇa sarvasacivānuvāca--vividhānāṃ prāṇināṃ śirobhiḥ karyam/
S01divyav_u:9748: 242.008 samānīteṣu ca śiraḥsu abhihitāh--gacchata, imāni śiraṃsi mūlyena vikrīṇīdhvamiti/
S01divyav_u:9753: 242.011 tato yaśāmātyastasyaḥ śirasaḥ pratigrāhakamanāsādya savrīḍo rājānamupetyedamarthamuvāca--
S01divyav_u:9755: 242.015 śirastvidaṃ mānuṣamapraśastaṃ na gṛhyate mūlyamṛte 'pi rājan//1//
S01divyav_u:9756: 242.017 atha sa rājā tamamātyamuvāca--kimidamitīdaṃ mānuṣaśiro na kaścidgṛhṇātīti?
S01divyav_u:9760: 242.019 rājābravīt--kimidaṃ madīyamapi śiro jugupsitamiti? sa ca bhayānnecchati tasmādbhūtārthamabhidhātum/
S01divyav_u:9763: tataḥ sa rājā tamamātyaṃ pratijñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pratyādiśannimamarthamuvāca--haṃ bhoḥ,
S01divyav_u:9767: 242.024 vināpi mūlyairvijugupsitatvāt pratigrahītā bhuvi yasya nāsti/
S01divyav_u:9768: 242.026 śirastadāsādya mameha puṇyam yadyarjitaṃ kiṃ viparītamatra//2//
S01divyav_u:9769: 242.028 jātiṃ bhavān paśyati śākyabhikṣuṣvantargatāṃsteṣu guṇānna ceti/
S01divyav_u:9771: 243.001 [243]āvāhakāle 'tha vivāhakāle jāteḥ parīkṣā na tu dharmakāle/
S01divyav_u:9772: 243.003 dharmakriyāyā hi guṇā nimittā guṇāśca jātiṃ na vicārayanti//4//
S01divyav_u:9775: 243.007 cittavaśena hi puṃsāṃ kalevaraṃ nindyate 'tha satkriyate/
S01divyav_u:9777: 243.009 yadi guṇaparivarjito dvijātiḥ patita iti prathito 'pi yātyavajñām/
S01divyav_u:9778: 243.011 na tu nidhanakulodgato 'pi jantuḥ śubhaguṇayukta iti praṇamya pūjyaḥ//7//
S01divyav_u:9780: 243.014 kiṃ te kāruṇikasya śākyavṛṣabhasyaitadvaco na śrutaṃ prājñaiḥ sāramasārakebhya iha yannṛbhyo grahītuṃ kṣamam/
S01divyav_u:9781: 243.016 tasyānanyathavādino yadi ca tāmājñāṃ cikīrṣāmyahaṃ vyāhantuṃ ca bhavān yadi prayatate naitat suhṛllakṣaṇam//8//
S01divyav_u:9782: 243.018 ikṣukṣodavadujijñato bhuvi yadā kāyo mama svapsyati pratyutthānanamaskṛtāñjalipuṭakleśakriyāsvakṣamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9783: 243.020 kāyenāhamanena kiṃ nu kuśalaṃ śakṣyāmi kartuṃ tadā tasmānnāryamataḥ śmaśānanidhanāt sāraṃ grahītuṃ mayā//9//
S01divyav_u:9789: 243.028 na bhavati bahu śocyam yadvadevaṃ śarīre sucaritahṛtasāre naiti śoko 'ntakāle//12//
S01divyav_u:9790: 244.001 [244]sucaritavimukhānāṃ garvitānām yadā tu prasabhamiha hi mṛtyuḥ kāyakumbhaṃ bhinatti/
S01divyav_u:9791: 244.003 dahati hṛdayameṣāṃ śokavahnistadānīṃ dadhighaṭa iva bhagne sarvaśo 'prāptasāre//13//
S01divyav_u:9792: 244.005 kartuṃ vighnamato na me 'rhati bhavān kāyapraṇāmaṃ prati śreṣṭho 'smītyaparīkṣako hi gaṇayan mohāndhakārāvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9793: 244.007 kāyam yastu parīkṣate daśabalavyāhāradīpairbudho nāsau pārthivabhṛtyayorviṣamatāṃ kāyasya saṃpaśyati//14//
S01divyav_u:9794: 244.009 tvagmāṃsāsthiśirāyakṛtprabhṛtayo bhāvā hi tulyā nṛṇāmāhāryaistu vibhūṣaṇairadhikatā kāyasya niṣpadyate/
S01divyav_u:9795: 244.011 etatsāramiheṣyate tu yadimaṃ niśritya kāyādhamaṃ pratyutthānanamaskṛtādikuśalaṃ prājñaiḥ samutthāpyate//15// iti/
S01divyav_u:9796_1: praṇāmādibhyaḥ samutthasya phalasya bahukalpaśaḥ sthāpayitvā sumeruvanmahāpṛthivībhyaḥ
S01divyav_u:9796_2: samutthasya phalasya bahukalpaśaḥ sthāpayitvā sumeruvanmahāpṛthivībhyaḥ sārataratāmavekṣya
S01divyav_u:9799: 244.020 tatra yaśo nāṃnā saṃghasthavira uvāca--asti mahārāja/
S01divyav_u:9800: yadā bhagavataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamaye tadā apalālaṃ nāgaṃ damayitvā kumbhakālaṃ caṇḍālīgopālīṃ ca nāgaṃ mathurāmanuprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9801: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate--asyāmānanda mathutāyāṃ varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya gupto nāṃnā gāndhiko bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:9802: 244.023 tasya putro bhaviṣyatyupagupto nāṃnā avavādakānāmagro 'lakṣaṇako buddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9804: 244.024 paśyasi tvamānanda dūrata eva nīlanīlāmbararājim? evaṃ bhadanta/
S01divyav_u:9806: atra varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya naṭabhaṭikā nāmāraṇyāyatanaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:9807: 244.026 etadagraṃ me ānanda bhaviṣyati śamathānukūlānāṃ śayyāsanānām yaduta naṭabhaṭikā nāmāraṇyāyatanam/
S01divyav_u:9811: 224.030 rājā āha--kiṃ punaḥ sa śuddhasattva utpannaḥ, athādyāpi notpadyata iti?
S01divyav_u:9815: 245.001 [245]sarvajñalīlo hi sa śuddhasattvo dharmaṃ praṇītaṃ vadate gaṇāgre/
S01divyav_u:9817: 245.005 tena khalu samayena āyuṣmānupagupto 'ṣṭādaśabhirarhatsahasraiḥ parivṛto naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatane prativasati/
S01divyav_u:9821: 245.011 tato 'mātyairabhihitah--deva dūtaḥ preṣayitavyo viṣayanivāsī, sa devasya svayamevāgamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:9822: 245.012 rājā āha--nāsau asmākamarhatyabhigantum, kiṃ tu vayamevārhāmastasyābhigantum/
S01divyav_u:9826: 245.016 yāvadrājñā sthaviropaguptasya sakāśaṃ dūto na preṣitaḥ sthaviradarśanāyāgamiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:9827: 245.017 sthaviropaguptaścintayati--yadi rājā āgamiṣyati, mahājanakāyasya pīḍā bhaviṣyati gocarasya ca/
S01divyav_u:9829: tato rājñā sthaviropaguptasyārthe nauyānenāgamiṣyatīti yāvacca mathurām yāvacca pāṭaliputramantarānnausaṃkramo 'vasthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9830: 245.019 atha sthaviropagupto rājño 'śokasyānugrahārthamaṣṭādaśabhirarhatsahasraiḥ parivṛto nāvamabhiruhya pāṭaliputramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9831: 245.021 tato rājapuruṣai rājño 'śokasya niveditam--deva, diṣṭyā vardhasva/
S01divyav_u:9834: 245.026 śrutvā ca rājñā prītamanasā śatasahasramūlyo muktāhāraḥ svaśarīrādapanīya priyākhyāyino dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9839: 245.031 svargāpavargāya ca hetubhūtaṃ sa paśyatāṃ kāruṇikopaguptam//22//
S01divyav_u:9840: 246.001 [246]yebhir na dṛṣṭo dvipadapradhānaḥ śāstā mahākāruṇikaḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:9842_0: 246.005 yāvadrājñā pāṭalipurre ghaṇṭāṃ ghoṣayitvā nagaraśobhāṃ ca kārayitvā ardhatṛtīyāni
S01divyav_u:9842_1: yojanāni gatvā sarvavādyena sarvapuṣpagandhamālyena sarvapauraiḥ sarvāmātyaiḥ saha
S01divyav_u:9845: tadantaraṃ hastiskandhādavatīrya padmyāṃ nadītīramabhigamya ekaṃ pādaṃ nadītīre sthāpya dvitīyaṃ nauphalake sthaviropaguptaṃ sarvāṅgenānuparigṛhya nau{saṃkramād} uttāritavān/
S01divyav_u:9846_0: 246.010 uttārya ca mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇopaguptasya pādayor nipatito
S01divyav_u:9846_1: mukhatuṇḍakena ca pādau anuparimārjya utthāya dvau jānumaṇḍalau pṛthivītale nikṣipya
S01divyav_u:9847: 246.013 yadā mayā śatrugaṇānnihatya prāptā samudrābharaṇā saśailā/
S01divyav_u:9848: 246.015 ekātapatrā pṛthivī tadā me prītir na sā yā sthaviraṃ nirīkṣya//24//
S01divyav_u:9850: 246.019 tvadvarśanāccaiva pare 'pi śuddhyā dṛṣṭo mayādyāpratimaḥ svayambhūḥ//25//
S01divyav_u:9852: 246.022 śāntiṃ gate kāruṇike jinendre tvaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kuruṣe triloke/
S01divyav_u:9855: 246.028 vibho mamājñāṃ vada śīghramadya kartāsmi vākyaṃ śuddhasattvā//27//
S01divyav_u:9856: 247.001 [247]atha sthaviropagupto dakṣiṇena pāṇinā rājānaṃ śirasi parimārjayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:9858: 247.003 durlabhaṃ trīṇi ratnāni nityaṃ pūjaya pārthiva//28//
S01divyav_u:9859_0: 247.004 api ca mahārāja tena tena bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena tava
S01divyav_u:9859_1: ca mama {ca} śāsanamupanyastaṃ sattvasārathivareṇa gaṇamadhye parīttaṃ paripālyam yatnato 'smābhiḥ /
S01divyav_u:9860: 247.005 rājā āha--sthavira, yathā ahaṃ nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā, tadevānuṣṭhīyate/
S01divyav_u:9863: 247.009 saṃśobhitā me pṛthivī samantādvaistārikā dhātudharāḥ kṛtāśca//29//
S01divyav_u:9865: 247.012 ātmā putraṃ gṛhaṃ dārān pṛthivī kośameva ca/
S01divyav_u:9870: 247.016 gate kāle na śocanti iṣṭam yānti surālayam//31//
S01divyav_u:9871: 247.017 yāvadrājā mahatā śrīsamudayena sthaviropaguptaṃ rājakule praveśayitvā sarvāṅgenānuparigṛhya prajñapta evāsane niṣādayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:9872: 247.018 sthaviropaguptasya śarīraṃ mṛdu sumṛdu, tadyathā tūlapicurvā karpāsapicurvā/
S01divyav_u:9877: 247.025 dānaṃ manāpaṃ suśubhaṃ praṇītaṃ dattaṃ mayā hyapratipudgalasya/
S01divyav_u:9878: 247.027 na pāṃśudānaṃ hi mayā pradattam yathā tvayādāyi tathāgatasya//33//
S01divyav_u:9889: ayaṃ me manoratho ye bhagavatā buddhena pradeśā adhyuṣitāstānarceyam,
S01divyav_u:9891: 248.009 āha ca--ye buddhena bhagavatā pradeśā adhyuṣitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:9892: tānarcayannahaṃ gatvā cihnāni caiva kuryāṃ paścimāṃ janatāmanukampārtham/
S01divyav_u:9893: 248.010 sthavira uvāca--sādhu sādhu mahārāja, śobhanaste cittotpādaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9896: 248.013 gatvā cihnāni teṣveva kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ//37//
S01divyav_u:9897: 248.014 atha rājā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya gandhamālyapuṣpamādāya sthaviropaguptasahāyaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9898: 248.015 atha sthaviropagupto rājānamaśokaṃ sarvaprathamena lumbinīvanaṃ praveśayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ hastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin mahārāja pradeśe bhagavāñ jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9901: 248.018 jātamātreha sa muniḥ prakrāntaḥ saptapadaṃ bhuvi//38//
S01divyav_u:9904: 248.021 atha rājā sarvaśarīreṇa tatra pādayor nipatya utthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:9907: 248.024 atha sthaviro rājñaḥ prasādavṛddhyarthamuvāca--mahārāja, kiṃ drakṣyasi tāṃ devatām?
S01divyav_u:9908: 248.025 yayā dṛṣṭaḥ prajāyansa vane 'smin vadatāṃ varaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9909: 248.026 tramamāṇaḥ padān sapta śrutā vāco yayā muneḥ//41//
S01divyav_u:9911: atha sthaviropagupto yasya vṛkṣasya śākhamavalambya devī mahāmāyā prasūtā,
S01divyav_u:9913: 248.029 naivāsikā yā ihāśokavṛkṣe saṃbuddhadarśinī yā devakanyā/
S01divyav_u:9915: 249.001 [249]yāvat sā devatā svarūpeṇa sthaviropaguptasamīpe sthitvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--sthavira, kimājñāpayasi?
S01divyav_u:9916: atha sthaviro rājānāmaśokamuvāca--mahārāja, iyaṃ sā devatā, yayā dṛṣṭo bhagavāñ jāyamānaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9919: 249.006 śrutvāstvayā tasya nararṣabhasya vāco manojñāḥ prathamā vane 'smin//43//
S01divyav_u:9920: 249.008 devatā prāha--mayā hi dṛṣṭaḥ kanakāvadātaḥ prajāyamāno dvipadapradhānaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9921: 249.011 padāni sapta kramāṇa eva śrutā ca vācamapi tasya śāstuḥ//44//
S01divyav_u:9922: 249.013 rājā āha--kathaya devate, kīdṛśī bhagavato jāyamānasya śrīrbabhūveti/
S01divyav_u:9923: devatā prāha--na śakyaṃ mayā vāgbhiḥ saṃprakāśayitum/
S01divyav_u:9926: 249.017 sasāgarāntā ca mahī saśailā mahārṇavasthā iva nauścāla//45//
S01divyav_u:9929: 249.020 atha sthaviropagupto rājānaṃ kapilavastu nivedayitvā dakṣiṇahastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvo rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyopanāmitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9930: 249.021 taṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtaśarīramasecanakadarśanaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā rājā sarvaśarīreṇa bodhisattvasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9934: tato rājñā śuddhodanena bodhisattvo devatānāmapyayaṃ deva iti tena bodhisattvasya devātideva iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:9935: 249.025 asmin pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvo brāhmaṇānāṃ naimittikānāṃ vipaścikānāmupadarśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9936: 249.026 asmin pradeśe asitena ṛṣiṇā nirdiṣṭo buddho loke bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:9939: asmin pradeśe hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe śaradhanurgrahe tomaragrahe 'ṅkuśagrahe kulānurūpāsu vidyāsu pāragaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9941: asmin pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvo devatāśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ ṣaṣṭibhiḥ strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ ratimanubhūtavān/
S01divyav_u:9942: 249.031 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvo jīrṇāturamṛtasaṃdarśanodvigno vanaṃ saṃśritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9943: 249.032 asmin pradeśe jambucchāyāyāṃ niṣadya viviktam [250]pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhamanāśravasadṛśaṃ prathamadhyānaṃ samāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9944: 250.002 atha pariṇate madhyāhne atikrānte bhaktakālasamaye bhaktakālasamaye anyeṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ chāyā prācīnaniṃnā prācīnapravaṇā prācīnaprāgbhārā,
S01divyav_u:9946: 250.003 dṛṣṭvā ca punā rājā śuddhodanaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa bodhisattvasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9947: 250.004 anena dvāreṇa bodhisattvo devatāśatasahasraiḥ parivṛto 'rdharāteḥ kapilavastuno nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:9948: 250.005 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvena cchandakasyāśvamābharaṇāni ca datvā pratinivartitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9952: 250.009 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvo lubdhakasakāśāt kāśikairvastraiḥ kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi grahāya pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9959: 250.014 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ cīrṇam/
S01divyav_u:9962: 250.016 nāyaṃ mārgo hyabhijñāya iti jñātvā samutsṛjet//48//
S01divyav_u:9963: 250.017 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvena nandāyā nandabalāyāśca grāmikaduhitryoḥ sakāśāt ṣoḍaśaguṇitaṃ madhupāyasaṃ parimuktam/
S01divyav_u:9965: 250.019 asmin pradeśe nandāyā bhuktvā ca madhupāyasam/
S01divyav_u:9967: 250.021 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvaḥ kālikena nāgarājena bodhisamūlamabhigacchan saṃstutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9971: 250.025 atha rājā sthavirasya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:9974: 250.028 atha kāliko nāgarājaḥ sthavirasamīpe sthitvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--sthavira, kimājñāpayasīti/
S01divyav_u:9975: 250.029 atha sthaviro rājānamuvāca--ayaṃ sa mahārāja kāliko nāgarājā yena bhagavānanena mārgeṇa bodhimūlaṃ nirgacchan saṃstutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9978: 251.003 ākhyāhi me daśabalasya guṇaikadeśaṃ tatkīdṛśī vada bhavan sugate tadānīm//52//
S01divyav_u:9984_0: atha sthaviropagupto rājānaṃ bodhimūlamupanāmayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ karamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin
S01divyav_u:9984_1: pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvena mahāmaitrīsahāyena sakalaṃ mārabalaṃ jitvā anuttarā
S01divyav_u:9986: 251.013 iha munivṛṣabheṇa bodhimūle namucibalaṃ vikṛtaṃ nirastamāśu/
S01divyav_u:9990: atha sthaviropagupto rājānamaśokamuvāca--asmin pradeśe bhagavāṃś caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sakāśāccatvāri śailamayāni pātrāṇi grahāyaikaṃ pātramadhimuktam/
S01divyav_u:9994: mupanīya dakṣiṇaṃ hastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin pradeśe mahārāja bhagavatā triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravarjitatam/
S01divyav_u:9999: asmin pradeśe rājño bimbisārasya dharmaṃ deśitam/
S01divyav_u:10002: 251.028 asmin pradeśe bhagavatā śakrasya devendrasya dharmo deśitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10005: 251.030 asmin pradeśe bhagavān deveṣu trāyastriṃśoṣu varṣā māturjanayitryā dharmam [252]deśayitvā devagaṇaparivṛto 'vatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10006_0: 252.001 vistareṇa yāvat sthaviro rājānamaśokaṃ kuśinagarīmupanāmayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ karatalamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin
S01divyav_u:10006_1: pradeśe mahārāja bhagavān sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinivṛtaḥ /
S01divyav_u:10012: atha rājā kathaṃcit saṃjñāmupalabhya parivirvāṇe śatasahasraṃ datvā caityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pādayor nipatyovāca--sthavira,
S01divyav_u:10013: ayaṃ me mano rathah--ye ca bhagavatā śrāvakā agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ,
S01divyav_u:10017: sthaviro rājānamaśokaṃ jetavanaṃ praveśayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ karamabhiprasāryovāca--ayaṃ mahārāja sthaviraśāriputrasya stūpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10019: rājā āha--ke tasya tasya guṇā babhūvah?
S01divyav_u:10020: sthavira uvāca--sa hi dvitīyaśāstā dharmasenādhipatirdharmacakraparavartanaḥ prajñāvatāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā/
S01divyav_u:10028: 252.023 tato rājā prītamanāḥ sthaviraśāradvatīputrastūpe śatasahasraṃ datvā kṛtājñaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:10031: 252.026 yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanasya stūpamupadarśannuvāca--idaṃ mahārāja sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanasya stūpam/
S01divyav_u:10034: sthavira uvāca--sa hi ṛddhimatāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā,
S01divyav_u:10035: yena dakṣiṇena pādāṅguṣṭhena śakrasya devendrasya vaijayantaḥ prāsādaḥ prakampitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10042: 253.005 yāvadrājā mahāmaudgalyāyanasya stūpe śatasahasraṃ datvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:10048: sthavira uvāca--sa hi mahātmā alpecchānāṃ saṃtuṣṭānāṃ dhutaguṇavāditāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā,
S01divyav_u:10057: 253.016 tato rājā aśokaḥ sthaviramahākāśyapasya stūpe datvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:10060: 253.019 yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ sthaviravatkulasya stūpaṃ darśayannuvāca--idaṃ mahārāja sthavirabatkulasya stūpam/
S01divyav_u:10062: rājā āha--ke tasya guṇā babhūvuriti? sthavira uvāca--sa mahātmā alpābādhānāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā/
S01divyav_u:10066: yāvadamātyairabhihitah--deva, kimarthaṃ tulyeṣvavasthiteṣvatra kākāṇī dīyata iti?
S01divyav_u:10068: 253.024 ājñāpradīpena manogṛhasthaṃ hataṃ tamo yadyapi kṛtaṃ hi tena yathā kṛtaṃ sattvahitaṃ tadanyaiḥ//67//
S01divyav_u:10069: 253.028 sā pratyāhatā tasyaiva rājñaḥ pādamūle nipatitā/
S01divyav_u:10070: yāvadamātyā vismitā ūcuh--aho tasya mahātmano 'lpecchatā babhūva/
S01divyav_u:10072: yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ sthavirānandasya stūpamupadarśayannuvāca--idaṃ sthavirānandasya stūpam/
S01divyav_u:10075: 253.031 sthavira uvāca--sa hi bhagavata upasthāyako babhuva, bahuśrutānāmagryaḥ pravacanagrāhakaśceti/
S01divyav_u:10084: 254.007 yattaccharīraṃ vadatāṃ varasya dharmātmano dharmamayaṃ viśuddham/
S01divyav_u:10085: 254.009 taddhāritaṃ tena viśokanāṃnā tasmādviśeṣeṇa sa pūjanīyaḥ//70//
S01divyav_u:10088: 254.015 yadā samudraṃ salilaṃ samudre kurvīta kaścinna hi goṣpadena/
S01divyav_u:10090: 254.019 atha rājā sthavirāṇāṃ stūpārcanaṃ kṛtvā sthaviropaguptasya pādayor nipatya prītimanā uvāca--
S01divyav_u:10091: 254.021 mānuṣyaṃ saphalīkṛtaṃ kratuśatairiṣṭena saṃprāpyate rājyaiśvaryaguṇaiścalaiśca vibhavaiḥ sāraṃ gṛhītaṃ param/
S01divyav_u:10092: 254.023 lokaṃ caityaśatairalaṃkṛtamidaṃ śvetābhrakūṭaprabhairasyādyāpratimasya śāsanamidaṃ kiṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ duṣkaram//73// iti/
S01divyav_u:10094: 254.026 yāvadrājñā aśokena jātau bodhau dharmacakre parinirvāṇe ekaikaśatasahasraṃ dattam,
S01divyav_u:10095: tasya bodhau viśeṣataḥ prasādo jātah--iha bhagavatānuttarā samyaksambodhirabhisambuddheti/
S01divyav_u:10096: 254.027 sa yāni viśeṣayuktāni ratnāni, tāni bodhiṃ preṣayati/
S01divyav_u:10098: 254.029 tasyā buddhirutpannā--ayaṃ rājā mayā sārdhaṃ ratimanubhavati, viśeṣayuktāṃśca(krāni ca)
S01divyav_u:10100: 254.030 tayā mātaṅgī vyāharitā--śakyasi tvaṃ bodhiṃ mama sapatnīṃ praghātitum?
S01divyav_u:10102: 254.031 yāvanmātaṅgyā bodhivṛkṣo mantraiḥ parijaptaḥ, sūtraṃ ca buddham/
S01divyav_u:10104: tato rājapuruṣai rājñe niveditam--deva, bodhivṛkṣaḥ śuṣyata iti/
S01divyav_u:10107: 255.003 sarvajñatā cādhigatā narendra bodhidrumo 'sau nidhanaṃ prayāti//74//
S01divyav_u:10108: 255.005 śrutvā ca rājā mūrcchito bhūmau patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10111: 255.007 dṛṣṭvānvahaṃ taṃ drumarājamūlaṃ jānāmi dṛṣṭo 'dya mayā svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:10112: 255.009 nāthadrume caiva gate praṇāśaṃ prāṇāḥ prayāsyanti mamāpi nāśam//59//
S01divyav_u:10116: 255.012 rājā āha--na sā strī, api tu bodhivṛkṣaḥ saḥ/
S01divyav_u:10119: mātaṅgī āha--yadi tāvat prāṇāntikāvaśiṣṭā bhaviṣyati, yathāpaurāṇamavasthāpayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:10120: 255.015 vistareṇa yāvatayā sūtraṃ muktvā vṛkṣasāmantena khanitvā divase kṣīrakumbhasahasreṇa pāyayati/
S01divyav_u:10122: tato rājapuruṣai rājñe niveditam--deva, diṣṭyā vardhasva, yathāpaurāṇaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10123: 255.017 śrutvā ca prītamanā bodhivṛkṣaṃ nirīkṣamāṇa uvāca--
S01divyav_u:10128_0: 255.023 atha rājā sauvarṇarūpyavaiḍūryasphaṭikamayānāṃ kumbhānāṃ sahasraṃ gandhodakena
S01divyav_u:10128_1: pūrayitvā prabhūtaṃ cānnapānaṃ samudrānīya gandhamālyapuṣpasaṃcayaṃ kṛtvā snātvā
S01divyav_u:10128_2: āhatāni vāsāṃsi navāni dīrghadaśāni prāvṛtya aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatamupavāsamupoṣya dhūpakaṭacchukamādāya
S01divyav_u:10130: 255.027 samyaggatā ye sugatasya śiṣyāḥ śāntendriyā nirjitakāmadoṣāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10134: 256.005 vasanti kāśmīrapure suramye ye cāpi dhīrāstamasāvane 'smin/
S01divyav_u:10135: 256.007 mahāvane revatake raye 'ryā anugrahāryaṃ mama te 'bhyupeyuḥ//80//
S01divyav_u:10137: 256.011 jinasutāḥ khalu dhyānaratāḥ sadā samudayāntviha te 'dya kṛpābalāḥ//81//
S01divyav_u:10138: 256.013 śairīṣake ye pravare vimāne vasanti putrā vadatāṃ varasya/
S01divyav_u:10139: 256.015 anugrahārthaṃ mama te viśokā hyāyantu kāruṇyaniviṣṭabhāvāḥ//82//
S01divyav_u:10142: 256.019 evamukte ca rājñā trīṇi śatasahasrāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ saṃnipatitāni/
S01divyav_u:10145: rājā āha--kimarthaṃ vṛddhāsanaṃ tannākramyate? tatra yaśo nāṃnā vṛddhaḥ ṣaḍabhijñaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10147: rājā āha--asti sthavira tvatsakāśādanyo vṛddhatara iti? sthavira uvāca--asti mahārāja--
S01divyav_u:10150: 256.026 atha rājā kadambapuṣpavadāhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ kathayati--asti kaścidbuddhadarśī bhikṣurdhriyata iti?
S01divyav_u:10151: sthavira uāca--asti mahārāja piṇḍolabharadvājo nāṃnā buddhadarśī tiṣṭhata iti/
S01divyav_u:10152: 256.028 rājā kathayati--sthavira, śakyaḥ so 'smābhirdraṣṭumiti? sthavira uvāca--mahārāja, idānīṃ drakṣyasi/
S01divyav_u:10158: atha sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvājo 'nekairarhatsahasrairardhacandrākāreṇopagūḍho rājahaṃsa iva gaganatalādavatīrya vṛddhānte niṣasāda/
S01divyav_u:10160: 257.008 adrākṣīdrājā piṇḍolabharadvājaṃ śvetapalitaśirasaṃ pralambabhrūlalāṭaṃ nigūḍhākṣitārakaṃ pratyekabuddhāśrayam/
S01divyav_u:10161: 257.009 dṛṣṭvā ca rājā mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvājasya pādayoḥ patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10162: 257.010 mukhatuṇḍakena ca pādāvanuparimārjya utthāya tau jānumaṇḍalau pṛthivītale pratiṣṭhāpya kṛtāñjaliḥ sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvājaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:10163: 257.012 yadā mayā śatrugaṇānnihatya prāptā samudrābharaṇā saśailā/
S01divyav_u:10164: 257.014 ekātaputrā pṛthaivī tadā me prītir na yā me sthaviraṃ nirīkṣya//86//
S01divyav_u:10168: 257.017 api ca sthavira dṛṣṭaste trailokyanātho gururme bhagavān buddha iti?
S01divyav_u:10169: tataḥ sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvāja ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ bhruvamunnāmya rājānamaśokam uvāca--
S01divyav_u:10172: 257.023 rājā āha--sthavira, kutra te bhagavān dṛṣṭaḥ, kathaṃ ceti?
S01divyav_u:10173: sthavira uvāca--yadā mahārāja bhagavān vijitamāraparivāraḥ pañcabhirarhacchataiḥ sārdhaṃ prathamato rājagṛhe varṣāmupagataḥ,
S01divyav_u:10178: 257.027 yadā rājagṛhe varṣā uṣitaḥ sa tathāgataḥ//88//
S01divyav_u:10180: 257.029 yathā paśyasi māṃ sākṣādevaṃ dṛṣṭo mayā miniḥ//89//
S01divyav_u:10181: 257.030 yadāpi mahārāja bhagavatā śrāvastyāṃ tīrthyān bijayārthaṃ vijayārthaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:10186: 258.001 tīrthyā yadā bhagavatā kupathaprayātā ṛddhiprabhāvavidhinā khalu nirgṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10187: 258.003 vikrīḍitaṃ daśabalasya tadāṃ hyudāraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tu nṛpa harṣakaraṃ prajānām//10//
S01divyav_u:10188: 258.005 yadāpi mahārāja bhagavatā deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu varṣā uṣitvā māturjanayitryā dharmaṃ deśayitvā devagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sāṃkāśye nagare 'vatīrṇaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10190: mayā sā devamanuṣyasampadā dṛṣṭā, utpalavarṇayā ca nirmitā cakravartisampadā iti/
S01divyav_u:10192: 258.008 yadāvatīrṇo vadatāṃ variṣṭho varṣāmuṣitvā khalu devaloke/
S01divyav_u:10193: 258.010 tatrāpyahaṃ saṃnihito babhūva dṛṣṭo mayāsau muniragrasattvaḥ//91//
S01divyav_u:10194: 258.012 yadā mahārāja sumāgadhayā anāthapiṇḍadaduhitryā upanimantritaḥ pañcabhirarhacchataiḥ sārdham ṛddhyā puṇḍravardhanaṃ gataḥ,
S01divyav_u:10195: tadāhaṃ parvataśailaṃ grahāya gaganatalamākramya puṇḍravardhanaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10196: 258.014 tannimittaṃ ca me bhagavatā ājñākṣiptā--na tāvat te parinirvātavyam yāvaddharmo nāntarhita iti/
S01divyav_u:10199: 258.018 tadā gṛhītvārdhabalena śailaṃ jagāma tūrṇaṃ khalu puṇḍravardhanam//92//
S01divyav_u:10200: 258.020 ājñā tadā śākyakuloditena dattā ca me kāruṇikena tena/
S01divyav_u:10201: 258.022 tāvanna te nirvṛtirabhyupeyā antarhito yāvadayaṃ na dharmaḥ//93//
S01divyav_u:10202: 258.024 yadāpi mahārāja tvayā pūrvaṃ bālabhāvādbhagavato rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭasya saktuṃ dāsyāmīti pāṃśvañjalirbhagavataḥ pātre prakṣiptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10204: tvaṃ na bhagavatā nirdiṣṭah--ayaṃ dārako varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama pāṭaliputre nagare aśoko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dhārmiko dharmarājā,
S01divyav_u:10214: 259.004 rājā āha--kiyantaḥ sthavirasya parivārāh? sthavira uvāca--
S01divyav_u:10217: 259.007 api ca mahārāja, kimanena saṃdehena kṛtena? pariviṣyatāṃ bhikṣusaṃghaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10220: 259.009 kiṃ tu buddhasmṛtipratibodhito 'haṃ bodhisnapanaṃ tāvat kariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:10229: 259.014 pāṇinā vardhitamātre ca kuṇālena sarvajanakāyena hāsyaṃ muktam/
S01divyav_u:10230: tato rājā hāsyaṃ muktvā kathayati--aho rādhagupta, kenaitadvardhitamiti?
S01divyav_u:10233: rājā āha--śatasahasratryaṃ dāsyāmītyāryasaṃghe kumbhasahasreṇa ca bodhiṃ snapayiṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:10238: ruṣitaṃ ca rājānamavekṣya rādhagupto rājñaḥ pādayor nipatyovāca--deva,
S01divyav_u:10239: kasya śaktir narendreṇa sārdhaṃ vispardhituṃ bhavet?
S01divyav_u:10242_0: kośaṃ sthāpayitvā rājyamantaḥpuramamātyagaṇamātmānaṃ ca kuṇālaṃ suvarṇarūpyasphaṭikavaiḍūryamayānāṃ
S01divyav_u:10246: 259.025 rājyaṃ samṛddhaṃ saṃsthāpya kośamantaḥpurāṇi cāmātyagaṇaṃ ca sarvam/
S01divyav_u:10247: 259.027 dadāmi saṃghe guṇapātrabhūte ātmā kuṇālaṃ ca guṇopapannam//97//
S01divyav_u:10248_0: 259.029 tato rājā piṇḍolabharadvājapramukhe bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayitvā bodhivṛkṣasya
S01divyav_u:10248_1: ca caturdiśaṃ vāraṃ baddhvā svayameva ca vāramabhiruhya caturbhiḥ kumbhasahasrairbodhisanapanaṃ kṛtavān /
S01divyav_u:10249: 259.030 kṛtamātre ca bodhisnapane bodhivṛkṣo yathāpaurāṇaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
