S01divyav_u:10255: 260.005 atha rājā bodhisnapanaṃ kṛtvā bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pariveṣṭumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10259: tathā te pariveṣṭavyam yathā te kṣatir na syāditi/
S01divyav_u:10260: 260.007 tato rājā svahastena pariveṣaṇam yāvannavakāntaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10261: tatra dvau śrāmaṇerau saṃrañjanīyaṃ dharmaṃ samādāya vartataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10270: 260.012 api tu asti dvau śrāmaṇerau bālakrīḍayā krīḍataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10271: 260.013 sthavira uvāca--alaṃ mahārāja, ubhau hi tau ubhayatobhāgavimuktau arhantau/
S01divyav_u:10272: 260.014 śrutvā ca rājñaḥ prītimanaso buddhirutpannā--tau śrāmaṇerau āgamya bhikṣusaṃghaṃ paṭenācchādayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:10273: 260.015 tatastau śrāmaṇerau rājño 'bhiprāyamavagamya bhūyo 'nye 'smābhiḥ svaguṇā udbhavayitavyā iti,
S01divyav_u:10279: 260.019 śrutvā ca rājño buddhirutpannā--mayā kevalaṃ cintitam, na tu vāgniścāritā/
S01divyav_u:10283: 260.023 yasyedṛśaḥ sādhujane prasādaḥ kāle tathotsāhi kṛtaṃ ca dānam//100//
S01divyav_u:10285_0: 260.026 tato rājā aśokaḥ pañcavārṣike paryavasite sarvabhikṣūṃs tricīvareṇācchādya
S01divyav_u:10286: 260.028 bhūyasā bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitamiti//
S01divyav_u:10287: 260.029 yasminneva divase rājñā aśokena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam,
S01divyav_u:10288: tasminneva divase rājño 'śokasya padmāvatī nāṃnā devī prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:10294: 261.001 [261]prītiḥ parā me vipulā hyavāptā mauryasya vaṃśasya parā vibhūtiḥ/
S01divyav_u:10295: 261.003 dharmeṇa rājyaṃ mama kurvato hi jāto dharmavivardhano 'stu//101//
S01divyav_u:10298: atha rājā kumāraṃ nirīkṣya prītamanāḥ kathayati--
S01divyav_u:10300: 261.009 alaṃkṛtaṃ śobhati yasya vaktraṃ saṃpūrṇacandrapratimaṃ vibhāti//102//
S01divyav_u:10305: asti himavati parvatarāje kuṇāle nāma pakṣī prativasati,
S01divyav_u:10311: tasyordhvato yojanam yakṣāḥ śṛṇvantyadho yojanaṃ nāgāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10313: atha rājā kuṇālasya netrāṇi suciraṃ nirīkṣya na kiṃcidviśeṣaṃ paśyati/
S01divyav_u:10317: 261.022 netrānurāgeṇa sa pārthivendraḥ sutaḥ kuṇāleti tadā babhāṣe/
S01divyav_u:10318: 261.024 tato 'sya nāma prathitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tasyāryasattvasya nṛpātmajasya//104//
S01divyav_u:10320: tasya kāñcanamālā nāma dārikā patnyarthe ānītā/
S01divyav_u:10321: 261.027 yāvadrājā aśokaḥ kuṇālena saha kurkuṭārāmaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10324: tena rājño 'bhihitam--kimarthaṃ kuṇālaḥ svakarmaṇi na niyujyate?
S01divyav_u:10325: tato rājñā abhihitah--kuṇāla, saṃghasthaviro yadājñāpayati tatparipālayitavyam/
S01divyav_u:10326: 261.030 tataḥ kuṇālaḥ sthavirasya pādayor nipatya kathayati--sthavira, kimājñāpayasi?
S01divyav_u:10331: 262.005 sa ca tathā abhyāsaṃ karoti manasikāraprayuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10334: tiṣyarakṣitā ca nāṃnā aśokasyāgramahiṣā taṃ pradeśamabhigatā/
S01divyav_u:10335: 262.007 sā taṃ kuṇālamekākinaṃ dṛṣṭvā nayanānurāgeṇa gātreṣu pariṣvajya kathayati--
S01divyav_u:10336: 262.009 dṛṣṭvā tavedaṃ nayanābhirāmaṃ śrīmadvapurnetrayugaṃ ca kāntam/
S01divyav_u:10337: 262.011 daṃdagyate me hṛdayaṃ samantāddāvāgninā prajvalateva kakṣam//106//
S01divyav_u:10338: 262.013 śrutvā kuṇāla ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ karṇau pidhāya kathayati--
S01divyav_u:10339: 262.014 vākyaṃ na yuktaṃ tava vaktumetat sūnoḥ purastājjananī mamāsi/
S01divyav_u:10340: 262.016 adharmarāgaṃ parivarjayasva apāyamārgasya hi eṣa hetuḥ//107//
S01divyav_u:10345: 262.022 mama bhavatu maraṇaṃ mā tu sthitasya dharme viśuddhabhāvasya/
S01divyav_u:10346: 262.023 na tu jīvitena kāryaṃ sajjanadhikkṛtena mama//109//
S01divyav_u:10347: 262.024 svargasya dharmalopo yato bhavati jīvitena kiṃ tena/
S01divyav_u:10354: atha rājā kuṇālamāhūya kathayati--vatsa kuṇāla, gamiṣyasi takṣaśilānagaraṃ saṃnāmayitum?
S01divyav_u:10357: 263.003 snehācca yogyaṃ manasā ca buddhvā ājñāpayāmāsa vidhāya yātrām//111//
S01divyav_u:10358: 263.005 atha rājā aśoko nagaraśobhāṃ mārgaśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā jīrṇāturakṛpaṇānāthāṃśca mārgādapanīya ekarathe 'bhiruhya kumāreṇa saha pāṭaliputrānnirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10359: 263.006 anuvrajitvā nivartamānaḥ kuṇālaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya nayanaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:10360: 263.008 dhanyāni tasya cakṣūṃṣi cakṣuṣmantaśca te janāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10366: 263.014 śriyā vivṛddhe hi sukhānukūle paśyāmi netre 'dya vinaśyamāne//113//
S01divyav_u:10368: 263.018 puraṃ vipanne nayane tu tasya bhaviṣyati śokaparītacetāḥ//114//
S01divyav_u:10370: śrutvā ca takṣaśilāpaurā ardhatrikāṇi yojanāni mārgaśobhāṃ nagaraśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā pūrṇakumbhaiḥ pratyudgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10384: śrutvā ca tiṣyarakṣitā cintayati--yadi kuṇālaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāsyati, nāsti mama jīvitam/
S01divyav_u:10388: tatastiṣyarakṣitayā vaidyānāmabhihitam--yadi kaścidīdṛśena[264] vyādhinā spṛṣṭaḥ strī vā puruṣo vā āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:10397: 264.005 jīvitād vyaparopya kukṣiṃ pāṭayitvā paśyati ca tasya pakvāśayasthāne antrāyāṃ kṛmirmahān prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10398: 264.0sa yadyūrdhvaṃ gacchati tenāśucīni pragharati, athādho gacchati, adhaḥ pragharati/
S01divyav_u:10399: 264.007 yāvat tatra maricān peṣayitvā dattaṃ na ca mriyate/
S01divyav_u:10403: etacca prakaraṇaṃ tayā rajñe niveditam--deva pālāṇḍuṃ parimuṅkṣva, svāsthyaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:10405: 264.010 kathaṃ palāṇḍuṃ paribhakṣayāmi? devyuvāca--deva, paribhoktavyaṃ jīvitasyārthe, bhaiṣajyametat/
S01divyav_u:10409: 264.012 tena parituṣṭena tiṣyarakṣitā vareṇa pravāritā--kiṃ te varaṃ prayacchāmi?
S01divyav_u:10411: 264.013 rājā āha--ahaṃ ko bhaviṣyāmi? devyuvāca--saptāhasyātyayāddeva eva rājā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:10413: tasyā buddhirutpannā--idānīṃ mayā asya kuṇālasya vairaṃ niryātitavyam/
S01divyav_u:10414: 264.015 tayā kapaṭalekho likhitastakṣaśilakānāṃ paurāṇām--kuṇālasya nayanaṃ vināśayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:10416: 264.017 rājā hyaśoko balavān pracaṇḍa ājñāpayattakṣaśilājanaṃ hi/
S01divyav_u:10417: 264.019 uddhāryatāṃ locanamasya śatrormauryasya vaṃśasya kalaṅka eṣaḥ//116//
S01divyav_u:10418: 264.021 rājño 'śoksya yatra kāryamāśu pariprāpyaṃ bhavati, dantamudrayā mudrayati/
S01divyav_u:10419: yāvat tiṣyarakṣitā śayitasya rājñastaṃ lekhaṃ dantamudrayā mudrayiṣyāmīti rājñaḥ sakāśamabhigatā/
S01divyav_u:10421: 264.023 devī kathayati--kimidamiti? rājā kathayati--devi, svapnaṃ me 'śobhanaṃ dṛṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:10424: 264.025 evaṃ dvirapi rājā bhītaḥ pratibuddhaḥ kathayati--devi, svapno me na śobhano dṛṣṭa iti/
S01divyav_u:10428: yāvat tiṣyarakṣitayā rājñaḥ śayitasya sa lekho dantamudrayā mudrayitvā takṣaśilāṃ preṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10429: 264.028 yāvadrājñā śayitena svapne dṛṣṭaṃ dantā viśīrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10430: 264.029 tato rājā tasyā eva rātreratyaye naimittikānāhūya kathayati--kīdṛśa eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ vipāka iti?
S01divyav_u:10433: 264.031 dantā yasya viśīryante svapnānte prapatanti ca/
S01divyav_u:10434: 264.032 cakṣurbhedaṃ ca putrasya putranāśaṃ ca paśyati//117//
S01divyav_u:10437: 265.003 yā devatā śāsturabhiprasannā dharme ca saṃghe ca gaṇapradhāne/
S01divyav_u:10438: 265.005 ye cāpi loke ṛṣayo variṣṭhā rakṣantu te 'smattanayaṃ kuṇālam//118//
S01divyav_u:10440: atha takṣaśilāḥ paurajānapadā lekhadarśanāt kuṇālasya guṇavistaratuṣṭā notsahante tadaptiyaṃ niveditum/
S01divyav_u:10441: 265.008 ciraṃ vicārayitvā rājā duṣṭaśīlaḥ svaputrasya na marṣayati, prāgevāsmākaṃ marṣayati/
S01divyav_u:10446: tataḥ kuṇālo vācayitvā kathayati--viśrabdham yathātmaprayojanaṃ kriyatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:10461: 265.022 paśyānityamidaṃ sarvaṃ nāsti kaścid dhruve sthitaḥ//121//
S01divyav_u:10465: 265.027 utpāṭane 'haṃ na bibhemi saumya netradvayasyāsthiratāṃ hi paśye//123//
S01divyav_u:10466: 265.029 utpāṭe vā na vā netre yathā vā manyate nṛpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10468: 265.031 tataḥ kuṇālastaṃ puruṣamuvāca--tena hi bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:10470: 265.032 yāvat sa puruṣaḥ kuṇālasya nayanamutpāṭayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10474: 266.003 teṣu prāṇiśatasahasreṣu rudatsu kuṇālasyaiva nayanamutpāṭya haste dattam/
S01divyav_u:10476: 266.005 rūpāṇi kasmānna nirīkṣase tvam yathāpurā prākṛta māṃsapiṇḍa/
S01divyav_u:10477: 266.007 te vañcitāste ca vigarhaṇīyā ātmeti ye tvāmabudhāḥ//126//
S01divyav_u:10479: 266.011 evaṃ pravīkṣanti sadāpramattā ye tvāṃ na te duḥkhamanuprayānti//127//
S01divyav_u:10482: 266.015 tataḥ kuṇālo dṛṣṭasatyastaṃ puruṣamuvāca--idānīṃ dvitīyaṃ viśrabdhaṃ nayanamutpāṭya haste datta/
S01divyav_u:10483: 266.016 atha kuṇālo māṃsacakṣuṣyuddhṛte prajñācakṣuṣi ca viśuddhe kathayati--
S01divyav_u:10490: 266.023 yāvatkuṇālena śrutam--nāyaṃ tātasyāśokasya karma, api tu tiṣyarakṣitāyā ayaṃ prayoga iti/
S01divyav_u:10492: 266.025 ciraṃ sukhaṃ caiva sā tiṣyanāṃnī āyurbalaṃ pālayate ca devī/
S01divyav_u:10493: 266.027 saṃpreṣito 'yaṃ hi yayā prayogo yasyānubhāvena kṛtaḥ svakārtham//132//
S01divyav_u:10495: śrutvā ca bhartṛtayā kuṇālasamīpamupasaṃkramya parṣadamavagāhya kuṇālamuddhṛtanayanaṃ rudhirāvasiktagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā sūrcchitā bhūmau patitā/
S01divyav_u:10498: 267.001 [267]netrāṇi kāntāni manoharāṇi ye māṃ nirīkṣañjanayanti tuṣṭim/
S01divyav_u:10499: 267.003 te me vipannā hyanirīkṣaṇīyāstyajanti me prāṇasamāḥ śarīram//133//
S01divyav_u:10504: 267.007 karmātmakaṃ lokamidaṃ viditvā duḥkhātmakaṃ cāpi janaṃ hi matvā/
S01divyav_u:10505: 267.009 matvā ca lokaṃ priyaviprayogaṃ kartuṃ priye nārhasi bāṣpamokṣam//134//
S01divyav_u:10506: 267.011 tataḥ kuṇālo bhāryayā saha takṣaśilāyā niṣkāsitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10517: 267.016 tataḥ kuṇālo rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye vīṇāṃ vādayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10518: yathā nayanānyutpāṭitāni, satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam, tadanurūpaṃ hitaṃ ca gītaṃ prārabdham/
S01divyav_u:10522: 267.020 yadi tava bhavaduḥkhapīḍitā bhavati doṣaviniśritā matiḥ/
S01divyav_u:10523: 267.022 sukhamiha ca yadīcchasi dhruvaṃ tvaritamihāyatanāni saṃtyajasva//136//
S01divyav_u:10526: 267.025 gītaṃ kuṇālena mayi prasaktaṃ vīṇāsvaraṃ caiva śrutiścireṇa/
S01divyav_u:10527: 267.027 abhyāgato 'pīha gṛhaṃ nu kaṃcinna cecchati draṣṭumayaṃ kumāraḥ//137//
S01divyav_u:10529: 267.030 na khalveṣa kiṃ gītasya kuṇālasadṛśo dhvaniḥ/
S01divyav_u:10536: 268.002 apratyabhijñāya ca rājānamaśokamabhigamyovāca--deva, na hyeṣa kuṇālaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10537: 268.003 andhaka eṣa vanīpakaḥ patnyā saha devasya yānaśālāyamavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10538: śrutvā ca rājā saṃvignaścintayāmāsa--yathā mayā svapnānyaśobhanāni dṛṣṭāni,
S01divyav_u:10541: 268.006 svapnāntare nimittāni yathā dṛṣṭāni me purā/
S01divyav_u:10542: 268.007 niḥsaṃśayaṃ kuṇālasya netre vai nidhanaṃ gate//140//
S01divyav_u:10545: 268.010 na hi me śāmyate cetaḥ sutavyasanacintayā//141//
S01divyav_u:10546: 268.011 yāvat puruṣo yānaśālāṃ gatvā kuṇālamuvāca--kasya tvaṃ putraḥ, kiṃ ca nāma? kuṇālaḥ prāha--
S01divyav_u:10548: 268.014 kṛtsneyaṃ pṛthivī yasya vaśe vartani kiṃkara//142//
S01divyav_u:10549: 268.015 tasya rājñastvahaṃ putraḥ kuṇāla iti viśrutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10551: 268.017 tataḥ kuṇālaḥ patnyā saha rājño 'śokasya samīpamānītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10552: atha rājā aśokah {paśyati} kuṇālamuddhṛtanayanaṃ vātātapaparidagdhagātraṃ rathyācolakasaṃghātapratyavareṇa vāsasā lakṣyālakṣyapracchāditakaupīnam/
S01divyav_u:10553: 268.019 sa tamapratyābhijñāya ākṛtimātrakaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā kathayati--tvaṃ kuṇāla iti?
S01divyav_u:10557: 268.021 tataḥ kuṇālasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya netroddhṛtaṃ śokaparītacetāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10558: 268.023 rājā hyaśokaḥ patito dharaṇyāṃ hā putraśokena hi dahyamānaḥ//144//
S01divyav_u:10560: atha rājā kathaṃcit saṃjñāmupalabhya kuṇālamutsaṅge sthāpayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:10562: 268.027 tato muhūrtaṃ nṛpa āśvasitvā kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya rasāśrukaṇṭhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10563: 268.028 muhuḥ kuṇālasya mukhaṃ pramṛjya bahūni rājā vilalāpa tatra//145//
S01divyav_u:10564: 268.030 netre kuṇālapratime vilokya sutaṃ kuṇāleti purā babhāṣe/
S01divyav_u:10565: 269.001 [269]tadasya netre nidhanaṃ gate te putraṃ kuṇāleti kathaṃ ca vakṣye//146//
S01divyav_u:10567: 269.004 kathaya kathaya sādhu putra tāvadvadanamidaṃ tava cārunetram/
S01divyav_u:10569: 269.008 akaruṇahṛdayena tena tāta munisadṛśasya na sādhu sādhubuddheḥ/
S01divyav_u:10571: 269.012 vada suvadana kṣiprametadarthaṃ vrajati śarīramidaṃ purā vināśam/
S01divyav_u:10574: 269.017 rājannatītaṃ khalu naiva śocyaṃ kiṃ na śrutaṃ te munivākyametat/
S01divyav_u:10575: 269.019 yatkarmabhiste 'pi jinā na muktāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ sudṛḍhaistathaiva//250//
S01divyav_u:10576: 269.021 labdhāḥ phalasthāśca pṛthagjanāśca kṛtāni kāmānyaśubhāni dehinām/
S01divyav_u:10577: 269.023 svayaṃkṛtānāmiha karmāṇāṃ phalaṃ kathaṃ tu vakṣyāmi parairidaṃ kṛtam//151//
S01divyav_u:10580: 269.027 na śastravajrāgniviṣāṇi pannagāḥ kurvanti pīḍāṃ nabhaso 'vikāriṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10581: 269.029 śarīralakṣyeṇa dhṛtena pārthiva patanti duḥkhānyaśivāni dehinām//153//
S01divyav_u:10583: 269.032 kenoddhṛtāni nayanāni sutasya mahyaṃ ko jīvitaṃ sumadhuraṃ tyajituṃ vyavastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10584: 270.001 [270]śokānalo nipatito hṛdaye pracaṇḍah ācakṣva putra kasya harāmi daṇḍam//154//
S01divyav_u:10585: 270.003 yāvadrājñā aśokena śrutam--tiṣyarakṣitāyā ayaṃ prayoga iti/
S01divyav_u:10587: 270.005 kathaṃ hi dhanye na nimajjase kṣitau cchindāmi śīrṣaṃ paraśuprahāraiḥ/
S01divyav_u:10590: 270.010 utpāṭya netre paripātayāmi gātraṃ kimasyā nakharaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:10591: 270.012 jīvantiśūlāmatha kārayāmi cchindāmi nāsāṃ krakacena vāsyāḥ//156//
S01divyav_u:10592: 270.014 kṣureṇa jihvāmatha kartayāmi viṣeṇa pūrṇāmatha ghātayiṣye/
S01divyav_u:10595: 270.020 anāryakarmā yadi tiṣyarakṣitā tvamāryakarmā bhava mā vadha striyam//158//
S01divyav_u:10596: 270.022 phalaṃ hi maitryā sadṛśaṃ na vidyate prabhostitakṣā sugatena varṇitā/
S01divyav_u:10597: 270.024 punaḥ praṇasya pitaraṃ kumāraḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ sūnṛtavāgjagāda//159//
S01divyav_u:10598: 270.026 rājanna me duḥkhamalo 'sti kaścittīvrāpalāre 'pi na manyutāpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10599: 270.028 manaḥ prasannam yadi me jananyām yenoddhṛte me nayane svayaṃ hi/
S01divyav_u:10600: 270.030 tattena satyena mamāstu tāvannetradvayaṃ prāktanameva sadyaḥ//160//
S01divyav_u:10602: yāvadrājñā aśokena tiṣyarakṣitā amarṣitena jatugṛhaṃ praveśayitvā dagdhā,
S01divyav_u:10604: 271.001 [271]bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaśayacchettāramāyuṣmantaṃ sthaviropaguptaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ kuṇālena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena nayanānyutpāṭitāni?
S01divyav_u:10613: 271.008 kiṃ manyadhvamāyuṣmantah? yo 'sau lubdhakaḥ, sa eṣa kuṇālaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10615: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhamanubhūya tataḥ karmāvaśeṣeṇa pañca janmaśatāni tasya nayanānyutpāṭitāni//
S01divyav_u:10616: 271.011 kiṃ karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākenocce kule upapannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10619: 271.013 tena hyāyucmantaḥ śrūyatām--bhūtapūrvamatīte 'dhvani catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi/
S01divyav_u:10620: 271.014 yadā krakucchandaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10621: tasya aśokena rājñā catūratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:10622: 271.016 yadā rājā aśokaḥ kālagataḥ, aśrāddho rājā rājyaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10625: atra janakāyo gatvā viśīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā śocitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10628: tairabhihitam--krakucchandasya samyaksambuddhasya stūpaṃ catūratnamayamāsīt, sa idānīṃ viśīrṇa iti/
S01divyav_u:10629: 271.020 tatastena ca tatra krakucchandasya samyaksambuddhasya kāyapramāṇikā pratimā babhūva viśīrṇā,
S01divyav_u:10633: 271.023 kiṃ manyadhvamāyuṣmantah? yo 'sau śreṣṭhiputraḥ, sa eṣa kuṇālaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10634: yatrānena krakucchandasya stūpamabhisaṃskṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākenoccakule upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10635: 271.024 yatpratimā abhisaṃskṛtā, tena karmaṇo vipākena kuṇākaḥ prāsādikaḥ samṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10637: tasya karmaṇo vipākena kuṇālena śākyamuniḥ samyaksambuddhastādṛśa eva śāstā samārāgito na virāgitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10642: 272.002 yadā rājñā aśokena bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā,
S01divyav_u:10643: tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ pañcavārṣikaṃ ca kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:10644: 272.003 trīṇi śatasahastāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojitāni yatraiko 'rhatāṃ dvau śaikṣāṇāṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:10653: atha rājā aśoko 'pareṇa samayena mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10656: tenābhigamya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā sa ṛṣiḥ pṛṣṭah--bhagavan, kiyaccitraṃ te ihāraṇye prativasatah?
S01divyav_u:10661: 272.013 vītaśoka uvāca--bhagavan, kiṃ duḥkhaṃ bādhate? ṛṣiruvāca--ime mṛgā ṛtukāle saṃvasanti/
S01divyav_u:10662: 272.014 yadā mṛgānāṃ saṃvāso dṛṣṭo bhavati, tasmin samaye rāgeṇa paridahyāmi/
S01divyav_u:10663: 272.015 vītaśoka uvāca--asya kaṣṭena tapasā rāgo 'dyāpi na bādhyate,
S01divyav_u:10665: 272.016 kuta eṣāṃ rāgaprahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? āha ca--
S01divyav_u:10666: 272.017 kaṣṭe 'smin vijane vane nivasatāṃ vāyvambumūlāśināṃ rāgo naiva jito yadīha ṛṣiṇā kālaprakarṣeṇa hi/
S01divyav_u:10667: 272.019 bhuktavānnaṃ sadhṛtaṃ prabhūtapiśitaṃ dadhyuttamālaṃkṛtaṃ śākyeṣvindriyanigraho yadi bhavedvindhyaḥ plavetsāgare//1//
S01divyav_u:10668: 272.021 sarvathā vañjito rājā aśoko yacchramaṇeṣu śākyaputrīyeṣu kārāṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:10669: etacca vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā upāyajño 'mātyānuvāca--ayaṃ vītaśokastīrthyābhiprasannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10672: rājā āha--yadā ahaṃ rājā alaṃkāraṃ mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ cāpanayitvā snānaśālāṃ praviṣṭo bhavāmi,
S01divyav_u:10673: tadā yūyaṃ vītaśokasyopāyena mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣādayiṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:10675: yāvadrājā rājālaṃkāraṃ mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ cāpanayitvā snānaśālāyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10677: 272.027 imaṃ tāvadrājālaṃkāraṃ pravaramauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣīdayiṣyāmah--kiṃ śobhase na veti/
S01divyav_u:10678: 272.028 taistadābharaṇamauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣādito rājñaśca niveditam/
S01divyav_u:10679: 272.029 tato rājā aśoko vītaśokaṃ rājālaṃkāraṃ maulipaṭṭabaddhaṃ ca siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--adhyāpyahaṃ jīvāmi/
S01divyav_u:10682: tato yāvadvadhyaghātakā nīlāmbaravasanāḥ pralambakeśā ghaṇṭāśabdapāṇayo rājñaḥ pādayor nipatyovāca--deva, kimājñāpayasi?
S01divyav_u:10685: tato 'mātyā rājñaḥ pādayor nipalyovāca--deva, marṣaya vītaśokam/
S01divyav_u:10689: mama bhrātuḥ snehādasya saptāhaṃ rājyaṃ prayacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:10695: divase gate vītaśokasyāgrataḥ sthitvā ārocayanti--nirgataṃ vītaśoka ekaṃ divasam/
S01divyav_u:10698: vistareṇa yāvatsaptāhadivase vītaśoko rājālaṃkāravibhūṣito rājño 'śokasya samīpamupanītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10699: 273.007 tato rājñā aśokenābhihitam--vītaśoka, kañcitsugītaṃ sunṛtyaṃ suvāditamiti ?
S01divyav_u:10700: vītaśoka uvāca--na me dṛṣṭaṃ vā syācchrutaṃ veti/
S01divyav_u:10702: 273.010 yena śrutaṃ bhavedgītaṃ nṛtyaṃ cāpi nirīkṣitam/
S01divyav_u:10705: idaṃ mayā rājyaṃ saptāhaṃ tava dattam,
S01divyav_u:10710: 273.013 kathaṃ tvaṃ kathayasi--naiva me dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutamiti? vītaśoka uvāca--
S01divyav_u:10711: 273.015 na me dṛṣṭaṃ nṛtyaṃ na ca nṛpa śruto gītaninado na me gandhā ghrātā na khalu rasā me 'dya viditāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10712: 273.017 na me spṛṣṭaḥ sparśaḥ kanakamaṇihārāṅgajanitaḥ samūho nārīṇāṃ maraṇaparibaddhena manasā//3//
S01divyav_u:10713: 273.019 striyo nṛttaṃ gītaṃ bhavaśayanānyāsanavidhirvayo rūpaṃ lakṣmīrbahuvividharatnā ca vasudhā/
S01divyav_u:10714: 273.021 nirānandā śūnyā mama nṛpa varaśayyā gatasukhā sthitān dṛṣṭvā dvāre vadhakapuruṣānnīlavasanān//4//
S01divyav_u:10718: 273.026 nādrākṣaṃ nṛpate nṛttaṃ na ca bhoktuṃ manaḥspṛhā//6//
S01divyav_u:10721: 273.029 rājā āha--vītaśoka, mā tāvat tavaikajanmikasya maraṇabhayāttava rājaśriyaṃ prāpya harṣo notpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10722: 273.030 kiṃ punarbhikṣavo janmaśatamaraṇabhayabhītāḥ sarvāṇyupapattyāyatanāni duḥkhānyanusṛtāni paśyanti/
S01divyav_u:10734: 274.004 mā tāvadekajanmikasya maraṇabhayāttava na jāyate harṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10738: 274.008 teṣāṃ tu vastraśayanāsanabhojanādi mokṣo 'bhiyuktamanasāṃ janayeta saṅgam/
S01divyav_u:10740: 274.012 kathaṃ ca teṣāṃ na bhavedvimokṣo mokṣārthināṃ janmaparānmukhānām/
S01divyav_u:10744: eṣo 'haṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ceti/
S01divyav_u:10747: 274.020 budhavibudhamanujamahitaṃ jinaṃ virāgaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca//12//iti/
S01divyav_u:10748: 274.021 atha rājā aśoko vītaśokaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajyovāca--na tvaṃ mayā parityaktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10749: api tu buddhaśāsanābhiprasādārthaṃ tava mayā eṣa upāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10761: tata utthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ sthavitamuvāca--labheyāhaṃ svakhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:10764: tato vītaśoko yena rājā aśokastenopasaṃkramya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--deva, anujānīhi mām/
S01divyav_u:10765: 274.030 pravrajiṣyāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikām/
S01divyav_u:10767: 275.001 [275]udbhrānto 'smi niraṅkuśo rājā iva vyāvartito vibhramāt tvadbuddhiprabhavāṅkuśena vidhivadbuddhopadeśairaham/
S01divyav_u:10768: ekaṃ tvamarhasi me varaṃ pradarśituṃ tvaṃ pārthivānāṃ pate lokālokavarasya śāsanavare liṅgaṃ śibhaṃ dhārayet//13//
S01divyav_u:10769: 275.005 śrutvā ca rājā sāśrukaṇṭho vītaśokaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajyovāca--vītaśoka, alamanena vyavasāyena/
S01divyav_u:10774: vyābādhe khalvapi bhaiṣajyamasulabhaṃ pūtimūtraṃ ca bhojanam/
S01divyav_u:10778: 275.010 naiva hi jāne taṃ nūnaṃ viṣayatṛṣito 'nāyāsavihataḥ pravrajyāṃ prāptukāmo na ripuhṛtabalo naivārthakṛpaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10779: 275.012 duḥkhārtaṃ mṛtyuneṣṭaṃ vyasanaparigataṃ dṛṣṭvā jagadidaṃ panthānaṃ janmabhīruḥ śivamabhayamahaṃ gantuṃ vyavasitaḥ//14//
S01divyav_u:10780: 275.014 śrutvā ca rājā aśokaḥ satvaraṃ praruditumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10782: 275.016 saṃsāradolāmabhiruhya lolam yadā nipāto niyataḥ prajānām/
S01divyav_u:10783: 275.018 kimarthamāgacchati vikriyā te sarveṇa sarvasya yadā viyogaḥ//15//
S01divyav_u:10785: rājakule vṛkṣavāṭikāyāṃ tasya tṛṇasaṃstaraḥ saṃstṛtaḥ, bhojanaṃ cāsya dattam/
S01divyav_u:10786: 275.021 so 'ntaḥpuraṃ paryaṭati, mahārhaṃ cāhāraṃ na labhate/
S01divyav_u:10794: athāyuṣmato vītaśokasyārhattvaṃ prāptasya vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedina etadabhavat--asti khalu me--pūrvaṃ rājño 'śokasya gṛhadvāramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10795: 275.028 tato dauvārikamuvāca--gaccha, rājño 'śokasya nivedaya--vītaśoko dvāri tiṣṭhati devaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:10800: dṛṣṭvā ca rajā aśokaḥ saṃhāsanādutthāya mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇāyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokaṃ nirīkṣamānaḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:10801: 276.001 [276]bhūteṣu saṃsargagateṣu nityaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi māṃ naiti yathā vikāram/
S01divyav_u:10804: sa paśyati--āyuṣmato vītaśokasya pāṃśukūlaṃ ca cīvaraṃ mṛṇmayaṃ pātram yāvadannaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ lūhapraṇītam/
S01divyav_u:10805: 276.006 dṛṣṭvā ca rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--deva,
S01divyav_u:10811: 276.011 nirāśravam yasya mano viśālaṃ nirāmayaṃ copacitaṃ śarīram/
S01divyav_u:10812: 276.013 svacchandato jīvitasādhanaṃ ca nityotsavaṃ tasya manuṣyaloke//18//
S01divyav_u:10816: 276.018 atyuddhṛtamiva manye yaśasā pūtaṃ puramiva mahaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:10818: 276.020 atha rājā aśokaḥ sarvāṅgena parigṛhya prajñapta evāsane niṣādayāmāsa,
S01divyav_u:10820: 276.021 bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātramāyuṣmato vītaśokasya purato niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:10821: 276.022 athāyuṣmān vītaśoko rājānamaśokaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:10823: 276.025 durlabhā trīṇi ratnāni nityaṃ pūjaya pārthiva//21//
S01divyav_u:10825: 276.027 atha rājā aśokaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ pañcabhiramātyaśataiḥ parivṛto 'nekaiśca paurajanapadasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta āyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokamanuvrajitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10829: 277.001 [277]tata āyuṣmān vītaśokaḥ svaguṇānudbhāvayan paśyataḥ sarvajanakāyasya ṛddhyā vaihāyasamutpatya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10830: 277.002 atha rājā aśokaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto gaganatalāvasaktadṛṣṭirāyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokaṃ nirīkṣamāṇa uvāca--
S01divyav_u:10836: 277.009 ṛddhyā khalvavabhartsatāḥ paramayā śrīgarvitāste vayaṃ buddhyā khalvapi nāmitāḥ śirasitāḥ prajñābhimānodayam/
S01divyav_u:10837: 277.011 prāptārthena phalāndhabuddhimanasaḥ saṃvejitāste vayaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa sabāṣpadurdinamukhāḥ sthāne vimuktā vayam//25//
S01divyav_u:10838: 277.013 tatrāyuṣmān vītaśokaḥ pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu śayyāsanāya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10840: 277.014 śrutvā ca rājñā aśokena bhaiṣajyamupasthāyikāśca visarjitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10841: tasya tena vyādhinā spṛṣṭasya śiraḥ khustamabhavat/
S01divyav_u:10842: 277.015 yadā ca vyādhirvigataḥ, tasya virūṭāni śirasi romāṇi/
S01divyav_u:10846: 277.017 tasmiṃśca samaye puṇḍravardhananagare nirgranthopāsakena buddhapratimā nirgranthasya pādayor nipātitā citrārpitā/
S01divyav_u:10849: 277.019 tasyordhvam yojanam yakṣāḥ śṛṇvanti, adho yojanaṃ nāgāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10851: 277.020 dṛṣṭvā ca rājñā ruṣitenābhihitam--puṇḍravardhane sarve ājīvikāḥ praghātayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10853: tataḥ pāṭaliputre bhūyo 'nyena nirgranthopāsakena buddhapratimā nirgranthasya pādayor nipātitā citrārpitā/
S01divyav_u:10854: 277.022 śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣitena sa nirgranthopāsakaḥ sabandhuvargo gṛhaṃ praveśāyitvā agninā dagdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10855: 277.023 ājñaptaṃ ca--yo me nirgranthasya śiro dāsyati, tasya dīnāraṃ dāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:10857: sa cāyuṣmān vītaśoka ābhīrasya gṛhe rātriṃ vāsamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10858: 277.025 tasya ca vyādhinā kliṣṭasya lūhāni cīvarāṇi, dīrghakeśanakhaśmaśruḥ/
S01divyav_u:10862: 277.028 tataḥ sa ābhīro 'siṃ niṣkoṣaṃ kṛtvā āyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokamabhigataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10863: 277.029 āyuṣmatā ca vītaśokena pūrvānte jñānaṃ kṣiptam/
S01divyav_u:10868: dṛṣṭvā ca rājñā aśokena parijñātam--viralāni cāsya śirasi romāṇi na vyaktimupagacchanti/
S01divyav_u:10875: 278.003 yāvadrājñā abhayapradānaṃ dattam--na bhūyaḥ kaścit praghātayitavyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:10876: 278.004 tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāramāyuṣmantamupaguptaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ karma kṛtamāyuṣmatā vītaśokena yasya karmaṇo vipākena śastreṇa praghātitah?
S01divyav_u:10877: sthavira uvāca--tena hyāyuṣmantaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu/
S01divyav_u:10879: 278.007 bhutapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatamo lubdho mṛgān praghātayitvā jīvikāṃ kalpayati/
S01divyav_u:10881: sa tatra lubdho gatvā pāśān yantrāṃśca sthāpayitvā mṛgān praghātayati/
S01divyav_u:10884: anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhastasminnudapāne āhārakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā udapānāduttīrya vṛkṣamūle paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10886: 278.011 sa lubdha āgatya paśyati--neiva mṛgā udapānamabhyāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10889: 278.013 tenāsiṃ niṣkoṣaṃ kṛtvā sa pratyekabuddhaḥ praghātitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:10890: 278.014 kiṃ manyadhve āyuṣmantah? yo 'sau lubdhaḥ sa eṣa vītaśokaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10891: yatrānena megāḥ praghātitāḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena mahān vyādhirutpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10893: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhamanubhūya pañca janmaśatāni manuṣyeṣūpapannaḥ śastreṇa praghātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10895: 278.018 kiṃ karma kṛtam yenoccakule upapannaḥ, arhattvaṃ ca prāptam?
S01divyav_u:10897: 278.019 tena dāyakadānapatayaḥ saṃghabhaktaṃ kārāpitāstarpaṇāni yavāgūpānāni nimantraṇakāni/
S01divyav_u:10906: 279.002 yadā rājñā aśokena ardhāmalakadānena bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā,
S01divyav_u:10907: sa bhikṣūnuvāca--kena bhagavacchāsane prabhūtaṃ dānaṃ dattam?
S01divyav_u:10910: bhikṣava ūcuh--koṭiśataṃ tena bhagavacchāsane dānaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:10911: 279.005 śrutvā ca rājā aśokaścintayati--tena gṛhapatinā bhūtvā koṭiśataṃ bhagavachāsane dānaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:10921: trīṇi śatasahasrāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojitāni yatrekarmahatāṃ dvau śaikṣāṇāṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:10922: 279.010 kośaṃ sthāpayitvā mahāpṛthivīmantaḥpurāmātyagaṇamātmānaṃ kuṇālaṃ ca āryasaṃghe niryātayitvā catvāri śatasahasrāṇi dattvā niṣkrītavān/
S01divyav_u:10925: atha rājā idānīṃ na bhaviṣyāmīti viklavībhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10926: 279.013 tasya rādhagupto nāmāmātyo yena saha pāṃśudānaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:10927: 279.014 tadā sa rājānamaśokaṃ viklavībhūtamavekṣya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:10929: 279.017 padmānanaśrīśatasamprapītaṃ kasmāt sabāṣpaṃ tava deva vaktram//1//
S01divyav_u:10931: nāhaṃ dravyavināśaṃ na rājyanāśanaṃ na cāśrayaviyogaṃ śocāmi,
S01divyav_u:10933: 279.021 nāhaṃ punaḥ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ saṃghaṃ samakṣaṃ naradevapūjitam/
S01divyav_u:10936: ayaṃ me manoratho babhūva--koṭiśataṃ bhagavacchāsane dānaṃ dāsyāmīti,
S01divyav_u:10938: 279.026 tato rājñā aśokena catvāraḥ koṭyaḥ paripūrayiṣyāmīti hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ kurkuṭārāmaṃ praṣayitumārabdhaḥ//
S01divyav_u:10939: 279.028 tasmiṃśca samaye kuṇālasya saṃpadir nāma putro yuvarājye pravartate/
S01divyav_u:10953: atha rājā aśokaḥ saṃvigno 'mātyān paurāṃśca saṃnipātya kathayati--kaḥ sāmprataṃ pṛthivyāmīśvarah?
S01divyav_u:10954: tato 'mātya utthāyāsanādyena rājā aśokastenāñjaliṃ praṇamyovāca--deva, pṛthivyāmīśvaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:10956: 280.008 dākṣiṇyādanṛtaṃ hi kiṃ kathayata bhraṣṭādhirājyā vayaṃ śeṣaṃ tvāmalakārdhamityavasitam yatra prabhutvaṃ mama/
S01divyav_u:10957: 280.010 eśvaryaṃ dhignāryamuddhatanadītoyapraveśopamaṃ martyendrasya mamāpi yatpratibhayaṃ dāridryamabhyāgatam//3//
S01divyav_u:10959: saṃpattayo hi sarvā vipattinidhanā iti pratijñātam yadavitathavādinā gautamena,
S01divyav_u:10961: 280.014 pratiśiṣyate 'smanne cirādājñā mama yāvatī yathā manasā/
S01divyav_u:10964: 280.018 bhraṣṭasvāyatano na bhāti kṛpaṇaḥ saṃpratyaśoko nṛpah chinnāmlānaviśīrṇapatrakusumaḥ śuṣyatyaśoko yathā//5//
S01divyav_u:10965: 280.020 tato rājā aśokaḥ samīpo gataṃ puruṣamāhūyovāca--bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:10966: pūrvaguṇānurāgādbhraṣṭaiśvaryasyāpi mama imaṃ tāvadapaścimaṃ vyāpāraṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:10967: 280.021 idaṃ mamārdhāmalakaṃ grahāya kurkuṭārāmaṃ gatvā saṃghe niryātaya/
S01divyav_u:10968: 280.022 madvacanācca saṃghasya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā vaktavyam--jambudvīpaiśvaryasya rājña eṣa sāmprataṃ vibhava iti/
S01divyav_u:10969: 280.023 idaṃ tāvadapaścimaṃ dānaṃ tathā paribhoktavyam yathā me saṃghagatā dakṣiṇā vistīrṇā syāditi/
S01divyav_u:10971: 280.025 idaṃ pradānaṃ caramaṃ mamādya rājyaṃ ca taṃ caiva gataṃ svabhāvam/
S01divyav_u:10973: 280.029 tatathā bhujyatām yena pradānaṃ mama paścimam/
S01divyav_u:10974: 280.030 yathā saṃghagatā me 'dya vistīrṇā dakṣiṇā bhavet//7//
S01divyav_u:10975: 280.031 evaṃ deveti s puruṣo rājño 'śokasya pratiśrutya tadardhāmalakaṃ kurukuṭārāmaṃ gatvā vṛddhānte sthitvā kṛtāñjalistadardhāmalakaṃ saṃghe niryātayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:10976: 281.001 [281]ekacchatrasamucchrayāṃ vasumatīmājñāpayan yaḥ purā lokaṃ tāpayati sma madhyadivasaprāpto divā bhāskaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:10977: 281.003 bhāgyacchidramavekṣya so 'dya nṛpatiḥ svaiḥ karmābhirvañcitaḥ saṃprāpte divasakṣaye raviriva bhraṣṭaprabhāvaḥ sthitaḥ//8//
S01divyav_u:10978: 281.005 bhaktyavanatena śirasā praṇamya saṃghāya tena khalu dattamidamāmalakasyārdhaṃ lakṣmīcāpalyacihnitam/
S01divyav_u:10979: 281.006 tataḥ saṃghasthaviro bhikṣūnuvāca--bhadantā bhavantaḥ, śakyamidānīṃ saṃvegamutpādayitum/
S01divyav_u:10980: 281.007 kutah? evaṃ hyuktaṃ bhagavatā--paravipattiḥ saṃvejanīyaṃ sthānamiti/
S01divyav_u:10984: 281.011 mṛtyaiḥ sa bhūmipatiradya hṛtādhikāro dānaṃ prayacchati kilāmalakārdhametat/
S01divyav_u:10986: 281.015 yāvattadardhāmalakaṃ cūrṇayitvā yūṣe prakṣipya saṃghe cāritam/
S01divyav_u:10987: tato rājā aśoko rādhaguptamuvāca--kathaya rādhagupta, kaḥ sāmprataṃ pṛthivyāmīśvarah?
S01divyav_u:10988: atha rādhagupto 'śokasya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--devaḥ pṛthivyāmīśvaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:10989_0: 281.017 atha rājā aśokaḥ kathaṃcidutthāya caturdiśamavalokya saṃghāya añjaliṃ kṛtvovāca--eṣa
S01divyav_u:10989_1: idānīṃ mahatkośaṃ sthāpayitvā imāṃ samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ bhagavacchrāvakasaṃghe niryātayāmi /
S01divyav_u:10992: 281.022 dadāmyahaṃ bhūtadharāṃ samandarāṃ saṃghāya tasminnupabhujyate phalam//11//
S01divyav_u:10994: 281.025 dānenāhamanena nendrabhavanaṃ na brahmaloke phalaṃ kāṅkṣāmi drutavārivegacapalaṃ prāgeva rājaśriyam/
S01divyav_u:10995: 281.027 dānasyāsya phalaṃ tu bhaktimahato yanme 'sti tenāpnuyāṃ cittaiśvaryamahāryamāryamahitaṃ nāyāti yadvikriyām//12//
S01divyav_u:10997: tato rājā mahāpṛthivīṃ saṃghe datvā kālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10998: 281.030 yāvadamātyair nīlapītābhiḥ śibikābhir nirhāritvā śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
S01divyav_u:11002: rādhagupta uvāca--eṣa rājño 'śokasya manorathe babhūva--koṭiśataṃ bhagavacchāsena dānaṃ dāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:11005: yāvadamātyaiścatasraḥ koṭyo bhagavacchāsane dattvā pṛthivīṃ niṣkrīya saṃpadī rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11006: 282.004 saṃpaderbṛhaspatiḥ putraḥ, bṛhaspatervṛṣasenaḥ, vṛṣasenasya puṣyadharmā, puṣyadharmaṇaḥ puṣyamitraḥ/
S01divyav_u:11007: 282.005 so 'mātyānāmantrayate--ka uapāyaḥ syādyadasmākaṃ nāma ciraṃ tiṣṭhet?
S01divyav_u:11008: nairabhihitam--devasya ca vaṃśādaśoko nāṃnā rājā babhūveti/
S01divyav_u:11013: 282.009 anyaḥ kaścidupāya iti? tasya brāhmaṇapurohitaḥ pṛthagjano 'śrāddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11014: 282.010 tenābhihitam--deva, dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ nāma ciraṃ sthāsyati/
S01divyav_u:11015: yāvadrājā puṣyamitraścaturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhayitvā bhagavacchāsanaṃ vināśayiṣyāmīti kukkuṭārāmaṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11020: 282.013 kimicchatha stūpaṃ saṃghārāmān vā? bhikṣubhiḥ parigṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11021: 282.014 yāvatpuṣyamitro yāvat saṃghārāmaṃ bhikṣūṃśca praghātayan prasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11023: tenābhihitam--yo me śramaṇaśiro dāsyati, tasyāhaṃ dīnāraśataṃ dāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:11032: tasya duhitā kṛmiśena yakṣeṇa yācyate, na cānuprayacchati--tvaṃ pāpakarmakārīti/
S01divyav_u:11033: 282.020 yāvatsā duhitā tena kṛmiśasya dattā bhagavacchāsanaparitrāṇāryaṃ parigrahaparipālanārthaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:11034: 282.021 puṣyamitrasya rājñaḥ pṛṣṭhato yakṣo mahān pramāṇe yūyam(?)/
S01divyav_u:11038: kṛmiśena ca yakṣeṇa mahāntaṃ parvatamānayitvā puṣyamitro rājā sabalavāhano 'vaṣṭabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11040: yadā puṣyamitro rājā praghātitastadā mauryavaṃśaḥ samucchinnaḥ//
S01divyav_u:11044: 283.002 punarapi mahārāja yanmayā anuttarasamyaksambodhiprāptaye dānāni dattāni,
S01divyav_u:11048: 283.003 bhūtapūrvaṃ mahāraja pañcālaviṣaye rājanau babhūvatuḥ, uttarapāñcālo dakṣiṇapāñcālaśca/
S01divyav_u:11049_0: 283.005 tatrottarapāñcālo mahādhano nāṃnā dastināpure rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ
S01divyav_u:11049_1: ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca śāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍmarataskaradurbhikṣarogāpagataṃ
S01divyav_u:11051: tasmiṃśca nagare mahāhrada utpalakumudapuṇḍrīkasampanno haṃsakāraṇḍavacakravākopaśobhito ramaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11052: 283.008 tatra ca hrade janmacitrako nāṃ nāgapotaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:11058: dakṣiṇapāñcālastu rājā adharmabhūyiṣṭhaścaṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśo 'dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati,
S01divyav_u:11060: 283.013 adharmabhūyiṣṭhatayā cāsya devo na kālena kālaṃ samyagvāridhāramutsṛjati/
S01divyav_u:11061: 283.014 tato 'sau mahājanakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ svatrastaḥ svajīvitāpekṣayā rāṣṭraparityāgaṃ kṛtvā uttarapāñcālasyaiva rājño viṣayaṃ gatvā prativasati/
S01divyav_u:11062: 283.015 yāvadapareṇa samayena dakṣiṇapāñcālo rājā mṛgayāvyapadeśena janapadān vyavalokanāya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11063: 283.016 yāvat paśyati grāmanagarāṇi śūnyāni, udyānadevakulāni bhinnaprabhagnāni/
S01divyav_u:11064: 283.017 sa janakāyaḥ kva gata iti kathayati/
S01divyav_u:11065: 283.018 amātyāḥ kathayatnti--deva, uttarapāñcālasya rājño viṣayaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11068: tataste kathayanti--deva, uttarapāñcālo rājā dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:11069: 283.020 tasya janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskaradurbhikṣarogāpagatāḥ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsampannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11071: devastu caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśo nityaṃ tāḍanaghātanadhāraṇabandhananigaḍoparodha(na) rāṣṭraṃ trāsayati/
S01divyav_u:11072: 283.023 yato 'sau janakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ saṃvegamāpanna uttarapāñcālasya rājño viṣayaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11074: ko 'sāvupāyaḥ syādenāsau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset?
S01divyav_u:11075: amātyā āhuh--yadi deva uttarapāñcālavaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayasi,
S01divyav_u:11077: nacirādasau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset/
S01divyav_u:11082: 283.029 yūyaṃ tathā kuruta, yathā asau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativasatīti/
S01divyav_u:11088: teṃs tasya śasyavatī vasumatī, subhikṣānnapānaśca deśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11089: 284.003 rājā āha--ko 'sau upāyaḥ syādyenāsau nāgapota ihānīyeta?
S01divyav_u:11092: tato rājñā suvarṇapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā svavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--ya uttarapāñcālarājaviṣayājjanmacitrakaṃ nāma nāgapotakamānayati,
S01divyav_u:11098: sa kathayati--yo yuṣmākaṃ śraddhayitaḥ pratyayitaśca, tasya haste tiṣṭhatu/
S01divyav_u:11101: tato 'sau ahituṇḍikaḥ pratyayitasya puruṣasya haste suvarṇapiṭakaṃ sthāpayitvā hastināpuraṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11103: nimittīkṛtah--asau jñmacitro nāgapotaka etasmin pradeśe tiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:11111: tasya hradasya nātidūre dvau lubdhakau prativasataḥ, sārako halakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11117: janmacitro nāgapotaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ko 'nyo 'sti mama śaraṇamṛte halakāt lubdhakāt?
S01divyav_u:11118: tato manuṣyaveṣamāsthāya halakasya lubdhakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11120_0: kiṃ tvaṃ jānīṣe kasyānubhāvāddhanasya rājño janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca subhikṣākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca
S01divyav_u:11121: sa kathayati--jāne sa rājā dhārmiko dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati,
S01divyav_u:11123: 284.025 asmin pradeśe janmacitrako nāma nāgapitakaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:11127: 284.028 janmacitraḥ kathayati--taṃ nāgapotakamito viṣayādapaharet, tasya nāgapotakasya kiṃ syāt?
S01divyav_u:11128: na śobhanaṃ syāt, mātāpitṛviyogajaṃ duḥkhaṃ syādrājño rāṣṭrasya ca/
S01divyav_u:11129: 284.030 yo 'paharati, tasya kiṃ tvaṃ kuryāh? sa āha--jīvitādvyaparopayeyam/
S01divyav_u:11130: jānīṣe tvaṃ kataro 'sau nāgapotaka iti? na jāne/
S01divyav_u:11135: 285.001 [285]āgatya asya hradasya catasṛṣu dikṣu khadiraśalākānnikhanya nānāraṅgaiḥ sūtrairveṣṭayitvā mantrānāvartayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:11138: tadā hradamadhyāt kvathamānaṃ pānīyamutthāsyati ahaṃ cotthāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:11139: 285.003 tadā tvayāsau ahituṇḍikaḥ śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍayitavyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11141: 285.004 mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:11142: 285.005 yadyasau mantrānanupasaṃhṛtya prāṇairviyokṣyate, mṛtaṃ te 'ham yāvajjīvaṃ mantrapāśabddhaḥ syāmiti/
S01divyav_u:11148: yāvadasau lubdhakaḥ saptame divase pratigupte pradeśe ātmānaṃ gopayitvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11150: 285.010 tena catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāraḥ khadirakīlakā nikhātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11155: 285.013 mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:11158: 285.015 tato nāgo mantrapāśavinirmukto hradādabhyudgamya lubdhakaṃ pariṣvaktavān,
S01divyav_u:11168: 285.019 asyānubhāvādyuṣmābhiḥ saha viyogo na jāta iti/
S01divyav_u:11169: tābhyāmasau vareṇa pravārito vividhāni ca ratnāni dattāni/
S01divyav_u:11171: tasya ca hradasya nātidūre puṣpaphalasalilasampanne nānāśakunikūjite ṛṣeragramāśramapadam/
S01divyav_u:11172: 285.021 tatra ca nāgapotakena sārdhaṃ vṛttakaṃ tatsarvaṃ vistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:11173: 285.022 tata ṛṣiḥ kathayati--kiṃ ratnaiḥ kiṃ vā te suvarṇena?
S01divyav_u:11174: tasya bhavane 'mogho nāṃ pāśastiṣṭhati, tam yācasva/
S01divyav_u:11175: 285.023 tato lubdhako 'moghapāśe saṃjātatṛṣṇah ṛṣivacanamupaśrutya punarapi nāgabhavanaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11177: 285.025 tasyaitadabhavat--eṣa sa pāśo yo mayā prārthanīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11179: tato janmacitreṇa nāgapotakena anyaiśca nāgaiḥ sasambhramaiḥ pratisaṃmodito ratnaiśca pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11182: sa nāga āha--tavānena kiṃ prayojanam? yadā garutmatopadrutā bhavāmaḥ, tadā anenātmānaṃ rakṣāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11183: 285.028 lubdhaka āha--yuṣmākameṣa kadācit karhicit garutmatopadrutānāmupayogaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:11188: ten mātāpitarau avalokya sa pāśo dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11189: 285.032 tato 'sau lubdhakaḥ pṛthivīlabdhaprakhyena sukhasaumanasyenāpyāyitamanā amoghapāśamādāya nāgabhavanādabhyudgamya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ//
S01divyav_u:11190: 286.001 [286]yāvadapareṇa samayena dhano rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:11191: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā/
S01divyav_u:11192: 286.002 sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham/
S01divyav_u:11194: mamātyayātsvakulavaṃśacchede rāṣṭrāpahāraḥ sarvasantasvāpateyamaputramiti kṛtvā anyarājavidheyo bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:11200: 286.008 sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityāvubaddhā api devatā āyācate/
S01divyav_u:11201: 286.009 asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraśceti/
S01divyav_u:11204: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:11205: 286.011 katameṣāṃ trayāṇām? mātāpitarau raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau/
S01divyav_u:11206: 286.012 mātā cāsya kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī ca/
S01divyav_u:11208: 286.013 eṣā trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:11212: katame pañca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti viraktaṃ jānāti/
S01divyav_u:11217: saceddārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:11218: 286.018 saceddārikā bhavati, vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:11219: sā āttamanāḥ svāminn ārocayati--diṣṭyā vardhasva āryaputra/
S01divyav_u:11221: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati, niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:11222: 286.020 so 'pyāttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvaṃ kāyamunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya udānamudānayati--apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:11228: asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādekṣyati--idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatu iti/
S01divyav_u:11231: 286.027 na cāsyāḥ kiṃcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇam yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya/
S01divyav_u:11232: 286.028 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayātprasūtā/
S01divyav_u:11233: 286.029 dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṇaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11240: 287.002 ājñā ca dattā--śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānaṃ prayacchata, sarvabandhanamokṣaṃ ca kuruteti/
S01divyav_u:11241: 287.003 tasyaivaṃ trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātakarma karoti/
S01divyav_u:11242: 287.004 tasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitumārabdham--kiṃ bhavatu dāraksya nāmeti?
S01divyav_u:11243: amātyāḥ kathayanti--ayaṃ dārako dhanasya rājñaḥ putraḥ, bhavatu dārakasya sudhano nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:11245: 287.006 sudhano dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nudatto dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām/
S01divyav_u:11246: 287.007 so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navatītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍairvā anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:11248_0: 287.010 sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre
S01divyav_u:11248_1: nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:11249: 287.012 so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu ghaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11250: sa yāni tāni bhavanti rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryamanuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthagbhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni,
S01divyav_u:11251_0: tasyathā--hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
S01divyav_u:11251_1: pāśagrahe chedye bhedye muṣṭibandhe padabandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe 'kṣuṇṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyām /
S01divyav_u:11253: 287.017 tasya pitrā trīṇyantaḥpurāṇi vyavasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ kanīyasam/
S01divyav_u:11254: trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni, haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:11256: 287.019 tataḥ sudhanakumāra upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati//
S01divyav_u:11257: 287.021 yāvadapareṇa samayena halako lubdhako mṛgayāmanveṣamāṇastena tenānuvicarannanyatamaṃ parvatamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11258: 287.022 tasya ca parvatasyādhastādṛṣerāśramapadaṃ paśyati puṣpaphalasampannaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇavicāritam/
S01divyav_u:11262: 287.025 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ papraccha--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:11265: 287.027 asti tvayā iyatā kālenāsmin pradeśe kaścidāścaryādbhutadharmo dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā?
S01divyav_u:11266: praśāntātmā ṛṣirmandaṃ mandamuvāca--bhadramukha, dṛṣṭaste 'yaṃ hradah? dṛṣṭo bhagavan/
S01divyav_u:11267: 287.029 eṣā brahmasabhā nāma puṣkiriṇī utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā nānāpakṣigaṇaniṣevitā himarajatatuṣāragaurāmbusampūrṇā surabhikusumapūrṇatoyā/
S01divyav_u:11268: 287.030 asyāṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ pañcadaśamyāṃ manoharā nāma drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā pañcakinnarīśataparivārā nānāvidhasnānodvartanairāgatya snāti/
S01divyav_u:11270: 288.001 ahamapi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā mahatā prītisaumanasyena saptāhamatināmayāmi/
S01divyav_u:11272: 288.002 atha halakasya lubdhakasyaitadabhavat--śobhano 'yaṃ mayā amoghaḥ pāśo nāgāllabdho manoharāyāḥ kinnaryāḥ kṣepsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:11273: 288.003 so 'pareṇa samayena pūrṇapañcadaśyāmamoghaṃ pāśamādāya hradatīrasamīpe puṣpaphalaviṭapagahanamāśritya avadhānatatparo 'vashtitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11274: 288.004 yāvanmanoharā kinnarī pañcaśataparivāritā tādṛśyaiva vibhūtyā brahmasabhāṃ puṣkiriṇīmavatīrṇā snātum/
S01divyav_u:11275: 288.005 tatsamantaraṃ ca halakena lubdhakena amoghaḥ pāśaḥ kṣiptaḥ, yena manoharā kinnarī baddhā/
S01divyav_u:11276: 288.006 tayā amoghapāśaśritayā hrade mahāhatanādaḥ kṛto bhīṣaṇaśca śabdo niścāritaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11277: yaṃ śrutvā pariśiṣṭaḥ kinnarigaṇa itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto manoharāṃ nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11282: 288.010 sā āha--hā hatāsmi, hā mandabhāgyā, mamodṛśīmavasthāmāptām/
S01divyav_u:11283: 288.011 mā naiṣīstvaṃ hi mā sprākṣīr naitattva suceṣṭitam/
S01divyav_u:11284: 288.012 rājabhogyā surūpāhaṃ na sādhu grahaṇaṃ tava//1// iti/
S01divyav_u:11285: 288.013 lubdhakaḥ prāha--yadi tvāṃ na gṛhṇāmi, niṣpalāyase/
S01divyav_u:11287: 288.014 yadi na śraddadhāsi, imaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ gṛhāṇa/
S01divyav_u:11290: tayā śirasthaścūḍāmaṇirdatta uktaśca--eṣa cūḍāmaṇiryasya haste, tasyāhaṃ vaśā bhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:11291: 288.016 tato lubdhakenāsau cūḍāmaṇirgṛhītaḥ, pāśabaddhāṃ caināṃ saṃprashtitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:11293: adrākṣītsa lubdhakaḥ sudhanaṃ rājakumāramabhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikam/
S01divyav_u:11294: 288.018 dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--ayaṃ ca rājakumāraḥ, iyaṃ ca paramadarśanīyā/
S01divyav_u:11298: upasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--idaṃ mama devasya strīratnaṃ prābhṛtamānītam, pratigṛhyatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:11299_0: 288.021 adrākṣītsudhanakumāro manoharāṃ kinnarīmabhirūpāṃ darśanīyāṃ prāsādikāṃ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā
S01divyav_u:11302: 288.030 tāṃ pratikīrṇahārāmuttaptajāmbūnadacārupūrṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ sahasā papāta viddho dṛḍharāgaśareṇa/
S01divyav_u:11305: 289.005 dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ sudhana indusamānvaktrāṃ prāvṛḍaghanāntaraviniścariteva vidyuta/
S01divyav_u:11306: 289.007 tatsnehamanmathavilāsasamudbhavena sadyaḥ sa cetasi nu rāgaśareṇa viddhaḥ//2//
S01divyav_u:11309: 289.010 tataḥ sudhano rājakumāro manoharayā rūpayauvanaguṇena sughanaḥ kumāronekaiścopacāraśataistathā apahṛto yathā muhūrtamapi tāṃ na jahāti/
S01divyav_u:11311: 289.012 tatraiko rājānāṃ saṃśritaḥ, dvitīyaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāram/
S01divyav_u:11312: yo rājānaṃ saṃśritaḥ, sa rājñā purohitaḥ sthāpito bhogaiśca saṃvibhaktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11313: 289.013 yastu sudhanaṃ kumāram, sa bhogamātreṇa saṃvibhaktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11314: 289.014 sa kathayati--yathā tava sahāyo brāhmaṇo mama pitrā paurohitye 'vasthāpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11316: 289.016 eṣa ca vṛttāntastena brāhmaṇena karṇaparamparayā śrutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11320: yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya rājño vijite 'nyatamaḥ kārvaṭikaḥ prativiruddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11323: evam yāvatsapta, ye daṇḍāḥ preṣitāḥ, te 'pi hastavidhvastāḥ pratyāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11325: 289.022 brāhmaṇa purohitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ sa kumārasya vadhopāyakāla iti/
S01divyav_u:11326: tena rājā vijñaptah--deva, naivamasau śakyaḥ saṃnāmayitum/
S01divyav_u:11332: tato rājā kumāramāhūya kathayati--gaccha kumāra, daṇḍasahāyaḥ kārvaṭikaṃ saṃnāmaya/
S01divyav_u:11333: 289.026 evaṃ deveti sudhanaḥ kumāro rājñaḥ pratiśrutya antaḥpuraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11336: 289.028 purohitena cābhihitah--deva, sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā atīva sakto na śakyate preṣayitum/
S01divyav_u:11338: nirgataḥ kumāro 'ntaḥpurāt preṣayitavyo yathā manoharāyāḥ sakāśaṃ na prativasatīti/
S01divyav_u:11339: 289.030 evaṃ deveti amātyai rājñaḥ pratiśrutya balaugho hastyaśvarathapadātisampanno 'nakapraharaṇopakaraṇayuktaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11340: 289.032 tataḥ kumāro nirgatah uktah--gaccha kumāra, sajjo balaugha iti/
S01divyav_u:11343: sa kathayati--tāvadyadi evam, mātaraṃ dṛṣṭvā gacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:11346: 290.003 pādayor nipatya kathayati--amba, ahaṃ kārvaṭikaṃ saṃnāmanāya gacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:11351: 290.008 sa evaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ saṃdiśya abhivādya ca nānāyodhabalaughatūryanir nāditaiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11352: 290.009 anupūrveṇa janapadānatikramya tasya kārvaṭikasya nātidūre 'nyataṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya vāsamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11355: tasya tena pathā gacchataḥ khagapathena yānamavasthitam/
S01divyav_u:11358: 290.013 ko 'tra heturyenedānīṃ pratihata iti? paśyati sudhanaṃ kumāram/
S01divyav_u:11362: na ca kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā karaṇīyeti viditvā pāñcikaṃ mahāyakṣasenāpatimāmantrayate--ehi tvaṃ pāñcika,
S01divyav_u:11364: 290.017 na ca te kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyeti/
S01divyav_u:11365: tatheti pāñcikena yakṣasenāpatinā vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya pratiśrutya divyaścaturaṅgo balakāyo nirmitah--tālamātrapramāṇāḥ puruṣaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11368: 290.019 tato nānāvidhakhaṅgamuśalatomarapāśacakraśaraparaśvadhādiśastraviśeṣeṇa nānāvāditrasaṃkṣobheṇa ca mahābhayamupadarśayan mahatā balaudhena pāñciko 'nuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11371: 290.023 tataste karvaṭanivāsinastaṃ balaughaṃ dṛṣṭvā tacca prākārapatanaṃ paraṃ viṣādamāpannāḥ papracchuh--kuta eṣa balaugha āgacchatīti?
S01divyav_u:11374: 290.025 tasya ca balaugho yadi ciraṃ vidhārayiṣyatha, sarvathā na bhaviṣyatheti/
S01divyav_u:11376: 290.027 vyutpannā na vayaṃ rājño na kumārasya dhīmataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11379: tata ucchritadhvajapatākāpūrṇakalaśā nānāvidhatūryanir nāditaiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ pratyudgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11380: 290.030 tena ca samāśvāsitāḥ, tadabhiprāyaśca rājabhaṭaḥ sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11384: 291.001 dhanena ca rājñā tāmeva rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭah--gṛdhreṇāgatya rājña udaraṃ sphoṭayitvā antrāṇyākṛṣya sarvaṃ tannagaramantrairveṣṭitam,
S01divyav_u:11386_0: 291.002 tato rājā bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghukadhvevotthāya mahāśayane
S01divyav_u:11386_1: niṣadya kare kapokaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--mā haiva me atonidānaṃ rājyaccyutirbhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:11388: 291.005 sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ svapnaṃ brāhmaṇāya purohitāya nivedayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:11389: sa saṃlakṣayati--yādṛśo devena svapno dṛṣṭaḥ, niyataṃ kumāreṇa karvaṭako nirjitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11391: 291.007 iti kṛtvā kathayati--deva, na śobhanaḥ svapnaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11393: 291.008 kevalaṃ tu atrāsti pratikāraḥ, sa ca brāhmaṇakamantreṣu dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11394: ko 'sau pratikārah? deva, udyāne puṣkariṇī puruṣapramāṇikā kartavyā/
S01divyav_u:11397: tato devena snānaprayatena tāṃ puṣkariṇīmekena so 'ānenāvataritavyam,
S01divyav_u:11405: purohitaḥ kathayati--deva, yadeva durlabhaṃ tadeva sulabham/
S01divyav_u:11406: 291.015 rājā kathayati--yathā katham? purohitaḥ kathayati--deva, nanviyaṃ manoharā kinnarī/
S01divyav_u:11413: 291.021 śakṣyasi hyaparāṃ kartuṃ ghātayaināṃ manoharām//7// iti/
S01divyav_u:11414: 291.022 ātmābhinandino na kiṃcinna pratipadyanta iti tenādhivāsitam/
S01divyav_u:11420: 291.026 tāḥ pramuditā dṛṣṭvā manoharā pṛcchati--kim yūyamatīva praharṣitā iva?
S01divyav_u:11421: yāvadaparayā sa vṛttānto vistareṇa manoharāyā niveditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11422: 291.027 tato manoharā saṃjātaduḥkhadaurmanasyā yena sudhanasya kumārasya jananī tenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:11428: tatastayā sa cūḍāmaṇirvastrāṇi ca manoharāyai dattāni, uktā ca--putrike, prāpte kāle āgantavyam/
S01divyav_u:11430: 291.032 tato rājā yathādiṣṭena krameṇa snānaprayato rudhirapūrṇāṃ puṣkiriṇimavatīryottīrṇah[292]/
S01divyav_u:11431: 292.001 tato 'sya brāhmaṇairjihvayā pādau nilīḍhau, avasthitah--ānīyatāṃ kinnarīti ca samādiṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:11434: 292.004 nāgīva bandhanānmuktā eṣā gacchāmi sāmpratam//8// iti/
S01divyav_u:11440: 292.007 tato manoharāyāḥ khagapathena gacchantyā etadabhavat--yadahametāmavasthāṃ prāptā,
S01divyav_u:11442: 292.008 yadi tena nākhyātamabhaviṣyat, nāhaṃ grahaṇa gatā abhaviṣyat/
S01divyav_u:11443: 292.009 tena hi yasyāmi tāvadasyaiva ṛṣeḥ sakāśāmiti/
S01divyav_u:11449: tadvijñāpayāmi--yadi yadā kadācitsudhanaḥ kumāra āgacchati māṃ samanveṣamāṇaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11451: 292.012 evaṃ ca vaktavyam--kumāra, viṣamāḥ panthāno durgamāḥ, khedamāpatsyase, nirvatasveti/
S01divyav_u:11459: tata utkūlako jalapatha ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī/
S01divyav_u:11460: 292.017 tatra khadirake parvate guhā, praveśa ekadhārake tu kīlakāḥ, vajrake pakṣirājena praveśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11461: 292.018 ebhirupāyaiste parvatā atikramaṇīyāḥ, yantrāṇi ca bhuṅktavyāni/
S01divyav_u:11462: 292.019 ajavaktrameṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasarūpī piṅgalāguhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahānajagaro vegena pradhāvati/
S01divyav_u:11465: 292.022 ayaṃ bhuktena bāṇena hantavyo mama kāraṇāt/
S01divyav_u:11471: 292.028 yadā paśyettatra kīlakaṃ lalāṭe tasyā nikhānayet//11//
S01divyav_u:11476: 293.001 [293]raṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudantī hasantī āśīviṣā vetranadī ca/
S01divyav_u:11480: 293.005 āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ//15//
S01divyav_u:11490: tato manoharā tam ṛṣimevamuktvā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntā//
S01divyav_u:11491: 293.012 yāvatsudhanaḥ kumārastaṃ karvaṭakaṃ saṃnāmya gṛhītaprābhṛto hastināpuramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11493: 293.013 tataḥ kumāro mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya pituḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11495: 293.014 rājñā paramayā saṃtoṣaṇayā saṃbhāṣitaḥ, uktaśca--kumāra, śivena tvamāgatah?
S01divyav_u:11496: deva, tava prasādātkarvaṭakaḥ saṃnāmitaḥ, nipakā gṛhītāḥ, cintakaḥ sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11499: 293.017 rājā kathayati--kumāra tiṣṭha, prābhṛtaṃ sahitā eva bhokṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11500: 293.018 deva gacchāmi, ciraṃ dṛṣṭā me manoharā/
S01divyav_u:11503: 293.019 so 'navabudhyamāna evamāha--tāta, adyaiva mayā avaśyaṃ gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:11507: sa cintāparaḥ praviśya manoharāṃ na paśyati/
S01divyav_u:11508: 293.021 itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrāntaḥ śūnyahṛdayaḥ śabdaṃ kartumārabdhah--manohare manohare iti/
S01divyav_u:11517: sa pitur nairguṇyamupaśrutya kṛtaghnatāṃ ca, mātuḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11522: 293.029 hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//18//
S01divyav_u:11523: 293.030 manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
S01divyav_u:11524: 294.001 [294]saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//19// iti/
S01divyav_u:11525: 294.003 sā kathayati--putra, kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptā manohareti mayā pratimuktā/
S01divyav_u:11526: amba, yathā katham? tayā yathāvṛttaṃ vistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:11527: 294.004 sa pitur nairguṇyamakṛtajñatāṃ ca jñātvā kathayati--kutra gatā katareṇa vā patheti? sā kathayati--
S01divyav_u:11529: 294.007 uṣito dharmarājena yatra yātā manoharā//20// iti/
S01divyav_u:11530: 294.008 sa manoharāviyogaduḥkhārtaḥ kṛcchraṃ vilalāpa, karuṇaṃ paridevate--
S01divyav_u:11534: 294.012 hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//22//
S01divyav_u:11535: 294.013 manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
S01divyav_u:11536: 294.015 saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//23// iti/
S01divyav_u:11537: 294.017 tato mātrā abhihitah--putra, santyasminnantaḥpure tadviśiṣṭatarāḥ striyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11540: sa tayā samāśvāsyamāno 'pi śokasaṃtāpasaṃtaptastasyāḥ pravṛttiṃ samanveṣamāṇa itaścāmutaśca paribhramitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11542: 294.020 sa halakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ pṛcchati--manoharā kutastvayā labdheti?
S01divyav_u:11547: 294.023 eṣa ca vṛttānto rājñā śrutah--manoharāviyogātkumāro 'tīva viklava iti/
S01divyav_u:11550: 294.025 sa kathayati--tāta, na śakyaṃ mayā tāmanānīya antaḥpurasthena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:11552: tato rājñā nagaraprākāraśṛṅgeṣvārakṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpitāḥ, yathā kumāro na niṣkāsatīti/
S01divyav_u:11554: 294.028 uktaṃ ca--pañceme rātryā alpaṃ svapanti bahu jāgārti/
S01divyav_u:11556: 294.029 strīpuruṣa utkośaḥ, ṛṇī, caurasenāpatiḥ, bhikṣuścālabdhavīrya iti/
S01divyav_u:11557: 294.030 atha kumārasyaitadabhavat--yadi dvāreṇa yāsyāmi, rājā dvārapālakān rakṣakāṃśca daṇḍenotsādayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:11559: sa rātryā vyutthāya nīlotpalamālābaddhaśirā[295] yena rakṣiṇaḥ puruṣā na santi,
S01divyav_u:11560: tena tāṃ mālāṃ dhvaje baddhvā avatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11563: 295.003 bhoḥ pūrṇacandra rajanīkara tārarāja tvaṃ rohiṇīnayanakānta susārthavāha/
S01divyav_u:11564: 295.005 kaccitpriyā mama manoharaṇaikadakṣā dṛṣṭā tvayā bhuvi manoharanāmadheyā//24// iti/
S01divyav_u:11568: 295.008 he tvaṃ kuraṅgi tṛṇavāripalāśabhakṣe svastyastu te cara sukhaṃ na mṛgārirasmi/
S01divyav_u:11569: 295.010 dīrghekṣaṇā mṛgavadhūkamanīyarūpā dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//25//
S01divyav_u:11570: 295.012 sa tāmatikramya anyatamaṃ pradeśaṃ gato dadarśa vanaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopaśobhitaṃ bhramarairupabhujyamānasāram/
S01divyav_u:11577: 295.021 rāgāgninā tava samo na viṣāgnirugro dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//27//
S01divyav_u:11580: 295.025 bhoḥ kokilottama vanāntaravṛkṣavāsin nārī manohara patatrigaṇasya rājan/
S01divyav_u:11588: 296.007 vande ṛṣe nataśirā vada me laghu tvaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//30//
S01divyav_u:11589: 296.009 tataḥ sa ṛṣiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ svāgatavacanāsanadānakriyādipuraḥsaraḥ pratisaṃmodya uvāca--
S01divyav_u:11590: 296.011 dṛṣṭā sā paripūrṇacandravadanā nīlotpalābhāsvarā rūpeṇa priyadarśanā subadanā nīlañcatabhrūlatā/
S01divyav_u:11591: 296.013 tvaṃ svastho bhuvi bhujyatāṃ hi vividhaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca prabho pañcātsvasti gamiṣyasīti manasā nātrāsti me saṃśayaḥ//31//
S01divyav_u:11592: 296.015 idaṃ hyavocadvacanaṃ ca subhrūḥ kumāra tṛṣṇā tvayi bādhate me/
S01divyav_u:11593: 296.017 mahacca duḥkhaṃ vasatāṃ vaneṣu yātāṃ ramāṃ drakṣyasi niṣcayena//32// iti/
S01divyav_u:11595: kathayati ca-- kumāra, viṣamāḥ panthāno durgamāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11597: yadi ca nivāryamāṇo na tiṣṭhet, tasya mārgamupadeṣṭumarhasi/
S01divyav_u:11599: idaṃ ca tayā samākhyātam--uttare digbhāge trayaḥ kālaparvatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:11602: 296.022 tatpradeśena tvayā imāni bhaiṣajyāni samudānetavyāni--tadyathā sūdayā nāmauṣadhistayā ghṛtaṃ paktvā pātavyam/
S01divyav_u:11603: 296.023 tena ca te na tṛṣā na bubhukṣā, smṛtibalaṃ ca vardhayati/
S01divyav_u:11609: tataḥ kūlako jalapathaḥ khadiraka ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī/
S01divyav_u:11612: 296.028 tatra khadirake parvate guhā, praveśa ekadhārake tu kolakāḥ, vajrake pakṣirājena praveśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11613: 296.029 ebhirupāyaiste sarve parvatāḥ samatikramaṇīyāḥ, yantrāṇi ca bhaṅktavyāni/
S01divyav_u:11614: ajavaktro meṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasīrūpī piṅgalāyāṃ guhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahatā ajagaro vegena pradhāvati/
S01divyav_u:11623: 297.007 yadā paśyettadā kīlaṃ lalāṭo tasyā nikhānayet//35//
S01divyav_u:11628: 297.012 raṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudantī hasantī āśīviṣā vetranadī ca/
S01divyav_u:11632: 297.016 āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ//39//
S01divyav_u:11642: 297.022 tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro yathopadiṣṭānauṣadhimantrāgadaprayogān samudānīya tasya ṛṣeḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11643: 297.023 tatastena yathopadiṣṭāḥ sarve samudānītāḥ sthāpavitvā vānaram/
S01divyav_u:11650: 297.027 candrasya khe vicarataḥ kva sahāyabhāvo daṃṣṭrābalena balinaśca mṛgādhipasya/
S01divyav_u:11651: 297.029 agneśca dāvadahane kva sahāyabhāvah asmadvidhasya ca sahāyabalena kiṃ syāt//41//
S01divyav_u:11652: 298.001 [298]kiṃ bho mahārṇavajalaṃ na vigāhitavyaṃ kiṃ sarpadaṣṭa iti naiva cikitsanīyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:11653: 298.003 vīryaṃ bhajetsumahadūrjitasattvadṛṣṭam yatne kṛte yadi na siddhyati ko 'tra doṣaḥ//42// iti/
S01divyav_u:11655: anupūrveṇa parvatanadīguhāprapātādīni bhaiṣajyamantrāgadaprayogeṇa vinirjitya drumasya kinnararājasya bhavanasamīpaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11656: 298.007 kumāro 'paśyannagaramadūraṃ śrīmadudyānopaśobhitaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopetaṃ nānāvihagasevitaṃ taḍāgadīrghikāvāpikinnaraiḥ samupāvṛtam/
S01divyav_u:11658: tatastāḥ sudhanakumāreṇābhihitāh--kimanena bahunā pānīyena kriyata iti?
S01divyav_u:11659: tāḥ kathayanti--asti drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā manoharā nāma/
S01divyav_u:11662: 298.011 sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ pṛcchati--kimete ghaṭāḥ samastāḥ sarve tasyā upari nipātyante, āhosvidanupūrveṇeti?
S01divyav_u:11667: 298.014 sā ca kinnarī abhihitā--anena tvayā ghaṭena manoharā tatprathamataraṃ snāpayitavyā/
S01divyav_u:11669: 298.015 tatastayāsau ghaṭaḥ prathamataraṃ manoharāyā mūrdhni nipātito yāvadaṅgulimudrā utsaṅge nipatitā/
S01divyav_u:11671: tataḥ kinnarīṃ pṛcchati--mā tatra kaścinmanuṣyo 'bhyāgatah? sā āha--ubhyāgtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11674: tato manoharā pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--tāta,
S01divyav_u:11678: sa kathayati--tamahaṃ khaṇḍaśataṃ kṛtvā catasṛṣu śikṣu kṣipeyam/
S01divyav_u:11680: manoharā kathayati--tāta, manuṣyabhūtasya kuta ihāgamanam? ahamevaṃ bravīmīti/
S01divyav_u:11683: tasyāhaṃ tvāṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ prabhūtacitropakaraṇaiḥ kinnarīsahasraparivṛtāṃ bhāryārthaṃ dadyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:11684: 298.024 tato manoharayā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditayā sudhanaṃ kumāro divyālaṃkāravibhūṣito drumasya kinnararājasyopadarśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11685: 298.025 tato drumaḥ kinnnararājaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ dadarśa abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prasādikaṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:11687: 298.027 tatastasya jijñāsāṃ kartukāmena sauvarṇāḥ stambhā ucchritāḥ,
S01divyav_u:11700: tato bodhisattvo nṛttagītavīṇāpaṇavasughoṣakavallarīmṛdaṅgādinānāvidhena daivatopasaṃhṛtena vāditraviśeṣeṇa samantādāpūryamāṇe 'nekaiḥ kinnarasahasraiḥ pativṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11705: 299.011 nīlotpaladalābhenāsinā gṛhītena paśyato drumasya kinnararājasya sauvarṇastambhasamīpaṃ gatvā tān stambhān kadalīcchedena khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ chettumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11706: 299.012 tatastāṃs tilaśo 'vakīrya sapta tālān sapta bherīḥ sapta ca sūkarān bāṇena vidhya sumeruvadakampyo 'vasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11708: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kinnararājaḥ paraṃ vismayamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11709: 299.015 tataḥ kinnarīsahasrasya manoharāsamānarūpasya madhye manoharāṃ sthāpayitvā sudhanaḥ kumāro 'bhihitah--ehi kumāra,
S01divyav_u:11712: 299.018 yathā drumasya duhitā mameha tvaṃ manoharā/
S01divyav_u:11715: kinnarāḥ kathayanti--deva, ayaṃ sudhanaḥ kumāro balavīryaparākramasamanvito manoharāyāḥ pratirūpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11717_0: 299.022 tato drumaḥ kinnararājaḥ kinnaragaṇena saṃvarṇitaḥ sudhanaṃ kinnarābhimetena
S01divyav_u:11717_1: mahatā satkāreṇa puraskṛtya manoharāṃ divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā
S01divyav_u:11718: eṣā te manoharā kinnarīpativṛtā bhāryārthāya dattā/
S01divyav_u:11720: 299.025 paraṃ tāteti sudhanaḥ kumāro drumasya kinnararājasya pratiśrutya kinnarabhavanastho manoharayā sārdhaṃ niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:11721: 299.027 so 'pareṇa samayena svadeśamanusmṛtya mātāpitṛviyogajena duḥkhenātyāhato manoharāyā nivedayati--mātāpitṛviyogajaṃ me duḥkhaṃ bādhata iti/
S01divyav_u:11722: 299.028 tato manoharayā eṣa vṛttānto vistareṇa pitur niveditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11726: 299.030 tato drumeṇa kinnararājena prabhūtaṃ maṇimuktāsuvarṇādīn dattvā anupreṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11729: 300.001 tato hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ nānāmanohareṇa surabhinā gandhaviśeṣeṇa sarvā digāmoditam/
S01divyav_u:11733: 300.004 tataḥ kumāro 'nekanaravarasahasraparivṛto manoharayā sārdhaṃ hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11734: 300.005 tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya vividhāni ratnānyādāya pituḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11738: 300.007 tato dhanena rājñā atibalavīryaparākrama iti viditvā rājyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11739: 300.008 sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--yanmama manoharayā sārdhaṃ samāgamaḥ saṃvṛtto rājyābhiṣekaścānuprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11742: 300.010 tena hastināpure nagare dvādaśa varṣāṇi nirgaṭo yajña iṣṭaḥ//
S01divyav_u:11743: 300.011 syātkhalu te mahārāja anyaḥ sa tena kālena samayena sudhanaḥ kumāro veti? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam/
S01divyav_u:11744: 300.012 api tvahameva tena kālena tena samayena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartamānaḥ sudhano nāma rājā babhūva/
S01divyav_u:11748: kiṃ tu taddānaṃ tacca vīryamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksamboderhetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ saṃbhāramātrakam//
S01divyav_u:11750: āttamanasaste ca sarve lokā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//
S01divyav_u:11754: 301.002 tatra bhagavbānāyuṣmantamāmantrayate--sma āgamaya ānanda yena śrāavastīti/
S01divyav_u:11756: 301.003 atha bhagavān yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11757: 301.004 yāvadanyatamasmin pradeśe brāhmaṇaśchinnabhakto halaṃ vāhayati, tasyārthāya dārikā peyāmādāya gatā/
S01divyav_u:11759_0: dadarśa sa brāhmaṇo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakcaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ
S01divyav_u:11759_1: vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam /
S01divyav_u:11761: 301.008 na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathaścattasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
S01divyav_u:11766: 301.010 sa tāṃ peyāmādāya laghuladhveva yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11769: 301.012 tato bhagavatā brāhmaṇasya jīrṇakūpo darśitah--sacette brāhmaṇa parityaktā,
S01divyav_u:11773: yathāpi tadbuddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
S01divyav_u:11774: 301.014 tato bhagavatā sa brāhmaṇo 'bhihitah--cāraya mahābrāhmaṇa peyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:11776: bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitā yathā sarvasaṃghena pītā/
S01divyav_u:11778: 301.017 tato 'sau brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasanno bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:11779: 301.018 tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāyasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:11780: pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:11782: eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:11783: 301.021 upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatamabhiprasannam/
S01divyav_u:11784_0: 301.022 athāsau brāhmaṇo vaṇigiva labdhalābhaḥ śasyasampanna iva kṛṣīvalaḥ śūra iva
S01divyav_u:11784_1: vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvaroganirmukta ivāturo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya bhagavataḥ
S01divyav_u:11784_2: pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yāvatkṣetraṃ gataḥ /
S01divyav_u:11785: 301.025 paśyati tasmin kṣetre sauvarṇān yavān saṃpannān/
S01divyav_u:11806: 302.004 tatastena brāhmaṇena parituṣṭena yaddattam, tatsauvarṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ//
S01divyav_u:11808: yāvadanyatamasmin pradeśe pañcakārṣaśatānyutpāḍūtpāṇḍukāni sphuṭitapāṇipādāni śaṇaśāṭīnivāsitāni laṅgalāni vāhayanti/
S01divyav_u:11809: 302.006 te 'pi balīvardā baddhaiḥ prayoktraiḥ pratodayaṣṭibhiḥ kṣatavikṣatagātrā muhurmuhur niśvasanto vahanti/
S01divyav_u:11810: 302.007 tadṛśuste kārṣākā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ pūrvavadyāvadupacitakuśalamūlasattvasya tatprathamato buddhadarśanam/
S01divyav_u:11813: 302.010 dṛṣṭvā ca punarvineyāpekṣayā mārgādapakramya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11814: eta kārṣakā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11815: 302.011 tato bhagavatā teṣāṃ kārṣakāṇāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:11816: pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:11821: 302.016 te bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā pravrājitāḥ pūrvavadyāvatte 'vasthitā buddhamanorathena/
S01divyav_u:11824: te 'pi balīvardā yoktrāṇi varatrāṇi ca cchittvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11826: 302.019 teṣāṃ bhagavatā tribhiḥ padārthairdharmo deśitaḥ pūrvavadyāvadyathā gaṅgāvatāre haṃsamatsyakūrmāṇām yāvad dṛṣṭasatyāḥ svarbhavanaṃ gatāḥ//
S01divyav_u:11827: 302.021 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ nu taiḥ kārṣakapūrvakairbhikṣubhiḥ karma kṛtam yena kārṣakāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S01divyav_u:11832: bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām//
S01divyav_u:11833: 302.026 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminneva bhadrakalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi/
S01divyav_u:11836: 302.028 tasya śāsane etāni pañca karṣakaśatāni pravrajitānyabhūvan/
S01divyav_u:11837: tatraibhir na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11838: 302.029 kiṃ tu śraddhādeyaṃ bhuktvā bhuktvā saṃgaṇikābhirataiḥ kausīdyenābhināmitam//
S01divyav_u:11839: 303.001 [303]kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni, etānyeva tāni pañca karṣakaśatāni/
S01divyav_u:11840: 303.002 yo 'sau vihārasvāmī, sa evāsau gṛhapatiryasyaite kārṣahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11841: yadebhirvihārasvāmisantakaṃ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhujya na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11843: tena karmaṇā pañca janmaśatāni tasya vihārasvāminaḥ kārṣakāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11845: yadebhiḥ kāśayapasya samyaksambuddhāsya śāsane pravrajya brahmacaryaṃ caritam,
S01divyav_u:11846: tenaitarhi mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:11847: 303.007 te ca balīvardapūrviṇo devaputrāḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitā āsan/
S01divyav_u:11851: yatkāśyape samyaksambuddhe brahmacaryaṃ vāsitam, tenedānīṃ devaputrabhūtaiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:11852: 303.010 iti bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, pūrvavadyāvadābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11854: 303.013 tatra bhagavānāyucmantamāmantrayate sma--āgamaya ānanda yena toyikā/
S01divyav_u:11858: 303.015 athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātraṃ pūrvavadyāvatsamantato bhadrakam/
S01divyav_u:11859: 303.016 dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--yadi bhagavantaṃ gautamamupetya abhivādayiṣyāmi, karmaparihāṇirme bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:11861: 303.018 tatko 'sāvupāyaḥ syādyena me na karmaparihāṇi syānnāpi puṇyaparihāṇiriti?
S01divyav_u:11864: 303.020 tena yathāgṛhītayaiva pratodayaṣṭyā tatrasthenābhivādanaṃ kṛtam--abhivādaye buddhaṃ bhagavantam/
S01divyav_u:11869: evamanena dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:11872: 303.025 athāyuṣmānānando laghulaghveva caturguṇamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya bhagavantamidamavocat--niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsane/
S01divyav_u:11873: 303.027 evamayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:11877: niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātamavikopitaṃ draṣṭum?
S01divyav_u:11878: etasya bhagavan kālaḥ, etasya sugata samayo 'yam/
S01divyav_u:11882: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikam [304]
S01divyav_u:11883: 304.001 [304]cittamutpādayanti, tasmin samaye kuntapipīlikādayo 'pi prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
S01divyav_u:11884: 304.002 nāgāḥ saṃlakṣayanti--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittamutpāditam?
S01divyav_u:11887: 304.004 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--gṛhṇīta bhikṣavo nimittam/
S01divyav_u:11890: 304.006 rājñā prasenajitā śrutam--bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanāya avikopitaḥ kaśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāta ucchrāpita iti/
S01divyav_u:11891: 304.007 śrutvā ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sārdhamantah--pureṇa kumārauramātyairbhaṭabalāgrair naigamajanapadaiśca draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11895: anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kutūhalajātāni draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitāni pūrvakaiśca kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
S01divyav_u:11897: 304.011 taiḥ śrutam--antarhito 'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śīrarasaṃghāta iti/
S01divyav_u:11898: 304.012 śrutvā ca punasteṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpannam--vṛthā asmākamāgamanaṃ jātamiti//
S01divyav_u:11900: evaṃ cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--asmānme padāvihārāt kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti?
S01divyav_u:11901: atha bhagavāṃstasya mahājanakāyasyāvipratisārasaṃjananārthaṃ tasya copāsakasya cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣite--
S01divyav_u:11902: 304.016 śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:11903: 304.018 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//2//
S01divyav_u:11907: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāpi cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:11908: 304.023 śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇapiṇḍaṃ jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:11917: 305.005 aparaistatra mālāvihāraḥ kṛtaḥ, cittaṃ cābhisaṃskṛtam--muktapuṣpāṇāṃ bhagavatā iyatpuṇyamuktam/
S01divyav_u:11918: 305.006 asmākaṃ mālāvihārasya kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:11919: 305.008 śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:11920: 305.010 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//5// iti/
S01divyav_u:11921: 305.012 aparaistatra dīpamālā dattā, cittaṃ cābhisaṃskṛtam--mālāvihārasya bhagavatā iyatpuṇyamuktam/
S01divyav_u:11923: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:11925: 305.017 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṃ prakaroti vidvān//6// iti/
S01divyav_u:11926: 305.019 aparaistatra gandhābhiṣeko dattaḥ, cittaṃ cābhisaṃskṛtam--pradīpadānasya bhagavatā iyat puṇyamuktam/
S01divyav_u:11928: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:11929: 305.022 śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:11930: 305.024 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṃ prakaroti vidvān//7// iti/
S01divyav_u:11933: muktapuṣpāṇāṃ mālavihārasya pradīpadānasya gandhābhiṣekasya ca iyatpuṇyamuktaṃ bhagavatā,
S01divyav_u:11938: 306.005 eṣāṃ hi dakṣiṇā proktā aprameye tathāgate/
S01divyav_u:11942: 306.008 atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:11948: 306.014 tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:11959: 306.018 yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:11960: 306.019 sārdhaṃ tatra brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhistasmin pradeśe mahaḥ sthāpitah--toyikāmahastoyikāmaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
S01divyav_u:11965: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
S01divyav_u:11966_0: 307.003 satkṛto bhagavān gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhibhikṇyupāsakopāsikai rājñā
S01divyav_u:11967: 307.005 lābhī ca bhagavān prabhutānāṃ praṇītānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ divyānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S01divyav_u:11969_0: 307.007 tena khalu punaḥ samayena ayameva bhagavato 'nurūpa udāraḥ kalyāṇakīrtiśabda
S01divyav_u:11969_2: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S01divyav_u:11970: 307.010 sa imāṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamanuṣīṃ svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharati/
S01divyav_u:11971: 307.011 sa dharmaṃ deśayatyādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇāṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam/
S01divyav_u:11972: 307.012 svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma/
S01divyav_u:11973: 307.013 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--evaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyuh--dānaṃ dānaphalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam,
S01divyav_u:11974: apīdānīm yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11976: na cotpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭheyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:11977: 307.016 yasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānanti dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jāne dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
S01divyav_u:11978: tasmātsattvā yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11980: utpannaṃ cauṣāṃ mātsaryamalaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati//
S01divyav_u:11981: 307.020 bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantamapṛcchan--āścaryaṃ bhadanta yāvacca bhagavata etarhi yācakāḥ priyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11982: 307.021 na bhikṣava etarhi mama, yathā atīte 'pyadhvani yācanakāḥ priyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11984: 307.023 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvanyuttarāpatheṣu janapadeṣu utpalāvatī nāṃ nagarī rājadhānī babhūva ṛddhā ca sphaītā ca kṣemā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca/
S01divyav_u:11985: 307.024 athāpareṇa samayena utpalāvatyāṃ nagararājadhānyāṃ durbhikṣamabhūd durjīvaṃ durlabhapiṇḍaṃ nasukaramapatāne pragrahaṇe yāpayitum/
S01divyav_u:11986: 307.026 tena khalu samayenotpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rūpāvatī nāma strī babhūva abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā śubhavarṇapuṣkalanayā samanvāgatā/
S01divyav_u:11987: 307.027 atha rūpāvatī strī svānniveśanānniṣkramya utpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jaṅghāvihāramanukrāmati/
S01divyav_u:11989: tasmin khalu samaye tasminnapavarake strī prasūtā,
S01divyav_u:11990: dārakaṃ prajātā abhirūpaṃ prāsādikaṃ śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:11991: 307.030 taṃ sā strī kṣutkṣāmaparītā raikṣacittā dārakaṃ gṛhṇāti, icchati ca svāni putramāṃsāni bhikṣayitum/
S01divyav_u:11992: 307.031 tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpāvatī strī etadavovat--kimidaṃ bhagini kartukāmāsi? sā āha--jighatsitāsmi bhagini/
S01divyav_u:11994: 308.001 rūpāvatī āha--tenabhagini niveśane kiṃcitsaṃvidyate 'nnaṃ vā pānaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā?
S01divyav_u:11996: 308.002 na me bhagini kiṃcitsaṃvidyate niveśane annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā khādyaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā lehyaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:12004: 308.006 na tāvattvaṃ dvāraśālāyā nirgatā bhaviṣyasi yāvanme vāyava ākramiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:12005: 308.007 yathā rūpāvatyā etadabhavat--yadi dārakaṃ gṛhītvā gamiṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:12007: 308.008 atha dārakamapahāya yāsyāmi, niyataṃ dārakaṃ bhakṣayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:12009_0: tasyā etadabhavat--anaparādhyāśayavati saṃsāre bahūni duḥkhānyanubhūtāni asakṛ nnarakeṣvasakṛttiryakṣvasakṛd
S01divyav_u:12009_1: yamaloke 'sakṛ nmanuṣyalokeṣu hastacchedāḥ pādacchedāḥ karṇacchedā karṇanāsācchedā
S01divyav_u:12010: 308.012 ko mayā tenārtho 'nuprāpto yadā āhamātmanaḥ sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saṃjanayitvā imāṃ striyaṃ svena rudhireṇa māṃsena saṃtarpya imaṃ dārakaṃ parimocayeyam/
S01divyav_u:12011: 308.014 rūpāvatī pṛcchati--asti te bhagini niveśane śastram? sā strī āha--astīti/
S01divyav_u:12014: 308.016 tato rūpāvatyā svayameva śastraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ gṛhītvā tau stanau cchittvā tāṃ striyaṃ svakena māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpayati sma/
S01divyav_u:12015: 308.017 saṃtarpya ca tāṃ striyametadavocat--yatkhalu bhagini jānīyāh--ayaṃ dārako mayā svakena māṃsarudhireṇa krītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12016: 308.018 sāhaṃ tava nikṣepamanuprayacchāmi--mā bhūyo dārakaṃ bhakṣayiṣyasi,
S01divyav_u:12019: 308.020 atha rūpāvatī strī rudhireṇoddharatā yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:12021: strīṃ rudhireṇoddharatā pradharatā dūrata eva agacchantīm/
S01divyav_u:12022: 308.022 dṛṣṭvā ca punā rūpāvatīmetadavocat--kenedamevamrūpaṃ rūpāvati viprakāraṃ kṛtam?
S01divyav_u:12024: 308.023 ārocayitvā etadavocat--prajñapaya āryaputra tasyā striyā bhaktam/
S01divyav_u:12027: yenāryaduhitaḥ satyena satyavacanena ayamevamrūpa āścaryādbhuto dharmo na kadācid dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā,
S01divyav_u:12028: tena satyena satyavacanena ubhau tava stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhavetām/
S01divyav_u:12029: 308.026 sahakṛtenāsminnevamrūpe satyavacane tasyā asminneva kṣaṇe ubhau stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhūtau//
S01divyav_u:12030: 308.028 atha śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhavat--atityāgo 'tityāgagauravatā yā rūpāvatyā striyā kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12031: 308.029 mā haiva sā rūpāvatī strī ataḥ śakrabhavanāccyāvayet/
S01divyav_u:12033_1: suvarṇadaṇḍena maṇivālavyajanena vījyamānastadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃmiñjitaṃ bāhuṃ
S01divyav_u:12034: evameva śakro devānāmindro deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣvantarhita utpalāvatyām [309]rājadhānyāṃ pratyasthāt/
S01divyav_u:12035: 309.001 atha śakro devānāmindra utpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ bhaikṣyamanvāhiṇḍan yana rūpāvatyāḥ striyā niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya dvāri sthitvā bhaikṣyamutkrośate/
S01divyav_u:12036: 309.002 tato rūpāvatī strī bhaikṣamādāya yena sa brāhmaṇaveṣadharaḥ śakraḥ,
S01divyav_u:12038: 309.003 atha sa śakro devānāmindro rūpāvatīṃ striyametadvocat--satyaṃ te rūpāvari dārakasyārthāyobhau stanau parityaktau?
S01divyav_u:12040: 309.005 sa tāmāh--evaṃ te rūpāvatī ubhau stanau parityajāmīti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vā abhūccittasya vipratisārah?
S01divyav_u:12041: sā āha--na me ubhau stanau parityajantyā abhūccittasya vipratisāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:12042: 309.007 śakra aha--atra kaḥ śraddhāsyati? rūpāvatyāha--tena hi brāhmaṇa satyavacanaṃ kariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:12043: 309.008 yena satyena brahman satyavacanenobhau stanau parityajāmīti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vā nābhūccittasyānyathātvam,
S01divyav_u:12045: api ca brahman yena satyena mayā dārakasyārthāyobhau stanau parityaktau,
S01divyav_u:12046: na rājyārthaṃ na bhogārthaṃ na śakrārthaṃ na rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ viṣayārthaṃ nānyatrāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhya adāntān damayeyam,
