S01divyav_u:12050: tena satyena satyavacanena mama strīndriyamantardhāya puruṣendriyaṃ prādurbhavet/
S01divyav_u:12052: atha khalu śakro devendrastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātas tata eva ṛddhyā vaihāyasamabhyudgamyodānamudānayati--rūpāvatyāḥ strīndriyamantarhitam,
S01divyav_u:12054: 309.016 rūpāvatyāḥ striyo rūpāvataḥ kumāra iti saṃjñā utpāditā//
S01divyav_u:12055: 309.018 athāpareṇa samayenopalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ nagaryāṃ rājā aputraḥ kālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12056: tatra piṇḍatajātīyānāṃ mahāmātrāṇāmetadabhūt--yannu vayamutpalāvatyāṃ rāhadhānyāṃ rāhānaṃ sthāpayema/
S01divyav_u:12058: te rūpāvataṃ kumāramutpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rājānaṃ sthāpayanti/
S01divyav_u:12061: 309.022 kāyasya bhedāttasyāmevotpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanyatamasya śroṣṭhino gṛhapateragramahiṣyāḥ kukṣāvupapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12062: 309.023 sā pūrṇānāmaṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāddārakaṃ janayati abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:12063: 309.024 tasya jātamātrasya tādṛśī kāyātprabhā muktā, yayā prabhayā candrasya prabhā niṣprabhīkṛtā/
S01divyav_u:12064: 309.025 athānyatarā strī yena sa śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:12065: 309.026 upasaṃkramya śreṣṭhinaṃ gṛhapatimetadavocat--yatkhalu gṛhapate jānīyāh--te dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12066: 309.027 tasya jātamātrasya tādṛśī kāyātprabhā pramuktā, yayā candrasya prabhā niṣprabhīkṛtā/
S01divyav_u:12067_0: 309.028 atha sa śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ prītasaumanasyajātas tasyā
S01divyav_u:12067_1: eva rātryā atyayādye jānanti brahmaṇā lakṣaṇyā naibhittikā vaipañcikā bhūmyantarikṣamantrakuśalā
S01divyav_u:12068: sa tān saṃnipātya dārakamupadarśayati--yatkhalu brāhmaṇā jānīdhvam--ayamagramahiṣyā dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādikāḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12069: 309.032 etasya jātamātrasya tādṛśī kāyātprabhā muktā, yayā candrasya prabhā niṣprabhīkṛtā/
S01divyav_u:12070: 309.033 tadasya brāhmaṇā dārakasya lakṣaṇāni prekṣya [310]nāma avasthāpayati/
S01divyav_u:12071: 310.001 tasye ta brāhmaṇā lakṣaṇanaimittikā vipañcikā bhūmyantarīkṣamantrakuśalā nakṣatraśukragrahacatiteṣu kovidā dārakamupagatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12072: 310.002 ṭe saṃlakṣya vadanti--te gṛhapate dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:12073: 310.003 asya jātamātrasya tādṛśī kāyātprabhā muktā yayā candraprabhā niṣprabhīkṛtā/
S01divyav_u:12075: 310.005 atha śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistān brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā visarjya candraprabhasya dārakasya catasro dhātrīranuprayacchati aṅkadhātrī maladhātrī stanadhātrī karīḍāpaṇilā dhātrī/
S01divyav_u:12076: 310.006 aṅkadhātrītyucyate yā dārakamaṅkena parikarṣayati, aṅkapratyaṅgāni ca saṃsthāpayati/
S01divyav_u:12077: 310.007 maladhātrītyucyate yā dārakaṃ snāapayati, cīvarakānmalaṃ prapātayati/
S01divyav_u:12079: 310.009 krūḍāpanikā dhātryucyate yāni tāni dārakāṇāṃ dakṣakāṇāṃ taruṇakānāṃ ktīḍāpanikāni bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:12081: syapeṭārikā vaṃśaghaṭikā saṃdhāvaṇikā hastivigrahā aśvavigrahā balīvardavigrahāḥ kathayanti dhanurgrahāḥ kāṇḍakaṭacchupūrakūrcabhaiṣajyasthavikāśca purataḥ patikṛṣyante/
S01divyav_u:12084: tadainaṃ mātāpitarau susnātaṃ suviliptaṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā saṃbahulairdārakaiḥ parivṛttaṃ lipiṃ prāpayante/
S01divyav_u:12085: 310.014 tena khalu samayena tasyāṃ lipiśālāyāṃ pañcamātrakadārakaśatāni lipiṃ śikṣanti/
S01divyav_u:12086: 310.015 atha candraprabho dārakastān dārakānetadavocat--etaddārakā vayaṃ sarve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambodhau cittamutpādayema/
S01divyav_u:12087: 310.016 te āhuh--kiṃ candraprabha bodhisattvena karaṇīyam? sa āha--ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12089: tadyathā--dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā/
S01divyav_u:12090: 310.018 tadahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi, yannvahaṃ tiryagyonigatebhyo 'pi dānaṃ dadyām/
S01divyav_u:12091: 310.019 sa tīkṣṇaṃ śastramādāya madhusarpiśca yenānyataraṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12092: 310.020 śastreṇātmanaḥ kāyaṃ kṣaṇitvā madhusarpiṣā mrakṣayitvā tasmin sa mahāśmaśāne ātmānaṃ vadhāyotsṛjati/
S01divyav_u:12093: 310.021 tena ca samayena tasmin mahāśmaśāne uccaṃgamaḥ pakṣī prativasati/
S01divyav_u:12094: 310.022 sa candraprabhasya dārakasyāṅge sthitvā dakṣiṇaṃ nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayati, punarmuñcati/
S01divyav_u:12095: 310.023 dvirapi trirapi uccaṃgamaḥ prāṇī candraprabhasya dārakasya dakṣiṇaṃ nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayitvā punarmuñcati/
S01divyav_u:12096: 310.024 atha candraprabho dāraka uccaṃgamaṃ pakṣiṇamidamavocat--kimidaṃ pakṣi mama nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayitvā utpāṭayitvā punaḥ pramuñcasi?
S01divyav_u:12097: sa āha--na mama candraprabha kiṃcidevāmiṣye(?) yathā manuṣyākṣi/
S01divyav_u:12099: candraprabha āha--sacenmama pakṣī sahasrakṛtvo nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayatu, punarmuñca (tu)
S01divyav_u:12106: abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikāṃ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:12107: 310.032 tasya mātāpitarau brāhmaprabha iti nāma sthāpitavantau/
S01divyav_u:12111: sa pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakāni svayameva mantrān vācayati/
S01divyav_u:12112: 311.002 yadā brahmaprabho māṇavakaḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣo jātyā saṃvṛttaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12115: 311.003 sa āha--amba tāta, na tāvanmama niveśanena prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:12117: sa āha--icchāmyahaṃ sattvānāmarthāya tapastaptuṃ duṣkaraṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:12119: 311.006 brahmaprabhamāṇavako mātāpitroḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya utpalāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yenānyataradvanaṣaṇḍaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12120: 311.007 tena khalu samayena tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe dvau brāhmaṇarṣī prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12121: 311.008 apaśyatāṃ brāhmaṇarṣīṃ brahmaprabhaṃ māṇavakaṃ dūrata evāgacchantam/
S01divyav_u:12122: 311.009 dṛṣṭvā ca brahmaprabhaṃ māṇavakametadavocat--ehi brahmaprabha, svāgatam, mā śrānto 'si, mā klāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12124: sa āha--icchāmyahaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya tapastaptuṃ duṣkaraṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:12125: 311.011 tau āhatuh--evamastu, bhavatu, ṛddhyantāṃ saṃkalpāḥ, paripūryantāṃ manorathāḥ//
S01divyav_u:12126: 311.012 atha brahmaprabho māṇavako 'nyatarasmin pradeśe kuṭīṃ kārayitvā caṃkramaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sattvānāmarthāya tapastaptavān/
S01divyav_u:12127: 311.013 athāpareṇa samayena brahmaprabhasya kuṭyā nātidūre vyāghrī gurviṇī vāsamupagatā/
S01divyav_u:12129: 311.014 tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca yena punastau dvau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12130: upasaṃkramya tau ca brahmarṣī etadavocat--yatkhalu ṛṣī jānītām--iha me kuṭyā nātidūre vyāghrī gurviṇī vāsamupagatā/
S01divyav_u:12131: 311.016 tasyāḥ ka utsahate bhaktaṃ dātum? tau āhatuh--āvāṃ tasyā bhaktaṃ dāsyāvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12132: 311.017 athāpareṇa samayena vyāghrī prasūtā kṣutkṣāmaparītā icchati svakau potakau bhakṣayitum/
S01divyav_u:12133: ekaṃ potakaṃ gṛhṇāti dvitīyaṃ muñcati, na bhakṣayati/
S01divyav_u:12135: dṛṣṭvā ca punaryena tau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12136: 311.019 upasaṃkramya punaryena tau dvau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12137: 311.020 upasaṃkramya dvau brahmarṣī etadavocat--yatkhalu brāhmaṇau jānītām--sā vyāghrī prasūtā kṣutkṣāmaparītā svakau potakau bhakṣayitumicchati/
S01divyav_u:12138: 311.021 ekaṃ potakaṃ gṛhītvā dvitīyaṃ muñcati na bhakṣayati/
S01divyav_u:12139: 311.022 tasyāḥ ka utsahate bhaktaṃ dātum? tau āhatuh--āvāṃ tasyā bhaktaṃ dāsyāvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12140: atha tau brahmarṣī yena sā vyāghrī tenopasaṃkrāntau/
S01divyav_u:12146: 311.026 dṛṣṭvā ca punastau brahmarṣī etadavocat--nanu brāhmaṇau,
S01divyav_u:12149: tau āhatuh--ka utsahate tiryagyonigatasyārthāya jīvitaṃ parityaktum?
S01divyav_u:12151: 311.029 atha sa brahmaprabho māṇavako yena sā vyāghrī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12155: atha brahmaprabhasya māṇavasyaitadabhavat--iyaṃ mama vyāghrī sāvijñānakaṃ kāyaṃ na bhakṣayati/
S01divyav_u:12157_0: tatastīkṣṇaṃ ca veṇupeśīṃ tīkṣṇāṃ gṛhītvā idamevaṃ rūpaṃ satyavacanamakarot--samanvāharantu
S01divyav_u:12157_1: me ye 'smin vanaṣaṇḍe 'dhyuṣitā [312]udārā devā nāgā yakṣā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragāḥ,
S01divyav_u:12159: 312.002 ayamahaṃ tyāgaṃ kariṣyāmi, atityāgaṃ tyāgātityāgaṃ svayaṃ galaparityāgam/
S01divyav_u:12160: api tu yenāhaṃ satyena satyavacanena parityajāmi,
S01divyav_u:12161: na rājyārthaṃ na bhogārthaṃ na śakrāthaṃ na rājacakravartiviṣayārtham,
S01divyav_u:12167: tena satyena satyavacanena mā me parityāgo niṣphalo bhūditi kṛtvā svayameva galaṃ chittvā tasyā vyāghryā purata upanikṣipati/
S01divyav_u:12172: 312.016 sahaparityakte khalu bhikṣavo brahmaprabheṇa māṇavena svake gale,
S01divyav_u:12173: ayaṃ rtisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ kampati saṃkampati saṃprakampati,
S01divyav_u:12184: sūryacandramasau na tapato na bhāsato na virājataḥ//
S01divyav_u:12185: 312.021 syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyā sā tena samayenottarāpatheṣu janapadeṣūtpalāvatīnāṃ nagarīrājadhānī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:12187: puṣkalāvataṃ tena kālena tena samayenotpalāvataṃ nāma nagaraṃ rājadhānī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:12188: 312.023 syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenotpalāvate nagare rājadhānyāṃ rūpāvatī strī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:12190: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rūpāvatī nāma strī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:12191: 312.025 syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyā sā tena kālena tena samayenāpavarake strī prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:12193: candraprabhamāṇavikā tena kālena tena samayenāpavarake strī prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:12194: 312.027 syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyastena kālena tena samayena dārako babhūva/
S01divyav_u:12196: rāhulaḥ kumāraḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena dārako 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:12197: 312.029 syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena candraprabho nāma dārako babhūva/
S01divyav_u:12199: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena candraprabho nāma dārako babhūva/
S01divyav_u:12200: 312.031 syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena pañcamātrāṇi dārakaśatānyabhūvan/
S01divyav_u:12202: 312.033 imāni tāni pañca etadbhadrikaśatāni tena kālena tena samayena pañcamātrāṇi dārakaśatāni [313]abhūvan/
S01divyav_u:12203: 313.001 syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tasmin mahāśmaśāne uccaṃgamo nāma pakṣī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:12205: kauṇḍinyo bhikṣustena kālena tena samayenoñcaṃgamo nāma pakṣī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:12206: 313.003 syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabho nāma māṇavo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:12208: 313.005 ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabho nāma māṇavo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:12209: syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabhasya māṇavasya mātāpitarau abhūtām/
S01divyav_u:12211: rājā śuddhodano māyādevī tena kālena tena samayena brahmaprabhasya māṇavasya mātāpitarau abhūvatām/
S01divyav_u:12212: 313.008 syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vanamabhūt/
S01divyav_u:12213: 313.009 .... syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau brahmarṣī abhūtām/
S01divyav_u:12215: maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ suprabhaśca buddhastena kālena tena samayena tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe dvau brahmarṣī abhūtām/
S01divyav_u:12216: 313.011 syādyuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vyāghrī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:12218: kauṇḍinyo bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena dvau vyāghrapotau babhūvatuḥ/
S01divyav_u:12220: nando bhikṣū rāhulaśca tena kālena tena samayena vyāghrapotakau abhūtām/
S01divyav_u:12221: 313.016 tadā me bhikṣavaścatvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito maitreyo bodhisattva ekena galaparityāgena paścānmukhīkṛtaḥ/

S01divyav_u:12698: 327.028 yadyevaṃ bho vijānāsi na te (putrā) parabhūtāḥ kvacit//68//
S01divyav_u:12699: 327.029 parīkṣasva brāhmaṇa samyageva--ko 'tra brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/
S01divyav_u:12701: 327.031 kilāsinaḥ kuṣṭhinaśca gaurāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ pṛthak pṛthak//69//
S01divyav_u:12704: 328.003 evaṃ gate brāhmaṇa naiva bhavati viśeṣaḥ ko jātikṛto viśeṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12705: 328.004 yasmānna jāterviśeṣaṇo 'sti tasmānna vai varṇacatuṣka eva//69//(a)
S01divyav_u:12706: 328.005 tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--saṃjñāmātramidaṃ lokasya yadidaṃ brāṃhaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā caṇḍāka iti vā/
S01divyav_u:12708: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:12710: 328.008 idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājāsya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī idamavocat--kiṃ punarbhavatā ṛgvedo 'dhītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12721: athavā aṅgavidyā vā vastravidyā vā śivāvidyā śakunividyā vā tvayādhītā?
S01divyav_u:12722: athavā rāhucaritaṃ vā śukracaritaṃ vā grahacaritaṃ tvayādhītam?
S01divyav_u:12723: athavā lokāyataṃ bhavatā bhāṣyapravacanaṃ vā pakṣādhyāyo vā nyāyo vā tvayādhītah?
S01divyav_u:12724: 328.014 evamukte triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat--etacca mayā brāhmaṇā adhītaṃ bhūyaścottaram/
S01divyav_u:12726: yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt--ahamasmi mantreṣu pāraṃ prāpta iti,
S01divyav_u:12727: tatra te brāhmaṇa saha dharmeṇānumānaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:12728: 328.016 na khalvevaṃ brāhmaṇa prāthamakalpikānāṃ sattvānāmetadabhavat--yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:12730: 328.019 atha brāhmaṇa sattvānāmasadṛśānāṃ cobhayathā sadṛśānāṃ tato 'nye sattvāḥ śālikṣetrāṇi kelāyanti gopāyanti vāpayanti vā,
S01divyav_u:12732: 328.020 athātra brāhmaṇa tadanyatamānāṃ sattvānāmetadabhavat--parigraho rogaḥ parigraho gaṇḍaḥ parigrahaḥ śalyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12733: 328.021 yannu vayaṃ svaparigrahamapahāya araṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā tṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśakānupasaṃhṛtya tṛṇakuṭikāṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā praviśya dhyāyema iti/
S01divyav_u:12734: 328.023 atha te sattvāstaṃ parigrahamapahāyā araṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā tṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāpatraparṇapālāśakaistṛṇakuṭiṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā tatraiva praviśya dhyāyanti sma/
S01divyav_u:12735: 328.025 te tatra sāyamāsanahetoḥ prāntavāṭikāṃ prātaraśanahetośca grāmaṃ piṇḍāya praviśanti sma//
S01divyav_u:12736: 328.027 atha teṣāṃ grāmavāsināṃ satvānāmetadabhavat--duṣkarakārakā bata bhoḥ sattvā ye svakaṃ parigrahamutsṛjya grāmanigamajanapadebhyo bahir nirgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12737: 328.028 teṣāṃ bahirmanaskā brāhmaṇā iti saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divyav_u:12738: 328.029 te ca punargrāmavāsinaḥ sattvāstānatīva satkurvanti sma/
S01divyav_u:12740: 329.001 [329]atha etṣāmeva sattvānāmanyatame sattvāstāni dhyānānyasambhāvayanto grāmeṣvavatīrya mantrapadān svādhyāyanti sma/
S01divyav_u:12744: 329.003 ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo brāhmaṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāya//
S01divyav_u:12745: 329.005 athānyatame sattvā vivekakālapratisamyuktān kārmāntān vividhānarthapratisamyuktān kurvanti sma/
S01divyav_u:12747: 329.007 athānyatame sattvāḥ kṣudreṇa karmaṇā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti sma/
S01divyav_u:12749: 329.009 bhūtapūrvaṃ brāhmaṇa anyatamaḥ sattvo vadhūmādāya rathamāruhya anyatamasminnaraṇyapradeśe gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12751: tasmānmātaṅgam {mā tvaṃ gāmah} iti saṃjñā udapādi//
S01divyav_u:12752: 329.011 kṣetraṃ karṣanti ye teṣāṃ karṣakā iti saṃjñā pravṛttā//
S01divyav_u:12753: 329.012 bhāṣyeṇa ca parṣadaṃ rañjayati dharmeṇa śīlavratasamācāreṇa samyak, tasya rājā iti saṃjñābhūt//
S01divyav_u:12754: 329.014 tato 'nye sattvā vāṇijyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti, teṣāṃ vaṇija iti saṃjñā udapādi//
S01divyav_u:12756: pravrajitvā parāñ jayanti kleśāñ jayantīti teṣāṃ pravrajitā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi//
S01divyav_u:12757: 329.017 api tu brāhmaṇa ekaiva saṃjñā loka udapādi/
S01divyav_u:12780: 329.027 tadyathā śīlavalkā araṇemikā laukākṣāḥ kauthumā brahmasamā mahāsamā mahāyāgikāḥ sātyamugrāḥ samantavedāḥ//
S01divyav_u:12791: ete brāhmaṇā ekaviṃśatyadhvaryavo bhūtvā ekottaraśatadhā bhinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12792: 330.002 tadyathā kaṭhāḥ kaṇimā vājasaneyino jātukarṇāḥ praṣṭhapadā ṛṣayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12808: 330.010 anumānamapi brāhmaṇa pramāṇaṃ pratītya etāni dvādaśabhedaśatāni ṣoḍaśabhedāśca ye brāhmaṇaiḥ pauraṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12809: 330.011 chandasi vā vyākaraṇe vā lokayate vā padamīmāṃsāyāṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:12812: tatte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--saṃjñāmātrakametallokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:12814: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitamutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:12816: 330.016 idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tūṣṇīmbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho 'dhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparo 'sthāt//
S01divyav_u:12817: 330.018 dadarśa triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ tūṣṇīmbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandhamadhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitam/
S01divyav_u:12818: 330.019 dṛṣṭvā ca punaridamabravīt--yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syādasadṛśena saha saṃbandho bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:12821: ye pramāṇaśrutiśīlaprajñādayo guṇā agryā lokasya te mama putrasya śārdūlakarṇasya saṃvidyante/
S01divyav_u:12822: 330.022 yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt--ye vājapeyam yajñam yajanti,
S01divyav_u:12823: aśvamedhaṃ puruṣamedhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajñam yajanti,
S01divyav_u:12824: sarve te kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyanta iti/
S01divyav_u:12827: vājapeyaṃ brāhmaṇa yajñam yajamānā aśvamedhaṃ puruṣamedhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajña ca yajamānā bahudhā mantrān pravartayantaḥ prāṇihiṃsāṃ ca pravartayanti/
S01divyav_u:12828: 330.026 tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--na hyeṣa mārgaḥ svargāya/
S01divyav_u:12829: ahaṃ te brāhmaṇa mārgaṃ svargāya vyākhyāmi/
S01divyav_u:12832: 330.029 praśaṃsāṃ vittalābhaṃ ca pratya svarge ca modanam//70//
S01divyav_u:12833: 330.030 yairbrāhmaṇa itaḥ pūrvaṃ vājapeyo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12834: yairaśvamedho yaiḥ puruṣamedho yaiḥ śāmyaprāśo yair nirargaḍo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12838: ye 'śvamedham ye śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajñam yakṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:12840: 331.002 tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--ehi tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ saṃbandham yojanayasva/
S01divyav_u:12841: 331.003 tatkasya hetoh? dharmeṇa hi caṇḍālā ajugupsanīyā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:12843: 331.005 śraddhā śīlaṃ tapastyāgaḥ śrutirjñānaṃ dayaiva ca//
S01divyav_u:12848: aṣṭau cemā brāhmaṇa nirdiṣṭā mātṛtulyā bhaginyo loke pravartante/
S01divyav_u:12858: 331.012 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin brāhmaṇānāṃ sapta gautrāṇi svākhyāsyāmi,
S01divyav_u:12859: tāni śrūyantām--tadyathā gautamā vātsyāḥ kautsāḥ kāśyapā vāsiṣṭhā māṇḍavyā ityetāni brāhmaṇa sapta gotrāṇi/
S01divyav_u:12861: atra ye gautamāste kauthumāste gagarste bhāradvājāsta ārṣṭiṣeṇāste vaikhānasāste vajrapādāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12862: 331.015 tatra ye vātsyāsta ātreyāste maitreyāste bhārgavāste sāvarṇyāste bahujātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12863: 331.016 tatra ye vātsyāsta ātreyāsta maitreyāste bhārgavāste sāvarṇyāste salīlāste bahujātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12864: tatra ye kautsāste maudgalyāyanāste gauṇāyanāste lāṅgalāste lagnāste daṇḍalagnāste somabhuvāh{vah}/
S01divyav_u:12865: 331.017 tatra ye kauśikāste kātyāyanāste darbhakātyāyanāste valkalinaste pakṣiṇaste laukākṣāste lohitāyanāh (lohityāyanāḥ/)/
S01divyav_u:12866: 331.018 tatra ye kāśyapāste maṇḍanāsta iṣṭāste śauṇḍāyanāste rocaneyāste 'napekṣāste 'gniveśyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12867: 331.019 tatra ye kāśyapāste jātukarṇyāste dhānyāyanāste pārāśarāste vyāghranakhāste āṇḍāyanāsta aupamanyavāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12868: 331.021 tatra ye māṇḍavyāste bhāṇḍāyanāste dhomrāyaṇāste kātyāyanāste khalvavāahanāste sugandhārāyaṇāste kāpiṣṭhalāyanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12869: 331.022 ityetāni brāhmaṇa evamekonapañcāśadgotrāṇi brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāni cchandasi vyākaraṇe padamīmāṃsāyām/
S01divyav_u:12870: 331.023 anyāni ca gotrāṇi vistarato mayā vācitāni/
S01divyav_u:12873: tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi sāmānyaṃ saṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:12875: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:12877: 331.029 idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tūṣṇīmbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho 'dhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparaḥ sthito 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:12878: 331.030 adrākṣīt triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājah [332]puskarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tūṣṇīmbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandhamadhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitam/
S01divyav_u:12880: 332.003 yādṛśaṃ vāpyate bījaṃ tādṛśaṃ labhyate phalam/
S01divyav_u:12887: 332.010 bhavette bhavinī bhāryā naitad brāhmaṇa yujyate//75//
S01divyav_u:12888: 332.011 yadi tāvadayaṃ loko brahmaṇā janitaḥ svayam/
S01divyav_u:12890: 332.013 atha vaiśyasya vaiśyā vai śūdrā vā punaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12891: 332.014 na bhāryā bhaginī yuktā brahmaṇā janitā yadi//77//
S01divyav_u:12892: 332.015 na sattvā brahmaṇo jātāḥ kleśajāḥ karmajāstvamī/
S01divyav_u:12894: 332.017 teṣāṃ ca jātisāmānyād brāhmaṇe kṣatriye tathā/
S01divyav_u:12895: 332.018 atha vaiśye ca śūdre ca samaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate//79//
S01divyav_u:12900: 332.023 manojavā ca gāndhārī ghorī vidyā vaśaṃkarī/
S01divyav_u:12901: 332.024 kākavāṇī ca mantraṃ ca indrajālaṃ ca bhañjanī//82//
S01divyav_u:12907: 332.030 na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa manyase//85//
S01divyav_u:12910: 333.003 na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//86//
S01divyav_u:12911: 333.004 kṣatriyā reṇukā nāma jajñe rāmaṃ mahāmunim/
S01divyav_u:12913: 333.006 na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//87//
S01divyav_u:12914: 333.007 ye ca te manujā āsaṃs tejasā tapasā yutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12916: 333.009 na hi te brāhmaṇīputrāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//88//
S01divyav_u:12919: 333.012 tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:12921: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramanuprayaccha bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:12923: 333.015 idaṃ ca punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅgarājamidamavocat--kiṃgotro bhavān?
S01divyav_u:12940: kathaṃ bhavati? katyakṣarā sāvitrī? katigaṇḍā? katipadā?
S01divyav_u:12945: 333.024 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin, sotpattikāṃ sāvitrīṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:12948: 333.025 bhūtapūrvaṃ brāhmaṇa atīte 'dhvani vasur nāma ṛṣirbabhūva/
S01divyav_u:12950: tena tatra takṣakaduhitā kapilā nāma āsaditā bhāryārtham/
S01divyav_u:12951: sa tatra saṃraktacittastayā kanyayā sārdhaṃ maithunamagacchat/
S01divyav_u:12953: 333.028 ṛddhiparihīnaḥ sa vipratisārī ātmano duścaritaṃ vigarhāṇastasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāvitrīṃ bhāṣate sma/
S01divyav_u:12958: 333.031 iti hi brāhmaṇa ajñānaśodhanārthamimameva mantraṃ sa brāhmaṇo divārātraṃ japati sma/
S01divyav_u:12973: 334.007 kāmā hi loke paramāḥ prajānāṃ kleśaprahāṇe bhūtā antarāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12974: 334.009 tasmādbhavantaḥ prajahantu kāmāṃs tato 'tulaṃ prāpsyatha brahmalokam//91//
S01divyav_u:12975: 334.011 itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa brahmaṇā sahāpatinā sāvitrī bhāṣitā, pūrvakaiśca samyaksambuddhairabhyanumoditā//
S01divyav_u:12981_0: 334.015 kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣyah āśleṣā maghā pūrvaphalgunī
S01divyav_u:12981_1: uttaraphalgunī hastā citrā svātī viśākhā anurādhā anurādhā jyeṣṭā mūlā pūrvāṣāḍhā
S01divyav_u:12981_2: uttarāṣāḍhā abhijit śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā pūrvabhādrapadā uttarabhādrapadā
S01divyav_u:12983: 334.019 katitārakāṇi katisaṃsthānāni katimuhūrtayogāni kimāhārāṇi kiṃdaivatāni kiṃgotrāṇi?
S01divyav_u:12984: 334.021 kṛttikā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatraṃ ṣaṭtāraṃ kṣurasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ dadhyāhāramagnidaivataṃ vaiśyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12985: 334.022 rohiṇīnakṣatraṃ pañcatārakaṃ śakaṭākṛtisaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mṛgamāṃsāhāraṃ prajāpatidaivataṃ bhāradvājaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12986: 334.023 mṛgāśirānakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ mṛgaśīrṣasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ phalamūlāhāraṃ somadaivataṃ mṛgāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12987: 334.024 ārdrānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ sarpirmaṇḍāhāraṃ sūryadaivataṃ hārītāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12988: 334.026 punarvasunakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhyāhāram aditidaivataṃ vāsiṣṭhaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12989: 334.027 puṣyanakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ vardhamānasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhumaṇḍāhāraṃ bṛhaspatidaivatam aupamanyavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12990: 334.028 āśleṣānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ pāyasabhojanaṃ sarpadaivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12991: 334.029 itīmāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi pūrvadvārakāṇi//
S01divyav_u:12992: 334.031 maghānakṣatraṃ pañcatāraṃ nadīkubjasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilakṛsarāhāraṃ titṛdaivatam [335]piṅgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12993: 335.001 pūrvaphalgunīnakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ bilvabhojanaṃ bhavadaivataṃ gautamīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12994: 335.002 uttaraphalgunīnakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ godhūmamatsyāhāramaryamādaivataṃ kauśikaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12995: 335.003 hastanakṣatraṃ pañcatāraṃ hastasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ śyāmākabhojanaṃ sūryadaivataṃ kāśyapaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12996: 335.004 citrānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mudgakṛsaraghṛtapūpāhāraṃ tvaṣṭṛdaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12997: 335.005 svātīnakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ mudgakṛsaraphalāhāraṃ vāyudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:12998: 335.007 viśākhānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ viṣāṇasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilapuṣpāhāramindrāgnidaivataṃ śākhāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13000: 335.009 anurādhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ ratnāvalīsaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ surāmāṃsāhāraṃ mitradaivatamālambāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13001: 335.010 jyeṣṭhānakṣatraṃ tritāram yavamadhyasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ śāliyavāgūbhojanamindradaivataṃ dīrghakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13002: 335.011 mūlanakṣatraṃ saptatāraṃ vṛścikasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mūlaphalāhāraṃ nairṛtidaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13003: 335.012 pūrvāṣāḍhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ govikramasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ nyagrodhakaṣāyāhāraṃ toyadaivataṃ darbhakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13004: 335.013 uttarāṣāḍhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ gajavikramasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhulājāhāraṃ viśvadaivataṃ maudgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13005: 335.015 abhijinnakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ gośīrṣasaṃsthānaṃ ṣaṇmuhūrtayogaṃ vāyvāhāraṃ brahmadaivataṃ brahmāvatīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13006: 335.016 śravaṇānakṣatraṃ tritāram yavamadhyasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ pakṣimāṃsāhāraṃ viṣṇudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13007: 335.017 ityetāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi paścimadvārakāṇi//
S01divyav_u:13008: 335.019 dhaniṣṭhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ śakunasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ kulatthapūpāhāraṃ vasudaivataṃ kauṇḍinyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13009: 335.020 śatabhiṣānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogam yavāgubhojanaṃ varuṇadaivataṃ tāṇḍyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13010: 335.021 pūrvabhādrapadānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ māṃsarudhirāhāramahirbudhnyadaivataṃ jātūkarṇyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13011: 335.022 uttarabhādrapadānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ māṃsāhāram aryamādaivataṃ dhyānadrāhyāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13012: 335.024 revatīnakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhupāyasabhojanaṃ gandharvadaivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13013: 335.026 bharaṇīnakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ bhagasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilataṇḍulāhāram yamadaivataṃ bhārgavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:13014: 335.027 ityetāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi uttaradvārakāṇi//
S01divyav_u:13015: 335.028 amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭaviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ ṣaṇnakṣatrāṇi pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogāni/
S01divyav_u:13016: 335.029 tadyathā--rohiṇī punarvasu uttaraphalgunī viśākhā uttarāṣāḍhā uttarabhādrapadā ceti/
S01divyav_u:13018: tadyathā--ārdrā āśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ceti/
S01divyav_u:13021: 336.001 [336]amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ pūrvadvārikāṇāṃ kṛttikā prathamā nāmā,
S01divyav_u:13023: 336.002 amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ dakṣiṇadvārīkāṇāṃ maghā prathamā nāma, viśākhā paścimāa nāma/
S01divyav_u:13024: 336.003 amīṣāṃ paścimadvārikāṇāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāmanurādhā prathamā nāma, śravaṇā paścimā nāma/
S01divyav_u:13025: 336.004 amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāmuttaradvārikāṇāṃ dhaniṣṭhā prathamā nāma, bharaṇī paścimā nāma//
S01divyav_u:13026: 336.006 amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sapta balāni/
S01divyav_u:13027: katamāni sapta? yaduta trīṇi pūrvāṇi viśākhānurādhā punarvasuḥ punarvasuḥ svātiśca/
S01divyav_u:13033: 336.009 śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā jyeṣṭhā mūlā iti/
S01divyav_u:13037: yaduta kṛttikā mṛgaśirā puṣyā aśvinī ceti//
S01divyav_u:13038: 336.011 amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭhāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ trayo yogā bhavanti--ṛṣabhānusārī yogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13041: tatra nakṣatram yadi purastādgacchati candraśca pṛṣṭhataḥ, ayamucyate ṛṣabhānusārī yoga iti/
S01divyav_u:13042: 336.013 yaduta candraḥ purastād gacchati nakṣatraṃ ca pṛṣṭhataḥ, tadā bhavati vatsānusārī yogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13043: 336.014 yadi punaścandro nakṣatraṃ cobhau samau yugapad gacchataḥ, tadāyamucyate yoga iti//
S01divyav_u:13044: 336.016 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin grahān pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:13046: tadyathā śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro budho 'ṅgārakaḥ sūryastārādhipatiśceti//
S01divyav_u:13047: 336.018 evaṃ viparivartamāne loke nakṣatreṣu pravibhakteṣu kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhiśca bhavati? taducyate/
S01divyav_u:13048: 336.019 hemantānāṃ dvitīye māsi rohiṇyāmaṣṭabhyāṃ dvādaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13050: grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyāmaṣṭabhyāmaṣṭādaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13052: varṣāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyāmaṣṭabhyāṃ caturdaśamuhūrto divase bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13061: tadyathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13067: 336.029 āditya udayati ṣaṇṇavatipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13068: ṣaṣṭipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śveto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13069: 336.030 dvādaśapauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ samṛddho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13070: 336.031 ṣaṭpauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śarapathe nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13073: 337.002 tripauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ sumukho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13074: sthite madhyāhne vajrako nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13075: 337.003 parivṛto madhyāhne tripuruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ rohito nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13081: 337.006 avataramāṇa āditye ṣaṇṇavatipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ parabhayo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13083: 337.008 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin rātryā muhūrtāni vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:13100: iti bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn imāni triṃśanmuhūrtāni yairahorātraṃ prajñāyate//
S01divyav_u:13113: caturojāḥ śvetaḥ samṛddhaḥ śarapatho 'tisamṛddha udgataḥ sumukho vajrako rohito balo vijayaḥ sarvaraso vasuḥ sundaraḥ parabhayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13114: 337.020 raudrastārāvacaraḥ samyamaḥ sāmpraiyako 'nanto gardabho rākṣaso 'vayavo brahmā ditirarko vidhamano āgneya ātapāgnirabhijit/
S01divyav_u:13129: 337.029 yadā caivaṃ śīryeta tat toyaṃ ghaṭasya tadaikā nāḍikā/
S01divyav_u:13130: etena nāḍikāpramāṇena vibhakte dve nāḍike eko muhūrtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13131: 337.030 etena bho brāhmaṇa triṃśanṃhūrtāḥ, yai rātridivasā anumīyanta iti//
S01divyav_u:13138: 338.003 etena punarakṣinimeṣeṇa ṣoḍaśakoṭyo 'ṣṭapañcāśañca śatasahasrāṇi aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi sa evaṃ māpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13154: paramāṇūnāṃ koṭiśatasahasrāṇi caturviṃśatiścaikonatriṃśatkoṭisahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca śatasahasrāṇi/
S01divyav_u:13161: 338.014 dve koṭī pañcaviṃśatiśca sahasrāṇi pañcaśatānyaṣṭau ca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13166: 338.017 paramāṇūnāmaṣṭakoṭayaḥ saptacatvāriṃśacca śatasahasrāṇi sapta ca sahasrāṇi dve śate aśītiśca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13172: dve koṭiśate tisraśca koṭaya ekonatriṃśacca śatasahasrāṇi catuḥsaptatisahasrāṇi sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiśca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13178: koṭiśatamaṣṭapañcāśacca koṭayo dviraśītiśca śatāshasrāṇi ekaṣaṣṭiśca sahasrāṇi pañcaśatāni triṃśacca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13181: atha khalu bho brāhmaṇa nakṣatravyākaraṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tacchrūyatām/
S01divyav_u:13190: 339.001 maghāyāṃ jāto matimān bhavati, mahātmā ca/
S01divyav_u:13195: 339.004 svātyāṃ jāto gaṇako bhavati, gaṇakamahāmātro vā/
S01divyav_u:13199: 339.006 mūle jātaḥ putravān bhavati, yaśasvī ca/
S01divyav_u:13213: atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatranirdeśaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:13216: 339.014 kṛttikāsu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
S01divyav_u:13218: 339.016 rohiṇyāṃ tu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ tad vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:13225: 339.023 punarvasau niviṣḍe tu nagaraṃ dīpyate śriyā/
S01divyav_u:13227: 339.025 śrīmatpuṣye niviṣṭe tu prajā duṣṭā prasīdati/
S01divyav_u:13233: 339.031 maghāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahādhanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13237: 340.003 uttarāyāṃ tu phalgunyāṃ dhānyāni ca dhanāni ca/
S01divyav_u:13238: 340.004 mūrkhā janā strībhir niviṣṭe nagare bhavet//102//
S01divyav_u:13239: 340.005 haste ca viniviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahādhanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13240: 340.006 parasparaṃ ca rucitaṃ śayanaṃ nagare bhavet//103//
S01divyav_u:13241: 340.007 citrāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu strījitāḥ sarvamānavāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13244: 340.010 lubdhāḥ krūrāśca mūrkhāśca prabhūtā nagare bhavet//105//
S01divyav_u:13245: 340.011 viśākhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
S01divyav_u:13257: 340.023 abhijiti niviṣṭe tu nagare tatra moditāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13268: 341.004 pūrṇaṃ ca dhanadhānyābhyāṃ ratnāḍhyaṃ ca vinirdiśet//117//
S01divyav_u:13269: 341.005 pure niviṣṭe revatyāṃ sundarī janatā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:13275: 341.011 purāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi tathā gṛhāṇi nakṣatrayogaṃ prasamīkṣya vidvān/
S01divyav_u:13276: 341.013 iṣṭe praśaste ca niveśayettu pūrve ca janme 'dhigataṃ mayedam//121//
S01divyav_u:13278: 341.016 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sthānanirdeśaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:13309: ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇāṃ sthānanirdeśavyākaraṇo nāmādhyāyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:13313: 342.001 [342]kṛttikāsu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13318: 342.005 rohiṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ekaviṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13321: eṣa ca varṣārātraḥ sāroparodhaḥ sasyaṃ ca saṃpādayati/
S01divyav_u:13326: 342.009 mṛgaśīrṣe grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13333: 342.012 ārdrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, aṣṭādaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13339: trayaścātra rogāḥ prabalā bhavanti--jvaraḥ śvāso galagrahaśca/
S01divyav_u:13342: 342.016 punarvasau grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, navatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13348: 342.019 puṣye grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, dvātriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13355: tatra trayo rogāśca bhavanti--gāṇḍāḥ piṭakāḥ pāmāni ca/
S01divyav_u:13357: 342.023 āśleṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ekaviṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13365: 342.027 maghāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13370: 342.030 pūrvaphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13372: tacca sasyaṃ janayitvā paracakrapīḍitā manuṣyā na sukhenopabhuñjate/
S01divyav_u:13373: 342.032 paśūnāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cātra garbhāḥ sukhino bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13375: 343.001 [343]uttaraphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, aśītyāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13381: 343.005 haste grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse devaḥ pravarṣati, ekonapañcāśadāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13386: 343.008 citrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13391: 343.011 svātyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ekaviṃśatyāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13395: 343.013 viśākhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, aśītyāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13401: 343.016 anurādhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ṣaṣṭyāḍakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13402: 343.017 jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse cātra dṛḍāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13404: 343.018 jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13413: 343.022 mūle grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13420: 343.026 pūrvasyāmāṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13426: 343.029 uttarasyāmāṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, pūrṇamāḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13432: trayaścātra rogāḥ prabalā bhavanti--gaṇḍaḥ kacchaḥ kaṇṭharoga iti/
S01divyav_u:13434: 344.001 [344]abhijiti grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakani pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13439: 344.004 śravaṇe tu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13446: 344.007 dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, ekapañcādāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13455: 344.011 śatabhiṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra pravarṣati, ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13460: manuṣyā dārakadārikāśca skandhe kṛtvā deśāntaraṃ gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:13462: 344.015 pūrvasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:13467: dvau cātra mahāvyādhī bhavatah--prathamaṃ pittatāpajvaro bhavati, paścād balavān mahāgraho bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13470: 344.020 uttarasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, pūrṇamāḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13478: 344.024 etāśca varṣāḥ puṣpāṇi phalāni ca saṃpādayanti/
S01divyav_u:13480: 344.025 revatyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devo pravarṣati, ekaṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13489: 344.030 aśvinyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, aṣṭacatvāriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13490: 344.031 yacca madhye varṣā bhavati, tatra niṃnāni kṛṣikartavyāni/
S01divyav_u:13496: 345.001 [345]bharaṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati, pūrṇamāḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:13505: 345.006 amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rāhugrahe phalavipākaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:13506: 345.007 kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yadi candragraho bhavati, kaliṅgamagadhānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13507: 345.008 yadi rohiṇyāṃ candragraho bhavati, prajānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13508: yadi mṛgaśirasi candragraho bhavati, videhānāṃ janapadānāmupapīḍā bhavati rājopasevakānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:13510: 345.010 āśleṣāyām yadi candragraho bhavati, nāgānāṃ haimavatānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13511: 345.011 yadi madhāsu candragraho bhavati, gauḍikānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13512: yadi pūrvaphalgunyāṃ somo gṛhyate, caurāṇāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13514: 345.013 yadi hasteṣu somo gṛhyate, saurāṣṭrikāṇāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13515: yadi citrāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, pakṣiṇāṃ dvipadānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13516: 345.014 yadi svātyāṃ somo gṛhyate, sarveṣāṃ pravrajyāsamāpannānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13517: 345.015 yadi viśākhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, audakānāṃ sattvānāmupapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13518: 345.016 yadyanurādhāsu somo gṛhyate, vaṇijānāmupapīḍā bhavati śākaṭikānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:13519: 345.017 yadi jyeṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, dauvālikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13520: yadi mūle somo gṛhyate, adhvagānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13521: 345.018 yadi pūrvāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, avantīnāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13522: 345.019 yadyuttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, kāmbojakānāṃ pīḍā bhavati vāhlīkānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:13523: yadyabhijiti somo gṛhyate, dakṣiṇāpathikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati tāmraparṇikānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:13524: 345.020 yadi śravaṇeṣu somo gṛhyate, caurāṇāṃ ghātakānāṃ copapīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13525: 345.021 yadi dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, kurupāñcālānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13526: 345.022 yadi śatabhiṣāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, maulikānāmātharvaṇikānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13527: 345.023 yadi pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, gāndhikānām yavanakāmbojakānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13528: 345.024 yadyuttarabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate, gandharvāṇāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13529: yadi revatyāṃ somo gṛhyate, nāvikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13530: 345.025 yadyaśvinyāṃ somo gṛhyate, aśvavaṇijānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13531: yadi bharaṇyāṃ somo gṛhyate, bharukacchānāṃ pīḍā bhavati//
S01divyav_u:13532: 345.027 evaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yasminnakṣatre candragraho bhavati tasya tasya deśasya pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13545: 346.008 navaṃ ca cchādayedvastraṃ krayaṇaṃ nātra kārayet//126//
S01divyav_u:13549: 346.012 taijasāni ca bhāṇḍāni kārayecca krīṇīta ca//128//
S01divyav_u:13550: 346.013 āyuṣyaṃ ca śiraḥsnānaṃ strīṇāṃ viṣkambhaṇāni ca/
S01divyav_u:13551: 346.014 pravarṣaṇaṃ ced devasya nātra vairaṃ praśāmyati//129//
S01divyav_u:13553: 346.016 āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca yajñaśīlo 'tra jāyate//130// kṛttikāsu//
S01divyav_u:13558: 346.021 ṛṇaṃ na dadyāttatraiva vairamatra tu vardhate/
S01divyav_u:13560: 346.023 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma cātra praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:13562: 346.025 āyuṣmān paśumān dhanyo mahābhogo 'tra jāyate//134// rohiṇyām//
S01divyav_u:13563: 346.026 saumyaṃ mṛgaśiro vidyād ṛju tisraśca tārakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13564: 346.027 mṛdūni yāni karmāṇi tāni sarvāṇi kārayet/
S01divyav_u:13565: 346.028 yāni karmāṇi rohiṇyāṃ tāni sarvāṇi kārayet//135//
S01divyav_u:13566: 346.029 sakṣīrān vāpayed vṛkṣān bījāni kṣīravanti ca/
S01divyav_u:13572: 347.003 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭiṃ cātra nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:13573: 347.004 svapnaśīlastathā trāsī medhāvī sa ca jāyate//139// mṛgaśirasi//
S01divyav_u:13574: 347.005 ārdrāyāṃ mṛgayedarthān bhadraṃ karma ca kārayet/
S01divyav_u:13577: 347.008 ūheta (uhayet) prathamāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ vikrīṇīyācca nātra gām/
S01divyav_u:13587: 347.018 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma cātra praśasyate//145//
S01divyav_u:13595: 347.026 purohitaṃ ca kurvīta dhvajāgraṃ ca prakārayet//149//
S01divyav_u:13597: 347.028 na ca rogo na cauraśca kṣemaṃ cātra sadā bhavet//150//
S01divyav_u:13600: 347.031 āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca mahābhogaḥ prajāyate//151// puṣye//
S01divyav_u:13613: 348.013 saṃgrāmaṃ jīyate tatra yadi pūrvaṃ pravartate/
S01divyav_u:13614: 348.014 dāruṇāni ca karmāṇi tāni vidvān vivarjayet//157// maghāsu//
S01divyav_u:13620: 348.020 bhāgam ye copajīvanti teṣāṃ karma prayojayet//160//
S01divyav_u:13623: 348.023 naṣṭaṃ viddhaṃ kṛtaṃ cāpi na tadastīti nirdiśet//161// pūrvaphalgunyām//
S01divyav_u:13626: 348.026 athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā sarvamastīti nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:13631: 348.031 cauryaṃ ca sidhyate tatra tacca vidvān vivarjayet//165//
S01divyav_u:13636: 349.005 rājānaṃ bhūṣitaṃ paśyet senāvyūhaṃ ca darśayet//167//
S01divyav_u:13637: 349.006 hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ dravyaṃ nagarāṇi ca māpayet/
S01divyav_u:13639: 349.008 gaṇakānāṃ ca vidyāṃ ca vādyaṃ nartanagāyanam/
S01divyav_u:13670: 350.008 kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ ca sarvakarmāṇi kārayet//181//
S01divyav_u:13672: 350.010 āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca vidvatsu ca kutūhalī//182//
S01divyav_u:13680: 350.018 ṛṇaṃ vai yatpurāṇaṃ syādartho vāsyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13683: 350.021 nadīṣu snapanaṃ caiva mūle sarvān prayojayet//187//
S01divyav_u:13687: 350.025 athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā naitadastīti nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:13689: 350.027 āṣāḍhāyāṃ ca pūrvasyāṃ saritaśca sarāṃsi ca/
S01divyav_u:13691: 350.029 utpādyāni ca puṣpāṇi tathā mūlaphalāni ca/
S01divyav_u:13693: 350.031 yāni cogrāṇi karmāṇi sidhyantyatra tu tāni ca//191//
S01divyav_u:13700: 351.007 śreṇībandhaṃ ca rājā tu samayaṃ cātra kārayet//194//
S01divyav_u:13705: 351.012 abhijiti na kurvīta brahmadevasya hyarcanam//197// abhijiti//
S01divyav_u:13706: 351.013 śravaṇe na ca kurvīta sarvāḥ saṃgrāmikāḥ kriyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13707: 351.014 gītaśikṣādhyayanaṃ ca na cireṇa hi sidhyati//198//
S01divyav_u:13713: 351.020 naṣṭaṃ ca labhyate tatra śravaṇasthe niśākare//201// śravaṇe//
S01divyav_u:13718: 351.025 medhāvī ca yaśasvī ca mahābhogī mahādhanaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13720: 351.027 naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ praviddhaṃ vā kleśenaivātra labhyate/
S01divyav_u:13721: 351.028 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya vidyāccātra suvṛṣṭitām//205// dhaniṣṭhāyām//
S01divyav_u:13727: 352.004 ādeyaṃ ca tadādadyād vyayaṃ cātra na kārayet//208//
S01divyav_u:13729: 352.006 bhiṣakkarma ca kurvīt bhaiṣajyāni ca saṃharet//209//
S01divyav_u:13730: 352.007 nidhiṃ vā khānayettatra nidadhyādapi vā nidhim/
S01divyav_u:13731: 352.008 dhanaṃ cātra prayuñjīt bhiṣakkarma ca śikṣayet//210//
S01divyav_u:13737: 352.014 dīrghaśrotro mahābhogo jñātīnāṃ ca sadā priyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13739: 352.016 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya caṇḍāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ samādiśet//213// pūrvabhādrapade//
S01divyav_u:13740: 352.017 uttarasyāṃ tu kurvīt āyuṣyaṃ puṣṭikarma ca/
S01divyav_u:13741: 352.018 na ca dakṣiṇato gacchetpuraṃ cātra pradāpayet//214//
S01divyav_u:13743: 352.020 atrāpi triguṇaṃ vindedādānam yadi vā vyayam/
S01divyav_u:13746: 352.023 koṣṭhāgārāṇi kurvīt kiṇvaṃ cātra na kārayet//216//
S01divyav_u:13747: 352.024 surākarma ca kurvīd dhiraṇyaṃ govrajāni ca/
S01divyav_u:13756: 353.002 yānāni ca hayān damyān dantinaśca prayojayet//220//
S01divyav_u:13763: 353.009 bhṛtiṃ copanayedatra bhāryāṃ ca na vivāhayet/
S01divyav_u:13770: 353.016 teṣāṃ madhye yadā sarve śasyānyoṣadhayo 'pi ca/
S01divyav_u:13774: 353.020 catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi dhruvāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13782: yāni cānyāni uktāni karmāṇi tāni kārayet/
S01divyav_u:13783: 353.023 atha naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ cāpi hṛtaṃ ca vā/
S01divyav_u:13785: 353.025 athātra jāto dhanyo 'sau vidyātmā ca yaśasvī ca/
S01divyav_u:13787: 353.027 catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi kṣiprāṇi bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13790: svādhyāyaṃ mantrasamārambhaṃ pravāsaprasthānaṃ gāśca turaṅgānapyatra yojayet/
S01divyav_u:13794: athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā, svasti bhaviṣyatīti vaktavyam//
S01divyav_u:13798: 354.004 kṣatriyaṃ dānaśīlaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ ca purohitam//231// iti//
S01divyav_u:13799: 354.005 pañca khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi dāruṇāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13801: 354.006 maghā trīṇi ca pūrvāṇi bharaṇī ceti pañcamī/
S01divyav_u:13802: 354.007 athātra dagdhaṃ naṣṭaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā na bhaviṣyati//232//
S01divyav_u:13805: tadyathā--ārdrā āśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā bharaṇī ceti/
S01divyav_u:13810: kṛttikā ca maghā mūlā trīṇi pūrvāṇi/
S01divyav_u:13812: mṛgaśirā puṣyā hastā citrā anurādhā śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā revatī aśvinī ceti imāni nava nakṣatrāṇi pañcādbhāgīyāni triṃśanmuhūrtayogāni kṣetrāṇi ca//
S01divyav_u:13813: 354.014 api ca brāhmaṇa śubhāśca muhūrtā bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:13816: 354.015 saṃprayuktanakṣatreṣu sarveṣu yadā śubhamuhūrtasamāpattayo bhavanti, tadā śobhanā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13817: 354.016 yadā aśubhamuhūrtasamāpattayo bhavanti, tadā na śobhanā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13818: yadā tu punaḥ śubhāścāśubhāśca samāpattayo, tadā sādhāraṇā bhavanti//
S01divyav_u:13819: 354.018 athātra kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhirvā bhavatīti taducyate/
S01divyav_u:13820: varṣāṇāṃ prathame māse puṣyanakṣatramamāvāsyāṃ bhavati, śravaṇā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:13826: varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse maghā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, bhādrapadā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:13832: 354.024 varṣāṇāṃ tṛtīye māse phalgunyamāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, aśvinī pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:13838: varṣāṇāṃ caturthe māse citrā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, kṛttikā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:13844: 354.030 hemantānāṃ prathame māse 'nurādhā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, mṛgaśirā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:13850: hemantānāṃ dvitīye māse amāvāsyāyāṃ jyeṣṭhā bhavati, puṣyaḥ pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:13856: 355.004 hemantānāṃ tṛtīye māse pūrvāṣāḍhā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, maghā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:13862: hemantānāṃ caturthe māse śravaṇā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13869: 355.010 grīṣmāṇāṃ prathame māse uttarabhādrapadā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, citrā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:13882: grīṣmāṇāṃ tṛtīye māse kṛttikā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, jyeṣṭhā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:13888: 355.018 grīṣmāṇāṃ caturthe māse mṛgaśirā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati, uttarāṣāḍhā pūrṇamāsyām/
S01divyav_u:13910: 355.029 candra ādityaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro 'ṅgārako budhaśca ime grahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13913: 355.031 bharaṇī kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā etatsādhāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:13914: ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣyo 'śleṣā etatsādhāraṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:13915: 355.032 maghā atha phalgunadvayaṃ hastā citrā etatsādhāraṇam [356]tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:13916: 356.001 svātī viśākhā anurādhā etatsādhāraṇaṃ caturthaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:13917: jyeṣṭhā mūlāṣāḍhā dvayamatra sarvāṇi mahābhayāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13919: abhijicchravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ubhe bhādrapade caitatsādhāraṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:13922: tasya tasya janapadasya sattvasya vā pīḍā nirdeṣṭavyā//
S01divyav_u:13923: 356.006 dvādaśa muhūrtāni divase dhruvāṇi, dvādaśa rātrau/
S01divyav_u:13925: katame ṣaṭ? nairṛto varuṇo vāyavo bhargodevo raudro vicārī ca/
S01divyav_u:13927: 356.008 athātra śrāvaṇe māse pūrṇe 'ṣṭādaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye ca caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13928: 356.009 rohitasya ca muhūrtasya balasya cāntare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13929: sūryāvatāre tu vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13930: 356.010 dvādaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye ṣaṣṭhe muhūrte nayamano nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13932: bhādrapade māse pūrṇe saptadaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye ca caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13935: trayodaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13936: 356.014 ardharātre mahābhayo vāyavo nāma muhūrto bhavati//
S01divyav_u:13938: āśvayuje māse pūrṇe ṣoḍaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13940: samudgatasya ca muhūrtasya abhijitasya tvantare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13942: 356.018 caturdaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye raudro nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13943: abhijitasya ca muhūrtasya bhīṣamāṇasya ca muhūrtasya antareṇārdharātraṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13947: 356.022 samāne 'horātre sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13950: rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye bhargodevo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13953: 356.026 mārgaśīrṣe māse ca pūrṇe caturdaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāṃ muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13954: 356.027 viratasya saṃmukhasya ca muhūrtasyāntare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13956: 356.028 ṣoḍaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye saṃtāpanaḥ samyamo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13959: 357.001 [357]pauṣamāse pūrṇe trayodaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13962: saptadaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye varuṇo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13965: 357.005 māghamāse pūrṇe dvādaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13966: sāvitrasya ca viratasya ca muhūrtasyāntareṇa madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13968: 357.007 aṣṭādaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye nairṛto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13969: gardabhasya muhūrtasya ca rākṣasasya cāntaramardharātraṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:13977: evameteṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ muhūrtānāṃ caritaṃ vicaritaṃ ca jñātavyam//
S01divyav_u:13979: 357.012 yathāmadhyaṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rātrivaśena divasavaśena cotkarṣāpakarṣau kartavyau/
S01divyav_u:13980: hīyamāne vardhamāne vā divase vā māse vā pūrṇe 'rdhamāse vā/
S01divyav_u:13981: 357.013 dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī navamī dvādaśī caturdaśī atrāntare divase kalā vardhate, rātrau kalā hīyate//
S01divyav_u:13986: 357.019 trayastu te yatra bhavanti pakṣe ṣaḍekamāse tu bhavanti vegāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13987: 357.021 parasya cakrasya nidarśanaṃ syātprakampate yatra mahī tvabhīkṣṇam//235//
S01divyav_u:13993: 357.028 adhyardhaṃ phalgune māse caitre triṃśattu rātrayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13995: 357.030 yadā sarveṣu māseṣu satataṃ kampate mahī/
S01divyav_u:13996: 357.031 vṛkṣāstathā calanti sma jalam yadi kampate/
S01divyav_u:13998: 358.001 [358]nagarāṇyatha vā grāmā ghoṣā ye cātra saṃśritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14000: 358.003 aṭavyaḥ saṃpravartante daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca/
S01divyav_u:14006: 358.009 ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye ca taṃ grāmamāśritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14009: 358.012 proptaṃ śasyaṃ na roheta bhavet phalasya kṛcchratā//245//
S01divyav_u:14010: 358.013 gurviṇīnāṃ ca nārīṇāṃ garbho nipīḍyate bhṛśam/
S01divyav_u:14020: 358.023 kūpakhāḥ parikhākhāśca pāpakā ye ca taskarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14032: 359.005 kīṭāḥ pipīlikāḥ śvānā ekakhurāśca ye mṛgāḥ//256//
S01divyav_u:14033: 359.006 vaidyā viṣakarāścāpi ye ca sattvā darīśrayāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14036: 359.009 ye ca śrāddhā nivartante samājā utsavāstathā/
S01divyav_u:14038: 359.011 ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye cānye 'pyagrapaṇḍitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14039: 359.012 gandharvāśca vinaśyanti narā ye ca mahākulāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14044: 359.017 dharme ratā āsanikā ye ca śulkopajīvinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14055: 359.028 kumāryaḥ sarvaratnaṃ ca sasyānāṃ bījakaiḥ saha//266//
S01divyav_u:14074: 360.017 grahāśrayāḥ piśācāśca ye ca sattvā darīśrayāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14107: 361.020 dharme ratāśca ye siddhā ye ca śauktikakarmiṇaḥ//289//
S01divyav_u:14111: 361.024 grāmaghātāśca vartante grāmo grāmaṃ ca hiṃsati//291//
S01divyav_u:14116: 361.029 yā cātra garbhamādhatte ye ca jātāśca tāniha/
S01divyav_u:14141: 362.024 anulomaṃ ca samyānti carantaḥ paścimāṃ diśam//304//
S01divyav_u:14147: 362.030 sthāpyante tatra bījāni niṃne naśyanti vai tadā//307//
S01divyav_u:14152: 363.005 dṛśyate kapilā saṃdhyā candrasūryau tu lohitau/
S01divyav_u:14155: 363.008 na tatra pravasetprājña ātmānaṃ cātra gopayet//311//
S01divyav_u:14162: 363.015 saṃdhyā ca lohitā bhāti candrasūryau tu lohitau/
S01divyav_u:14165: 363.018 dṛśyante dhūmaśikharāḥ śastraṃ ca svidyate bhṛśam//316//
S01divyav_u:14166: 363.019 vīṇāśca divi dṛśyante nava māsānna varṣati/
S01divyav_u:14168: 363.021 jayati ahani pūrve kṣatriyān pārthivāṃśca hayagajarathamukhyān mantriṇo madhyamāhne/
S01divyav_u:14169: 363.023 vyathayati aparāhṇe gopaśūn vaiśyaśūdrān pradahati niśisaṃdhyā taskarānantavāsān//318//
S01divyav_u:14170: 363.025 rajanimiha pradoṣe hiṃsate mlecchasaṃghān striyamapi ca napuṃsaścārdharātreṣvanantān/
S01divyav_u:14171: 363.027 kṛṣivaṇigupajīvyān hanti yāme tṛtīye vyathayati surapakṣaṃ raudrakarmāntakṛṣṇe//319//
S01divyav_u:14172: 363.029 pradahati śaśipakṣe yājñikaṃ brahmakṣatra śrapayati śucivṛttāneva dharme pradhānān/
S01divyav_u:14173: 363.031 viduṣi ca mṛdubhāvaṃ vindate yo hyadhīte sa bhavati nṛpapūjyo brāhmaṇo vedadarśī//320//
S01divyav_u:14178: 364.005 atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn abhiṣāmaṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rogotpattiṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāmi/
S01divyav_u:14181: 364.007 kṛttikāsūtthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14183: 364.009 agnirhi devatā tatra dadhnā hyasya baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14185: 364.011 rohiṇyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14191: 364.017 somo hi devatā tatra maṇḍena tu baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14193: 364.019 ārdrāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14195: 364.021 rudro hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14197: 364.023 punarvasau bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14201: 364.027 puṣye samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14205: 365.001 [365]āśleṣāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14206: 365.002 na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu sarpastatra tu daivataḥ//334//
S01divyav_u:14207: 365.003 maghāsamutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14211: 365.007 pūrvaphālgunijo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14215: 365.011 uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14216: 365.012 na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu bhago 'pyatra tu devatā//339//
S01divyav_u:14217: 365.013 hastenāpyutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya va/
S01divyav_u:14221: 365.017 citrāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14223: 365.019 tvaṣṭā hi devatā tatra ghṛtamudgairbaliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14225: 365.021 svātyāṃ samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya/
S01divyav_u:14229: 365.025 viśākhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14233: 365.029 anurādhotthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14235: 366.001 [366]mitro hi devatā tatra ghṛtapātraṃ baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14237: 366.003 jyeṣṭhāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14239: 366.005 indro hi devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14241: 366.007 mūle samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14245: 366.011 pūrvāṣāḍhe bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14247: 366.013 āpo hi devatāstatra kṛsareṇa baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14249: 366.015 uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14251: 366.017 viśvo hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14253: 366.019 abhijidutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14255: 366.021 viṣṇuśca devatā tatra dadhimaṇḍaṃ baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14257: 366.023 śravaṇenotthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14258: 366.024 guruko hi bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇaṃ dvādaśamāsikam//360//
S01divyav_u:14261: 366.027 dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14263: 366.029 varuṇo devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14267: 367.003 uttarābhādrajo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14271: 367.007 revatyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14273: 367.009 pūṣā hi devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14275: 367.011 aśvinyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14277: 367.013 gandharvo devatā tatra yāvakena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:14279: 367.015 bharaṇyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:14280: 367.016 na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu yamastatra tu daivataḥ/
S01divyav_u:14281: 367.017 śīlaṃ rakṣatu medhāvī tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati//370//
S01divyav_u:14283: 367.019 ayaṃ khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin bandhananirmokṣaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:14286: 367.021 kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin baddho vā ruddho vā trirātreṇa mokṣyatīti vaktavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14287: rohiṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā trirātreṇa mokṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:14288: 367.022 mṛgaśirasi baddho vā ruddho vā ekaviṃśatirātreṇa mokṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:14289: 367.023 ārdrāyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā ardhamāsena mokṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:14290: punarvassau ruddho vā baddho vā saptarātreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14302: śravaṇe dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ śatabhiṣāyāṃ pūrvabhādrapade uttarabhādrapade revatyāṃ caturdaśarātreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14304: bharaṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā parikleśamāvāpsyatīti vaktavyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:14309: 368.001 [368]mūrdhni tu yasyāstilako 'sti sūkṣmaḥ knigdho bhavet padmasamānavarṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14310: 368.003 rājā tu tasyā bhavatīha bhartā stanopariṣṭātpratibimbamāhuḥ//372//
S01divyav_u:14311: 368.005 śīrṣe tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syāt sūkṣmo bhavedañjanacūrṇavarṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14312: 368.007 senāpatistasyā bhaveddhi bhartā stanāntare 'syāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//373//
S01divyav_u:14313: 368.009 bhruvontare 'syāstilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:14314: 368.011 pañcaiva tasyāḥ patayo bhavanti bahvannapānaṃ labhate nārī//374//
S01divyav_u:14315: 368.013 gaṇḍasya nāsādikamadhyadeśe bhavecca bimbaṃ tilakasya yasyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14316: 368.015 tāṃ śokabhājaṃ pramadāṃ vadanti romapradeśe pratibimbamāhuḥ//375//
S01divyav_u:14317: 368.017 karṇe tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syād bahuśrutāṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:14318: 368.019 bahuśrutāṃ tāṃ śrutidhāriṇīṃ ca trike tu yasyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//376//
S01divyav_u:14319: 368.021 yasyottaroṣṭhe tilakālakaḥ syāttāṃ bhinnasatyāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:14320: 368.023 kṛcchreṇa sā vai labhate hi vṛttimūrau tu tasyāstilabimbamāhuḥ//377//
S01divyav_u:14321: 368.025 yasyādharoṣṭhe tilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:14322: 368.027 miṣṭānnapānaṃ bahu ṛcchate sā tathā hi guhye pratibimbakaṃ syāt//378//
S01divyav_u:14323: 368.029 cibuke tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:14324: 368.031 miṣṭānnapānaṃ bahu sā labheta guhye dvitīyaṃ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//379//
S01divyav_u:14326: 369.001 [369]atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrajanmaguṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:14332: 369.006 vyavasāyī sthiraḥ śūro dhruvaṃ cāsya sadā sukham//381//
S01divyav_u:14333: 369.007 jāto mṛgaśire yastu mṛduḥ saumyastu mānavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14344: 369.018 dhanavān dhānyavān bhogī maghāsu puruṣo bhavet//387//
S01divyav_u:14347: 369.021 uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ jāto bhavati bhogavān/
S01divyav_u:14353: 369.027 svātyāṃ ca puruṣo jāto bandhuślāghī vicakṣaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14358: 369.032 śuciścaiva kṛtajñaśca dharmātmā ca bhavecca saḥ//394//
S01divyav_u:14362: 370.004 dṛḍho vīro bhaveccāsau kilbiṣī ca sa mānavaḥ//396//
S01divyav_u:14366: 370.008 viśvadaive naro jāto bhavedapi ca niścitaḥ//398//
S01divyav_u:14367: 370.009 ācāryaḥ śāstrakartā ca viścvāsī ca kriyāparaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14368: 370.010 śravaṇe jāta āyuṣmāñ śrīmāṃśca puruṣo bhavet//399//
S01divyav_u:14371: 370.013 vāruṇe yadi nakṣatre jāto bhavati mānavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14389: 371.004 māghasya prathame pakṣe śailo vā pārthivo yadi/
S01divyav_u:14396: 371.011 phālgune kṛttikāyāṃ tu āditye parikho yadi/
S01divyav_u:14397: 371.012 naśyanti karvaṭāstatra yadi devo na varṣati//411//
S01divyav_u:14398: 371.013 caitramāse yadā puṣye sūrye kṛṣṇaṃ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:14410: 371.025 māse 'tha śrāvaṇe mūle candrasūryau na bhāsataḥ/
S01divyav_u:14417: 372.002 rājñāṃ vidyāddhatānāṃ vai bhūmiḥ pāsyati śoṇitam//421//
S01divyav_u:14418: 372.003 bharaṇyaṃ māghamāse tu kṛṣṇo vāyuḥ samutthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14420: 372.005 māse tu phālgune vāyuḥ pāṃśuvarṣaṃ savidyutam/
S01divyav_u:14432: 372.017 śrāvaṇe vāyavaḥ pītāḥ sadā kṛṣṇaṃ nabhastalam/
S01divyav_u:14443: 372.028 aśvinyāṃ viṣaye tatra prajā śvāsena vadhyate//434//
S01divyav_u:14444: 372.029 māse tu phālgune yatra agnivarṣaṃ nabhastalāt/
S01divyav_u:14446: 372.031 svātyāṃ caitre yadā varṣaṃ niruddhaṃ vātavarṣitam/
S01divyav_u:14450: 373.003 āṣāḍhe māsi puṇye 'tha dṛśyante vyoṃni vidyutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14452: 373.005 śrāvaṇe tu yadā mūle bahu devaḥ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:14454: 373.007 māse bhādrapade yatra nirghātaḥ patati kṣitau/
S01divyav_u:14456: 373.009 māse bhādrapade puṣye vidigbhyo niścared dhvaniḥ/
S01divyav_u:14457: 373.010 kṣatriyaḥ kupyate kṣipraṃ vipakṣā tu tadā prajā//441//
S01divyav_u:14460: 373.013 kārtike tu yadārdrāyāṃ śabdaḥ śrūyeta bhairavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14464: 373.017 pauṣamāse yadā svātyāṃ śabdo bhavati bhairavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14466: 373.019 māghe śukle tu nirghāto nityaṃ śāmyedvasuṃdharām/
S01divyav_u:14472: 373.025 pūrvāyāṃ cedāṣāḍhāyāṃ rātrau caitre ca niścalet/
S01divyav_u:14475: 373.028 anāvṛṣṭyā tu durbhikṣaṃ māsān ṣaṭ tatra nirdiśet//450//
S01divyav_u:14476: 373.029 jyeṣṭhe māse bharaṇyāṃ tu divā kampedvasuṃdharā/
S01divyav_u:14478: 373.031 jyeṣṭhe māse yadā mūle rātrau bhūmiḥ prakampate/
S01divyav_u:14479: 373.032 pratyanto vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre baliṃ samādiśet//452//
S01divyav_u:14481: 374.002 śasyaṃ vinaśyate tatra kalikarma ca jāyate//453//
S01divyav_u:14482: 374.003 prakampante yadā caityā ārdrāyāṃ vā maghāsu vā/
S01divyav_u:14484: 374.005 caityā yatra prakampante hasanti ca namanti ca/
S01divyav_u:14487: 374.008 sadā parājito rājā caurai rāṣṭre ca vadhyate//456//
S01divyav_u:14489: 374.010 dvāraṃ vā nagarasyātha bhūyiṣṭhaṃ naśyate prajā//457//
S01divyav_u:14490: 374.011 vāme vā dakṣiṇe cendoḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhed bṛhaspatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:14495: 374.016 jñeyaṃ rogabhayaṃ ghoraṃ durbhikṣaṃ cātra nirdiśet//460//
S01divyav_u:14498: 374.019 yasya caivātha nakṣare śaśī sūryo vigṛhyate/
S01divyav_u:14500: 374.021 rājño vai cātha nakṣatre candraṃ keturyadā viśet/
S01divyav_u:14508: 374.029 maghāyāṃ lohitāṅgo vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:14513: 375.002 somo vā raviṇā sārdhaṃ paracakrabhayaṃ tadā//469//
S01divyav_u:14514: 375.003 kākāḥ śyenāśca gṛdhrāśca vaseyuḥ sahitā mudā/
S01divyav_u:14515: 375.004 maithunaṃ vāritaṃ veyuḥ paraiḥ saha raṇastadā//470//
S01divyav_u:14517: 375.006 paracakreṇa yuddhaṃ tu bhaveccāpi punaḥ punaḥ//471//
S01divyav_u:14520: 375.009 garbhasthā dārakā yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca/
S01divyav_u:14525: 375.014 pramadā yatra deśe tu rājā tatra vinaśyati//475//
S01divyav_u:14527: 375.016 pramadā yatra sūyante rāṣṭraṃ tatra vinaśyati//476//
S01divyav_u:14529: 375.018 dvitriśīrṣāḥ prasūyante deśe yatra sa naśyati//477//
S01divyav_u:14531: 375.020 jāyante yatra deśe tu sa deśo laghu naśyati//478//
S01divyav_u:14535: 375.024 rājā vā rājāmātyo vā saha deśena naśyati//480//
S01divyav_u:14538: 375.027 saukareṇa tu vaktreṇa śarīraṃ mānuṣam yadi/
S01divyav_u:14539: 375.028 sūtaṃ caturdiśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hanyāttatra na saṃśayaḥ//482//
S01divyav_u:14540: 375.029 ādityasya tu rūpeṇa mānuṣo yatra jāyate/
S01divyav_u:14543: 376.002 dṛṣṭaḥ pravyāharan vedān kṣipraṃ deśo vinaśyati//484//
S01divyav_u:14544: 376.003 kukṣiṃ bhittvā yadā bālo garbhānniṣkramate svayam/
S01divyav_u:14545: 376.004 atrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ kṛtvā sa deśo naśyate laghu//485//
S01divyav_u:14553: 376.012 sa jano jāyate yatra rāṣṭraṃ sādhipatiṃ dahet//489//
S01divyav_u:14555: 376.014 śuṣyeta sakalaṃ śasyaṃ janaśca vilayaṃ vrajet//490//
S01divyav_u:14557: 376.016 svayaṃ kṣubhyeta tadrāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ//491//
S01divyav_u:14558: 376.017 phale phalam yadā paśyetpuṣpe vā puṣpamāśritam/
S01divyav_u:14560: 376.019 akāle pādapā yatra puṣpyanti ca phalanti ca/
S01divyav_u:14561: 376.020 latā gulmo 'tha vallī vā deśe tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//493//
S01divyav_u:14564: 376.023 vṛkṣāṇāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vā chāyā na parivartate/
S01divyav_u:14568: 376.027 anāvartam yadā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ cāpi pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:14569: 376.028 vināśaṃ tasya deśasya durbhikṣaṃ kalahaṃ vadet//497//
S01divyav_u:14574: 377.003 kampate rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:14576: 377.005 devatā yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca/
S01divyav_u:14578: 377.007 devatā yatra krīḍanti jvalanti nimiṣanti vā/
S01divyav_u:14581: 377.010 nimajjate dharaṇyāṃ vā dhruvaṃ rājavadho bhavet//503//
S01divyav_u:14585: 377.014 amātyo hanti rājānaṃ kalahaṃ cātra nirdiśet//505//
S01divyav_u:14586: 377.015 vamanti rudhiraṃ kanyā namante vā diśo daśa/
S01divyav_u:14592: 377.021 indurvā dīpavṛkṣo vā dīpo yatra na dīpyate/
S01divyav_u:14595: 377.024 astraṃ vāpi gṛhaṃ dahyād rājño vyasanamādiśet//510//
S01divyav_u:14597: 377.026 puri caityacchāyāyāṃ vā rājārthe patitā hi sā//511//
S01divyav_u:14599: 377.028 vāyasaḥ kurute nīḍaṃ sāmātyo dhvaṃsate nṛpaḥ//512//
S01divyav_u:14608: 378.007 vidyucca patate ghorā karakāṇāṃ ca varṣaṇam/
S01divyav_u:14613: 378.012 gaganaṃ dahyate tatra lokapīḍā jvareṇa ca//519//
S01divyav_u:14618: 378.017 nāpsu majjati nāpyagnau pūrvavacca na dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:14622: 378.021 jalaṃ jājvalyamānaṃ tu matsyo nirdahati svayam/
S01divyav_u:14623: 378.022 anāvṛṣṭiṃ tadā brūyād durbhikṣaṃ ca mahadbhayam//524//
S01divyav_u:14625: 378.024 cakradvaye 'pi durbhikṣaṃ rāṣṭre rogaṃ ca nirdiśet//525//
S01divyav_u:14626: 378.025 triśīrṣaḥ pañcaśīrṣo vā yadā sarpo 'tha dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:14636: 379.005 kākaḥ śyenaśca gṛdhro vā yasya nīyeta mūrdhani/
S01divyav_u:14651: 379.020 pādena karṣate śīghram yuddhe rājavadho dhruvam//538//
S01divyav_u:14652: 379.021 kākaśced gṛhamāruhya hā putra iti vāśati/
S01divyav_u:14654: 379.023 anagnau jāyate dhūmaḥ sthale padmāni vā yadā/
S01divyav_u:14666: 380.005 narāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ ca ratiharṣo na jāyate/
S01divyav_u:14667: 380.006 sarvatra śokacintā vā mahattatra bhayaṃ bhavet//546//
S01divyav_u:14669: 380.008 nadīṃ bhittvā nikuñjān vā sa deśo naśyate 'cirāt//547//
S01divyav_u:14672: 380.011 matsyāḥ kūrmāśca sarpāśca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14674: 380.013 apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra sthale vāriṇi eva vā/
S01divyav_u:14681: kathayatu bhagavān--atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣapinyādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāmi/
S01divyav_u:14684: 380.020 aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi prakīrtitāni, yāni candrasūryaniḥsṛtānyanuvahanti/
S01divyav_u:14685: 380.021 tatra sukugṛṣṭyā aṣṭāṅgalapramāṇayā dvādaśākṣagṛṣṭayaḥ svaśarīraṃ dairdhyeṇa jñātavyam//
S01divyav_u:14687: caturdaśagṛṣṭayo nakṣatrāṇāṃ padam yatra saṃdṛśyante, tadanyathā na bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14688: 380.023 nakṣatre yatra yo jātastatra tatra saṃdṛśyate//
S01divyav_u:14690: 380.025 kṛttikāyāṃ hi jātasya mukhe vai caturaṅgalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14692: 380.027 bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ piṇḍato jvalati śriyā/
S01divyav_u:14694: 380.029 dṛśyate vraṇa evāyam yasya vai caturaṅgalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14695: 380.030 rohiṇyāṃ jātakaḥ so 'pi vidvān dharmarataḥ sadā//554//
S01divyav_u:14700: 381.003 ardhadvitīyagṛṣṭyā tu pinyo vāme hi yasya tu/
S01divyav_u:14701: 381.004 ārdrāyāṃ krodhano jāto mūrkho gopatikaśca saḥ//557//
S01divyav_u:14702: 381.005 vāme kakṣe vraṇo yasya kṛṣṇaścaiva punarvasau/
S01divyav_u:14705: 381.008 cakramadhye ca haste ca sūryaścandro virājate//559//
S01divyav_u:14710: 381.013 adha urasi pṛṣṭhe vā yasya vraṇaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:14711: 381.014 maghāyāṃ dhanavāñ jāto mahātmā dhārimiko naraḥ//562//
S01divyav_u:14718: 381.021 vyañjane yasya pinyastu dṛśyate niyamena hi/
S01divyav_u:14720: 381.023 vyañjane 'pi ca ūrdhve vā pītaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:14722: 381.025 kugṛṣṭyā yasya ūrubhyāṃ pinyo lohita eva hi/
S01divyav_u:14728: 382.001 [382]adho yasyeha corubhyāṃ pinyo jyeṣṭhe sa jāyate/
S01divyav_u:14736: 382.009 dvitīyaḥ pinyo dṛśyeta dhanavān bhogavān sadā/
S01divyav_u:14738: 382.011 dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca jaṅghāyām yasya pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:14740: 382.013 dvikugṛṣṭyā ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:14741: 382.014 mūrkhaḥ śatabhiṣāyāṃ tu mriyate hyudakena saḥ//577//
S01divyav_u:14742: 382.015 adho jaṅghāṃ kugṛṣṭyā tu pūrvabhādrapade vraṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14746: 382.019 ubhayoḥ pādayoḥ sūkṣmaḥ pinyo yasya pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:14747: 382.020 revatyāṃ jāyate nīco nāpitaḥ sa bhavatyapi//580//
S01divyav_u:14755: 382.028 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭakādhyāyaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:14760: 382.032 strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca piṭakaṃ sarvakarmakam//584//
S01divyav_u:14762: 383.002 prājñā yenābhijānanti taṃ ca sarvaṃ nibodhatām//585//
S01divyav_u:14768: 383.008 yadā savarṇapiṭako mūrdhni rājā mahān smṛtaḥ//588//
S01divyav_u:14769: 383.009 śīrṣe tu dhanadhānyābhyāṃ kāntaye subhagāya ca/
S01divyav_u:14773: 383.013 aśrupāto dhruvaṃ śokaḥ śravaṇe goṣu nāśakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14778: 383.018 cibuke hanudeśe ca dhanaṃ gāvaḥ satāṃ śriyaḥ//593//
S01divyav_u:14781: 383.021 jāto 'yaṃ śiraso mūle hanuni ca dhanakṣayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14784: 383.024 pārśve tu sukhaśayyāyai stane tu sutajanyatā//596//
S01divyav_u:14786: 383.026 bāhvoḥ śatruvināśāya yuktaṃ strīlābha eva ca//597//
S01divyav_u:14789: 383.029 saubhagaṃ dhanalābhaṃ ca jātaḥ pāṇau dadāti ca/
S01divyav_u:14790: 383.030 puṣpito hyekadeśe tu daśaneṣu nakheṣu ca//599//
S01divyav_u:14794: 384.004 putrotpattistu vṛṣaṇe liṅge bhāryā tu śobhanā//601//
S01divyav_u:14802: 384.012 maṇibandhe tu piṭako bandhanaṃ nirdiśed dhruvam/
S01divyav_u:14803: 384.013 paribādhaṃ sa labhate bandhanaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ//605//
S01divyav_u:14804: 384.014 pārśve gulphe ca jānīyācchastreṇa maraṇaṃ dhruvam/
S01divyav_u:14808: 384.018 dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ sutā gāvaḥ striyo yānāni cāpnuyāt//607//
S01divyav_u:14809: 384.019 snigdhaṃ snigdheṣu vijñeyaṃ caleṣu ca calaṃ phalam/
S01divyav_u:14810: 384.020 sthānasthe vipulaṃ dadyāt phalaṃ nṛṇāṃ śubhodayam//608//
S01divyav_u:14812: 384.022 puṃsāṃ madhye ye snigdhāśca deśe dakṣiṇataśca ye/
S01divyav_u:14813: 384.023 tathā cābhyantare caiva sthāne tu pratipūjitāḥ//609//
S01divyav_u:14814: 384.024 strīṇāṃ mṛduṣu deśeṣu vaktrānteṣu ca parvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:14815: 384.025 tattvaṃ vijñāya pinyānāṃ sthānaṃ varṇaṃ ca janma ca//610//
S01divyav_u:14816: 384.026 sthānāsthānaṃ ca matimān vikāraṃ gatimeva ca/
S01divyav_u:14818: 384.028 vāmabhāge tu nārīṇāṃ vijñeyāḥ piṭakāḥ śubhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14821: 384.031 yathoktānāṃ ca saṃdhisthāḥ sarve viphaladāḥ smṛtāḥ//613//
S01divyav_u:14826: 385.005 na nakhena na śastreṇa nāyasena kathaṃcana/
S01divyav_u:14829: 385.008 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin svapnādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:14836: 385.013 yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//617//
S01divyav_u:14837: 385.014 yastu paśyati svapnānte rājānaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayam/
S01divyav_u:14838: 385.015 suvarṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ caiva kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//618//
S01divyav_u:14839: 385.016 sārasāṃśca śukān haṃsān krauñjāñ śvetāṃśca pakṣiṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14840: 385.017 yastu paśyati svapne vai kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//619//
S01divyav_u:14841: 385.018 samṛddhāni ca śasyāni navāni surabhīṇi ca/
S01divyav_u:14844: 385.021 yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//621//
S01divyav_u:14845: 385.022 pāṇau pāde 'tha vā jānau śastreṇa dhanuṣāpi vā/
S01divyav_u:14848: 385.025 yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//623//
S01divyav_u:14853: 385.030 goyutaṃ ca rathaṃ svapne hayaṃ vā yo 'bhirohati/
S01divyav_u:14863: 386.009 śuṣkodapānaṃ tu labhate svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayam//630//
S01divyav_u:14865: 386.011 ajāṃ vā paśyataḥ svapne vyādhikleśaṃ vinirdiśet//631//
S01divyav_u:14866: 386.012 kākaṃ śyenamulūkaṃ vā gṛdhraṃ vāpyatha vartakam/
S01divyav_u:14868: 386.014 nagnaṃ paśyati hyātmānaṃ pāṃśunā dhvastameva vā/
S01divyav_u:14871: 386.017 kuśīlāṃścāraṇān dhūrtān svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayam//634//
S01divyav_u:14874: 386.020 dhvajaṃ chatraṃ vitānaṃ vā svapnānte yasya dhāryate/
S01divyav_u:14878: 386.024 manuṣyaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ vā svapnānte grasate yadi/
S01divyav_u:14882: 386.028 prapātaṃ parvataṃ tālaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayam/
S01divyav_u:14889: 387.003 kṛṣṇavastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naram/
S01divyav_u:14891: 387.005 tamasi praviśet svapne śambhorvā cāmaraṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:14892: 387.006 vṛkṣādvā prapatet svapne maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//644//
S01divyav_u:14893: 387.007 vṛkṣaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ vāpi virucam yastu paśyati/
S01divyav_u:14894: 387.008 svapne śīrṣaṃ śarīraṃ vā maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//645//
S01divyav_u:14895: 387.009 devo vā varṣate yatra yatra caivāśaniḥ patet/
S01divyav_u:14897: 387.011 candradityau yadi svapne khaṇḍau bhinnau ca paśyati/
S01divyav_u:14902: 387.016 labdhvā tu puruṣaḥ svapne dhananāśaṃ samarcchati//649//
S01divyav_u:14903: 387.017 gāyantī vā hasantī vā nṛtyantī vā vibudhyate/
S01divyav_u:14909: 387.023 āsane śayane yāne vastre sābharaṇe gṛhe/
S01divyav_u:14914: 387.028 utpadyate dhruvaṃ tasya skandhanyāso na saṃśayaḥ//655//
S01divyav_u:14915: 387.029 abhīkṣṇaṃ varṣate devo jalaṃ pāṃśumathāpi vā/
S01divyav_u:14916: 387.030 aṅgāraṃ vāpi varṣeta maraṇaṃ tatra nirdiśet//656//
S01divyav_u:14922: 388.004 gāyate hasate caiva prahāraṃ tasya nirdiśet//659//
S01divyav_u:14923: 388.005 yaṃ kṛṣṇavasanā nārī ārdrā vā malinātha vā/
S01divyav_u:14925: 388.007 kṛṣṇasārpo yadi svapne hyabhirohati yaṃ naram/
S01divyav_u:14928: 388.010 svapnānte puruṣo yastu bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//662//
S01divyav_u:14933: 388.015 pūtanā vā piśācā vā duścalā malinātha vā/
S01divyav_u:14934: 388.016 evamrūpāṇi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā svapne dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//665//
S01divyav_u:14935: 388.017 susnātaṃ ca suveśaṃ ca sugandhaṃ śuklavāsasam/
S01divyav_u:14936: 388.018 puruṣaṃ vātha nārīṃ vā dṛṣṭvā svapne mahatsukham/
S01divyav_u:14937: 388.019 tṛṇaṃ vṛkṣamatho kāṣṭhaṃ virūḍham yatra dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:14938: 388.020 gṛhe vā yadi vā kṣetre kṣipraṃ dravyakṣayo bhavet//667//
S01divyav_u:14940: 388.022 naro vā labhate nārīṃ nārī vā labhate naram//668//
S01divyav_u:14942: 388.024 svapnānte yastu paśyeta strīlābhaṃ tasya nirdiśet//669//
S01divyav_u:14944: 388.026 narastu labhate bhāryāṃ nārī vā labhate patim//670//
S01divyav_u:14946: 388.028 labdhvā naro labhed bhāryāṃ nārī ca labhate patim//671//
S01divyav_u:14948: 388.030 abhivandeta yā nārī patiṃ sā labhate 'cirāt//672//
S01divyav_u:14954: 389.004 labdhvā nārī tu svapnānte śrīmatputraṃ prasūyate//675//
S01divyav_u:14956: 389.006 svapne yā labhate nārī sāpi putraṃ prasūyate/
S01divyav_u:14957: 389.007 yamaṃ tu bhājanaṃ cāpi yamaṃ tu sā prasūyate///676//
S01divyav_u:14959: 389.009 śuṣkāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā svapne svapakṣamaraṇaṃ bhavet//677//
S01divyav_u:14962: 389.012 badhyante bāhavo yasya cakṣuśca vyākulaṃ bhavet/
S01divyav_u:14964: 389.014 devo vā yadi vā preto nāryā vastraṃ phalāni vā/
S01divyav_u:14966: 389.016 apakṛṣṭo rudan yo vā nagno 'tha malinaḥ kṛśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14968: 389.018 carma yantraṃ gaṇitaṃ vā kīlaṃ vātha kilāṭakam/
S01divyav_u:14969: 389.019 svapne labdhvā ca prāpnu{jānī}yād dhruvaṃ vastrāgamo bhavet//682//
S01divyav_u:14970: 389.020 amānuṣo 'tha rājā vā devaḥ preto 'tha brāhmaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14971: 389.021 svapne yathā te jalpante sa tathārtho bhaviṣyati//683//
S01divyav_u:14975: 389.025 viṣamaṃ vā tathādhvānaṃ chidraṃ vā pratipadyate//685//
S01divyav_u:14976: 389.026 agniṃ prajvalitaṃ taptaṃ śamitvā tu praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:14977: 389.027 gṛhāṇāṃ karaṇaṃ śastaṃ bhedanaṃ na praśasyate//686//
S01divyav_u:14978: 389.028 nirmalaṃ gaganaṃ śastaṃ samedhaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:14983: 390.002 madyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ pānaṃ tu na praśasyate//689//
S01divyav_u:14984: 390.003 pṛthivī haritā śastā vivarṇā na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:14986: 390.005 svapneṣu ruditaṃ śastaṃ hasitaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:14988: 390.007 mālyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ dhāraṇaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:14989: 390.008 gātraṃ vikartitaṃ sādhu prokṣitaṃ na praśasyate//692//
S01divyav_u:14991: 390.010 vyādhito malinaḥ śasto bhūṣito na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:14993: 390.012 dhūmrā ghanā dundubhiśaṅkhaśabdo vāto 'bhravṛṣṭiśca tathā samantāt/
S01divyav_u:14994: 390.014 sarvasthirāṇāṃ ca calaśca yaḥ syādye cāntare doṣakṛtā vikārāḥ//694//
S01divyav_u:14995: 390.016 pūrveṣu rūpeṣu yathāvadiṣṭā rājarṣayo devagaṇāśca sarve/
S01divyav_u:14996: 390.018 yad brāhmaṇa gātravikartanaṃ ca etāni sarvāṇyapi śobhanāni//695//
S01divyav_u:14998: 390.022 gāvaḥ pradānaṃ dvijapūjanaṃ ca duḥsvapnametena parājitaṃ syāt//696//
S01divyav_u:14999: 390.024 devaṃ ca yaṃ bhaktigato manuṣyastaṃ tu parāṃścārcayitum yatena/
S01divyav_u:15000: 390.026 svapnaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā prathame pradoṣe saṃvatsarānte 'sya vipākamāhuḥ//697//
S01divyav_u:15001: 390.028 ṣaṇmāsikam yacca bhaved dvitīye ṣaṭpākṣikam yattu bhavet tṛtīye/
S01divyav_u:15006: 391.006 atha khalu bho puṣkarasārinn aparamapi svapnādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15012: 391.010 nimittam yādṛśam yasya śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ//700//
S01divyav_u:15013: 391.011 jāgrato yadi vā trasto divā svapnāni paśyati/
S01divyav_u:15014: 391.012 na tu bhayaṃ bhavettasya jānīyādeva buddhimān//701//
S01divyav_u:15016: 391.014 svapne tu kalahaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣipraṃ prītirbhaviṣyati//702//
S01divyav_u:15019: 391.017 madhyame bhavate naiva kṣipraṃ bhavati paścime/
S01divyav_u:15025: 391.023 sarvāṇi khalu pānāni madhurāṇi sukhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:15026: 391.024 yastu pibati svapnānte sa ca lābhaiḥ prayujyate//707//
S01divyav_u:15029: 391.027 upari kākā gṛdhrāśca dhāvantyupari yānti ca/
S01divyav_u:15033: 391.031 ekaśca dharaṇau pādo dvitīyaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15037: 392.003 vṛkṣaṃ parvatamāruhya nāgaṃ ca turagaṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:15039: 392.005 yastu svapnāntare paśyet pitṛrn yāniha cānyathā/
S01divyav_u:15040: 392.006 tathā mātā pitā caiva tasya jīvanti te ciram//714//
S01divyav_u:15043: 392.009 anānaṃ codake dṛṣṭvā madhye 'gnau ca vidhāvitam/
S01divyav_u:15073: 393.007 suvarṇaṃ ca tathā rūpyaṃ muktāhāraṃ tathaiva ca/
S01divyav_u:15075: 393.009 bandhanaṃ bahu dṛṣṭvā tu cchedanaṃ kuṭṭanaṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:15082: 393.015 yadi phālgune māse nirghoṣa upari bhavet, manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15084: 393.016 yadi devo garjati, prathamaṃ mahāsasyāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:15087: 393.018 yadi caitre māse devo garjati, tadā sarvasasyamutpattiṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15088: yadi candragraho bhavati, mahān saṃnipāto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15090: yadi nīhāraṃ bhūmiṃ chādayati, subhikṣaṃ codayati//
S01divyav_u:15091: 393.021 yadi vaiśākhe māase devo garjati, subhikṣaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15092: yadi pūrve paścime śaṅkhe candragraho bhavati, kṣemaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15093: 393.022 yadi colkāpāto bhavati, yasmiṃśca janapade nipatati, tatra deśe pradhānapuruṣasya vināśo bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15095: 393.024 yadi jyeṣṭhe māse devo garjati, rogaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15096: yadi sūryagraho bhavati, manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15097: 393.025 pūrve paścime vā śaṅkhe yadi candrasya sūryasya kiṃcinnimittaṃ lakṣyate, tadā kṣemaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15098: 393.026 yadi madhyarātrau candragraho bhavati, manuṣyāṇāmanyonyaghātaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15099: yadi copari nirghoṣo bhavati, adhyakṣapuruṣasya pīḍāṃ codayati, paracakrāgamaṃ ceti//
S01divyav_u:15100: 393.028 āṣāḍhe māse yadi sūryagraho rucirābhāso bhavati, subhikṣaṃ codayati//
S01divyav_u:15103: yadi nīhāraṃ bhūmiṃ chādayati, subhikṣaṃ codayati//
S01divyav_u:15104: 393.031 śrāvaṇamāse yadi sūryagraho bhavati, rājyaṃ parivartate/
