S01divyav_u:15105: yadi candragraho bhavati, prathame māse durbhikṣaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15107: yadi tārakā yatra deśe patanti, [394]tatra yuddhaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15108: 394.001 yadi cātiśayaṃ bhūmicālo bhavati, rogaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15109: yadi nirghoṣo bhavati, tatra gṛhe yo gṛhasvāmī bhavati tasya vināśaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15110: 394.002 atra ca māse 'bhinavaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ na prāvaritavyam/
S01divyav_u:15113: 394.004 yadyāśvayuje māse devo garjati, manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15115: 394.005 yadi pūrve yāme candrasya nimittaṃ dṛśyate, subhikṣaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15118: tatra ca manuṣyā anyonyaṃ vadhayiṣyantīti codayati//
S01divyav_u:15119: 394.008 yadi kārtike māse devo varṣati, mahadākulaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15121: 394.009 yadyekāntarūpaṃ vāto vāti, tatra ca manuṣyā jalena vibhramiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:15123: 394.010 yadi pūrve yāme utpāto bhavati, mahāvarṣaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15126: 394.012 yadi mārgaśīrṣe māsi devo garjati, śasyavināśo bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15128: 394.013 yadi cākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati, yatpūrvabhāgīyā manuṣyāsteṣāmāmayaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15129: yadi bhūmicālo bhavati, yastatra janapade pradhānapuruṣaḥ sa vadhānmokṣyati//
S01divyav_u:15130: 394.015 yadi pauṣe māse devo garjati, prathame janapadanāśo bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15132: 394.016 prathame yāme ca yadi candroparāgo bhavati lohitavarṇaśca dṛśyate, udakāgamaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15135: 394.018 yadi tārakāḥ patantyo vidṛśyante, tatra janapade ākulaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15136: yadyākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati, manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:15138: 394.020 yadyatraiva māse tārakā utsṛṣṭā na candro dṛśyate, sasyaṃ saṃcodayati/
S01divyav_u:15139: yadi bhūmicālo bhavati, mahāmanuṣyasya maraṇaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15144: 394.024 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin khañjarīṭakajñānaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15156: 395.004 kṛkare svalpacelatvaṃ purīṣe tu kṛśaṃ śravaḥ//736//
S01divyav_u:15165: 395.013 amṛtaṃ ca sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā odanaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ//740//
S01divyav_u:15166: 395.014 gavāṃ pṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ siddhiraśvapṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ jayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15168: 395.016 uṣṭrapṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ kleśaḥ śvānapṛṣṭhe ca vidravaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15169: 395.017 pṛṣṭhe ca gardabhasyeha maraṇaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ//742//
S01divyav_u:15170: 395.018 kīle tu maraṇaṃ vidyād yūpāgre ca na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15171: 395.019 kumbhasthāne śmaśāne vā mṛto vā yatra dṛśyate//743//
S01divyav_u:15172: 395.020 antarīkṣe praḍīnaṃ tu aphalaṃ tu vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15176: 395.024 sameṣu samake kṣetre samān varṇān vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15180: 395.028 tāṃ diśaṃ gamanaṃ vidyādyathā tasya tathā punaḥ//746//
S01divyav_u:15181: 395.029 kīṭā vātha pataṅgā vā bhayam yadiha dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:15183: 396.001 [396]apāṃ samīpe gajamastake vā sūryodaye brāhmaṇasaṃnidhau vā/
S01divyav_u:15184: 396.003 mukhyaprakāśe 'pyahimastake vā yaḥ paśyate khañjanakaṃ sa dhanyaḥ//748//
S01divyav_u:15185: 396.005 mātaṅgarājo matimāṃstriśaṅkaḥ provāca tattvaṃ khañjanaṃ ca śāstram/
S01divyav_u:15186: 396.007 snigdhe sarūkṣe viṣame same ca odeśayed doṣaguṇairyathoktaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:15189: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasāriñ śivārutaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15196: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tapasā vīryeṇa ca imaṃ śivārutaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15199: 396.017 yādṛśaṃ ca yathā vāśetteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāśāñ śṛṇotha me/
S01divyav_u:15200: pūrvasyāṃ diśi yadi vāśet, śivā pūrvamukhaṃ sthitvā trīn vārān vāśet, vṛddhiṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15201: 396.018 caturo vārān yadi vāśet, atra maṅgalaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15208: 396.022 dakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇamukhaṃ sthitvā trivārān vāśet, 'atṛ atṛ' kurute maraṇaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15209: 396.023 caturo vārān vāśati, dakṣiṇamukhaṃ sthitvā dakṣiṇāyā eva diśāyāḥ priyasamāgamaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15217: 396.027 paścimāyāṃ paścimābhimukhaṃ sthitvā śivā trivārān vāśati, maraṇaṃ nivadayati/
S01divyav_u:15234: 397.006 diśi vidiśi caiva giriprāgbhāreṣu śikhareṣu nirdeśaṃ taṃ ca śṛṇotha me/
S01divyav_u:15239: na ca śṛgālabhaye śivā (vā)me sameti apramattena smṛtimatā pūjayitavyā śivā nityam/
S01divyav_u:15244: 397.013 adhomukho yadi vāśati, nidhānaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15245: ūrdhvamukho yadi vāśati, varṣāṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15246: 397.014 dvipathe yadi vāśati, pūrvamukhaṃ sthitvā arthalābhaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15248: dvipathe pañcimābhimukho yadi vāśati, kalahaṃ vivādaṃ vigrahaṃ maraṇaṃ ca nviedayati/
S01divyav_u:15249: 397.016 kūpakaṇaṭhake yadi vāśati, arthaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15251: atimṛdukam yadi vāśati, vyādhikaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15252: 397.018 gītahāreṇa yadi vāśati, arthamanarthaṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15253: 397.019 tribhirvārairarthaṃ caturbhiranarthaṃ pañcabhiḥ priyasamāgamaṃ ṣaḍbhirbhojanaṃ saptabhirbhayamaṣṭabhirvigrahaṃ vivādaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:15256: nānāhāre yadi vāśati, mārge saṃsthitasyāpi sarvaṃ vakṣyāmi taṃ śṛṇotha me/
S01divyav_u:15259: 397.023 atha dakṣiṇamukhaṃ vāśati, yā arthasiddhiṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15262: 397.025 atha saṃprasthitasya vāśati, yā purataḥ sthitvā upakleśaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15263: atha dakṣiṇe vāśati, yadi dakṣiṇāmukhā eva diśaḥ karmasiddhiṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15264: 397.026 paścimato yadi vāśati, caurato 'hitamasya duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15265: 397.027 atha mārge vrajato dakṣiṇato vāśati, mahāvyādhimanarthaṃ caurā muṣanti tannivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15266: 397.028 glānasya yadi vāśati, dakṣiṇamukham, "na sa cikitsituṃ śakyo mṛtyudūtena coditah"/
S01divyav_u:15267: 397.029 glānasya yadi vāśati, uttaramukhaṃ sthitvā ārogyadhanalābhaṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15268: 397.030 atha mūrdhnā vāśati, yā upakleśaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15269: atha paścimamukhaṃ sthitvā yā anyonyaṃ vyāharate, yamaśāsanam {nivedayati}/
S01divyav_u:15270: 397.031 nānāhāre yadi vāśati, yā saṃkṣobhaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15272: 398.001 [398]śivā purataḥ puruṣasya mārgaprayātasya yadi vāśati, yā agrataḥ kṣemamārgaṃ vijñāpayati/
S01divyav_u:15276: 398.003 mārge vrajataḥ puruṣasya śivā vāmenāgatya purato vāśati, yā tathā sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijñāpayati/
S01divyav_u:15278: dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ vāmaṃ gatvā vāmataḥ parivarteta "na tanmārgeṇa gantavyaṃ triśaṅkuvacanam yathā"/
S01divyav_u:15279: 398.005 purataḥ śivā gatvā agrataśca niṣīdati, sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijānīyāt/
S01divyav_u:15281: śivā purata āgatya vāmena parivartate, 'bhayametīha' tenāpi bhayaṃ jānīyādvicakṣaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15282: 398.007 senāyāmāvāhitāyāṃ śivā vāśati, paścimaṃ nivartanaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15285: senāyāṃ vrajamānāyāṃ śivā āgacchedagrataḥ senājayaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15287: sārthasya vrajamānasya śivā gacchatyagrataḥ kṣemamārgaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15289: 398.011 puruṣasya pathi vrajato vāmato vāśati, mārgaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15292: pūrveṇottareṇāpi śivā vāśati, kṣemaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15293: 398.013 dakṣiṇe paścime yadi vāśati, yā bhayaṃ tatra nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:15294: 398.014 vāmato na praśaṃsanti tathaiva vidiśāsu ca/
S01divyav_u:15296: 398.016 adharāṃ tu bhayaṃ vakṣye triśaṅkuvacanam yathā//751//
S01divyav_u:15297: 398.017 madhusvarāṃ śivāṃ jñātvā kāle vele upasthite/
S01divyav_u:15299: 398.019 vyādhirupadravāśca, "sarvaṃ tu praśamam yānti triśaṅkuvacanam yathā"/
S01divyav_u:15301: yaḥ śivāyā divaso bhavati, sa divaso jñātavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15325: 399.008 tṛtīya sā lekhā yatra pradeśinyā pravartate/
S01divyav_u:15335: 399.018 dīrghāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dīrghalekhā tu yā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:15339: 399.022 avyakto yavako yatra tatra lagnaṃ vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15341: 399.024 divasaṃ janma nirdiśed rātrau strīsaṃjñako bhavet/
S01divyav_u:15342: 399.025 rātriḥ saṃdhyā samākhyātā bhāgairanyair na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15348: 399.031 yasya syād yavakaścāpi cāpo vā svastikastathā/
S01divyav_u:15349: 399.032 taleṣu yeṣu dṛśyante dhanyante dhanyāste puruṣā hyamī//766//
S01divyav_u:15355: 400.006 preṣkyante śākhayā pañca haste catvāra eva ca/
S01divyav_u:15356: 400.007 kṣatriyo vā bhaved bhogī rājabhiścāpi satkṛtaḥ//769//
S01divyav_u:15357: 400.008 vaiśyo 'tha kṣatriyo vāgmī dhanadhānyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15360: 400.011 viśīlaḥ śīlakuñco vā bahubhir na bahustathā//771//
S01divyav_u:15361: 400.012 śyāmavarṇātha bhinnā vā sā lekhā duḥkhabhāginī/
S01divyav_u:15362: 400.013 trilekhā yasya dṛśyante yasya pūrṇāḥ karasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15365: 400.016 taleṣu yasya dṛśyante taṃ vidyāt pṛthivīpatim//773//
S01divyav_u:15367: 400.019 matsyo nu pānāya yavo dhanāya vedistu yajñāya gavāṃ ca goṣṭhaḥ//774//
S01divyav_u:15368: 400.021 anāmikāparva atikramed yadi kaniṣṭhikā varṣaśataṃ sa jīvati/
S01divyav_u:15369: 400.023 same tvaśītirvarṣāṇi saptabhiryathā nadīnāṃ bharitāya nirdiśed//775//
S01divyav_u:15370: 400.025 śarīravarṇaprabhavāṃ tu lekhāṃ savaiśikhāṃ varṇavihīnakāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:15375: 401.003 dvirapi ca {sa} bhavāntare mahātmā vipuladhanaśriya āha vastralābhaḥ//778//
S01divyav_u:15376: 401.005 dadati satatamunnatastu pāṇirbhavati cirāya tu dīrghapīnapāṇiḥ/
S01divyav_u:15383: 401.019 iha hi bahudhano balena yuktaḥ sutanususaṃcitapāṇirekhako yaḥ//782//
S01divyav_u:15384: 401.021 dhanamupanayatīha pāṇilekhā kṛtajanitā jalavacca yā sudīrghā/
S01divyav_u:15387: 401.027 balipuruṣamapi tyajeddhi vittaṃ ditavivaśā (?) ca viśīrṇavarṇalekhā//784//
S01divyav_u:15388: 401.029 apagataghṛtavarṇapāṇilekho bhavati naro dhanavān balena yuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15393: 402.006 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasarutaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15401: 402.010 jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva lābhālābhaṃ tathaiva ca//787//
S01divyav_u:15404: 402.013 devāḥ pravadanti śreṣṭhā vāyasānāṃ namo namaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15411: 402.020 asūpaṃ nirdiśed bhojyaṃ guḍamiśraṃ tu gorasam//782//
S01divyav_u:15413: 402.022 pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā miśraṃ tatra vidyānna saṃśayaḥ//783//
S01divyav_u:15417: 402.026 vyādhena ca hataṃ māṃsaṃ nivedayati bhojanam//785//
S01divyav_u:15420: 402.029 śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:15421: 402.030 kalahaṃ sumahat kṛtvā na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//787//
S01divyav_u:15422: 402.031 kṣīrivṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:15423: 402.032 krameṇa yugamātreṇa na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyate//788//
S01divyav_u:15428: 403.005 pakṣaṃ vidhūyamāno yaḥ paśyan pathasya vāśati/
S01divyav_u:15430: 403.007 rajjuṃ vā phalakaṃ vāpi yadi karṣati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15432: 403.009 gomaye śuṣkakāṣṭhe vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15433: 403.010 kalahaḥ kuvaco vyādhir na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//803//
S01divyav_u:15434: 403.011 tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā kāṣṭhaṃ darśayecca sadā khagaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15436: 403.013 sārthopari niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:15438: 403.015 yadā pradakṣiṇaṃ trastaṃ vāśanti vividhaṃ khagāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15444: 403.021 vāstumadhye pratisthāne kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:15445: 403.022 vyādhiṃ tatra vijānīyād vāse vā gṛhasvāminām//809//
S01divyav_u:15446: 403.023 śakaṭasya yathā śabdaṃ viśrabdhaṃ vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15449: 403.026 niṣaṇṇo vāśati kākaḥ prasiddhaṃ gamanaṃ dhruvam//811//
S01divyav_u:15450: 403.027 āsane śayane vāpi sthito vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15463: 404.008 kāṣṭhaṃ vā vāyasā yatra gṛhamāropayanti ca/
S01divyav_u:15465: 404.010 nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ ca pratisaṃharaṇāni ca/
S01divyav_u:15466: 404.011 nigṛhṇanti yatra kākā vyādhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//819//
S01divyav_u:15467: 404.012 grāmānte bhayamākhyāti kāko vā vāśati dhruvam/
S01divyav_u:15471: 404.016 yasya śīrṣe niṣīditvā karṇaṃ karṣati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15478: 404.023 vakṣo vidhunvan vāyasaḥ sadyo vṛṣṭiṃ vinirdiśet//825//
S01divyav_u:15481: 404.026 prakāre toraṇāgre vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15482: 404.027 abhīkṣṇaṃ gharṣate tuṇḍaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ tatra nirdiśet//827//
S01divyav_u:15484: 404.029 vairaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ghoraṃ tatra caiva vinirdiśet//828//
S01divyav_u:15485: 404.030 grāme vā nagare vāpi kurvate yatra maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:15490: 405.004 varṣati prathame māse paścāddevo na varṣati/
S01divyav_u:15500: 405.014 yadā tu madhye vṛkṣasya nilayaṃ karoti vāyasī/
S01divyav_u:15502: 405.016 skandhamūle tu vṛkṣasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divyav_u:15504: 405.018 caturaḥ pañca vā potān yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divyav_u:15507: 405.021 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāralakṣaṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15512: 405.024 mohendramatha divyaṃ ca māṅgalyaṃ pūrvataḥ smṛtam/
S01divyav_u:15513: 405.025 dakṣiṇe tu diśo bhāge pūṣā ca pitryameva ca//839//
S01divyav_u:15517: 405.029 atha vai dhanamitraṃ ca paramaṃ mairameva ca//841//
S01divyav_u:15525: 406.006 vyāyamato jalaṃ caiva vāstu tasya dhanauṣadhī//845//
S01divyav_u:15527: 406.008 anāvāsyaṃ ca tat proktam yacca putrakṣayāvaham//846//
S01divyav_u:15543: 406.024 mahendre pure vā rājyaṃ sūrye sūraprabhāvatā//854//
S01divyav_u:15546: 406.027 puṣpe tu subhago nityaṃ vitathe 'pyaśubho bhavet/
S01divyav_u:15547: 406.028 śoke bhūtavikāraḥ syāt śoṣe tasya viṣaṇṇatā//856//
S01divyav_u:15558: 407.007 asure maraṇaṃ ghoraṃ roge tu bahudoṣatā//861//
S01divyav_u:15562: 407.011 mahendre muktapuṣpāṇi pāvake ca payo dadhi//863//
S01divyav_u:15563: 407.012 āditye parideyaṃ tu bhaktaṃ caiva priyaṅgavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15564: 407.013 antarīkṣe jalaṃ divyaṃ puṣpāṇi jalajāni ca//864//
S01divyav_u:15565: 407.014 nandā pratipadā jñeyā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśī jayā/
S01divyav_u:15566: 407.015 tāsu tāsu dhruvaṃ kuryātprājño hyevaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ//865//
S01divyav_u:15568: 407.017 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvādaśarāśikaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15576: 407.023 dvādaśaiva tu cittāste ye loke pracaranti vai//867//
S01divyav_u:15577: 407.024 tānahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena me tataḥ/
S01divyav_u:15579: 407.026 prathamaṃ meṣo nāma syād dvitīyaṃ tu vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15580: 407.027 tṛtīyaṃ mithunaṃ nāma caturthaṃ cāpi karkaṭaḥ//869//
S01divyav_u:15581: 407.028 pañcamaṃ cāpi siṃhastu ṣaṣṭhaṃ kanyā iti smṛtam/
S01divyav_u:15582: 407.029 tulā tu saptamaṃ jñeyā vṛścikastu tathāṣṭamam//870//
S01divyav_u:15583: 407.030 dhanvī tu navamaṃ jñeyā daśamaṃ makaraḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15587: 408.003 cintyate pañcame putraḥ ṣaṣṭhe maṇḍale śatrutā/
S01divyav_u:15589: 408.005 navame cintyate dharmo daśame karmajaṃ phalam/
S01divyav_u:15591: 408.007 ete dvādaśa cittāstu yathā dṛṣṭā maharṣibhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:15593: 408.009 āgatya pṛcchate kaścit prathamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divyav_u:15596: 408.012 yadi brūyāttadā tasya ātmārthaṃ cintitaṃ bhavet//877//
S01divyav_u:15597: 408.013 kāñcanaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ lohaṃ caiva bhṛśaṃ bhavet/
S01divyav_u:15602: 408.018 grīvāṃ vā parimārjayed galaṃ ca cibukaṃ punaḥ//880//
S01divyav_u:15603: 408.019 yadi śabdaśca śrūyeta dṛṣṭā gāvastathaiva ca/
S01divyav_u:15604: 408.020 īdṛśaṃ ca dṛṣṭvotpātaṃ gośabdaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15605: 408.021 atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//881//
S01divyav_u:15608: 408.024 atha śabdo bhavettatra śrūyantāṃ tādṛśāstu te/
S01divyav_u:15611: 408.027 atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//884//
S01divyav_u:15613: 408.029 kacchapaṃ spṛśate yastu kalahaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15615: 408.031 ākaṭṭā kaṭṭeti śabdā bhavanti ca nirantaram/
S01divyav_u:15618: 409.002 hṛdayaṃ spṛśate yastu apatyaṃ tatra cintitam//887//
S01divyav_u:15620: 409.004 śastradravyaṃ ca yattasya brāhmaṇānāṃ kule sthitam//888//
S01divyav_u:15621: 409.005 atha śabdo bhavettatra yaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu maharṣibhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:15624: 409.008 puruṣaḥ kaścidāgatya ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divyav_u:15625: 409.009 spṛśate cāpi pārśvāni gātracintā tu cintitā//890//
S01divyav_u:15627: 409.011 atha vā tatra ye śabdāḥ śrotavyāste na saṃśayaḥ//891//
S01divyav_u:15630: 409.014 atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//892//
S01divyav_u:15632: 409.016 hastena mardayed hastaṃ tathā nāḍīṃ ca mardayet//893//
S01divyav_u:15635: 409.019 sthitaṃ niviṣṭaṃ vartaṃ ca kṛtaṃ hastagataṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:15637: 409.021 yādṛśo vā śrutaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//895//
S01divyav_u:15639: 409.023 udaraṃ caiva phicakaṃ dve ime parimārjayet//896//
S01divyav_u:15640: 409.024 nidhanaṃ dṛśyate tasya maraṇaṃ cāpi dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:15642: 409.026 tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā mṛta eva bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:15645: 409.029 ūruṃ ca spṛśate bhūyo dharmacintā ca cintitā//899//
S01divyav_u:15646: 409.030 tatra śabdāśca śrotavyā bhavanti hi na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15651: 410.003 spṛśate jānunī caiva karmacintāṃ tu nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15652: 410.004 tatra śabdā bhavantīme śrotavyāśca na saṃśayaḥ//902//
S01divyav_u:15653: 410.005 bhūmikarma ca kṣetraṃ ca kṣetrakarma tathaiva ca/
S01divyav_u:15656: 410.008 jaṅghe tu spṛśate bhūyo hyarthalābhaṃ vinirdiśet//904//
S01divyav_u:15657: 410.009 tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhavantīha na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15659: 410.011 etādṛśaṃ ravaṃ śrutvā hiraṇyaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15662: 410.014 pādau ca spṛśate pṛcchaṃś cittaṃ cāpyanarthikam//907//
S01divyav_u:15663: 410.015 yastu taccintito hyartha āśā āgantukā ca yā/
S01divyav_u:15666: 410.018 atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//909//
S01divyav_u:15668: 410.020 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin kanyālakṣaṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15674: 410.024 ninditaṃ ca praśastaṃ ca strīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam//910//
S01divyav_u:15675: 410.025 pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva mātulaṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:15678: 410.028 tadvijñaiḥ saha saṃgamya kanyāṃ paśyeta śāstravit//912//
S01divyav_u:15680: 410.030 pāṇilekhāśca jaṅghe ca kaṭi nābhyūrumeva ca//913//
S01divyav_u:15681: 411.001 [411]oṣṭhau jihvāṃ ca dantāṃśca kapolau nāsikāṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:15682: 411.002 akṣibhruvau lalāṭaṃ ca karṇau keśāṃstathaiva ca//914//
S01divyav_u:15683: 411.003 romarājīṃ svaraṃ varṇaṃ mantritaṃ gītameva ca/
S01divyav_u:15691: 411.011 dhanyān sā janayetputrāṃsteṣāṃ prītiṃ ca bhuñjate//918//
S01divyav_u:15692: 411.012 yasyāḥ pāṇitale vyaktaḥ kacchapaḥ svastiko dhvajaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15694: 411.014 ekaṃ sā janayetputraṃ taṃ ca rājānamādiśet//919//
S01divyav_u:15702: 411.022 subhrūḥ suvarakeśāntā sā tu kanyā bahuprajā//923//
S01divyav_u:15705: 411.025 yasyāvartau samau snigdhau ubhau pārśvau susaṃsthitau/
S01divyav_u:15709: 411.029 ūrū jaṅghe ca pārśve ca tathā vikramaḥ saṃsthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15710: 411.030 raktānte vipule netre sā kanyā sukhamedhate//927//
S01divyav_u:15717: 412.005 kāntajihvā tu yā nārī raktoṣṭhī priyabhāṣiṇī/
S01divyav_u:15720: 412.008 sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ tu svāminī sā bhaviṣyati//932//
S01divyav_u:15725: 412.013 ūrdhvaprekṣī adhaḥprekṣī yā ca tiryak ca prekṣiṇī/
S01divyav_u:15732: 412.020 trīṃśca sā puruṣān hanti devaraṃ śvaśuraṃ patim//938//
S01divyav_u:15733: 412.021 pārśvato romarājī tu vinatā ca kaṭirbhavet/
S01divyav_u:15735: 412.023 kākajaṅghā ca yā nārī raktākṣī ghargharasvarā/
S01divyav_u:15736: 412.024 niḥsukhā ca nirāśā ca varjitā naṣṭabāndhavā//940//
S01divyav_u:15739: 412.027 yā tu sarvasamācārā mṛdvaṅgī samatāṃ gatā/
S01divyav_u:15742: 412.030 putraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vāpi jāramicchati tādṛśī//943//
S01divyav_u:15744: 412.032 uttaroṣṭhe ca romāṇi sā tu bhakṣayate patim//944//
S01divyav_u:15745: 413.001 [413]yasyā hastau ca pādau ca cchidrau dantāntarāṇi ca/
S01divyav_u:15746: 413.002 patinopārjitaṃ dravyaṃ na tasyā ramate gṛhe//945//
S01divyav_u:15749: 413.005 yasyā kaniṣṭhikā pāde bhūmiṃ na spṛśate 'ṅguliḥ/
S01divyav_u:15750: 413.006 kaumāraṃ sā patiṃ tyaktvā ātmanaḥ kurute priyam//947//
S01divyav_u:15752: 413.008 na sā ramati kaumāraṃ bandhakītvena jīvati//948//
S01divyav_u:15755: 413.011 āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasyā nābhī sā cānubandhati/
S01divyav_u:15756: 413.012 na sā ramati kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ labhate patim//950//
S01divyav_u:15760: 413.016 agnikārye 'pi sā gatvā kṣipraṃ doṣaṃ kariṣyati//952//
S01divyav_u:15762: 413.018 pralamboṣṭhī tu yā nārī naikatra ramate ciram//953//
S01divyav_u:15765: 413.021 na devikā na nadikā na ca daivatanāmikā/
S01divyav_u:15767: 413.023 nakṣatranāmā yā nārī yā ca gotrasanāmikā/
S01divyav_u:15781: 414.006 punarvasuśca dhanyā syātpuṣye vai vastravān bhavet/
S01divyav_u:15783: 414.008 phālgunīṣu bhaved vidyā uttarāsu ca vastravān/
S01divyav_u:15785: 414.010 svātyāṃ ca śobhanaṃ vastraṃ viśākhā priyadarśanam/
S01divyav_u:15792: 414.017 bharaṇī ca bhayākīrṇā cauragamyā ca sā bhavet//965//
S01divyav_u:15794: 414.019 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasāriṃl luṅgādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15799: 414.022 kutrotpannā ime bījāh(?) śasyānāṃ ca yavādayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15801: 414.024 vāpayet tu kathaṃ bījaṃ lāṅgalam yojayetkatham/
S01divyav_u:15803: 414.026 śāradaṃ vātha graiṣmaṃ tu kasmin māse tu vāpayet/
S01divyav_u:15804: 414.027 nimittaṃ kati śasyante kāni vā parivarjayet/
S01divyav_u:15805: 414.028 kasya vā dāpayed dhūpaṃ kena mantreṇa dāpayet//968//
S01divyav_u:15809: 415.002 kati saubhikṣiko luṅgāḥ kati daurbhikṣikāḥ smṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15815: 415.008 puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkurmātaṅgādhipatiridaṃ vacanamabravīt--
S01divyav_u:15818: 415.011 amṛte bhakṣyamāṇe tu bhāgaṃ prārthitavān dvijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15820: 415.013 tata utpannā ime bījā bhuvi lokasukhāvahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15831: 415.024 trayodaśyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tathā hi navamīṣu ca/
S01divyav_u:15838: 415.031 grāmakṣetre ca yad bījaṃ gṛhe ca gṛhadevatā/
S01divyav_u:15841: 416.002 vāraṇendraṃ vṛṣaṃ caiva hayaṃ vā svabhyalaṃkṛtam//984//
S01divyav_u:15844: 416.005 cakrārūḍhaṃ ca śakaṭaṃ kākārūḍhāṃ ca sūkarīm/
S01divyav_u:15848: 416.009 ajo vā vāmataḥ śasyo jambukaśca praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:15849: 416.010 vikṛtaṃ kubjakuṣṭhiṃ ca mukhaṃ śmaśrudharaṃ tathā//988//
S01divyav_u:15857: 416.018 śrutvā mlānaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca mandavṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15859: 416.020 nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ varṣate yadi vāsavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15860: 416.021 svayameva tu tacchasyaṃ kāmaṃ kālena bhujyate//993//
S01divyav_u:15861: 416.022 nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ kampate yadi medinī/
S01divyav_u:15862: 416.023 bhramyate karṣakaḥ sthānānna tacchakyaṃ tu vāpitum//994//
S01divyav_u:15873: 417.003 pipīlikā yadā kṣetre bījaṃ kurvanti saṃcayam/
S01divyav_u:15874: 417.004 suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarvasasyeṣu saṃpadā//1000//
S01divyav_u:15875: 417.005 haranti cet tṛṇād bījaṃ tṛṇe śasyāpahā api/
S01divyav_u:15876: parasparaṃ ca hiṃsanti dhānyaṃ ca nidhanaṃ vrajet//1001//
S01divyav_u:15878: 417.007 dṛṣṭvā tu saṃcayaṃ niṃne 'nāvṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet//1002//
S01divyav_u:15879: 417.008 yadā tu preṣitaṃ bījaṃ saptarātreṇa jāyate/
S01divyav_u:15880: 417.009 suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarvaśasyeṣu saṃpadā//1003//
S01divyav_u:15882: 417.011 alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ cātra jāyate//1004//
S01divyav_u:15885: 417.014 luṅgasya tu ye pādāḥ pañca sapta nava tathā/
S01divyav_u:15886: 417.015 suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarvasasyeṣu saṃpadā//1006//
S01divyav_u:15888: 417.017 alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ cātra nirdiśet//1007//
S01divyav_u:15889: 417.018 luṅgasya yadi pādāstu dṛśyante dvādaśa kvacit/
S01divyav_u:15892: 417.021 yadā pūrvamukhī luṅgā kṣemaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15893: 417.022 yadā paścānmukhī luṅgā ativṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet//1009//
S01divyav_u:15898: 417.027 yadā nāgamukhī luṅgā dṛśyate yatra vā kvacit/
S01divyav_u:15904: 418.002 dharmamarthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ sarvaṃ prāpnoti karṣakaḥ//1014//
S01divyav_u:15907: 418.005 kathaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nāgāśca kena vā vinivāritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15911: 418.009 ko hi sṛjati durbhikṣaṃ subhikṣaṃ caiva prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:15912: 418.010 kastatra sa muniśreṣṭho nāma gotraṃ bravīhi me//1017//
S01divyav_u:15913: 418.011 daivatāni ca me brūhi vidhānāni svayambhuvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15914: 418.012 yajñaṃ ca yajñabhāgaṃ ca hotavyaśca yathā baliḥ//1018//
S01divyav_u:15915: 418.013 pṛthivyāṃ daivataṃ brūhi āśrame daivataṃ brūhi/
S01divyav_u:15916: 418.014 deve tu daivataṃ brūhi kena devī sā kalpitā//1019//
S01divyav_u:15918: 418.016 karake daivataṃ brūhi tathā sthālyāṃ ca daivatam//1020//
S01divyav_u:15923: 418.021 tatra saṃvartate piṇḍaṃ tato meghaḥ pravartate//1022//
S01divyav_u:15924: 418.022 eṣa vyāpnoti cākāśaṃ vāyunā janyate ghanaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15929: 418.027 virodhanaṃ tu vāyośca agneśca anilasya ca//1025//
S01divyav_u:15934: 418.032 yatra satyaṃ ca dharmaśca havirmeghaśca vartate//1027//
S01divyav_u:15938: 419.004 pañcamī krimayaḥ proktāḥ ṣaṣṭhī tu śalabhāstathā/
S01divyav_u:15943: 419.009 dantāśanī tu sainyānāṃ grahā vātāśanī smṛtā/
S01divyav_u:15973: 420.006 tatra dagdhā anekā hi nāgāḥ koṭisahasraśaḥ//1041//
S01divyav_u:15977: 420.010 tadāprabhṛti bhūtānāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vai trāsitaṃ manaḥ//1043//
S01divyav_u:15985: 420.018 digbhāgeṣu ca bhūtānāṃ teṣāmarthaṃ dine dine//1047//
S01divyav_u:15988: 420.021 sadhūmaṃ jvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānaṃ tu pāvakam/
S01divyav_u:15993: 420.026 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasāriṃs tithikarmanirdeśaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:16007: 421.006 gṛhe kṣetre vivāhe vā āvāhakarmasu mitreti//1055//
S01divyav_u:16008: 421.007 bhadrā ca saptamī khyātā śreṣṭhā sā saukṛte 'dhvani/
S01divyav_u:16009: 421.008 nṛpāṇāṃ śāsane chatre śayyānāṃ karaṇeṣu ca//1056//
S01divyav_u:16019: 421.018 vivāhe ca girau kṣetre gṛhakarmasu pūjitā//1061//
S01divyav_u:16020: 421.019 jayā trayodaśī sādhvī maṇḍaleṣu ca yoṣitām/
S01divyav_u:16026: 421.025 nandādīnāṃ kriyā pūrve ṣaṣṭhyādīnāṃ tu madhyame/
S01divyav_u:16029: 421.028 api ca mahābrāhmaṇa idaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānasākṣātkriyāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ cittamabhinirṇayāmi nivartayāmi,
S01divyav_u:16031: 421.030 syātte brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:16033: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro 'bhūvam/
S01divyav_u:16038: 422.002 mayā te tadā brāhmaṇa catvāro vedā vibhaktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16042: 422.004 syāttava brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣirabhūt/
S01divyav_u:16044: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣirabhūvam/
S01divyav_u:16045: 422.006 mayā sā takṣakavadhūkāyāḥ kapilā nāma māṇavikā duhitā āsāditā bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:16046: 422.007 so 'haṃ tatra saṃraktacitta ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ parihīnaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16047: so 'hamātmānaṃ jugupsamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāṃ babhāṣe--oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16050: 422.010 so 'haṃ brāhmaṇa tvāṃ bravīmi--sāmānyasaṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:16052: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramanuprayaccha bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:16054: 422.013 idaṃ ca vacanaṃ punaḥ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī idamavocat--
S01divyav_u:16057: 422.016 putrāya te bhoḥ prakṛtiṃ dadāmi śīlena rūpeṇa guṇairupetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16058: 422.018 śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtistu bhadrā ubhau rametāṃ rucitaṃ mamedam//1067//
S01divyav_u:16059: 422.020 tatra tāni pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni uccaiḥśabdāni procurmahāśabdāni--mā tvaṃ bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ saṃbandhaṃ rocaya/
S01divyav_u:16060: 422.021 nārhasi bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ saṃbandhaṃ kartum//
S01divyav_u:16061: 422.023 atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ nidānaṃ nidāya śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya nipatya ślokenaitānarthānabhāṣata--
S01divyav_u:16063: 422.026 tattvaṃ hyavitathaṃ bhūtaṃ satyaṃ nityaṃ tathā dhruvam//1068//
S01divyav_u:16064_0: 422.027 atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ māṇavakānāṃ taṃ mahāntaṃ śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya
S01divyav_u:16064_1: triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅgarājamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhostriśaṅko brahmaṇā sahāpatinā cātrumahābhaitiko
S01divyav_u:16070: 423.003 aśrūṇi varṣaṇaṃ cāsya eṣa brahmā sahāpatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:16071: 423.004 bhavāṃstu paramajño 'si tanme brūhi yathā tathā//1071//
S01divyav_u:16072: 423.005 iha bhostriśaṅko kimāha svalakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratyavekṣasva/
S01divyav_u:16073: pitrā ca mātrā ca kṛtāni karmāṇi bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:16075: 423.007 gacchanti sattvā bahugarbhayoniṃ na caiva kaścinmanujo hyayoniḥ/
S01divyav_u:16076: 423.009 samastajātau pracaranti sattvā na mārutājjāyate kaścideva//1072//
S01divyav_u:16078: 423.013 sarvatra kāṇāḥ kuṇinaśca khañjāḥ kuṣṭhī kilāsī hyapasmāriṇo 'pi//1073//
S01divyav_u:16079: 423.015 kṛṣṇāśca gaurāśca tathaiva śyāmāḥ sattvāḥ prajā hyanyatame viśiṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16080: 423.017 sahāsthicarmāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsā duḥkhī sukhī mūtrapurīṣayuktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16081: 423.019 na cendriyāṇāṃ praviviktirasti tasmānna varṇāścaturo bhavanti//1074//
S01divyav_u:16082: 423.021 mantrairhi yadi labhyeta svargaṃ tu gamanaṃ dvijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16086: 423.025 māṇavakaśateṣu sa tatra vinihato mahāyaśasā triśaṅkunā puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇo 'bravīt--brāhmaṇo 'sau mātaṅgarājo hi triśaṅkur nāma/
S01divyav_u:16092: 423.029 jñānena hi tvaṃ parameṇa yuktaḥ sarveṣu śāstreṣu bhavān kṛtārthaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16093: 424.001 [424]śreṣṭho viśiṣṭo paramo 'si loke bhavān hi vidyācaraṇena yuktaḥ//1077//
S01divyav_u:16094: 424.003 dadāmi te 'haṃ prakṛtiṃ mamāmalāṃ śīlena rūpeṇa guṇairupetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16095: 424.005 śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtiśca bhadrā ubhau rametāṃ rucitaṃ mamedam//1078//
S01divyav_u:16099: 424.012 kṛtvā niveśaṃ sa tadātmajasya gatvāśrame 'sau nagaram yaśasvī/
S01divyav_u:16100: 424.014 dharmeṇa vai kārayati svarājyaṃ kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sadotsavāḍhyam//1080// iti/
S01divyav_u:16101: 424.016 syād bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājo 'bhūt? naivaṃ draṣṭavyam/
S01divyav_u:16102: 424.017 ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājo 'bhūvam/
S01divyav_u:16103: 424.018 syādevaṃ ca bhikṣavo yuṣmākam--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śādūlakarṇo nāma mātaṅgarājakumāro 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:16105: eṣa sa ānando bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇo nāma mātaṅgarājakumāro 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:16106: 424.021 syādevam yuṣmākam--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:16108: 424.022 eṣa śāradvatīputro bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:16109: 424.023 nānyā sā tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitābhūt/
S01divyav_u:16111: eṣā sā prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitābhūt/
S01divyav_u:16112: 424.025 sā etarhi tenaiva snehena tenaiva premṇā ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ gacchantamanugacchati tiṣṭhantamanutiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:16113: 424.026 yadyadeva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati, tatra tatraiva dvāre tūṣṇīmbhūtā asthāt//
S01divyav_u:16114: 424.028 atha khalu bhagavānetasminnidāne etasmin prakaraṇe tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata--
S01divyav_u:16116: 424.030 etena jāyate prema candrasya kumude yathā//1081//
S01divyav_u:16121_0: 425.003 drutameṣāṃ caturṇāṃ duḥkhasyāryasatyasya duḥkhasamudayasya nirodhasya nirodhagāminyāḥ
S01divyav_u:16121_2: tīvracchando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāha unnatiraprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyenāpramādato yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
S01divyav_u:16122: 425.007 asmiṃśca khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭimātrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāani vimuktāni/
S01divyav_u:16123: 425.008 saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ ca virajaskaṃ vigatamalaṃ dharmacakṣurudapādi viśuddham//
S01divyav_u:16130: 426.002 ekasmin samaye bhagavāñchrāvastyāṃ viahrati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham/
S01divyav_u:16131: 426.003 tatra {bhagavān} bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--saptagtriṃśatā bhikṣava ākāraiḥ paṇḍito dānaṃ dadāti/
S01divyav_u:16158: 426.022 tathāagatacaityeṣu tathāgatabimbeṣu ca sugandhodakasnānaṃ dānaṃ dadāti dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanavipākapratilābhasaṃvartanīyam/
S01divyav_u:16173: 427.002 buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:16176: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati tamate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:16179: 427.005 sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16182: sā kathayati--kasmāttvaṃ brāhmaṇa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitah?
S01divyav_u:16183: sa kathayati--mamāpatyaṃ jātaṃ jātaṃ kālaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:16186: sa kathayati--yadā tava patvyāḥ prasavakālaḥ syāt, tadā māṃ śabdāpayethā iti/
S01divyav_u:16187: 427.009 athāpareṇa samayena tasya patnyāḥ prasavakāle jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16191: 427.011 tayā sa dārakaḥ snāpayitvā śuklena veṣṭayitvā navanītenāsyaṃ pūrayitvā dārikāyā haste 'nupradattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16193: yaṃ kaṃcit paśyasi brāhmaṇaṃ vā, sa vaktavyah--ayaṃ dārakaḥ pādābhivandanaṃ karotīti/
S01divyav_u:16194: 427.013 astaṃ gate āditye yadi jīvati, gṛhītvā āgaccha/
S01divyav_u:16198: 427.016 sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādabhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--ayaṃ dāraka āryāṇāṃ pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:16199: 427.017 te kathayanti--ciraṃ jīva, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitrormanorathaṃ pūrayatu/
S01divyav_u:16200: 427.018 sthavirasthvirā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastyāṃ piṇḍāya praviśanti/
S01divyav_u:16201: 427.019 sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--ayaṃ dāraka āryāṇāṃ pādābhivandanaṃ karotīti/
S01divyav_u:16202: 427.020 sthavirāḥ kathayanti--suciraṃ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṃ pūrayatu/
S01divyav_u:16203: 427.021 bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviśati sma/
S01divyav_u:16204: 427.022 sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--bhagavān,
S01divyav_u:16206: 427.023 bhagavānāha--ciraṃ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṃ pūrayatu/
S01divyav_u:16209: sā taiḥ pṛṣṭā--jīvati dārakah? sā kathayati--jīvati/
S01divyav_u:16211: te kathayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma? ayaṃ dārako mahāpathe dhāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16213: mahāpanthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16215_0: saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ brāhmaṇikāyāmīryāyāṃ śauce samudācāre bhasmagrahe autkare
S01divyav_u:16215_1: bhoskāre ṛgvede yajurvede sāmavede 'tharvavede yajane yājane 'dhyayane 'dhyāpane dāne pratigrahe /
S01divyav_u:16218: tasya bhūyaḥ krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:16223: tayā sa dārakaḥ snāpayitvā śuklena vastreṇa veṣṭayitvā navanītenāsyaṃ pūrayitvā dārikāyā haste dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16224: 428.002 sā dārikoktā--imaṃ tvaṃ dārakaṃ caturmahāpathe dhāraya/
S01divyav_u:16225: 428.003 yadi kaṃcitpaśyasi śramaṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vā, sa vaktavyah--ayaṃ dāraka āryasya pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:16226: 428.004 astaṃ gata āditye yadi jīvati, gṛhītvā āgaccha/
S01divyav_u:16228: sā dārikā alasajātīyā taṃ dārakamādāya panthalikāyāṃ sthitā/
S01divyav_u:16230: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādabhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--ārya,
S01divyav_u:16232: 428.008 te kathayanti--ciraṃ jīvatu, dīrghamāyuḥ pālayatu, mātāpitromanorathaṃ pūrayatu/
S01divyav_u:16235: sā taiḥ pṛṣṭā--jīvati dārakah? sā kathayati--jīvatīti/
S01divyav_u:16236: 428.010 te kathayanti--kutra tvayaiṣa dhāritah? sā kathayati--amuṣyāṃ panthalikāyām/
S01divyav_u:16237: 428.011 te kathayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma? ayaṃ dārakaḥ panthalikāyāṃ dhāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16239: panthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛttiḥ/
S01divyav_u:16242: 428.014 atha tasyācāryaḥ kathayati--brāhmaṇa, mayā prabhūtadārakāḥ pāṭhayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16244: mahāpanthakasyālpamucyate prabhūtaṃ gṛhṇāti, asya tu panthakasya sītyukte dhamiti vismarati/
S01divyav_u:16245: 428.016 brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarve brāhmaṇā lipyakṣarakuśalā bhavanti, vedabrāhmaṇa eṣa bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:16247: tasya omityukte bhūriti vismarati, bhūrityukta omiti vismarati/
S01divyav_u:16250: asya omityukte bhūriti vismarati, bhūrityukta omiti vismarati/
S01divyav_u:16251: 428.020 brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na sarve brāhmaṇā vedapāragā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:16253: sa yatra kvacinnimantritako gacchati, tameva panthakamādāya gacchati/
S01divyav_u:16254: 428.022 atha tena samayena sa brāhmaṇo glānībhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16256: 428.023 sa tena mahāpanthaka uktah--putra, tvaṃ mamātyayādaśocyo 'si/
S01divyav_u:16257: 428.024 api tu tvayā panthakasya yogodvahanaṃ kartavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:16262: te taṃ nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya mahatā satkāreṇa śmaśāne dhmāpayitvā śokavinodaṃ kṛtvā avasthitāḥ//
S01divyav_u:16263: 428.029 āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṃ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau/
S01divyav_u:16264: 428.030 śrāvastyāṃ janakāyena śrutam--āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṃ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau/
S01divyav_u:16265: 428.031 śrutvā ca punaḥ sa janakāyo bahir nirgantumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16266: 428.032 mahāpanthako 'pi bahiḥ śrāvastyāmanyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle [429]pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayati/
S01divyav_u:16267: 429.001 tena sa janakāyaḥ śrāvastyā nirgacchan dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16268: 429.002 sa tān māṇavakān pṛcchati--bhavantaḥ, ka eṣa mahājanakāyo nirgacchati?
S01divyav_u:16270: bhadantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritvā iha śrāvastīmanuprāptau,
S01divyav_u:16273: yatredānīṃ tadagraṃ varṇamapahāya dvitīyavarṇasya śramaṇasya gautamasyāntike pravrajitau/
S01divyav_u:16277: yadyupādhyāyasteṣāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇuyāt, sthānametadvidyate yadupādhyāyasyāpi rocate/
S01divyav_u:16278: 429.007 ācaritaṃ teṣāṃ māṇavakānām yadā apāṭhā bhavanti, te kadācinnagarāvalokanayā gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:16281: apareṇa samayena te sarve apāṭhāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16286: tena tasya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vistareṇa saṃprakāśitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16292: tena tasya dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nulomapratilomo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16301: sa tena janapadaṃ nītvā pravrajitah upasampāditaḥ, uktaśca/
S01divyav_u:16304: 429.021 tena divā uddiśatā yoniśo bhāvayatā trīṇi piṭakāni,
S01divyav_u:16305: rātrau cintayatā tulayatā upaparīkṣamāṇena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:16308: 429.026 yadā panthakasya bhogāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:16312: 429.028 athāyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivāro yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16314: śrāvastyāṃ janakāyena śrutam--āryo mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivāraḥ kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16318: te kathayanti--āryo mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivātaḥ kosaleṣu [430]janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16320: 430.002 panthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--eṣāmasau na bhrātā na jñātiḥ/
S01divyav_u:16322: ahaṃ kasmāttaṃ na darśanāyopasaṃkrāmāmi? so 'pi taddarśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16323: 430.003 sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaśca--panthaka, katham yāpayasi?
S01divyav_u:16326: sa kathayati--ahaṃ cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16327: 430.005 ko māṃ pravrājayiṣyatīti? āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--santyasya kānicitkuśalamūlāni? santi/
S01divyav_u:16328: 430.006 kenāyaṃ na yogyah? āgaccha, ahaṃ tvāṃ pravrājayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:16331: 430.008 pāpaṃ na kuryānmanasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṃcana sarvaloke/
S01divyav_u:16332: 430.010 riktaḥ kāmaiḥ smṛtimān saṃprajānan duḥkhaṃ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṃhitam//1//
S01divyav_u:16333: 430.012 tasyaiṣā gāthā traimāsyenāpi na vṛttā jātā/
S01divyav_u:16334: anyeṣāṃ gopālakānāṃ paśupālakānāṃ śrutvā pravṛttā jātā/
S01divyav_u:16337: dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dvau śrāvakāṇāṃ saṃnipātau bhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:16341: te tāṃstān manasikāraviśeṣānādāya tāsu tāsu grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣā upagacchanti/
S01divyav_u:16345: 430.018 āyuṣmato mahāpanthakasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavo janapade varṣoṣitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:16348: 430.020 tatra ye cūḍā bhavanti paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ,
S01divyav_u:16350: 430.022 āyuṣmān panthakaḥ ṣaḍvargīyān sevate bhajate paryupāsate/
S01divyav_u:16355: na tvekā gāthā mama vṛttā jātā,
S01divyav_u:16358: 430.026 kiṃ tavāsvādhyāyamānasya gāthā anupravṛttā bhaviṣyati? gaccha, yācāhi/
S01divyav_u:16359: 430.027 sa gatvā kathayati--upādhyāya, svādhyāyinikāṃ tāvanme dehi/
S01divyav_u:16360: 430.028 āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimasyedaṃ svaṃ pratibhānamāhosvit kenacitprayuktah?
S01divyav_u:16364: 430.031 sa tena grīvāayāṃ gṛhītvā bahirvihārasya niṣkāsitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16366: 430.032 kiṃ tvamasmiñ śāsane kariṣyasi? sa roditumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16369: dṛṣṭvā ca punarāgacchantamidamavocat--kasmāttvaṃ pathaka vahirvihārasya rodiṣyasi, aśrūṇi vartayasi?
S01divyav_u:16372: 431.004 bhagavānāha--nedaṃ vatsa maunīndraṃ vacanaṃ tavopādhyāyena tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairaneikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya samudānītam,
S01divyav_u:16373: api tu mayedaṃ maunīndraṃ pravacanaṃ tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanaikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya samudānītam/
S01divyav_u:16375: ahamasmi bhadanta cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16377: 431.009 yo bālo bālabhāvena paṇḍitastatra tena saḥ/
S01divyav_u:16378: 431.010 bālaḥ paṇḍitamānī tu sa vai bāla ihocyate//2//
S01divyav_u:16379: 431.011 asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ padaśo dharmaṃ vācayiṣyanti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate/
S01divyav_u:16380: 431.012 tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--imaṃ pāṭhaya tvamānanda panthakam/
S01divyav_u:16387: bhagavatā tasya dve pade datte--rajo harāmi, malaṃ harāmīti/
S01divyav_u:16401: 431.023 athāyuṣmataḥ panthakasya rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye etadabhavat--bhagavānevamāha--rajo harāmi, malaṃ harāmīti/
S01divyav_u:16402: 431.024 kiṃ nu bhagavānādhyātmikaṃ rajaḥ saṃdhāyāha āhosvidbāhyam?
S01divyav_u:16403: tasyaivaṃ cintayatastasyāṃ velāyāmaṣrutapūrvāstisro gāthā āmukhīpravṛttā jātāh--
S01divyav_u:16404: 431.026 rajo 'tra rāgo na hi reṇureṣa rajo rāgasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
S01divyav_u:16405: 431.028 etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane//3//
S01divyav_u:16406: 431.030 rajo 'tra dveṣo na hi reṇureṣa rajo dveṣasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
S01divyav_u:16407: 432.001 [432]etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane//4//
S01divyav_u:16408: 432.003 rajo 'tra moho na hi reṇureṣa rajo mohasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
S01divyav_u:16409: 432.005 etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāaḥ sugatasya śāsane//5//
S01divyav_u:16415: sa tena bāhau gṛhītvoktah--āgaccha svādhyāyinikāṃ tāvatkuru, tataḥ paścāddhyāyiṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:16416: 432.012 athāyuṣmatā panthakena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam, gajabhujasadṛśo bāhurutsṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16417: 432.013 āyuṣmatā mahāpanthakena pṛṣṭato mukhaṃ vyavalokayatā dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16418: 432.014 sa kathayati--āyuṣman panthaka, evaṃ te tvayā guṇagaṇā adhigatāh? adhigatāḥ//
S01divyav_u:16421: 432.017 śramaṇo gautama evamāha--gambhīro me dharmo gambhīrāvabhāso durdṛśo durnubodho 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ,
S01divyav_u:16424: yasyedānīṃ panthakaprabhṛtayaścūḍāḥ paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ pravrajanti/
S01divyav_u:16425: 432.020 bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake mahājanakāyaḥ kṣāntiṃ gṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:16429: 432.022 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāyuṣmān panthakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16430: 432.023 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmantaṃ panthakamidamavocat--śāstā tvāmāyuṣman panthaka evamāha--bhikṣuṇyaste avavaditavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:16431: 432.024 āyuṣmān panthakaḥ kathayati--kimarthaṃ sthavirasthavirān bhikṣūnapahāya māṃ bhagavān bhikṣuṇyavavādakamājñāpayati?
S01divyav_u:16434: 432.027 tā bhikṣūn pṛcchanti--bhagavatā ko 'smākamavavādaka ājñaptah? te kathayanti--āyuṣmān panthakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16435: 432.028 tāḥ kathayanti--bhaginyaḥ, paśyata kathaṃ mātṛgrāmaḥ paribhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16436: yena tribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā, sāpi na pravṛttā/
S01divyav_u:16441: 432.031 kimāryo mahāpanthakah? na hyayam, sa tvanyaścūḍāpanthakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16445: yena tribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā, sāpi na pravṛttā/
S01divyav_u:16446: 433.002 imā bhikṣuṇyastripiṭā dharmakathikā yuktamuktapratibhānāḥ, sa kila kimāsāmavavadiṣyatīti?
S01divyav_u:16447: tāḥ kathayanti--bhaginyaḥ, ṣaḍjanyo dvādaśahastikābhirlatābhiḥ siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapayantu/
S01divyav_u:16448: 433.004 ṣaḍjanyaḥ śrāvastyāṃ praviśya rathya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocayantu--so 'smākaṃ tādṛśo 'vavādaka āgamiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:16451: 433.006 yena na kaścit putramoṭikāputro 'lpaśruta utsahate bhikṣuṇīravavaditum/
S01divyav_u:16452: 433.007 tāsāṃ ṣaḍbhir janībhir dvādaśahastikābhir latābhiḥ saṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptam,
S01divyav_u:16453: ṣaḍbhikṣuṇībhiḥ śrāvastīṃ praviśya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocitam--so 'smākaṃ tādṛśo 'vavādaka āgamiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:16456: 433.010 āyuṣmān panthakaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:16457: 433.011 kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktāpiṇḍapātrapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamayya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pratisamlayanāya/
S01divyav_u:16458: 433.012 athāyuṣmān panthakaḥ sāyāhne pratisamlayanāya vyutthāya saṃghāṭīmādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścāccramaṇena saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16459: 433.013 anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi--kāni ca kutūhalajātāni, kānicit pūrvakaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
S01divyav_u:16460: 433.014 adrākṣīt sā pariṣat āyuṣmantaṃ panthakaṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:16461: 433.015 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ pṛcchati--kataro 'tra bhikṣuṇyavavādakah?
S01divyav_u:16469: 433.019 apare kathayanti--tiṣṭhāmo yadi dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, śroṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16472: 433.020 āyuṣmatā panthakena siṃhāsanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prajñaptakaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprāyābhih?
S01divyav_u:16474: dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprasāyābhih?
S01divyav_u:16476: 433.022 āyuṣmatā panthakena gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya taṃ siṃhāsanam yathāsthāne sthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:16478: sa niṣīdan kaiścit dṛṣṭah. kaiścit na dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16479: 433.024 athātrastha āyuṣmān panthakastadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte sve āsane 'ntarhitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:16480: pūrvasyāṃ diśi uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya pūrvavat yāvat ṛddhiprātihāryāṇi vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16481: 433.026 niṣadya āyuṣmān panthakastā bhikṣuṇīrāmantrayate--mayā bhaginyastribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā/
S01divyav_u:16483: 433.029 pāpaṃ na kuryānmanasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṃcana sarvaloke/
S01divyav_u:16484: 433.031 riktaḥ kāmeiḥ smṛtimān saṃprajānan duḥkhaṃ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṃhitam//6//iti/
S01divyav_u:16494: 434.005 yadbhūyasā sā pariṣad buddhaniṃnādharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:16495: 434.006 athāyuṣmān panthakastāṃ pariṣadaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16497: te saṃlakṣayanti--adyāyuṣmatā panthakena mahājanakāyaḥ prasādito bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:16498: 434.008 te na ṣaknuvantyāyuṣmantaṃ panthakaṃ saṃmukhamapriyaṃ praṣṭum/
S01divyav_u:16500: 434.009 āyuṣman, adya āyuṣmatā panthakena kiṃ mahājanakāyo na prasādito vā prasāditah?
S01divyav_u:16502: 434.010 bhagavatā vārāṇasyām ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ cakraṃ pravartitam,
S01divyav_u:16504: 434.011 yāvadgāthārthaṃ na vibhajati, tāvad dvādaśabhiḥ praṇisahasraiḥ satyāni dṛṣṭāni//
S01divyav_u:16505: 434.013 tatra bhagavāan bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikcūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ cetovivartakuśalānām yaduta panthako bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:16506: 434.014 bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--paśya bhadanta dvādaśavargīyābhirāyuṣmataḥ panthakasyānarthaṃ kariṣyāmi ityatha eva kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16507: 434.015 bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'pyadhvani ābhiranarthaṃ kariṣyāma ityartha eva kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16511: 434.018 sa tayā sardhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:16512: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato bhūyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati yāvar dvādaśa putrā jātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16517: 434.021 yadā tāsāṃ svāmino bahir nirgatā bhavanti, tadā tāḥ parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṃ paricārayanti/
S01divyav_u:16519: sa jānāti--ayaṃ mama putrasya śabdaḥ, ayaṃ parapuruṣayeti/
S01divyav_u:16520: 434.023 sa puruṣāṇāṃ padaśabdāñ śrutvā tāḥ snuṣā garjayati.
S01divyav_u:16523: 434.026 taistā uktāh--kiṃ kāraṇam yūyaṃ tātasya cakaṭyodanaṃ kāñjikacchiṭiṃ cānuprayacchata?
S01divyav_u:16528: 434.028 te kathayanti--kimetadevaṃ bhaviṣyati? tāḥ kathayanti--vayam yuṣmākaṃ pratyakṣīkariṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16530: 434.030 tābhiḥ kumbhakāara uktah--śakṣyasi tvaṃ bhadramukham ekamukhike dve sthālyau kartum?
S01divyav_u:16533: tābhirekasyāṃ sthālyāṃ cakaṭitaṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptāḥ, dvitīyāyāṃ kāñjikam/
S01divyav_u:16534: 434.032 tābhiḥ svāmināṃ purastādekasya [435]sthālyāṃ taṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptā ekasyāṃ dadhi/
S01divyav_u:16538: 435.003 tābhisteṣāṃ purastāttasyaukasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya cakaṭyodanaṃ dattaṃ dvitīyāyāḥ kañjikam/
S01divyav_u:16539: 435.004 tata evaṃ tābhisteṣāmekasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya śālyodanaṃ dattaṃ dvitīyāyā dadhi uddhṛtam/
S01divyav_u:16540: te tasya kathayanti--tāta, tava puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni/
S01divyav_u:16546: tena tāsāmapratyakṣaṃ mahānasaṃ praviśya paryeṣamāṇena hastasaṃspatśenaikamukhe dve sthālyau labdhe/
S01divyav_u:16548: 435.009 tena etṣāṃ putrāṇāmāgatānāṃ te pradarśite--paśyata, mama puṇyāni parikṣīṇāni/
S01divyav_u:16549: 435.010 gatvā paśyadhvamasmākaṃ gṛha eva ekamukhī sthālī/
S01divyav_u:16550: putraka, anyeṣu geheṣu na shālīdvayaṃ tvakamukhamasmākaṃ mandabhāgyānām/
S01divyav_u:16556: sa kathayati--kīdṛśaṃ sarpaṃ mṛgayatha jīvantamāhosvit mṛtakamiti?
S01divyav_u:16558: 435.014 sa saṃlakṣayati--kemetā mṛtakena sarpeṇa kariṣyanti? nūnametā etaṃ vṛddhaṃ mārayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:16559: 435.015 dharmatā khalu sarpasya ruṣitasya dvayoḥ sthānayorviṣaṃ saṃkrāmati--śirasi pucche ca/
S01divyav_u:16560: 435.016 tena roṣitvā śiraḥ pucchaṃ svayaṃ chittvā tāsāṃ madhye sarpā dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16561: 435.017 tābhirjomāṃ sādhayitvā sa brāhmaṇa uktah--tāta, hilimāṃ joma pāsyasi?
S01divyav_u:16562: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimetā me hilimāṃ jomāṃ dāsyanti?
S01divyav_u:16564: 435.019 sa saṃlakṣayati--pibāmi, yathā ca tathā marāmi/
S01divyav_u:16572: tāḥ kathayanti--tāta, bhūyaḥ pāsyasi? sa kathayati--pāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:16575: tasya tena bāṣpeṇa bhūyasyā mātrayā paṭale sphuṭite/
S01divyav_u:16577: 435.024 tāḥ pūrvam yathā tasyāndhasya tato viśvastā vihṛtavantyastathaiva vihartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16579: kathayati ca--kim yūyaṃ jānītha idānīmapyahaṃ na paśyāmi? paśyāmyahamidānīmiti/
S01divyav_u:16582: yo 'sau brāhmaṇaḥ, eṣa evāsau panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:16583: 435.028 yāstāstasya dvādaśa snuṣāḥ, etā eva tā dvādaśavargīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16585: 435.029 etarhyapi ābhirasyānarthaṃ kariṣyāma ityartham eva kṛtaḥ//
S01divyav_u:16586_0: 435.030 bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān
S01divyav_u:16586_1: panthakaḥ parīttenāvavādenācodya saṃsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe anuttare yogakṣeme
S01divyav_u:16587: 435.032 bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'pyadhvanyeṣo mayā parīttenāvavādenācodya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16589: 436.001 [436]bhūtabhūtaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin kartavaṭake gṛhapariḥ prativasati āḍyo sahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16591: sa tayā sārdhaṃ trīṭati ramate paticārayati/
S01divyav_u:16596: sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--yadahamasyai prabhūtānaṃ kārṣāpaṇān dāsyāmi,
S01divyav_u:16599: 436.006 tasmin karpaṭake śreṣṭhī prativasati tasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16600: tasya haste prabhūtāḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāh--yadi mama patnyā bhaktācchādena yogodvahanaṃ kuryāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16603: tayā sa dārako jñātibakena svahastabalena vā āyāpitā(payitvā) pālito vardhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16604: 436.009 sa mātaraṃ pṛcchati--amba, kimasmākaṃ pitā pitāmahāśca karmākārṣuh?
S01divyav_u:16605: sā saṃlakṣayati--yadyasya vakṣyāmi mahāsamudre potasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsann iti,
S01divyav_u:16608: 436.011 śrutamāhitastava putā ca pitāmahāśca ihaiva vāṇijyamakārṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:16609: 436.012 sa kathayati--kārṣāpaṇān mamānuprayaccha, yairihaiva vāṇijyaṃ kariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:16611: tvaṃ mayā kathaṃcit jñātibalena svahastabakena āyāpitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16612: 436.014 kuto me kārṣāpaṇānāṃ vibhavah? api tvayaṃ śroṣṭī tava pitṛvayasyo bhavati/
S01divyav_u:16613: 436.015 asya sakāśāt kārṣāpaṇān gṛhītvā karma kuru/
S01divyav_u:16617: tasya ca gṛhāt preṣyadārikāyāḥ saṃkāratalasyopari mṛtamūṣikāṃ dṛṣṭvā prayacchati cchorayitum/
S01divyav_u:16618: 436.018 sa śreṣṭhī tasya puruṣasya kathayati--yaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt, śakyate anayā mṛtamūṣikayā ātmānamuddhartum/
S01divyav_u:16629: tena vāṇijakena dāraka ucyate--anuprayaccha asya biḍālasya mṛtamūṣikām/
S01divyav_u:16632: sa saṃlakṣayati--yadyetān bhakṣayiṣyāmi, mūlameva bbhikṣitaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:16633: 436.026 sa tān bhrāṣṭre bharjayitvā śītalasya pānīyasya vardhanīyasya pūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tadgṛhya tasmātsthānakānniṣkramya yasmin pradeśe kāṣṭhahārakā viśrāmyanti,
S01divyav_u:16638: tena teṣāṃ kalāyānāṃ stoktaṃ dattaṃ śītalaṃ ca pānīyaṃ pātam/
S01divyav_u:16640: bhāgineya, vayaṃ tāvat kalyamevotthāya gatvā idānīmāgacchāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16641: 436.031 tvamidānīṃ gacchan kiyatā āgamiṣyasi? taistasyaikaikaṃ kāṣṭhamanupradattam/
S01divyav_u:16644: sa tāṃ vikrīya [437]kalāyānāṃ gṛhītvā bharjayitvā udakasya kumbhaṃ pūrayitvā tasminneva praveśe gatvāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16645: 437.002 te kāṣṭhahārakāstathaiva tena kalāyaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ, śītalena pānīyena saṃtarpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16646: te tasya kathayati--bhāgineya, divase divase tvaṃ kalāyān pānīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā āgamya atraiva tiṣṭham/
S01divyav_u:16649: sa teṣāṃ kathayati--mātula, mā yūyaṃ kāṣṭhabhārān vīrthāṃ nayatha/
S01divyav_u:16661: tasya tatprabhūto lābhaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati--etat pratikruṣṭataraṃ vāṇijyānām yaduta ukkarikāpaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16665: sa saṃlakṣayati--etadapi pratikraṣṭataraṃ ca tadvāṇijyānāṃ pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:16667: tasya mūṣikāhairaṇyako mūṣikāhairaṇyaka iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:16668: 437.014 te hairaṇyakāḥ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, sarve vayamanena mūṣikāhairaṇyakenābhibhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16670: yathā mahāsamudramavataret tatraivānayena vyasanamāpatsyate tathā kariṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:16671: 437.016 te tasya nātidūre sthitvā svaiḥ kathāsamlāpena tiṣṭhanti--yathāpi nāma bhavantaḥ puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṃ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet,
S01divyav_u:16674: evamevāsya mūṣkikāhairaṇyikasya pitā ca pitāmahāśca samudre potasaṃvyavahātiṇa āsan/
S01divyav_u:16675: 437.019 eṣa idānīṃ kuṛcchreṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayati hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ vāhayatīti/
S01divyav_u:16676: 437.020 śrutvā sa kathayati--kiṃ kathayata? te kathayanti--tava pitā ca pitāmahāśca potasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsan/
S01divyav_u:16677: 437.021 sa tvamidānīṃ kṛcchreṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayasi, hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ vāhayasi?
S01divyav_u:16679: satyamasmākaṃ pitā ca pitāmahāśca mahāsamudre petasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsan?
S01divyav_u:16687: tena ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ kṛtam--yo yuṣmākamutsahate mūṣikāhairaṇyena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavataritum,
S01divyav_u:16690: atha mūṣilāhairaṇyikaḥ kṛtamaṅgalakaitūhalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16694: sārthavāhaḥ karṇadhārasya kathayati--kathaya kathaya bhoḥ puruṣa yathābhūtaṃ mahāsamudrasya varṇam/
S01divyav_u:16696: 438.002 yo yuṣmākamutsahate evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena pratiṇayitum,
S01divyav_u:16697: mātāpitarau putradārān dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ motrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ kālena kālaṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitum,
S01divyav_u:16703: sa karṇadhārasya kathayati--ghoṣaya bhoḥ puruṣa mahāsamudrasya yathābhūtaṃ varṇam/
S01divyav_u:16704: 438.008 tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣitumāravdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16706: tadyadhā timibhayaṃ timiṃgalabhayaṃ timitimiṃgalabhayamāvartabhayaṃ kumbhīrabhayaṃ śiśumārabhayamantarjalagatānāṃ parvatānāmāghātabhayam/
S01divyav_u:16707: 438.011 caurā apyatrāgavvhanti nīlaiḥ sitairvanacāriṇaḥ, asmākaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitādvyavaropayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:16708: 438.012 yena yuṣmākaṃ priyamātmānaṃ parityaktvā mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyañjātisālohitaṃ mahāsamudramavataratu/
S01divyav_u:16711: 438.014 tataḥ karṇadhārastriruddḥpṣaṇāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ paścādekāṃ vastrāṃ muñcati,
S01divyav_u:16713: yatastadvahanaṃ mahākarṇadhārasaṃdhānabalavadvāyusampreritaṃ mahāmegha iva saṃprasthito 'nuguṇena vāyunā yāvad ratnadvīpamanuprāptam/
S01divyav_u:16714: 438.016 tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣayitumārabdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ,
S01divyav_u:16718: 438.019 asminneva ca ratnadvīpe kroñjakumārikā nāma rākṣasyaḥ prativasanti/
S01divyav_u:16719: 438.020 tāḥ puruṣaṃ tathā upalālayanti yathā tatraivānayena vyasanamāpadyante/
S01divyav_u:16721: 438.021 tāni yaḥ paribhuṅkte, sa saptarātraṃ mūrcchitastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:16725: 438.023 saptāahasyātyayāt tādṛśaṃ vāyumutsṛjanti yena vahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadkṛtakāryāṇām/
S01divyav_u:16726: 438.024 yaṃ śrutvā te vaṇijo 'vahitā apramattā avasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16731: 438.027 sa kathayati--agradhanikaṃ tāvacchinadbhi, tataḥ paścānniveśaṃ kariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:16732: 438.028 sa tathā uktah--putra na tava putā na putāmaho dhanikaḥ kṛtaḥ, kutastava dhaniko jātah?
S01divyav_u:16735: 438.030 tena suvarṇasya phelāṃ pūrayitvā catasno mūṣikāścaturṣu pārśveṣu sthāpayitvā śroṣṭhigṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:16736_0: 438.031 sa śreṣṭhī tadā tasyaiva tadvarṇaṃ bhāṣamāṇastiṣṭhati--paśyata bhavanto mūṣikāhairaṇyikaḥ
S01divyav_u:16736_1: kathaṃ puṇyamaheśākhyo yam yameva gṛhṇāti tṛṇaṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā sarvaṃ tat suvarṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
S01divyav_u:16740: sa praviśya kathayati--idaṃ te mūlam, ayaṃ lābhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16749: tava pitrā gacchatā mama hasto kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16750: 439.006 tena śreṣṭhinā duhitā sarvlamlāravibhūṣitā tasya bhāryārthamanupradattā//
S01divyav_u:16751: 439.007 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau śreṣṭhī, ahameva tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:16752: yo 'sau mūṣikāhairaṇyakaḥ, eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:16754: 439.009 etarhyapyeṣa mayā parittenāvavādenāvavādya saṃsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe 'nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ//
S01divyav_u:16755: 439.011 bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ bhadanta panthakena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaścūḍaḥ paramacūḍo jātah?
S01divyav_u:16757: 439.012 na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:16761: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:16763: 439.016 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//7//
S01divyav_u:16764_0: 439.017 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śastā
S01divyav_u:16764_1: loka utpannastathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyāciraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S01divyav_u:16764_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S01divyav_u:16765: 439.019 sa viṃśatibhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ parivāro vārāṇasīmupaniśritya viharati sma/
S01divyav_u:16767: anena tatra mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikāpi gāthā uddiṣṭo/
S01divyav_u:16771: sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi sūkarān praghātya nayiṣyāmi, māṃsasya krayiko na bhaviṣyati, kledaṃ gamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:16773: 439.024 tatra tatra praghātya neṣyāmi, yatra yatra krāyiko 'sti/
S01divyav_u:16774: 439.025 sa prabhūtān sūkarāñ jānuṣu buddhvā nāvamāropya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16781: 439.028 sa saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvadayaṃ mṛtah āhosvijjīvatīti? paśyati yāvajjīvati/
S01divyav_u:16782: sa tena gajamujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya uddhṛtya vālukāyāḥ shalaṃ kṛtvā tatrāvamūrdhakaḥ sthāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16786: sa tena pādānusāreṇa gato yāvatpaśyati pañcamātrāṇi pratyekabuddhaśatāni/
S01divyav_u:16787: 439.031 sa teṣāṃ patreṇa puṣpeṇa phalena dantakāṣṭhena copasthānaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16791: 440.001 tadā so 'pyekānte sthitvā paryaṅkaṃ buddhcā dhyāyati/
S01divyav_u:16794: yo 'sau kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane bhikṣastripiṭah āsīt,
S01divyav_u:16797: 440.004 yadanena mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikā gāthā uddiṣṭā,
S01divyav_u:16799: tasya karmaṇo vipākena cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ//
S01divyav_u:16800: 440.007 yadā āyuṣmān panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:16801: jīvakena śrutam--panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajita iti/
S01divyav_u:16803: ahaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmi sthāpayitvā bhadantaṃ panthakam/
S01divyav_u:16804: 440.009 bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ śrāvastīṃ vihṛtya yena rājagṛhe tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16807: aśrauṣījjīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah--bhagavān magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:16809: 440.013 apasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānto niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16810: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:16811: 440.015 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:16812_0: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:16812_1: praṇamya bhagavantametadvocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñchvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
S01divyav_u:16814: 440.018 sa na śaknoti bhagavantaṃ vaktuṃ sthāpayitvā bhadantaṃ panthakam/
S01divyav_u:16815: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yenāyuṣmānāndastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16816: 440.020 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vinditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16817_1: ānanda jānīyāh--mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargehe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ
S01divyav_u:16818: 440.023 yathā te jīvaka kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vṛddhirbhavati/
S01divyav_u:16819: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmata ānandasya bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya āyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16820: 440.025 athāyuṣmānānando 'ciraprakrāntaṃ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ viditvā yenāyuṣmān pathakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16823_0: sa jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtastāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya
S01divyav_u:16823_1: kalyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samaye bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:16824: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:16825: 440.031 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena jīvakasya kumārabhūtasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16828: 441.002 jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā vṛddhānte tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:16830: jīvikaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kathayati--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan vāridhārāṃ na pratigṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:16834: 441.006 jīvakaḥ kathayati--bhagavan, nāsau mayā nimantrita iti/
S01divyav_u:16835: bhagavānāha--na tvayā jīvaka buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho nimantritah? bhagavan, nimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16836: 441.007 kimasau bhikṣusaṃghādbahir na vā? bhagavān kathayati jīvakam--gaccha tvaṃ śabdāpaya/
S01divyav_u:16837: 441.008 jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyahaṃ bhagavato gauraveṇa śabdāpayāmi,
S01divyav_u:16841: tena dūtena gatvā panthaka iti śabdo muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16843: sa dūta āgatya jīvakasya kathayati--tathaiva veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpo bhikṣūṇāṃ pūrṇastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:16844: 441.012 bhagavānāha--gaccha tvaṃ kathaya yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu/
S01divyav_u:16845: 441.013 sa gatvā kathayati--yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu/
S01divyav_u:16846: 441.014 āyuṣmān panthakastatra gatvā svasyāṃ gatyāṃ niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16849: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kṣāntiṃ gṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:16852: 441.017 dharmatā khalu na tāvat sthabirashtavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātrāṇi pratigṛhyante,
S01divyav_u:16854: 441.018 āyuṣmān panthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavataḥ sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātrāṇi na gṛhyante?
S01divyav_u:16856: 441.020 āyuṣmatā panthakenādharmāsanaṃ kṛtvā gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya bhagavataḥ pātraṃ gṛhītam/
S01divyav_u:16862: sa jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇa āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayati,
S01divyav_u:16864: 441.025 nityaṃ caityaguṇo hi candanaraso nityaṃ sugandhayutpalaṃ nityaṃ bhāsati kāñcanasya vimalaṃ vaiḍūryaśuddham/
S01divyav_u:16865: 441.027 nityaṃ pāpajane hi krodhamatulaṃ pāṣāṇarekhopamaṃ nityaṃ cāryajaneṣu prātirvasate kṣāntirdhruvā hyarhatām//8//
S01divyav_u:16868: yadā jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya guṇānāmanabhijñastadā asatkāraḥ prayuktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:16874: 442.003 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava uttarāpathāt sārthavāḥ pañcaśatamaśvapaṇyamādāya madhyadeśamāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:16876: sa yameva divasamavakrāntastameva divasamupādāya te 'śvā na bhūyo heṣante/
S01divyav_u:16877: 442.005 sārthavahaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ ca mamāśvānāṃ kaścid rogaḥ prādurbhūto bhaviṣyati yena te na heṣante?
S01divyav_u:16880: 442.007 sa yameva divasamupādāya te 'śvāḥ saṃcartumapi nārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16881: sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--nūnamayaṃ daurbhāgyasattvo jātah asya doṣaṇa mamāśvānāṃ rogaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16886: sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi gamiṣyāmi, aśvānāṃ khurāḥ kledaṃ gamiṣyanti, apaṇyoobhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:16888: sa tasyaiva varṣāmuṣitasya tadvāsino yo śilpinaste svena śilpenopasthānaṃ kurvānti/
S01divyav_u:16897: sa tasya kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, aticireṇa tvamāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:16901: sa kathayati--api tvayamekaḥ kiśorastiṣṭhati, yadi prayo 'si, gṛhītvā gaccha/
S01divyav_u:16907: sa patnyā uktah--asti kiṃcittvayā tasya sakāśāllabdham? labdham/
S01divyav_u:16912: 442.023 sa pakkamānānāṃ bhāṇḍānāṃ madhye parisarpanna kiṃcidbhāṇḍaṃ bhinatti/
S01divyav_u:16921: tena kumbhakāreṇa patnī uktā--bhadre, śobhanaḥ kiśorakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16922: 442.028 na bhūyo mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:16925: 442.030 tena kālena tena samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca bahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:16930: sa teṣāṃ karapratyāyān nānuprayacchati, nāpi taṃ sa udyānaṃ samāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:16932: brahmadattena rājñā śrutam--uttarāpathāt sārthavāho 'śvapaṇyamādāya vārāṇasīmanuprāpta iti/
S01divyav_u:16933: 443.003 so 'mātyānāmantrayate sma--bhavantaḥ, kiyacciraṃ mayehaṃ praviṣṭena sthātavyam?
S01divyav_u:16938: sārthavāhaṃ dṛṣṭvā te kathayanti--bhavanto 'śvāvaḍavāyā aśvājāneyo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16940: sārthavāhamupasaṃkramya pṛcchanti--asti kaścidaśvastvayā vikrītaḥ kasyacidvā datta iti?
S01divyav_u:16942: 443.008 api tvasti mayā pūjitake 'dhiṣṭhāne 'maṅgalakaḥ kiśorakaḥ kumbhakārasya datta iti/
S01divyav_u:16948: upasaṃkramya kathayanti--kimanena kiśorakena karoṣi? sa āha--eṣa mama mṛttikāṃ vahati/
S01divyav_u:16949: 443.012 te kathayati--vayaṃ te tathā gardabhamanuprayacchāmaḥ, tvamasmākamamumanuprayacchasva/
S01divyav_u:16953: te kathayanti--evaṃ cet saṃpradhāraya vayaṃ śvo bhūya āgamiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16956: kiṃ tvaṃ jānāsi mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā tuṣāśca kuṭisakaṇṭaṃ bhakṣitavyam/
S01divyav_u:16957: 443.017 mayā rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto vāḍhavyaḥ, sauvarṇasthāle madhumrākṣitakā mūlakā bhakṣitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16958: 443.018 te yadi saṃkathayanti keśoraka iti, vaktavyāh--kiṃ lajjadhvaṃ vaktumaśvājāneya iti?
S01divyav_u:16960: 443.020 vaktavyāh--suvarṇalakṣaṃ vānuprayacchatha yāvadvā dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati tāvadanuprayacchati/
S01divyav_u:16961: 443.021 te 'parasmin divase upasaṃkramya pṛcchanti--bhoḥ puruṣa, saṃpradhāritaṃ tvayā?
S01divyav_u:16968: sa kathayati--suvarṇalakṣaṃ vānuprayaccḥ, yāvadvā suvarṇalakṣaṃ dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:16972: tairbrahmadattasya rājñaḥ saṃdiṣṭaṃ suvarṇalakṣeṇa aśvājāneyo labhyate/
S01divyav_u:16973: 443.027 rājñāpi saṃdiṣṭam--yūyam yāvatā mūlyena tāvatā gṛhṇīta/
S01divyav_u:16979: kiṃ sarogo bhavadbhiraśvājāneya ānītah? api tu samanuyuñjyāmahe tāvadenam/
S01divyav_u:16981: 443.032 smarasi turaga ghaṭikarasya śālāṃ kimiha vidhairya viprayukraḥ/
S01divyav_u:16983: 444.003 na carasi bahumatastadarthe māsidiha hi cara yānasahasrapūrṇayāyī/
S01divyav_u:16984: 444.005 hyavasanamidaṃ tṛṣāpanītaṃ na carasi kiṃ vada me 'dya sādhu pṛṣṭaḥ//10//
S01divyav_u:16987: 444.011 tvamiha vidhihitapradābhimānī na ca vihito bhavato yathāvadasmi/
S01divyav_u:16988: 444.013 nidhanamahamiha prayāyamāśu na ca biduṣāya taraya pūrvyām//12//
S01divyav_u:16989: 444.015 suciramapi hi na sajjanāvamāno yadi guṇavānasi saumya nāvamānaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16990: 444.017 kṣaṇamāpi khalu sajjanāvamāno yadi guṇavānasi nāvamānaḥ//13//
S01divyav_u:16991: 444.019 sūto rājñaḥ kathayati--devasyānupūrvī na kṛtā yanaiṣa yavasayogyāśanaṃ na gṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:16997: sa tasya śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ mūrdhni dhārayati/
S01divyav_u:16998: rājño jyeṣṭhā duhitā sauvarṇena maṇivyajanena makṣikān vārayati/
S01divyav_u:16999: 444.023 rājño 'gramahiṣī sauvargasthāle madhumrakṣitakān mūlān bhakṣayato dhārayati/
S01divyav_u:17001: rājā kathayati--eṣa nāma rājā, nāhaṃ sa rājeti/
S01divyav_u:17002: 444.025 sūtaḥ kathayati--deva, nāsya sarvakālameṣa upacāraḥ kriyate/
S01divyav_u:17004: rājā kathayati--yattāvadatītaṃ na śakyaṃ tatpunaḥ kartum, yadavaśiṣṭaṃ tatkriyatām/
S01divyav_u:17006: tasya rājño jyeṣṭhaḥ putraḥ śataśalākāṃ dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:17007: rājño jyeṣṭhā duhitā sauvarṇamaṇimayavālavyajanena makṣikān vārayati,
S01divyav_u:17008: rājño 'gramāhiṣī sauvarṇena sthālena madhumrakṣitakān mūlān bhakṣayato dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:17011: sasṛtaparamasugandhivilepanānudhārī madhuramadhurakṛtāntarānurāgā nṛpamahiṣī turagottamāya dattā rājñā/
S01divyav_u:17013: rājā sūtaṃ pṛcchati--rājā asya pṛṣṭhaṃ duḥkhayati/
S01divyav_u:17018: rājā sūtaṃ pṛcchati--eṣo bibheti? deva, naiṣa bibheti/
S01divyav_u:17019: api tu mā rājānaṃ pucchodakena sekṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:17023: sāmantarājaiḥ śrutam--yathā rājā brahmadatta udyānaṃ gata iti/
S01divyav_u:17025: rājñā brahmadattena śrutaṃ sāmantarājair nagaradvārāṇi nigṛhītānīti/
S01divyav_u:17027: antarā ca vārāṇasyantarā codyānamatrāntarā brahmavatī nāma puṣkiriṇyutpalakuṃdapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā/
S01divyav_u:17035: api tvenamāgamya saptāhaṃ dānāni dīyantām, puṇyāni kriyantām, akālakaumudī ca kriyatām/
S01divyav_u:17036: 445.011 amātyaiḥ saptāahaṃ dānāni dātumārabdhāni, puṇyāni kartumārabdhāni, saptāhamakālakaumudī prasthāpitā/
S01divyav_u:17039: 445.013 tataḥ kumbhakārasya sakāśāt suvarṇalakṣeṇāśvājāneyaṃ gṛhītvā ihānītam/
S01divyav_u:17041: tamāgamya saptāhaṃ dānāni dātumārabdhāni, puṇyāni kriyante, akālakaumudī ca prasthāpitā/
S01divyav_u:17042: 445.015 sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yo mayā chorito nāma, sa eṣa kiśorako 'śvājāneyaḥ syāt?
S01divyav_u:17045: sa tenāśvājāneyenoktah--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ tvayā teṣāmaśvānāṃ sakāśāllabdham?
S01divyav_u:17049: 445.020 kiṃ manyadhve bḥkṣavo yo 'sau sārthavāhaḥ, eṣa eva jīvakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17050: 445.021 yo 'śvājāneyaḥ, eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17051: tadāpi yadā asyaiṣa guṇānāmanabhijñaḥ, tadāsyāsatkāraṃ prayuktavān/
S01divyav_u:17052: 445.022 yadā tu guṇānāmabhijñaḥ, tadā pādayor nipatya kṣamāpitavān/
S01divyav_u:17053: 445.023 etarhyapyeṣa yadā guṇānāmanabhijñaḥ, tadā asatkāraṃ prayuktavān/
S01divyav_u:17054: yadā guṇānāmabhijñaḥ, tadā pādayor nipatya kṣamapayati//
S01divyav_u:17058: 446.002 buddho bhagavān kuruṣu janapadacārikāṃ carat kalmāṣadamyamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17059: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kalmāṣadamye mākandiko nāma parivrājakaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:17061: 446.004 tasya duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā/
S01divyav_u:17062: tasyā asthīni sūkṣmāṇi susūkṣmāṇi, na śakyata upamā kartum/
S01divyav_u:17063: 446.005 tasyāstrīṇi saptāhānyekaviṃśatiṃ divasān vistareṇa jātimahī saṃvṛttā yāvajjātamahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate--kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti?
S01divyav_u:17064: jñātaya ūcuh--iyaṃ dārikā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā/
S01divyav_u:17065: 446.008 tasyā asthīni sūkṣmāṇi susūkṣmāṇi, na śakyate upamā kartum/
S01divyav_u:17069: mākandikaḥ saṃlakṣayati--iyaṃ dārikā na mayā kasyacit kulena dātavyā na dhanena nāpi śrutena,
S01divyav_u:17070: kiṃ tu yo 'syā rūpeṇa samo vāpyadhiko vā,
S01divyav_u:17072: 446.012 atrāntare bhagavān kuruṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran kalmāṣadamyamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17074: 446.013 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya kalmāṣadamyaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:17075: 446.014 kalmāṣadamyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17076: 446.015 pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmya pādau prakṣāmya anyatamavṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā/
S01divyav_u:17077: 446.016 tena khalu samayena mākandikaḥ parivrajakaḥ puṣpasamidhasyārthe nirgato 'bhut/
S01divyav_u:17078_1: suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ paryaṅka baddhvā niṣaṇṇaṃ bhagavantaṃ dūrādevānyataravṛkṣamūlaṃ
S01divyav_u:17078_2: niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīlṛtaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇaṃ prāsādikaṃ pradarśanīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:17078_3: śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ parameṇa cittavyupaśamena samanvāgataṃ suvarṇayūpamiva śriyā jvalantam /
S01divyav_u:17080: sa saṃlakṣayati--yādṛśo 'yaṃ śramaṇaḥ prāsādikaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ sakalajanamanohārī,
S01divyav_u:17081: durlabhastu sarvastrījanasya patiḥ pratirūpaḥ prāgeva anupamāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17084: upasaṃkramya patnīmāmantrayate--yatkhalu bhadre jānīyāh--labdho me duhiturjāmātā/
S01divyav_u:17086: 446.024 sā kathyati--kasya prayacchasīti? sa kathayati--śramaṇasya gautamasyeti/
S01divyav_u:17092: 446.027 dṛṣṭo mayā vipra sa piṇḍahetoḥ kalmāṣadamye vicaranmaharṣiḥ/
S01divyav_u:17093: 446.029 bhūratnabhā santi tasya pragacchato 'tyunnamate na caiva(?)//1//
S01divyav_u:17098: 447.003 saceddruta samadhikṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati punarapyasau kāmaguṇyeṣu raṃsyate//2// iti/
S01divyav_u:17102: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--yatkhalu bhavati jānīyāh--eṣa te duhitustṛṇasaṃstaraka iti/
S01divyav_u:17104: 447.009 raktasya śayyā bhavatativikopitā dviṣṭasya śayyā sahasā nipīḍitā/
S01divyav_u:17105: 447.011 sūḍhasya śayyā khalu pādato gatā suvītarāgeṇa nisevitā nviyam/
S01divyav_u:17106: 447.013 nāsau bhartā bhajate kumārikāṃ nirvata, yāsyāmaḥ svaṃ niveśanam//3//
S01divyav_u:17107: 447.015 amaṅgale sākalike tvaṃ maṅgalyakāle vadase hyamaṅgalam/
S01divyav_u:17108: 447.017 sāceddrutaṃ samadhikṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati punarapyasau kāmaguṇeṣu raṃsyate//4//
S01divyav_u:17110: bhagavataḥ padāni dṛṣṭvā punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--imāni te bhavanti bhadre duhiturjāmātuḥ padāni/
S01divyav_u:17112: 447.021 raktasya puṃsaḥ padamutpaṭaṃ syānnipīḍitaṃ dveṣavataḥ padaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:17113: 447.023 padaṃ hi mūḍhasya visṛṣṭadehaṃ suvītarāgasya padaṃ tvihedṛśam/
S01divyav_u:17119: 447.029 śrutvā ca punaḥ punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--eṣa te bhavati huhiturjāmāturutkāśanaśabda iti/
S01divyav_u:17121: 447.031 rakto naro bhavati hi gadadasvaro dviṣṭo naro bhavati hi khakkhaṭāsvaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:17122: 448.001 [448]mūḍho naro hi bhavati samākulasvaro buddho hyayaṃ brāhmaṇadundubhisvaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:17123: 448.003 nāsau bhartā bhajate kumārikāṃ nivarta yāsyāmaḥ svakaṃ niveśanam//3//
S01divyav_u:17127: 448.007 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate sma--eṣa te bhavati duhiturjāmātā nirīkṣata iti/
S01divyav_u:17129: 448.009 rakto naro bhavati hi cañcalekṣaṇo dviṣṭo bhujagaghoraviṣo yathekṣate/
S01divyav_u:17130: 448.011 mūḍo naraḥ saṃtamasīva paśyati dvijavītarāgo yugamātradarśī/
S01divyav_u:17131: 448.013 na eṣa bhartā bhajate kumārikāṃ nivarta yāsyāmaḥ svakaṃ niveśanam//7//
S01divyav_u:17135: 448.017 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--eṣa duhiturjāmātā caṃkramyata iti/
S01divyav_u:17137: 448.018 yathāsya tetre ca yathāvalekitam yathāsya kāle sthita eva gacchataḥ/
S01divyav_u:17138: 448.020 yathaiva padmaṃ stimite jale 'sya netraṃ viśiṣṭe vadane virājate/
S01divyav_u:17139: 448.022 na eṣa bhartā bhajate kumārikāṃ nivarta yāsyāmaḥ svakaṃ niveśanam//8//
S01divyav_u:17140: 448.024 amaṅgale sākalike tvaṃ maṅgalakāle vadase hyamaṅgalam/
S01divyav_u:17141: 448.026 saceddrutaṃ samadhikṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati punarapyayaṃ kāmaguṇeṣu raṃsyate//9//
S01divyav_u:17143: 448.030 dharmo munīnāṃ hi sanātano hyayamapatyamutpāditavān sanātanaḥ//10//
S01divyav_u:17146: 449.003 imāṃ bhagavān paśyatu me sūtāṃ satīṃ rūpopapannāṃ pramadāmalaṃkṛtām/
S01divyav_u:17147: 449.005 kāmārthinīm yadbhavate pradīyate sahānayā sādhurivācaratāṃ bhavān/
S01divyav_u:17150: sthānametadvidyate yadanupamā rāgeṇa svinnā kālaṃ kurvāṇā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:17151: 449.009 tattasyāḥ pratighavacanaṃ brūyāmiti viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:17152: 449.011 dṛṣṭā mayā mārasutā hi vipra tṛṣṇā na me nāpi tathā ratiśca/
S01divyav_u:17154: 449.014 tasmādimāṃ mūtrapurīṣapūrṇāṃ praṣṭuṃ hi yattāmapi notsaheyam//12//
S01divyav_u:17156: 449.017 sutāmimāṃ paśyasi kiṃ madīyāṃ hīnāṅginīṃ rūpaguṇairviyuktām/
S01divyav_u:17157: 449.019 chandaṃ na yenātra karoṣi cārau viviktabhāveṣviva kāmabhogī//13// iti/
S01divyav_u:17159: 449.022 yasmādihārthī viṣayeṣu mūṭaḥ sa prārthayedvipra sutāṃ tavemām/
S01divyav_u:17161: 449.026 ahaṃ tu buddho munisattamaḥ kṛtī prāptā mayā bodhiranuttarā śivā/
S01divyav_u:17162: 449.028 padmam yathā vārikaṇairaliptaṃ carāmi loke 'nupalipta eva//15//
S01divyav_u:17163: 449.030 nīlāmbujaṃ kardamavārimadhye yathā ca paṅkena va nopaliptam/
S01divyav_u:17164: 449.032 tathā hyahaṃ brāhmaṇa lokamadhye carāmi kāmeṣu viviktah {eva}//16// iti/
S01divyav_u:17165: 450.001 athānupamā bhagavatā mūtrapurīṣavādena samudācaritā vītaharṣā durmanāḥ saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:17169: 450.003 tena sa khalu samayenānyatamo mahallo, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:17172: 450.007 ratā vayaṃ hi pramadāmalaṃkṛtāṃ bhokṣyāmahe ghīra yathānulomam//17// iti/
S01divyav_u:17173: 450.009 evamukte bhaganāṃstaṃ mahallamidamavocat--apehi puruṣa, mā me puratastiṣṭheti/
S01divyav_u:17175: 450.011 idaṃ ca te pātramidaṃ ca cīvaram yaṣṭiśca kuṇḍī ca vrajantu niṣṭhām/
S01divyav_u:17176: 450.013 imāṃ ca śikṣāṃ svayameva dhāraya dhātrī yathā hyaṅkagataṃ kumārakam//18// iti/
S01divyav_u:17177: 450.015 evamukte sa mahallaḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya mahānanāryo 'yamiti matvā yena mākandikaḥ parivrājakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17179: 450.017 sa paryavasthitaḥ kathayati--mahalla, draṣṭamapi te na prayacchāmi, prāgeva sparcṭumiti/
S01divyav_u:17180: 450.018 evamuktasya mākandikasya parivrājakasyāntike tādṛśaṃ paryavasthānamupannam yenoṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālagato narakeṣūpapannaḥ//
S01divyav_u:17181: 450.020 tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:17183: 450.021 bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi, yathā atīte 'pyadhvanyeṣā mayā labhyamānā na pratigṛhītā/
S01divyav_u:17189: 450.025 ayaskāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--mayaiṣā duhitā na kasyacit kulena dātavyā,
S01divyav_u:17191: api tu yo mama śilpena samo 'bhyadhiko vā,
S01divyav_u:17193: 450.027 yāavadanyatamo māṇavo bhikṣārthī tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17195: sa māṇavastāṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--dārike, tvaṃ kasyaciddattā āhosvinna datteti?
S01divyav_u:17196: sā kathayati--yadā jātāhaṃ tadaiva matpitaivāṅgīkṛtya vadati--duṣkaramasau māṃ kasyaciddāsyati/
S01divyav_u:17197: 450.029 kiṃ tava pitā vadati? yo mama śilpena samo 'bhyadhiko vā, asyāhamenāṃ dāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:17198: 450.030 tava pitā kīdṛśaṃ śilpaṃ jānīte? sūcīmīdṛśāṃ karoti yāvadudake plavate/
S01divyav_u:17199: 450.031 sa māṇavaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyahamanayānarthī, madāpanayo 'sya kartavya iti/
S01divyav_u:17201: 451.001 [451]tenāyaskārabhāṇḍikām yācitvā anyatra gṛhe susūkṣmāḥ sūcyo ghaṭitāḥ, yā udake plavante/
S01divyav_u:17202: 451.002 ekā ca mahatī ghaṭitā yasyāṃ sapta sūcyaḥ pratikṣiptāḥ saha tayā plavante/
S01divyav_u:17212: 451.010 sacetpitā te jānīyācchilpaṃ mama hi yādṛśam/
S01divyav_u:17213: 451.011 tvāṃ caivānuprayaccheta anyacca vipratam (vipulam?) dhanam//21// iti/
S01divyav_u:17214: 451.012 sā kathayati--kīdṛśaṃ tvaṃ śilpaṃ jānīṣe? īdṛṣīṃ sūcīṃ karomi yodake plavate/
S01divyav_u:17218: 451.014 ayaskārabhāryā kathayati--kīdṛśaṃ tvaṃ śilpaṃ jānīṣe? tena samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:17231: evaṃ dvitīyāṃ tṛtīyām yāvat saptasūcīṃ prakṣipya prakṣiptāstathāpi plotumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17234_0: iti viditvā tāṃ dārikāṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ kṛtvā vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena
S01divyav_u:17234_1: pāṇinā bhṛṅgārakamādāya māṇavasya purataḥ sthitvā kathayati--imāṃ te 'haṃ māṇavaka
S01divyav_u:17235: 451.022 sa kathayati--nāhamanayārthī, kiṃ tu tavaiva madāpanayaḥ kartavya iti mayā śilpamupadarśitamiti//
S01divyav_u:17236: 451.024 bhagavānāha--kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau māṇavaḥ, ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17237: 451.025 yo 'sāvayaskāraḥ, eṣa eva mākandikastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17238: yāsāvayaskārabhāryā, eṣaivāsau mākandikabhāryā tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17239: 451.026 yāsāvayaskāraduhitā, eṣaivāsāvanupamā tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17242: 451.029 punarapi bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta ayaṃ mahallako 'nupamāmāgamyānayena vyasanamāpanna iti/
S01divyav_u:17243: 451.030 bhagavānāha--bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'pyadhvanyeṣa anupamāmāgamya sāntaḥpuro 'nayena vyasanamāpannaḥ/
