S01divyav_u:17245_0: 452.001 [452]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ siṃhakalpāyāṃ siṃhakesarī nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati
S01divyav_u:17245_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanaṃ pūrvavadyāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati /
S01divyav_u:17246: 452.002 tena khalu samayena siṃhakalpāyāṃ siṃhako nāma sārthavāhaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigrahaḥ pūrvavadyāvattena kalatramānītam/
S01divyav_u:17249: 452.005 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:17250: dārako jātah abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇah chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvidtīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṇa saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17251: 452.007 tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatiṃ divasān vistareṇa tasya jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti?
S01divyav_u:17252: jñātaya ūcuh--ayaṃ dārakaḥ siṃhasya sārthavahasya putraḥ/
S01divyav_u:17255: 452.010 siṃhalo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattaḥ pūrvavadyāvadaṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu ghaṭako vācakaḥ piṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17256: 452.011 tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:17260: tāvatprabhūtaṃ me dhanajātamasti yadi tvaṃ tilataṇḍulakulatthādiparibhogena ratnāni me paribhokṣyase,
S01divyav_u:17261: tathāpi me bhogā na tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gamiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:17262: 452.015 tadyāvadahaṃ jīvāmi, tāvat krīḍa ramasva paricāraya/
S01divyav_u:17264: sa bhūyo bhūyaḥ kathayati--tāta, anujānīhi, mahāsamudramavatarāmīti/
S01divyav_u:17265: 452.017 sa tenāvaśyanirbandhaṃ jñātvā uktah--putra, evaṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:17267: tena siṃhakalpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ siṃhakalpanivāsino vaṇijo nānādeśābhyāgatāśca/
S01divyav_u:17269: yo yuṣmākamutsahate siṃhalena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartum,
S01divyav_u:17272_2: prabhūtaṃ mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamādāya pañcabhirvaṇikśataiḥ saparivāraḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
S01divyav_u:17275: sarve te vaṇijo bālahāśvarājātpatitāḥ, tābhiśca rākṣasībhirbhakṣitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17280: 452.029 yadi tāvattamānayiṣyasītyevaṃ kuśalam, no cetvāṃ bhakṣayām iti/
S01divyav_u:17281: 452.030 sā saṃtrastā kathayati--yadi yuṣmākameṣa nirbandho māṃ dhariṣyatha ānayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:17284: sā paramabhīṣaṇarūpamabhinirmāya laghuladhveva gatvā siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya purato gatvā sthitā/
S01divyav_u:17287: sā rākṣasī sārthavāhasya pādayor nipatyāha--sārthavāha, ahaṃ tāmradvīpakasya rājño duhitā/
S01divyav_u:17289: 453.003 tasya mahāsamudramadhyagatasya makareṇa matsyajātena yānapātraṃ bhagnam/
S01divyav_u:17294: 453.005 viśrambhakathālāpena muhūrtaṃ sthitvā kathayati--vayasya, rājaduhitāsau tvayā pariṇitā/
S01divyav_u:17296: sa kathayati--vayasya, nāsau rājaduhitā, tāmradvīpādasau rākṣasī/
S01divyav_u:17300: sāpi rākṣasī svayamatīvarūpayauvanasampannamahāsundarīmānuṣīrūpamāsthāya siṃhalasadṛśanirviśeṣasundaraṃ putraṃ nirmāya taṃ putramādāya siṃhakalpāṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptā/
S01divyav_u:17303: 453.011 te kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, jñāyantāmayaṃ dārakaḥ siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya putra iti/
S01divyav_u:17306: 453.013 te kathayanti--bhagini, kuta āgatā, kasya vā duhitā tvamiti?
S01divyav_u:17307: sā kathayati--bhavantaḥ, ahaṃ tāmradvīparājasya duhitā siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya bhāryārthaṃ dattā/
S01divyav_u:17309: 453.015 tenāhamamaṅgaleti kṛtvā asthāne chotitā, kathaṃcidiha saṃprāptā/
S01divyav_u:17313: 453.017 sa tābhyāmuktah--putra, mainām {tyaja}duhitaraṃ rājñaḥ, kṣudraputreyaṃ tapasvinī, kṣameti/
S01divyav_u:17314: 453.018 sa kathayati--tāta, naiṣā rājaduhitā, rākṣasyeṣā tāmradvīpādihāgateti/
S01divyav_u:17315: tau kathayatah--putra, sarvā eva striyo rākṣasyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17317: tāta, yadyeṣā yuṣmākamabhipretā, etāṃ gṛhe dhārayata/
S01divyav_u:17319: tau kathayatah--putra, sutarāṃ vayamenāṃ tavaivārthāya dhārayāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17320: yadyeṣā tava nābhipretā, kimasmākamanayā? na dhārayāma iti/
S01divyav_u:17323: 453.022 amātyai rājño niveditam--deva, īdṛśī rūpayauvanasampannā strī rājadvāre tiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:17329: svāgatavādasamudācāreṇa tāṃ samudācarya kathayati--kutaḥ kathamatrāgatā, kasya vā tvamiti/
S01divyav_u:17331: ahaṃ tāmradvīpakasya rājño duhitā siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya bhārvārthaṃ dattā/
S01divyav_u:17332: 453.026 tasya mahāsamudramadhyagatasya makareṇa matsyajātena yānapātraṃ bhagnam/
S01divyav_u:17333: 453.027 tenāhamamaṅgaleti śrutvā asthāne chotitā, kathaṃcidiha saṃprāptā/
S01divyav_u:17335: tadarhasi deva tameva siṃhalaṃ sārthavāhaṃ kṣamāpayitumarhasi/
S01divyav_u:17337: 453.029 amātyānāmājñā dattā--gacchantu bhavantaḥ, siṃhalaṃ sārthavāhaṃ śabdayateti/
S01divyav_u:17339: 453.030 rājā kathayati--siṃhala, enāṃ rājāduhitaraṃ dhāraya, kṣamasveti/
S01divyav_u:17340: sa kathayati--deva, naiṣā rājaduhitā, rākṣasyeṣā tāmradvīpādihāgateti/
S01divyav_u:17341: 453.031 rājā kathayati--sārthavāha, sarvā eva striyo rākṣasyaḥ, kṣamasva/
S01divyav_u:17347: 454.002 yāvadapareṇa samayena rājñaḥ sāntaḥpurasyāsvāpanaṃ datvā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--bhaginyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:17356: eṣa śabdaḥ siṃhakalpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ samantato visṛtah--rājadvāraṃ na mucyate/
S01divyav_u:17363: amātyāḥ kathayanti--kathamatra pratipattavyamiti? sa kathayati--niśrayaṇīmānayata, paśyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:17370: 454.015 paurāmātyajanapadāḥ saṃnipatya kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, rājā sāntaḥpuraparivāro rākṣasībhirbhakṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17371: 454.016 kumāro nāsya, kamatrābhiṣiñcāma iti? tatraike kathayanti--yaḥ sāttvikaḥ prajñaśceti/
S01divyav_u:17375: taiḥ siṃhalaḥ sārthavāha uktah--sārthavāha, rājyaṃ pratīccheti/
S01divyav_u:17377: kiṃ mama rājyeneti? te kathayanti--sārthavāha, nānyaḥ śaknoti rājyaṃ dhārayitum/
S01divyav_u:17379: sa kathayati--samayena pratīcchāmi yadi mama vacanānusāriṇo bhavatha/
S01divyav_u:17381: taurasau nagaraśobhāṃ kṛtvā mahatā satkāreṇa rājye 'bhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17382: 454.022 tena nānādeśanivāsino vidyāvādikā āhūya bhūyasyā mātrayā vidyā śikṣitā,
S01divyav_u:17385: 454.025 siṃhalo rājā caturaṅgādbalakāyādvaravarāṅgān hastino 'śvān rathān manuṣyāśca vahaneṣvaropya tāmradvīpaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17388: 454.027 tāḥ saṃjalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavatyaḥ, āpaṇasthānīyo dhvajaḥ kampate/
S01divyav_u:17395: 454.031 avaśiṣṭāḥ siṃhalasya rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayanti--deva, kṣamasveti/
S01divyav_u:17402: 455.002 siṃhalenāpi rājñā āvāsitamiti siṃhaladvīpaḥ siṃhaladvīpa iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
S01divyav_u:17403: 455.004 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau simihalaḥ, ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17404: yo 'sau siṃhakesarī rājā, eṣa eva sa mahallastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17405: 455.005 yā sā rākṣasī, eṣaivānupamā tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17411: strī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā udyāne tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:17412: 455.010 devasyaiṣā yogyeti śrutvā rājā tadudyānaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:17416: tena mākandikaḥ parivrājaka uktah--kasyeyaṃ dārikā? sa āha--deva, madduhitā deva, na kasyacid/
S01divyav_u:17417: 455.012 mama kasmānna dīyate? deva, dattā bhavatu rājñaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17423: pañca ca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni dine dine gandhamālyanimittam/
S01divyav_u:17425: 455.016 tena khalu punaḥ samayenodayanasya rājñastrayo 'grāmātyā yogandharāyaṇo ghoṣilo mākandika iti/
S01divyav_u:17426: 455.017 yāvadapareṇa samayena udayanasya rājñaḥ puruṣa upasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17431: so 'pi rājñā pṛṣṭah--kastvamiti? sa kathayati--deva apriyākhyāyīti/
S01divyav_u:17437: yāvadapareṇa samayena rājā udayanaḥ śyāmāvatī anupamā caikasmin sthāne tiṣṭhanti/
S01divyav_u:17449: yadā devaḥ śyāmāvatī ahaṃ ca rahasi tiṣṭhema,
S01divyav_u:17452: tayā teṣāṃ rahasyavasthitānāṃ sopānake kāṃsikā pātitā/
S01divyav_u:17454: 455.030 anupamā namo devasyetyuktvā kathayati--devasya santakaṃ bhavatī bhuṅkte,
S01divyav_u:17456: 455.031 rājā kathayati--anupame, atra mā saṃrambhaṃ kuru, upāsikaiṣā, nātra doṣa iti/
S01divyav_u:17457: 455.032 rājā udayana ekasmin divase śyāmāvatyā sakāśam [456]bhuṅkte, dvitīyadivase 'nupamāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17458: 456.001 rājñā śākunikasyājñā dattā--yasmin divase śyāmāvatyā bhojanavāraḥ,
S01divyav_u:17459: tasmin divase jīvantaḥ kapiṃjalā ānetavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:17465: rājā kathayati--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, śyāmāvatyāḥ samarpayeti/
S01divyav_u:17467: sā kathayati--kimahaṃ śākunikāyinī? na mama prāṇātipātaḥ kalpate/
S01divyav_u:17469: tena rājñe gatvā niveditam--deva, śyāmāvatī kathayati--kimahaṃ śākunikāyinī?
S01divyav_u:17473: yadyasāvucyate śramaṇasya gautamasyārthāya sādhayeti sāmprataṃ saparivārā sādhayet/
S01divyav_u:17475: tenāsau puruṣa uktah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, evaṃ vada--bhagavato 'rthāya sādhayeti/
S01divyav_u:17480: śākunikena gatvā rājñe niveditam--sā deva saparivārā udyukteti/
S01divyav_u:17482: yadi tāvatprāṇātipāto na kalpate, śramaṇasyārthāya na kalpate, devasyāpi kalpate?
S01divyav_u:17483: devasya na kalpate iti kuta etat?
S01divyav_u:17486: aparayā śyāmāvatyā niveditam--devo 'tyarthaṃ paryavasthito dhanuḥ pūrayitvā āgacchati, kṣamayeti/
S01divyav_u:17487: 456.016 tayā svopaniṣaduktā--bhaginyaḥ, sarvā yūyaṃ maitrīṃ samāpadyadhvamiti/
S01divyav_u:17489: 456.018 rājñā ā karṇāddhanuḥ pūrayitvā śaraḥ kṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17496: 456.020 rājā vinītaḥ kathayati--tvaṃ devī nāgī yakṣiṇī gandharvī kinnarī mahoragīti? sā kathayati--na/
S01divyav_u:17497: 456.021 atha kā tvam? bhagavataḥ śrāvikā anāgāminī/
S01divyav_u:17498: maya bhagavato 'ntike 'nāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam, ebhiśca pañcabhiḥ strīśataiḥ satyāni dṛṣṭānīti/
S01divyav_u:17509: anupamā saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ rājā maya sārthaṃ ratikrīḍāṃ pratyanubhavati/
S01divyav_u:17510: 456.028 śyāmāvatyā navaiḥ phalair navaiḥ sasyakair navartukaiḥ kārāṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:17512: 456.029 sā ca tasyāḥ praghātanāya randhrānveṣaṇatatparā avasthitā/
S01divyav_u:17517: amātyāḥ kathayanti--devasya balaṃ hīyate, kārvaṭikasya balaṃ varthate/
S01divyav_u:17518: 456.032 yadi devaḥ svayameva na gacchati, sthānametadvidyate yat sarvathāsau durdamyo [457]bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:17519: 457.001 tena kauśāmbyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--yo mama vijite kaścicchastropajīvī prativasati,
S01divyav_u:17525: 457.004 rājñā mākandikaḥ sthāpita uktaśca--śyāmāvatyā yogodvahanaṃ kartavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:17529: 457.006 tayā pṛṣṭah--tāta, ka iha devena sthāpitah? aham/
S01divyav_u:17531: 457.007 śakyamanena sahāyena vairaniryātanaṃ kartumiti viditvā kathayati--nānujānīṣe śyāmāvatī kā mama bhavatīti/
S01divyav_u:17534: nānujānīṣe kataro dharmo 'tyarthaṃ bādhata iti? putri, jāne īrṣyā mātsaryaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:17537: yāvat trirapyahaṃ rājñā siṃdiṣṭah--śyāmāvatyā yogodvāhanaṃ kariṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:17540: asti kaścitpitā duhiturarthe vimukhaḥ, yaḥ sapatnyāḥ sakāśe atīva snehaṃ karoti?
S01divyav_u:17548: 457.016 sa kathayati--devi, kiṃ te karaṇīyamasti? sā kathayati--mākandika, na kiṃcitkaraṇīyamasti/
S01divyav_u:17549: 457.017 api tvetā dārikā rātrau pradīpena buddhavacanaṃ paṭhanti,
S01divyav_u:17550: atra bhūrjena prayojanaṃ tailena masinā kalamayā tulena/
S01divyav_u:17555: 457.020 mākandikaḥ kathayati--devi praveśayāmi, na bhūyo bhūyaḥ praveśitavyam/
S01divyav_u:17561: kauśāmbyām yantrakarācāryaḥ kathayati--ahamenaṃ dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ jvalantam yantreṇānyasthānaṃ saṃkramayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:17567: 457.029 naivāntarikṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praviśya/
S01divyav_u:17568: 457.031 na vidyate pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta karma//22// iti/
S01divyav_u:17571: 458.003 ājñātāni ca satyāni kṛtaṃ buddhasya śāsanam//23// iti/
S01divyav_u:17573: iti tatra śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañca strīśatāni dagdhāni/
S01divyav_u:17575: mākandikena teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ strīśatānāṃ kalevarāṇi śmaśāne choritāni/
S01divyav_u:17578: 458.008 atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya kauśāmbīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan/
S01divyav_u:17579: 458.009 aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ kauśāmbīnagare udayanasya vatsarājasya janapadān gatasya antaḥpuramagninā dagdhaṃ pañcamātrāṇi strīśatāni śyāmāvatīpramukhāni/
S01divyav_u:17580_0: 458.010 śrutvā ca punaḥ kauśāmbīṃ piṇḍāya praviśyā caritvā pratikramya punaryena
S01divyav_u:17580_1: bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā etadūcuh--aśrauṣma vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavo kauśāmbīṃ
S01divyav_u:17580_2: piṇḍāya caranta udayanasya vatsarājasyāntaḥpuramagninā dagdhaṃ pañcamātrāṇi strīśatāni
S01divyav_u:17581: 458.014 bhagavānāha--bahu bhikṣavastena mohapuruṣeṇāpuṇyaṃ prasūtam yenodayanasya vatsarājasya janapadagatasyāntaḥpuramagninā dagdhaṃ pañcamātrāṇi strīśatāni śyāmāvatīpramukhāni/
S01divyav_u:17582: 458.015 kiṃ cāpi bhikṣavastena mohapuruṣeṇa bahvapuṇyaṃ prasūtam, api tu na tā durgatiṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17585: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāḥ pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇādupapādukāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17588: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāstrayāṇāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇādrāgadveṣamohānāṃ kālaṃ kṛtvā sakṛdāgāminyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:17591_0: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāstrayāṇāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇācchrotāpannā avinipātadharmiṇyo
S01divyav_u:17591_1: niyatasamādhiparāyaṇāḥ saptakṛtvo bhavaparamāḥ saptakṛtvo devāṃśca manuṣyāṃśca saṃdhāvya
S01divyav_u:17593: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāḥ svajīvitahetorapi śikṣāṃ na vyatikrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17595: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yā mamāntike prasannacittālaṃkāraṃ kṛtvā kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17597: āgamyata bhikṣavo yena śyāmāvatīpramukhānāṃ pañcastrīśatānāṃ kalevarāṇi/
S01divyav_u:17599: atha khalu bhagavān saṃbahulairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdham yena tāsāṃ pañcānāṃ strīśatāṇāṃ kalevarāṇi tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17600: 458.030 upasaṃkramya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--etāni bhikṣavastāni pañcaśatakalevarāṇi yatra udayano vatsarājo raktaḥ sakto gṛddho grathito mūrcchito 'dhyavasāyamāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17605: 459.003 asatsaditi paśyanti paśyatāṃ nāsti kiṃcana//24// iti/
S01divyav_u:17607: yaddagdhasthūṇāyāmapi cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ prāgeva savijñānake kāye/
S01divyav_u:17611: 459.007 tatko nvasmākaṃ rājña ārocayiṣyatīti? tatrekai kathayanti--yo 'sāvapriyākhyāyī sa ārocayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:17620: 459.011 samayato nivedayāmi yadahaṃ bravīmi tatkurudhvam? brūhi, kariṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17622: pañcahastinīśatāni pañcāśvaśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇalakṣaṃ kauśāmbyadhiṣṭhānam/
S01divyav_u:17623: 459.013 paṭe lekhayata puṣpadantaprāsādam yathā mākandikena bhūrjaṃ kalamā tailaṃ tūlamasirapaścime ca bhūrjabhāge 'gniḥ prakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17627: 459.016 yathā yantrakalācārya āgatya kathayati--dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ jvalantamanyat sthānaṃ saṃkramayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:17631_1: pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ kauśāmbyadhiṣṭhānaṃ paṭe
S01divyav_u:17632: 459.020 yathā mākandikena bhūrjaṃ kalamā tailaṃ tūlamasirapaścime bhūrjabhārake 'gniḥ prakṣipto yathā dvārako 'ṣṭhake prajvālitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17635: 459.023 yathā yantrakalācārya āgatah--ahamenaṃ dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ jvalantamanyat sthānaṃ saṃkramayāmīti,
S01divyav_u:17637: 459.024 yathā śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañcastrīśatānyagnāvutplutya nipatitāni, tatsarvaṃ paṭe likhitam/
S01divyav_u:17638: 459.025 tato 'priyākhyāyino 'mātyānāṃ lekho 'nupreṣito rājña īdṛśo 'nartha utpanno 'hamasyānenopāyena nivedayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:17640: 459.027 sa teṣāṃ lekhāṃ lekhayitvā caturaṅgabalakāyayukto 'nyatamasmin pradeśe gatvāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17641: 459.028 udayanasya ca lekho 'nupreṣitah--deva, ahamanuṣmin pradeśe rājā/
S01divyav_u:17644: yadi tāvattvaṃ śaknoṣi yuddhena niyoktumityevaṃ kuśalam,
S01divyav_u:17645: no cetpañcahastinīśatāni pañcāśvaśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ datvā tamāneṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:17646: 459.032 rājña udayanasya sa kārvaṭiko balavān saṃnāmaṃ na gacchati/
S01divyav_u:17648: 460.001 [460]bhavantaḥ, īdṛśo 'pi rājā mūrkhah? asti kaśṣinmṛtyunāpahṛtaḥ śakyata ānetum? tadgatam/
S01divyav_u:17649: 460.002 etattasyaivaṃ likhitam--mamaivaṃnāmā kārvaṭikaḥ saṃnāmaṃ na gacchati/
S01divyav_u:17650: sa tvamasmākaṃ tāvatsāhāyyaṃ kalpaya, paścāttavāpi sāhayyaṃ karomīti/
S01divyav_u:17654: sa saṃlakṣayati--ekena tāvadahaṃ rājñā daśa diśo viśrāntaḥ, ayaṃ ca dvitīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17656: 460.006 sa kaṇṭhe 'siṃ baddhvā nirgatya rājña udayanasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17658: 460.007 athasāvapriyākhyāyī rājalīlayā rājña udayanasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--deva,
S01divyav_u:17662: yadi tāvattvaṃ śaknoṣi yuddhena nirjetumiyevaṃ kuśalam,
S01divyav_u:17663: no cetpañcahastiśatāni pañcahastinīśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ datvā tamāneṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:17665: 460.012 asti kaścicchakyate mṛtyoḥ sakāśādānetumiti? sa kathayati--deva, na śakyate/
S01divyav_u:17668: rājā paṭaṃ nirīkṣya marmavedhaviddha iva ruṣyamāṇaḥ kathayati--bhoḥ kim?
S01divyav_u:17669: kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ kathayasi śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañca strīśatānyagninā dagdhānīti?
S01divyav_u:17670: sa paṭṭaṃ mauliṃ cāpanīya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:17671: 460.016 nāhaṃ narendro na narendraputraḥ pādopajīvī tava deva mṛtyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17676: ayaṃ mākandikaḥ puṣpadantaṃ prāsādaṃ bhūrjādinā prayogeṇa dahati,
S01divyav_u:17677: imāni śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañca strīśatānyagninā dahyamānānyutplutya nipatitānīti/
S01divyav_u:17678: 460.022 vicārya kathayati--bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṃ kathayasi śyāmāvatī dagdheti?
S01divyav_u:17679: deva, nāhaṃ kathayāmi api tu deva eva kathayati/
S01divyav_u:17682: anyathā te mayāsinā nikṛntitamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātitamanvabhavisyadityutkvā mūrcchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17691: tato yogandharāyaṇasyājñā dattā--gaccha mākandikamanupamayā saha yantragṛhe prakṣipya dahyatām/
S01divyav_u:17692: 460.029 tato yogandharāyaṇena suguptaṃ bhūmigṛhe prakṣipya sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17695: sa kathayati--yogandharāyaṇa, kutrānupameti? tena yathāvṛttaṃ niveditam/
S01divyav_u:17698: tvayāpyanupamayā saparivārayā sārdhaṃ mayā pravrajitavyaṃ jātamiti/
S01divyav_u:17699: 460.032 yogandharāyaṇaḥ kathayati--deva, ityarthameva mayā asau bhūmigṛhe prakṣipya sthāpitā/
S01divyav_u:17703: 461.002 nūnamanayā parapuruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ paricāritamiti viditvā kathayati--anupame, anyena paricāritamiti?
S01divyav_u:17705: 461.003 kathaṃ jāne? abhiśraddadhasi tvaṃ bhagavatah? abhiśraddadhe gautame/
S01divyav_u:17707: api tu kiṃ navaśavāyā arthe bhagavantaṃ pravakṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:17708: śyāmāvatyā arthe pravakṣyāmīti viditvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17709: 461.006 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17710: udayano vatsarājo bhagavantamidamavocat--kiṃ bhadanta śyāmāvatīpramukhaiḥ pañcabhiḥ strīśataiḥ karma kṛtam yenāgninā dagdhāni?
S01divyav_u:17712: 461.008 bhagavānāha--ābhireva mahārāṭ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām//
S01divyav_u:17713: 461.010 bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryā brahmadatto rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca pūrvavadyāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:17714: 461.011 asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:17724: sā kathayati--pravrajito vā tiṣṭhatu, agniṃ datvā tāṃ prajvalayeti/
S01divyav_u:17734: sa tāsāmanukampārthaṃ tata evākāśamutplutya tapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17736: 461.023 tā mūlanikṛntita iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamayitumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17739: 461.025 tāni tasmin kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kārtumārabdhāh--yadasmābhirevaṃ sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:17745: 461.028 kiṃ manyase mahārāja tadā sāsau rājño brahmadattasyāgramahiṣī,
S01divyav_u:17746: eṣaiva sā śyāmāvatī tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17747: 461.029 yāni pañca strīśatāni, etānyeva tāni pañca strīśatāni tāni tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17748: 461.030 yā sā preṣyadārikā, eṣaivāsau kubjottarā tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:17750: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣāṇi narakeṣu patkā yāvadetarhyapi dṛṣṭasatyā agninā dagdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17753: iti hi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmāṇāṃ pūrvavadyāvadevamābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17755: 462.003 atrodayano vatsarājo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinindyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikātprakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17756: 462.005 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena kubjā saṃvṛttā?
S01divyav_u:17757: bhagavānāha--kubjottarayaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pūrvavadyāvad phalanti khalu dehinām/
S01divyav_u:17758: 462.008 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati pūrvavadyāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:17760: rājñā vārāṇasyāmevaṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--yasya dvādaśavārṣikaṃ bhaktamasti, tena sthātavyam/
S01divyav_u:17761: 462.010 yasya nāsti tenānyatra gantavyamiti yataḥ kolenāgantavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:17762: 462.011 tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ saṃdhāno nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga iti vistaraḥ pūrvavadyāvad vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:17763: 462.013 tena koṣṭhāgārika āhūyoktah--bhoḥ puruṣa, bhaviṣyati mama saparivārasya dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti?
S01divyav_u:17765: 462.014 asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante pūrvavadyāvadbhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:17766: vinyasya pravrajitasahasrasya mama dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti/
S01divyav_u:17773: sandhānasya duhitā kathayati--tāta, eko 'dya pravrajito nāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:17775: sā pṛṣṭhaṃ vināmayitvā kathayati--tāta, īdṛśa iti/
S01divyav_u:17776: 462.020 yadanayā pratyekabuddho vināḍitaḥ, tasya karmaṇo vipākena kubjā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:17777: 462.021 punarapi bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:17778: kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena śrutadharāa jāteti?
S01divyav_u:17779: bhagavānāha--tena kālena tena samayena pratyekabuddhānām yaḥ saṃghasthaviraḥ sa vāyvādhikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17781: tasya saṃdhānaduhitrā hastāt kaṭānavatārya sa pratyekabuddha uktah--ārya, taistatpātraṃ sthāpayeti/
S01divyav_u:17786: evameva mamāpi saṃtāne ye dharmāḥ praviśeyuḥ,
S01divyav_u:17788: 462.026 yattayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena śrutadharā saṃvṛtā//
S01divyav_u:17789: 462.028 punarapi bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena dāsīsaṃvṛtteti?
S01divyav_u:17792: 462.031 punarapi bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta anupamayā karma yadeṣā nirāhārā bhūmigṛhe sthāpitā amlānagātrī cotthitā/
S01divyav_u:17793: 462.032 bhagavānāha--anupamayaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām//
S01divyav_u:17794: 463.001 [463]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin karvaṭake dve dārike anyonyasaṃstutike kṣatriyadārikā brāhmaṇadārikā ca/
S01divyav_u:17795: 463.002 asti buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:17797: 463.004 aparasmin divase pūrvāhṇe nivāsya piṇḍārthī pracalitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17798: taṃ dṛṣṭvā te dārike prasādite, asmai praṇītānnapūrṇaṃ pātraṃ prayacchataḥ/
S01divyav_u:17799: 463.005 tatkarmaṇo vipālenānupamā jātā, ekā ghoṣilasya gṛhapaterduhitā jātā mahāsundarī śrīmatī nāma/
S01divyav_u:17800: 463.006 ekasmin samaye rājñā dṛṣṭā pṛṣṭā ca--kasyeyaṃ kanyā? māntribhiḥ kathiyam--ghoṣilasya gṛhapateḥ/
S01divyav_u:17801: 463.007 tato ghoṣilo gṛhapatiḥ samāhūyoktah--gṛhapate, tava duhiteyaṃ kanyā? sa prāha--mama deva/
S01divyav_u:17805: udayanena vatsarājenāntaḥpuraṃ praveśya mahatā śrīsamudayena pariṇītā/
S01divyav_u:17807: 463.011 sa kathayati--ākāṅkṣase kiṃ tu bhikṣavo rājakulaṃ praviśānti/
S01divyav_u:17809: sarvathā yadi bhikṣudarśanaṃ na labhe, adyāgreṇa na bhokṣye na pāsya iti/
S01divyav_u:17811: rājñā ghoṣilo gṛhapatiruktah--gṛhapate, na tvaṃ duhitaraṃ pratyavekṣase?
S01divyav_u:17816: bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantrya bhojaya, antareṇa ca dvāraṃ chedayeti/
S01divyav_u:17819: 463.017 tato bhūri karma kārayitvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17820: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17821: 463.018 ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ ghoṣilaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:17822: 463.019 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tuṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:17823_0: 463.020 atha ghoṣilo gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādyena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu
S01divyav_u:17823_1: me bhagavāñchvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena mama nimantritaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
S01divyav_u:17825: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālāṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:17828: 463.024 pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairbuddhā bhagavanta aupadhike tiṣṭhanti--abhinirhṛtaṃ manrtayate sma/
S01divyav_u:17833: 463.027 sa praviśya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17834: atha śrīmatī devī sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ śāriputrapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā pūrvavadyāvannīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā purastānniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:17835: 463.029 athāyuṣmāñchāriputraḥ śrīmatīṃ devīṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:17837: āyuṣmāñchāriputraḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimāsyāḥ santi kānicitkuśalamūlāni? na santīti paśyati/
S01divyav_u:17844: 464.003 tena tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ ca prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:17845: yāṃ śrutvā śrīmatyā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ pūrvavadyāvatsarvaṃ vādyaṃ triśaraṇagamabhiprasannam/
S01divyav_u:17846: 464.005 athāyuṣmāñchāriputraḥ śrīmatīṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya prakrānto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17847: 464.006 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17848: ekānte niṣaṇṇa āyuṣmāñchāriputra etatprakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavate vistaraṇārocayati/
S01divyav_u:17856: 464.010 atha bhagavāñchikṣākāmatayā varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā pūrvavadyāvat pūrvikā prajñaptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17858_0: yaḥ punarbhikṣuranirgatāyāṃ rajanyāmanudgate 'ruṇe anirhṛteṣu ratneṣu ratnasaṃmateṣu
S01divyav_u:17858_1: vā rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhnābhiṣiktasya indrakīlaṃ vā idrakīlasāmantaṃ vā samatikrāmedanyatra
S01divyav_u:17863: 464.016 tatra nīlāruṇo nīlābhāsaḥ, pītāruṇaḥ pītābhāsaḥ, tāmrāruṇas tāmrābhāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17865: 464.017 ratneṣu veti ratnānyucyante maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaṃ pūrvavadyāvaddakṣiṇāvartaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17866: 464.018 ratnasaṃmateṣu veti ratnasaṃmatamucyate sarvaṃ saṃgrāmāvacaraśastraṃ sarvaṃ ca gandharvāvacaraṃ bhāṇḍam/
S01divyav_u:17867: 464.019 rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasyeti vā rājye stryapi rājyābhiṣikeṇābhiṣiktā bhavati,
S01divyav_u:17869: 464.020 kṣatriyo 'pi brāhmaṇo 'pi vaiśyo 'pi śūdro 'pi rājyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto bhavati rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17877: bhikṣuraprabhāte prabhātasaṃjñī nagarendrakīlaṃ samatikrāmati, āpadyate duṣkṛtām/
S01divyav_u:17881: 464.027 bhikṣuraprabhāte aprabhātasaṃjñī antaḥpurendrakīlam asmatikrāmati āpadyate pāpāntikam/
S01divyav_u:17884: anāpattih--rājā śabdayati--devyaḥ kumārā āmātyā aṣṭānāmantarāyāṇāmantyatamānyatamamupathitaṃ bhavati rājā cauramanuṣyāmanuṣyavyālāgnyudakānām/
S01divyav_u:17889: 465.002 buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:17891: 465.003 yadā pāṭaliputraṃ saṃvartate, tadā rorukaṃ vivartate/
S01divyav_u:17892: roruke mahānagare rudrāyaṇo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:17896: 465.006 tasya candraprabhā nāma devī, śikhaṇḍī putraḥ kumāraḥ, hirubhirustasyāgrāmātyau/
S01divyav_u:17897: 465.007 rājagṛhe rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:17898: 465.008 tasya vaidehī mahādevī, ajātaśatruḥ putraḥ kumāraḥ, varṣakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmātyo 'grāmātyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17903: asti kasyacidanyasyāpi rājña evamavidhā janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāṣca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca?
S01divyav_u:17907: te vaṇijaḥ kathayanti--asti deva pūrvadeśe rājagṛhaṃ nagaram/
S01divyav_u:17908: 465.014 tatra rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:17914: te kathayanti--devo ratnādhipatiḥ, sa rājā vastrādhipatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:17916: 465.019 tena tasya ratnānāṃ peṭāṃ pūrayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ lekhaśca dattah--priyavayasya,
S01divyav_u:17918: 465.020 yadā tava kiṃcid roruke nagare karaṇīyaṃ bhavati, mama lekho dātavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17920: te taṃ prābhṛtamādāya yena rājagṛhaṃ tena prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17922: taiḥ sā ratnapeṭā rājño bimbisārasyopanāmitā lekhaśca/
S01divyav_u:17923: rājā bimbisāro lekhaṃ vācayitvā amātyānāmantrayate--kiṃ bhavantastadrājño durlabham?
S01divyav_u:17924: amātyāḥ kathayanti--devo vastrādhipatiḥ, sa rājā ratnādhipatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:17926: tena tasya mahārhāṇāṃ vastrāṇāṃ vastrāṇāṃ peṭāṃ pūrayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ lekhaśca dattah--priyavayasya,
S01divyav_u:17928: 465.026 yatkiṃcittava rājagṛhe prayojanaṃ bhavati, mama lekho dātavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17930: 465.027 te taṃ prābhṛtamādāya yena rorukaṃ tena prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17932: 465.028 taiḥ sā vastrapeṭā rājño rudtāyaṇasyopanāmitā lekhaṣca/
S01divyav_u:17936: te kathayanti--yādṛśa eva devasya, api tu sa rājā svayaṃ prahartā/
S01divyav_u:17938: rudrāyaṇasya rājño maṇivarma pañcāṅgepetośītam uṣṇasaṃsparśamuṣṇe śootasaṃsparśaṃ duśchedaṃ durbhedaṃ viṣaghnamavabhāsātmakaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:17940: idaṃ mayā ca tava maṇivarma prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ pañcāṅgopetaṃ śīte uṣṇasaṃsparśamuṣṇe śītasaṃsparśaṃ duśchedaṃ durbhedaṃ viṣaghnamavabhāsātmakam/
S01divyav_u:17942: 466.003 sa dūtastanmaṇivarma ādāya lekhaṃ ca, yena rājagṛhaṃ tena prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17948: 466.006 dharmatā khalu yasya na śakyate mūlyaṃ kartum, tasyaikaikasya koṭimūlyaṃ kriyate/
S01divyav_u:17949: 466.007 rājā bimbisāro vyathitaḥ kathayati--kiṃ mayā tasya prābhṛtamanupreṣitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati?
S01divyav_u:17954: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17955: 466.010 rājā bimbisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--roruke bhadanta nagare rājā rudrāyaṇo nāma prativasati mamādṛṣṭasakhā/
S01divyav_u:17966: 466.017 te yamevāvayavaṃ bhagavataḥ paśyanti, tameva paśyanto na tṛptiṃ gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:17968: 466.019 bhagavānāha--mahārāja, khedamāpatsyante, na śakyate tathāgatasya nimittamudgrahītum/
S01divyav_u:17971: 466.020 tatra bhagavatā chāyā utsṛṣṭā, uktāśca--raṅgaiḥ pūrayata/
S01divyav_u:17979: 466.027 yadi kathayati--kimidam? vaktavyam--iyamabhyupapattiriyaṃ śikṣā iyaṃ lokasaṃvṛtiriyamatyutsāhatā/
S01divyav_u:17984: 466.029 asya tvayā ardhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyam/
S01divyav_u:17986: 466.031 vistīrṇāvakāśe pradeśe sthāpayitvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ satkāraṃ kṛtvodghāṭayitavyam/
S01divyav_u:17988: 466.032 rājñā bimbisāreṇa yathāsaṃdiṣṭaṃ lekho likhitvā saṃpreṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17993: kīdṛśaṃ mama tena prabhṛtamanupreṣitam yasya satkāraḥ kartavyo bhaviṣyati?
S01divyav_u:17997: 467.004 na śakyaṃ tena yadvā tadvā pratiprābhṛtamanupreṣayitum/
S01divyav_u:17999: 467.005 yadi devasya na cittaparitoṣo bhaviṣyati, tatra kālajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18003: 467.007 vistīrṇāvakāśe pradeśe sthāpayitvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvoddhāṭitā/
S01divyav_u:18005: 467.008 tairbuddhapratimāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaraveṇa nādo muktah--namo buddhāyeti/
S01divyav_u:18006: 467.009 tasya buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāṇyāhṛṣṭāni/
S01divyav_u:18007: sa kathayati--ka eṣa bhavanto buddho nāma?
S01divyav_u:18009: śākyānāṃ kumāra utpanno 'sti himavatpārśve nadyā bhāgīrathyāstīre kapilasya ṛṣerāśramapadasya nātidūre/
S01divyav_u:18012: rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgairvijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:18014: tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:18015: 467.014 pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:18016: 467.015 sa imāmeva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthvīṃkhilāmalaṇṭakāmanutpīḍāmadaṇḍenāśastreṇa dharmeṇa śamenābhinirjitya adhyāvasiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:18017: 467.016 sacet keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:18026: 467.021 atha rudrāyaṇo rājā sāmātyaḥ pratyūṣasamaye sarvārthān sarvakarmāntān pratiprasrabhya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:18029: asyotpādādidamutpadyate yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvatsamudayo nirodhaśca bhavati/
S01divyav_u:18030: 467.024 tenemaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyasamutpādamanulomapratilomaṃ vyavalokayatā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:18039: anādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:18042: atha sa rājā bimbisāro yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18043: 468.001 [468]upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18044: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo bhagavantamidamavocat--rudrāyaṇena bhadanta rājñā satyāni dṛṣṭāni/
S01divyav_u:18046: 468.003 bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--katamasya bhikṣo rudrāyaṇo rājā saparivāro vineyo rairukanivāsī ca janakāyah?
S01divyav_u:18048: 468.004 tatra bhgavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamāmantrayate--samanvāhara kātyāyana rauruke nagare rudrāyaṇaṃ rājānaṃ saparivāraṃ raurukanivāsinaṃ ca janakāyam/
S01divyav_u:18051: 468.007 athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastasyā eva rātryā atyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:18052_1: paribhuktaṃ śayanaṃ pratiśāmya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ pañcaśataparivāro yena raurukaṃ
S01divyav_u:18054: 468.011 priyavayasya, eṣa te bhikṣurmayā śāstṛkalpo mahāśrāvako 'nupreṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18055: 468.012 asya tvayārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyā nagaraśobhā ca/
S01divyav_u:18064: yena ekajanasahasraparivāreṇa ca svayameva pratyudgamya mahatā satkāreṇa rorukaṃ nagaraṃ praveśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18069: 468.019 ayuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18072: tata āyuṣmatā mahākātyāyanena tasyāḥ pariṣada āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:18080: 468.026 yadbhūyasā sā pariṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā//
S01divyav_u:18081: 468.027 rauruke nagare tiṣyaḥ puṣyaśca gṛhapatī vasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:18083: 468.028 upasaṃkramya āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau/
S01divyav_u:18084: 468.029 tiṣyapuṣyau gṛhapatī āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocatām--labhevahi āryamahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:18087_0: tābhyām yujyamānābhyāṃ vyāyacchamānābhyāṃ ghaṭamānābhyāmidameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
S01divyav_u:18089: 469.004 sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyau mānyavabhivādyau ca saṃvṛttau/
S01divyav_u:18090: tau jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau/
S01divyav_u:18091: 469.006 tayorjñātṛbhiḥ śarīrapūjāṃ kṛrtvā dvau stūpau kāritau--ekastiṣyasya, dvitīyaḥ puṇyasya//
S01divyav_u:18092_0: 469.007 rudrāyaṇo rājā dine dine āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasyāntikād dharmaṃ śrutvā antaḥpurasyārocayati--āryo
S01divyav_u:18092_1: mahākātyāyano madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudramiva madhuraṃ praprīṇayatīti /
S01divyav_u:18095: 469.010 yadyevam, yūyaṃ kasmāñ śṛṇutha? deva, vayaṃ hrīmantyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18096: kathaṃ vayaṃ tatra gatvā dharmaṃ śṛṇumah?
S01divyav_u:18097: yadyāryo mahākātyāyana ihaivāgatya dharmaṃ deśayet, evaṃ vayamapi śṛṇuyām iti/
S01divyav_u:18098: 469.011 rudrāyaṇena rājñā āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana uktah--mama ārya sāntaḥpuramicchati śrotum/
S01divyav_u:18099: 469.012 sa kathayati--mahārāja, na bhikṣavo 'ntaḥpuraṃ praviśya dharmaṃ deśayanti/
S01divyav_u:18101: 469.014 ārya, atra ko 'ntaḥpurasya dharmaṃ deśayati? mahārāja, bhikṣuṇyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18102: rudrāyaṇarājñā bimbisārasya rājño lekho 'nupreṣitah--priyavayasya, antaḥpuramicchati dharmaṃ śrotum/
S01divyav_u:18104: 469.016 bimbisāro rājā taṃ lekhaṃ vācayitvā yena bhagvāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18105: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18106: 469.017 ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā bimbisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--rudrāyaṇena bhagavan rājñā lekho 'nupreṣitah--antaḥpuramicchati dharmaṃ śrotum/
S01divyav_u:18109: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--katarasyā bhikṣuṇyā rudrāyaṇasya rājño antaḥpuraparijano vineyo raurukanivāsī ca strījana iti?
S01divyav_u:18111: 469.021 tatra bhagavāñchailāṃ bhikṣuṇīmāmantrayate--samanvāhara śaile rauruke nagare rudrāyaṇasya rājño 'ntaḥpurajanaṃ raurukanivāsinaṃ strījanamiti/
S01divyav_u:18112: 469.022 evaṃ bhadanteti śailā bhikṣuṇī bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntā/
S01divyav_u:18113_0: 469.024 atha śailā bhikṣuṇī tasyā eva rātrertyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya
S01divyav_u:18113_1: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhakrakṛtyā pañcādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntā yathāparibhuktaṃ
S01divyav_u:18113_2: śayanāsanaṃ pratisamayya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ pañcaśataparivārā yena raurukaṃ nagaraṃ
S01divyav_u:18114: 469.027 bimbisāreṇa ca rājñā rudrāyaṇasya rājño lekho 'nupreṣitah--priyavayasya,
S01divyav_u:18115: eṣā te mayā mahāśrāvikā śāstrānugatā pañcaśataparivārā preṣitā/
S01divyav_u:18116: 469.028 asyāṃ tvayārdharṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyā nagaraśobhā ca/
S01divyav_u:18118: abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kārayitavyāni,
S01divyav_u:18123: 469.032 rudrāyaṇena rājñā lekhaṃ vācayitvā prāmodyajātenārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kāritā/
S01divyav_u:18124: 470.001 anekajanasahasraparivāreṇa ca svayameva pratyudgamya mahatā satkāreṇa raurukaṃ nagaraṃ praveśitā/
S01divyav_u:18125: 470.002 abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kāritāni,
S01divyav_u:18128: 470.003 śailā bhikṣuṇī rudrāyaṇasya rājño 'ntaḥpuraṃ praviśya dine dinai dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:18129: 470.004 rudrāyaṇo rājā vīṇāyāṃ kṛtāvī, candraprabhā devī nṛtye/
S01divyav_u:18130: 470.005 yāvadapareṇa samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā vīṇāṃ vādayati, candraprabhā devī nṛtyati/
S01divyav_u:18134: candraprabhā devī kathayati--deva, mā mayā durnṛtyam? devi, na tvayā dunṛtyam/
S01divyav_u:18135: 470.008 api tu mayā tava nṛtyantyā vināśalakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam--saptame divase tava kālatriyā bhavatīti/
S01divyav_u:18136: 470.009 candraprabhā devī pādayor nipatya kathayati--deva yadyevam, kṛtopasthānāhaṃ devasya/
S01divyav_u:18139: 470.011 yadi tāvatpravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkaroṣi, eṣa eva te duḥkhāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18140: 470.012 atha sāvaśeṣasamyojanā kālaṃ kṛtvā deveṣūpapadyase, devabhūtayā te mamopadarśayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:18142: sā rudrāyaṇena rājñā śailāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ samarpitā--āryacandraptabhā devī ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikcuṇībhāvam/
S01divyav_u:18148: sā saptame divase kālagatā cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannā/
S01divyav_u:18149: 470.018 dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya,
S01divyav_u:18154: 470.021 kena karmaṇā? bhagavataḥ śāsane brāhmacaryaṃ caritveti/
S01divyav_u:18155: tasyā etadabhavat--tadapratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitum/
S01divyav_u:18158: 470.026 bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:18159: yāṃ śrutvā candraprabhayā devakanyayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃsatkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:18161: na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭair nasvajanabandhuvargair na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:18171: 471.007 prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padamāryakāntaṃ tīrṇaśca duḥkhārṇavapāramasmi//5//
S01divyav_u:18174: 471.013 avanamya tataḥ pralambahārā caraṇau dvāvabhivandya jāraharṣā/
S01divyav_u:18175: 471.015 parigamya pradakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukhī divaṃ jagāma//7//
S01divyav_u:18180: yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśāmāgatā tayaiva vibhūtyā svarbhavanaṃ saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:18182: 471.020 atha candraprabhā devakanyā yena rājā rudrāyaṇastenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:18183: tena khalu samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā ekākī gṛhasyoparitalake śayitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18184: 471.021 sa tayā udārāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā acchaṭāśabdena pratibodhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18185: 471.022 sa middhāvasthalocanāparisphuṭo 'vijñātaḥ kathayati--kā tvamiti? sā kathayati--ahaṃ candraprabheti/
S01divyav_u:18187: sā kathayati--deva, cyutāhaṃ kālagatā cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannā/
S01divyav_u:18188: 471.024 yadīcchasi mayā sārdhaṃ samāgamam, bhagavato 'ntike pravraja/
S01divyav_u:18189: 471.025 yadi tāvaddṛṣṭadharmā sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyase, sa eva te 'nto dukhasya/
S01divyav_u:18190: 471.026 atha sāvaśeṣasamyojanaḥ, kālaṃ kṛtvā cārturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapatsyase/
S01divyav_u:18191: tatra te mayā sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:18193: rudrāyaṇo rājā kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ pravrajyāmanuvicintayan kālyamevotthāya amātyānāmantrayate--paśyata bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18196: 471.029 rudrāyaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ devatācodito 'ham agāramadhyāvaseyam/
S01divyav_u:18198: 471.031 yannvahaṃ śikhaṇḍinaṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:18200: yādṛśa eva mama śikhaṇḍī kumāraḥ putraḥ,
S01divyav_u:18202: 472.001 sa eṣa yuvābhyāmahitānnivārayitavyo hite ca saṃniyojayitavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18206: yathaiva tvaṃ mama vacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyase,
S01divyav_u:18207: tathā anayorapi hirubhirukayoragrāmātyayorvacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyathāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18210: tato rudrāyaṇena rājñā rauruke nagare ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto raurukanivāsinaḥ paurā nānādeśābhyāgataśca janakāyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18211: 472.007 ahaṃ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:18212: 472.008 bhūyaśaḥ putramāha--putra, tvayā rājyaṃ kārayatā kasyacidaparādhyaṃ na kṣantavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:18214: śrutvā sarva eva raurukanivāsī janakāyo 'nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgātaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18215_0: 472.010 tato rudrāyaṇo rājā śikhaṇḍinaṃ kumāraṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpya bandhujanaṃ kṣamāpayitvā
S01divyav_u:18215_1: śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā paṇyāni kṛtvā ekena puruṣeṇopasthāyakena
S01divyav_u:18216: 472.012 tataḥ śikhaṇḍī rājā sāntaḥpurāmātyapaurajanapado 'nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgato janakāyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18221: so 'pi janakāyaḥ samāśvāsyoktah--bhavantaḥ, eṣa yuṣmākaṃ rājā samanuyukto mayā/
S01divyav_u:18223: 472.019 rājā śikhaṇḍī sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajanapado 'śruparuyākulekṣaṇo muhūrmuhūr nivartya nirīkṣamāṇo raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pratinivṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18224: 472.020 tato rudrāyaṇo rājā anupūrveṇa rājagṛhaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18225: 472.021 tenodyāne sthitvā sa puruṣa uktah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:18226: rājño bimbisārasya gatvā nivedaya--rudrāyaṇo nāma udyāne tiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:18227: 472.022 tena puruṣeṇa gatvā rājño bimbisārasya niveditam--deva,
S01divyav_u:18231: 472.024 na yuṣmākaṃ kenacidvijñāt iti? sa kathayati--deva, kuto 'sya sādhanam? ātmanā dvitīya āgata iti/
S01divyav_u:18232: 472.025 rājā bimbisāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ rāhānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhnāmiṣiktamevameva praveśayeyam/
S01divyav_u:18233: 472.027 mahatā satkāreṇa praveśayāmīti viditvā mārgaśobhāṃ bagaraśobhāṃ ca kārayitvā caturaṅgena balakāyena pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:18234: 472.028 kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya hastiskandhe āropya rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ praveśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18238: sphītaṃ rājyamapāsya antaḥpuraṃ kumārānāmātyān paurajanapadān kimihāgamanaprayojanam?
S01divyav_u:18241: sa kathayati--vayasya, [473]ākaṅkṣāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:18242: 473.001 iti śrutvā rājā bimbisāra āttamanāḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇabāhumābhiprasāryodānamudānayati--aho buddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18245_0: yatredānīmevaṃvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ sphītaṃ rājyamapahāya sphītamantaḥpuraṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ
S01divyav_u:18245_1: sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyapahāya ākāṅkṣante svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam /
S01divyav_u:18246: 473.005 ityuktvā rājānaṃ rudrāyaṇaṃ samādāya yena bhagavāṃsetnopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18247: 473.006 tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:18248: 473.007 adrākṣīdbhagavān rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:18249: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣavo rājā bimbisāraḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:18252: rājā bimbisāro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18253: 473.010 ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā biṃvisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhadanta rājā rudrāyaṇa ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:18255: 473.012 sa bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitah--ehi bhikṣo, cara brāhmacaryamiti/
S01divyav_u:18256: 473.013 sa bhagavato vācāvasāne eva muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:18257: 473.015 ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparivṛtadehaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18258: 473.017 sadyaḥ praśāntendraya eva tasthau evaṃ sthito buddho manorathena//8//
S01divyav_u:18259: 473.019 āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇṭāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:18261: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtah--rudrāyaṇo rājā bhagavatā pravrajitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18266: rudrāyaṇo rājā rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭo 'nekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtastiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:18267: 473.024 śrutvā ca punā rājā bimbisāro yena rudrāyaṇo bhikṣustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18271: 473.028 bhuktvā śatapale pātre sauvarṇe rājate 'tha vā/
S01divyav_u:18285: 474.011 koṣṭhāgārāṇi kośaṃ ca bahuvittaṃ prahāya vai/
S01divyav_u:18291: 474.017 kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rājan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
S01divyav_u:18293: 474.019 kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rāhan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
S01divyav_u:18294: 474.020 dadāmi pravarān bhogān yān kāṃścinmanasecchasi//20// iti/
S01divyav_u:18296: 474.022 na rājan kṛpaṇo loke dharmakāyena saṃspṛśet/
S01divyav_u:18300: 474.026 śṛṇu me tvaṃ mahārāja dharmatā deśayāmyaham/
S01divyav_u:18301: 474.027 śrutvā dharmaṃ tato jñeyo yadi tvaṃ prītimeṣyasi//23//
S01divyav_u:18305: 474.031 trīṭā tatra ratiḥ kā vā putraparadhaneṣu vā//25//
S01divyav_u:18307: 475.002 śaurā dhanaṃ prārthayante rājan mukto 'smi bandhanāt//26//
S01divyav_u:18308: 475.003 na bhaiṣajyāni trāyante na dhanaṃ jñātayo na ca/
S01divyav_u:18309: 475.004 na sarvavidyā na balaṃ na śauryaṃ trāyate 'ntakāt//27/
S01divyav_u:18311: 475.007 āyuḥkṣayānte 'pi tataścyavante mucyeta ko neha śarīrabhedāt//28//
S01divyav_u:18312: 475.009 rājyāni kṛtvāpi mahānubhāvā vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kuravaśca pāṇḍavāśca/
S01divyav_u:18313: 475.011 saṃpannacittā yaśasā jvalantas te na śaktā maraṇaṃ nopagantum//29//
S01divyav_u:18314: 475.013 na samyamena tapasā na rājan na karmaṇā na rājan na karmaṇā vīryaparākrameṇa vā/
S01divyav_u:18315: 475.015 na vittapūgair na dhanairudāraiḥ śakyaṃ kadācinmaraṇādvimoktam//30//
S01divyav_u:18316: 475.017 naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praviśya/
S01divyav_u:18317: 475.019 na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta mṛtyuḥ//31//
S01divyav_u:18318: 475.021 naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praciśya/
S01divyav_u:18319: 475.023 na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta karma//32//
S01divyav_u:18323: 475.028 śaṅkhavarṇāni śīrṣāṇi tāni dṛṣṭveha kā ratiḥ//34//
S01divyav_u:18330: 476.005 purā hi tvāṃ vyāghra iva mṛgaṃ nihatya vyādhirjarā karṣati antakaśca/
S01divyav_u:18331: 476.007 na te mitrāṇyapaneṣyanti rogaṃ saṃgamya sodaryagaṇāśca sarve//38//
S01divyav_u:18332: 476.009 yadeva labdhādhikamasya bhavati dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpam/
S01divyav_u:18334: 476.013 sacedṛṇaṃ bhvati piturmṛtasya priyāḥ sutā nāsya vahṇiṃ viśanti mṛtyau na vāpyaśrumukhā rudanti rāhuḥ pitā mama kāryateti(?)//40//
S01divyav_u:18335: 476.017 āyāntu sattvāḥ pitā mameti prakīrṇakeśāśrumukhā rudanti/
S01divyav_u:18336: 476.019 jyotiścāsya purato haranti hyaho batāyamamaro bhavediti//41//
S01divyav_u:18337: 476.021 dūṣyairenaṃ prāvṛtaṃ nirharanti jyotiḥ samādāya {ca tam} dahanti/
S01divyav_u:18338: 476.023 sa dahyate jñātibhī rudyamāna ekena vastreṇa vihāya bhogam//42//
S01divyav_u:18339: 476.025 eko hyayaṃ jāyate jāyamānastathā mriyate mriyamāṇo 'yamekaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18340: 476.027 eko duḥkhānanubhavatīha jantur na vidyate saṃsarataḥ sahāyaḥ//43//
S01divyav_u:18341: 476.029 etacca dṛṣṭveha parivrajanti kulāyakāste na bhavanti santaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18342: 476.031 te sarvasaṃgānabhisamprahāya na garbhaśayyāṃ punarāvasānti//33// iti/
S01divyav_u:18343: 477.001 [477]atha bimbisāro rājā rudrāyaṇena bhikṣuṇā uttarottareṇa pratibhānena nirākṛtastūṣṇīṃ niṣpratibhaḥ prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:18344: 477.003 atha śikhaṇḍī rājā yāvatkaṃciddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18345: 477.004 sa hirubhirukābhyāmuktah--deva, dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kāraya, mā adharmeṇa/
S01divyav_u:18347: 477.005 tadyathā deva puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāśca kālena kālaṃ samyakparipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṃ puṣpāṇi phalāni cānuprayacchanti,
S01divyav_u:18348: evameva janapadāḥ pritipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṃ karapratyāyānanuprayacchantīti/
S01divyav_u:18349: 477.007 sa tābhyāṃ nivārito yāvattāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapyadharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18353: ruṣito 'mātyānāmantrayate--yo bhavanto rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya yāvat trirapyājñāṃ prativahati,
S01divyav_u:18355: 477.011 tatra kecidduṣṭāmātyāḥ kathayanti--deva, kimatra jñātavyam? tasya vadho daṇḍa iti/
S01divyav_u:18357: 477.013 amātyasya ca duṣṭasya dantasya calitasya ca/
S01divyav_u:18360: 477.016 kośasthaṃ ca balasthaṃ ca yo na hanyātsa ghātyate//43// iti/
S01divyav_u:18361: 477.017 śikhaṇḍī rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ, mamaitau pitrā saṃnyastau/
S01divyav_u:18363: 477.018 kiṃ tvābhyāṃ mama darśanapathe na sthātavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:18374: 477.025 dharmeṇa vā kārayati svarājyaṃ na cāsya kaścitparatopasargaḥ//47// iti/
S01divyav_u:18376: 477.028 tathyaṃ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo balavānarogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18377: 477.030 na cāsya kaścitparatopasargo adharmeṇa tu rājyaṃ karoti nityam//48//
S01divyav_u:18380: sa kathayati--deva, hirubhirukayoramātyayordvāraṃ nivārya anyau duṣṭāmātyau sthāpitau/
S01divyav_u:18382: rudrāyaṇaḥ kathayati--gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa, raurukanivāsinaṃ janakāyaṃ samāścāsaya/
S01divyav_u:18385: 478.006 sa vaṇik paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya saṃprasthito 'nupūrveṇa raurukamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18386: 478.007 tena jñātīnāṃ rahasi niveditam--bhavantaḥ, ahaṃ paṇyamādāya rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:18390: hite ca saṃniyojayiṣyāmi yathā janapadānna pīḍayatīti/
S01divyav_u:18392: 478.010 evaṃ karṇaparamparayā sa śabdastayorduṣṭāmātyayoḥ karṇaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:18396: 478.012 tadupāyasaṃvidhānaṃ ca kartavyam yenāsavantarmārga eva praghātyata iti/
S01divyav_u:18397: 478.013 tābhyāṃ rājñaḥ śikhaṇḍina ārocitam--deva, śrūyate vṛddharājā āgacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:18400: tau kathayatah--deva, yenaikadivasamapi rājyaṃ kāritam, sa vinā rājyenābhiraṃsyata iti kṛta etat?
S01divyav_u:18402: 478.016 śikhaṇḍī kathayati--yadyasau rājā bhaviṣyati, ahaṃ sa eva kumāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:18403: ko nu virodha iti? tau kathayatah--deva, apratirūpametat/
S01divyav_u:18404: 478.017 kathaṃ nāma kumārāmātyapaurajanapadairañjalisahasrair namasyamānena rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapi kumāravāsena vastavyam?
S01divyav_u:18405: varaṃ deśaparityāgo na tu kumāravāsena vāsam/
S01divyav_u:18406: 478.019 tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṃ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet,
S01divyav_u:18409: evameva rājyaṃ kārayitvā punaḥ kumāravāsena vāsa iti/
S01divyav_u:18413: 478.022 yadi na praghātyate, niyataṃ duṣṭāmātyavigrāhito devaṃ praghātayatīti/
S01divyav_u:18414: 478.023 sa evamukte hīnadīnavadano mūhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā bāṣpoparudhyamānahṛdayaḥ karuṇadīnavilambitairakṣaraiḥ sa kathayati--bhavantau,
S01divyav_u:18417: 478.026 pitā vā yadi vā bhrātā putro vā svāṅganiḥsṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18421: 478.030 ekaśca tatra śatruḥ syāttadarthe tānnimajjayet//50// iti/
S01divyav_u:18424: 478.033 grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet//51// iti/
S01divyav_u:18429: 479.002 kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṃcitpāpaṃ karmākaraṇīyamiti tenādhivāsitam--evaṃ kriyatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:18436: 479.006 tābhyāṃ te hiraṇyasuvarṇagrāmapradānādinā protsāhitā na pratipadyante/
S01divyav_u:18438: bhavantah etān puruṣān saputradārān sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavāṃścārake baddhvā sthāpayateti/
S01divyav_u:18439: 479.008 te śrutvā bhītāḥ saṃpratipannāḥ kathayanti--deva, alaṃ krodhena/
S01divyav_u:18443: 479.010 āyuṣmānapi rudrāyaṇastrayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayātkṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaram yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18444: 479.011 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantamidamavocat--icchāmyahaṃ bhadanta raurukaṃ nagaraṃ janapadacārikāṃ caritumiti/
S01divyav_u:18446: athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18447: 479.014 āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:18448: 479.015 rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratisāmayya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ karmabalapreritam--
S01divyav_u:18449: 479.018 dūraṃ hi karṣate karma dūrātkarma prakarṣate/
S01divyav_u:18450: 479.019 tatra prakarṣate jantum yatra karma vipacyate//52//
S01divyav_u:18451: 479.020 iti yena raurukaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18452: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ carannantarmārge 'nyatamaṃ karvaṭakaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18457: sa taiḥ puruṣaiḥ sārdhamekasminnevodyāne rātriṃdevā samupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:18460: 479.026 dharmeṇa vā kārayati svakaṃ rājyaṃ na cāsya kaccitparatopasargaḥ//53// iti/
S01divyav_u:18462: 479.029 deva, tathyaṃ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo bakavānarogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18463: 479.031 na cāsya kaścitparatopasargah adharmarājyaṃ tu karoti nityam//54//
S01divyav_u:18465: 480.002 tasyāpi tu yatsadṛśaṃ tadadya upalapsyase saubhyeti//55//
S01divyav_u:18466: 480.003 āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ, kimasau mama tatra gamanaṃ nābhinandatīti?
S01divyav_u:18468: 480.004 sa kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yadevaṃ na gacchāmi, pratinivartāmīti/
S01divyav_u:18470: 480.006 kva yāsyasi tvaṃ naravīra bhūyo na te suto nandati jīvitena/
S01divyav_u:18471: 480.008 vayaṃ hyadhanyā nṛpasamprayuktā ihābhyupetāstava ghātanāya //56// iti//
S01divyav_u:18472: 480.010 āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ, yūyaṃ nāma mama vadhakapuruṣāh? deva, vadhakapuruṣāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18473: 480.011 sa saṃlakṣayati--yattaduktaṃ bhagavatā karmasvakatā te rudrāyaṇa manasikartavyeti, idaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:18474: 480.012 sarvathā dhik saṃsārabhaṅguramiti viditvā teṣāṃ kathayati--bhadramukhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:18478: 480.014 te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā kathayanti--deva, evaṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:18479: athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo 'nyatamaṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍataṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā śānteneryāpathenāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18480: 480.015 uktaṃ bhagavatā--pañcānuśaṃsā bāhuśrutye--skandhakuśalo bhavati dhātukuśala āyatanakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18482_0: 480.017 tena vīryamārabhya idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā
S01divyav_u:18485: 480.022 athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo 'rhattvaprāpto vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṃvedī tasyā velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:18487: 480.025 adyāpyudrāyaṇo bhikṣū rājadharmair na mucyate//57// iti/
S01divyav_u:18488: 480.026 ityuktvā tān vadhakapuruṣānuvāca--bhadramukhāḥ, yaṃ mayā prāptavyaṃ tatprāptam/
S01divyav_u:18491: yadi śikhaṇḍī rājā asmān pṛcchati--kiṃ vṛddharājena maraṇasamaye vyākṛtamiti,
S01divyav_u:18495: 480.031 ahaṃ ca parinirvāsye tvaṃ cāvīciṃ gamiṣyasi//58// iti/
S01divyav_u:18496: 481.001 [481]idaṃ cāparaṃ vaktavyah--dve ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18499: atyayamatyayato deśaya, apyetatkarma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchediti/
S01divyav_u:18502: yam yam ṛddhyupāyaṃ prārabhate, tasya dharmavinaṣṭatvād ṛkaro 'pi na pratibhāti prāgeva ṛddhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:18503: 481.005 tatasteṣāmekena puruṣeṇa nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena kakṣādasiṃ niṣkṛṣya utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:18505: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
S01divyav_u:18506: tasmin samaye nīlapītakohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti,
S01divyav_u:18509_0: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ
S01divyav_u:18509_1: nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvamutpalaṃ padman mahāpadmaṃ narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu
S01divyav_u:18512: teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, āhosvidanyatropapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:18514: 481.015 teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, nāpyanyatropapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18517: te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya taṃ narakanivedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:18519_3: sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamanātmetyuddhoṣayanti /
S01divyav_u:18525: 481.027 atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokaghātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
S01divyav_u:18526: 481.028 tadyadi bhagavānatītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati, bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'ntardhīyante/
S01divyav_u:18538: 482.001 atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādatale 'ntarhitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18545: 482.013 tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:18548: 482.018 yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//64// iti/
S01divyav_u:18550: nāhetvapratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:18554: 482.024 rudrāyaṇa ānanda arhattvaṃ prāpto jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18556: 482.025 atha te vadhakapuruṣā āyuṣmato rudrāyaṇasya pātracīvaraṃ khikkhitaṃ cādāya raurukamanuprāptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18558: tau śrutvā prītiprāmodyajātau yena śikhaṇḍī rājā tenopasaṃkrāntau/
S01divyav_u:18561: kathaṃ kṛtvā? yo devasya śatruḥ, sa praghātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18565: tābhyāṃ te vadhakapuruṣā darśitāh--deva, ime te badhakapuruṣā yaurasau praghātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18566: 482.030 śokhaṇḍanā rājñā te pṛṣṭāh--bhavantaḥ, kiyadvṛddharājasya balam/
S01divyav_u:18567: 482.031 deva, kutastasya balam? idaṃ pātracīvaraṃ khikkhiraṃ ceti/
S01divyav_u:18568: śikhaṇḍī [483]rājā mūrcchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatito jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18572: 483.004 ahaṃ ca parinirvāsye tvaṃ cāvīciṃ gamiṣyase//66// iti/
S01divyav_u:18573: 483.005 idaṃ cāparaṃ vaktavyah--dve tvayā ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18579: 483.008 tena hirubhirukāvagrāmātyāvāhūtoktaubhavantau, na yuvābhyāmahamīdṛśakarma kurvāṇo nivārita iti?
S01divyav_u:18581: 483.010 kathaṃ nivārayāma iti? tena tau duṣṭāmātyau adarśanapathe vyavasthāpitau/
S01divyav_u:18583: tābhyāmapi duṣṭāmātyābhyāṃ pracchannaṃ tiṣyapuṣyastūpayordve bale kṛtvā dvau biḍālapotakau sthāpitau/
S01divyav_u:18585: yena satyena satyavacanena yuvābhyāṃ māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau,
S01divyav_u:18586: tena satyena satyavacanena māṃsapeśīṃ kṛtvā svakasvakaṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakaṃ balaṃ praviśatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:18588: tadā tābhyāṃ duṣṭāmātyābhyāṃ rudrāyaṇasya rājño devī uktā--devi,
S01divyav_u:18590: 483.017 kimadhyupekṣasa iti? sā kathayati--kimahaṃ karomīti? yuvābhyāmevāsāvīdṛśakarma kārita iti/
S01divyav_u:18591: 483.018 tau kathayati--devi, yatra gha{aḥ patitaḥ, kiṃ tatra rajjurapi pātayitavyā?
S01divyav_u:18598: tvamapyevaṃ kathayasi--kasmāttvamutpāḍūtpāṇḍuḥ kṛśāluko durbako mlāno 'prāptakāya iti,
S01divyav_u:18599: kathamahaṃ notpāṇḍūtpāṇḍuko bhavāmi kṛśāluko dubalako mlāno 'prāptakāya iti,
S01divyav_u:18600: yena mayā duṣṭāmātyavigrāhitena dve ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitādvyaparopito yaccārhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāśravah?
S01divyav_u:18602: 483.026 sā kathayati--putra, abhayaṃ tāvatprayaccha, yatsatyaṃ tatkathayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:18606: kiṃ tu mayā ṛtusnātayā anyena puruṣeṇa sārthaṃ paricaritam,
S01divyav_u:18609: 483.029 iti viditvā kathayati--amba, yadyevaṃ pitṛvadho nāsti, athadvadho 'sti/
S01divyav_u:18610: sa kathaṃ nistārya iti? sā kathayati--putra, jñānakocidāḥ praṣṭavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18612: 483.031 tayā tau duṣṭāmātyau āhūyoktau--mayā asya pitṛvadho vinoditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18614: 483.032 śikhaṇḍinā rājñā amātyānāmājñā dattā, sarvāmātyān [484]saṃnipātayata ye ca kecijjñānakovidā iti/
S01divyav_u:18615: 484.001 taiḥ sarvāmātyāḥ saṃnipātitāḥ, ye ca kecijjñānakovidāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18619: apare kathayanti--deva, arhantaḥ sarvajñānakalpā ākāśagāmina iti/
S01divyav_u:18620: 484.004 tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--deva, kimatra śokaḥ kriyate?
S01divyav_u:18621: sa kathayati--yuvāmapyevaṃ kathayatha--kimarthaṃ śokaḥ kriyate iti,
S01divyav_u:18625: sa kathayati--mayā pratyakṣadṛṣṭau tiṣyapuṣyau arhantau jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau nirvātau/
S01divyav_u:18627: tau kathayatah--vayaṃ devasya pratyakṣīkurmo yathā māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau adyatve 'pi stūpe tiṣṭhata iti/
S01divyav_u:18628: 484.010 rājā amātyānāmantrayate--bhavantaḥ, yadyevamāgacchata gacchāmaḥ, paśyāmaḥ kiṃ bhūtamabhūtaṃ veti/
S01divyav_u:18629: 484.011 eṣa ca śabdo rauruke nagare samantato visṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18631_0: tatastau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--yathā tiṣyapuṣyau yena satyena satyavacanena yuvāṃ
S01divyav_u:18631_1: māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau
S01divyav_u:18632: 484.014 anena satyena satyavacanena imāṃ māṃsapeśīmādāya svakasvakaṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakaṃ bilaṃ praviśatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:18635: tau māṃsapeśīmādāya svakasvakastūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakabilaṃ praviṣṭau/
S01divyav_u:18636: 484.017 tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayata--dṛṣṭaṃ deveneti? sa kathayati--dṛṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:18639: tasya yāsau dṛṣṭih--santi loke 'rhanta iti, sā prativigatā/
S01divyav_u:18644: śikhaṇḍī rājā saṃlakṣayati--yadi na santyeva loke 'rhantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18645: kimarhtamāryakāśyapasya kātyāyanasya pañcaśataparivārasya śaulāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ plañcaśataparivārāyāḥ piṇḍakamanuprayacchāmīti?
S01divyav_u:18646: tena bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ ca piṇḍapātaḥ samucchinnaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18648: athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ śaulā ca bhikṣuṇī vinayāpekṣayā tatraivāvasthatau/
S01divyav_u:18650: 484.025 āyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyano raurukaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya praviśati/
S01divyav_u:18654: kimarthamayamāryo mahākātyāyano māṃ dṛṣṭvā ekānte 'pakramyāvasthita iti/
S01divyav_u:18663: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyano raurukaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya caritvā nirgacchati, rājā ca śikhaṇḍī praviśati/
S01divyav_u:18666: pūrvamapyayamāryo mahākātyāyano māṃ dṛṣṭvā ekānte 'pakramyāvasthitaḥ, sāmpratimapi/
S01divyav_u:18667: 485.003 ko 'tra heturiti? tasya pṛṣṭhatastau duṣṭāmātyau gacchataḥ/
S01divyav_u:18668: tau kathayatah--deva, eṣa kathayati--mā ahamasya pitṛmārakasya rajasā pravrajyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:18676: ekaikayā pāṃśumuṣṭyā āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasyopari mahān pāṃśurāśirvyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18682: te kathayanti--tena kalirājena pitṛmārakeṇa āryo mahākātyāyano 'duṣyanayakārī pāṃśunā avaṣṭabdha iti/
S01divyav_u:18683: 485.011 tau sāśrukaṇṭhau rudanmukhau gopālakapaśupālakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pāṃśūnapanetumārabdhau/
S01divyav_u:18687: tau kathayatah--ārya, yadidaṃ śikhaṇḍinā mahākātyāyane janakāyasahāyena karma kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:18689: 485.015 itaḥ saptame divase raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pāṃśunā avaṣṭapsyate/
S01divyav_u:18692: prathame divase mahāvāyurāgatya raurukaṃ nagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakapālaṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:18699: 485.019 teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratvavarṣaṃ patiṣyati, saptame divase pāṃśuvarṣamiti/
S01divyav_u:18700: tau kathayatah--ārya, kimāvāmasya karmaṇo bhāvinau? bhadramukhau, na yuvāmasya karmaṇo bhāginau/
S01divyav_u:18702: sa kathayati--yuvām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe nāvaṃ sthāpayitvā tiṣṭhata/
S01divyav_u:18703: 485.023 yadā ratnavarṣaṃ patet, tadā ratnānāṃ nāvaṃ pūrayitvā niṣpalāyitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:18704: tau tasya pādayor nipatya raurukaṃ praviṣṭau/
S01divyav_u:18705: 485.024 rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ praviṣṭau kathayatah--kiṃ devenāryo mahākātyāyanaḥ kiṃciduktaḥ pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdhah?
S01divyav_u:18707: 485.025 kiṃ kathayati--deva, evaṃ kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pāṃśunā avaṣṭapsyata iti/
S01divyav_u:18711: prathame tāvaddivase mahavāyurāgatya raurukaṃ nagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakapālaṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:18716: paścādyai raurukasāmantakanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṃ karma kṛtaṃ te raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pravekṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:18717: teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratnavarṣaṃ patiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:18719: 485.031 tau kathayatah--ārya, kimāvāmapyasya karmaṇo bhāginau? bhadramukhau, na yuvāmasya karmaṇo bhāginau/
S01divyav_u:18721: sa kathayati--[486]yuvām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe nāvaṃ sthāpayitvā tiṣṭhata/
S01divyav_u:18722: 486.002 yadā ratnavarṣaṃ patet, tadā ratnānāṃ nāvaṃ pūrayitvā niṣpalayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:18723: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--samucchinnapiṇḍapātaḥ pāṃśuvarṣeṇāvaṣṭabadhaḥ sa kimanyadvadatu?
S01divyav_u:18724: īdṛśaṃ vā vadate, devato vā pāpanaramiti(?)/
S01divyav_u:18726: hirubhirukāvagrāmātyau mukhaṃ vibhaṇḍya hastān saṃparivartya prakrāntau/
S01divyav_u:18729: hitukena śyāmāko dāraka āyuṣmate mahākātyāyanāya dattah--ārya,
S01divyav_u:18732: 486.008 bhirukenāpi śyāmāvatī dārikā śailāyā bhikṣuṇyā dattā--ārye,
S01divyav_u:18734: 486.009 no cet kauśāmbyāṃ ghoṣilo nāma gṛhapatirmama vayasyastasya samarpayiṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:18736: atha śailā bhikṣuṇī śyāmāvatīmādāya ṛddhyā raurukānnagarāt prakrāntā/
S01divyav_u:18740: hirubhirukābhyāmagrāmātyābhyām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe ca nauḥ sthāpitā/
S01divyav_u:18744: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--deva, śrūyate rājño māndhātuḥ saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patitamiti/
S01divyav_u:18747: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--devasyedaṃ vastravarṣaṃ patitam, nacirādvirāddhiraṇyavarṣaṃ patiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:18749: 486.019 tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--devasyedaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patitam, nacirādeva suvarṇavarṣaṃ patiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:18751: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--devasyedaṃ suvarṣaṃ ptatitam, nacirādeva ratnavarṣaṃ patiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:18752: 486.021 yau raurukasāmantakanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṃ karma kṛtam, te raurukaṃ nagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18753: 486.022 teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratnavarṣaṃ patitam/
S01divyav_u:18755: 486.023 tatra hirukeṇānyatamasmin pradeśe hirukaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitam/
S01divyav_u:18757: bhirukeṇānyatamasmin pradeśe bhirukaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitam/
S01divyav_u:18761: śyāmākaḥ kathayati--ārya, kimeṣa uccaśabdo mahāśabda iti/
S01divyav_u:18762: 486.027 āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ kathayati--putra, vātāyanena kāśikāṃ niṣkāsayeti/
S01divyav_u:18769: atha yā raurukanivāsinī devatā sā yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:18773: āyṣmatā mahākātyāyanena śyāmāka uktah--putra, gṛhāṇa cīvarakarṇikam/
S01divyav_u:18776: sa ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā śyāmākaṃ dārakamādāya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18781: 487.005 āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ śyāmākaṃ dārakaṃ khalabhidhāne sthāpayitvā pinṇḍapātraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18784: sa taṃ dārakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--bho dāraka,
S01divyav_u:18786: 487.008 sa kathayati--na mama prabhāvāt khalabhidhāne dhānyaṃ vardhata iti,
S01divyav_u:18787: api tu raurukanivāsinī devatā ihāgatā amuṣmin pradeśe tiṣṭhati,
S01divyav_u:18788: tasyāḥ prabhāvāt khalābhidhāne dhānyaṃ vardhata iti/
S01divyav_u:18789: 487.010 sa tasyāḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā pādayor nipatya kathayati--devate,
S01divyav_u:18792: 487.011 na ca tvayā māṃ muktvā anyasya kasyaciddātavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:18793: 487.012 tenāpi karvaṭakaṃ gatvā karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyaḥ saṃnipātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18794: 487.013 uktaśca--bhavantaḥ, raurukanivāsinī devatā ihāgatā khalābhidhāne tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:18796: tasyā haste mayā tāḍakaṃ kuñcikā ca dattā/
S01divyav_u:18797: 487.015 {uktam} ca--devate, tāḍakaṃ kuñcikāṃ ca tāvaddhāraya yāvad grāmaṃ gatvā āgacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:18798: 487.016 na ca tvayā māṃ muktvā anyasya kasyaciddātavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:18805: tataḥ sarvaṃ tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ gandhapuṣpośobhitaṃ chatradhvajapatākāśobhitaṃ ca balimādāya yena devatā tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18806: 487.021 upasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--devate, adhiṣṭhā bhava, ihaiva tiṣṭheti/
S01divyav_u:18810: samanvāhara asya yasya sakāśāt tāḍakaḥ kuñcikā ca gṛhīteti/
S01divyav_u:18813: 487.025 tauryādṛśameva tasyā devatāyāḥ sthaṇḍilaṃ kāritaṃ tādṛśamevāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya/
S01divyav_u:18815: tamasau gṛhītvā āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sthaṇḍile sthāpayati/
S01divyav_u:18816: 487.028 sā anyatamena puruṣeṇa prākārakaṇṭake sthitena pradīpaṃ gṛhītvā gacchantī dṛṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:18817: 487.029 sa saṃlakṣayati--eṣā devatā āryasya mahākātyāyanasyābhisātikā gacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:18824: 488.001 adhiṣṭhānanivāsinā janakāyena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāh--kimetaditi? te kathayanti devatāprakopa iti/
S01divyav_u:18827: te bhūyaḥ kathayanti--kṣamakha devate, na kaścidasatkāraṃ kariṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:18829: 488.005 te kathayanti--devate kṣamakha, prativiśiṣṭataraṃ kurma iti/
S01divyav_u:18832: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastatra varṣoṣitaḥ śyāmākaṃ dārakamādāya devatāmupāmantrya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18833: 488.007 sā kathayati--ārya, mama kiciccihnamanuprayaccha, yatrāhaṃ kārāṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmīti/
S01divyav_u:18835: 488.009 tayātra prakṣipya stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito mahaśca prasthāpitah--kāśīmaha kāśīmaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:18838: 488.011 tairlambate lambata iti uccair nādo muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18839: tasmiñ janapade manuṣyāṇāṃ lambakapāla iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:18841: 488.013 tatra śyāmākaṃ dārakaṃ vṛkṣamūle sthāpayitvā piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18843: 488.014 paurajānapadāḥ saṃnipatya kathayanti--bhavantaḥ, kaṃ rājānamabhiṣiñcāma iti?
S01divyav_u:18845: 488.015 apare kathayanti--kathamasau prajñāyata iti? anye kathayanti--parīkṣakāḥ prayujyantāmiti/
S01divyav_u:18851: tasya vṛkṣasya cchāyā asya śyāmākasya dāraksya kāyaṃ na vijahātīti/
S01divyav_u:18852: 488.019 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ saṃjalpitumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ, ayaṃ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ sattvaḥ, etamabhiṣiñcāma iti/
S01divyav_u:18858: kimasya dārakasya rājñaḥ saṃvartanīyāni karmāṇi na veti/
S01divyav_u:18860: sa kathayati--putra, pratīccha rājyam, kiṃ tu dharmeṇa te kārayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:18867: 488.027 sā āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--dṛṣṭvā cirasya bara putrakaṃ paśyāmi,
S01divyav_u:18872: tasyā āyuṣmatā mahākātyāyanenāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:18873: yāṃ śrutvā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:18874_0: 488.032 sā dṛṣṭasatyā trirudānamudānayati sma--idamasmākaṃ bhadanata na mātrā [489]kṛtaṃ
S01divyav_u:18874_1: na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam /
S01divyav_u:18883: 489.006 durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge ca te aham/
S01divyav_u:18884: 489.007 sthāpitā putra yatnena sādhu te duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam//68//
S01divyav_u:18885: 489.008 athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastāṃ bhadrakanyāṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya kathayati--amba,
S01divyav_u:18887: 489.009 sā kathayati--putra, yadyevaṃ mama kiṃcidanuprayaccha, yatrāhaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmīti/
S01divyav_u:18889: tayā stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sā tasmin pratimāropitā/
S01divyav_u:18897: 489.014 sa saṃlakṣayati--uktaṃ bhagavatā madhyadeśe pule na dhārayitavye iti/
S01divyav_u:18900: tayā sthaṇḍile kārayitvā te pratiṣṭhāpite itaścarasantisaṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:18903: kiccitkuśalacaryeti? sa kathayati--āyuṣmantaḥ, kiṃcit sukhacaryā kiṃcidduḥkhacaryeti/
S01divyav_u:18906: 489.019 yad rājā śikhaṇḍī raurukanivāsī ca janakāya ahaṃ ca pāṃśunāvacṭabdhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18914: 489.024 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā rudrāyaṇena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule pratyājātah?
S01divyav_u:18920: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:18924: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:18926: 490.002 sāmagarīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//69// iti/
S01divyav_u:18927_0: 490.003 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīti^dhvani asti buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā
S01divyav_u:18927_1: lola utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktāḥ khaṅgaviṣāṇakalpā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
S01divyav_u:18929: tasya karvaṭakasya ca nātidūre udapānaṃ prabhūtānāṃ mṛgāṇāmāvāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18930: 490.006 tatrāsau lubdhakaḥ pratidinaṃ prabhūtān kūṭān pāśālepāṃśca pratikṣipati prabhūtānāṃ mṛgānāmutsādāya vināśāya anayena vyasanāya/
S01divyav_u:18932: 490.008 yāvadanyataraḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāaṃ caraṃstaṃ karvaṭakamanuprāpto devatāyatane rātiṃdivā samupāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:18933: 490.009 sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya taṃ karvaṭakamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18935: 490.010 tataḥ piṇḍapātamaṭitvā saṃlakṣayati--idaṃ devāyatanaṃ divā ākīrṇam/
S01divyav_u:18936: 490.011 bahiḥ karvaṭakasya śānte sthāne piṇḍapātaṃ velāṃ karomīti/
S01divyav_u:18937: sa karvaṭakānniṣkramyedaṃ śāntamidaṃ śāntamiti yena tadudapānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18938_0: 490.012 upasaṃkramya pātrasnāvaṇamekānta upanikṣipya pādau prakṣālya hastau nirmādya
S01divyav_u:18938_1: pānīyaṃ parisrāvya śīrṇaparṇakāni samudānīya niṣadya bhaktaketyaṃ kṛtvā hastau nirmādya
S01divyav_u:18938_2: mukhaṃ pātraṃ ca pātraparisrāvaṇam yathāsthāne sthāpya pādau prakṣālya anyatamavṛkṣamūlaṃ
S01divyav_u:18938_3: niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā śānteneryāpathena niṣaṇṇaḥ /
S01divyav_u:18940: atha sa lubdhakaḥ kālyamevotthāya yena tadudapānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18944: kimatra kāraṇam yenādya ekamṛgo 'pi na baddha iti?/
S01divyav_u:18949: 490.021 sa saṃlakṣayati--ete pravrajitāḥ śāntātmāna īdṛśeṣu sthāneṣvabhiramante/
S01divyav_u:18950: yadyadyāhamasya jīvitāpacchedaṃ na karomi, niyatameṣa mama vṛttisamucchedaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:18952: 490.023 tenāsau nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena karākārasadṛśaṃ dhanurākarṇaṃ pūrayitvā saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18953: 490.024 sa mahātmā pratyekabuddhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--mā ayaṃ tapasvī lubdho 'tyantakṣataśca bhaviṣyati, upahataśca/
S01divyav_u:18955: sa vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarāja uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18957: 490.027 sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--avatarāvatara sadbhūtadakṣiṇīya,
S01divyav_u:18964: 490.030 sa saṃlakṣayati--yanmayā anena pūtikāyena prāptavyaṃ tadidānīṃ śāntaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ praviśāmīti/
S01divyav_u:18965: 490.031 sa tasyaiva purastātpunargaganatalamabhyudgamya vicitrāṇi pratihāryāṇi vidarśya nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18969: tānyasthīni nave kumbhe prakṣipya śārīrastūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18971: gandhairmālyairdhūpaśca kumbhe kṛtvā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yanmayaivaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāro kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18974: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam,
S01divyav_u:18977: 491.007 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena lubdhakaḥ, eṣa evāsau rudrāyaṇo bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:18978: 491.008 yadanena pratyekabuddhaḥ saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18979: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi narakeṣu paktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18980: tasminnapi codapāne saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18982_0: 491.011 punarapi bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:18982_1: papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta śikhaṇḍinā raurukanivāsinā janakāyenāyucmatā mahākātyāyanena
S01divyav_u:18987: na bḥkṣavaḥ karmaṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:18991: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāayataneṣu karmaṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:18993: 491.019 samagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//70//
S01divyav_u:18996: 491.021 sa tayā saha krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:18997: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18998: 491.022 punarasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato dārikā jātā/
S01divyav_u:19000: 491.023 yā janmikā dārikāḥ, tāsām yācanakā āgacchanti/
S01divyav_u:19002: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanasanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:19004: 491.026 yāvattayā dārikayā gṛhaṃ saṃmṛjya vāṭasyopariṣṭāt saṃkāraśchoritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19010: sā bhrātrā pṛṣṭā--kiṃ tvayādya kṛtam yena te yācanakā nāgatā iti/
S01divyav_u:19015: 491.032 yasyā yasyā yācanakā āgacchanti, sā sā tasya pratyekabuddhasyopari saṃkāram [492]chorayatviti/
S01divyav_u:19021: 492.003 tasmin karvaṭake dvau gṛhapatī samakau prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:19024: 492.005 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau dārikā yayā pratyekabuddhasyopari saṃkāraśchoritaḥ, eṣa evāsu śikhaṇḍī/
S01divyav_u:19025: 492.006 yo 'sau karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyaḥ, eṣa evāsau raurukanivāsī janakāyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19028: 492.008 yo 'sau gṛhapatī yābhyāṃ nivāritam, etāvetau hirubhirukāvagrāmātyau/
S01divyav_u:19030: yo 'sau dārikāyā bhrātā yena vipuṣpitam, eṣa evāsau kātyāyano bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:19031: 492.010 yadanena bipuṣpitaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19032: 492.011 yadi tena na vipuṣpitam (cittam) na pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdho 'bhaviṣyaditi/
S01divyav_u:19035: 492.013 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:19038: 492.014 tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:19045: 493.002 mātaryapakāriṇaḥ prāṇina ihaiva vyasanaprapātapātālāvalambino bhavantīti satatasamupajāyamānapremaprasādabahumānamānasaiḥ satpuruṣairmātaraḥ śuśrūṣaṇīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19051: 493.015 dṛṣṭvā lokamimaṃ dhanakṣayabhayāt saṃtyaktadānotsavaṃ lokakleśapiśācikāvaśatayā saṃdūṣitādhyāśayam/
S01divyav_u:19052: 493.017 kāruṇyāt sa dadāvanāthakṛpaṇaklībāturebhyo dhanaṃ matvā ca prahatārṇavormicapalaṃ svaṃ jīvitaṃ bhūyasā//3//
S01divyav_u:19053: 493.019 yeṣu vyāsajjacetā bhujagavaravadhūbhogabhīmeṣu labdhā gāhante pāpagartaṃ sphuṭadahanaśikhābhīmaparyantarandhram/
S01divyav_u:19056: yadāsau lokapravādamātrayāpi panthānaṃ samavatīrya dhanadavaruṇakuberaśaṃkarajanārdanapitāmahādīn devatāviśeṣān putrārtham yācitumārebhe/
S01divyav_u:19058: 493.029 tattattasya prabalavirasam yāti tīkṣṇāṃśumālaiḥ śoṣaṃ manye raviriva jalaṃ bhāgadheyārkabimbam//5//
S01divyav_u:19059: 494.001 [494]rudraṃ naikakapālaśekharadharaṃ cakrāyudhaṃ vajriṇaṃ sraṣṭāraṃ makaradhvajaṃ girisutāputraṃ mayūrāsanam/
S01divyav_u:19060: 494.003 gaṅgāśaṅkhadalāvadātasalilāṃstāṃstāṃśca devānasau putrārthī śaraṇam yayau bahu punardānaṃ dvijebhyo dadau//6//
S01divyav_u:19063: 494.009 evamanekaprakārakāyacetasorāyāsakāribhirapi vratopavāsamaṅgalairyadā naiva kadācit kāle 'sya putrā jīvino babhūvuḥ,
S01divyav_u:19068: 494.015 na ca te 'dyāpi jīvanti tatra kiṃ parikhidyase//9//
S01divyav_u:19070: 494.018 ye yairvinā nātmabhavaṃ labhante te tairvinā janma kathaṃ bhajeran//10//
S01divyav_u:19072: 494.022 tvaṃ kenāpi viḍambase jaḍamatiḥ putrāśayonmattako yastvaṃ dyāmadhigantumicchasi bṛhatsopānamālāśrayāt//12//
S01divyav_u:19073: 494.024 vidhimaparamahaṃ te bodhayāmi prasiddhyai tvamapi ca kuru tāvat saṃprasiddhyai kadācit/
S01divyav_u:19074: 494.026 yadi bhavati sutaste kanyakānāma tasya sakalajanapade 'smin khyāpayasva prasiddhyā//13//
S01divyav_u:19075: 494.028 atha tasya kālāntare gaganatalamaṃśumālīva svakiraṇanikarairvirājamānaṃ svavaṃśalakṣmīḥ putraṃ janayāmbabhūva/
S01divyav_u:19080: 495.005 mūrtistasya rarāja cāruśikharāddhemam yathā bhūcyutaṃ prodgīrṇasvamayūkhajālajaṭilai ratnāṅkurairveṣṭitam//15//
S01divyav_u:19087: 495.017 atha tasya pitā mitraḥ sārthavāho vaṇigjanaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:19090: 495.021 pitaryatīte jananīṃ jagāda cakāra kiṃ karma pitā mameti//20//
