S01divyav_u:19096: 495.028 yāvaccāyaṃ janapadamimaṃ tasya vṛttiṃ na bhūtāṃ pṛcchatyasmai kathayati na vā sarva evaiṣa lokaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19097: 495.030 tāvadyuktaṃ mama sutamimaṃ mṛtyuvaktrāntarālaṃ nānāduḥkhavyasanagahanaṃ vyādhiṣaktaṃ niṣeddhum//23//
S01divyav_u:19098: 496.001 [496]paro 'pi yaḥ sādhujanānujuṣṭaṃ vihāya mārgaṃ śrayate vimārgam/
S01divyav_u:19099: 496.003 nivāraṇīyaḥ sa svamatājjanena prayatnataḥ kiṃ punareva putraḥ//24//
S01divyav_u:19103: 496.008 atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo māturvacanaṃ kusumamālāmiva śirasā samabhivandya anyasminnahani aukarikāpaṇaṃ prasasāra/
S01divyav_u:19106: 496.012 svagarbhasaṃdhāraṇaduḥkhitāyai dadau sa tasyai mudito jananyai/
S01divyav_u:19108: 496.016 atha ye tasmin puravare ciraṃtanā aukarikāḥ,
S01divyav_u:19111: 496.020 sa tvaṃ tāṃ vṛttimujjhatvā śrayase 'nyāṃ kayā dhiyā//28//
S01divyav_u:19116: atha gāndhikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣāḥ sametyāgatya ca taṃ mahāsattvaṃ vicchandayāmāsuh--
S01divyav_u:19117: 496.026 gāndhāpaṇaṃ klībajanābhipannaṃ pitā na vai mādya pure(?) cakāra/
S01divyav_u:19118: 496.028 tatraiva hairaṇyikatāṃ sa kṛtvā dhanāni bhūyāṃsi samāpa sādho//30//
S01divyav_u:19119: 496.030 atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāmapi jīvikāmapahāya hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ cakrāra/
S01divyav_u:19121: 497.001 [497]lebhe dine sa prathame mahārhaḥ kārṣāpaṇān ṣoḍaśa tān dadau ca//31//
S01divyav_u:19124: 497.005 atha hairaṇyikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣā sametyāgatya ca taṃ tasmātkarmaṇo vinivartanārthamāhuh--
S01divyav_u:19128: 497.010 vivartitaṃ ślāghyamatīva puṃsāṃ na tu svavṛtteścyavanaṃ pravṛttam//34//
S01divyav_u:19131: 497.016 yadāśritaṃ karma janānuvarjinā tvayā vidagdhena dhanepsunādhunā/
S01divyav_u:19132: 497.018 kathaṃ na saṃprāpsyasi bhāgyasampadaṃ piturvyatīte 'pi viśālinīṃ śriyam//36//
S01divyav_u:19134: 497.022 tasyā mahendrāmalatulyakīrteḥ sūnuḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ na bibharṣi lajjām//37//
S01divyav_u:19135: 497.024 ye mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti naiva vipadi grāsaṃ bhajante 'nagha gehe bandhuṣu sūnuṣu vyapagatasnehātmanodyoginaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19136: 497.026 ye nītvā jaladhīnagādhasalilānāvartabhīmān budhāḥ prāpyārthān gajadantabhaṅgasitayāsinvanta kīrtyā jagat//38//
S01divyav_u:19137: 497.028 atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastebhyo 'pi tathānuguṇinīṃ kathāmavadhārya samudrāvataraṇakṛtavyavasāyo mātaramupasṛtyovāca--amba,
S01divyav_u:19140: 497.030 sā pūrvameva bhartṛmaraṇaduḥkhena vigatajīvitāśā svasya tanayasya tenāsamlakṣitadāruṇena viyogaśokaśastreṇa bhṛśataraṃ pravidāryamāṇahṛdayeva svatanayamāha--
S01divyav_u:19142: 497.033 jīvitaṃ kasya te 'niṣṭaṃ tvayā krīḍāṃ karoti kaḥ//39//
S01divyav_u:19145: 498.003 na yāvadevaṃ mama duḥkhaśalyaṃ prayāti nāśaṃ pravidārya śokam/
S01divyav_u:19146: 498.005 kathaṃ nu tasyopari me dvitīyaṃ nipātyate pāpamayairamitraiḥ//41//
S01divyav_u:19147: 498.007 yeṣāṃ ceto vividhavirasāyāsaduḥkhāprakampyam yaiḥ saṃtyaktaṃ kṛpaṇahṛdayairjīvitaṃ bhogalubdhaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:19148: 498.009 te saṃtyaktvā nayanagalitāśrupravāhārdravaktrān bandhūnajñā makaranilaye mṛtyave yānti nāśam//42//
S01divyav_u:19150: 498.013 saṃtyajya yātuṃ kathamudyamaste mā sā kathā mā nu vaco madīyam(?)//43//
S01divyav_u:19152: 498.017 saṃpattayo yena vaṇigjanasya tato 'hamevaṃ suta vārayāmi//44//
S01divyav_u:19153: 498.019 sa tasyā hitārthaṃ madhurāṇyapi vacanakusumāni tṛṇamivāvadhūya sapragalbhatayā samavalambitavikatthāśobhaṃ kiṃcidīdṛśaṃ pratyāha--
S01divyav_u:19154: 498.021 varaṃ naiva tu jāyeran ye jātā nirdhanā janāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19155: 498.022 jātasya yadi duḥkhāni varaṃ mṛtyur na jīvitam//45//
S01divyav_u:19157: 498.024 arthino mama pāpasya yānti niḥśvasya durmanāḥ//46//
S01divyav_u:19158: 498.025 ye śaktihīnā vibhavārjanādau te dehino duḥkhaśataṃ sahante/
S01divyav_u:19159: 498.027 lokaṃ punarduḥkhaśatopataptaṃ draṣṭaṃ na śaknomi cirāyamāṇaḥ//47//
S01divyav_u:19160: 498.029 tasmādvilaṅghāmi vacastvadīyam yāsyāmi taṃ tvaṃ prajahīhi śokam/
S01divyav_u:19161: 498.031 tatraiva yāyāṃ nidhanaṃ samudre chinnaṃ mayā vā vyasanaṃ janasya//48//
S01divyav_u:19162: 499.001 [499]atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo mātaramapramāṇīkṛtya nirgatya gṛhādvārāṇasyāṃ puryāmātmānaṃ sārthavāhamityuddhoṣayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:19163: 499.003 asyāmeva purā puraṃdarapurīpratispardhipuryāṃ vaṇik mitro nāma babhūva yatsuranaraprakhyātakīrtidhvajaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19164: 499.005 putrastasya mahāsamudramacirādyāsyatyamuṣmindine yātum ye vaṇijaḥ kṛtopakaraṇāste santu sajjā iti//49//
S01divyav_u:19169: 499.014 anartharāgagrahamūḍhabuddhayo narā hi paśyanti na kevalaṃ hitam/
S01divyav_u:19170: 499.016 satāṃ hitādhānavidhānacetasāṃ giro 'pi śṛṇvanti na bhūtavādinām//50//
S01divyav_u:19171: 499.018 maitrakanyako 'pi dharaṇi{tala}niṃnāṃ mātaraṃ śokavaśyāṃ śirasi kupitacittaḥ pādavajreṇa hatvā/
S01divyav_u:19172: 499.021 muhurupacitaśokaḥ karmaṇā preryamāṇas tvaritamatirabhūt saṃprayātuṃ vaṇigbhiḥ//51//
S01divyav_u:19175: 499.026 vyasanaphalamanantaṃ mā tu bhūt karmaṇo 'sya punarapi guruvākyaṃ mātigāḥ svapnato 'pi//52//
S01divyav_u:19196: 501.009 atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastena mahatā vyasanopanipātenāpyanāpatitabhayaviṣādadainyāyāsamanāḥ samavalambya mahaddhairyaparākramaṃ sasambhramaṃ phalakamādāya prasasāra/
S01divyav_u:19199: 501.016 saṃsmṛtya māturvacanaṃ sa pāṇā vyāsajya mūrdhānamidaṃ jagāda//62//
S01divyav_u:19200: 501.018 śṛṇvanti ye nātmahitaṃ gurūṇāṃ vākyaṃ hitārthodayakāryabhadram/
S01divyav_u:19203: 501.024 prāptaṃ phalaṃ janmataroḥ sudhībhirye mānayantīha giro gurūṇām//64//
S01divyav_u:19204: 501.026 māturhitāyaiva sadodyatāyāḥ prollaṅghya vākyaṃ mama duṣkṛtasya/
S01divyav_u:19205: 501.028 puṣpam yadīdṛgbharapāpadāruṇaṃ prāntaṃ gamiṣyāmi kadā phalasya//65//
S01divyav_u:19207: 501.032 guruśirasi dadhānaḥ pādavajraṃ khalo 'haṃ kathamavanividāryaśvabhrarandhre na lagnaḥ//66//
S01divyav_u:19208: 502.001 [502]ye santo hitavādināṃ sphuṭadhiyāṃ saṃpādayante giriḥ śreyaste samavāpnuvanti niyataṃ kravyādapuryām yathā/
S01divyav_u:19209: 502.003 ye tūtsṛjya mahārthasāradayitāṃ vācaṃ śrayante 'nyathā dustāre vyasanodadhau nipatintāḥ śocanti te 'ham yathā//67//
S01divyav_u:19211: 502.009 ete dāḍimapuṣpalohitamukhāḥ pronmuktakolāhalā hāsādarśitadantapaṅktivirasāḥ śākhāmṛgā nirbhayāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19212: 502.011 sarpān bhīmaviṣānalasphuradurujvālākarālasphuṭān hatvā pāṇitalaiḥ prayānti vivaśāḥ phūtkārabhītā nunaḥ//68//
S01divyav_u:19214: 502.015 vaṃśaistālaravaiḥ sagītamadhuraiḥ pracchedasampādibhiḥ saṃgītāhitacatasaḥ pramuditā gāyantyamī kinnarāḥ//69//
S01divyav_u:19228: 503.005 likhantaṃ karālair nabhaḥ śṛṅgajālaiḥ kṣipantaṃ mayūkhaistamaḥ sāgarāṇām/
S01divyav_u:19238: 503.024 prekṣante madavārilolamadhuliṭprollīḍhagaṇḍasthalaṃ darpāt kesariṇo balena mahatā pronmathyamānā gajam//78//
S01divyav_u:19239_1: jagat saṃsārapaṅke tribhuvanasvāmīvodayad ramaṇakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa /
S01divyav_u:19255: 504.025 adyaiva duḥkhāni śamaṃ gatāni adyaiva no jīvitamāttasāram/
S01divyav_u:19260: 505.003 teṣāṃ phalaṃ vīkṣaṇameva te 'laṃ saṅgastvayā kiṃ punareva dīghyam (rgha?) //87//
S01divyav_u:19261: 505.005 adyaiva mā bandhusuhṛdviyogaśokaṃkathāḥ kasya na santyapāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19262: 505.007 dāsyo vayaṃ te 'psarasaścatasrah chāyā na te laṅghayituṃ samarthāḥ//88//
S01divyav_u:19263: 505.009 ratnāni vāsāṃsi samujjvalāni śayyāśrayāścārutarā vayaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:19268: 505.018 nitye viyoge maraṇāt puraḥsthite śocanti te deśakṛte viyoge/
S01divyav_u:19271: 505.024 haimādriśṛṅgamiva tatpuramāviśantaṃ nemuḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭā bahavo 'pi tatra//92//
S01divyav_u:19274: 505.029 hā kiṃ vinikṣipya kharāgravajro nāthaḥ surāṇāmiti tarkito 'bhūt//93//
S01divyav_u:19280: 506.009 krīḍan sa kālaṃ na viveda yātaṃ sarvātmanā rāgaparītacetāḥ//96//
S01divyav_u:19281: 506.011 pratyahaṃ ca dakṣiṇena gamanaṃ vārayanti sma/
S01divyav_u:19282: so 'pi yathā yathā nivāryate, tathā tathā tayā diśā gamanāyautsukyamanā babhūva/
S01divyav_u:19285: 506.015 yadi kuryādayaṃ loke suhṛdāṃ vacanaṃ hitam/
S01divyav_u:19286: 506.016 paraiti svargaṃ pātāle śvabhre vā svapnato 'pi na//98//
S01divyav_u:19287: 506.017 atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāsāmapsarasāmaparijñātagamanaprayojano dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi padavīmāruhya vrajan sadāmattakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa/
S01divyav_u:19288: 506.018 tasmādapi nagarādaṣṭāpsarasaḥ sasambhramaṃ niḥsṛtya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ praveśayāmāsuḥ/
S01divyav_u:19289: 506.019 tatrāpyaticiraṃ ratimanubhūya pratiṣiddhamānagamanakriyastenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchannandanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa/
S01divyav_u:19291: 506.021 tatrāpi ciraṃ krīḍāṃ sevitvā tasmādapi brahmottaraṃ nāma nagaraṃ prayayau/
S01divyav_u:19292: tatrāpi dvātriṃśatāpsarobhiḥ prabhūtasatkāraṃ viṣayasukhaṃ bhuktvā tāḥ prāha--
S01divyav_u:19293: 506.023 icchāmi gantuṃ tadahaṃ bhavantyo mā matkṛte śokahrade śayīdhvam/
S01divyav_u:19294: 506.025 saṃpātabhadrāṇi hi kasya nāma viśleṣaduḥkhāni na santi loke//99//
S01divyav_u:19295: 506.027 sthitvāpi yenaiva ciraṃ viyogaḥ śatroḥ kṛtāntādbhavitāntakāle/
S01divyav_u:19298: 507.001 [507]viśleṣaduḥkhāya ratiṃ prayānti teṣāṃ paro nāsti vimūḍhacetāḥ//101//
S01divyav_u:19299: 507.003 athāpsarasastāḥ samastāstadgamanaviyogaśokaropitahṛdayāḥ sasambhramāḥ kamalakuvalayakunmalavilāsā nalinya iva śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayaḥ prāhuh--
S01divyav_u:19300: 507.005 asmāsu te kartumaniṣṭamiṣṭaṃ kathaṃ hi bhaktipraṇayārpitāsu/
S01divyav_u:19302: 507.009 gatvā tannagaratrayam yadapi he svāminnihāpyāgataḥ saṃprāptā viṣayopabhogamadhurāḥ saṃpattayaste ciram/
S01divyav_u:19303: 507.011 gantavyaṃ na punastvayā subahunā proktena kim yāsi cet saṃsmartāsi vipatsamudrapatito vākyaṃ hi no duḥkhitaḥ//103//
S01divyav_u:19306: 507.015 kathaṃ teṣu nivāryerannivarteran kathaṃ nu vā//104//
S01divyav_u:19307: 507.016 niyojanīyāḥ suhṛdo 'suhṛdbhir yasmin hite karmaṇi nityakālam/
S01divyav_u:19308: 507.018 nivāraṇaṃ tatra tu ye prakurvate te śatravo mitratayā bhavanti//105//
S01divyav_u:19309: 507.020 divyaṃ prāpya sukhaṃ pure ramaṇake saṃcoditaḥ karmaṇā āyāto 'smi niṣevaṇāya paraṃ saukhyaṃ sadāmattakam/
S01divyav_u:19310: 507.022 saṃprāpto 'smi tataḥ svakarmakuśaleneṣṭaṃ puraṃ nandanaṃ tasmādāgatakasya yūyamadhunā pronmūlitā bhūmayaḥ//106//
S01divyav_u:19311: 507.024 tasmādato me gamanaṃ bhavantyo mā vārayadhvaṃ na hi no 'styapāyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19313_1: tiraskṛtya tenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan dadarśa mahārgalapraghaṭitaprakaṭapuṭacaturdvāradāruṇaṃ
S01divyav_u:19315: 508.001 [508]samprāptamātrasya tu tatkṣaṇena dvāraṃ ca pusphoṭa kapāṭabhāram/
S01divyav_u:19326: 508.019 kṣaṇādabhūttannagaraṃ ca sarvaṃ bhrāntaṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ sa dadarśa bhītaḥ//111//
S01divyav_u:19327_0: 508.021 tato maitrakanyako bodhisattvaḥ paśyati sma tamatidāruṇākārapramāṇaṃ krūrājvalanamālāliṅgitamudāreṇa
S01divyav_u:19329: 508.025 kiṃ nāgo 'si suro 'si kinnaravaro yakṣo 'si kiṃ mānuṣaḥ kiṃ vidyādharasainikaḥ kimasi vā daityaḥ piśāco 'si vā/
S01divyav_u:19330: 508.027 kiṃ vākāri bhavāntareṣu bhavatā karmātiraudraṃ svayam yāsyāmi vyasanaṃ duruttaramidaṃ bhujyaṃ phalaṃ krandayat//112//
S01divyav_u:19332: 508.030 nāhaṃ nāgo naiva yakṣo na devo daityo nāhaṃ nāpi gandharvarājaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19333: 509.001 [509]rakṣo nāhaṃ nāpi vidyādharo 'pi jātistulyā saṃpratīhi tvayā naḥ//113//
S01divyav_u:19335: 509.004 kiṃ karma bhramatā tvayā kumatinā saṃsāradurge kṛtam yenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi cakraṃ bhramatyāyasam/
S01divyav_u:19337: 509.007 nānāduṣkarakārikā bhagavatī saṃsārasaṃdarśikā tatra śreyaḥsukhopapādanaparā matsnehabaddhāśayā//114//
S01divyav_u:19338: 509.009 yāṃ loke pravadanti sādhumatayaḥ kṣetraṃ paraṃ prāṇināṃ daivāveśavaśādakāryagurukastasyā jananyā mahat/
S01divyav_u:19339: 509.011 sādho prāskhalayaṃ śiraḥpraharaṇaṃ pādena pāpāśayas tenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi me cakraṃ bhramatyāyasam//115//
S01divyav_u:19340: 509.013 atha bodhisattvastasya puruṣasya pravacanapratodena saṃcoditahṛdayastāṃ parajugupsāmātmanyanupaśyannāha--
S01divyav_u:19342: 509.017 yeṣu svayaṃ doṣaguṇeṣu magnas taireva lokaṃ kathamaṅkayāmi//116//
S01divyav_u:19346: 509.025 kiṃ na paśyati karmāṇi balavanti śarīriṇām/
S01divyav_u:19348: 509.027 ye baddhā viṣayeṇa duḥkhanigaḍenāyāsakarmotkaṭe ye tyaktvā guruvākyamandhamatayaḥ pāpāśrayaṃ kurvate/
S01divyav_u:19349: 509.029 muktāḥ karmabhireva duḥkhanigaḍapracchedaśūraiḥ śubhair mānuṣyam yadavāpya mūḍhamatayo dūre sthitā jarmiṇah (janminah?) //119//
S01divyav_u:19350_0: 509.031 atha tasya vacanānantarameva karmānilāvegotkṣiptamiva taccakraṃ ciṭiciṭāyamānadahanakaṇacayodgāraraudraṃ
S01divyav_u:19350_1: tasya mūrdhnaḥ samabhyudgamya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya śiraḥ pravidārayad bhramitumārabdham /
S01divyav_u:19353: 510.003 tataḥ sa puruṣo hā heti mūrdhnā pravidāhajena tīvreṇa duḥkhena samākramyamāṇaśarīrakaṃ maitrakanyakaṃ bodhisattvamāha--
S01divyav_u:19355: 510.007 saṃtyajya karmāda parāṇi tāni prāptastvidaṃ sthānamanantaduḥkham//121//
S01divyav_u:19356: 510.009 devālayaṃ divyasukhopabhogaṃ ko nāma saṃprāpya śubhairatulyaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:19360: 510.016 saṃtyajya nāgā vyasanaṃ sahante yayā tayecchālatayā gato 'ham//123//
S01divyav_u:19362: 510.020 yuddhe mriyante bahavo narendrā yayā tayecchālatayā gato 'ham//124//
S01divyav_u:19364: 510.024 mahodadhau yānti narāḥ praṇāśam yayā tayecchālatayā gato 'ham//125//
